chapter.verse: Iliivuru yo mayaranacelo o nrukulu na Yesu Kristu, mwana a Taviti, mwana a Aparahamu.
Aparahamu ahonnyara Isaki; Isaki ahonnyara Yakopi; Yakopi ahonnyara Yuta wamoca na asunnawe.
Yuta ahonnyarana Tamari asaana yeehaninya Peresi ni Seraa; Peresi ahonnyara Esiromi; Esiromi, ahonnyara Aramu;
Aramu ahonnyara Aminatapi; Aminatapi ahonnyara Naasomi; Naasomi ahonnyara Salimomi;
Salimomi ahonnyara Powasi, anumwane Rahapi; Powasi ahonnyara Opete, anumwane Ruti, ni Opete ahonnyara Yesee;
Yesee ahonnyara mwene Taviti ni mwene Taviti ahonnyara Salomoni, na athiyana yaari amwaarawe Uriya;
Salomoni ahonnyara Ropowau; Ropowau ahonnyara Apiyasi; Apiyasi ahonnyara Asa;
Asa ahonnyara Yosafaa; Yosafaa ahonnyara Yoramu, Yoramu ahonnyara Usiyasi;
Usiyasi ahonnyara Yotamu, Yotamu ahonnyara Akasi, Akasi ahonnyara Esekiya;
Esekiya ahonnyara Manasesi; Manasesi ahonnyara Amoni; Amoni ahonnyara Yosiya;
Yosiya ahonnyara Yekoniya ni asihimawe, ukati waavariyaya athamiheriyaka uPapiloniya.
Wahoolo anathamiheriyene uPapiloniya, Yekoniya ahonnyara Salatiyeli, ni Salatiyeli ahonnyara Soropapeli;
Soropapeli ahonnyara Apiyuti; Apiyuti ahonnyara Eliyakimi; Eliyakimi ahonnyara Asori;
Asori ahonnyara Satoki; Satoki ahonnyara Akimu; Akimu ahonnyara Eliyuti;
Eliyuti ahonnyara Eleyaseri; Eleyaseri ahonnyara Mathani; Mathani ahonnyara Yakopi.
Yakopi ahonnyara Yusufu, awannyawe Mariya annyanre Yesu, neehaninya Kristu.

Maanaya maloko othene, ukhuma Aparahamu mpaka Taviti, ari khumi na macese; ukhuma Taviti mpaka aathamiheriyaya atthu uPapiloniya, ari khumi na macese, ni ukhuma waatamiheriyaya atthu uPapiloniya mpaka Kristu, ari khumi na macese.
Uyaryaa wa Yesu Kristu weeranele coo: Mariya anumwane Yesu napakaneliyene ni Yusufu, ahinaya waathukmanana, ahorupala irukulu mo'kuru co Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Nanso Yusufu mayopakanela, ukhala wiira aari ntthu nasariya ni khaatthuna unvenwihaca, aholakela unhiya mmwiitihoni.
Nanso oopuwelacaka manhiyero, ahophwanyinya munttorani ni ncelo a Apwiya amwiirelaka: Yusufu, mwana a Taviti, uhoove unkusa Mariya ukhala mwaaraa, kontha irukulu irinawe iyo iri yo Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Uyo naahala unnyara mwana ni ummonvaha ncina na Yesu, kontha naahala woopola atthu awe ntampini mwaya.
Cothene nnyo ciiraneenle wiira itthariheleliye ile yaahimilyaya Apwiya anleeheraka nnapiyu yiiraka:
Mwali oohincuwela nlopwana, naahala urupala irukulu ni unnyara mwana, ni yooyo nohala wiihaninya Emanueli, maanaya wiira: Nluku ri ni hiyano.
Yusufu wunwa wawe waarupawe, ahopanka toko caalamuleliyawe ni ncelo a Apwiya, ni ahomwaakhelela Mariya ukhala amwaarawe.
Nanso khaanthukumananne mpaka waannyanryawe mwana, ni ahonvaha ncina na Yesu.
Yesu ayaryele uPetelehemu yo'Yuteya, Heroti nari mwene, yahowa uYerusalemu acuwelaci o'tthoottwa, yaakhuma mphantte unkhuma ncuwa,
ni yaanakohakoha yiiraka: Ri vayi mwene a ayuta yaryele naanano uyo? Kontha nihowoona itthoottwa awe ikhumelelaka unkhuma ncuwa, ni naaweenle unlapela.
Vano weewilyawe mwene Heroti, ahotikhinaca, na atthu othene o'Yerusalemu.
Vaavale ahaalattula akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha o'lapo yeeyo ni ahaakohakoha eeraka: Nipuroni naahalawe uyaryaa Kristu?
Yahaakhula yiiraka: UPetelehemu yo'Yuteya, kontha ihantikhiya ni nnapiyu wiira:
We Petelehemu, ilapo yo'Yuta, kuhimwena mwankani woopwaha iparasa cothene co'Yuta, kontha mwa we naahala ukhumelela nlamuli nohala uhakhela unethi aka, Sirayeli.
Toko commo, Heroti aheehana mmwiitihoni acuwelaci ni ahaakohakoha wiira acuwele ukatini woonnyaya itthoottwa eyo.
Vano aarumaka uPetelehemu, aheerela: Murwee mweeweehe ratta ratta ihaali ya mwan'oyo, ni mwamphwanya, mwaakihimerye wiira ni mi kirwee kanlapele.
Waamwiiwilyaya mwene ule, yahorwaaca. Vano yahoona wiira itthoottwa yoonnyaya mphantte unkhuma ncuwa yaari uhoolo waya, mpaka weemenlyaya nipuro naaryawe mwana.
Woonnyaya itthoottwa ile, yahotteeliya venci n'utthapa.
Waakenlyaya mpaani, yahomoona mwan'oyo ni Mariya anumwane. Yahokhoroma n'unlapela, ni atthukulaka mirupa caya, yahokumiha mihakhu n'untthuva; nnyo caari, iwooru, lumpani ni miira.
Vano anahimeriyene munttorani wiira ahihokoleele wa Heroti, yahovira nttala nkina arwaaka uwannyaya.

Vano waakhumilyaya acuwelaci, ahowa ncelo a Apwiya wa Yusufu munttorani ni ahomwiirela: Wiitthenkemanihe, unkuse mwan'oyo na anumwane, utthawele wIciipitu ni wakhale wonwo mpaka mi wuhimerya, maana Heroti naahala umwaavya mwan'oyo wiira amwiive.
Witthenkemanihaca wawe, ahonkusa uhiyu mwana ule na anumwane ni ahorwaa wIciipitu,
ni ahokhala wonwo mpaka wakhwilyawe Heroti, wiira itthariheleliye yaahiminye na Apwiya ni nnapiyu eeraka: Ukhuma wIciipitu kihomwiihana mwanaka.

Vano Heroti, woona wawe wiira ahothepiya na acuwelaci yaakhuma unkhuma ncuwa, ahorusiya venci mpaka ulamula wiira yiivakaciye asaana asilopwana othene yaariwo uPetelehemu ni ilapo cowaattamanana wonwo, ukhuma myakha miili urwaaka vathi, toko waaryaya ukati waakohakohilyawe acuwelaci.
Paahi, yaheerannyaa itthu yaahimilyawe nnapiyu Yeremiya, eeraka:
URamaa niheewannyaa ncu, wunla ni ucukula venci; aari Rakeli onlelaka asaanawe, ni khaatthuna umaalihiya, maana khanoona tho.
Vaavale nakhwilene Heroti, ahowa ncelo a Apwiya wa Yusufu munttorani wIciipitu, ni ahomwiirela:
Wiitthenkemanihe, unkuse mwan'oyo na anumwane ni urwee ilapo yo'Sirayeli, maana ahokhwaca ale yaaphavela umwiiva mwan'oyo.
Ule aheetthenkemaniha ni ahonkusa mwana na anumwane aturuwelaka ilapo yo'Sirayeli.
Vaavale, weewilyawe Yusufu wiira Arkelau phinlamula uYuteya, nipuro na Heroti, athumwane, ahoova urwaa wonwo. Ahimeriyaka ni Nluku munttorani, ahorwaa nttetthe wo'Kalileya,
ukhala isittatti yo'Nasaree, wiira itthariheleliye yowantikhiya ni minapiyu yiiraka: Uyo nohala wiihaninya nnasaree.
Yaayo mahuku ayo Yohani Mpattisa ahorwaa itakhwa yo'Yuteya ni ahopacera ulalya, eeraka:
Nrukunuse mirima cinyu, kontha umwene wo wirimu uri wakhiviru.
Kontha Yohani, phi yooyo ahiminye ni nnapiyu Isaya eeraka: Ncu na ntthu nokhuwela ntakhwani niiraka: Nlokihe iphiro ya Apwiya, mookole mittala caya.
Yohani aawara ikuwo co mapururu o'nkamira, eetthukelaka nnyununi mmo isintu yo nrapala. Iyolya awe yaari mattettentte ni urawo wo ntakhwani.
Vano atthu othene o'Yerusalemu, uYuteya wothene ni owaattamanana mooloko Yortani, yaarwa wenwe.
Yaanapattisiya ni yooyo umoolokoni Yortani, alaphululaka itampi caya.
Nanso, woonawe wiira, mafarisi ni masatusi enci yammwa wupattisoni, aheerela: Ikhapila yo'vili, tipani oohimenryeni utthawa uviruwa wa Nluku, unhala uwa?
Paahi, nkhalane mihokorokho coocuwaneha urukunusa winyu mirima;
ni nhancere wiira ayaayoru: Nihaana athumwanihu Aparahamu, kontha mi kinawuhimeryani wiira Nluku nawoorya utatusa ala maluku ala ukhala asaana a Aparahamu.
Ciicammo iheesiya ipaco wamititharini co miri, ni mwiri wothene uhinvaha mihokorokho comaana, unaathikiliya ni uvonyeriya umooroni.

Mi kinoopattisani ni maasi wiira nrukunuse nrima, nanso nohala uwa uttuli waka, haana ikuru impwaha yawaka, ni mi akimphwanela wiira kitthukule miripwe co'kwakwatta cawe. Uyo naahala wuupattisani ni Nnepa Nttakattifu ni mooro.
Haana ithokwa mmatatani mwawe, naahala uveerela itiriku, wahoolo naahala usunka itiriku iyo nnikhupini nawe, nanso macasi ayo naahala upaha ni mooro uhinttiphyaa.
Yoole ukati ule, Yesu ahophiya uYortani akhumaka uKalileya wiira apattisiye ni Yohani.
Vano Yohani ahomananiha unkhottela eeraka: Phi mi kimphwanela upattisiya ni we, vano waneera cani ukiweelaka mi?
Nanso Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Nna va uhiyeke ciicammo kontha ninlamuliya uttharihelela isariya yothene. Vaavale ahonkupaleela.
Yesu napattisiyene, ahokhuma mmaasini. Yooyo ukati uyo irimu yahohulya ni uyo ahoona Nnepa wa Nluku toko ikhuntta inkhuruwelaka.
Vano naheewiya ncu no wirimu niiraka: Ula mwanaka oofentiya, nokitteeliha nrima.
Wahoolo Yesu ahokusiya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu ni ahorwaniya utakhwani wiira attehattehiye ni Sotwani.
Natthukilene mahuku arupayini (40) uhiyu n'uthana, yahonvola itala.
Vano nttehattehi ule ahomwaattamerya Yesu ni ahomwiirela: We wakhala wiira uMwana a Nluku ulamulele ala maluku ala wiira athatuwe mikatthe.
Vano Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Ihantikhiya wiira: Kuhimwena ni nkatthe paahi ntthu phinkhalanawe ukumi, nanso wo nuulumo nothene ninkhuma wamalakuni a Nluku.
Wahoolo, Sotwani ahonrweha Yesu usittatti ittakattifu, ni ahommweliha nipuro nootepa urekama no'nupa ittakattifu ni ahomwiirela:

Wakhala wiira we uMwana a Nluku, utuphe va urwaaka vathi, kontha ihantikhiya wiira: Nluku naahala waaruma ancelo awe nlattu wawaa, ni wuuvarelela mmatatani mwaya, wiira hata nluku nimoca nihuukakathule nnyaani mwaa.
Vano Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Ciicammo ihantikhiya wiira: Uhaattehattehe Apwiya Nluku aa.
Ikwaha ikinaku tho, Sotwani ahonkusa Yesu anrwaanaka umwaakoni woorekama cinene ni ahomoonihera umwene wothene wo nttuniyani ni nttittimiho naya
ni ahomwiirela: Cothene nnya kinawuvaha, wakikhoromelaka ukilapelaka.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Ukhume, we Sotwani, kontha ihantikhiya wiira: Mwaalapele Apwiya Nluku inyu, yaayo paahi phinphwanela urumeeliya.
Ummaleloni Sotwani ahonhiya, ni yahowa ancelo ni yahonrumeela.
Yesu weewilyawe wiira Yohani hotthukiya, ahoturuwela uKalileya.
Akhumaka uNasaree ahorwaa ukhala uKafarnaumu, uri wakhiviru ni ntthiya, nttetthe wo Sepuloni ni Nafitali,
wiira itthariheleliye yaahiminye ni nnapiyu Isaya yiiraka:
Ilapo yo'Sepuloni ni Nafitali iphiro yo'pahari upwaha Yortani, Kalileya a amalaponi,
atthu yaakhala mpiphini yahoona waarya venci; ni ale ankhala ilapo yo mitthuuci co nookhwa wahaasela.
Ukhuma vaavale mpaka wahoolo Yesu ahopacera ulalya eeraka: Nrukunuse mirima cinyu, kontha umwene wo wirimu uri wakhiviru.
Yesu eettaka ni nceresere ntthiya no'Kalileya, ahomoona Simoni eehaninya Peturu, ni nhimawe Anteree, yaavonyeraca matthavi mpahari, kontha yaari mayototha ihopa.
Yesu aheera: Nkitthare mi, ni mi kinkowupankani mayowaatotha atthu.
Wowaakuvyaca wene yahohiyaca matthavi aya ni yahonttharaca Yesu.
Wahoolo, ahomoona Yakopu, mwana a Sepeteu ni Yohani nhimawe. Ale yaari nkalawani wamoca ni Sepeteu athumwanaya, alokihacaka matthavi aya. Yesu aheehanaca,
ni ale, wowaakuvyaca wene yahaahiyaca athumwanaya wamoca ni ikalawa, ni yahonttharaca.
Wahoolo Yesu ahorwaa mittetthe cothene co'Kalileya, eetthucihaka mmasinakokani mwaya, alalyaka nhupi woorera wo Umwene ni avonihaka iretta ni ikwerere cothene ca atthu.
Vano ihapari ca Yesu cahomwareela uSiriya wothene, na atthu othene yaanawaawiiha aretta yaahuvihiya ni minepa coonanara ni cowoopiha, anacilicili, owuntakyaa, ni uyo aanawaavoniha.
Miphwinko cinci ca atthu ookhuma uKalileya, uTekapoli, uYerusalemu, uYuteya ni o mittetthe cikhwawe co Yortani caanantthara.
Yesu woonnyawe atthu enci ahowela mmwaakoni ni wunkoma. Eetthuci awe yahomwaattamerya,
ni ahopacera weetthuciha eeraka:
Ahoreriya ale oohuva munnepani, kontha Umwene wo wirimu uri wawaya.
Ahoreriya ale anonla kontha Nluku nawaamaaliha.
Ahoreriya ale owiiyeviha kontha ilapo yo vathi inhala ukhala yawaya.
Ahoreriya ale anvoliya itala ni ntthona no'sariya, kontha anaahala urupala.
Ahoreriya ale anoonela ikiriri akhwaya, kontha Nluku naahala woonela ikiriri.
Ahoreriya ale ari oorera nrima, kontha anaahala umoona Nluku.
Ahoreriya ale mayowaataniha atthu, kontha Nluku naahala weehana asaanawe.
Ahoreriya ale anoomolanihaciya nlattu woovara intthunawe Nluku, kontha umwene wo wirimu uri wawaya.
Nhoreriya nyu mwaruwaninyaka, nlupatthiyaka ni mootheraciyaka nlattu wawaka.
Ntteeliye ni ntthape kontha nhosunkeriya wirimu itthuvo yuulupale. Ciicammo pheenryaya wowoomolanihiya minapiyu caariwo nyu nhinaya.
Nyu nri maakha o mwiilaponi, vano maakha yalulaka anhala uhokoleela tho cani uciva? Khaanciva tho, uri paahi uriha ni unyakelaciya na atthu.
Nyu nri waarya wo mwiilaponi. Khinvithiya isittatti yootekiya waculu mwaako.
Khimpariheliya isamaninya phweesiyaka nkhwikwicira. Nanso ineesiya nipuro nowoonnya, wiira yaamwaleele atthu othene ari mpaani.
Ciicammo, isamaninya enyu inlamuliya upharela wariyari wa atthu, wiira cooninye coovara cinyu coorera, ni attottopeliye athumwaninyu ari wirimu.
Nhuupuwele wiira mi kaawile umaliha Nlamulo na Musa atthuna Minapiyu. Akaawile umaliha, nanso kaawile uttharihelela nlamulo.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira mpaka wanhalaya umala irimu ni ilapo, khaniwo mena nlepa nimoca ninhala umala muNlamuloni mwaka, mpaka cothene ciirannyeke.

Vano ule nohala uhanyuriha nlamulo nimoca mwa ala, eeraka wiira nna niri nlamulo nankani eetthucihaka atthu, nohala ukhala ookhicera wumweneni wo wirimu. Nanso ule nohala uttharihelela ni wiitthuciha, nohala waalikeleliya ukhala muulupale wumweneni wo wirimu.
Maana kinoohimeryani wiira, isariya cinyu nnyo caahivirikaneke ni isariya co mayowantikha ni mafarisi, khannokela wumweneni wo wirimu.
Nheewa itthu ihimyaceriyaya atthu o khalayi yiiriyaka: Nhiive. Nanso ntthu nohala wiiva, naahukhumwinya.

Vano mi kinawuhimeryani wiira ntthu phi ntthu nohala unviruwela munnawe naahukhumwinya, ni ule nohala unruwana munnawe naahukhumwinya ni mphwinko wa akhulupale, ni ule nohala umwiirela munnawe, nsikini, naahukhumwinya umooroni.
Vano nyu mwawaanaka itthuvo enyu ukhipulani, ni muupuwelaka wiira ihaawo itthu ikipankilyawe munnaka,
nhiye itthuvo enyu iyo wakhipulani, murwee mweewanane ni munninyu, ni wahoolo mwaturuwa vale mwavahe itthuvo enyu iyo.
Mwaakuve umwiiwanana mwiinaninyu nnari ni uyo mphironi, wiira huurweeheni wuuhukhumwinyani, ni mayahukhumu uyo huurweeheni ukalaposo.
Weekhweli kinawuhimeryani wiira khannohala ukhuma wonwo nhinaya uliva itoosu yowiiheerya.
Vano nyu nheewa itthu ihiminye yiiraka: Nheette uluva.
Nanso mi kinwiirelani coo: Nlopwana othene nohala waawehecesa athiyana wowaalakela, wanrimani wawe, heettana uluva.
Wakhalaka wiira niitho naa nno ninawukosiha, utamihe ni urihele uttayi, phatari uhaleele mphantte mmoca wo'rutthu aa, wiira ihiriheliye irutthu aa yothene umooroni.
Wakhala wiira ntata naa no nlopwana ninawukosiha, uthikile ni urihele uttayi, phatari uhaleele mphantte mmoca wo'rutthu aa, wiira ihiriheliye irutthu aa yothene umooroni.
Ciicammo ihohiminya wiira: Ule nohala waamwalanana amwaarawe, aavaheke iwarakha yoomwalana.
Nanso, mi kinwiirelani coo: Ntthu naamwalanana amwaarawe, mari uhikhanle paahi nlattu wooluva, phwaathelaka akina, neetta uluva.
Ciicammo nheewa ceereliyaya atthu okhalayi wiira: Nhilupele moothaka, nanso nttharihelele venci cilupenlenyu wa Apwiya.
Nanso mi, kinwiirelani coo: Nhilupele ni hata nhiromole irimu, nlattu wookhala ihice ya Nluku,
mena ilapo, nlattu wookhala phinnyakelelawe, mena uYerusalemu, nlattu wookhala isittatti ya Mwene muulupale.
Ni uhilupele muru aa, maana we khunoorya uphuwiha hata ikharari yooripa atthuna ipwi.
Nanso wuulumaca winyu nwo ukhaleke wowiira: Aye, aye. Mena, mena. Impwaha va, inkhuma wa Ntakhali.
Nheewa yiiriyaka: Niitho ni niitho, niino ni niino.
Nanso mi kinwiirelani coo: Nhinlivyaanihere yoonanara mwiinani enyu, nanso ule nohala uwaattani nrama no nlopwana, unthetyeeleke nikina nno.
Ni nohala wuunyokhani ni phiwaakhakani malaya, munvaheke ni ikacako enyu.
Ookhanyererihakani ntthu unveleela nkwaha wookhuvyaa, munveleeleke nkwaha woorekama.
Munvahe noolepelani ni nhinrerye ittuli nophavela wuukophelani.
Nheewa yiiriyaka: Unfente nkhwaa ni unthanye mwiinani aa.
Nanso mi kinwiirelani coo: Mwaafente eenani inyu ni mwaavekelele ale anowoomolanihacani,
wiira nkhale asaana eekhweli a athumwaninyu o wirimu, maana ayo naakumiha ncuwa nawe aakumiheraka oohimaana ni omaana, anaawaana ipula aavahaka atthu o'sariya ni oohi isariya.
Maana mwaafentaka paahi anoofentani, nrina itthuvoni? Mpaka mayoliviha nsoko ampanka ciicammo!
Mwasalamehaka paahi asunninyu, mpankileni yomaana? Mpaka amalaponi ampanka ciicammo!
Phimaana, nkhale ooloka toko ciryaya ooloka athumwaninyu ari wirimu.
Mwiinemecere, nhipanke miteko cinyu coorera nnyo uhoolo wa atthu wiira nttottopeliye na ayo, maana mwapankaka commo, khannohala uphwanya itthuvo wamiithoni wa athumwaninyu ari wirimu.

Vano mwaavahaka atthu oohuva, nhiittottope toko cineeraya atthu o mirima miili mmasinakokani ni mmaparaparani. Ayo ampankela commo wiira attottopeliye na atthu. Mi kinoohimeryani ikhweli wiira: Ayo ahaakhela itthuvo caya.
Nanso nyu mwankavihaka ntthu, mpanke woohiittottopa hata mpwana enyu oonkhuluvela hicuwele itthu ipankilenyu.
Ipankilenyu iyo ikhale nsiirini, na athumwaninyu ari wirimu anoona citthu cothene ciri nsiirini, anaahala wuutthuvani.

Vano nyu mwaswaliki, nhikhale toko atthu omirima miili. Ayo unaacivela uswali aneemenle mmasinakokani ni mapuro amwalanne iphiro wiira yooninye na atthu akina. Weekhweli mi kinawuhimeryani wiira ayo ahaakhela itthuvo caya.
Nanso nyu mwaswaliki, nkele mpaani mwinyu, ntthyee nkhora ni mwaavekele athumwaninyu ari wirimu. Vano athumwaninyu ari wirimu anoona citthu cothene ciri nsiirini, anaahala wuutthuvani.
Mwaswaliki, nhaakulelihace itthu imoca, toko cimpankaya asenci. Ale anoopuwela wiira yaakulelihacaka anaahala wiiwiya.
Vano nyu nhaalate yaayo, kontha athumwaninyu ari wirimu anaacuwela citthu cothene cimphavelenyu nhinaya waavekela.
Vano nyu nswaliki coo: Athumwanihu nri wirimu, ncina ninyu nittakattifihiye.
Umwene enyu uwe. Utthuna winyu upankyee, vathi va toko wirimu.
Nnivahe iyolya ehu yo'lelo.
Nnilevelele cookosa cihu toko cinaalevelelehu annikosera.
Nhinihiye mwa coothepya, nanso nnoopole mwa coonanara, kontha wawinyu uri umwene, ikuru ni nttittimiho mahuku othene. Ameni.
Maana mwaalevelelaka atthu cookosa caya nnyo, ciicammo athumwaninyu ari wirimu ammowulevelelani.
Nanso mwahaaleveleleke atthu ayo cookosa caya, ciicammo athumwaninyu o wirimu khanhala wuulevelelani cookosa cinyu.

Vano nyu mwantthukaka ramatani, nhithoonyere ikhove yoocukulaca toko anamirima miili; aneecooneha wamiithoni wa atthu wiira ahontthuka ramatani. Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira ayo ahaakhela itthuvo caya.
Nanso nyu mwantthukaka ramatani nkhuce ni nvace ikharari cinyu,
wiira nhiicoonehe waatthuni wiira nhontthuka ramatani, nanso mwiicooneehe wa athumwaninyu ari wirimu anoona citthu cothene ciri nsiirini, anaahala wuutthuvani.
Vano nyu nhiithotokanihere mihakhu cinyu ilapo yo vathi va unliyaya uweese ni nrenci na atthu owinnya unhukhacaya.
Nanso nyu mwiithotokanihere nhakhu wirimu uhinliyaya n'uweese ni nrenci, hata atthu owinnya khaanhukhaca.
Kontha nipuro niryaya nhakhu inyu, vaava ciicammo phiryaya nrima enyu.
Isamaninya yo'rutthu ari miitho. Miitho aa yakhalaka omaana, irutthu aa yothene inaakhalana imwaleelo.
Nanso miitho enyu yakhalaka ootakhala, irutthu inyu yothene inkookhala mpiphini. Vano, imwaleelo irinenyu yakhalanaka ipiphi, ncuwele wiira inkookhala ipiphi yuulupale!

Khaawo nohala woorya waarumeela akunya eeli, kontha naahala unhanyuriha mmoca n'unfenta nkina uyo, atthuna nohala unlemeliha mmoca n'unvenwiha nkina uyo. Khawanooryaa unrumeela Nluku n'urumeela mihakhu.
Phimaana kinawuhimeryani wiira nhikhale ni masukuli mphavelaka iyolya, atthuna yowurya, ni ikuwo yoowara. Kontha ukumi unaavikana iyolya ni irutthu inaavikana coowara.
Mwaawehe asaanuni ooculu; khaanaala ni khaanrottovola, hata khaanhephela mmakhupini mwaya, nanso athumwanaya o wirimu anawaavaha iyolya. Nyu mw'atthu o'fayita waapwaha asaanuni.
Khaawo mwa nyu, neera eekurumicaka, phooryaka wuncerera nliko wo'kumi awe.
Vano nnorecelani mwiiraka kinhala uwarani? Mmwehe ithutu co ntakhwani mananna cinonnuwaya, khacinvara nteko mena khacintthava ikuwo.
Nanso mi kinoohimeryani wiira hata Salomoni, ni nttittimiho nawe nothene, khawanre toko nnya ithutu nnya.
Vano mooneke mananna Nluku cinwarihawe makukhu o ntakhwani, ankhala ilelo ni meelo ampahiya wamooroni. Commo naahala wuuwarihani nyu, atthu owaamini vakani!
Vano nhirece mwiiraka: Ninhala ulyani? Ninhala uwuryani? Ninhala uwarani?
Kontha amalaponi phinrecela cennyo citthu nnyo, nanso Athumwaninyu o wirimu anaacuwela cothene cimphavelenyu.
Nanso woopacera, mwaavye umwene wa Nluku ni isariya cawe, ni nnyo citthu cothene nnyo nnaahala wuncereriya.
Phimaana, nhirecele itthu yo meelo, kontha nihuku no meelo nno ninaahala wiirecela. Khula nihuku cinaatosa coonanara caya.
Nhihukhumu, wiira ni nyu nhihukhumwinye,
kontha ni ihukhumu inhalenyu unhukhumwela nkhunaninyu, yeeyo phinhalenyu uhukhumweliya. Ciicammo ni nliko unhalenyu umphimela, yooyo phinhalenyu uphimeliya.
Unweherani niphalapacu niri nniithoni mwa munnaa, nanso khunwacawaca ithaapwa iri nniithoni mwaa?
Unoorya cani umwiirela munnaa: Nkankani kuukumiheni niphalapacu niri nniithoni mwaa, ni we unarina ithaapwa nniithoni mwaa!
Ntthu o mirima miili! Ukumihe toko ithaapwa iri nniithoni mwaa, vano phinhalaa woona ratta wookumiha niphalapacu niri nniithoni mwa munnaa.
Nhaavahe asilapwa citthu cittakattifu, ni nhivonyere ikuluwe maluku o'fayita. Kontha alapwa ayo anaahala wuusimyeelani ni ikuluwe nnyo cinaahala unyakelaca maluku ayo.
Nlepeleke ni nnaavahiya; mwaavyeke ni nnaaphwanya; mwaatteke nkhora ni nnaahuleliya.
Maana ule nolepela nawaakhela, ule naavya naaphwanya ni ule naatta nkhora naahuleliya.
Vano mwanaa oolepelaka nkatthe, khunonvaha ikokoottho;
ni hata oolepelaka ihopa, khunonvaha inwaa.
Vano, nyu nri oonanara nrima, nnaacuwela waavaha asaanenyu citthu coorera, eere tho Athumwaninyu ari wirimu anaavaha citthu comaana ale anonlepela!
Cothene cimphavelenyu wiira mpankeliye na atthu, ni nyu ciicammo mwaapankeleke akhunaninyu, kontha nenno phiri Nlamulo ni Minapiyu.
Nkelele nkhora woophurya, kontha nkhora muulupale ni wowaatapuwa iri iphiro inaarimeliha atthu, ni ari enci ankelela yooyo nkhora uyo.
Kontha, nkhora mwankani uri iphiro yoophuryaa inaarwana atthu wukumini, ni ari vakani ankela yeeyo iphiro eyo.
Mwiirattavelele mo minapiyu cowootha, aneecooneha toko ikhontwaa, nanso nhina mmo ari miici cowinnya.
Vano nnohala waacuwelela nlattu wo mihokorokho caya. Cinaarukuliyaka imanka mmiiwani ni hata ikhacu khacinrukuliya mmarokani?
Commo, miri cothene comaana cineema mihokorokho comaana, nanso mwiri woohimaana uneema mihokorokho coohimaana.
Khawanooryaa wiira miri comaana cinawiima mihokorokho coohimaana, hata mwiri woohimaana khuneema mihokorokho comaana.
Miri cothene cihineema mihokorokho comaana, cinaathikiliya ni uvonyeriya wamooroni.
Commo, nnaahala waacuwela nlattu wo mihokorokho caya.
Kaahimwe othene ankiirela: Pwiya, Pwiya! phinhala ukela wumweneni wo wirimu, nanso ule nopanka utthuna wa Apaapa ari wirimu.
Vano nenno nihuku nno, enci ankokiirela: Pwiya, Pwiya! Hi niholalyaa mwa ncina ninyu, ni mwa ncina ninyu nihoomola macini, ni mwa ncina ninyu nihopanka cootikineeha cinci.
Vano mi kinkoweerela coo: Akuucuwenleni hata vakani. Nkhume uhoolo waka, nyu mwaapanka citthu coonanara!
Phimaana ale othene aneewa ala moolumo aka ala, ni attharihelelaka, kinaalikanihera toko nlopwana o miruku aatekile inupa awe waculu mwala.
Yahorupa ipula, myooloko cahocara, yahowuka iphyoo ni yahottinkihiya inupa ile ni khayaawuluwile, kontha yaatekiye waculu mwala.
Ale othene aneewa moolumo aka ni phihittharihelelaka, kinaalikanihera toko nlopwana oohi miruku aatekile inupa awe wanhaavani.
Yahorupa ipula, cahocara myooloko, yahowuka iphyoo ni yahottinkihiya inupa ile n'ukwanyuwaca ni ihasara aya yaari yuulupale.
Vano, Yesu namalihilene wuulumaca, mphwinko wahotikinihinya mananna ceetthucihawe,
kontha aheetthuciha atthu n'ulamuli, khaari toko mayowantikha.
Vaavale ule akhuruwaka umwaakoni atthu enci yaanontthara.
Vano namakuttula mmoca ahomwaattamerya ni ahonlapela eeraka: Pwiya mwatthunaka, nawoorya ukivoniha!
Yesu ahonthatela ntata mpaka unkwanya, eeraka: Kinaatthuna, uvone! Wowaakuvyaca wene ule ahovonihiya makuttula ale.
Paahi Yesu ahomwiirela: Ukiviriyane, uhinhimerye ntthu itthu ila. Nanso urwee weethoonyihere wa mayasataka ni wavahe itthuvo ilamunlyawe Musa wiira ikhale saahiti wamiithoni wa atthu.
Vaavale, Yesu naphilene uKafarnaumu, ahowa nhooleli a anatoropa iminya, anlepelaka wiira:
Pwiya, nanteko aka owuntakyaa ri uwani wankorini ni naahuva venci cinene.
Vano Yesu ahomwiirela coo: Mi kinaarwa unvoniha.
Nanso nhooleli a anatoropa ule ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, mi akimphwanela wiira nyu nkele mpaani mwaka, nanso nhimye nuulumo nimoca paahi, ni nanteko aka naahala uvona.

Maana ni mi ki ntthu oolamuliya ni kihaana anatoropa anaalamulaka ni kinaamwiirela mmoca uyo: Urwee! Ni uyo naarwa, ni nkina uyo kamwiirelaka: Uwe woono. Ni uyo naawa; ciicammo nanteko aka kamwiirelaka: Upanke ila! Ni uyo naapanka.
Vano Yesu wiiwa wawe yaale moolumo ale, ahotikhinaca. Aheerela atthu yaantthara: Weekhweli kinawuhimeryani wiira hata uSirayeli akiphwanyile nroromelo toko nna.
Kinoohimeryani wiira, enci anaahala uwa, akhumaka mphantte unkhuma ncuwa ni mphantte unkela ncuwa, ni ankowunkoma wameecani wamoca na Aparahamu, Isaki ni Yakopi wumweneni wo wirimu.
Nanso asaana o wumweneni, anaahala uvonyeriya uta, upiphini; wonwo unkokhala wunla ni ucekesa miino.
Vano, Yesu ahomwiirela tho nhooleli a anatoropa ule: Urwee, ni yiirannyee toko caamini aa. Ni yoole ukati ule nanteko ule ahovona.
Yesu waakenlyawe uwannyawe Peturu, ahoona amaathi awe anarupile wankorini awerennyaka ikopo.
Nanso Yesu ahaavarela ntata, ni ikopo ile yahaahiya. Ale yahonwa ni yahopacera waatafiti.
Wiila waya, ahowiiheriya anamacini enci, vano ni moolumo paahi, ule ahoomola macini ni ahaavoniha othene yaawerennya,
wiira itthariheleliye itthu yaahimilyawe nnapiyu Isaya eeraka: Uyo ahokusa iretta ni aheerya coowerya cihu.
Yesu woona wawe atthu enci ananrukurenrye, ahaalamulela wiira alapuwele nikhopela nikhwawe.
Vano mayowantikha ahomwaattamerya Yesu ni ahomwiirela coo: Mwalimu, kinawuttharani mapuro othene anhalenyu urwaa.
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Akhwantte ahaana makhuku, ni asaanuni ooculu ahaana ipuru, nanso Mwanawe Pinatamu kharina nipuro noomumula.
Mmoca w'eetthuci aheera: Pwiya, nkaarerihe toko, kirwee kaavithe apaapa.
Nanso Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Ukitthare, ni waahiye atthu ookhwa avithane ayaayoru.
Vano Yesu akelaka nkalawani eetthuci awe yahontthara.
Yahowa mpahari iphyoo yinci ni ikalawa yahottinkihiya ni mawimpi. Yesu aanrupa nkalawani mmwe.
Nanso eetthuci yahorwaaca ummusa, akhuwelacaka yiiraka: Pwiya, unoopole! Ninaakhwaaca!
Vano Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Nnoovani nyu atthu owaamini vakani? Yesu ahonwa ni ahomaaliha iphyoo ni mawimpi, ni maasi ale yaheera riyariya.
Atthu ale yahotikhinaca yiiraka: Tipani yoola neeweleliya ni iphyoo ni ipahari?
Uphiya wawe nikhopela nikina, ilapo ya akatara, ahosiceeriya na atthu eeli oovahuwa, yaakhumaca umahiye acacaka ni khaawo aavira yeele iphiro ile.
Ale yaankhuwelaca yiiraka: Urinani we ni hi, we Mwana a Nluku! Waaweenle unoopopiha ukati uhinaphiya?
Vano wakhiviru yoole ncoko ule, cahaawo ikuluwe cinci caalya.
Vano macini ale, yahonlepela yiiraka: Mwaphavela unoomola, nnilamulele ukela nkuluweni mmwe.
Vano Yesu aheerelaca: Nrwaace! Ukhuma waya mwa atthu mmwe yahokelaca nkuluweni, ni ikuluwe cothene caheevonyera muntthiyani ni cahottittha.
Atthu yaaliha ikuluwe ale yahotthawaca ni uphiyaca waya uparasa, yahottonkaca citthu cothene ceeranele na atthu oovahuwa ale.
Vano, atthu othene o wasittatti yahorwaaca umoonanana Yesu, ni umoona waya yahonlepela wiira akhume mwiilaponi mwaya mmwe.
Yesu ukela wawe nkalawani, aholapuwela nikhopela nikina ni ahorwaa usittatti wawe.
Ahowiiheriya ntthu owuntakyaa aataleliye munrepani. Woonnyawe nroromelo naya, Yesu ahomwiirela owuntakyaa ule: Mwanaka, upise nrima, itampi caa ciholeveleliya.
Nanso mayowantikha akina yaari nenno nipuro nno yeeraca coo: Ula naakufuru.
Vano Yesu ahocuwela moopuwelo aya ni ahaakoha eeraka: Nlattuni muupuwelaka itthu yoonanara wanrimani winyu?
Vano itthu yootepa urika phivi? Umwiirela: Itampi caa ciholeveleliya, atthuna umwiirela wunwe ni weette?
Vano, waacera ncuwele wiira Mwanawe Pinatamu haana ulamuli vathi va woolevelela itampi, vaavale ahomwiirela owuntakyaa: Wunwe, ukuse nrepa naa ni urwee uwanyaa.
Ntthu ule ahonwa ni ahorwaa uwannyawe.
Vano mphwinko ule woonnyaya itthu yeeranyeele, wahoova, ni yaananttottopela Nluku aavahile atthu ule ulamuli ule.
Yesu ukhuma wawe nne nipuro nne, ahomoona nlopwana eehaninya Mateu nonkomile nipuro naaliviya nsoko ni ahomwiirela: Ukitthare! Ule ahonwa ni ahontthara.
Yesu nari uwannyawe Mateu alyaka, yahowaaca mayoliviha nsoko na anatampi enci ni yahonkomaca wamoca ni Yesu n'eetthuci awe.
Vano mafarisi woona waya itthu ile, yahaakohaca eetthuci yiiraka: Nlattuni mwalimu inyu naalya ni mayoliviha nsoko ni anatampi?
Nanso Yesu wiiwa wawe aheera: Kahiwena akumi phimmwaavya tothoro, nanso, aretta.
Murwaace, mwiitthuce maanaya: Ikiriri phimphavelaka, kahi isataka, kontha akiweenle weehana atthu o'sariya, nanso ookosakosa wiira arukunuse mirima caya.
Wahoolo yahowaaca eetthuci a Yohani ni yahonkohaca yiiraka: Nlattuni hi ni mafarisi nitthukaka n'eetthuci aa ahitthukaka?

Yesu ahaakhula: Wanawooryaa mayolattuliya usikuhuuluni yoothelaninya ucukulaca, mayothela nari ni yaayo? Nanso anaawa mahuku anhalaya waakhiya mayothela uyo, ni yaayo mahuku ayo phinhalaya untthuka ramatani.
Khaawo neesera icaapha yonaanano nkuwoni yokhalayi, maana icaapha inatepereriha waahuwa nwo.

Ciicammo khinheliya ivinyu yonaanano munrupani wo nrapala nokhalayi, maana unkoophwya nrupa uyo ni urihakyaa ivinyu iyo ni khunvareliya tho nteko nrupa uyo. Nanso ivinyu yonaanano inheliya munrupani wonaanano ni cinaasunkyaa.

Vano Yesu ahimyacaka nnya citthu nnya, ahowa nhooleli o nsinakoka ni amwaattameryaka ahonlapela n'umwiirela: Mwanaka mwanthiyana hokhwa nenna va, nanso kinawulepela wiira nrwee waanthatele matata aa ni naahala ukhala nkumi.
Yesu ahokhuma wamoca n'eetthuci awe ni ahontthara.
Ahaawo nthiyana mmoca aamalihile myakha khumi na miili awerennyaka iretta yoovuva iphome, ahowa uttuli wawe ni ahokwanya mphantte woosoriya wo'hancu awe;
kontha mwanene eeciirela coo: Mi kakwanyaru paahi ihancu awe, kinaahala uvona.
Yesu ahorukunuwa ni umoona wawe nthiyan'ole, ahomwiirela: Upise nrima mwanaka! Nroromelo naa nihowoopola. Ukhuma yoole ukati ule, nthiyan'ole ahovona.
Vano Yesu naphilene uwannyawe nhooleli ule ni oonanaka mayowiipa ampetta na atthu arecarecaka, aheera:
Nkhumace va, kontha mwali uyo kakhwile, nanso naarupa. Vaavale yaananthyaca.
Vano wakhumacilyaya atthu ale, Yesu ahokela mpaani ni ahommarela ntata mwali ule ni ule ahonwa.
Itthu yaakhumelenle ile yahorumannyaa mwiilaponi mmwe mothene.
Vano Yesu ukhuma wawe vale, ahotthariya na atthu eeli oohoona akhuwaka yiiraka: Unoonele ikiriri Mwana a Taviti!
Nakenlene mpaani mmwe, yahomwaattamerya oohoona ale, ni Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Nnaakupali wiira mi kinawoorya uvoniha? Yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Ninaakupali, Pwiya!
Vaavale, ahokwanya miitho aya eeraka: Yiirannyee toko cikupanlinyu!
Ni yahotthukuwa miitho aya. Nanso Yesu ahaahimerya ni waalipihera eeraka: Mwiinemecere wiira hikhale nohala ucuwela itthu ila.
Vano ukhumaca waya yahomwarusela mwiilaponi mmwe itthu yaakhumelenle ile.
Vaavale anakhumacilene, ahowiiheriya ntthu oovariya ni nnepa woohuulumaca.
Ukhuma waya ncini nne, ahoolumaca, na atthu ale yahotikhinaca yiiraka: Khinatoko wiirannyaa itthu toko ila uSirayeli!
Nanso mafarisi yaanattokutta yiiracaka: Noomola macini ayo ni ikuru co nlamuli o macini.
Yesu aaneetta isittatti cothene ni iwaani cothene, eetthucihaka mmasinakokani mwaya, alalyaka nhupi woorera wo Umwene ni avonihaka iretta ni ikwerere cothene.
Yesu woonnyawe miphwinko, ahoonela ikiriri, maana caancukulaca n'usanka, toko ikhontwaa coohikhalana nhakheli.
Vano ahaahimerya eetthuci awe eeraka: Yoorottowola iri yinci, nanso ananteko ayo ari vakani.
Munlepele mwanene imatta wiira aarume ananteko umattani wawe.
Neehannene eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli, Yesu ahaavaha ikuru yowoomola minepa coonanara ni yoovoniha iretta ni ikwerere cothene.
Paahi, macina a amitthenka khumi n'eeli ale, ph'ala; oopacera Simoni, acuweliyaka ukhala Peturu ni nhimawe Anteree, Yakopu mwana a Sepeteu ni Yohani, nhimawe Yakopu;
Filipe ni Partolomeu; Tomee ni Mateu, mayoliviha nsoko; Yakopu, mwana a Alfeu, ni Tateu;
Simoni o mphwinko wa aseloti, ni Yuta Iskariyoti, aantumihile Yesu.
Yaala khumi n'eeli ala, Yesu ahaaruma ni ahaavaha nnya ikano nnya: Nhirwaace wa amalaponi ni nhikele ilapo ya asamariya.
Nanso, venci venci, mwaavye ikhontwaa coorimela co'Sirayeli.
Wo khula nipuro ninhalenyu urwaa, mwahimyace wiira umwene wo wirimu uhaattamerya.
Vano mwaavonihe oowerennya, monwelelihe ookhwa, mwaavonihe anamakuttula, moomole macini, nhaakhela womahala ni nvahe womahala.
Nhikusace iwooru atthuna iparatha nlasuperani mwinyu;
ni nhikuse nrupa, mena ihancu piili, mena ikwakwatta, mena nttontto wo wiilipiherera, kontha nanteko unaamphwanela waakhela iyolya awe.
Mwakelaka nsittatti atthuna mmawaani, mmwaavye ntthu oorera uwaakhelelani; mwakhale uwannyawe yooyo mpaka ukhuma.
Phimaana wookela va, nnolamuliya usalameeha.
Itthoko inhalenyu waakheleliya eyo, nnema ninyu nno ninhala ukhala vaava, nanso aahikhaleke, nnema ninyu nno ninawuturuwelani mwasinene.
Ntthu aahitthuneke uwaakhelelani, ni hiphavelaka wiiwa moolumo enyu, wookhuma yeeyo itthoko eyo atthuna isittatti iyo, nkukutthe ntthupi no nnyaani mwinyu.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira nihuku no'hukhumu, unaahala unemeceriya uSotoma ni uKomora, woovikana iyo isittatti iyo.
Mi kinoorumani toko ikhontwaa iriyari yo miici; phimaana nkhale oowalaala toko amwiikhomya ni wiimaaliha toko ikhuntta.
Mwiirattavelele na atthu, kontha ayo anaahala wurwehani umphwinkoni wa akhulupale ni anaahala uwaafyulacani mmasinakokani mwaya.
Nlattu wawaka nnarwaaninya wa alamuli ni mamwene, wiira mwakhale asaahiti wa yaayo ni wa amalaponi.
Vano mwarwaaninyaka wonwo, nhaakaake mwiiraka kinhala wuulumacani, kontha yooyo ukati uyo nnaahala uhimeriya itthu yowuulumaca.
Kontha khannakhalaka nyu nnohala wuulumaca, nanso Nnepa wa Athumwaninyu phinoolumaca.
Ntthu ni munnawe anaahala wiivihana; thumwana ntthu ni mwanawe; asaana waahanyuriha athumwanaya mpaka weeva.
Nnaahala wiinananinya na atthu othene nlattu wo ncina naka, nanso, ule nohala uvilela mpaka ummaleloni, naahala woopwa.
Vano, nsittatti mmo moomolanihaciyaka, ntthaweleke wiikina; khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira khannohala umaliha isittatti co'Sirayeli, hinawa Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Mwiitthuci khanompwaha mwalimu awe, hata ipottha khinompwaha nkunya aya.
Mwiitthuci atteeliyeke nlattu wookhala toko mwalimu awe, ni ipottha eyo, nlattu wookhala toko nkunya aya. Wakhalaka wiira mwanene inupa neehaninya Peelsepu, weere tho anaakhalanawe!
Paahi, nhoove. Maana khiiwo yovithyaa ihinhala wooneleliya, ni khiiwo yowipithyaa ihinhala wooneleliya.
Vano yothene yuulumacilyaka mpiphini, nlalye wakwalya, ni itthu inaapeliyenyu, nwele wasancani ni mmwarusele.
Paahi, nhoove aneeva irutthu wohoorya wiiva nnepa. Mmoove ule noorya ukwanyulaca ni uvonyera umooroni nnepa ni irutthu.
Khaantumihinyaka asaanuni eeli ni inota imoca? Nanso khaawo hata mwaanuni mmoca nomorela vathi woohitthuna Athumwaninyu.
Mpaka ikharari cinyu cothene co mmuru cihaalikeliya.
Phimaana nhoove! Nyu nhaana ifayita wowaapwaha asaanuni enci.
Vano, ule nokirumelela wamiithoni wa atthu, ni mi kimmoonrumelela wamiithoni wa Apaapa ari wirimu.
Nanso ule nohala ukiruna wamiithoni wa atthu, ciicammo kinaahala unruna wamiithoni wa Apaapa ari wirimu.
Vano nhuupuwele wiira kiwiihile mpuha vathi va; akiwiihile mpuha, nanso ikatana.
Mi kaaweenle uhaaculaca ukawanaca nlopwana na athumwane; mwana mwanthiyana na anumwane ni amwaara mwanaya na apwiya mwanaya.
Vano, eenani awe ntthu anhala ukhala asimuci awe o wapuwani wawe.
Ule naafenta athumwane atthuna anumwane woovikana mi, khamphwanelanyaa ni mi; ule nonfenta mwana mwanlopwana atthuna mwana mwanthiyana woovikana mi, khamphwanelanyaa ni mi;
ni hinkusa nsalapa awe akittharaka mi, khamphwanelanyaa ni mi.
Vano ule nophwanya ukumi awe, unanrihyaa. Ule unonrihyaa ukumi awe mwa nlattu wawaka mi, naahala uphwanya.
Ntthu nowaakhelani, nokaakhela mi, ni ntthu nokaakhelela mi nomwaakhelela ule kirumile.
Vano ule nomwaakhela nnapiyu nlattu wookhala nnapiyu, nawaakhela itthuvo ca nnapiyu; nomwaakhela nasariya nlattu wookhala nasariya, nawaakhela itthuvo ca nasariya.
Ciicammo ule nohala ummaha uwurya, pooti ukhala ikahi yo maasi ooririya, mmoca wa ala asaana ala, nlattu wookhala eetthuci aka, khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira khanhaleela mena vakani itthuvo awe.
Vaavale, Yesu namalihilene waasomiha eetthuci awe, ahokhuma arwaaka wiitthuciha ni ulalya mmasittatti mwaya.
Vano Yohani weewilyawe nkalaposo, cuuluminyaka ihaali co miteko ca Kristu, ahaaruma eetthuci awe ukohiya wiira:
Kaahiki phi we, ule aammwehereryehu uwa atthuna nimmwehereryeke nkina?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Murwee ni mwanhimerye Yohani ineewenyu ni inoonenyu;
oohoona anawoona, owuntakyaa anaweetta, omakuttula anaavonihinya, oohiiwa anawiiwa, ookhwa anawunwelelihiya, ni oothwennya anaalaleeriya nhupi woorera.
Horeriya ule hinkakathuwa nlattu wawaka mi.
Vano, ukati waakhumacilyaya eetthuci a Yohani, Yesu ahopacera waahimyacera atthu ale mwaha wa Yohani eeraka: Mwaarweele woonani utakhwani? Ntathi woottinkihiya ni iphyoo?
Mwaarweele woonani? Nlopwana oowaraca ikuwo coovevyaala? Ale anwaraca ikuwo coovevyaala ankhala unupani ya nlamuli.
Vano mwaarweele woonani? Nnapiyu? Khweli, mi kinawuhimeryani wiira, mmoonnenyu uyo hompwaha nnapiyu.
Nlattu wa yoola phantikhiyaya wiira: Kinaanveleeliha wamiithoni waa mayanhupi aka, uyo naahala wulokiherani iphiro uhoolo waa.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, mwa atthu ayariye na athiyana, khanakhumelela muulupale oompwaha Yohani Mpattisa, nanso ule ri mwankani wumweneni wo wirimu, uyo phi muulupale wompwaha uyo.
Ukhuma ukati wa Yohani Mpattisa mpaka nna va, umwene wo wirimu unkusiya ni ikuru, ni ale aneekurumica anaakusa.
Maana minapiyu cothene ni Nlamulo ciholalya mpaka ukati wa Yohani.
Mwatthunaka ukupali, yooyo phi Eliya, aanwehereryehu uwa.
Paahi, ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eeweke!
Kinlikanihereke pani nna nloko nna? Ninlikana toko amirawo anonkomacile wapacari, akhuwelelanaka ni yiirelanaka:
Hi nihowoopelani mpetta, nanso khamwiinne; nihowiipelani icipo cowiikhupanya nanso khancukulacile.
Vano howa Yohani hinlya ni hinwurya ni nyu nneera: Haana ncini.
Howa Mwanawe Pinatamu, nolya ni nowurya, vano nneera uyo nanlula ni nanhapaliya, mpwana aya mayoliviha nsoko ni mayokosa! Nanso ankhili anaathoonyera miteko caya.
Vano Yesu ahovira acaceraka mittetthe caaviravinryawe apankaka mitikiniho, nlattu woohirukunusa nrima:
Uhotakhaliya we Korasimi! Uhotakhaliya we Petesayita! Kontha mitikiniho cipankiye iriyari inyu, cinapankiye uTiru ni uSitoni, coono anarukunusile mirima, awaraka icakho ni wiitteelelihaca ittura.
Nanso kinoohimeryani wiira; nihuku no'hukhumu, unaahala unemeceriya uTiru ni uSitoni woovikana nyu.

Vano we Kafarnaumu, unoona wiira unaahala uwelihiya wirimu? Mena, we unhala ukuruseliya umooroni. Kontha, waari wiira uSotoma cahopankiya cennyo mitikiniho cipankeliyaa we, Sotoma uyo aankhala mpaka nihuku no'lelo.
Nanso kinoohimeryani wiira, nihuku no'hukhumu unaahala unemeceriya uSotoma woovikana we.
Yoole ukati ule Yesu aheera: Kinawuttittimihani, Paapa, Mwanene irimu ni vathi, maana nhaavithela nnya citthu nnya asomi ni acuweli, nanso nhaathoonyera acikani.
Khweli, Paapa, kontha commo phuucivenlyayani.
Citthu cothene kihovahiya na Apaapa, ni khaawo noncuwela Mwana ari hikhanle Athumwane, ni khaawo naacuwela Athumwane ari hikhanle Mwana ni ule Mwana nontthunawe uncuweliha.
Mmwaace waryaka mi nyu othene ntoomwile ni oolemeliya, mi kimmowukaviherani.
Munkuse kolokopiko aka, nkiwehere mi kontha mi kiri oomaala ni owiiyeviha munrimani. Nnaamumula nroohoni mwinyu.
Kontha kolokopiko aka ri ookhwyaa ni nrintti aka khunlemela.
Ukati ule, nihuku no ntivela, Yesu aanvira mmamattani. Eetthuci awe anavoliye itala, yahopacera wunta macasi wiira alye.
Mafarisi woonnyaya ile itthu ile yahomwiirela: Nkoona, eetthuci aa anaapanka itthu ihinlamuliya upankiya nihuku no ntivela.
Nanso Yesu ahaakhulaca eeraka: Khansomile ipankilyawe Taviti waavoliyawe itala uyo na asikhwawe?
Ahokela inupa ya Nluku, ni ahokhura mikatthe coottakattifihiya, cahaalamuliyawe ukhura uyo, mena ale yarinawe, nanso yaalamuliya ukhura paahi mayasataka.
Khansomile muNlamuloni wiira, nihuku no ntivela, mayasataka anaatupha nlamulo no ntivela mpaani mo'nupa ittakattifu ni khaankhalana makosa?
Paahi, mi kinawuhimeryani wiira haawo va ri muulupale woopwaha inupa ittakattifu.
Nanso nyu mwaacuwenle wiira: Ikiriri phimphavelaka, kahi isataka; khamwaahala waahukhumu ahirina nlattu.
Maana Mwanawe Pinatamu phi mwanene ntivela.
Yesu ukhuma wawe vale, ahokela nsinakoka waya.
Ahaawo mommo nlopwana oonririya ntata. Vano yahaawo atthu yaaphavela umootheryaca, yahonkoha Yesu yiiraka: Uholamuliya uvoniha nihuku no ntivela?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Tupani wa nyu neera, narina ikhontwaa, ni imorelaka munlittini nihuku no ntivela phihirwaaka ukumiha?
Ntthu kankhalana ifayita woopwaha ikhontwaa? Phimaana, unlamuliya upanka yoorera nihuku no ntivela.
Vaavale ahomwiirela nlopwan'ole: Utaphule ntata. Ahotaphula ni nne nahovona n'ukhala toko nikina nne.
Vano mafarisi yahokhuma ni yahopacera uvaanela mananna omwiiva Yesu.
Nanso Yesu acuwelaka cothene nnye, ahothama vaavale. Enci yahontthara ni othene ahaavoniha.
Yesu aanawaateliha wiira ahicuwelihe,
wiira itthariheleliye ihimilyawe nnapiyu Isaya eeraka:
Ula phi karumeya aka kinthanlilyaka, nonfentaka ni nokitteeliha nrima. Kimmoonhela Nnepa aka, ni uyo noowohimya ihukhumu aka mwiilaponi.
Khankela anyakulihanaka, mena ukhuwela, ni khaawo nohala wiiwa ncu nawe mmaphironi.
Khanhala unyakela ntathi wophwyaa, mena nthuko untthuwa kunhala uttiphyaa, mpaka uhukhumu nwo utthema,
ni amalaponi anaawehererya mwa ncina nawe.
Wahoolo Yesu ahowiiheriya ntthu oovariya ni macini aari oohoona ni oohuulumaca, ni ule ahonvoniha, mpaka upacera wuulumaca ni woona.
Atthu othene yaanatikhinaca yiiraka: Ula khanakhalaka mwana a Taviti?
Nanso mafarisi weewilyaya ila itthu ila yaanattokutta yiiracaka: Ula noomola macini ni ikuru ca Peelsepu, nlamuli o macini.
Yesu ucuwela wawe moopuwelo aya, aheera: Umwene wothene wakawanyaka unaakwanyuwaca ni isittatti atthuna ntthoko nakawanyaka ninaamora.
Akhalaka wiira Sotwani hokawanyaca, neecaaniha veekhawe, vano umwene awe unhala ulipa cani?
Wakhala wiira mi kinoomola macini ni ikuru ca Peelsepu, kaahiki asaanenyu ayo anoomola macini ni ikuru cawani? Phimaana, asaanenyu ayo phinhala wuuhukhumuni.
Wakhala wiira mi kinoomola macini ni Nnepa wa Nluku, khweli umwene wa Nluku uhophiya warinyu.
Khaawo noorya ukela inupa ya ntthu oolipa, n'umwiinyera mihakhu cawe woohipaca ummara wahoolo phumwiinyeraka.
Ule hiri ni mi, naakikhotta, ni ule hinthukumana ni mi, naamwarusa.
Phimaana kinawuhimeryani wiira itampi ni ikufuru cothene ca atthu cinaaleveleliya, nanso ukufurwela Nnepa Nttakattifu khunleveleliya.
Ntthu nohala umuulumacera yoonanara Mwanawe Pinatamu, naahala uleveleliya, nanso ntthu oolumelaka yoonanara Nnepa Nttakattifu, khanhala uleveleliya ula ukati ula ni mena ukati ummwa.
Mwiri woorera uneema mihokorokho coorera, ni mwiri woonanara, uneema mihokorokho coonanara, maana, mmihokorokhoni phincuwannyaya mwiri woorera.
Ikhapila yo'vili, nnohala wuulumaca cani citthu coorera nnari oonanara mirima? Maana malaku anooluma itthu iri munrimani.
Ntthu oorera nrima nokumiha nvithoni mwawe citthu coorera, nanso ntthu oonanara nrima, nokumiha nvithoni mwawe citthu coonanara.
Kinoohimeryani wiira nihuku no'hukhumu, atthu othene ankohukhumwinya wo citthu cothene cithiru cinoolumaya.
Maana nlattu wo moolumo aa unaavahiya isariya, ni nlattu wo moolumo aa unaahukhumwinya.
Vano, mayowantikha ni mafarisi yahonlepela Yesu yiiraka: Mwalimu, nimphavela woona ikanyero enyu.
Ule ahaakhula: Nloko noonanara nrima ni nooluva ninlepela ikanyero. Nanso hata ikanyero imoca khiiwo inhalaya uvahiya, mari ihikhanle paahi ikanyero ya nnapiyu Yona.
Kontha, toko Yona caakhanlyawe mahuku mararu uthana n'uhiyu mmirimani mo'hopa yuulupale, ciicammo Mwana a Pinatamu naahala ukhala mahuku mararu uthana n'uhiyu vathi waya itthaya.
Nihuku no'hukhumu atthu o'Ninive anaahala weemela waryaya atthu o nenna nloko nna ni waahukhumu. Kontha ahorukunusa mirima caya ni nhupi wa Yona. Vano haawo va ule ri muulupale oompwaha Yona.

Ciicammo, nihuku no'hukhumu Apwiyamwene Oohitto anaahala wunwa wiira ahukhumu nenna nloko nna, kontha akhumile wiimaleloni wo'lapo wiira yeewe ikano ca Salomoni. Vano, ule ri va, phi muulupale oompwaha Salomoni.
Nnepa woonanara wakhumaka mwirutthuni mwa ntthu, uneettakaca uninkareni waavyaka nipuro noomumula, nanso khumphwanya.
Phimaana unawiira: Kinaaturuwela uwani ukhumilyaka. Waturuwelaka vale, umphwanya inupa yoohikhaliya, yookwecaciya ni citthu cothene cinatthonkomanihinye.

Vano, unaakhuma, phirweelaka minepa cikhwawe saapa cootepa unanara woopwaha uyo, ni cakelakelaka cinkhala mommo, ni makhalelo awe ntthu ule ankhala ootepa unanara woopwaha ukati woopacera. Ciicammo phinkelaya wiiraneela nenna nloko noonanara nrima nna.
Nanlelo Yesu eera oolumanaka atthu, ni vaavale yahowa anumwane na asunnawe yaheemela vate aphavelaka umuulumana.
Ntthu mmoca ahomwiirela: Anumwana na asunnaa ari vate anaaphavela uwuulumana.
Nanso Yesu ahomwaakhula ule aawile unhimyacera: Amaanyi ni asunnaka tapani?
Yesu aathoonyaka eetthuci awe aheera: Ala ph'amaanyi ni asunnaka.
Kontha ntthu othene nopanka utthuna wa Apaapa o wirimu, yooyo phi nhimaaka, mwanrokoraka na amaanyi.
Nihuku nenne, Yesu ahokhuma mpaani ni ahonkoma nceresere ntthiya.
Miphwinko cahothukumana nipuro naaryawe, phimaana ahokela nkalawani ni ahonkoma ni mphwinko waheemela vaavale.
Ahoolumacera citthu cinci mmalikaniheroni eeraka: Aakhumile ntthu umwacera ipyo.
Amwacak'ono, ipyo ikina yahomorela nceresere iphiro ni yaholyaca asaanuni.
Ipyo ikina yahomorela wamalukuni, vaava itthaya eyo yaari vakani, ni yahomela woohipica, nlattu woohikhala itthaya yinci.
Nanso, ukhuma waya ncuwa yahovya, nlattu woohikhalana mitithari, yahooma.
Ikina yahomorela wamiiwani, ni miiwa nnye cahonnuwa ni cahohoma coomela ciyo.
Ikina yahomorela watthayani yomaana ni yaheema iminya, sitini (60) ni talathini (30) wo khula ipyo.
Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eeweke!
Vano, eetthuci yahomwaattamerya ni yahonkoha yiiraka: Nlattuni woolumelaka ni malikanihero?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Kontha nyu nhovahiya ucuwela isiiri co'mwene wo wirimu, nanso ale kaavahiye ucuwela.
Kontha ule rina, naahala uvahiya, n'ukhalana woontosa, nanso ule hirina, naahala waakhiya mpaka itthu irinawe.
Phimaana koolumaceraka ni malikanihero, wiira yoonaka, ahoone, ni yiiwaka, ahiiwe ni ahicuwelele.
Weekhweli inaatthariheleliya ihimilyawe nnapiyu Isaya eeraka: Nnaahala wiiwa nanso khannohala wiiweeha; nnaahala woona nanso khannohala ucuwelela.
Kontha nrima wo'nethi ula uri wooturumala; uhottiyela manyaru wiira uhiiwe, uhohicila wiira uhoone, ni uhicuwelele ni nrima aya; urukunusaka nrima ni mi kaavonihaka.
Nanso, ahoreriya miitho enyu ayo, maana anawoona, ni manyaru enyu ayo, maana anawiiwa.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, minapiyu cinci na anasariya yahophavela woona inoonenyu, nanso khayoonne, ni yahophavela wiiwa ineewenyu, nanso khayiiwile.
Nkaviriyanani maanaya nlikanihero na ntthu oomwacera ipyo.
Othene aneewa nuulumo noomwene ni ahiiweehaka, naawa Ntakhali ni naatamiha itthu yaaliye munrimani. Yeeyo phi ile yaamorenle mphironi.
Ipyo yaamorenle wamalukuni, ph'ale aneewa nuulumo ni wowaakuvyaca anawaakhela wotteeliya nrima,
nanso khaciwo mitithari mwa ayo. Ankhala ukati vakani, kontha ukati unkhunaya masakha, atthuna woomolanihaciya nlattu wo nuulumo, anaawuluwa woohipica.
Ipyo yaamorenle wamiiwani ph'ale aneewa nuulumo, mwa nlattu wooramela citthu ni mihakhu co nttuniyani, anaamiriya ni khaneema.
Nanso ipyo yaamorenle watthayani yomaana ph'ale aneewa nuulumo ni antthara. Ayo anaawiima iminya, sitini (60) ni talathini (30) wo khula ipyo.
Nlikanihero nikina ahaahimyacera eeraka: Umwene wo wirimu unlikana ni ntthu aamwacenre ipyo yomaana mmattani mwawe.
Nanso ukati waarupaya asilopwana ale, ahowa mwiinani, ahommwacera nammuka iriyari yo'tiriku ni ahokhuma.
Ukati wunnuwacilyaya, civeraka icasi, aheekhumeleliha nammuka.
Vano uphiya waya ananteko awe, yahomwiirela: Nkunya, khawaamwacenre ipyo yomaana mmattani mwaa? Nokhuma vayi nammuka ula?
Ule ahaakhula: Mwiinani phipankile yeeyo itthu iyo. Nanso ananteko yahonkoha amwiirelaka: Unaatthuna wiira hi namphele nammuka uyo?
Ule aheera: Mena, kontha munkoonvaranihela ni itiriku iyo.

Vano nhiye cunnuwe wamoca, mpaka ukati woohepha, ni ukati woohepha uyo, kinawaahimerya mayohepha ayo wiira: Mmupapanihe toko nammuka, muntthuke ihiru wiira apahiye, nanso itiriku iyo nrottowolele mmakhupini mwaka.
Vano Yesu ahaavaha tho nlikanihero nikina eeraka: Umwene wo wirimu unlikana ni inuku yo nrale, yaakusiye ni nlopwana ni waala mmattani mwawe.
Yeeyo iri yootepa uyeva upwaha ipyo cothene, ni, yonnuwaka, inkhala yuulupale upwaha miri cothene, ni unawiipanka mwiri, mpaka asaanuni owirimu upanka ipuru mmirittani mmo.
Yesu ahaahimyacera nlikanihero nikina: Umwene wo wirimu unlikana ni miropo caakusiye na athiyana ni yaheethela mphepani yinci, ni iphepa yothene yahottuttula.
Yesu ahaahimerya atthu nnya citthu cothene nnya ni malikanihero. Woohi nlikanihero khaahimerya itthu,
wiira itthariheleliye yaahiminye ni nnapiyu eeraka: Kinaahula malaku aka ni malikanihero; kinaahimyaca citthu coovithiya ukhuma ukati upattusiyaya ilapo.
Vano, Yesu ahaaleeha atthu ale ni ahorwaa uwani. Ammweelaka eetthuci, yahomwiirela: Unitaphulele nlikanihero no nammuka mmattani.
Ni ule ahaakhula: Ule nomwacera ipyo yomaana ri Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Imatta eyo iri ittuninya. Ipyo yomaana ari asaana wumwene. Nammuka oyo ari asaana a Nnyali;
mwiinani mmwaacenre uyo ri Sotwani; uhepha nwo uri wiimaleloni wo'kati, ni mayohepha ayo ari ancelo.
Kontha toko nammuka cinhephiyawe ni avonyeriyaka wamooroni, ciicammo unkokhala wiimaleloni wo'kati.
Mwana a Pinatamu nawaaruma ancelo awe, anhala waathukumaniha wumwene wawe ale anaatthekiha akhwaya ni ale ampanka coonanara.
Ayo ankovonyeriya munlittini no mooro umpharela; wonwo unkokhala wunla ni ucekesa miino.
Ukati yooyo, ale anasariya ankowaarya toko ncuwa wumweneni wa athumwanaya. Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eeweke.
Umwene wo wirimu unlikana toko nhakhu uvithiye mmattani, vano ntthu mmoca ahophwanya ni uvitha tho, ni natteeliye venci cinene, naarwa ni utumiha citthu cothene cirinawe ni uthuma yeele imatta ele.
Ciicammo, umwene wo wirimu unlikana ni mayotumiha naavya maluku o'fayita,
ni naphwanyilene nluku no'fayita yinci, naatumiha cothene cirinawe ni naathuma nluku nne.
Umwene wo wirimu unlikana toko ntthavi ninvonyeriya mpahari, ninvariha ikhapila cothene co'hopa.
Ukati uncara aya, mayomenca ale anaapurulela ntthavi ucenkweni, anaawunkomaca ni anaathanla ihopa comaana phihelaka mmatthenkani, vano coohimaana nnyo phirihaka.
Commo phinhalaya ukhala wiimaleloni wo'kati: Ankokhuma ancelo, ni ankowaawayaniha oorera ni oonanara nrima,
ni ankowaavonyera unlittini no mooro umpharela. Wonwo unkokhala wunla ni ucekesa miino.
Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Nheeweeha nnya citthu cothene nnya? Yahomwaakhulaca: Aye!
Vano aheerela coo: Phimaana mayowantikha othene aneetthuciha co'mwene wo wirimu anlikana toko namanantthu o wapuwani nokumiha nvithoni mwawe citthu co naanano ni citthu co khalayi.
Yesu namalihilene uttonka ala malikanihero ala, ahokhuma.
Uphiya wawe ilapo yonnuwenlyawe, aaneetthuciha atthu nsinakoka. Atthu othene yaanantikhina yiiraka: Woono ucuwelaca uno ni ikuru co mitikiniho nnya cinonkhuma vayi?
Khanakhala mwana a nkalapinteru? Ncina na anumwane kanakhala Mariya ni asihimawe Yakopu, Yusufu, Simoni ni Yuta?
Asirokorawe khaankhala ni hi? Vano cinonkhuma vayi nnya citthu cothene nnya?
Phimaana khayaankupali. Yesu aheerelaca: Nnapiyu khanlemelihiya ilapo iyarenlyawe ni uwannyawe.
Nwe khaapankile cootikineeha cinci mwa nlattu wohaamini wa atthu ale.
Yaale mahuku ale, mwene Heroti aheewa ihapari ca Yesu
ni aheerela akarumeya awe: Uyo Yohani Mpattisa; honwelela mwa atthu ookhwa, phimaana mwa ule cinaapankyaa ikuru cootikineeha.
Maana Heroti phaanvanre Yohani phuntthukelaka nkalaposo, nlattu wa Herotiya, amwaarawe Filipe, nhimawe.
Kontha Yohani aamwiirela Heroti coo: Khunlamuliya waathela amwaarawe nhimaa.
Vano, Heroti aaphavela umwiiva Yohani, nanso aanawoova mphwinko, kontha aalikeleliya ukhala nnapiyu.
Paahi, waphilyaya nihuku noopiihera myakha Heroti, mwanthiyana mwanawe Herotiya, aheena wamiithoni wa atthu othene, ni Heroti wahoncivela.
Vaavale Heroti aholupela n'unkhuluveliha mwali ule unvaha yaahalawe ulepela.
Vano mwali ule, ahotheperiya na anumwane wiira: Nkivahe muru wa Yohani Mpattisa munttiisini.
Mwene ahocukulaca, nanso nlattu woolupela ni nlattu wa atthu yaalattunlyawe, aholamula wiira avahiye.
Ahokumiha nlamulo noorwaa uhitiya Yohani nkalaposo.
Vano wahowiihiya muru ule munttiisini ni ahovahiya mwali ule, n'ule ahaavaha anumwane.
Vaavale, yahowa eetthuci awe Yohani, yahokusa nrutthu n'usikha. Wahoolo yahorwaaca unhimerya Yesu.
Vano, Yesu wiiwa wawe mwaha ule, ahokhuma nipuro nne ni ahokela nkalawani, ahorwaa nipuro nowiipithyaa. Nanso mphwinko waacuwenlyaya, wahowa ukhumaka mmasittatti unttharaka mwentta vathi.
Yesu ukhuruwa wawe nkalawani, ahoona mphwinko mwinci, ahoonela ikiriri ni ahaavoniha aretta yaawiihiye.
Ucoocilo, eetthuci awe yahowa ni yahomwiirela: Nna nipuro nna ntakhwani ni uneera wiilaka. Mweerele atthu ayo arwaace mmawaani yathume iyolya.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khawanrera weerela arwaace; mwaavaheke iyolya nyenyuva.
Vano ale yahaakhula yiiraka: Khanirina iyolya, nirina paahi mikatthe mithanu ni ihopa piili.
Vano ule aheera: Nkiwiihere woono.

Nalamunlene wiira atthu ale yunkomace wamalasini, ahokusa mikatthe mithanu nnye ni ihopa piili nnye, ahoweha wirimu ni ahonsukuru Nluku. Vano, ahomyaniha mikatthe nnye, ahaavaha eetthuci awe, ni ale yahaakawela atthu ale.
Atthu othene yahokhura n'urupala; vano ikalakathela co mikatthe caahanle nnyo cahottotteliya mpaka ucara itthuttu khumi na piili.
Yaakhunre ayo yaari wookhalaka alopwana ilufu thanu woohaatakanihera athiyana ni asaana.
Nananoru Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe akelace nkalawani, ahoolelace ni alapuwelace nikhopela nikhwawe, uyo aleehaka mphwinko ule.
Ulasera wawe mphwinko ule, ahorwaa veekha umwaakoni wiira aswali. Wiila waya, aari vale veekha.
Vano ikalawa yaari iriyari ipahari ittinkihiyaka ni mawimpi, maana iphyoo yaawuka mananna makina.
Mapikosa, Yesu ahaasicerya eettaka waculu maasi.
Vano eetthuci ale waamoonnyaya eettaka waculu maasi, wahaakelaca woova ni yaheeraca: Nna nlayikha! Ni yahokhuwelaca ni woova.
Nanso Yesu aheerelaca: Mpise nrima! Phi mi! Nhoove!
Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, wakhala wiira phi nyenyuva, nkiirele kiwe warinyu, keettaka waculu maasi.
Ule aheera: Uwe. Peturu ahokhuruwa nkalawani mmwe, aheetta waculu maasi, wiira akumane ni Yesu.
Nanso woonnyawe uwuka iphyoo yinci, ahoova, ni ahopacera uttittha ni ahokhuwela eeraka: Pwiya, nkoopole.
Nananoru Yesu, ahookola ntata nawe, ahommara moono ni ahomwiirela: Ntthu ookupali vakani, unaakanyacerani?
Uwela waya nkalawani, iphyoo yahomaala.
Vano, yaari nkalawani ale yahonlapela yiiraka: Khweli we uMwana a Nluku.
Analapuwenle nikhopela nikina, yahophiya uKenesare.
Vano waancuwelenlyaya atthu o nenne nipuro nne, ile ihapari ile yahomwarusela mittetthe cothene co waattamana ni ahowiiheriya aretta othene.
Yahonlepela wiira aattunihere ukwanya paahi mphantte woosoriya wo'hancu awe. Vano othene yaakwanya yahovona.
Mafarisi ni mayowantikha yaakhumile uYerusalemu yahophiyaca waaryawe Yesu ni yahonkoha yiiraka:
Anhanyurihelani eetthuci aa ilema co mahumu o'ttiini? Kontha yaphavelaka ulya khaannyawa.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nyu nnohanyurihelani nlamulo na Nluku nlattu wo'lema cinyu?
Maana Nluku heera: Waalemelihe athumwana na anumwana, ni ntthu nohala waalapha athumwane ni anumwane eeviye.
Nanso nyu nneera: Ntthu nohala weerela athumwane atthuna anumwane wiira: Itthu yaahalaka wuuvahani nyu kihonvaha Nluku toko itthuvo.
Uyo khankhanyererihiya tho waakavihera athumwane. Commo, nnaafutta nuulumo na Nluku nlattu wo'lema cinyu.
Anamirima miili! Nnapiyu Isaya holalya sana, awaacakani nyu, eeraka:
Ala atthu ala ankittittimiha ni malaku paahi, nanso nrima aya uri uttayi ni mi.
Anaakilapela vathiru; waneetthucihaya ikano ca atthu.
Yesu aheehana mphwinko wa atthu ni aheera: Nviriyane ni mwiiweehe:
Ntthu khankhala nharamu nlattu wo itthu inkelela wamalakuni, nanso inkhumela wamalakuni, yeeyo phinonkhaliha nharamu.
Vano ahorukureriya neetthuci awe ni yahomwiirelaca: Uhocuwela wiira wiiwa waya mafarisi ala moolumo ala, yahothamala n'urusiya venci?
Nanso ule wowaakhula eenre: Mwiri wothene uhaaliye na Apaapa o wirimu, ummoopheliya.
Mwaahiye, ayo ari ahooleli oohoona; maana, ntthu oohoona ammarelaka oohoona nkhwawe, oyeeli anaawuluwela munlittini.
Vaavale Peturu ahonlepela eeraka: Unitaphulele nenno nlikanihero nno.
Nanso Yesu aheera: Mpaka ni nyu khanneeweha nanlelo?
Ncuwele wiira yothene inkela wamalakuni, inkhuruwela nnapwiipwini ni uriheliya utakhwani.
Nanso citthu cinkhumela wamalakuni, cennyo cinkhuma wanrimani, cennyo phinonkhaliha nharamu ntthu.
Maana wanrimani phinkhumaya moopuwelo oonanara; wiiva, uluva, uraruwa, winnya, usaahiti wowootha, ukufuru.
Nnya phinonkhaliha ntthu nharamu, nanso ulya woohinyawa, khunonkhaliha nharamu.
Vano Yesu ahokhuma ni ahorwaa miphantte co'Tiru ni uSitoni.
Vaavale ahomoona nthiyana nkanaa, aakhuma miphantte cennye, ahokhuwa eeraka: Pwiya, mwana a Taviti, nkoonele ikiriri, nlattu mwanaka naahoosiya venci ni macini.
Nanso ule khaamwaakhunle. Vano eetthuci awe amwaattameryaka, yahonlepela yiiraka: Unleehe, maana naanitthara.
Vano ule ahaakhula eeraka: Mi kiveleelihiye paahi ukhontwaani coorimela co'Sirayeli.
Vaavale nthiyan'ole ahowa ni ahonlapela, eeraka: Pwiya, nkikavihere.
Nanso ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khawanrera ukusa iyolya ya asaana ni waavonyera asilapwa.
Nthiyan'ole aheera tho: Khweli, Pwiya, nanso asilapwa anaalya cimmoramora wameecani wa anene asilapwa.
Vano Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Nthiyana, nroromelo naa niri nuulupale! Yiirannye toko cimphavelaa. Ukhuma yooyo ukati uyo, mwanawe uyo ahovona.
Vaavale Yesu ahokhuma ni ahophiya ncenkweni wo'pahari yo'Kalileya, ahowela wamwaakoni ni ahonkoma.
Atthu enci yahowa waaryawe, yahaawiiha oottumpela, oohoona, oohuulumaca, owuntakyaa ni akina; yaheesiya waaryawe Yesu, ni ule ahaavoniha.
Atthu ale yahotteeliya woonaya oohuulumaca yuulumacaka, owuntakyaa akhalaka akumi, oottumpela yeettaka ni oohoona yoonaka, ni yahonttittimiha Nluku o'Sirayeli.
Yesu aheehana eetthuci awe ni aheera: Kinawoonela ikiriri mphwinko ula. Nna va ahovira mahuku mararu unari ni mi woohilya itthu, ni akintthuna waalasera ni itala, waacera ahikhwe mahile ni iphiro.
Vano eetthuci awe yahonkoha yiiraka: Ninhala uphwanya vayi mikatthe ntakhwani toko mu cowiira avone atthu enci toko ala?
Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Nrina mikatthe mikavi? Ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Nirina mikatthe saapa ni asihopa vakani.
Vano ahaalamula atthu ale wiira yunkome vathi.
Ahokusa mikatthe saapa nnye ni ihopa ni ahonsukuru Nluku; ahomyaniha ni ahaavaha eetthuci awe, ni eetthuci ale yahaakawela atthu ale.
Othene yaholya mpaka urupala, ni ikalakathela caahanle nnyo eetthuci awe yahottottela itthuttu saapa.
Vano, yaalilye ayo yaari alopwana ilufu cese, woohaalikelela athiyana na asaana.
Wahoolo, aholasera mphwinko ule, ni ahokela nkalawani n'ulapuwela nttetthe wo'Makatani.
Mafarisi ni masatusi yahomwaattamerya Yesu ni yahonttehaca, anlepelacaka wiira aathoonyere ikanyero yookhuma wirimu.
Yesu ahaakhula eerelaka: Waphiyaka ucoocilo nyu nneera: Unaawa ukati womaana, kontha irimu ihoseerya;
ni wicisu nneera: Ilelo naakhuruwa nkhaya, maana irimu iyo iri kunyantta. Nnaacuwela utaphulela cinkhalaya irimu, nanso khannocuwela ikanyero co'kati?
Nloko noonanara nrima ni nooluva ninlepela ikanyero. Nanso hata ikanyero imoca khiiwo inhalaya uvahiya, mari ihikhanle paahi ikanyero ya Yona. Yesu ahaahiya ni ahokhuma.
Vano, eetthuci ale analapuwenlene nikhopela nikina, yaholiyala ukusa iyolya.
Yesu aheerela: Moone ni mwiikasoope ni miropo co mafarisi ni co masatusi.
Vano ale yaanawaapelana ayaayoru yiirelanaka: Nlattu woohiwiiha iyolya!
Yesu ucuwela wawe mwaha ule, ahaakoha eeraka: Atthu ookupali vakani; Nnoopelani mwaha nlattu woohikhalana iyolya?
Khannaya wiiweeha? Mena khannoopuwela ihaali yo mikatthe mithanu caakaweliyaya atthu ilufu thanu ni itthuttu kavi co'kalakathela caattotteliye?
Mena mikatthe saapa caaliye na atthu ilufu cese ni itthuttu kavi caattottenlenyu?
Vano nhincuwelela cani wiira akinooluma ihaali yo mikatthe? Nanso, mwiikasoope ni miropo co mafarisi ni masatusi.
Paahi, yahocuwelela wiira khaaca wiikasoopa ni miropo co mikatthe, nanso miitthuciho co mafarisi ni co masatusi.
Yesu ahophiya mphantte wo'Sesareya ya Filipe, ahaakoha eetthuci awe eeraka: Atthu ayo aneera Mwana a Pinatamu tipani?
Ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Akina aneera Yohani Mpattisa; akina aneera Eliya; akina aneera Yeremiya, ni akina aneera mmoca wo minapiyu.
Ahopwaherera eeraka: Vano nyu nneera mi kimpani?
Vaavale Simoni Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: We uKristu, Mwana a Nluku nkumi.
Yesu aheera: Uhoreriya we, Simoni Parayona, maana kahiwena ntthu phi ntthu phuhimenrye, nanso Apaapa ari wirimu.
Ciicammo kinowiirela, we Peturu, waculu waya ula mwala ula kinaahala uteka ikereca aka, ni mikhora co'mooroni khacinhala utthema.
Kinaahala wuvaha mitthukulo co'mwene wo wirimu; vano itthu inluttanihenyu vathi va inaaluttanihinya wirimu, ni itthu ihinluttanihinya vathi va, wirimu khinluttanihinya.
Vaavale ahaalakihera eetthuci awe ale wiira ahinhimerye ntthu wiira uyo ri Kristu.

Ikhumelo yooyo ukati uyo, Yesu Kristu ahopacera waathoonyera eetthuci awe wiira kinlamuliya urwaa uYerusalemu n'uhuva wo citthu cinci, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha, wiiviya ni wunwelela nihuku noneeraru.
Peturu ahomwiihana Yesu ni ahopacera unkuphula: Pwiya! Mena vakani khinlamuliya wukhumelela.
Nanso Yesu, anrukunuwelaka Peturu, ahomwiirela: Ukhume Sotwani! We nluku nookakathula. Khunoopuwela citthu ca Nluku, nanso ca atthu.
Paahi, Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe: Ntthu atthunaka ukitthara mi, eekhotteke mwanene, akuseke nsalapa awe ni akitthareke.
Kontha ule notthuna woopola ukumi awe, unanrihyaa. Ule unonrihyaa ukumi awe mwa nlattu wawaka mi, naahala uphwanya.
Ntthu nohala uphurani aphwanyaka ittuninya yothene nanso unrihyaka nnepa awe? Atthuna, nohala waakakhaniha ni isiyani nnepa awe?
Maana Mwana a Pinatamu naawa ni waarya wa Athumwane, na ancelo awe, vano naahala untthuva khula ntthu toko ciinryawe mavarelo nteko.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira ahaawo ari va, ahinhala ukhwa mpaka umoona Mwana a Pinatamu awaaka mumweneni mwawe.
Anavinre mahuku siita, Yesu ahaakusa Peturu, Yakopu ni Yohani, munnawe Yakopu, ahaarwana umwaakoni woorekama.
Wonwo yakhalacile ayaayoru, ni Yesu aheetatusa ikhove awe wariyari waya. Ikhove awe yahaarya toko ncuwa, ni coowara cawe caari cootteela toko waarya.
Vaavale yahokhumelela Musa ni Eliya, amuulumanaka uyo.
Vano Peturu ahomwiirela Yesu: Pwiya, wahorera ukhala vaava, watthunaka kinaateka marapattha mararu; nimoca nawinyu, nikina na Musa ni nikina na Eliya.
Oolumacak'ono, yahokhuneeliya ni nihutte no waarya ni nnihutteni mmwe naheewannyaa ncu neera: Ula ri mwanaka oofentiya nokitteeliha nrima. Mmwiiweleleke!
Eetthuci ale wiiwa waya, yahoovaca venci cinene ni yahowuluwela vathi.
Vano Yesu ahaattamerya ni ahaakwanya eeraka: Munwace ni nhoove!
Vano ale waawehilyaya, khayamoonne tho nkina, yaamoonne Yesu paahi.
Wakhuruwaya mmwaakoni, Yesu ahaalamulela eeraka: Nhinhimerye ntthu iyooni ile, mpaka wanhalawe wunwelela Mwanawe Pinatamu mwa atthu ookhwa.
Vaavale eetthuci yahonkoha yiiraka: Nlattuni mayowantikha yiiraka, woopacera nolamuliya uwa Eliya?
Vano, Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khweli, Eliya naawa wiira alokihere citthu cothene.
Nanso mi kinoohimeryani wiira, Eliya howa ni khayancuwelenle ni yahompankela citthu cothene caaphavenlyaya. Ciicammo Mwana a Pinatamu anaahala unhuviha.
Vano eetthuci yahocuwela wiira aamwaaca Yohani Mpattisa.
Uphiyaca waya nipuro naari mphwinko, nlopwana mmoca ahomwaattamerya ni ahokhoroma eeraka:
Pwiya, mmoonele ikiriri mwanaka, kontha uyo nacilicili ni naahuva venci; imaara cinci naawuluwela viikho ni imaara cikina mmaasini.
Kihaahimerya eetthuci inyu, nanso khayoonrye unvoniha.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nloko na atthu oohaamini ni oohiloka! Mpaka yakhani kinhalaka wukhalanani ni kuuvilelakani? Nkiwiihere uno mmirawo oyo.
Yesu aholamulela ncini wiira nikhume, ni nne nahokhuma mwa mmirawo mmwe. Ukhuma yoole ukati ule mmirawo ule ahovona.
Vano, eetthuci yahomwaattamerya Yesu ni yahonkoha anari ayaayoru yiiraka: Nlattuni hi khanoonrye woomola?

Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Nlattu wookhalana ikupalelo yankani. Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, mwakhalanaka ikupalelo toko ipyo yankani, nnaahala wiirela ula mwaako ula: Ukhume va urwee nwe, ni uyo unaarwaa. Khiiwo itthu inhala wuurikelani.
Nanso ila ikhapila yo macini ila khinoomoliya paahi, nanso inoomoliya ni iswali ni utthuka.
Anathukumanne uKalileya, Yesu aheerela: Mwanawe Pinatamu naavahereriya mmatatani mwa atthu.
Ala anaahala umwiiva, nanso nihuku noneeraru nawunwelela. Vano, eetthuci yahocukula venci cinene.
Yesu n'eetthuci awe uphiyaca waya uKafarnaumu, mayoliviha nsoko yahorwaaca wa Peturu ni yahonkohaca yiiraka: Mwalimu inyu khanliva nsoko wo'nupa ittakattifu?

Ni uyo ahaakhula eeraka: Naaliva. Peturu ukela wawe mpaani mmwe, Yesu ahaaholelihera, eeraka: Simoni, unoonela cani? Mamwene o vathi anaalepela apani nsoko atthuna micanko, asaanaya atthuna amalaponi?
Peturu ahaakhula: Amalaponi. Yesu ahomwiirela: Wakhala commo, asaanaya ayo khaanlivihiya.

Nanso wowiira nihaakosihe ala atthu ala, urwee upahari, wamence, ni ihopa inhala upacera uvariy'eyo, waruule ni waatamihe, unkophwanya ncurukhu mmoca wo'paratha. Wakumihe ni walive mwa ncina naka ni nawaa.
Yoole ukati ule, yahophiya eetthuci awe waaryawe Yesu, yahonkoha yiiraka: Tupani ri muulupale wumweneni wo wirimu?
Yesu ahomwiihana mwana ni ahomweesa iriyari aya,
ni aheera: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, mwaahiivaherereke ni mwaahikhaleke toko mwana, mena vakani khannohala ukela wumweneni wo wirimu.
Phimaana, ule neeyeviha toko mwana, phi muulupale wumweneni wo wirimu.
Ntthu nomwaakhelela mwana mwa ncina naka, nokaakhelela mi.
Ntthu nohala unkosiha mmoca wa ala acikani ankikupali mi, phatari nawarihiye nsilo nsiko ni uvonyeriya iriyari ipahari.
Ihotakhaliya ittuninya nlattu wo citthu cinkosiha. Maana cookosiha khacinhaleela, nanso hotakhaliya ule nohala waakosiha atthu!

Wakhala wiira ntata naa atthuna nnyaa naa ninawukosiha, uthikile ni urihele uttayi; maana, phatari ukela wukumini uttumpelaka atthuna unapahuwile, wahohiyana ukhalana matata atthuna inyaa cothene n'uvonyeriya umooroni woohimala.
Wakhala wiira niitho naa ninawukosiha, uphele ni urihele uta. Phatari ukela wukumini ni niitho nimoca, wahohiyana, ukhalana oomeeli n'uvonyeriya umooroni.
Pasoopa, nhintarawe hata mmoca wa ala acikani ala. Maana kinoohimeryani wiira ancelo aya wirimu anawoona woohihiyerera ikhove ya apaapa wirimu.
Kontha Mwana a Pinatamu awile woopola yaarimenle.
Vano nnoona cani? Ntthu akhalanaka ikhontwaa iminya, ni imoca irimelaka, khanhala uhiya tuswini na khentta (99) nnyo umyaakoni, arwaaka uphavelaca imoca irimenle iyo?
Akhalaka wiira hophwanya, khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira naatteeliya venci nlattu wo yeeyo, uvikana tuswini na khentta (99) cihirimenle nnye.
Ciicammo, khunakhala utthuna wa athumwaninyu o wirimu wiira arimele mmoca wa ala acikani ala.
Wakhalaka wiira munnaa hookosera, wamuulumaneke we paahi. Awiiwaka, uhompatthanana munnaa.
Nanso, aahiwiiweke, unrwaane wa ntthu mmoca atthuna eeli, kontha yooriyeleliya yothene wowiira ikupaliye inlamuliya ukhaleliya usaahiti na atthu eeli atthuna araru.
Vano ule aahitthuneke, unrweeheke ukereca, ni akhottaka nanlelo wiiwelela ikereca, vano ule munwacawace toko nkaafiri atthuna mayoliviha nsoko.
Khweli kinoohimeryani wiira yothene inluttanihenyu vathi va, ciicammo wirimu inaaluttanihinya, ni yothene ihinluttanihenyu vathi va, ciicammo wirimu khinluttanihinya.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani tho wiira, yakhalaka eeli mwa nyu, vathi va, atthunelanaka w'etthu phi itthu inhalaya ulepela, anaavahiya na Apaapa ari wirimu.
Maana nipuro niri atthu eeli atthuna araru anathukumanne mwa ncina naka, mi kiri iriyari aya.
Vano, Peturu, amwaattameryaka Yesu, ahonkoha eeraka: Pwiya, mpaka imaara kavi kinlamuliyaka unlevelela munnaka akikoseraka? Mpaka imaara saapa?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Akinwiirela mpaka imaara saapa, nanso mpaka imaara sapini (70) ceettaka saapa.
Phimaana, umwene wo wirimu unlikana ni mwene aalakenle waalokiha ikophi akarumeya awe.
Wapacenryawe upanka commo, ahowiiheriya mmoca aarina ikophi yo ncurukhu mwinci wo'paratha.
Karumeya ule khaarina mananna ooliva, vano nkunya ule aholamula wiira atumihinye ule, amwaarawe na asaanawe ni citthu cothene caarinawe, wiira alive ikophi yarinawe.
Vano, karumeya ule ahokhoroma ni aholepela eeraka: Nkoonele ikiriri, cothene kinaahala uliva.
Nkunya awe, ahomoonela ikiriri, ahonhiya ni ahonlevelela ikophi ile.
Nanso, ukhuma wawe karumeya ule, ahonkumanana nkhunanawe aankophenle iminya imoca paahi. Ahoncotta ni ahomwiirela: Ukilive ikikophenlyaa.
Vano nkhunanawe ule ahokhoroma wamettoni wawe ni ahonlepela eeraka: Ukoonele ikiriri, kinaahala wuuliva.
Nanso ule khaatthunne, ahontthukiiha n'unrweha ukalaposo, mpaka walivilyawe ikophi ile.
Vano woonnyaya akhunanawe ale itthu yaapankilyawe, yahocukula venci ni yahorwaa unhimerya nkunya awe itthu yaakhumelenle.
Vano nkunya awe ule ahomwiihana ni ahomwiirela: Karumeya oonanara nrima. Kihoolevelela ikophi yaarinaa yothene kontha uhookilepela.
Vano we khawaalamuliya unlevelela nkhwaa toko mi culevelenlyaka?
Nkunya ule ahoviruwa venci ni ahoruma ukusiya ni urweehiya ukalaposo mpaka ukati waahalawe uliva ikophi yothene.
Ciicammo Apaapa o wirimu phinhalaya uwiirihani mwahaaleveleleke asunninyu ni nrima wothene.
Yesu waamalihilyawe wuulumaca, ahokhuma uKalileya n'urwaa ilapo yo'Yuteya, nikhopela nikhwawe no Yortani.
Ahotthariya na atthu enci, ni uyo ahaavoniha.
Vaavale yahowaaca mafarisi wiira anttehe ni yahonkoha wiira: Naattuniheriya nlopwana waamwalanana amwaarawe woohitthekeliya?
Yesu ahaakhula: Khansomile wiira Mpattusi, wupaceroni hompattusa nlopwana ni nthiyana?
Aheera tho: Phimaana, nlopwana naahala waahiya athumwane na anumwane, nokoluttana na amwaarawe ni oyeeli ankhala irutthu imoca.
Commo ayo khaanakhala tho eeli, nanso irutthu imoca. Phimaana, itthu iluttanihilyawe Nluku, ntthu himwalanihe.
Yahomwiirelaca tho: Nlattuni Musa alamulaka wiira avahiye iwarakha yoomwalana?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nlattu wooturumala nrima enyu phimaana Musa oottuniherakani waamwalanana amwaarinyu, nanso khawaari commo ukhuma wupaceroni.
Mi kinoohimeryani wiira ntthu naamwalanana amwaarawe, mari uhikhanle paahi nlattu wooluva, phwaathelaka akina, neetta uluva.
Vano eetthuci awe yahomwiirela: Wakhalaka wiira phinkhalaya nlopwana na amwaarawe ayo, phatari uhithela.
Nanso Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Kuhimwena wiira othene phivahiyaya commo, nanso ale yaalikeleliye.
Maana ahaawo ookhwa nrayi iyarelo; ahaawo akina yiiviye nrayi na atthu, ni ahaawo akina yiipankile mwanene aya, nlattu woomwene wo wirimu. Ule noorya ukupali, nkupali.
Yesu ahowiiheriya asaana wiira aathatele matata ni aaswalele, nanso eetthuci awe yaanawaateeliha.
Yesu aheera: Mwaahiye asaana ayo, nhaateelihe uwa waryaka, kontha umwene wo wirimu uri wawaya.
Wahoolo ahaathatela matata ni ahokhuma.
Nlopwana mmoca ahomwaattamerya Yesu ni ahonkoha eeraka: Mwalimu, kipankekeni yomaana wiira kaphwanye ukumi woohimala?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Unkikoherani nlattu w'etthu yomaana? Omaana ri mmoca paahi. Watthunaka ukela wukumini, uttharihelele malamulo.
Ule ahonkoha tho: Phavi? Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Uhiive, uhiluve, uhinnye, uhikhale saahiti owootha,
waalemelihe athumwana na anumwana ni unfente nkhwaa toko cineefentaa umwanene.
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Cothene nnyo kinaattharihelelaka; inkihaleela isiyani tho?
Yesu ahomwiirela: Watthunaka ukhala ooloka, urwee, watumihe citthu cothene cirinaa, ni ncurukhu uyo waavahe amasikiini ni unkookhalana nhakhu wirimu. Wahoolo uwe ni ukitthare.
Vano weewilyawe nuulumo nne, ahokhuma acukulacaka, kontha aarina mihakhu cinci.
Vano Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, thaciri urikarika ukela wumweneni wo wirimu.
Nanlelo kinoohimeryani wiira, wari wookhwya uvira inkamira wamwiitheni wo sinkano, woovikana thaciri ukela wumweneni wa Nluku.
Eetthuci awe wiiwa waya commo, yahotikhinaca venci, yiiracaka: Vano, tipani nohala woorya woopwa?
Yesu ahaaweha ni aheerela: Iyo khinooryaa wamiithoni wa atthu, nanso ni Nluku, citthu cothene cinawooryaa.
Peturu ahomwiirela: Hi nihohiya cothene ni wuttharani; ninhala uphwanyani?

Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, inaawa ilapo yonaanano, Mwana a Pinatamu wanhalawe wunkoma wahiceni wawe nipuro no waarya, ni nyu nnokitthara nnaahala wunkoma mmahiceni khumi na piili wiira nhukhumu mahimo khumi na meeli o'Sirayeli.

Ale othene anhala uhiya inupa aya, asunnaya, asirokoraya, athumwanaya, anumwanaya, amwaaraya, asaanaya, atthuna imatta caya, nlattu wo ncina naka, naahala waakhela itthuvo imaara cene iminya, ni wahoolo nokoophwanya ukumi woohimala.
Nanso enci oopacera ankokhala owiiheerya, ni owiiheerya ankokhala oopacera.
Kontha umwene wo wirimu unlikana toko mwanene itthoko aakhumile mapikosa wiira aakawele miteko ananteko umattani wawe yo'vinyu.
Aheewanana waaliva ananteko khula nihuku ncurukhu mmoca wo'paratha ni ahaaruma urwaaca umattani wawe.
Vano ahokhuma iwora yonakhentta, ahorwaa mpaka upacari, ahoona akina yahaarina nteko,
ni aheerela: Ni nyu ciicammo nrwaaceke umattani waka mwavareke nteko ni kinaahala wulivani wanreranaya. Ale yahorwaaca.
Ahokhuma tho ikwaha ikina, ukati wo'thana ni iwora yoneeraru yocoocilo, ahopanka ciicammo.
Ahokhuma tho iwora yoneethanu yocoocilo, ahaaphwanya akina yahaarina nteko ni ahaakoha eeraka: Nlattuni nkhalaka nihuku nothene woohivara nteko?
Vano ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Kontha khaawo nivahile nteko. Vaavale aheerelaca: Ni nyu ciicammo nrwaaceke umattani waka yo'vinyu.
Utthekuwa waya ncuwa, mwanene imatta yo'vinyu ahomwiirela nhooleli awe: Weehanace ananteko ayo ni waalive, waapaceraka owiiheerya ni waamaliheraka oopacera ayo.
Awaacaka yeehenrye ale, ahaavaha wo khula ntthu ncurukhu mmoca wo'paratha.
Waphilyaya oopacera ale, yoopuwela wiira yaanhala waakhela wowaapwaha ale, nanso, na ale yaakhenle ncurukhu mmoca.
Nanso anaakhenlene, yaananttokutta mwanene imatta ule,
yiiraka: Ala owiiheerya ala avanre nteko iwora imoca paahi, nanso wowaaliva va uhaalikaniha ni hi, nivilenle woocyaa ni nttukuttha nihuku nothene.
Nanso mwanene imatta ile ahomwaakhula mmoca mwa ale eeraka: Mpwana, akuuthuwile isariya; khaneewananne wuuliva ncurukhu mmoca wo'paratha?
Ukuse iri yawaa ni urwee. Maana kimphavela ummaha ula owiiheerya ula toko we.
Maanaya mi khunkiphwanela upanka intthunaka ni itthu iri yawaka? Atthuna we unrama nlattu wooloka waka?
Paahi, atthu oopacera, ankokhala owiiheerya, ni owiiheerya ankokhala oopacera.
Vaavale, Yesu ahovattela uYerusalemu ni aheehana eetthuci khumi n'eeli mphantte aya ni aheerela:
Nna va ninvattela uYerusalemu, ni Mwanawe Pinatamu naahala uvahereriya mmatatani mwa akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha. Ayo anaahala umwiiviha.
Anaahala unvaherera mmatatani mwa amalaponi wiira antarawace, amwaafyulace ni ankhomele wansalapani, nanso nihuku noneeraru naahala wunwelela.
Vaavale yahophiya amwaarawe Sepeteu na asaanaya, yahokhoroma ni yahonlepela itthu.
Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Nnophavelani? Ale yahaakhula yiiraka: Ulamule wiira, wumweneni waa, asaanaka eeli ala yonkome wonwo, mmoca moono wo nlopwana ni nkina uyo moono wo nthiyana.
Nanso Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khannocuwela inlepelenyu. Nnawoorya uwurya ikikhompe inhalaka uwurya ni upattisiya n'upattiso unhalaka upattisiya mi? Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Ninawoorya.
Vano aheerela: Nnaahala uwurya ikikhompe aka, nanso wunkoma moono aka wo nlopwana atthuna wo nthiyana khakilamuleliye wuuvahani, nanso uri wa ale atthenkemaniheriye na Apaapa.
Vano, eetthuci akina khumi ale wiiwa waya mwaha ule, yahaarusanana anna eeli ale.
Yesu aheehana ni aheerela: Nnaacuwela wiira alamuli o mwiilaponi anawaathawala atthu, ni akhulupale anawaahuviha atthu ni ikuru caya.
Nanso wa nyu, kuhimweni commo. Ntthu notthuna ukhala muulupale wa nyu, nolamuliya ukhala nrumeyi,
ni ntthu notthuna ukhala oopacera mwa nyu, nolamuliya wiiyeviha toko ipottha.
Kontha Mwanawe Pinatamu, khaawile uvareliya nteko, nanso wile uvara nteko ni uvaha ukumi awe wiira oopole atthu enci.
Vano Yesu n'eetthuci awe waakhumaya uYeriko, mphwinko mwinci wahontthara.
Vano, yahooninya atthu eeli oohoona, anonkomile nceresere iphiro. Weewilyaya wiira Yesu naavira, yahokhuwa yiiracaka: Pwiya, Mwana a Taviti, nnoonele ikiriri!
Nanso atthu ayo waamaalihaya va, ayo phaatepaya ukhuwela yiiracaka: Pwiya, Mwana a Taviti, nnoonele ikiriri!
Paahi, Yesu aheemela, aheehanaca ni ahaakohaca eeraka: Nnophavela kiwiiriheni isiyani?
Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Pwiya, nimphavela woona.
Yesu ahoonela ikiriri, ahokwanya miitho aya ni wowaakuvyaca wene ale yahoona ni yahontthara.
Yesu n'eetthuci awe yahattameryaca uYerusalemu, yahophiya uPetifaki, mwaako wo Olivera ni ule ahaaruma eetthuci eeli, eerelaka:
Murwee aliteya ari uhoolo ni nnaahala umphwanya puuru natthukeleliye, nari ni mwapuuru, mwantaphule ni mwammwiihe woono.
Akhalaka wiira haawo nohala wuukohani, mmwiireleke wiira Apwiya anaamphavela, ni anaahala wuuhiyerani.
Paahi, cothene nnyo cikhumelenle wiira citthariheleliye cowantikhiya co minapiyu cineera:
Nhimerye unethi wo'Siyoni: Mwene enyu naawa, owiiyeviha nonkomile wapuuruni ni wamwapuuru, mwana o mwannama mpakhira.
Eetthuci ale yahorwaa ni yahopanka toko ceereliyaya ni Yesu.
Yahommwiiha puuru ni mwapuuru ni yahaatalaca ikuwo caya waculu waya ni Yesu ahomunkomela waculu.
Atthu enci yaanaatala ikuwo caya mphironi, ni akina yaathikila miritta co miri cikithi ni yaanaatala mphironi.
Atthu yaari uhoolo mpaka yaantthara, yaankhuwela yiiraka: Hosaana mwana a Taviti! Horeriya ule nowa mwa ncina na Apwiya! Hosaana onculu!
Yesu ukela wawe uYerusalemu, isittatti yothene yahorekecya, wiiriyaka: Tupani yoola?
Ni mphwinko weera: Ula phi Yesu, nnapiyu o'Nasaree yo'Kalileya.
Yesu ahokela wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, ni ahoomolaca othene yaatumihaca ni yaathuma mpaani mmwe. Ahopinttulaca meeca a atthu yaakakhanihaca ncurukhu ni ihice ca atthu yaatumihaca ikhuntta,
ni aheerelaca: Ihantikhiya: Inupa aka inhala wiihaninya inupa yo'swali. Nanso nyu nnopanka nikhuku na anamwiinya.
Yahowa atthu oohoona ni oottumpela wapuwani vale, ni Yesu ahaavoniha.
Vano akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha, yahorusiya woonnyaya mitikiniho caapankawe ni amirawo akhuwelaka wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu yiiracaka: Hosaana mwana a Taviti.
Ale yahomwiirelaca: Unawiiwaka itthu inoolumacaya ala? Yesu aheerela: Khweli; khannasoma wiiriyaya: Wamalakuni wa amirawo ni asaana oohihiya nipele cihokhuma icipo coottottopela?
Aahiyacaka, ahokhuma nsittatti mmwe, arwaaka uPetaniya waarupilyawe uhiyu wothene.
Wicisu, Yesu waaturuwelawe usittatti yahonvola itala.
Woona wawe mwiri wo nfikera waari wakhiviru ni iphiro, ahaattamerya mwiri ule ni aaphwanyile matakhuru paahi ni aheerela: Cihiime tho mihokorokho ula mwiri ula! Wowaakuvyaca wene mwiri ule wahooma.
Eetthuci woona waya itthu ile yahotikhina yiiraka: Weeraceele cani waakuvaka wuuma mwiri ula?

Vano Yesu ahaakhula eerelaka: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, mwakhalanaka nroromelo woohaanyihera, khannohala upanka paahi toko cipankiyaya ula mwiri ula, nanso mpaka ula mwaako ula mweerelaka: Wiiphele ni wiivonyere mpahari; inawiirannya.
Cothene cinlepelenyu muuswalini ni nroromelo, nnawaakhela.

Yesu ahokela wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni ukati weetthucihawe yahomwaattamerya akhulupale o mayasataka ni mahumu ni yahonkoha yiiraka: Umpanka nnya citthu nnya n'ulamuli wa pani? Tipani oovahile yoola ulamuli ula?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mi ciicammo kinawukohani itthu imoca. Mwakaakhulaka, kinawuhimeryani umphwanyaka ikuru cinkipankiha nnya citthu nnya.
Upattiso wa Yohani waakhumile vayi? Waakhumile wirimu atthuna wa atthu? Ale yahopacera wiirelana ayaayoru coo: Naakhulaka wiira wo wirimu; naahala unikoha wiira: Kaahiki nhinkupalenleni?
Ciicammo neeraka wa atthu, ninawoova mphwinko, maana atthu othene ammoonela Yohani ukhala nnapiyu.
