Vano yahomwaakhula Yesu yiiraka: Khanincuwela. Ni ule aheerela: Hata mi akinoohimeryani kivahile ulamuli unkipankiha nnya citthu nnya.
Vano nnoona cani? Aakhumile nlopwana na asaanawe eeli, ni amphwanyaka ontthaara, ahomwiirela: Mwanaka, ilelo urwee wavare nteko umattani yo'vinyu.
Vano ule ahaakhula eeraka: Akintthuna. Nanso wahoolo ahorukunusa nrima ni ahorwaa.
Ahomphwanya mwana nkina ule ni ahomwiirela ciicammo. Vano ule ahaakhula eeraka: Kinaarwa. Nanso khaarweele.

Vano mwa asaana eeli ale phuvi pankile utthuna wa athumwane? Vaavale ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Oopacer'oyo. Yesu aheerela: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira mayoliviha nsoko ni mapuuta, nnaahala woona uhoolo winyu akelaka wumweneni wa Nluku.
Maana Yohani howa wiira oothoonyereni iphiro yo'sariya, nyu khammwaaminni, nanso mayoliviha nsoko ni mapuuta ahomwaamini. Vano nyu, moonak'ono hata vakani khantthunne urukunusa nrima.

Nviriyane tho nlikanihero nikina: Ahaawo ntthu aarina imatta yo'vinyu, ahopophela nkuco, ahothipa nlitti no waameliya ivinyu ni ahoteka isanca. Wahoolo ahaahiyera mayolima ni ahokhuma arwaaka ikwaha yoottayi.
Vano uphiya waya ukati woorottowola, ule ahaaruma arumeyi awe wa mayolima ale wiira yavahiye mihokorokho co mmattani.
Mayolima ale, yahaavara arumeyi ale, mmoca uyo yahonrakaliha, nkin'oyo yahomwiiva ni nkin'oyo yahonvonyakaca ni maluku.
Wahoolo ahaaruma tho arumeyi akina, enci woopwaha oopacera ale, ni ale yahaapankaca toko oopacera ale.
Wumaleloni, ahaaveleelihera mwanawe, eeraka: Anaahala unlemeliha mwanaka.
Nanso mayolima ale, umoona waya mwan'ole, yaheerelana ayaayoru: Ula phinhala waakhela nhakhu! Nrwee, nimwiive wiira nihalane nhakhu awe.
Yahonvaraca ni yahompurulela nceresere imatta ni yahomwiiva.
Vano awaaka mwanene imatta ile, nohala waapanka cani mayolima ale?
Ale yahaakhulaca: Naahala weevakaca oonanara nrima ale ni naahala waathanla mayolima akina, wiira akumihe mihokorokho.
Vano Yesu aheerela: Khannasoma cowantikhiya? Nnyo cineera: Nluku nikhottiye ni mayoteka, nenno pheesiye ukhala nowookolela nlootho; Iyo inkhuma wa Apwiya, ni iri yootikineeha wamiithoni wihu.
Paahi mi kinwiirelani, umwene wa Nluku nnawaakhiya ni anhala uvahiya atthu akina anvaha mihokorokho.
Ntthu nohala uwuluwela waculu waya nenno nluku nno naahala unyakatyaaca, ni ule ninhala umuluwela, naahala uthatuwa ntthupi.
Vano akhulupale o mayasataka ni mafarisi, weewilyaya moolumo ale, yahoonenela wiira yaaciya yaayo.
Aphavelacaka untthuka, yaanoova mphwinko, maana waamwiirela nnapiyu.
Wahoolo Yesu ahopwaherera woolumana ni malikanihero, eeraka:
Umwene wo wirimu uri toko mwene mmoca aatthenkemanihile isikuhuulu yoothela mwanawe.
Ahaaruma arumeyi awe wiira yeehanace mayolattuliya isikuhuulu; na ale khayaatthunne uwaaca.
Wahoolo ahaaruma tho arumeyi awe akina, eeraka: Mwaahimerye mayolattuliya ayo wiira: Iyolya kihotthenkemaniha, kihohita imope ni ikhontwaa, cothene ciholikana, nwaace usikuhuuluni.
Nanso ale khayaatthunne uwa, mmoca ahorwaa umattani wawe, nkina uyo ahorwaa umaronttani wawe;
akina ayo yahaavara arumeyi ale, yahaattakaca ni weevakaca.
Mwene ule, waakhenlyawe ihapari co yeeyo itthu iyo, ahoviruwa ni ahaaveleeliha anakhotto awe, aheevakaca ale anyali ale n'upaha isittatti aya iyo.
Vano aheerela arumeyi awe ale, isikuhuulu yoothelaninya iyo ihotthenkemanihinya, nanso mayolattuliya ayo khayaaphwanenle.
Vano nrwaace mmwalanne iphiro ni mwaalattule atthu wiira awe usikuhuuluni othene anhalenyu waaphwanya.
Arumeyi ale yahorwaaca mmaphironi ni yahaathukumaniha othene yaaphwanyaya, oonanara ni oorera nrima; wasikuhuuluni vale yahocara mayolattuliya.
Mwene waakenlyawe wiira oone mayolattuliya ale, ahomoona nlopwana ahaawanre toko mayolattuliya,
ni ahomwiirela: Mpwana, ukenle cani mu woohiwaraca toko mayolattuliya isikuhuulu yoothelaninya? Nlopwan'ole ahomaala.
Vano mwene ule aholamula eeraka: Atthukiye metto ni myoono nnyo ni avonyeriye vate uri ipiphi; wonwo phinhalawe wunla ni ucekesa miino.
Maana owiihaninya ari enci, nanso oothanliya ari vakani.
Vaavale mafarisi yahokhumaca ni yahopacera uvaanela mananna oonvarihaca mmoolumoni.

Vano yahaarumaca eetthuci aya ni annaheroti, yiiraka: Mwalimu, ninaacuwela wiira nri eekhweli ni nnawiitthuciha iphiro ya Nluku, toko ciryaya yeekhweli. Khaawo nonramelenyu, maana khannoweha makhalelo a ntthu.
Vano nnihimerye mawooni inyu, wanaalamuliya uliviya nsoko Sesari atthuna mena?
Nanso Yesu waacuwenlyawe moopuwelo aya oonanara, aheera: Anamirima miili! Nnokittehacerani?
Nkoonihere ncurukhu unliveliya nsoko. Ale yahomoonihera ncurukhu
ni ahaakoha eeraka: Ilatarato ela ni yaantikhiye ela yawani?
Vano ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Ya Sesari. Vano ule aheerelaca: Khweli. Munvahe Sesari iri ya Sesari ni Nluku, iri ya Nluku.
Ale wiiwa waya maakhulelo ayo, yahotikhinaca, yahonhiyaca n'ukhumaca.
Nenno nihuku nno, yahowaaca masatusi, aneera khuuwo wunwelela, ni yahonkohaca,
yiiraka: Mwalimu, Musa eenre wiira nthiyana akhweliyaka awannyawe woohaayarana asaana, ayo anaatheliya ni munnawe waacera annyarele asaana.
Vano wariyari wihu yahaawo asilopwana saapa eerukulu imoca. Oopacer'oyo, ahonthela nthiyana ni ahokhwa. Nlattu woohinyarana mwana ni ahonhiyera nhimawe nthiyan'ole.
Ni ciicammo wahomwiiranela onayeeli, oneeraru mpaka onasaapa.
Wiimaleloni, ahokhwa nthiyan'ole.
Vano, wanhala wunweleliya va, nthiyan'ole nohala ukhala awannyawe phavi? Kontha othene yahonthela nthiyan'ole.
Nanso Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nnaavonyiha nlattu woohicuwela cowantikhiya mena ikuru ca Nluku.
Kontha, uwunwelelani, khunhala ukhala uthela mena uthelihana, nanso nokokhala toko ancelo owirimu.
Khansomile itthu ihimilyawe Nluku mwaha wo wunwelela atthu ookhwa? Neera coo:
Mi ki Nluku a Aparahamu, Nluku a Isaki ni Nluku a Yakopi. Maana Nluku khanakhala Nluku a atthu ookhwa, nanso ri Nluku a atthu akumi.
Atthu ale wiiwa waya commo, yahotikhinaca meetthuciho awe ale.
Mafarisi weewilyaya wiira ahaamaaliha masatusi, yahothukumana nenno nipuro nno.
Mmoca wa ale, ntaphuleli o nlamulo, ahonkoha wiira anttehace, eeraka:
Mwalimu, nlamuloni niri nuulupale wo malamulo othene?
Yesu ahomwiirela: Waafente Apwiya Nluku aa ni nrima aa wothene ni nnepa aa wothene, na ankhili aa othene.
Nna phi nlamulo noopacera ni nuulupale.
Ni nonayeeli, noolikana ni nenna: Unfente nkhwaa toko cineefentaa umwanene.
Wa ala malamulo meeli ala, ahokwanihera Nlamulo nothene ni Minapiyu.
Uthukumana waya mafarisi, Yesu ahaakoha
eeraka: Nnoopuwela cani mwaha wa Kristu; mwana awani? Ale yahomwaakhulaca: A Taviti.
Yesu aheerelaca: Vano waneera cani Taviti oolumaka munnepani amwiirelaka Pwiya? Kontha Taviti heera:
Apwiya aheerela Apwiya aka: Wunkome moono aka wonlopwana, mpaka wanhalaka weesa eenani aa vathi waya inyaa caa.
Vano Taviti anamwiihana Pwiya, wankhala toko cani mwanawe?
Khaawo ntthu oorya waakhula hata nuulumo nimoca. Ukhuma nenne nihuku nne khaawo tho aankohakohile.
Vano Yesu ahoolumana mphwinko ule n'eetthuci awe
eeraka: Mafarisi ni mayowantikha ahonkoma wahiceni ya Musa.
Mmweheehe ni nvare yothene inwiirelayani, nanso nhitakihe mmitekoni cimmaraya, maana anaahimya woohipanka.
Kontha anaatthuka mirintti coolemela ni coorika uvilela, ni anaweesera atthu wanikhatani, nanso ayo, khaantthuna uttinkiha ni nikokho naya mena vakani.
Ampanka cothene wiira yooninye na atthu, maana aneetthukelela ihirisi cuulupale ni mphantte woosoriya wo'hancu cawe coorekama,
ni amphavela mapuro oopacera mmasikuhuuluni ni ihice coopacera mmasinakokani,
ni usalameehiya mmapacarini, ni wiireliya na atthu: Mwalimu.
Nanso nyu, nhitthune wiihaninya mwalimu, maana Mwalimu ri mmoca paahi, ri Kristu, ni othene nyu nri ntthu ni munna awe.
Ni mwiilaponi hikhale nomwiihanenyu paapa, maana Paapenyu ri mmoca paahi, ule ri wirimu.
Ciicammo nhiciihane mwalimu, maana mwalimu enyu ri mmoca paahi, Kristu.
Nanso, ri muulupale wa nyu, nolamuliya ukhala nrumeyi enyu.
Ntthu nohala wiicunnuwiha naahala uyevihiya, ni ule nohala wiiyeviha, naahala wunnuwihiya.
Nhotakhaliya nyu, mayowantikha ni mafarisi, anamirima miili! Nnaattiyelela atthu wiira ahikele wumweneni wo wirimu, ni nyu nhitthunaka ukela mena vakani, ni khannaatthunihera ukela antthuna ale.
Nhotakhaliya nyu, mayowantikha ni mafarisi, anamirima miili! Nyu nnawalyacera anankhwele ntupererihaka upanka iswali coorekama. Phimaana, nnaahala uttarusiya wootepa.

Nhotakhaliya nyu, mayowantikha ni mafarisi, anamirima miili! Nnorukurerya ipahari ni ilapo mphavelaka umpanka mwaamini enyu, ni nnampankilene commo, nnontatusa mwana o'mooroni imaara piili wowupwahani nyu.

Nhotakhaliya nyu, ahooleli oohoona. Maana nneera: Nohala ulupelela nipuro nittakattifu, khankhanyererihiya ummaliha natiri awe, nanso ule nohala umoopa natiri alakelaka uwiiha iwooru, naakhanhererihiya ummaliha natiri awe ule.
Nyu atirikhi ni oohoona! Vano yuulupale phivi, iwooru atthuna nipuro nittakattifu, ninttakattifiha iwooru?
Vano nyu nneera: Ule nolupelela ikhipula, khavanakhalaka itthu, nanso ule nolupelela yoovahiya iri wakhipulani, uyo phinlamuliya ummaliha natiri awe.
Atirikhi ni oohoona! Vano yuulupale phivi, yoovahiya atthuna ikhipula inttakattifiha yoovahiya?
Paahi, ule nolupelela ikhipula, nolupelela yeeyo ni citthu cothene ciri wakhipulani.
Ni nolupelela nipuro nittakattifu, nolupelela nenno, ni ule nokhala vaavale.
Ni nolupelela irimu, nolupelela ihice ya Nluku ni ule nonkoma wahiceni vaavale.

Nhotakhaliya nyu, mayowantikha ni mafarisi, anamirima miili! Nnovaha mphantte wonakhumi wo lonkho, ipirincila, inuku yo nsiri, nanso nnaahanyuriha iri yuulupale munlamuloni: isariya, uthunku ni nroromelo. Nyu nolamuliya uttharihelela nnya citthu nnya, woohihiya cikina nnyo.
Ahooleli oohoona! Nnokikittha isencema nanso nnomirya inkamira.
Nhotakhaliya nyu, mayowantikha ni mafarisi, anamirima miili! Nnorapiha ikahi ni nttiisi vate waya, nanso nhina waya cicanre ikokhola ni mahirihiri.
Nfarisi oohoona! Urapihe toko nhina waya ikahi ni nttiisi, wiira ciicammo nhina mmo nrere.
Nhotakhaliya nyu, mayowantikha ni mafarisi, anamirima miili! Nnolikana ni mahiye ootteelihiya, vate waya ankhala oorera, nanso nhina mmo ari makhuva a atthu ookhwa ni anaanukha.
Vano, ni nyu ciicammo vate winyu va nnokhala toko atthu o'sariya wamiithoni wa atthu, nanso nhina mwinyu mmo unoocara wootha ni uhanyuriha.
Nhotakhaliya nyu, mayowantikha ni mafarisi, anamirima miili! Nnotekela mahiye o minapiyu ni urattelaca mahiye a anasariya,
ni nneera: Yiiriyaka nahokhala ukati wo mayapaapehu, khanaatakaneelana wiira nivuvihe iphome yo minapiyu.
Commo nheevahera usaahiti mwasinene wiira nri asaana a atthu yeevakacile minapiyu.
Paahi, ncariheke nyenyuva nliko wo mayathumwaninyu!
Nyu inwaa, ikhapila yo'vili! Nnohala usempa cani ihukhumu yo'mooroni?

Phimaana, mi kinawuveleeliherani minapiyu, acuweli ni mayowantikha, ni akhwawe ayo nnaahala weevakaca ni waakhomela, ni akina ayo nnaahala waafyulaca nsinakoka ni nnaahala woomolanihaca iparasa ni iparasa.

Commo iphome yothene yo'sariya yumoreleni nyuva, imwaryenle mwiilaponi mothene, ukhuma iphome ya nasariya Apeli, mpaka ya Sakariya, mwana a Parakiya, mweevilenyu iriyariru ikhipula ni nipuro nittakattifu.
Weekhweli kinawuhimeryani wiira citthu cothene nnya cinhala ukhumelela wo nenna nloko nna.

Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, we uneevakaca minapiyu ni waavonyakaca ale aveleliheriyaa! Imaara kavi kiphavelaka waathukumaniha asaanaa, toko nankuttu wanaakhuparelawe asaanawe mmapuphani, nanso we khutthunne.
Nviriyane: Itthoko enyu iyo khinhala ukhaliya.
Paahi mi kinoohimeryani wiira, ukhuma nenna va, khannohala ukoona tho, mpaka wanhalenyu wiira: Horeriya ule nowa mwa ncina na Apwiya!
Yesu ukati waakhumawe inupa ittakattifu, ahaattameriya n'eetthuci awe wiira anthoonyere makhalelo aya inupa ile.
Yesu aheerelaca: Munnoonaka cothene nnya va? Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira khaninhala ukhala nluku nootataanihinya ni nluku nikhwaya; othene anaahala ukwanyulaciya.

Yesu ahonkoma wamwaakoni wo Olivera ni yahowaaca eetthuci awe ntthikini ni yahonkoha wiira: Unihimerye, cinhala wiirannyaa yakhani nnya citthu nnya? Ni inhala ukhala ikanyeroni inthoonyera uwa waa, ni mamalelo o'ttuninya?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mwiinemecere, wiira hikhale nohala wuuthepyani.
Maana enci anaahala uwa mwa ncina naka yiiraka: Mi ki Kristu. Ni anaahala waathepya atthu enci.
Nyu nnaahala wiiwa wuuluminya co'khotto ni mwaha wo'khotto, nanso nhituthuwe, kontha unaalamuliya wiiranyaa commo, nanso khunakhala wuumaleloni.
Ilapo inaahala waana ni ilapo ikhwaya, ni umwene unaahala waana n'umwene nkhwawe. Inaahala uvola itala, ni mapuro menci itthaya inaahala uttettemela.
Cothene nnyo cinthoonyera upacera wo mahuviho.
Vano, nnaahala urwaaninya, utulumwinya, ni wiiviya. Nnaahala urusanananiya ni ilapo cothene, mwa nlattu wo ncina naka.
Yooyo ukati uyo, atthu enci anaahala uhiya nroromelo naya n'urusananaca.
Minapiyu cinci cowootha cinaahala ukhumelela ni waathepya atthu enci.
Mwa nlattu wo wuncereryaa coonanara, nifento na atthu othene ninaahala uririyaca,
nanso ule nohala ulipelela irima mpaka ummaleloni, naahala woopwa.
Vano ula nhupi woorera wo umwene wa Nluku ula unaahala ulalennya ilapo cothene, wiira ukhale usaahiti wo maloko othene. Wahoolo ittuninya phinhalaya umala.
Vano, moonaka miikho cowoopiha ni colava nipuro nittakattifu caahimilyawe nnapiyu Taniyeli, ule nosoma, eeweehe.
Vano ale ari uYuteya atthawele umyaakoni.
Ntthu ri wancaarani hikhuruwe wiira akuse itthu iri mpaani,
ni ntthu ri umattani hituruwele uwani wiira akuse ikacako awe!
Kaasope ale anhala ukhala ni irukulu ni ale anhala waamwiha yooyo ukati uyo!
Nvekele wiira ukati wootthawa uhikhale iyiita, atthuna nihuku no ntivela.
Kontha yooyo ukati uyo ankokhala mahuviho menci ahinatoko ukhumelela yompiyeru ittuninya ni hata khanhala ukhumelela tho.
Apwiya yahaawukunle ayo mahuku ayo, khaawo aahala woopwa, nanso nlattu wa atthu oothanliya, mahuku ayo anaahala ukhuveehiya.
Vano, akhalaka ntthu nohala uwiirelani: Mesiya ula va! Atthuna: Ule nwe! Nhikupali.
Kontha anaahala ukhumelela amesiya enci owootha, ni minapiyu cowootha ni anaahala upanka ikanyero cinci cuulupale ni cootikineeha wiira yaathepyace atthu, wanooryaya pooti waathepya mpaka oothanliya.
Mooneke ciinryaka wowuhimeryani cihinaya ukhumelela.
Vano ntthu awiirelakani: Uyo ri ntakhwani, nhirwee; atthuna ri mpaani, nhikupali.
Maana, toko cinverunyaya mphantte unkhuma ncuwa mpaka woonnya unkela ncuwa, ciicammo phinhalaya wiirannyaa uwa wa Mwana a Pinatamu.
Nipuro nikhwenle inama, nenno nipuro nno marepo anaacara.
Wanhalaya uwa woottharanana marikariko yaayo, ncuwa ninaahala uripela, mweeri khunhala waarya, itthoottwa co wirimu cinaahala umora ni ikuru co nculu cinaahala uttinkihiya.

Vano inaahala woonnya ikanyero wirimu ya Mwana a Pinatamu, na atthu othene o mwiilaponi anaahala ucukula ni anaahala umoona Mwana a Pinatamu awaaka mmahutteni o wirimu ni ikuru ni nttittimiho nuulupale.
Uyo naahala waaruma ancelo awe ni ncu nowiirunya no mapalapatta, ni ancelo ayo anaahala waathukumaniha atthu yaathanlilyawe o malootho oomacese o'lapo ni miphantte cikhwawe co wirimu.
Mwiitthuce nlikanihero no mwiri wo nfikera. Ukati umpaceraya uphuwela matakhuru, nyu nnaacuwela wiira iyiita iri wakhiviru.
Phimaana, moonaka nnya citthu cothene nnya, ncuwele wiira uyo ri wakhiviru ni wankhora.
Mi kinawuhimeryani wiira khanimmira nna nloko nna cihinaya wiirannyaa cothene nnya.
Irimu ni itthaya cinaamala, nanso moolumo aka khaammala.
Nanso khaawo nocuwela nihuku atthuna ukati, hata ancelo ari wirimu, hata Mwana, ancuwela paahi Apaapa.
Toko ceeranelyaya mahuku a Nowee, phinhalaya wiirannyaa mahuku oowa Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Ciicammo, toko ceeranelyaya mahuku yaattamenryawe naphuvu oocara maasi, atthu yaanlya, yanwuryaa, yanthelana n'uthelihaninya, mpaka nihuku naakenlyawe Nowee nkalawani,
ni khayaacuwelenle, mpaka wawilyawe naphuvu o maasi, aakusile othene, commo phinhalaya ukhala mawelo a Mwana a Pinatamu.
Vano, anaryene eeli umattani, nokookusiya mmoca, n'uhinnya nkin'oyo.
Anaryene atthu eeli asilaka, nokookusiya mmoca, n'uhinnya nkin'oyo.
Vano nrontte, kontha, khannocuwela ukati unhalaya uwa Apwiy'enyu.
Nanso ncuwele wiira; mwanene itthoko aacuwela ukati ummwawe namwinnya, aanrontta ni khaahiyerera uhukhaciya itthoko awe.
Commo, nyu nkhale owiitthenkaca kontha Mwana a Pinatamu naahala uwa ukati uhimmwehererenyu.
Vano, nrumeyi owaaminnyaa ni a ankhili, ph'ule vahaceriye ni nkunya awe wiira aavahe iyolya arumeyi akhwawe ni ukati aya.
Horeriya nrumeyi nohala uphwanyinya ni nkunya awe wanhalawe uwa, avaraka nteko womaana.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira naahala unvahacera uhooleli wo citthu cothene.
Nanso nrumeyi oohiloka ule oopuwelaka wiira: Nkunya aka naapica uwa,
vano phipaceraka waattakaca arumeyi akina ayo, alyaka, awuryaka na ananhapaliya.
Vano nkunya awe ule naahala uturuwa nihuku nahaawehereryawe ni ukati wahaacuwelawe.
Ule aphwanyeriyaka nokottarusiya ni waalikeleliya wamoca na atthu o mirima miili, ni wonwo unkokhala wunla n'ucekesa miino.
Umwene wo wirimu unhala ulikana ni mamwali khumi, yaakusile isamaninya, ansiceeryaka mpakaneli aya.
Athanu yaari oolocwaaca, ni akina athanu ayo yaari oowalaala.
Oolocwaaca ale, yahokusaca isamaninya caya nanso khayakusile makhura.
Vano oowalaala ale yahokusaca makhura mmaphootirini, wamoca ni isamaninya caya.
Mpakaneli ule ahopica uwa, ale cahaavolaca ikhove ni othene yahorupaca.
Nanso, uhiyu iriyari waheewannya ukhuweliya: Mpakaneli hophiya! Munsiceerye!
Vano mamwali othene ale yahonwaca ni utthonkomanihaca isamaninya caya.
Mamwali oolocwaaca ale yaheerela oowalaala ale: Nnivahe makhura enyu ayo, kontha isamaninya cihu nnyo cinaattiphyaca.
Nanso mamwali oowalaala ale yahaakhula yiiracaka: Mena, wahikhale phinhalaya unithwa makhura nlattu wowuvahani nyu, murwee woohipica mwathume.
Vano, anarwaacilene uthuma, ahowa mpakaneli ule, ni ale yaari owitthenkaca ale yahokelaca ni uyo nsikuhuuluni, ni wahotthukiya nkhora uyo.
Wahoolo, yahophiyaca mamwali oolocwaaca ale yiiraka: Pwiya, Pwiya, nnihulele nkhora!
Vano ule ahaakhula eeraka: Weekhweli kinawuhimeryani wiira akinoocuwelani.
Phimaana, mwiiwehawehe, maana khannocuwela nihuku atthuna ukati unhalawe uwa Mwana a Pinatamu.
Kontha iyo iri toko nlopwana, arwaaka ilapo yoottayi, aheehanaca arumeyi awe n'uvaha mihakhu cawe.
Mmoca uyo ahonvaha ncurukhu ilufu thanu wo'paratha, ni nkina uyo, ilufu piili ni nkina uyo, ilufu imoca, wo khula ntthu toko cooreryawe, ni ahorwaa ilapo yoottayi.
Urwaa wawe, ule aakhenle ncurukhu ilufu thanu ule ahompanka nakoso mpaka uphwanya tho ilufu thanu.
Ciicammo, aakhenle ncurukhu ilufu piili ule ahomweetta nakoso mpaka uphwanya tho ilufu piili.
Nanso aakhenle ilufu imoca ule, ahothipela vathi ncurukhu wa nkunya awe.
Unavinre ukati mwinci, ahowa nkunya aya nrumeyi ni ahopacera waapankana ikontha.
Vano ahomwaattamerya aakhenle ilufu thanu ule ni ahonwiihera ilufu thanu tho, eeraka: Pwiya, mwaakivahile ilufu thanu: Vano kihophwanya tho ilufu thanu.
Vaavale aheereliya ni nkunya uyo: Wahorera, nrumeyi omaana ni eekhweli. Uhokhalela ikhweli yo vakani, vano kinawuvaha yinci. Ukeleke mumpuhani mwa nkunya aa.
Ciicammo waphilyawe aakhenle ncurukhu ilufu piili ule, aheera: Pwiya, mwaakivahile ncurukhu ilufu piili; vano kihophwanya tho ilufu piili.
Vaavale aheereliya ni nkunya uyo: Wahorera, nrumeyi omaana ni eekhweli. Uhokhalela ikhweli yo vakani, vano kinawuvaha yinci: Ukeleke mumpuhani mwa nkunya aa.
Womalihera, ahowa ule aakhenle ncurukhu ilufu imoca, ni aheera: Pwiya, mi kahoocuwelani, wiira nri ntthu oosilili, nnohepha wahaanlenyu ni muntotokaniha wahimwarusenlenyu.
Phimaana kahoova, mpaka uthipela vathi ncurukhu enyu uyo. Vano ph'ula uri wawinyu uyo.
Nkunya awe ahomwaakhula eeraka: Nrumeyi oonanara nrima ni oohikhuluvelyaa. Unaacuwela wiira kinhepha nipuro nihaanlyaka ni kintukumaniha nipuro nihimwarusenlyaka.
Vano, waalamuliya, waakopiha atthu ncurukhu uyo yaahala utotholiha wiira katuruwaka kiphwanye ncurukhu aka uyo unari mwinci.
Mmwaakhe ncurukhu uyo, ni munvahe ule rina ilufu khumi,
kontha ule rina, naahala uvahiya n'ukhalana woontosa, nanso ule hirina, naahala waakhiya mpaka itthu irinawe.
Vano munvonyere vate uri ipiphi, nrumeyi oohikhuluvelyaa; wonwo unkokhala wunla ni ucekesa miino.
Wanhalawe uwa Mwana a Pinatamu ni nttittimiho nawe, ni ancelo attakattifu othene, phinhalawe wunkoma wahiceni wo nttittimiho.
Ilapo cothene phinhalaya uthukumanihinya uhoolo wawe, ni naahala waakawaniha atthu akina ni akhwaya, toko nhakheli cinkawanihawe ikhontwaa ni ipuri.
Naahala weesa ikhontwaa moono nlopwana ni ipuri nnyo moono nthiyana.
Vano mwene uyo phinhalawe weerela anhala ukhala moono nlopwana ayo: Nkaaweni, nyu oorerihiya na Apaapa, mwaakheleke umwene utthenkemaniheriyenyu ukhuma wupaceroni wo'lapo.
Maana kahovoliya itala ni mwahokivaha iyolya, nahokivola ntthona ni mwahokivaha maasi; kaari nletto ni mwahokaakhelela;
kaari oothaaleliya ni mwahokirulela; kahowerennya ni mwahokithotola; kaari nkalaposo ni mwahowa ukithotola.
Vano ooloka ayo ammwa wiira: Pwiya, niwoonneni yakhani nnavoliye itala nuvahakani iyolya? Atthuna nnavoliye ntthona nuvahakani maasi?
Niwoonneni yakhani nnari nletto niwaakhelelakani? Atthuna nnathaaleliye nuurulelakani?
Mena niwoonneni yakhani nwerennyaka atthuna nkalaposo niwaaka wuthotolani?
Mwene ule wowaakhula, nohala wiira coo: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, waapankenyu asihimaaka acikani ala, mwaakipanka mi.
Ciicammo naahala weerela ale anhala ukhala moono awe nthiyana: Nthamace waryaka va, nyu oolaphiya, nrwee umooroni woohimala, utthenkemaniheriye Sotwani ni malaikha awe.
Maana yahokivola itala ni khamwaakivahile iyolya; nahokivola ntthona ni khamwaakivahile maasi;
kinaryene nletto khankaakhelenle; kinathaaleliyene khankirulenle, ni kiwerennyaka ni kinari nkalaposo, khankithotonle.

Vano ni ale ciicammo anaahala umwiirela: Pwiya, niwoonneni yakhani ni itala, atthuna ni ntthona, atthuna nnari nletto, atthuna nnathaaleliye, atthuna nwerennyaka ni atthuna nnari nkalaposo ni hi wohukaviherani?
Vaavale ule naahala waakhula eeraka: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, wahimpankilenyu mmoca wa ala acikani ala, nhikipankile mi.
Atthu oohiloka ayo anaahala urwaa umahuvihoni woohimala, nanso atthu ooloka ayo anrwaa wukumini woohimala.
Yesu namalihilene wuulumaca cothene nnya, aheerela eetthuci awe:
Nnaacuwela wiira, ukati wo mahuku meeli, ninaahala unlya Paasikuwa, ni Mwana a Pinatamu naahala urweehiya mmatatani mwa anyali wiira akhomeliye.
Vano akhulupale o mayasataka ni mahumu o'nethi yahothukumana uwannyawe nkhulupale o mayasataka, neehaninya Kayifasi;
ni yahovaanela untthuka Yesu, amootheryacaka, n'umwiiva.
Nanso yeeraca coo: Wahikhale ukati wo'sikuhuulu, waacera wiira ihikhale iporonka iriyari ya atthu ayo.
Yesu nari uPetaniya, nonkomile wameeca uwannyawe Simoni namakuttula,
ahowa nthiyana nakusile iphotiri yo nluku na alapasturu inheliya makhura oonukhela venci ni oorika nttenko, aheetthela mmuru wa Yesu.
Eetthuci ale woonnyaya commo, khawaacivenle ni yahokohaca wiira: Anhononacerani makhura ala?
Ala makhura oonukhela ala yaantumihiya ni ncurukhu mwinci ni ncurukhu uyo waakawela amasikiini.
Nanso Yesu, ucuwela wawe, aheerelaca: Nnakhupulacerani athiyana ala? Ala ahokipankela itthu yomaana.
Maana amasikiini ankhalesa ni nyu, nanso mi khannokikhalana.
Waneetthelaya ala makhura oonukhela ala mwirutthuni mwaka, maanaya wiira ala athiyana ala antthenkemaniha usikhiya waka.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira nipuro phi nipuro no'ttuninya unhalaya ulalennya nhupi woorera, inaahimiya itthu ipankilyawe wiira yuupuweleliye.
Vano, mmoca wa ale khumi n'eeli ale, eehaninya Yuta Iskariyoti, ahorwaa wa akhulupale o mayasataka ni ahaakoha eeraka:
Nnohala ukiliva kavi koovahakani uyo? Vaavale yahovaanela unliva ncurukhu talathini (30) wo'paratha.
Vano ukhuma vaavale mpaka uhoolo, Yuta aamwaavya nafasi oontumiha Yesu.
Nihuku noopacera no'sikuhuulu yo mikatthe coohi miropo, eetthuci yahowa wa Yesu ni yahonkoha yiiraka: Untthuna wiira nuutthenkemanihere vayi nipuro nonlelya Paasikuwa?
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Nrwaace usittatti mwamphwanye nlopwana ni mwamwiirele: Mwalimu honiruma uwiirela: Ukati aka uri wakhiviru; wapuwani waa kimmwa unlya Paasikuwa n'eetthuci aka.
Ale yahopanka toko caahimeriyaya ni Yesu, ni yahontthenkemaniha Paasikuwa.
Wiila waya, Yesu ahonkoma wameecani n'eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli.
Vano, ukati waalyaya, Yesu aheera: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, mmoca wa nyu, naakuuluma makhuce.
Ale yahocukulaca venci ni ahopacera khula ntthu unkoha Yesu eeraka: Pwiya, kaahiki phi mi?
Ule ahaakhula: Yoole nonlyanaka nttiisi nimoca, yooyo phinhala ukuuluma makhuce.
Mwana a Pinatamu naarwa, toko cantikhiyaya cimwaacaka yooyo, nanso hotakhaliya ule nohala umuuluma makhuce! Phatari hiyariye!
Vaavale, Yuta, aahala umuuluma makhuce, ahonkoha eeraka: Mwalimu, kaahiki phi mi? Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: We uhohimya.
Walyaya, Yesu ahokusa nkatthe ni ahosukurwela, ahomyaniha ni ahaakawela eetthuci awe eeraka: Nkuseke ni nlyeke; ila phi irutthu aka.
Wahoolo, ahokusa ikoopu ni, ahonsukuru Nluku, ahaavaha eetthuci awe eeraka: Mmuryeke othene.
Ila phi iphome aka, iphome yo nleehano nonaanano, ivuviheriye nlattu wa atthu enci, wiira aleveleliye itampi.
Kinoohimeryani wiira, ukhuma ula ukati ula mpaka uhoolo, akinhala uwurya tho nhokorokho wo nvitera mpaka nihuku ninhalaka uwurya ivinyu yonaanano ni nyu wumweneni wa Apaapa.
Paahi, aneepile ncipo, yahokhumaca arwaaka umwaakoni wo Olivera.
Vano Yesu aheerelaca: Yoola uhiyu ula, nnaahala ukihiya. Maana ihantikhiya wiira: Kinaanrakaliha nhakheli, ni ikhontwaa co muncicini cinaamwaryaca.
Nanso, konwelelaka, kinaahoolela uKalileya.
Vano Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: Pooti wuuhiya atthu othene, nanso mi akinoohiya.
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, yoola uhiyu ula, nthupi uhinaya wiipa, unaakiruna imaara ttharu.
Peturu ahomwiirela: Hata kilamuliye ukhwa ni nyu, akinoorunani. Ni eetthuci awe othene yahoolumaca ciicale.
Wahoolo, Yesu ahorwaa wamoca na ale, nipuro neehaninya Yetsemani ni aheerela eetthuci awe: Munkome va, mi kinkoswali vale.
Ahonkusa Peturu ni asaana eeli a Sepeteu, ahopacera ucukula n'ukhuna masakha.
Vano aheerelaca: Iroho aka inaacukula venci, icuku co nookhwa. Nkhalace va, ni nronttace ni mi.
Ahorwaa uhoolo vakani, ahooroma mpaka iyuuci vathi ni ahovekela eeraka: Paapa, wooryaaka, ikipwahe ila ikikhompe ela! Wahikhale toko cintthunaka, nanso toko cintthunenyu.
Vaavale, ahohokoleela nipuro naari eetthuci awe, ahaaphwanya arupacaka ni ahonkoha Peturu eeraka: Nyu khamoonrye urontta ni mi hata iwora imoca?
Nrontte ni nvekele, wiira uhuuphwanyeni uttehattehiya, kontha nnepa uri woolipa, nanso irutthu iri yookenkennyaa.
Ahorwaa tho uswali eeraka: Paapa, waahooraneke ukipwaha ila ikoopu ila woohiwurya, wiirannye toko cintthunenyu.
Ahoturuwa tho ni ahaaphwanya arupaka kontha miitho aya yahocara ikhove.
Ahaahiyaca ni ahorwaa tho uvekela imaara yoneeraru, aakulelihacaka moolumo mamoca yaayo.
Vano, ahoturuwela tho w'eetthuci awe ni aheerelaca: Nyu nanlelo nnarupa n'umumula? Mooneke! Ukati uhophiya ni Mwana a Pinatamu neera avahereriyaka mmatatani mwa anatampi.
Munwe ni nirwee! Namakhuce uyo hophiya.
Oolumacak'ono nanlelo, ahowa Yuta, mmoca wa ale khumi n'eeli ale, nari ni mphwinko wa anakatana ni ikupitti, yaarumiye na akhulupale o mayasataka ni wo mahumu o'ttiini ni o'nethi.
Maana, namakhuce ahaavaha ikanyero eeraka: Ule nohalaka unsalameeha n'unkapatta, phi yooyo, muntthuke.
Uphiya wawe ahomwaattamerya Yesu ni ahomwiirela: Salama, Mwalimu! Ni ahonkapatta.
Nanso Yesu ahomwiirela: Mpwana, uweenleni? Vaavale atthu ale yahomwaattamerya, yahonvara Yesu ni yahontthuka.
Vano, mmoca mwa ale yaari ni Yesu, ahotholola ikatana awe ni ahonrakaliha n'unthikila nnyaru na nrumeyi a nkhulupale o mayasataka.
Nanso, Yesu ahomwiirela: Uhele ikatana munluwoni! Maana othene anvarela ikatana, anaahala ukhwa ni ikatana.
Ncuwele wiira mi kinawoorya waalepela Apaapa wiira akiveleelihere wowaakuvyaca wene ancelo ilufu cene khumi na piili.
Vano caahala utthariheleliya cani cowantikhiya cineera, caalamuliya ukhumelela toko nnya?

Vano yoole ukati ule, Yesu aheerela atthu ale: Mwile ni ikatana ni ikupitti wiira mwakitthuke toko kinhoolela mphwinko wowaatuphela atthu? Mahuku othene mi keetthuciha wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu nanso nyu khankitthukile.
Vano cothene nnyo, cikhumelenle wiira citthariheleliye cowantikhiya co minapiyu. Vaavale, eetthuci ale othene, yahonhiyaca n'utthawaca.
Ale yaantthukile Yesu ale, yahonrwaana mpaka uwannyawe Kayifasi, nkhulupale o mayasataka, wonwo waathukumanne mayowantikha ni mahumu.
Nanso Peturu ahontthara nttayi nttayi mpaka ipuwa ya nkhulupale o mayasataka. Vano ahokela, ni ahonkomana anarontta, wiira oone itthu yaahala wiiranyaa.
Vano, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mphwinko wa akhulupale othene, yaamwaavya nantuthi owiira amwiive Yesu.
Nanso khayaaphwanyile, yanonriyelelaru. Wiimaleloni, yahokhumelela eeli, yiiraka:
Ula nlopwan'ola eenre: Kinawoorya ukwanyulaca inupa ittakattifu ya Nluku n'uteka mahuku mararu.
Vaavale, nkhulupale o mayasataka aheemela ni ahomwiirela Yesu: We khunaakhula cinooriyelelaya ala atthu ala?
Nanso Yesu ahomaala. Vano nkhulupale o mayasataka ahomwiirela: Mi kinwiirela coo, ulupele wa Nluku nkumi wakhala wiira we khweli Kristu, Mwana a Nluku!

Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: We uhohimya. Phimaana, mi kinawuhimeryani wiira, ukhuma nenna va, nnaahala umoona Mwana a Pinatamu nonkomile moono nlopwana wa Nluku o'kuru cothene ni awaaka mmahutteni o wirimu.
Vaavale, nkhulupale o mayasataka ahaahula coowara cawe ni aheera: Hokufuru! Nimphavelacerani tho usaahiti? Maana nhomwiiwa wakufuru wawe va!
Nnoonela cani? Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Eeviye!
Vano, akina yahonsuwela wiitho, akina yaanankhittakaca, akina yaanvaha ilatuma, yiiraka:
Ulohe, Kristu! Tipani waattile?
Peturu nonkomile uta waya ipuwa ahowa nanteko nthiyana, ni ahomwiirela: We waari ni Yesu, nkalileya.
Nanso ule ahoruna wamiithoni wa atthu othene, eeraka: Akincuwela inhimyaa.
Wahoolo Peturu ahokhuma n'urwaa wankhora wo'luwani, ni ahooninya ni nanteko nkina nthiyana, ule aheerela yaari ale vaavale: Ula ciicammo aari ni Yesu, o'Nasaree.
Ni ule ahoruna imaara ikinaku tho, alupelacaka wiira: Akinoncuwela yooyo nlopwan'oyo!
Wahoolo, yaari ale vaavale, yahophiya wa Peturu ni yahomwiirela: Weekhweli, phi we mmoca wo yaayo, maana moolumacero aa anawiihimya.
Vaavale Peturu ahopacera wiilapha n'ulupelaca eeraka: Akinoncuwela yooyo nlopwan'oyo! Paahi, wowaakuvyaca wene nthupi waheepa.
Vano Peturu ahoopuwela nuulumo naahimeriyawe ni Yesu wiira: Nthupi uhinaya wiipa, unaahala ukiruna imaara ttharu. Vaavale Peturu ahokhuma ni ahoonla n'ucukula cinene.
Vano usa waya, akhulupale o mayasataka othene ni mahumu o'nethi, yahopacera uvaanela wiira amwiive Yesu.
Yahontthuka ni yahonrweeha wa nlamuli Pilatu.
Vano Yuta, yoole aamuulumile makhuce, woonnyawe wiira Yesu hohukhumwinya, cahonwaaca icimu, ahohokolosa ncurukhu wo'paratha talathini (30) ule ni ahaavaha akhulupale o mayasataka ni mahumu, eeraka:
Kihokosa, maana kihoomuuluma makhuce ntthu oohikosa itthu. Nanso ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Niireke cani tho? Iyo yawaa.
Vaavale Yuta ahovonyera ncurukhu ule mpaani mo'nupa ittakattifu, ahokhuma ni ahorwaa wiitthukelela.
Akhulupale o mayasataka ale, yahokusa ncurukhu ule ni yaheeraca: Khawanloka uhela munsunkiyaya cooveleela, maana ula uri wo'hisapu yo'phome.
Vaavale unavaaneliyene, wahothumeliya imatta ya ntthu mayowuupa myaapu, wiira ipankiye mahiye a atthu oowa.
Phimaana, ile imatta ile yiihaninyaka Imatta Yo'phome mpaka ilelo.
Paahi, yahottharihelelilya ihimilyawe nnapiyu Yeremiya eeraka: Uhokusiya ncurukhu talathini (30) wo'paratha, nttenko wooneliye ukhala toko asaana o'Sirayeli coonenlyaya;
ni wahokhala wo'matta ya mayowuupa myaapu, toko cikilamulenlyawe Pwiya.
Yesu ahorweehiya wa nlamuli, ni ule ahonkoha eeraka: Phi we mwene a ayuta? Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: We uhohimya.
Ule ariyeleliyak'ono na akhulupale o mayasataka ni mahumu, khiiwo yaakhunlyawe.
Vaavale, Pilatu ahonkoha eeraka: Khuneewa cinci cinriyeleliyaa nnyo?
Nanso Yesu khaakhunle mena nuulumo nimoca, mpaka citikinihinyawe venci nlamuli ule.
Vaavale, nlattu wo'sikuhuulu, nlamuli aholemalela untthukula ntthu mmoca, oothanliya ni mphwinko.
Yoole ukati ule, yahaana nantthukiya mmoca oocuwelaciya, eehaninya Parapasi.
Vano unethi unathukumannene, Pilatu ahokoha eeraka: Nnontthuna pani wiira kintthukule, Parapasi atthuna Yesu, neehaninya Kristu?
Maana aancuwela wiira, nlattu woonramaca phammwiihenryaya.
Pilatu nari mpwaro nnooluminya milattu mmwe, amwaarawe yahoruma uhimaceriya wiira: Uhiikelakelihe mwaha wa ula nasariya ula, kontha ilelo, munttorani, mi akimala uhuva nlattu wawawe yooyo.
Nanso akhulupale o mayasataka ni mahumu, yahotheperya mphwinko, wiira anlepele Parapasi ni amwiivihe Yesu.
Aakulelaka, nlamuli ule ahaakoha eeraka: Yaala eeli ala, tupani nomphavelenyu wiira kuutthukuleleni? Ale yahaakhula yiiraka: Parapasi!
Pilatu ahaakoha tho eeraka: Vano kinhala umpanka cani Yesu, neehaninya Kristu? Vano othene yahaakhula yiiraka: Unkhomele wansalapani!
Pilatu ahaakoha tho eeraka: Pankileni yoonanara? Nanso ale yaantepaca ukhuwela nwe yiiraka: Unkhomele wansalapani!

Vano woonnyawe Pilatu wiira hoolwaana, utepa n'upwaha woncereryaya nceece uyo, ahoruma uwiihiya maasi ni ahonyawa wamiithoni wo'nethi eeraka: Khiiwo incuwelaka ni iphome ya nasariya ula. Nlahanya ula uri ni nyenyuva!
Unethi wothene wahaakhula wiiraka: Iphome awe inimorele hi ni asaanehu!
Vaavale, Pilatu ahaatthukulela Parapasi ni aholamula waafyulaciya Yesu ni ahaavahaca wiira ankhomele wansalapani.
Wahoolo, anatoropa a nlamuli, yahonrweeha Yesu uhano ni yahothukumana nikhoto nothene ni yahonrukurerya.
Yahonrulaca coowara cawe, yahonwariha ihancu yooceremela;
vano yahoopa ikhara yo miiwa, yahonwariha mmuru, ni yahommareliha ntathi muntatani no nlopwana, ni yahokhoroma uhoolo wawe, yaanantarawaca amwiirelaka: Salama, mwene a ayuta!
Yaanansuwelaca ni yahokusaca ikopo n'umwaattana wamuru.
Wamanlyaya untarawaca, yahonrula ihancu ile ni yahonwariha ikuwo cawe. Wahoolo, yahonrweeha wiira akhomeliye wansalapani.
Vano waakhumaya, yahonkumanana nlopwana o'Sirene, eehaninya Simoni ni yahonkhanyereriha ukusa nsalapa.
Yahophiya nipuro nineehaninya Kolokota, maanaya nipuro no'kohi,
Yesu ahovahiya uwurya ivinyu ni nthiikila, nanso uyo ulawiha wawe, khaatthunne uwurya.
Ukhomeliya wawe, yahokawelana coowara cawe, yaavyaka iparakha.
Anookomacilene vaavale, yaanaanrontta.
Waculu muru awe, yahaantikhiya yaariyeleliyawe, yeera: ula phi yesu, mwene a ayuta.
Yahokhomeliya wamoca n'ule anamwinnya eeli, mmoc'oyo moono nlopwana ni nkin'oyo moono nthiyana.
Atthu yaavira ayo, yaananruwana, apukunyaka muru, yiiraka:
We, watankulaca inupa ittakattifu n'uteka wo mahuku mararu, wiicoopole o mwanene aa! Ukhuruwe wansalapani mari unari Mwana a Nluku!
Ciicammo, akhulupale o mayasataka, mayowantikha ni mahumu o'ttiini, yaanantarawaca yiiraka:
Hoopola akina, vano khanoorya wiicoopola. Uyo ri mwene o'Sirayeli, akhuruwe wansalapani va, ninaawukupali!
Nkhuluvenle Nluku. Vano Nluku awe aantaphule, akhala wiira khweli naanfenta; maana eenre: Mi ki mwana a Nluku.
Ciicammo anamwinnya eeli yaakhomelaninyawe ale yaananruwana.
Waphilyaya ukati wo'thana ipiphi yahokhunela ilapo yothene mpaka iwora yoneeraru yocoocilo.
Uphiya waya iwora yoneeraru yocoocilo Yesu ahokhuwa ni ncu nowiirunya eeraka: Eli, Eli, lama sapaktani! Maanaya: Nluku aka! Nluku aka! Ukihiyenreni?
Vano akina yaari vaavale, umwiiwa waya, yaheera: Mwiiwe! Uyo nomwiihana Eliya!
Wowaakuvyaca wene, mmoca wa ale ahotthawelela ntthoce, ahowya ni ahoruwyaa nvinyuni yoonyuunya, ahohomerya muntathini ni ahonvaha wiira awurye.
Nanso akina yeera: Munhiye, noone mari awaaka Eliya umoopola.
Yesu ahokhuwela tho ni ncu nowiirunya ni ahovaherera iroho awe.
Yooyo ukati uyo, ikuwo yo mpaani mo'nupa ittakattifu yahaahuwa, miphantte miili ukhuma uculu mpaka vathi; itthaya yahottettemela, myala cahophwyaa.
Mahiye yahohulyaa ni irutthu cinci ca atthu attakattifu yaarupile, cahonwelela
ni yahokhumaca mmahiye. Ukati wonwelenlyawe Yesu, yahokelaca uYerusalemu, isittatti ittakattifu, wonwo wooninyaya na atthu enci.
Nhooleli a anatoropa iminya na ale yarinawe, anronttaka Yesu, woonnyaya uttettemela wo'tthaya ile ni cothene ceerannyaa, wahaakelaca woova venci ni yaheeraca: Khweli ula aari Mwana a Nluku!
Vaavale yahaawo athiyana enci, yaaweha nttayi nttayi. Yaari yaale yaantthara Yesu ukhuma uKalileya, wiira anrumeele.
Mwa yaayo, yahaawo: Mariya Mantalena, Mariya, anumwane Yakopu ni Yusufu, ni anumwanaya asaana a Sepeteu.
Waatthekuwilyaya ncuwa, ahowa nlopwana thaciri o wArimateya, eehaninya Yusufu, ni uyo aari mwiitthuci a Yesu.
Uyo ahorwaa umoonanana Pilatu n'unlepela nrutthu wa Yesu. Vano Pilatu aholamula wiira avahiye.
Vano Yusufu, ahokusa nrutthu ule, ahokhuneelaca ni isantta yo'linyu ootteela
ni ahosikha mmahiye onaanano, yaathipihilyawe wamwalani; ahottiyela ni nluku nuulupale wankhora wo mahiye vale ni ahokhuma.
Yaanoonannya anonkomacile uhoolo wo mahiye vale, Mariya Mantalena ni Mariya nkinaku uyo.
Usa waya, nihuku no ntivela, yahothukumana akhulupale o mayasataka ni mafarisi yahorwaaca wa Pilatu,
ni yahomwiirelaca: Nlamuli, hi nihoopuwela wiira, ule mayowootha ule, ukati waaryawe nkumi, aheera: Anavinrene mahuku mararu, kimmowunwelela.

Vano ulamulele wiira mahiye ayo aronttiye woolipiheryaa wene mpaka nihuku noneeraru, wiira wahikhumelele wiira, awaacaka eetthuci awe ayo, amwinnyaka ni wahoolo yeerelaka atthu ayo: Honwelela mwa atthu ookhwa. Vano inhala ukhala itthu yootepa, upwaha woopacera.
Pilatu aheerelaca: Nrwaaceke ni mwarontteke mahiye ayo toko cinoonelenyu.
Ale yahorwaaca, yaheesaca mayorontta wamahiye vale, yahomarela nluku naakhuneeliye mahiye ale ni yahaahiya mayorontta.
Vano ninavinrene nihuku no ntivela, mapikosa nihuku noopacera no'sumana, Mariya Mantalena ni Mariya nkina, yahorwaaca umahiye.
Ni wahoonannya uttettemela venci wo'tthaya, maana ncelo a Apwiya ahokhuruwa wirimu, uphiya wawe ahotamiha nluku nne ni ahonkomela.
Ikhove awe yaari toko uverunya, ni coowara cawe nnyo toko nihutte nootteela.
Mayorontta ale yahottettemela venci ni woova ni yaari toko ookhwa.
Ncelo uyo aheerela asithiyana ale: Nhoove! Kihocuwela wiira nnomwaavya Yesu, khomeliye wansalapani.
Uyo khaawo va; honwelela toko caahimilyawe. Mmweeke, mmwaace mwawoone nipuro namweesilyaya.
Vano, nrweeke wowaakuvyaca wene, mwaahimerye eetthuci awe wiira uyo honwelela mwa atthu ookhwa ni nawuhoolelani mpaka uKalileya. Wonwo nnaahala umoona, toko coohimenryaweni!
Athiyana ale yahothamaca wowaakuvyaca wene umahiye nwe, yoovaka nanso anatteeliye venci, ni yahorwaaca waahimerya eetthuci a Yesu.
Nananoru ahaakhumelela Yesu ni aheerelaca: Salama! Ale, amwaattameryaka, yahommaraca inyaa cawe nnye ni unlapela.
Paahi Yesu aheerelaca: Nhoovace! Nrwaace mwaahimerye asunnaka wiira arwaace uKalileya, wonwo anaahala ukoona.
Waarwacaya ale, vaavale mayorontta yahorwaaca uparasa ni waattonkela akhulupale o mayasataka cothene caakhumelenle.
Vano athukumanaka wiira avaanele ni mahumu aya, yahaavahaca ncurukhu mwinci anatoropa ale,
yaalakaka wiira yiire: Yahowaaca eetthuci awe uhiyu ni umwinnya, hi nirupaka.
Vano nlamuli acuwelaka ila itthu ila, hi ninaahala umooryaca ninhimeryaka wiira phiiracilyaya wookhumelela.
Vaavale ale anaakhelenlene ncurukhu ule, yahopanka toko caalakiyaya. Yeeyo yahorumannyaa iriyari ya ayuta mpaka nihuku no'lelo.
Eetthuci khumi na mmoca yahorwaa uKalileya umwaakoni weereliyaya ni Yesu.
Wamoonnyaya yahonlapela, nanso akinaku yahaakanyaca.
Vano Yesu ahaattamerya ni aheerela: Kihovahiya ikuru cothene coolamula wirimu ni vathi.
Phimaana, murwee mwaapanke eetthuci ilapo cothene, mwaapattisaka mwa ncina na Athumwane, na Mwana ni na Nnepa Nttakattifu,
mweetthucihaka weettela cothene culamulenlyakani. Ni mi kiri ni nyu mahuku othene mpaka wiimaleloni wo'kati.
Wiipaceroni wo nhupi woorera wa Yesu Kristu, Mwanawe Nluku.
Uhantikhiya ni nnapiyu Isaya wiira: Kinaanveleeliha wamiithoni waa mayanhupi aka, uyo naahala wulokiherani iphiro.
Ncu na ntthu nokhuwela ntakhwani, Nlokihe iphiro ya Apwiya, mookole mittala caya.
Ciicale, Yohani Mpattisa aari ntakhwani wiira eetthucihe upattiso woorukunusa nrima wiira itampi cileveleliye.
Atthu othene o'lapo yo'Yuteya, na atthu ankhala uYerusalemu, yaanarwaa ni yaanapattisiya ni yooyo umoolokoni Yortani, alaphululaka itampi caya.
Yohani aawara ikuwo co mapururu o'nkamira, eetthukela nnyununi mmo isintu yo nrapala ni iyolya awe yaari mattettentte ni urawo wo ntakhwani.
Ni wo waalaka aanahimya coo: Uttuli waka mi naawa nkinaku rina ikuru impwaha yawaka, ni mi akimphwanela wooroma wiira kitthukule miripwe co'kwakwatta cawe.
Mi kinoopattisani ni maasi, nanso uyo naahala wuupattisani ni Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Waheerannyaa, mahuku ale, Yesu ahowa uNasaree yo'Kalileya, mpaka upattisiya ni Yohani umoolokoni Yortani.
Waakhumawe mmaasini mmo, ahoona irimu ihulyaka, ni Nnepa, woonnya toko ikhuntta inkhuruwelaka.
Ni ukhuma wirimu naheewiya ncu neera: We uMwanaka oofentiya, unkitteeliha nrima.
Wahoolo Nnepa Nttakattifu wahonrweha utakhwani.
Ahokhala wonwo mahuku arupayini (40) ni ahottehattehiya ni Sotwani. Wonwo yahaawo masene ni ancelo yahonrumeela.
Utthukiya wawe Yohani, Yesu ahorwaa uKalileya waalaleera atthu nhupi woorera wa Nluku, eeraka:
Ukati uhophiya ni ciicammo umwene wa Nluku uri wakhiviru. Nrukunuse nrima, nkupalelaka nhupi woorera!
Aviraka nceresere ntthiya no'Kalileya, ahomoona Simoni ni Anteree nhimawe, yaavonyeraca matthavi mpahari, kontha yaari mayototha ihopa.
Yesu aheerela: Nkitthare mi, ni mi kinkowupankani mayowaatotha atthu.
Wowaakuvyaca wene yahohiyaca matthavi aya, yahonttharaca Yesu.
Napwahilene vakani, ahomoona Yakopu mwana a Sepeteu ni Yohani nhimawe, alokihacaka matthavi aya nkalawani.
Aheehanaca ni ale yahonhiya nkalawani Sepeteu athumwanaya ni ananteko aya, ni yahonttharaca.
Yahorwaa uKafarnaumu. Nihuku no ntivela ahokela nsinakoka, ni aheetthuciha atthu.
Na atthu othene yahotikinihinya mananna ceetthucihawe, kontha aheetthuciha atthu ni ulamuli, khaari toko mayowantikha.
Ahaawo nsinakoka mmwe nlopwana aarina nnepa woonanara. Uyo ahokhuwela eeraka:
Iri isiyani we ni hi, Yesu o'Nasaree? Waaweenle unoomola? Mi kihoocuwela we, uNttakattifu a Nluku!
Nanso Yesu aholamulela eeraka: Umaale ni ukhume mwa ntthu ula!
Vano, nnepa woonanara, wahontatha ni ikuru, ni ukhuwacaka, wahokhuma mwa ntthu ule.
Othene yahotikhinaca, mpaka ukohana ayaayoru yiirelanaka: Isiyani ila? Meetthuciho onaanano, ni o'lamuli! Mpaka ulamulela minepa coonanara ni nnya phimwiiwelelaka!
Ni ihapari cawe cahomwareela nttetthe wothene wo'Kalileya.
Waakhumacilyaya nsinakoka, yahokela mpaani mwa Simoni ni Anteree, anari ni Yakopu ni Yohani.
Amaathi awe Simoni yaarupile wankorini awerennyaka ikopo. Nananoru yahonhimerya Yesu itthu ile.
Yesu ahaattamerya ni ahaavarela ntata mpaka waawusa. Ikopo yahaahiya, ni yahopacera waatafiti.
Wiila waya, ncuwa ninakwattuwile, yahommwiihera aretta ni anamacini,
na atthu othene o watthokoni yahothukumana wankhora.
Ahaavoniha aretta enci, yahoosiye ni coowerya, ni ahoomola macini menci, nanso khaatthunihera wuulumaca nlattu yaanancuwela.
Wicisuru, uhinasa ahonwa ni ahokhuma phurwaka ntakhwani wiira aswali.
Simoni, na ale yaari ni Yesu yahontthara.
Umphwanya waya, yahomwiirela: Atthu othene anawuphavela.
Nanso ahaakhula: Nirwee ncoko nkina, itthoko co wakhiviru, neetthucihe wonwo. Nlattu wo yeela phikumenlyaka.
Ni ahorwaa ilapo yothene yo'Kalileya, eetthucihaka mmasinakokani, ni aanoomola minepa coonanara.
Namakuttula ahonrwela Yesu, ahonkhoromela ni ahonlepela eeraka: Mwatthunaka, nawoorya ukivoniha!
Amoonelaka ikiriri, Yesu ahonthatela ntata mpaka unkwanya, eeraka: Kinaatthuna, uvone!
Nananoru, makuttula yahonhiya, ni irutthu yahokhala toko khalayi.
Yesu ahonleeha phunlakaka ni ala moolumo ala:
Ukiviriyane, uhinhimerye ntthu ila itthu ila. Nanso urwee wa mayasataka wavahe itthuvo yoovonihinya waa ilamunlyawe Musa, wiira ikhale saahiti wamiithoni wa atthu.
Ule, mweeco, urwaa wawe ahopacera ulattula ni uhimya itthu yeeranele, mpaka Yesu uhoorya ukela ooniyaka mmawaani phukhalaka ntakhwani; na atthu o'lapo ile yaananrwela.
Anavinre mahuku vakani, ni Yesu naturuwile uKafarnaumu wahorumanyaa wiira ri uwani.
Yahothukumana atthu enci, mpaka uphunyana wankhora, ni Yesu aheetthuciha moolumo.
Vano yahommwiihera ntthu owuntakyaa, aakusiye na atthu acese.
Ukhala wiira khayoorya unkusa mpaka waaryawe Yesu, nlattu wa atthu enci, yahophattulaca nivatho nne nipuro naaryawe Yesu ni yahokurusela nrepa naaryawe owuntaky'ole.
Yesu woona wawe ukupali waya atthu ale, ahomwiirela owuntakyaa: Mwanaka, itampi caa ciholeveleliya.
Wonwo mweeco, yahonkoma mayowantikha vakani yaakaakaka munrimani mwaya yiiraka:
Nlattuni, ule oolumacaka co? Naakufuru. Noorya tipani ulevelela itampi, ari hiri paahi Nluku?
Nanso Yesu, munnepani mwawe, ahocuwela moopuwelo aya ni ahaakoha eeraka: Nlattuni muupuwelaka ciicale wanrimani winyu?
Itthu yootepa urika phivi? Umwiirela owuntaky'ole: Itampi caa ciholeveleliya; atthuna umwiirela: Wunwe, ukuse nrepa naa ni weette?
Vano, ncuwele wiira Mwanawe Pinatamu haana ulamuli woolevelela itampi vathi va,
vaavale ahomwiirela owuntakyaa: Mi kinawulamulela: Wunwe, ukuse nrepa naa ni urwee uwanyaa.
Ntthu ule ahonwa, ahokusa nrepa nawe ni ahokhuma ooniyaka na atthu ale othene, mpaka othene wuumiya mwaano, ni yaananttottopela Nluku yiiraka: Khaninoona itthu toko ila nakhaleru!
Imaara ikina tho ahokhumela vate mphantte wo'pharyaa. Mphwinko wa atthu othene wahontthara, ni ule aheetthuciha.
Yesu waavirawe ahomoona Levi, mwana a Alfeu, nonkomile nipuro naalivihiya nsoko, ni ahomwiirela: Ukitthare. Ule ahonwa ni ahontthara.
Nari wameeca, itthoko ya Levi, mayoliviha nsoko na anatampi enci yahonkomaca wamoca ni Yesu n'eetthuci awe, maana khayaamala atthu yaantthara.
Mayowantikha ni mafarisi, waamoonaya alyaka na anatampi ni mayoliviha nsoko, yahaakoha eetthuci awe yiiraka: Nlattuni, alyaka na anatampi?
Yesu weewilyawe cothene ahaakhula eeraka: Kahiwena akumi phimmwaavya tothoro, nanso, aretta. Mi akiweenle weehana atthu o'sariya, nanso atthu ookosa.
Eetthuci a Yohani ni mafarisi yaantthuka. Ni atthu yahowa unkoha Yesu yiiraka: Nlattuni eetthuci a Yohani ni mafarisi anaatthuka nanso eetthuci aa khaantthuka?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Wanawooryaa mayolattuliya usikuhuuluni yoothelaninya untthuka ramatani, mayothela nari ni yaayo? Mahuku othene ankhalaya wamoca ni mayothela, khaanoorya utthuka.
Nanso anaawa mahuku anhalaya waakhiya mayothela uyo, vano yaayo mahuku ayo phinhalaya utthuka.
Khaawo neesera icaapha yonaanano nkuwoni yokhalayi, maana icaapha yonaanano inatepereriha waahuwa nwo.

Khaawo nohela ivinyu yonaanano munrupani wo nrapala nokhalayi. Ahelaka vale, ivinyu inaahala upwesa nrupa wokhalayi, ni ivinyu inarihakyaa wamoca ni nrupa. Nanso ivinyu yonaanano inheliya munrupani wonaanano.
Nkwaha mmoca, nihuku no ntivela Yesu aanvira mmamattani n'eetthuci awe. Yeettaka mphironi, eetthuci awe yahopacera wunta macasi.
Mafarisi yahonkohaca, yiiraka: Nkoona, nlattuni ale apankaka itthu ihinlamuliya upankiya nihuku no ntivela?
Ahaakhula eeraka: Khansomile ipankilyawe Taviti, wathwenyawe ni involaka itala, uyo na asikhwawe?

Ukati wa nkhulupale o mayasataka Apiyatari, Taviti ahokela inupa ya Nluku, ni ahokhura mikatthe coottakattifihiya, cahaalamuliyawe ukhura uyo, mena ale yaarinawe, nanso yaalamuliya ukhura paahi mayasataka.
Ni ahopwahera eeraka: Ntivela nihopankeliya ntthu, ni kahiwena ntthu phipankeliye ntivela.
Mwanawe Pinatamu phi mwanene ntivela.
Yesu ahokela tho nsinakoka. Ahaawo mommo ntthu oonririya ntata.
Vano yahaawo atthu yaananhottela wakhala wiira nanvoniha nihuku no ntivela, wiira amphwanyane nantuthi oomootheryaca.
Yesu ahomwiirela ntthu aarina ntata noonririya: Wunwe ni uwe iriyari ila va.
Wahoolo ahaakoha eeraka: Nihuku no ntivela unlamuliya upanka yoorera atthuna yoonanara, woopola ukumi atthuna wiiva? Ale yahomaalaca.
Vano, aawehaka n'urusiya, ni ummweryaka nrima nlattu wooturumala mirima caya, ahomwiirela ntthu ule: Utaphule ntata. Ahotaphula ni nne nahovona.
Vano mafarisi na annaheroti yahokhuma ni yahopacera uvaanela mananna oomwiiva Yesu.
Yesu ahorwaa untthiyani n'eetthuci awe, atthariyaka ni mphwinko muulupale waakhuma uKalileya, ni Yuteya,
uYerusalemu, wItumeya, ukhopela Yortani, ni nceresere uTiru ni uSitoni. Ahophwanyinya ni mphwinko muulupale, wewiilyaya itthu yaapankawe.
Ahaahimerya eetthuci awe anlokihere ikalawa yankani, wiira hiphunyererihiye ni mphwinko uyo.
Woona ahaavoniha atthu enci, ni nlattu w'etthu ila, ale yaanawaaninya ni ikwerere wiira ankwanye.
Minepa coonanara, waamoonaya, caanankhoromela wamiithoni wawe ni caanakhuwa ciiraka: We uMwana a Nluku.
Nanso ule ahaalamulela wiira ahicuwelihe.
Wahoolo ahowela mmwaakoni, ni aheehana ale yaatthunnyawe, na ale yahomwaattamerya.
Ahaathanla khumi n'eeli phwaavahaka ncina na amitthenka wiira yakhale n'uyo, ni aarume ulalya,
ni yaphwanyeke ikuru yowoomola minepa coonanara.
Ahaathanla khumi n'eeli ala: Simoni, ammahilyawe ncina na Peturu,
Yakopu, mwanawe Sepeteu, ni Yohani nhimawe Yakopu, ammahilyawe ncina Powanerce, maanaya asaana utari;
Anteree, Filipe, Partolomeu, Mateu, Tomee, Yakopu mwanawe Alfeu, Tateu, Simoni nseloti,
ni Yuta Iskariyoti, anthumihile Yesu.
Waaphilyaya uwani, mphwinko wa atthu wahothukumana tho, mpaka wahinooryaya ulya.
Ni amawawe, wiiwa waya itthu ila, yahokhuma wiira ammare, nlattu yeeriya: Hoolociya.
Mayowantikha yaakhuruwenle uYerusalemu yeera: Hovariya ni Peelsepu. Ula noomola macini ni ikuru ca nlamuli o macini.
Vano Yesu aheehana ni waahimerya mmalikaniheroni: Noorya cani, Sotwani umoomola Sotwani?
Umwene wakawanyaka, khunkhala tho,
ni ntthoko nakawanyaka khaninkhala tho.
Vano, Sotwani eecaanihaka ikhotto mwanene eekawanihaka, ni khanoorya ukhala tho, homala.
Khaawo noorya ukela inupa ya ntthu oolipa n'umwiinyera mihakhu cawe woohipaca ummara wahoolo phumwiinyeraka.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani: Itampi cothene ni ikufuru cothene cinkhala coromoliya na atthu, cothene cimmoleveleliya,
nanso, ntthu nohala ukufurwela Nnepa Nttakattifu khanhala uleveleliya; nowookhala ni itampi awe mahuku othene.
Ahaahimerya itthu ila nlattu yahimenrye: Ule naavariya ni nnepa woonanara.
Vano yahophiya anumwane na asunnawe, ni aneemenle uta, yahaaruma atthu umwiihana.
Mphwinko wa atthu wahonkoma ntotho wawe, atthu yahonhimerya: Ahaawo vate anumwana na asunnaa, anawuphavela.
Ahaakhula: Amaanyi ni asunnaka phapani?
Ni athetulaka miitho mwa atthu ale yaanrukurenrye, aheera: Ala ph'amaanyi na asunnaka.
Ntthu nopanka utthuna wawe Nluku, ule phi nhimaaka, mwanrokoraka na amaanyi.
Yesu ahopacera wiitthuciha nceresere ntthiya. Atthu enci yahothukumana nipuro naaryawe, phimaana ahokela nkalawani yaari wantthiyani ni ahonkoma, na atthu othene yaari ucenkweni.
Aanaweetthuciha citthu cinci mmalikaniheroni ni aanawaahimerya mmeetthucihoni mwawe:
Nviriyane! Aakhumile ntthu umwacera ipyo.
Amwacak'ono, ipyo ikina yahomorela nceresere iphiro ni yaholyaca asaanuni.
Ipyo ikina yahomorela wamalukuni, vaava itthaya iyo yaari vakani, ni yahomela woohipica, nlattu woohikhala itthaya yinci.
Nanso, ukhuma waya ncuwa, yahovya, ni nlattu woohikhalana mitithari, ipyo eyo yahooma.
Ikina yahomorela wamiiwani, ni miiwa nnye cahonnuwa, cahohoma ipyo ni khayeemile.
Ikina yahomorela watthayani yomaana yahomela, yahoonuwa ni yaheema talathini (30), sitini (60) ni iminya wo khula ipyo.
Ni ahopwahera eeraka: Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eeweke.
Nahanle veekha, eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli na atthu yaanrukurenrye yahonkoha maanaya nlikanihero nne.
Ahaakhula eeraka: Nyu nhovahiya ucuwelaca isiiri yo'mwene wa Nluku, nanso atthu ari uta, citthu cothene anhimeriya ni malikanihero,
wiira yoonaka, ahoone, ni ahicuwelele; yiiwaka, ahiiwe, ni ahiiweehe wiira ahirukunuse mirima, aleveleliyaka itampi caya.
Ni ahopwahera eeraka: Khanneeweha maanaya nlikanihero nna? Mweeco nnohala wiitthuca cani malikanihero makina ayo?
Ntthu nawaala nuulumo.
Ari nceresere iphiro, ph'ale yaahimeriye nuulumo, nanso, aneewile nuulumo, Sotwani naawa waatamiha nuulumo naaliye.
Ciicammo, ale yaakhenle ipyo wamalukuni, ph'ale aneewa nuulumo, wowaakuvyaca anawaakhela ni wotteeliya nrima.
Nanso khaciwo mitithari mwa ayo, ankhala ukati vakani kontha ukati unkhunaya masakha, atthuna woomolanihaciya nlattu wo nuulumo, anaawuluwa woohipica.
Ahaawo akina, anaakhela nuulumo mapuro o miiwa. Ala anawiiwa nuulumo,
nanso nlattu wooramela citthu co nttuniyani, uthepyaciya wo mihakhu ni citthu cikina cinonlelaya, cinaakela munrimani mwaya anaatitha ni nuulumo, khanineema tho.
Akina ari toko ipyo immorela watthayani yoorera ph'ale aneewa nuulumo, yaakhelaka ni avahaka mihokorokho talathini (30), sitini (60) ni iminya wo khula ipyo.
Ahaahimerya tho: Pooti inaweesiya isamaninya nhina mwaya itthuttu atthuna vathi waya nkori? Keera ineesiya waculu mmutto?
Kontha khiiwo yovithyaa ihinhala wooneleliya, ni khiiwo yowipithyaa ihinhala wooneleliya.
Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eeweke.
Ni ahopwahera eeraka: Nviriyaneke ratta itthu ineewenyu. Nnowophimiya ni nliko unhalenyu umphimela, ni thotho nnowowincereriya.
Vano ntthu rina, naahala uvahiya, ni ntthu hirina, naahala waakhiya mpaka itthu irinawe.
Ni aanawiira: Umwene wa Nluku uri toko ntthu avonyenre ipyo awe vathi.
Arupe ni unwe, uhiyu n'uthana, ipyo inaamela ni inawunnuwa, ule woohicuwela manannani.
Itthaya inaavaha veekhaya, woopacera ntathi, wahoolo ncasi, ni wiimaleloni, ncasi noocara meele.
Ni yowiima yattokotthaka, naahepha nlattu wahophiya ukati woohephiya.
Vano aheera tho: Ninhala ulikanihera ni isiyani Umwene wa Nluku? Atthuna ninhala utaphulela ni nlikaniheroni?
Uri toko inuku yo nrale, iri yootepa uyeva ineera inaliye vathi.
Nanso, yamelaka, inawunnuwa n'uthatuwa mwiri muulupale woopwaha miri co mmattani, ni miritta caya cinaamwarya mpaka asaanuni owirimu anaateka ipuru mmirittani mwaya.
Yesu aheetthuciha nuulumo ni malikanihero menci, toko coonawe wiira anawaakhela.
Woohi nlikanihero khaahimerya itthu, nanso uyo aanawaataphulela cothene eetthuci awe anari veekhaya.
Nihuku nne, unaripenle, ahaahimerya eeraka: Nrwee nilapuwele ukhopela.
Ahiyaka mphwinko, eetthuci yahonkusa, toko caaryawe nkalawani, ni cahonveleela ikalawa cikina.
Vano ahokhumelela naphuvu muulupale o'phyoo ni mawimpi yaanawiicattakanihaca ni ikalawa mpaka yaahala vakani ucara maasi.
Yesu, nari mphantte wo'ttuli wo'kalawa, aanarupa naphitenrye nsawu. Yahommusa n'umwiirela: Mwalimu, khunoona wiira ninaattittha?
Onwaka, aholamulela iphyoo ni aheerela ipahari: Imaale, ihittinke! Iphyoo ni maasi yahomaala ni yaheera riyariya.
Wahoolo ahaahimerya eeraka: Nlattuni nkhalaka atthu owoova oosilili? Nhikupaliki?
Yaanawoova venci ni yaankohana yiiraka: Tipani yoola neeweleliya ni iphyoo ni ipahari?
Yahophiya nikhopela nikhwaya ntthiya, ilapo yo'Kerasenu.
Yesu nalapuwile ahosiceeriya ni ntthu aakhuma umahiye, aavariye ni nnepa woonanara.
Aakhala umahiye, ni khaawo oorya untthuka n'unyolo,
kontha imaara cinci ahotthukiya n'unyolo, nanso aannyakataca ni wuntakaca. Khaawo oorya unvoniha.
Mahuku othene aanaweetta, uthana n'uhiyu mmarekhano ni mmyaakoni, akhuwaka ni eerakalihaka ni maluku.
Ukati wamoonyawe Yesu uttayi, ahotthimakaca ni ahonkhoromela ni
ahokhuwa ni ncu nowiirunya eeraka: Yesu Mwana a Nluku Ooculu, iri isiyani we ni mi? Uhikoopopihe!
Vaavale Yesu ahomwiirela: Ukhume mwirutthuni mu, nnepa woohiloka!
Wahoolo ahonkoha eeraka: Ncina naa tipani? Ule ahaakhula: Mphwinko phi ncina naka, nlattu niri enci.
Ni yahonlepela ankhanyererihaka wiira ahoomoliye nttetthe ule.
Wakhiviru, cahaawo ikuluwe cinci caalya nceresere mwaako.
Minepa coonanara cahonlepela Yesu: Nnilamulele nakele nkuluweni mmwe.
Yesu ahorumelela, ni nenna nna minepa coonanara cahokhuma wantthuni ni cahokela nkuluweni, ni ikuluwe nnye caari ilufu piili caheevonyera muntthiyani ni cahottittha.
Atthu yaaliha ikuluwe ale yahotthawaca ni yahovira attonkaka mmawaani, na atthu enci yahowa woona itthu yeeranele.
Waphilyaya nipuro naaryawe Yesu, yahomoona ntthu aavariye ni minepa coonanara nonkomile, nawanre ni nakhalanne ankhili, ni yahoovaca.
Atthu yaari wakhiviru ale, yahaattonkela atthu yaawile itthu yeeranele ni ntthu oovariya ni minepa coonanara ni ikuluwe nnye.
Vano yahonlepela Yesu wiira akhume mwiilaponi mwaya mmwe.
Yesu ahoturuwela ukalawani, ni ntthu aavariye ni minepa aananlepela wiira antthukane nkwaha.
Yesu khantthunihenre, nanso ahomwiirela: Urwee uwanyaa, wamawaa ni wattonkacere citthu cothene cupankenlyaya Apwiya, ni mananna ciwoonenlyaya ikiriri.
Ahokhuma wonwo arwaaka uTekapoli ni ahopacera uttonkaca citthu cothene caapankeliyawe ni Yesu, na atthu othene yaantikhinaca.
Yesu ahokela nkalawani ni aholapuwela nikhopela nikhwawe, ni atthu enci yahonrukurerya ni uyo neemenle nceresere ntthiya.
Ahophiya vano muulupale o nsinakoka, eehaninya Cayiru, ni umoona wawe Yesu, ahonkhoromela,
ni ahonlepela ankhanyererihaka: Mwanaka mwanthiyana hanle vakani ukhwa; uwe unthatele matata akhale nkumi.
Yesu ahommeleela phutthariyaka ni mphwinko muulupale wamphunyereriha.
Vano, nthiyana mmoca aawuva iphome iyakha khumi na piili,
ni aanaweettihiya venci mmatatani mo mayovoniha enci, ni aarihile mihakhu cawe cothene, nanso woohimphwanya nafasi, mpaka iretta awe yaanavira itepacaka.
Neewile ca Yesu, ahotakaneela ni mphwinko, ni ahowa uttuli wawe ni ahokwanya mphantte woosoriya wo'hancu awe,
maana eeciirela: Mi kakwanyaru paahi ihancu awe, kinaahala uvona.
Nananoru iphome yaheemela, ni ahoona mwirutthuni mwawe wiira ikwerere awe ihovona.
Nenna nna, Yesu, oonaka wiira ikuru awe yahokhuma mwirutthuni mwawe, ahaarukunuwela atthu ale ni ahaakoha wiira: Kikwanyile tipani?
Eetthuci awe yahomwiirela: Unawoona wiira atthu enci anawuphunyereriha miphantte cothene, ni unaakoha wiira kikwanyile tipani?
Nanso Yesu ahoweha nceresere aphavelaka umoona ntthu aapankile itthu ile.
Vano nthiyana ahocuwela itthu yeeranele, ahomwaattamerya ni ahokhoroma wamettoni wawe athukumelaka ni oovaka ni ahonhimerya ikhweli yothene.
Ule ahomwiirela: Mwanaka, ukupali waa uhowoopola. Urwee ni nnema ni uvone ikwerere aa.
Yesu oolumacaka nanlelo yahowa atthu yaakhuma itthoko ya nhooleli o nsinakoka phwiiraka: Mwaninyu hokhwa.
Nanso Yesu, wiiwa wawe moolumo ale, ahomwiirela nhooleli o nsinakoka: Uhoove, ukupali paahi.
Ahaateeliha othene eeraka: Hikiveleele ntthu, hikhanle Peturu, Yakopu ni Yohani, nhimawe Yakopu.
Uphiya waya uwannyawe muulupale o nsinakoka, Yesu aheewa ikuttho yuulupale ya atthu enci yunlaka mpaani.
Ni akelaka, ahaahimerya: Ikuttho ila wunla nwe isiyani? Mwana uyo kakhwile, naarupa paahi.
Nanso atthu ale yaananthyaa. Yesu ahaakumihera uta atthu ale othene ni aakusaka athumwane na anumwane na ale yammelenle, yahokela mpaani mwataleliye mwanamwane.
Ni ammaraka ntata, aheera: Talita kum! Maanaya wiira, mwanaka kinawulamulela, wunwe!
Nananoru mwanamwane ahonwa ni ahopacera weetta, maana ahaana iyaakha khumi na piili. Othene yahooma mwaano.
Yesu ahaalepela wiira itthu ile ihicuweliye ni ntthu, ni aholamula uvahiya iyolya mwanthiyana.
Ukhuma wawe wenwe, ahorwaa wamoca n'eetthuci awe.

Nihuku no ntivela ahopacera wiitthuciha nsinakoka na atthu enci yaamwiiwa, waanawooma mwaano ni yaanahimya yiiraka: Inonkhuma vayi itthu ila ni ucuwelani uno uvahiyawe uno? Cinopankyaa cani cootikineeha nnya ni ntata nawe?
Kahi nkalapinteru, mwanawe Mariya, ni nhimawe Yakopu, Yusufu, Yuta ni Simoni? Na asirokorawe khari ni hi? Phimaana khayaankupali.
Yesu aheerela: Nnapiyu khanlemelihiya ilapo iyarenlyawe, na aloko awe ni uwannyawe.
Nwe khoonrye upanka cootikineeha hata imoca, nanso ahaathatela matata aretta vakani ni ahaavoniha.
Yesu ahotikhinaca uhikupali wa atthu ale ni ahoviravira iwaani cowaattamana eetthucihaka.
Aheehana khumi n'eeli, ni ahopacera waaruma eeli eeli, ni ahaavaha ikuru yoolamulela minepa coonanara.
Ahaalamulela wiira ahikuse itthu yootthumiri ni iphiro, toko nkatthe, mena nrupa, mena ncurukhu nlasuperani, nanso akuse ikopo paahi.
Aware ikwakwatta ni ahiwye ihancu piili.
Ni ahaahimerya tho eeraka: Mwakelaka watthokoni, nkhale wonwo mpaka ukhuma.
Mwahaakheleliyeke nipuro nno, na atthu ale yaahiwiiwekeni, woothama vale, nkukutthe ntthupi no nnyaani mwinyu, nthoonyiheraka usaahiti wookhotta uwaakhelelani.
Eetthuci yahorwaaca ni yahaalaleera atthu wiira arukunuse nrima.
Yahoomola minepa coonanara cinci, yahaattikitthela ni makhura aretta enci mpaka waavoniha.
Mwene Heroti aheewa cuulumaceriyaka ca Yesu, naanruma ncina nawe ni anawiira: Uyo Yohani Mpattisa honwelela mwa atthu ookhwa, phimaana mwa ule cinaapankyaa ikuru cootikineeha.
Akina yeera: Phi Eliya. Akina yeera: Ri nnapiyu toko minapiyu cokhalayi.
Nanso Heroti, wowiiwa itthu ila, aanahimya eeraka: Yohani unthikinlyaka isiko phunwelenle.
Khweli, Heroti phalamunle utthukiya Yohani ni weesiya nkalaposo, nlattu wa Herotiya, amwaarawe Filipe nhimawe, anthenlyawe.
Kontha Yohani ahomwiirela Heroti wiira: Khunlamuliya waathela amwaarawe nhimaa.
Herotiya aananrama ni aaphavela umwiiva, nanso khoorya,
nlattu Heroti aanamoova Yohani ni, acuwelaka wiira aari ntthu ooloka ni nttakattifu, aanamwaakiha; wamwiiwawe aanasanka, nanso aananviriyana n'uciveliya.
Nanso nahophiya nihuku noopiihera myakha Heroti, ahopanka isikuhuulu, ahaalattula oolupale oohano, oolupale a anatoropa, ni mamwene o'Kalileya.
Ukati waakenlyawe wiina mwana nthiyana a Herotiya, wahoncivela Heroti na atthu yaalattuliye ni mwene ahomwiirela mwali ule: Ukilepele itthu phi itthu intthunaa ni mi kimmowuvaha.
Ni ahopwahera eeraka: Kimmowuvaha itthu yothene inhalaa ukilepela, pooti ukhala nuusu no'mwene aka.
Mwali ahokhuma waakoha anumwane wiira: Kilepele isiyani? Ala yahaakhula yiiraka: Muru wa Yohani Mpattisa.
Mwali akelaka tho nenna nna, ahonlepela mwene, eeraka: Itthu imphavelaka naanano va, kivahiye muru wa Yohani Mpattisa munttiisini.
Mwene ahocukulaca, nanso nlattu woolupela ni nlattu wa atthu yaalattuliyawe, khaatthunne unthuwa yalepenlyawe.
Nenna nna ahonlamulela mayorontta uwiha muru wa Yohani. Mayorontta ahorwaa nkalaposo n'unhita Yohani.
Wahoolo ahowiha muru munttiisini mpaka ummaha mwali, n'ule ahaavaha anumwane.
Ucuwela waya itthu ila eetthuci a Yohani, yahokusa nrutthu ni yahothipela mmahiye.
Amitthenka yahothukumana ni Yesu ni yahonttonkacera citthu cothene caapankilyaya ni ceetthucihilyaya.
Ni Yesu ahaahimerya eeraka: Nkaweni, nrwee nipuro nowiipithyaa ni mmumule vakani, nlattu yaari enci yaarwa ni yaawa mpaka uhikhalana ukati woolya.
Vano yahorwaa ni ikalawa nipuro nowiipithyaa nahaariwo hata ntthu.
Yoonaka arwaaka, enci yahocuwela ukitthu unkelaya. Ni mmatthokoni mothene yahorwaa, yeettaka vathi, nipuro nne, ni yahophiya nraci.
Yesu ukhuruwa wawe nkalawani, ahoona mphwinko mwinci ni ahoonela ikiriri, nlattu yaari toko ikhontwaa coohikhalana nhakheli. Vano ahopacera weetthuciha citthu cinci.
Ncuwa waakelaya utthekuwa, eetthuci awe yahomwaattamerya n'umwiirela: Nipuro nna ntakhwani, ni ncuwa nihotthekuwa.
Mweerele atthu ayo wiira arwaace mmawaani ni mmatthokoni cowaattamana wiira yathume iyolya.
Ahaakhula: Mwaavahe nyenyuva iyolya. Na ale yahomwiirela: Woothuma mikatthe cowaavaha ala atthu ala, nimphavela ncurukhu iminya piili.
Yesu ahopwahera eeraka: Nrina mikatthe mikavi? Murwee moone. Anaakohile atthu, yahaakhula yiiraka: Mikatthe mithanu ni ihopa piili.
Ahaalamulela wonkomiha atthu vakani khula nipuro mmalasini makithi.
Yaanawunkoma mmakhunkoni atthu iminya ni atthu hansini (50).
Vano ahokusa mikatthe mithanu ni ihopa piili. Awehaka wirimu, ahonsukuru Nluku, ahomyaniha mikatthe ni ahaavaha eetthuci awe wiira yaakawele atthu ale, ni ale yahaakawela ciicammo ihopa piili nnye.
Atthu othene yahokhura n'urupala;
vano ikalakathela co mikatthe ni ihopa caahanle cahottotteliya mpaka ucara itthuttu khumi na piili.
Vano yaakhunre ayo yaari alopwana ilufu thanu.
Nananoru Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe wiira akelace nkalawani, ahoolelace ni alapuwelace uPetesayita, uyo aleehaka mphwinko ule.
Ulasera wawe mphwinko ule, ahowela umwaakoni wiira aswali.
Wiila waya, ikalawa yaari iriyari ipahari, ni Yesu aheemela nceresere veekhawe.
Woona wawe wiira yahoocya weettiha ikalawa nlattu iphyoo yaawuka mananna makina, aheekamela mapikosa, eettaka wamaasini mpaka utthuna waahapuwa.
Vano eetthuci ale waamoonnyaya eettaka waculu maasi, yahoopuwela wiira nlayikha, ni yahokhuwa.
Othene mweeco yahomoona ni wahaakela woova. Nanso Yesu aheerelaca coo: Mpise nrima! Phi mi! Nhoove!
Wahoolo, ahokela nkalawani mwariyaya, ni iphyoo yahowukuwa. Othene yaanawoova venci.
Khayeeweehile ni nlelo itthu yeeranele ni mikatthe nnye nlattu woolipa mirima caya.
Analapuwenle nikhopela nikina, yahophiya uKenesare ni yahokocera ikalawa iyo.
Anakhumilene nkalawani mmwe, atthu o wonwo yahoncuwelela Yesu.
Yahophiya atthu enci o'lapo ile ni yahopacera waawiiha aretta mmarepani ni yahaarweha nipuro naacuwenlyaya wiira phiryawe.

Mmatthokoni cikani, itthoko cuulupale ni mmawaani, nipuro phi nipuro naakelawe yaanaweesiya aretta mmaparaparani ni yahonlepela wiira aattunihere ukwanya paahi mphantte woosoriya wo'hancu awe. Vano othene yaakwanya yahovona.
Mayowantikha ni mafarisi akina, akhumaka uYerusalemu, yahothukumana ntotho wawe Yesu.
Yahoona wiira eetthuci awe akina yaanalya nkatthe ni matata oohirya, maanaya woohinyawa.
Mafarisi ni ayuta othene khanlya woohinyawa ratta ratta, toko caalemalenlyaya atthu okhalayi.
Waturuwaya uparasa, khayalya ihinaya unyawa, ni cihaawo tho citthu cinci cikina cimpankaya attharaka citthu cokhalayi, toko urapiha ikahi, myaapu, ni myaapu co ncukhuma ni mikori.
Mafarisi ni mayowantikha yahonkoha yiiraka: Eetthuci aa khanttharihelela ilema co mahumu o'ttiini, anlya woohinyawa, isiyani?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Anamirima miili! Nnapiyu Isaya holalya sana, awaacakani nyu, toko cantikhiyaya: Ala atthu ala ankittittimiha ni malaku paahi, nanso nrima aya uri uttayi ni mi.
Anaakilapela vathiru; waneetthucihaya ikano ca atthu.
Nhiyaka nlamulo na Nluku, phuttharaka ilema ca atthu, toko urapiha myaapu ni ikahi ni citthu cinci coolikana nnya.
Ni aheerela: Nyu nnaavya mananna oohiya nlamulo na Nluku ni ilema cinyu.
Musa heera: Waalemelihe athumwana na anumwana; ni: Ntthu nohala waalapha athumwane ni anumwane eeviye.
Nanso nyu nneera: Ntthu nohala weerela athumwane atthuna anumwane wiira: Itthu yaahalaka wuuvahani nyu phi Korpan, maanaya itthuvo yoovaherera wa Nluku.
Ciicammo khanonhiyera ntthu itthu yowapankela athumwane atthuna anumwane.
Commo, nnaafutta nuulumo na Nluku nlattu wo'lema cinyu cinvahenyu. Ni naapanka citthu cinci toko nnya.
Yesu aheehana mphwinko wa atthu ni aheera: Nviriyane ni mwiiweehe:
Khiiwo iri uta wawe ntthu, ineera inakenle nhina mwawe, phoorya untatusa nharamu, nanso inkhuma muntthuni, yeeyo phinonkhaliha nharamu.
Ntthu urina manyaru uwiiwelela, eewe!
Waakenlyawe mpaani, nahile mphwinko, eetthuci awe yahonkoha maanaya nlikanihero nna.
Ahaakhula eeraka: Nyu ciicammo khanneeweha? Khannocuwela wiira, citthu cothene co vate cinkela muntthuni, khacinontatusa nharamu?
Kontha khacinkela munrimani mwawe, nanso nnapwiipwini, ni wahoolo cinaakhumela wanipuroni waya. Ciicale aanahimya wiira coolya cothene ciri co'halali.
Ni ahohimya tho: Citthu cinkhuma muntthuni, cennyo phinonkhaliha nharamu ntthu.
Nlattu nhina nrima wa ntthu phinkhumaya moopuwelo oonanara, uluva, winnya, wiiva,
uraruwa, isooyo, wunlela coonanara, uthepya, uhilemeliha irutthu, urama, ukufuru, wiicoona, uhiwacera itthu yomaana.
Citthu nnye cothene coonanara cinkhuma nhina, ni cinantatusa ntthu nharamu.
Ukhuma wawe nipuro nne, ahorwaa nttetthe wo'Tiru ni uSitoni. Ahokela mpaani ni khaatthuna wiira acuweliye ni ntthu, nanso khoonrye wiipitha.
Vano woohipica nthiyana aarina mwanawe mwanthiyana aavariye ni nnepa woonanara weewilyawe wuulumaciya ca Yesu, ahowa unkhoromela wamettoni wawe.
Aari nthiyana nsenci, o'lapo yo'Siriya-Fenisiya, ni aananlepela wiira oomole ncini wa mwanawe.
Ahaakhula: Woopacera, waarerihe asaana avone; khawanrera ukusa iyolya ya asaana ni waavonyera asilapwa!
Ale mweeco, yahomwaakhula: Khweli, Pwiya, nanso hata asilapwa anaalya vathivaya meeca coolya ca asaana cimmoramora.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Nlattu wo nuulumo nna, urweeke, ncini nihokhuma mwa mwanaa.
Ahoturuwela uwani ni ahomphwanya mwamhima nonkomile wankorini. Ncini nahonhiya.
Nakhumile tho nttetthe wo'Tiru, ahowela uSitoni, mpaka ntthiya no'Kalileya, aphulanihaka nttetthe wo'Tekapoli.
Yahomwiihera ntthu oohiiwa, ni wanrikarikela wuulumaca, ni yahonlepela wiira anthatele ntata.
Yesu antamihaka waatthuni ahonhela makokho mmanyaruni, ahonsuwela ni ukwanya nlimi ni isene.
Ni awusaka miitho wirimu ahohihimerya, eeraka: Efatha; maanaya wiihule.
Manyaru yahonhulya namarweele, nlimi nawe nahontthukuwa ni ahopacera wuuluma ratta.
Yesu aheera wiira hinhimerye ntthu itthu yeeranele, nanso waatepawe waateliha, phaatepaya umwarusela.
Atikhinacaka, yaanawiira: Cothene nopanka cootikhineeha, heewiha atthu oohiiwa, ni woolumaciha atthu oohuulumaca.
Mahuku ale, ukhala wiira wahothukumana tho mphwinko muulupale na atthu khayaarina iyolya, Yesu aheehana eetthuci awe ni ahaahimerya:
Kinawoonela ikiriri mphwinko ula. Nna va ahovira mahuku mararu unari ni mi woohilya itthu.
Kalaseraka mphwinko ula woohilya itthu, unaahala ukhwa mahile ni iphiro, kontha akina akhumile uttayi.
Eetthuci awe yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Nohala woorya cani ntthu waaliha nkatthe, watakhwani va?
Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Nrina mikatthe mikavi? Ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Nirina mikatthe saapa.
Vano ahaalamula atthu ale wiira yunkomace vathi. Ahokusa mikatthe saapa nnye ni ahonsukuru Nluku, ahomyaniha ni ahaavaha eetthuci awe, wiira yaakawele atthu ale.
Yahaana tho asihopa vakani. Ahoreriha ni aholamula wiira yaakawele.
Yaholya mpaka urupala ni ikalakathela caahanle nnyo eetthuci awe yahottottela itthuttu saapa.
Yaari atthu ene ookhalaka ilufu cese. Wahoolo ahaalasera,
ni ahokela nkalawani n'eetthuci awe, n'ulapuwela nttetthe wo'Talmanuta.
Yahowa mafarisi yaapacenre unyakulihana ni Yesu ni woontteha yahonlepela ikanyero yookhuma wirimu.
Yesu ahihimeryaka ni nrima wothene, aheera: Nlattu isiyani nloko nna ninalepelela ikanyero? Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira nna nloko nna khaninhala uvahiya ikanyero hata vakani.
Yesu ahaahiya, ahokela nkalawani, ulapuwela ikhopela ikina.
Eetthuci yaholiyala ukusa iyolya, ni nkalawani mmwe khayaarina iyolya mena vakani.
Yesu aheerela: Moone, nkhale miitho mmweheehaka ratta miropo co mafarisi ni miropo ca Heroti.
Vano ale yaanawaapelana ayaayoru yiirelanaka: Waaciye uhikhalana iyolya.
Nanso Yesu ucuwela wawe mwaha ule, ahaakoha eeraka: Nnoopelani mwaha nlattu yoohikhalana iyolya? Khannacuwelela ni khanneeweha? Nri ni nrima wooturumala.
Nhaana miitho ni khannoona? Nhaana manyaru nanso khanneewa ni khannoopuwela.
Itthuttu kavi coocara ni coohala caattottenlenyu, wamyanihilyaka mikatthe mithanu kaakawelaka atthu ilufu thanu? Yahaakhula yiiraka: Khumi na piili.
Ni wamyanihilyaka mikatthe saapa phwakawelaka atthu ilufu cese, mwacarihile itthuttu kavi co'kalakathela co mikatthe? Yahaakhula yiiraka: Saapa.
Aanaweerela: Nanlelo khanneeweha?
Yesu n'eetthuci awe yahophiya uPetesayita ni yahomwiihera ntthu oohoona, anlepelaka wiira ankwanye.
Ahommarela ntata ntthu oohoona ni ahonrweha nceresere itthoko, ahonhela isenye mmiithoni mwawe, ahonthatela matata n'unkoha: Unawoonaka itthu?
Ule ahoteesa miitho ni aheerela: Kinawoona atthu, yeettaka ankhala toko miri.
Ahonthatela tho matata mmiithoni, n'ule ahopacera woona ratta ratta ni ahovona mpaka woona citthu cothene.
Vaavale Yesu ahonlamulela urwaa uwannyawe, ni ahomwiirela: Uhikele umawaani.
Yesu ahonwa na eetthuci awe, akelaka umawaani co'Sesareya ya Filipe. Mphironi ahaakoha eetthuci awe, eeraka: Atthu ayo aneera wiira Mi kipani?
Ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Yohani Mpattisa, akina Eliya, ni akina aneera wiira uri mmoca wo minapiyu.
Ahaakoha tho: Vano nyu nneera Mi kimpani? Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: We uKristu.
Vano Yesu ahaalakihera wiira ahinhimerye ntthu itthu ila.

Wahoolo ahopacera weetthuciha wiira Mwanawe Pinatamu nolamuliya uhuva wo citthu cinci, naahala ukhottiya ni mahumu, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha, wiiviya ni wunwelela anavinre mahuku mararu.
Ni aanawaahimerya itthu ila wohaakhuwakhuwa. Peturu ahomwiihana Yesu ni ahopacera unkuphula.
Yesu nanso arukunuwaka, ni aawehaka eetthuci ahonkuphula Peturu, eeraka: Ukhume, Sotwani! Kontha khummwacera citthu ca Nluku, nanso, ca atthu.
Eehanaka mphwinko wa atthu wamoca n'eetthuci awe aheerela: Ntthu atthunaka ukitthara mi, eekhotteke mwanene, akuseke nsalapa awe ni akitthareke.
Kontha ule notthuna woopola ukumi awe, unanrihyaa. Ule unonrihyaa ukumi awe mwa nlattu wawaka mi ni wo nhupi woorera naahala woopola.
Ntthu nohala uphurani aphwanyaka ittuninya yothene nanso unrihyaka nnepa awe?
Atthuna ntthu nohala uvaha isiyani wo waakakhaniha nnepa awe?

Kontha yoole nohala wuulihaciya muru nlattu wo mi ni moolumo aka nna nloko nooluvaluva ni no'tampi, ciicammo Mwanawe Pinatamu naahala wuulihaceriya muru ni yooyo awaaka munttittimihoni na Athumwane na ancelo attakattifu.
Yesu ahaahimerya tho eeraka: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira ahaawo ari va, ahinhala ukhwa ahinaya woona umwene wa Nluku uwaka ni ikuru caya.
Anavinre mahuku siita, Yesu ahaakusa Peturu, Yakopu ni Yohani, munnawe Yakopu, ahaarwana umwaakoni woorekama. Wonwo yakhalacile ayaayoru, ni Yesu aheetatusa ikhove awe wariyari waya.
Coowara cawe cahothatuwa cowaarya, cootteela usilili toko khaawo mayokattha vathi va uwoorya utteeliha ciicale.
Ahaakhumelela Eliya wamoca ni Musa ni oyeeli yaanawuulumaca ni Yesu.
Peturu ahomwiirela Yesu: Mwalimu wahorera ukhala vaava. Niteke marapattha mararu, nimoca nawinyu, nikina na Musa nikina na Eliya.
Kontha khaacuwela itthu yaahimyawe nlattu yaanawoova venci.
Ni nahokhuruwa nihutte nakhunenle ni ntthuuci, ni nahokhuma ncu nnihutteni neera: Ula mwanaka oofentiya. Mmwiiweleleke!
Nenna nna, awehaka, khayamoonne tho ntthu, ari Yesu veekhawe.
Wakhuruwaya mmwaakoni, Yesu ahaalamulela wiira ahinhimerye ntthu itthu yoonnyaya, mpaka wanhalawe wunwelela Mwanawe Pinatamu mwa atthu ookhwa.
Ale yahotthara moolumo ale, nanso yaanakohana ayaayoru maanaya, wunwelela mwa atthu ookhwa.
Yahonkoha yiiraka: Nlattuni mayowantikha yiiraka, woopacera nolamuliya uwa Eliya?
Ahaakhula eeraka: Aye, Eliya naawa wiira alokihere citthu cothene, nanso yantikhiye isiyani ya Mwanawe Pinatamu, wiira naalamuliya uhuva venci n'unyoholiya.
Mi mweeco kinawuhimeryani: Eliya howa ni yahompankela citthu cothene caaphavenlyaya, toko cantikhiye.
Naphile waryaya eetthuci awe ahoona mphwinko muulupale wa atthu warukurenrye ayo, ni mayowantikha anyakulihanaka na ale.
Amoonakaru Yesu yahotikhina ni yahotthimakaca unkoha isalama.
Ni ule ahaakoha ale: Nnonyakulihanani?
Ntthu mmoca mwa mphwinko ule, ahomwiirela: Mwalimu, kihowiihera mwanaka, rina nnepa woohuulumaca.
Wammaraka vale, unamphatela vathi ni ule naapacera ukhuma niphooru, ucekesa miino ni phuumaka teyeye. Kihaalepela eetthuci aa wiira yoomole ncini, nanso khayoonrye.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nloko na atthu oohaamini ni oohiloka! Mpaka yakhani kinhalaka wukhalanani ni kuuvilelakani? Nkiwiihere uno mmirawo oyo.
Yahommwiihera. Nimoonakaru Yesu, ncini nahompukunyaa mwanhima ni ikuru, mpaka umphatela vathi, ni ahopacera uphirikyaa akhumaka niphooru mwaano.
Yesu ahaakoha athumwane eeraka: Itthu ila inomwiirannya ikhumelo yakhani? Na ale yahaakhula yiiraka: Ikhumelo mwanamwane,
ni imaara cinci nahommonyera wamooroni ni mmaasini wiira nimwiive. Nanso wooryaka vale upanka itthu, unoonele ikiriri ni unikavihere.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Wooryaka! Ntthu nokupali citthu cothene cinawooryanyaa.
Nenna nna, athumwane mwana oyo yahokhuwa: Kinaakupali; nkikavihere uhikupali waka!
Yesu, oonaka wiira atthu enci yaanawa, aholamulela nnepa woonanara ni aheerela: Nnepa wohuulumaca ni wohiiwa, Mi kinawulamulela, ukhume wamwana ola ni uhinturuwele tho.
Ni nnepa, ukhuwaka ni wiicipulacaka ni ikuru, wahokhuma. Mwanhima ahokhala toko ookhwa, mpaka atthu enci wiira hokhwa.
Nanso, ammaraka ntata, Yesu ahommusa, ni ule aheemela.
Ukela wawe mpaani, eetthuci yahonkoka veekhawe: Nlattuni hi khanoonrye woomola?
Ahaakhula: Nloko nna ninoomoliya ni iswali ni utthuka paahi.
Akhumaka wonwo yahottupulaniha ilapo yo'Kalileya, ni Yesu khaatthuna wiira acuweliye ni ntthu,
nlattu aanavira eetthucihaka eetthuci awe ni aanaweerela: Mwanawe Pinatamu naavahereriya mmatatani mwa atthu, ni ala anaahala umwiiva, nanso nakhwile, anavinre mahuku mararu nowowunwelela.
Nanso ayo khayeeweehile itthu yaahimyawe ni yaanoova unkoha.
Yahophiya uKafarnaumu, ni, anari uwani, Yesu ahaakoha: Mwavanyihanani mphironi?
Yahomaalaca, nlattu mphironi yaanavaanyihana ayaayoru, wiira tipani ri muulupale mwa ale.
Unkomaka, Yesu aheehana eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli ni ahaahimerya: Ntthu aphavelaka ukhala muulupale, eepanke mwankani mwa atthu, ni akhale nrumeyi a atthu othene.
Ni ankusaka mwanamwane, ahomweesa iriyari aya, ahommarela ni aheerela:
Ntthu nomwaakhelela mwana mwa ncina naka, nokaakhelela mi, ni ntthu nokaakhelela mi, khankaakhelela mi, nanso ule kirumile.
Yohani ahomwiirela: Mwalimu, nihomoona ntthu oomolaka macini mwa ncina ninyu. Nihomwaateliha ntthu uyo kontha khanakhala awihu.
Yesu ahaahimerya: Nhimwaatelihe, kontha khaawo nopanka cootikhineeha mwa ncina naka, nenna na phukuuluma yoonanara.
Kontha ntthu hinoniina, ri ni hi.
Ntthu noovahani ikahi yo maasi wiira mmurye nlattu wookhala eetthuci awe Kristu, khweli, kinawuhimeryani wiira khanhaleela mena vakani itthuvo awe.
Ntthu nohala unkosiha mmoca acikani ankikupali mi, phatari atthukeleliye nsiko mmo nsilo noosileliya ni avonyeriye mpaharini.
Wakhala wiira ntata naa ninawukosiha, uthikile. Phatari ukela wukumini ni ntata noopahuwa, wahohiyana ukhalana matata oomeeli n'urwaa umooroni uhinttiphyaa.
Wonwo uhinkhwa asunku, ni mooro khunttiphyaa.
Wakhala wiira nnyaa naa ninawukosiha, uthikile. Phatari ukela wukumini unapahuwile, wahohiyana ukhalana oomeeli uvonyeriyaka umooroni.
Wonwo uhinkhwa asunku, ni mooro khunttiphyaa.
Wakhala wiira niitho naa ninawukosiha, uphele. Phatari ukela umweneni wa Nluku ni niitho nimoca, wahohiyana ukhalana oomeeli n'uvonyeriya umooroni.
Wonwo uhinkhwa asunku, ni mooro khunttiphyaa.
Phimaana khula ntthu naahala ulukiya ni mooro.
Maakha phi itthu yoorera, nanso yathatuwaka ooririya, ammolukiya ni isiyani? Nkhalaneke maakha mwa nyu ni mweetteke ni mpuha ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Vano Yesu ahokhuma vale ni ahorwaa nttetthe wo'Yuteya nikhopela nikhwawe no Yortani. Yahowa atthu enci nipuro naaryawe, aanaweetthuciha toko caalemalenlyawe.
Vaavale yahowaaca mafarisi wiira anttehe ni yahonkoha wiira: Naattuniheriya nlopwana waamwalanana amwaarawe?
Ahaakhula eeraka: Musa oolamulenleni isiyani?
Yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Musa holevela waavaha iwarakha yoomwalana, ni waahiya.
Yesu ahaakhula tho eeraka: Nlattu wooturumala nrima enyu phuvahilyaweni nno nlamulo nno.
Nanso, yapattusiyeru ilapo, Nluku ahompanka nlopwana ni nthiyana.
Phimaana nlopwana naahala waahiya athumwane na anumwane nokowaaluttanana amwaarawe,
ni oyeeli ankhala irutthu imoca. Commo ayo khaanakhala tho eeli, nanso irutthu imoca.
Phimaana, itthu iluttanihilyawe Nluku, ntthu himwalanihe.
Anaphile uwani, eetthuci awe yahonkoha tho itthu ile.
Yesu ahaahimerya eeraka: Ntthu naamwalanana amwaarawe, mari uhikhanle paahi nlattu wooluva, phwaathelaka athiyana akina, neetta uluva.
Ni nthiyana oomwalananiya atheliyaka ni nlopwana nkina, neetta uluva.
Atthu yaanawiiha asaana wiira aakwanye, nanso eetthuci awe yaanawaateeliha.
Yesu, oonaka itthu ile ahonyoonyinya ni aheerela: Mwaahiye asaana ayo, nhaateelihe uwa waryaka, kontha umwene wa Nluku uri wawaya.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Ule hinaakhelela umwene wa Nluku toko mwana, khanhala ukela wonwo.
Wahoolo ahaakusa vayawani phwathatelaka matata ni ahaareriha.
Wakhumilyawe eettaka ni iphiro, ahomwaattamerya ntthu atthimakacaka, ni akhoromelaka ahonkoha: Mwalimu omaana, kipankekeni wiira kaphwanye ukumi woohimala?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Unkiihanelani omaana? Khaawo ri omaana mari hikhanle Nluku paahi.
Unaacuwela malamulo: Uhiive, uheette uluva, uhinnye, uhikhale saahiti owootha, uhithepye, waalemelihe athumwana na anumwana.
Ahomwaakhula eeraka: Mwalimu, cothene nnya kiheettela ikhumelo umirawo aka.

Yesu ahonwehecesa, ni ahonfenta, ni ahomwaakhula eeraka: Inawuhaleela itthu imoca. Urwee ni watumihe citthu cothene cirinaa, ni ncurukhu uyo waavahe amasikiini, ni unkookhalana nhakhu wirimu, wahoolo uwe ni ukitthare.
