Nanso, weewilyawe nuulumo nne, ahothulana ni ahokhuma acukulacaka, kontha aarina mihakhu cinci.
Awehaka nceresere, Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe: Thaciri urikarika ukela wumweneni wa Nluku.
Eetthuci wahooma uwanoni, wowiiwa moolumo ala. Nanso Yesu ahopwahera eeraka: Asaanaka, cirikarikilyaya ukela wumweneni wa Nluku, ale ankhuluvela mihakhu.
Nanso wari wookhwya uvira inkamira wamwiitheni wo sinkano, woovikana thaciri ukela wumweneni wa Nluku.
Ale yahotikhinaca venci ni yaanawiirelana ayaayoru: Vano, tipani nohala woorya woopwa?
Yesu ahaaweha ni aheerela: Iyo khinooryaa wamiithoni wa atthu, nanso ni Nluku, citthu cothene cinawooryaa.
Peturu ahopacera unhimerya eeraka: Hi nihohiya cothene ni nihoottharani.

Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Kinawuhimeryani ikhweli wiira khaawo ntthu nohala uhiya inupa awe, asunnawe, asirokorawe, athumwane na anumwane, asaana atthuna imatta cawe nlattu wawaka, ni nlattu wo nhupi woorera,
phihaakhela mpaka imaara iminya, ukati urihu ula, inupa, asunnawe, asirokorawe, anumwane, asaana ni imatta, wamoca ni woomolanihaciya, ni wahoolo ukumi woohimala.
Nanso enci oopacera ankokhala owiiheerya, ni owiiheerya ankokhala oopacera.

Eetthuci yaanaweetta ni iphiro ni yahovattela uYerusalemu, ni Yesu aari uhoolo waya. Yaanatikhina ni yaanantthara ni woova. Ahaakusa tho eetthuci khumi n'eeli, ahopacera waahimerya itthu yaahala umwiiranela,

eeraka: Nna va ninvattela uYerusalemu, ni Mwanawe Pinatamu naahala uvahereriya mmatatani mwa akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha. Ayo anaahala umwiiviha. Anaahala unvaherera mmatatani mwa amalaponi,
wiira antarawace, amwaafyulace ni ankhomele wansalapani, nanso nihuku noneeraru naahala wunwelela.
Yakopu ni Yohani, asaana a Sepeteu, yahomwaattamerya ni yahomwiirela: Mwalimu, nimphavela, unipankele yothene inhalehu wuulepela.
Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Nnophavela kuupankeleni isiyani?
Yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Wumweneni waa, nonkome, mmoca moono wo nlopwana, ni nkina moono wo nthiyana.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khannocuwela inlepelenyu. Nnawoorya uwurya ikikhompe inhalaka uwurya, ni waakhela upattiso unhalaka waakhela?
Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Ninawoorya. Yesu ahaahimerya eeraka: Nnaahala uwurya ikikhompe inhalaka uwurya, ni nnaahala upattisiya n'upattiso unhalaka upattiseriya,
nanso wunkoma moono aka wo nlopwana atthuna wo nthiyana khakilamuleliye wuuvahani, nanso uri wa ale atthenkemaniheriye.
Akina khumi, wiiwa waya mwaha ule, yahonrusanana Yakopu ni Yohani.
Yesu aheehana ni aheerela: Nnaacuwela wiira ale oocuwaneehiya ukhala alamuli o mwiilaponi anawaathawala atthu, ni akhulupale anawaahuviha atthu ni ikuru caya.
Nanso wa nyu, kuhimweni commo. Ntthu notthuna ukhala muulupale wa nyu, nolamuliya ukhala nrumeyi.
Ni ntthu notthuna ukhala oopacera mwa nyu, nolamuliya wiiyeviha toko ipottha ya atthu othene.
Nlattu Mwanawe Pinatamu khaawile uvareliya nteko, nanso wile uvara nteko n'uvaha ukumi awe wiira oopole atthu enci.
Yahophiya uYeriko. Wakhumaya uYeriko n'eetthuci awe, ni mphwinko muulupale, Partimeu, mayolepela oohoona, mwanawe Timeu, ahonkoma nceresere iphiro alepelacaka icimola.
Weewilyawe wiira Yesu o'Nasaree naavira, ahokhuwela: Yesu, Mwana a Taviti, ukoonele ikiriri!
Atthu enci yaanankuphula wiira ammaalihe, nanso ule phaatepawe ukhuwela eeraka: Mwana a Taviti, ukoonele ikiriri!
Yesu aheemela ni aheera: Mmwiihane. Yahomwiihana ntthu uhoona yiiraka: Ulipe nrima, wunwe, nawiihana.
N'ule, arulaka ikacako awe, ahotupha ni ahorwaa wa Yesu.
Yesu ahonkoha eeraka: Umphavela kuupankele isiyani? Oohoona ahaakhula eeraka: Mwalimu, kimpheela woona.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Urwee. Waamini waa nwo uhowoopola. Wowaakuvyaca wene ahopacera woona, n'untthara Yesu mphironi.
Yesu n'eetthuci awe yahattameryaca uYerusalemu, yahophiya uPetifaki ni Petaniya, wakhiviru ni mwaako wo Olivera ni ule ahaaruma eetthuci eeli, eerelaka:
Murwee aliteya ari uhoolo; mwaphiyaka nwo, nnaamphwanya natthukeleliye mwapuuru hinatoko uweliya. Mwantthukule ni mwammwiihe woono.
Akhalaka wiira ntthu nookohani: Nlattuni mpankaka ciicammo? Mmwiireleke: Apwiya anaamphavela, ni ankowuturuselani wowaakuvyaca.
Yahorwaa phumphwanyaka mwapuuru natthukeleliye wankhorani, mphantte wo vate wo'luwani, ni yahontthukula.
Atthu yaari wonwo yahaakoha: Nnopankani muntthukulaka mwapuuru?
Yahaakhula toko Yesu caahimenryawe, ni yahaahiya urwaaca.
Yahonrwehela Yesu mwapuuru uyo, yahonkhunela ikuwo caya, ni Yesu ahonwela.
Atthu enci yaanawaatala ikuwo caya mphironi, akina yamwarusela miritta cikithi caathikinlyaya mmattani.
Atthu yaari uhoolo mpaka yaantthara, yaankhuwela yiiraka: Hosaana! Horeriya ule nowa mwa ncina na Apwiya!
Uhoreriya umwene umwa wa athumwanihu Taviti! Hosaana wo nculu!
Ahophiya uYerusalemu, Yesu ahokela inupa ittakattifu, ni namanle uweha citthu cothene caanrukurenrye, wahokhala yocoocilo, ahokhuma, phurwaka uPetaniya n'eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli.
Wasilyaya, wakhumaya uPetaniya, Yesu yahonvola itala.

Oonaka uttayi mwiri wo nfikera waari ni matakhuru aya makithi, ahorwaa uweha wakhala wiira uhaawo nhokorokho wowiima. Nanso aattameryaka, khaaphwanyile, aaphwanyile matakhuru paahi, kontha khawaari ukati wowiima mihokorokho.
Aheerela vano nfikera ule: Hikhale tho nohala ulya cowiima caa. Ni eetthuci awe yaheewa itthu ile.

Yahophiya uYerusalemu, Yesu ahokela wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, ni ahoomolaca othene yaatumihaca ni yaathuma mpaani mmwe. Ahopinttulaca meeca a atthu yaakakhanihaca ncurukhu ni ihice ca atthu yaatumihaca ikhuntta,
ni khaantthunihera ntthu wiira eettakane itthu phi itthu wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu.
Aanaweetthuciha eeraka: Ihantikhiya wiira inupa aka inhala wiihaninya n'unethi wo'lapo cothene, inupa yo'swali. Nanso nyu nhotatusa nikhuku na anamwiinya.
Akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha yaheewa itthu ile, ni yaaphavela mananna oomwiiva, nanso yaanamoova, nlattu wo mphwinko wothene waakhala wotikhineehiya ni meetthuciho awe.
Wiila waya, yahorwaa uta waya iparasa.
Uvira waya, wicisu, yahoona mwiri wo nhokorokho unoomile, ni mitithari caya cothene.
Peturu oopuwelaka, ahomwiirela Yesu: Wooneke mwalimu, mwiri ula ulaphilyaa, uhooma.
Yesu aheerela: Munkupali Nluku.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani, ntthu eerelaka mwaako ula: Wiiphele ni wiivonyere mpahari, ni ahaanyihereke munrimani mwawe nanso akupaliki wiira itthu ihimilyawe inawiiranyaa; khweli, inawiiranyaa.
Phimaana, kinawuhimeryani wiira citthu cothene cinhalenyu ulepela nswalini, nkupaliki wiira nnawaakhela, ni nnaapattha.
Mweemelaka vale wiira nswali, mwakhalanaka mwamweetthu ni nkhwiinyu, munleveleke wiira Athumwaninyu, ari wirimu, yuuleveleleni cookosa cinyu.
Nlattu, mwahaaleveleleke akhwinyu, Athumwaninyu ari wirimu khanhala ulevelela cookosa cinyu.
Yahoturuwela uYerusalemu, ni Yesu eettaka wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, yahomwaattamerya akhulupale o mayasataka, mayowantikha ni mahumu,
ni yahonkoha yiiraka: Umpanka nnya citthu nnya n'ulamuli wa pani? Oolamulenle tipani upanka citthu nnya?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mi kinawukohani itthu. Nkaakhule, ni mi kinawuhimeryani umphwanyaka ulamuli unkipankiha nnya citthu nnya.
Upattiso wa Yohani waari wo wirimu, atthuna wa atthu? Nkihimerye.
Ale yahopacera wiirelana ayaayoru coo: Naakhulaka wiira wo wirimu; naahala unikoha wiira: Kaahiki nhinkupalenleni?
Neeraka, wa atthu, ninawoova mphwinko. Nlattu othene yamoona Yohani ukhala nnapiyu.
Vano yahomwaakhula Yesu yiiraka: Khanincuwela. Ni Yesu aheerela: Hata Mi akinoohimeryani kivahile ulamuli unkipankiha citthu nnya.

Yesu ahopacera woolumacera ni malikanihero eeraka: Ahaawo ntthu aarina imatta yo'vinyu, ahopophela nkuco, ahothipa nlitti no waameliya ivinyu ni ahoteka isanca. Wahoolo ahaahiyera mayolima ni ahokhuma arwaaka ikwaha yoottayi.
Waphilyaya ukati woorottowola, ahonruma nrumeyi awe wiira aakhele mphantte awe wo mihokorokho co mmattani.
Nanso ale yahommara, yahomwaatta n'umoomola woohi itthu.
Ni ahonruma nrumeyi nkina. N'uyo tho yahompwesa muru ni yahontarawa venci.
Ahonruma nkina, ni yahomwiiva. Ahaaruma akina enci, na ale yahaatta ni akina weeva.
Nahalenle nlelo mwanawe oofentiya, umwiisoni ahonruma ule, eeraka: Anaahala unlemeliha mwanaka.
Nanso, mayolima yaheerelana ayaayoru: Ula phinhala waakhela nhakhu uyo! Nrwee, nimwiive, wiira nhakhu uyo ukhale wawihu.
Yahonvaraca ni yahomwiiva, n'unrihela nceresere imatta.
Mwanene imatta ile nohala upankani? Naahala uwa ni weeva mayolima ayo, ni waavaha imatta mayolima akina.
Khannasoma cowantikhiya? Nnyo cineera: Nluku nikhottiye ni mayoteka, pheesiye ukhala nowookolela nlootho.
Iyo inkhuma wa Apwiya, ni iri yootikineeha wamiithoni wihu.
Yaanawaavya ummara, nanso yaanawoova mphwinko, nlattu yaheeweha ratta, wiira nlikanihero nne naaca yaayo. Yahonhiya ni yahorwaaca.
Wahoolo yahonrumihela mafarisi ni annaheroti akina wiira ammare mmoolumoni.

Amwaattameryaka yahomwiirela: Mwalimu, ninaacuwela wiira nri eekhweli, khaawo nonramelenyu, maana khannoweha makhalelo a ntthu, kontha nnawiitthuciha iphiro ya Nluku, toko ciryaya yeekhweli. Unihimerye, wanaalamuliya uliviya nsoko Sesari atthuna mena? Ninlive atthuna nihinlive?
Yesu acuwelaka unamirima aya miili, ahaakhula eeraka: Nnokittehatteherani? Nkoonihere ncurukhu uyo.
Yahomwiihera ni ahaakoha eeraka: Ila ilatarato ela ni yaantikhiye ela yawani? Yahaakhula yiiraka: Ya Sesari.
Vano Yesu aheerela: Munvahe Sesari iri ya Sesari, ni Nluku iri ya Nluku. Ni yahotikhinaca venci.
Wahoolo yahowa masatusi, aneera khuuwo wunwelela, ni yahonkohaca, yiiraka:
Mwalimu, Musa eenre wiira nthiyana akhweliyaka awannyawe woohaayarana asaana, ayo anaatheliya ni munnawe waacera annyarele asaana.
Vano yahaawo asilopwana saapa eerukulu imoca. Oopacer'oyo ahonthela nthiyana ni ahokhwa woohinyarana mwana.
Onayeeli uyo ahonthela nthiyana nankhwele ule, n'uyo ahokhwa woohinyarana mwana. Ni ciicammo wahomwiiranela oneeraru uyo.
Ni othene saapa yahokhwa woohinyarana mwana. Wiimaleloni ahokhwa nthiyan'ole.
Wanhala wunweleliya va, nthiyan'ole nohala ukhala awannyawe phavi? Kontha asilopwana saapa ale yahonthela nthiyan'ole.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nnaavonyiha nlattu woohicuwela cowantikhiya mena ikuru ca Nluku.
Phimaana wanhalaya wunweleliya mwa atthu ookhwa, khunhala ukhala uthela mena uthelihana, nanso ankokhala toko ancelo owirimu.

Khansomile itthu ihimilyawe Nluku mwaha wo wunwelela wa atthu ookhwa? Toko Nluku caamuulumannyawe Musa ukati wapharelaya nikukhu woohiivya, eeraka: Mi ki Nluku a Aparahamu, Nluku a Isaki, ni Nluku a Yakopi?
Maana Nluku khanakhala Nluku a atthu ookhwa, nanso ri Nluku a atthu akumi. Nyu khanrere weetta n'ututhi.
Ahomwaattamerya mayowantikha eewile avanyihanaka, ni oonaka wiira Yesu ahaakhula ratta, ahonkoha eeraka: Phinni nlamulo noopacera wo malamulo othene?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Noopacera phi nna: Wiiwe Sirayeli, Apwiya Nluku ihu phi Mwanene Nluku veekhaya.
Waafente Apwiya Nluku aa, ni nrima aa wothene, ni nnepa aa wothene, na ankhili aa othene, ni ikuru caa cothene.
Nonayeeli phi nna: Unfente nkhwaa toko cineefentaa umwanene. Khaniwo nlamulo noopwaha ala.
Mayowantikha yahomwiirela coo: Urera cinene, Mwalimu, khaawoothile weenryaa wiira ule ri veekhawe ni khaawo tho nkina nompwaha ule.
Ni unfente ni nrima aa wothene, ni ankhili aa othene, ni nnepa aa wothene ni ikuru caa cothene, toko cineefentaa umwanene. Iri itthu yuulupale woovikana isataka coopahiya ni cooveleelihiya cothene.
Yesu, oonaka wiira ntthu uyo ahaakhula ni nruku, ahomwiirela: Khuri uttayi n'umwene wa Nluku. Ni khaariwo tho oonkoha itthu.
Eetthucihaka wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, Yesu ahokoha eeraka: Mayowantikha aneerelani wiira Mesiya ri mwana a Taviti?
Taviti mwanene, athoonyeriyaka ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, heera: Apwiya yaheerela Apwiya aka: Wunkome moono aka wonlopwana, mpaka weesa eenani aa vathi waya inyaa caa.
Taviti mwanene namwiihana, Apwiya. Nokhala cani mwanawe? Ni mphwinko muulupale waanamwiiwa n'utteeliya.
Wowiitthuciha, Yesu eera coo: Nkhale miitho, mwiikasoope ni mayowantikha unaacivela uwaraca ihancu, usalameehiya mmapacarini,
wunkoma mapuro oopacera mmasinakokani ni mmasikuhuuluni.
Ayo anawaalyacera anankhwele atupererihaka upanka iswali coorekama. Yaayo atthu ayo anaahala waakhela ihukhumu yuulupale.
Yesu ahonkoma uhoolo waya ikasa yaaheliya cooveleela ni aanaweha atthu wahelaya ncurukhu nkasani mmwe. Mathaciri menci yaanahela ncurukhu mwinci.
Vano, ahowa nthiyana nankhwele oohuva, ahaahela nkasani mmwe atoosu eeli, oohi ifayita.
Yesu aheehana eetthuci awe ni ahaahimerya wiira: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira nthiyana nankhwele oohuv'ola hovaha nkasani yo'tthuvo wowaapwaha atthu othene.
Nlattu, othene yaavaha itthu yoohalahala muthacirini mwaya, nanso ula muhuvani mwawe, hovaha yothene yarinawe.
Waakhumawe inupa ittakattifu eetthuci mmoca ahonhimerya: Mwalimu, moone, maluku menci ale ni cootekiya nnya!
Yesu ahaakhula: Unawoona cootekiya nnye cuulupale? Khaninhala ukhala nluku nootataanihinya ni nluku nikhwaya; othene anaahala ukwanulaciya.
Yesu ahonkoma wamwaakoni wo Olivera, uhoolo waya inupa ittakattifu, vano Peturu, Yakopu, Yohani ni Anteree yahonkoha ntthikini wiira:
Unihimerye, cinhala wiirannyaa yakhani nnya citthu nnya? Ni inhala ukhala ikanyeroni inthoonyera wiira citthu nnye ciri wakhiviru?
Yesu aheera: Mwiinemecere, wiira hikhale nohala wuuthepyani.
Maana enci anaahala uwa mwa ncina naka yiiraka: Phi mi! Ni anaahala waathepyaca atthu enci.
Ukati unhalenyu wiiwa wuuluminya co'khotto ni mwaha wo'khotto; mwiiwaka nhituthuwe, kontha unaalamuliya wiiranyaa commo, nanso khunakhalaka wuumaleloni.
Ilapo inaahala waana ni ilapo ikhwaya, ni umwene unaahala waana n'umwene nkhwawe. Inaahala uvola itala, ni mapuro menci itthaya inaahala uttettemela. Cothene nnyo cinthoonyera upacera wo mahuviho.
Nkhale miitho! Anaahala wurwehani upwaroni, ni anaahala uwaafyulacani mmasinakokani. Nlattu wawaka nnaarwaaninya wa alamuli ni mamwene, wiira mwakhale asaahiti wa yaayo.
Nanso woopacera nhupi woorera unaahala uhimeriya maloko othene.
Vano mwakusiyaka wiira mwatthukiye, nhoove itthu inhalenyu uhimya. Nanso nhimye itthu inhalenyu uvahiya ukati yooyo, kontha khannakhalaka nyu nnohala wuulumaca, nanso Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Ntthu ni munnawe anaahala wiivihana; thumwana ntthu ni mwanawe; asaana waahanyuriha athumwanaya, mpaka weeva.
Nnaahala wiinananinya nlattu wo ncina naka, nanso ule nohala ulipelela irima mpaka ummaleloni, naahala woopwa.
Moonaka miikho cowoopiha ni colava nipuro nahalamuliya ukhumelela, ntthu nosoma uyo eeweehe! Vano ale ari uYuteya atthawele umyaakoni.
Ule ri wancaarani hikhuruwe, hata hikele mpaani wiira akuse itthu,
ni ntthu ri umattani hituruwele uwani wiira akuse ikacako awe.
Kaasope ale anhala ukhala ni irukulu ni ale anhala waamwiha yooyo ukati uyo!
Nvekele wiira ukati wootthawa uhikhale iyiita.
Nlattu mahuku ale ankokhala mahuviho menci ahinatoko ukhumelela yompiyeru ittuninya ni hata khanhala ukhumelela tho.
Ni Apwiya yahaakhuvehile mahuku ale, hata ntthu mmoca khoopwa, nanso nlattu wa atthu oothanliya ni Nluku, uyo hokhuveha.
Akhalaka ntthu nohala uwiirelani: Mesiya ula va! Atthuna: Wamoone ri nwe! Nhikupali.
Kontha anaahala ukhumelela asimesiya enci owootha, ni minapiyu cowootha ni anaahala upanka ikanyero cinci ni cootikhineeha wiira yaathepyace atthu, wanooryaya pooti waathepya oothanliya.
Nanso nyu, nkhale miitho; kihoohimeryani cothene marapuroru.
Nanso yaayo mahuku ayo, anamanle mahuviho ale, ncuwa ninaahala uripela, ni mweeri khunhala waarya,
itthoottwa co wirimu cinaahala umora, ni ikuru co nculu cinaahala uttinkihiya.
Vano naahala wooniya Mwanawe Pinatamu, awaaka mmahutteni ni ikuru cuulupale ni nttittimiho.
Naahala waaruma ancelo awe ni waathukumaniha atthu yaathanlilyawe o malootho oomacese o'lapo, mpaka umalenlyaya ilapo ni umalenlyaya irimu.
Mwiitthuce nlikanihero no mwiri wo nfikera. Ukati umpaceraya uphuwela matakhuru, nyu nnaacuwela wiira iyiita iri wakhiviru.
Phimaana, moonaka nnya citthu cothene nnya, ncuwele wiira uyo ri wakhiviru ni wa nkhora.
Mi kinawuhimeryani wiira khanimmira nna nloko nna cihinaya wiirannyaa cothene nnya.
Irimu ni itthaya cinaamala, nanso moolumo aka khaammala.
Nanso khaawo nocuwela nihuku atthuna ukati, hata ancelo ari wirimu, hata Mwana, ancuwela paahi Apaapa.
Nkhale miitho, nrontte! Nlattu khannocuwela nihuku ninhalaya uphiya ukati ule.
Uri toko ntthu aalakenle ikwaha awe, ahiyaka inupa awe, ahaahiyera iyuulupale arumeyi awe, khula ntthu ahovahiya nteko woovara, ni ahonlamulela mayorontta wiira arontte.
Vano nrontte, kontha khannocuwela ukati unhalawe uwa mwanene itthoko; toko yocoocilo, atthuna uhiyu iriyari, atthuna uneepile nthupi, atthuna wicisu,
wahikhumelele wiira, nawile ni wututuserani, huphwanyeni nrupaka.
Itthu inoohimeryakani nyu, kinahimerya atthu othene: Nrontte!
Yaahanle mahuku meeli uphiya isikuhuulu yo Paasikuwa ni nihuku ninliyaya mikatthe coohi miropo. Akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha yaavya mananna oontthuka wo makhuce n'umwiiva.
Yeera coo: Itthu ila ihiirannye mahuku o'sikuhuulu wiira atthu ayo ahipanke ipokoho.

Yesu nari uPetaniya, nonkomile wameeca uwannyawe Simoni namakuttula, ahowa nthiyana, nakusile iphotiri yo nluku na alapasturu inheliya makhura oonukhela yeehaninya nartu, oorika nttenko, ahopwesa iphotiri ile ni aheetthela makhura mmuru wawe Yesu.
Nanso akina yahonyonyinya, yiirelanaka ayaayoru: Anhononacerani ala makhura ala?
Yaantumihiya ni ncurukhu iminya ttharu, ni ncurukhu uyo waakawela amasikiini. Ni yahonkuphula nthiyan'ole.
Nanso Yesu aheera: Mwaahiye! Nnakuphulacerani athiyana ala? Ala ahokipankela itthu yomaana.
Kontha, amasikiini ankhalesa ni nyu, ni mwatthunaka nnawoorya waapankela coorera, nanso miyano akinkhala ni nyu mahuku othene.
Ale ahopanka itthu yoonryaya. Ahoottiha ni makhura irutthu aka ahoolelihaka uvithiya waka kihinaya ukhwa.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, nipuro phi nipuro no'ttuniya unhalaya ulalennya nhupi woorera, inaahimiya itthu ipankilyawe wiira yuupuweleliye.
Vano, Yuta Iskariyoti, mmoca mwa ale khumi n'eeli, ahorwaa wa akhulupale o mayasataka wiira antumihe Yesu.
Weewilyaya moolumo ale, cahaatteela mirima ni yahovaanela unliva ncurukhu. Vaavale Yuta aamwaavya nafasi oontumiha Yesu.
Nihuku noopacera no mikatthe coohi miropo, ukati waveleelihiya mwakhontwaa o Paasikuwa, eetthuci yahonkoha Yesu: Untthuna wiira nuutthenkemanihereke vayi nipuro nonlelya Paasikuwa?
Ahaaruma eetthuci eeli ni aheerela: Murwee uparasa. Nnaahala umphwanya ntthu oocisa mwaapu wo maasi. Muntthare
ni munhimerye mwanene itthoko eyo wiira: Mwalimu naakoha: Iri vayi inupa inhalaka umaka ni kinlyaka Paasikuwa n'eetthuci aka?
Vano uyo naahala wuthoonyerani nsana nuulupale niri uculu, nooratteliya ni nootthenkemanihinya. Mwaatthenkace mommo.
Eetthuci ale ukhuma waya, yahorwaa uparasa, ni yahophwanya toko caahimeriyaya, ni yahontthenkemaniha Paasikuwa.
Wiila waya, Yesu ahophiya n'eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli.
Anonkomacile alyaka, Yesu aheera: Khweli kinawuhimeryani, mmoca wa nyu, nolya ni mi, naakuuluma makhuce.
Yahopacera ucukulaca, yiirelanaka ayaayoru: Kaahiki phi mi?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Phi mmoca mwa nyu khumi n'eeli, nokilyana nttiisi nimoca.
Mwana a Pinatamu naarwa, toko cantikhiyaya cimwaacaka yooyo, nanso hotakhaliya ule nohala umuuluma makhuce! Phatari hiyariye!
Walyaya, Yesu ahokusa nkatthe ni ahosukurwela, ahomyaniha ni ahaakawela eetthuci awe, eeraka: Nkuseke ni nlyeke, ila phi irutthu aka.
Wahoolo ahokusa ikikhompe, ahosukuru ni ahaavaha ni othene yahowurya.
Ni ahaahimerya eeraka: Ila phi iphome aka, iphome yo nleehano nonaanano, invuviheriya atthu enci.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira akinhala uwurya tho nhokorokho wo nvitera mpaka nihuku ninhalaka uwurya wumweneni wa Nluku.
Paahi, aneepile ncipo, yahokhumaca arwaaka umwaakoni wo Olivera.
Vano Yesu aheerelaca: Yoola uhiyu ula, nnaahala ukihiya. Maana ihantikhiya wiira: Kinaanrakaliha nhakheli ni ikhontwaa cinaamwaryaca.
Nanso, konwelelaka, kinaahoolela uKalileya.
Peturu aheera: Pooti wuuhiya atthu othene, nanso mi akinoohiya.
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khweli kinawuhimeryani, ilelo uhiyu ula, nthupi uhinaya wiipa imaara piili, unaakiruna imaara ttharu.
Nanso Peturu ahopwahera waakhula eeraka: Hata kilamuliye ukhwa ni nyu, akinoorunani. Ni othene yahoolumaca ciicale.
Yahorwaa nipuro neehaninya Yetsemani, ni Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe wiira: Munkome va, mi kinkoswali.
Ahonkusa Peturu, Yakopu, ni Yohani, ni ahopacera ucukula n'ukhuna masakha.
Vano aheerelaca eeraka: Iroho aka inaacukula venci, icuku co nookhwa; nkhalace va, ni nronttace.
Ahorwaa uhoolo vakani, ahokhoroma ni ahovekela wiira: Wooryanyaa, ula ukati ula ukipwahe.
Ni eera: Paapa, nyu nnawoorya cothene. Ikipwahe ila ikikhompe ela! Wahikhale toko cintthunaka, nanso toko cintthunenyu.
Vaavale, ahohokoleela nipuro naari eetthuci awe, ahaaphwanya arupacaka ni ahonkoha Peturu eeraka: Simoni, unaarupa? Khawoonrye urontta hata iwora imoca?
Nrontte ni nvekele, wiira uhuuphwanyeni uttehattehiya, kontha nnepa uri woolipa, nanso irutthu iri yookenkennyaa.
Ahorwaa tho uswali, aakulelihaka moolumo yaayo.
Ahoturuwa tho ni ahaaphwanya arupaka kontha miitho aya yahocara ikhove. Ni khayaarina yomwaakhula.
Ahowa imaara yoneeraru ni aheerela coo: Nyu nanlelo nnaarupa n'umumula? Wahotosa! Ukati uhophiya ni Mwana a Pinatamu neera avahereriyaka mmatatani mwa anatampi.
Munwe ni nirwee! Namakhuce uyo hophiya.
Oolumacak'ono nanlelo, ahowa Yuta, mmoca wa ale khumi n'eeli ale, nari ni mphwinko wa anakatana ni ikupitti, yaarumiye na akhulupale o mayasataka, mayowantikha ni mahumu o'ttiini.
Namakhuce ahaavaha ikanyero eeraka: Nohalaka unsalamih'oyo n'unkapatta, phi yooyo, munvare, muntthuke ni munkuse ratta.
Uphiya wawe, ahomwaattamerya ni ahomwiirela: Mwalimu! Ni ahonsalameeha.
Yahommara Yesu, ni yahontthuka.
Vano, mmoca mwa ale eemenle wonwo, ahotholola ikatana ahonrakaliha n'unthikila nnyaru na nrumeyi a nkhulupale o mayasataka.
Yesu aheera: Mwile ni ikatana ni ikupitti wiira mwakitthuke toko kinhoolela mphwinko wowaatuphela atthu?
Mahuku othene keetthuciha wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu nanso nyu khankitthukile. Nanso cowantikhiya cinlamuliya utthariheleliya.
Vano, anhiyaka, othene yahotthawa.
Ni ahontthara mmirawo mmoca eekhunenle ikuwo. Yahommara,
nanso ahiyaka ikuwo ile, ahotthawa pwitipwiti.
Yahonrweeha Yesu wa nkhulupale o mayasataka wathukumannyaya othene akhulupale o mayasataka, mayowantikha ni mahumu.
Peturu ahontthara nttayi nttayi mpaka ipuwa ya nkhulupale o mayasataka. Vaavale ahonkoma wamoca na anarontta ootthaka mooro.
Vano, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mphwinko wa akhulupale othene yaamwaavya nantuthi owiira amwiive Yesu, nanso khayaaphwanyile.
Enci yaanahimya cowootha, nanso caahimilyaya khaweerana.
Ahaawo yeemenle ni uromola yowootha ila yiiraka:
Hi nihomwiiwa eeraka: Kinaahala ukwanyula inupa ela, itekiye ni matata a atthu, ni mahuku mararu kinaahala uteka ikina yoohitekiya ni matata a atthu.
Nanso, hata ciicammo usaahiti aya khaweeranne.
Vano, nkhulupale o mayasataka aheemela ni ahonkoha Yesu eeraka: We khunaakhula cinooriyelelaya ala atthu ala?
Nanso Yesu ahomaala. Vano nkhulupale o mayasataka ahonkoha tho: We uKristu, Mwana a Nluku Oottottopeliya?
Yesu ahaakhula: Phi yeemi, ni nnaahala umoona Mwanawe Pinatamu nonkomile moono nlopwana wa Nluku o'kuru cothene, ni awaaka mmahutteni o wirimu.
Vano, nkhulupale o mayasataka ahaahula coowara cawe ni aheera: Nimphavelacerani tho usaahiti?
Maana nhomwiiwa wakufuru wawe va! Nnoonela cani? Na atthu othene yahonhukhumu ukhwa.
Wahoolo, akina yaanapacera unsuwela, yahonkhunela wiitho ni ikuwo n'umwaatta yiiraka: Ulohe! Ni mayorontta yahonkusa n'umwaattakaca.
Peturu neemenle vate wapuwani, ahophiya nanteko mwanthiyana a muulupale a mayasataka.
Umoona wawe Peturu ootthaka mooro, ahomwehecesa ni ahomwiirela: We ciicammo waari ni Yesu o'Nasaree.
Ule nanso ahoruna, eeraka: Akinoncuwela, hata akineeweeha inhimyaa iyo. Wahoolo ahokhumela vate iluwani, ni nthupi waheepa.
Nanteko mwanthiyana, umoona wawe tho, ahaahimerya atthu yaattamanannyawe: Ula phi mmocaru.
Nanso ahoruna imaara yonapiili. Ukati vakani tho, ale yaari mmo, yahonhimerya Peturu: Khweli we phi mmocaru, kontha uri nkalileya.
Nanso aholapha ni aholupela eeraka: Akinoncuwela ntthu nnomwaacenyu uyo!

Wowaakuvyaca wene nthupi waheepa imaara yonapiili. Vano, Peturu ahoopuwela nuulumo naahimeriyawe ni Yesu wiira: Nthupi uhinaya wiipa imaara piili, we unaahala ukiruna imaara ttharu. Ni vaavale ahopacera wunla.
Usakaru, yahothukumana akhulupale o mayasataka wamoca ni mahumu ni mayowantikha, ni mphwinko wa akhulupale othene, ni untthuka waya Yesu, yahonkusa ni yahonveleela wa Pilatu.
Pilatu ahonkoha eeraka: We uMwene a ayuta? Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: We uhohimya.
Ni akhulupale o mayasataka yahonriyelela citthu cinci.
Pilatu ahonkoha tho eeraka: Khunaakhula itthu? Woone, citthu cinci cinriyeleliyaa na atthu ala.
Yesu nanso khaakhunle tho itthu, ni Pilatu ahotikhina.
Nihuku no'sikuhuulu, Pilatu aholemalela untthukula ntthu mmoca yaantthunaya atthu.
Ahaawo nlopwana eehaninya Parapasi, aatthukiye wamoca na anaporonka nlattu yaamwiivile ntthu ukati wo nkhitto.
Atthu enci yahonwa ni yahopacera ulepela itthu yalemalenlyaya upankeliya.
Pilatu ahaakhula eeraka: Nnotthuna wiira kintthukule mwene a ayuta?
Nlattu ahocuwela wiira akhulupale o mayasataka yaamwiihenre nlattu woonrama.
Nanso akhulupale o mayasataka yaanatheperya mphwinko wiira phatari Pilatu antthukule Parapasi.
Pilatu ahaakoha eeraka: Kinhala umwiiriha isiyani ula nnomwiihanenyu mwene a ayuta?
Na ale yaankhuwaca tho: Unkhomele wansalapani!
Pilatu ahaakoha tho eeraka: Pankileni yoonanara? Nanso ale yaantepaca ukhuwela nwe yiiraka: Unkhomele wansalapani!
Pilatu, atthunaka waamaaliha atthu ale, ahaatthukulela Parapasi, ni aholamula wiira Yesu apsuliye ni akhomeliye wansalapani.
Anatoropa yahonrweeha Yesu uhano, ni wahoolo yahothukumana nikhoto nothene.
Yahonwariha ihancu yooceremela, ni yahonwariha ikhara yo miiwa wamuru wawe.
Wahoolo yahopacera unkoha nrettele yiiraka: Salama, Mwene a ayuta!
Yaanamwaatta wamuru ni nthale ni yaanansuwela ni ankhoromelaka yaananlapela.
Wamanlyaya untarawaca yahonrula ihancu yooceremela n'unwariha ikuwo cawe. Vano yahonkumihera vate wiira akhomeliye wansalapani.
Simoni nsirene, athumwane Alisantere ni Rufu, aakhuma umattani, ahokhanyererihiya ukusa nsalapa.
Yahonrweeha nipuro neehaninya Kolokota, maanaya, nipuro no'kohi.
Yahommaha ivinyu yootakaniheriya ni miira, nanso ahokhotta uwurya.
Wahoolo yahonkhomela wansalapani. Ni akawelanaka coowara cawe, yaavyaka iparakha yaahalawe uphwanya khula ntthu.
Yaari iwora yoneeraru wakhomeliyawe wansalapani.
Waculu wawe yahaantikhiya yaariyeleliyawe: mwene a ayuta.
Yahokhomeliya wamoca n'ule, anamwinnya eeli, mmoc'oyo moono nlopwana, nkin'oyo moono nthiyana.
Ciicammo cootthariheleliya cowantikhiya cineera: Ahaalikeliya na atthu oonanara nrima.
Atthu yaavira ayo, yaananruwana, apukunyaka muru, yiiraka: We, watankulaca inupa ittakattifu n'uteka wo mahuku mararu.
Ukhuruwe wansalapani ni wiicoopole o mwanene aa!
Ciicammo, akhulupale o mayasataka, mayowantikha ni mahumu o'ttiini, yaanantarawaca yiiraka: Hoopola akina ni khanoorya wiicoopola mwanene.
Kristu, Mwene o'Sirayeli, ukhuruwe wansalapani wiira niwoone ni wukupali! Na ale yaakhomelaniyawe yaananruwana.
Waphilyaya ukati wo'thana ipiphi yahokhunela ilapo yothene mpaka iwora yoneeraru yocoocilo.
Uphiya waya iwora yoneeraru yocoocilo Yesu ahokhuwa ni ncu nowiirunya eeraka: Eli, Eli, lama sapaktani! Maanaya: Nluku aka! Nluku aka! Ukihiyenreni?
Vano akina yaari vaavale, umwiiwa waya, yaheera: Mwiiwe! Uyo nomwiihana Eliya!
Mmoca mwa ale ahotthimakaca uwiiha ntthoce nooheliya makari ahotthukelela muntathini ni ahonvaha wiira awurye, ni ahohimya: Noone wiira Eliya naawa unkurusela vathi.
Yesu ahokhuwela ni ncu nowiirunya ni ahokhwa.
Vano ikuwo yo mpaani mo'nupa ittakattifu yahaahuwa iriyariru ukhuma uculu mpaka vathi.
Nhooleli a anatoropa eemenle cooco waaryawe Yesu, umoona wawe akhwaaka ciicale, aheera: Khweli ula aari Mwana a Nluku!
Yahaawo tho athiyana yeemenle uttayi amwehaka; mwa ale ahaawo Mariya Mantalena, Mariya anumwane Yakopu aari mwankani ni Yusufu, ni Salome.
Waaryawe Yesu uKalileya yaayo yahontthara n'unvarela nteko, ni athiyana akina enci yaanvelenle waakenlyawe uYerusalemu.
Wiila waya, maana waari ukati wowiitthenkaciya nihuku no ntivela,
ahowa Yusufu o wArimateya, humu oocuwanyaa ni oottitthima, aakhuluvenle uwa wo'mwene wa Nluku, aholipa nrima mpaka urwaa wa Pilatu ni aholepela nrutthu wa Yesu.
Pilatu ahaakaaka wiiwa wawe wiira hokhwa, ni ahomwiihana nhooleli a anatoropa n'unkoha akhala wiira khwile mwaakhalayi.
Nahimeriye ni muulupale uyo, nrutthu ahovahiya Yusufu.
Yusufu nathumile ikuwo, ahokurusa nrutthu wansalapani, ni ahokhuneela ni ikuwo eyo. Wahoolo ahosikha mmahiye yaathipiye wamwalani ni ahottiyela ni nluku nuulupale wankhora wo mahiye.
Mariya Mantalena ni Mariya anumwane Yusufu yahoona nipuro naavithiyawe.
Uvira waya nihuku no ntivela, Mariya Mantalena, Mariya anumwane Yakopu ni Salome yahothuma makhura oonukhela ni yahorwaa uttikitthela nrutthu wa Yesu.
Wicisu ncuwa nikhumaka nihuku noopacera no'sumana, yahorwaaca umahiye.
Yaanawaakaka yiiraka: Tipani nokela unitamihera nluku niri wankhora wo mahiye?
Nanso uphiya waya, yahoona wiira nluku nuulupale nne nahotamihiya.
Ukela waya mmahiye yahomoona mmirawo nonkomile moono nlopwana, aawanre ihancu yootteela, ni yahoovaca.
Uyo aheerela: Nhoove! Nyu nnomwaavya Yesu o'Nasaree, aakhomeliye wansalapani. Uyo honwelela! Khaawo va. Moone nipuro namweesilyaya.
Vano, murwee, mwaahimerye eetthuci awe ni Peturu wiira Yesu nawuhoolelani mpaka uKalileya. Wonwo nnaahala umoona toko coohimenryaweni.
Athukumelacaka ni yoovaka, athiyana ale yahokhumaca umahiye nwe ni yahotthawaca. Khayanhimenrye ntthu nlattu wo woova.
Nonwelenle, wicisu aya nihuku noopacera isumana, Yesu ahonkhumelela woopacera Mariya Mantalena, yoola ankumihilyawe macini saapa.
Uyo ahorwaa waacuweliha ale yaari ni Yesu, yeetta acukulaka ni yiikhupanyaka.
Ale nanso, wiiwa waya wiira Yesu ri nkumi, ni Mariya ahomoona, khayaakupanli.
Wahoolo aheeconeeha nnanna nkina wasilopwana eeli yeetta ni iphiro, arwaaka umawaani.
Ayo yahoturuwa wiira yacuwelihe akhwaya, nanso na ayo khayaakupanli.
Wahoolo waya, Yesu ahaakhumelela eetthuci awe khumi na mmoca alyaka, ni ahaakuphula nlattu woohikupali ni uturumala waya nrima, kontha khayaakupanli ale yaamoonne nonwelenle.
Ni aheerela coo: Murwee ittuniya yothene mwaalaleere atthu othene nhupi woorera.
Ntthu nohala ukupali ni upattisiya naahala woopwa, nanso ntthu hinhala ukupali, naahala uhukhumwiya.
Ikanyero cinhala waatthara atthu ookupali phi nnya: Mwa ncina naka, ankowoomola minepa coonanara, ankowuuluma moolumo onaanano;
ankovara inwaa, ni yawuryaka itthu yowiiva, khinhala waapanka itthu; ammowaathatela matata aretta, na ale anaahala uvona.
Vano, Apwiya Yesu umaliha waya wuulumaca, yahaakheleliya wirimu, ni ahonkoma moono wo nlopwana wa Nluku.
Vano eetthuci yahokhuma ni yahorwaa ulaka mapuro othene ni Apwiya yahaakavihera, yooneehaka nuulumo na Apwiya ni ikanyero cavelenle.
Nyu oolemelihiya Teyofilu, atthu enci ahophavela wantikha cookhumelela caahiminye, ciiraneele wariyari wihu,
toko cinihimyacenryaya atthu yaari asaahiti ukhuma wupaceroni, yooneehile ni avanre nteko woohimya nuulumo.
Mi ciicammo kihaavya ucuwela ratta citthu ciiraneele ukhuma wupaceroni ni kiholakela uwantikhelani, nyu oolemelihiya Teyofilu,
wiira ncuweleehe maanaya citthu ciitthucihiyenyu.
Heroti, ukati waaryawe mwene o'lapo yo'Yuteya, ahaawo mayasataka eehaninya Sakariya, aari o mphwinko wo mayasataka Apiyasi. Ule ahaana amwaarawe yeehaninya Isapeli, yaari o nloko na Aroni.
Oyeeli yaari o'sariya wamiithoni wa Nluku, yaanaweettela malamulo ni ikano ca Apwiya woohicovaciya.
Khayaarina asaana, kontha Isapeli aari mwali eekupa ni oyeeli yahooluvalaca.
Nkwaha mmoca, mphwinko wa Sakariya unakenle nteko, ahorwaa uvaha isataka wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Toko caalemalenlyaya mayasataka, Sakariya wahommorela mwaavi wookela inupa ittakattifu ya Apwiya, wiira ampahe lumpani.
Waaphilyaya ukati woopahiya lumpani, mphwinko wothene wa atthu waari vate uvekelaka.
Vano ahonweela ncelo a Apwiya eemenle moono nlopwana wo'khipula yoopahiya lumpani.
Sakariya woonnyawe, ahotuthuwa ni ahoopihiya venci.
Nanso ncelo ahomwiirela: Sakariya uhoove, kontha uvekela waa nwo uheewiya, amwaaraa Isapeli anaahala unnyara mwana, ni unhala unvaha ncina na Yohani.
Yooyo naahala wuutteeliha nrima ni ummootthapa. Ciicammo atthu enci ankotteeliya mwa nlattu wooyaryaa mwan'oyo,
kontha nohala ukhala muulupale wamiithoni wa Apwiya. Uyo khanhala uwurya ivinyu hata yoohapala ni nokoocariya Nnepa Nttakattifu, ikhumelo mmirimani mwa anumwane,
ni naahala waaturusela atthu enci o'Sirayeli wa Apwiya Nluku aya.

Yooyo, nokorwaa uhoolo wa Apwiya. Unaahala uncara nnepa ni ikuru toko caarinawe Eliya, wiira aaturuselihe mirima mayoyara na asaanaya, ni aaturuselihe mirima atthu oohanyuriha wiira yeettele ikano ca anasariya wiira Apwiya atthenkaceriye atthu anhala waakhelela.
Vano Sakariya ahonkoha ncelo ule eeraka: Kinhala ucuwela cani itthu iyo? Kontha mi kihooluvala ni amwaaraka ayo ciicammo.
Vano ncelo ule ahaakhula eeraka: Mi Kapiriyeli, kinkhala wamoca ni Nluku ukati wothene, kihooruminya uwuulumana ni wuuhimyacera nnya citthu nnya.
Vano unhala ukhala oohuulumaca mpaka uphiya nihuku ninhalaya ukhumelela nnya citthu nnya, kontha khukupanli moolumo aka, nanso inaahala ukhumelela ihimilyaka waphiyaka ukati aya.
Vano atthu yammwehererya Sakariya yahotikinihinya nlattu woopica mpaani mo'nupa ittakattifu.
Nanso ukhuma wawe khoorya wuulumaca. Vano atthu ale yahocuwelela wiira yahomphwanya iyooni waaryawe mpaani mo'nupa ittakattifu. Phimaana woohimyaca itthu phi itthu, aanthoonyaca ni khoolumaca.
Vano waaphiyenryaya mahuku o wiinuwa nteko, ahorwaa uwannyawe.
Uvira waya ale mahuku ale, amwaarawe yeehaninya Isapeli yahorupala irukulu ni yaheevithavitha ukati wo myeeri mithanu ni yaheera:
Apwiya ahokiwehanana woorera wiira atamihe ihaaya caka wamiithoni wa atthu othene.
Waaphiyeraya myeeri siita, Nluku ahonveleeliha ncelo Kapiriyeli wiira arwee isittatti yo'Kalileya, yeehaninya Nasaree,
wiira amphwanye mwali oopakaneliya ni nlopwana eehaninya Yusufu aari o nloko na Taviti. Mwali uyo eehaninya Mariya.
Vano waaphilyawe ncelo ule mpaka waaryawe Mariya, aheera: Salama Mariya, uhovahiya nnema, Apwiya ari ni we!
Nanso ule, wiiwa wawe nuulumo nno, ahotuthuwa venci ni ahoopuwela eeraka: Hinsalamani yeela?
Vano ncelo ule aheera: Mariya, uhoove! Kontha uhovahiya nnema wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Maana unaahala urupala irukulu n'unnyara mwana, nohalaa unvaha ncina na Yesu.
Yooyo nohala ukhala muulupale ni nokowiihaninya Mwana o wirimu, ni Mwanene Nluku naahala unvaha ihice yo'mwene wa Taviti, athumwane.
Ni naahala ulamula woohimala nloko na Yakopi ni umwene awe khummala tho.
Vano Mariya ahonkoha ncelo ule, eeraka: Wanhala ukhala cani? Mi, kakhaleru akinatoko unthukumanana nlopwana.
Vano ncelo ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Unawukhuruwela Nnepa Nttakattifu, ikuru ca Nluku o wirimu ni irunku awe inawuukhunela. Ciicammo Nttakattifu nohalaa unnyara, nohala wiihaninya Mwana a Nluku.
Vano ucuwele wiira, nloko aa Isapeli horupala irukulu nooluvanlene. Ula phi mweeri wonasiita nari ni irukulu, yoole eereliya ule mwali eekupa.
Kontha Nluku khiiwo itthu inoolwanawe.
Vano Mariya ahaakhula eeraka: Phi mi va karumeya a Apwiya. Ikiirannyee toko cuulumacilyaa. Ni ncelo ule ahokhuma waaryawe Mariya vale.
Yaayo mahuku ayo, Mariya ahokhuma wowaakuvyaca wene ni ahorwaa nttetthe wo'myaakoni, uryaya isittatti imoca yo'Yuteya,
ahorwaa uwannyawe Sakariya ni ahonsalameeha Isapeli.
Vano ule wiiwa wawe isalama ya Mariya, mwana ule ahowunawuna mmirimani mwa Isapeli ni Isapeli wahoncara Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Vaavale ahokhuwela venci eeraka: Uhoreriya we wariyari wa athiyana othene ni horeriya mwana nohalaa unnyara uyo!
Kimpani mi owiira kithotoliye na anumwanaya Apwiya aka?
Kontha wiiwa waka ncu no'salama enyu, mwanaka uyo howunawuna n'utteeliya mmirimani mwaka mmo.
Horeriya ule kupanli, kontha cinaahala utthariheleliya cuulumacilyaya Apwiya.
Vano Mariya aheera: Nnepa aka unawonnuwiha Apwiya,
ni iroho aka ihotteeliya wamiithoni wa Nluku Moopoli aka.
Kontha hommwehanana karumeya awe owiiyeviha; phimaana ukhuma nenna va atthu othene anhala ukiihana ooreriya.
Kontha Ule ri o'kuru cothene hokipankela citthu cuulupale; ncina nawe ri Nttakattifu.
Ni ikiriri cawe naahala waathoonyera ale ammoova, wo khula nloko.
Ni moono awe, hopanka citthu cuulupale. Haamwarusa ale yaacariha moopuwelo owiisamiha wanrimani waya.
Haawulusa wahiceni atthu o'kuru ni haaweliha atthu owiiyeviha.
Haacariha nhakhu amasikiini ni hoomola woohi itthu mathaciri.
Honkavihera Sirayeli karumeya awe, wiira oopuwelele ikiriri cawe,
anfentelelaka Aparahamu ni ucuulu awe, ukati woohimala, toko caakhuluvelihilyawe mayapaapehu.
Vaavale Mariya ahokhala wamoca ni Isapeli wookhalaka myeeri miraru ni wahoolo ahoturuwela uwannyawe.
Vano Isapeli ahopiihera mahuku oorukurerya nipirothi ni ahonnyara mwana mwanlopwana.
Aattamanani awe ni alokwawe yaheewa wiira Apwiya ahomunnuwiha Isapeli ni ikiriri caya ni atthu othene yaananthyana.
Waapiihenryawe mahuku naane, mwana ule ahoolihiya icantto ni aaphaveliya uvahiya ncina na athumwane yeehaninya Sakariya.
Nanso anumwane yahoolumaca yiiraka: Mena, uyo nolamuliya wiihaninya Yohani.
Atthu ale yaheera: Khaawo nlokwaa rina nenno ncina nno.
Vano atthu ale yahonkoha Sakariya athoonyacaka yiiraka: Unonvaha ncinani?
Vaavale, Sakariya aholepela nipawu ni ahantikha coo: Yohani phi ncina nawe. Ni othene yahotikinihinya.
Wowaakuvya wene, Sakariya yahonhulya malaku ni nahontthukuwa nlimi nawe, ni ahopacera wuulumaca anttottopelaka Nluku.
Vano aattamanani awe othene yahoova, ni caanahimyaciya nnya citthu nnya nttetthe wothene wo'myaakoni co'Yuteya.
Atthu othene yeewa, yaanasunka wanrimani waya yiiraka: Nohala ukhala cani yoola mwana ula? Kontha ntata na Apwiya naari ni yoole.
Vaavale Sakariya athumwane mwana ule, wahaacara Nnepa Nttakattifu ni yahopacera ulalya yiiraka:
Attottopeliye Apwiya Nluku o'Sirayeli, kontha ahaathotola ni waataphula atthu aya.
Aniwiihenre woopwa wo'kuru ukhuma nloko na Taviti, karumeya aya,
toko cuulumacilyaya wamalakuni wo minapiyu cittakattifu ikhumelo khalayi;
wiira anoopole mmatatani mweenani ihu na ale annirama,
wiira yaathoonyihere ikiriri mayapaapehu ni yuupuwele nleehano naya neettakattifu,
ni wiilupelela waapankenlyaya athumwanihu Aparahamu,
unoopola mmatatani mweenani ihu naavarelaka nteko wohoova,
nikhalaka n'uttakattifu ni isariya wamiithoni wawe mahuku othene o'kumi ihu.
Vano we mwanaka, unhala wiihaninya nnapiyu a Nluku o wirimu, kontha unaahala urwaa uhoolo wa Apwiya, wiira utthenkace iphiro caya,
wiira avahe unethi awe ucuwelaci wo woopwa n'uleveleliya wo'tampi caya,
phimaana Nluku ihu ri oocara ikiriri, maana honootola, toko cinkhumaya ncuwa khula wicisu,
wiira aamwaleele ale yuunkomile wiipiphini ni wantthuucini wo nookhwa; ni eettihe inyaa cihu iphiro yo salama.
Phimaana mwana ule aanawunnuwa ni aanakhomaala munnepani, ni aakhala ntakhwani mpaka nihuku naapacenryawe wiithoonyihera uSirayeli.
Yaayo mahuku ayo, Sesari Akusitu ahovaha nlamulo no wantikhiya ntthitto atthu othene o mwiilaponi mwawe.
Ntthitto nno naari noopacera, nantikhaninye Kiriinu nari nlamuli o'Siriya.
Vano atthu othene yaanarwaa wiicantikiha, khula ntthu aarwa usittatti wawe.
Ciicammo Yusufu ahokhuma uKalileya isittatti yo'Nasaree, arwaaka nttetthe wo'Yuteya, isittatti ya Taviti ineehaninya Petelehemu, kontha aari o nihimo ni nloko na Taviti,
wiira eecantikihe wamoca ni Mariya amwaarawe, anari ni irukulu.
Vano anaryene wonwo, yahophiyera mahuku awe ooyara.
Ahonnyara mwana mwanlopwana ontthaara, ni ahonkhuneelaca ni ikuwo, ahomwaatalela nlelyoni mo'nama, kontha khayaarina nipuro noomaka.
Yahaawo ahakheli yaakhalakhalaca mmathalani yoole nttetthe ule, yaarupelelaca inama caya.
Vaavale ahaakhumelela ncelo a Apwiya, ni waarya wa Apwiya wahaarukurerya, ni yahoovaca venci.
Vano ncelo ule aheerelaca coo: Nhoove! Kontha kinoowiiherani nhupi woorera ni wootteeliha nrima, unhala ukhala wa atthu othene.
Ilelo, isittatti ya Taviti, hoyarya moopoli ri Apwiya Kristu.
Vano, nthoonyero unhala ukhala ph'ula: Nnaamphwanya mwana nakhuneelaciye ni ikuwo ni neesiye nlelyoni mo'nama.
Wowaakuvyaca wene wahowa mphwinko wa anakhotto o wirimu wamoca ni ncelo anttottopelaka Nluku yiiraka:
Attittimihiye Nluku Ooculu, isalama vathi va ikhale na atthu avahiye iraati ya Nluku!
Vano ancelo ale ukhuma waya arwaaka wirimu, ahakheli ale yaheerelana ayaayoru: Nrwee mpaka uPetelehemu, noone yeeyo itthu ikhumelenle iyo, Apwiya inicuwelihilyaya.
Yahorwaa wowaakuvyaca wene, ni yahomphwanya Mariya, Yusufu ni mwan'ole naataleliye nlelyoni mo'nama.
Vano umoona waya yahottonkaca moolumo yaahimyaceriyaya amwaacaka mwan'ole.
Atthu othene yeewile, yahotikhinaca wo citthu caahimyacaya ahakheli ale.
Nanso Mariya aanasunka nnya citthu nnya oopuwelelaka wanrimani wawe.
Ahakheli ale yahoturuwaca anttittimihaka ni anttottopelaka Nluku, mwa citthu cothene ceewilyaya ni coonnyaya cikhumelelaka toko caahimyaceriyaya.
Vano uphiyera waya mahuku naane owuulihiya icantto mwana ule, ahovahiya ncina na Yesu toko ncelo ule coolumacilyawe hinarupaliya.
Anavinrene mahuku o wiinanela toko cinhimyaya Nlamulo na Musa, mayathumwane ale yahonkusaca uYerusalemu wiira athoonyiheriye wa Apwiya
toko cantikhiyaya muNlamuloni a Apwiya, wiira: Matthaara othene a asilopwana anlamuliya uvahereriya wa Apwiya,
ni nvahe isataka toko cantikhiyaya muNlamuloni na Apwiya yiiraka: Maciya meeli atthuna makhintta meeli.
UYerusalemu ahaawo nlopwana eehaninya Simeyoni, yooyo nlopwan'oyo aari nasariya ni omoova Nluku, aanawehererya woopoliya wo'Sirayeli, ni Nnepa Nttakattifu waari ni yooyo.
Nnepa Nttakattifu wahoncuweliha wiira khaahala ukhwa himoonne Kristu a Apwiya.
Eettihiyaka ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, ahorwaa inupa ittakattifu. Mayathumwane wammwihilyaya Yesu wiira apankiye ihimilyaya Nlamulo,
Simeyoni ahonkusa mmatatani ni ahonttittimiha Nluku eeraka:
Vano Pwiya, nkihiyeke mi karumeya enyu kikhweke wo'salama, toko wahimilyaya nuulumo ninyu,
kontha miitho aka ahoona woopola winyu
utthenkacilyenyu wamiithoni wa atthu othene,
waarya wo waamwaleela amalaponi othene ni nttittimiho wa annasirayeli ari unethi inyu.
Athumwane na anumwane mwana ule yaanatikhinaca citthu cothene caattonkiya nnyo.
Simeyoni ahaattakattifiha ni ahomwiirela Mariya anumwane mwana: Kinawoona ula heesiya wiira aawuluse ni aawuse atthu enci uSirayeli, ni nohala ukhala nthoonyero woovaanyihana,
wiira moopuwelo o munrimani mwa atthu enci acuwannye. Ciicammo ikatana inaahala uhoma iroho aa.
Ahaawo nnapiyu nthiyana eehaninya Ana, mwana a Fanuweli, nihimo na Aseri, yooyo aari owuuluvala. Ahokhala myakha saapa nari ootheliya, nakhumilene iharusi,
ni ahokhala nankhwele myakha thamanini na micese (84). Khaakhuma inupa ittakattifu, anlapelaka Nluku uhiyu ni uthana avekelaka n'utthuka.
Vano uyo ahophiya ukati yoole ni ahonsukuru Nluku, aahimyaceraka ihaali ca mwan'oyo, atthu othene yaawehererya woopoliya uYerusalemu.
Umaliha waya uvara cothene toko cinhimyaya Nlamulo na Apwiya, yahoturuwelaca uKalileya, isittatti yo'Nasaree.
Mwana ule aanawunnuwa n'ulipa munnepani, acaraka ankhili, ni nnema na Nluku naari ni yooyo.
Khula mwakha mayathumwane yaanarwaa uYerusalemu upanka isikuhuulu yo Paasikuwa.
Vano waapihenryawe myakha khumi na miili yahorwaaca uYerusalemu toko caalemalenlyaya ukati wo'sikuhuulu.
Wamanlyaya mahuku o'sikuhuulu, mayathumwane aturuwelaka uwani, mmirawo Yesu ahohala uYerusalemu, ayo woohicuwela.
Vano ale yooniha toko naawa na asimpwanawe yaatthukannyawe ikwaha, nahovira nihuku nimoca yeettaka. Yaanamwaavya mwa alokwawe ni mwacuweliyawe mothene.
Uhimphwanya waya, yahoturuwela uYerusalemu uvira amwaavyaka.
Vano anavinrene mahuku mararu, yahomphwanya nari wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu nonkomile iriyari ya aalimu, aaviriyanaka ni aakohakohaka.
Ni othene yaamwiiwa yaanatikhina ankhili awe ni ceerawe wowaakhula.
Vano mayathumwane umoonelela waya yahosankaca ni anumwane yahomwiirela coo: Mwanaka, unipankenleni ciicammo? Athumwana ni mi nahosankaca, naanawaavya.
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Mwaakaavyerani? Khannocuwela wiira kinlamuliya ukhalela nthiti citthu ca Apaapa?
Nanso ale khayaacuwelela moolumo yaahimyacerawe.
Vaavale ahokhuruwa ni mayathumwane arwaaka uNasaree, ni aanaweewelela. Nanso anumwane yaanaasunka citthu cothene wanrimani waya.
Vano Yesu aanawunnuwa mwankhilini, mwirutthuni, ni nnema wamiithoni wa Nluku ni wa atthu.

Waapiiherawe Tiperiyu Sesari myakha khumi na mithanu co'lamuli, Ponsiyu Pilatu nari nlamuli o'Yuteya, Heroti nari mwene o'Kalileya, Filipe nhimawe Heroti nari mwene o'Tureya ni uTarakonite, ni Lisaninya nari mwene o wApileni,
Anasi ni Kayifasi anari akhulupale o mayasataka, Yohani mwana a Sakariya, nari ntakhwani, ahaakhela nhupi wa Mwanene Nluku.
Vaavale Yohani aheettakaca ilapo cothene cowaattamanana mooloko Yortani alalyaka upattiso woorukunusa nrima wiira itampi cileveleliye,
toko cantikhiyaya nliivuruni yo moolumo a nnapiyu Isaya yiiraka: Ncu na ntthu nokhuwela ntakhwani niiraka: Nlokihe iphiro ya Apwiya, mookole mittala caya.
Malikitti othene ammowuheleliya, myaako ni masika, cothene cimmopwesakaciya, mapuro oocipuwaca ammowookoliya, ni iphiro coothipakya cimmopapatthiya.
Vano atthu othene anaahala woona woopola wa Nluku.
Vano Yohani aanaahimerya atthu yaawa wiira apattisiye, eeraka: Ikhapila yo'vili, tipani oohimenryeni utthawa uviruwa wa Nluku, unhala uwa?

Nthoonyihere mihokorokho coocuwaneha urukunusa winyu mirima, ni nhiittottope mwiiraka: Nihaana athumwanihu Aparahamu, kontha mi kinawuhimeryani wiira, Nluku nawoorya utatusa ala maluku ala ukhala asaana a Aparahamu.
Ciicammo iheesiya ipaco wamititharini co miri, ni mwiri wothene uhinvaha mihokorokho comaana, unaathikiliya n'uvonyeriya umooroni.
Vano atthu enci yaanankoha yiiraka: Kaahiki hi niireke cani?
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Ule rina ikacako piili, anruleleke hirina, ni ntthu rina iyolya, anvaheke hirina.
Ciicammo yahophiyaca mayoliviha nsoko wiira yapattisiye ni yahonkoha yiiraka: Mwalimu, kaahiki hi niireke cani?
Ule ahaakhulaca eeraka: Nhilivihe mpwahihaka cilamuleliyenyu.
Ciicammo anatoropa yahonkoha yiiraka: Kaahiki hi niireke cani? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Nhintulumu ntthu, nhimootheryace ntthu; ntteeliye ni ile inaakhelenyu.
Vano atthu othene yaanaawehererya itthu yaahala wiirannyaa; phimaana yaanawaanyihera munrimani mwaya yoonihaka toko Yohani phiri Kristu.

Phimaana Yohani ahaahimyacera atthu othene eeraka: Khweli mi kinoopattisani ni maasi, nanso naawa ule rina ikuru impwaha yawaka, yooyo himphwanelaaka utthukula miripwe co'kwakwatta cawe; uyo naahala wuupattisani ni Nnepa Nttakattifu ni mooro.
Haana ithokwa mmatatani mwawe wiira aveerele impeyu yoorera yo'tiriku, akhupele nnikhupini nawe, nanso macasi ayo naahala upaha ni mooro uhinttiphyaa.
Ciicammo ni moolumo makhwawe ookuphula, aanawaahimerya atthu ayo nhupi woorera.
Vano, mwene Heroti, ahokuphuliya ni Yohani nlattu woonthela Herotiya amwaarawe nhimawe, ni citthu cothene coonanara caapankawe Heroti.
Napankilene nnya citthu nnya, ahontthukela Yohani nkalaposo.
Atthu ayo apattisiyak'ono, ciicammo ahopattisiya Yesu, ni avekelak'ono, irimu yahohulyaa,
ni Nnepa Nttakattifu toko ikhuntta inkhuruwelaka, ni naheewiya ncu nikhuwaka wirimu, niiraka: We uMwanaka oofentiya, unkitteeliha nrima.
Yooyo ukati uyo Yesu ahaana wookhalaka myakha talathini (30), waapacerawe uvara nteko awe. Aacuweliya ukhala mwana a Yusufu, ni Yusufu mwana a Eli,
ni Eli mwana a Matate, ni Matate mwana a Levi, ni Levi mwana a Malikhi, ni Malikhi mwana a Yanayi, ni Yanayi mwana a Yusufu,
ni Yusufu mwana a Matatiya, Matatiya mwana a Amosi, Amosi mwana a Nahumu, Nahumu mwana a Esali, Esali mwana a Nakayi,
Nakayi mwana a Maate, Maate mwana a Matatiya, Matatiya mwana a Semeyi, Semeyi mwana a Yoseke, Yoseke mwana a Yotta,
Yotta mwana a Yowana, Yowana mwana a Resa, Resa mwana a Soropapeli, Soropapeli mwana a Salatiyeli, Salatiyeli mwana a Neeri,
Neeri mwana a Malikhi, Malikhi mwana a Ati, Ati mwana a Koosa, Koosa mwana a Elimataa, Elimataa mwana a Eeri,
Eeri mwana a Yosuwe, Yosuwe mwana a Eliyeseri, Eliyeseri mwana a Sorimi, Sorimi mwana a Matate, Matate mwana a Levi,
Levi mwana a Simeyoni, Simeyoni mwana a Yuta, Yuta mwana a Yusufu, Yusufu mwana a Yonaa, Yonaa mwana a Eliyakimi,
Eliyakimi mwana a Meleya, Meleya mwana a Menna, Menna mwana a Matatha, Matatha mwana a Nataa, Nataa mwana a Taviti,
Taviti mwana a Yesee, Yesee mwana a Opete, Opete mwana a Powasi, Powasi mwana a Salaa, Salaa mwana a Naasomi,
Naasomi mwana a Aminatapi, Aminatapi mwana a Atimimu, Atimimu mwana a Arini, Arini mwana a Esiromi, Esiromi mwana a Peresi, Peresi mwana a Yuta,
Yuta mwana a Yakopi, Yakopi mwana a Isaki, Isaki mwana a Aparahamu, Aparahamu mwana a Tera, Tera mwana a Nahori,
Nahori mwana a Siruke, Siruke mwana a Rewu, Rewu mwana a Peleki, Peleki mwana a Heperi, Heperi mwana a Selah,
Selah mwana a Kayinaa, Kayinaa mwana a Arifacate, Arifacate mwana a Seemu, Seemu mwana a Nowee, Nowee mwana a Lameke,
Lameke mwana a Metusalemu, Metusalemu mwana a Enoki, Enoki mwana a Yereti, Yereti mwana a Malaleli, Malaleli mwana a Kayinaa,
Kayinaa mwana a Enosi, Enosi mwana a Seeti, Seeti mwana a Atamu, Atamu mwana a Nluku.
Wahoolo, Yesu nacanre Nnepa Nttakattifu, ahoturuwa uYortani ni ahokusiya ni Nnepa ule, mpaka utakhwani.
Ahokhala wonwo mahuku arupayini (40) ahottehattehiya ni Sotwani. Yaayo mahuku ayo khaalilye itthu ni wiimaleloni yahonvola itala.
Vano Sotwani ahomwiirela coo: We wakhala wiira uMwana a Nluku, ulamulele nna nluku nna wiira nithatuwe nkatthe.
Nanso Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Ihantikhiya wiira: Kuhimwena ni nkatthe paahi phinkhalanawe ntthu ukumi.
Sotwani ahonweliha Yesu nipuro noorekama ni ahomoonihera umwene wothene wo nttuniyani.
Vano Sotwani ahomwiirela coo: Kinawuvaha ulamuli n'uttitthima urinaya, kontha mi kihovahiya, ni mi kinanvaha ule nontthunaka.
Phimaana wakilapelaka mi, citthu cothene cinhala ukhala cawaa.
Vano Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Ihantikhiya wiira: Mwaalapele Apwiya Nluku inyu, yaayo paahi phinphwanela urumeeliya.
Wahoolo ahonrweha uYerusalemu ni ahonweliha nipuro nootepa urekama no'nupa ittakattifu, ni ahomwiirela coo: Wakhala wiira we uMwana a Nluku utuphe va urwaaka vathi,
kontha ihantikhiya wiira: Nluku naahala waaruma ancelo awe wiira yuusunke,
ni wuuvarelela mmatatani mwaya, wiira hata nluku nimoca nihuukakathule nnyaani mwaa.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Ihohimyaciya wiira: Uhaattehattehe Apwiya Nluku aa.
Unamanlene uttehattehiya nwo, Sotwani ahonhiya ukati vakani.
Vano ni ikuru co Nnepa Nttakattifu, Yesu ahoturuwela uKalileya, ni uttitthima wawe wahomwareela mittetthe cothene caanrukurenrye.
Eetthuciha mmasinakokani ni atthu othene yaananttittimiha.
Yesu ahorwaa uNasaree wonnuwenlyawe, nihuku no ntivela ahokela nsinakoka toko caalemalenlyawe, ni ahonwa wiira asome.
Vano ahovahiya iliivuru ya nnapiyu Isaya. Uhula wawe iliivuru iyo, ahophwanya nipuro nantikhiye niiraka:

Nnepa wa Apwiya uri mwa mi, kontha Apwiya Nluku ahokitthapela wiira kaalalyeere nhupi woorera atthu oohuva. Kihoruminya wiira kahimyace utaphuliya wa atthu ootthukiya ni uvonihiya wa atthu oohoona, ni woopoliya wa atthu oohuvihiya,
ni ulalya wiira uhophiya mwakha wo nnema na Apwiya.
Natthyeelene iliivuru ile, ahonturusela nrumeyi o nsinakoka ni ahonkoma. Vano atthu othene yaariwo nsinakoka mmwe yaanammwehecesa venci.
Vano aheerela coo: Ilelo cihotthariheleliya cowantikhiya toko ciiwilenyu.
Vaavale atthu othene yaananttottopela ni yaanatikhinaca moolumacero awe omaana, yiiraka: Khanakhala ula mwana a Yusufu?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Weekhweli, nnaahala ukuulumela nna nikano nna mwiiraka: Tothoro, wiivonihe umwanene, ni upanke ciicammo mmwannyaa mu, cothene ciiwilehu wiira uhopanka uKafarnaumu.
Ni ahopwaherera eeraka: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, khaawo nnapiyu naakheleliya womaana ilapo iyarenlyawe.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, ukati wa Eliya cahaawo minankhwele cinci uSirayeli, waatthukeliyaya irimu myakha miraru ni myeeri siita woohirupa ipula, ivolaka itala ilapo yothene;
nanso khaariwo hata mmoca wa yaayo ankavihenre Eliya nari hikhanle paahi nankhwele mmoca o'Serepita yo'Sitoni.
Ciicammo yahaawo anamakuttula enci uSirayeli ukati wa nnapiyu Eliseu, nanso khaariwo hata mmoca aavonihiye, nari hikhanle paahi Naama o'Siriya.
Vano atthu othene o nsinakoka wiiwa waya ala moolumo ala yahoviruwaca.
Yahonwaca n'umoomolaca nsittatti mmwe ni yahonwelihaca waculu mwaako, ule waari wakhiviru waatekiye isittatti vale, wiira yanvonyere vathi.
Nanso Yesu ahokhuma wariyari waya ni ahorwaa.
Wahoolo ahorwaa uKafarnaumu, isittatti yo'Kalileya, ni aanasomiha mahuku o ntivela.
Atthu othene yahotikinihinya mananna ceetthucihawe, kontha oolumaca ni ulamuli.
Ahaawo nsinakoka mmwe nlopwana aarina ncini, vano ahokhuwa venci
eeraka: Eekhuu! Iri isiyani we ni hi, Yesu o'Nasaree? Waaweenle unoomolaca? Mi kihoocuwela we, uNttakattifu a Nluku!
Nanso Yesu aholamula eeraka: Umaale ni ukhume mwa ntthu ula! Vano ncini nne, nahomphatela ntthu ule vathi iriyari ya atthu othene ni nahokhuma woohinrakalihaca.
Vaavale atthu othene yahotikinihinya ni yaaneerelana ayaayoru: Nuulumoni nna? Mpaka ni ikuru naalamula macini ni ayo anaakhuma!
Phimaana uttitthima wawe nwo wahomwareela mapuro othene o yoole nttetthe ule.
Wahoolo Yesu ahokhuma nsinakoka mmwe ni ahokela mpaani mwa Simoni. Amaathi awe Simoni yaanwerennya venci ikopo ni Yesu aholepeliya wiira aavonihe.
Uyo ahaattamerya ni ahomaaliha ikopo ile, ni iyo yahaahiya. Wowaakuvyaca wene yahonwa ni yahopacera waatafiti.
Ukati waakelaya ncuwa, aanawiiheriya othene yaawerennya iretta cene, ni aanthatela matata wamuru wo khula nretta ni waavoniha.
Ciicammo mwa atthu enci yaanakhuma macini, akhuwelaka yiiraka: We uMwana a Nluku! Nanso uyo aanawaamaaliha ni khaahiya wuulumaca, kontha yaanacuwela wiira yooyo phiri Kristu.
Usa waya, ahokhuma n'urwaa ntakhwani. Vano atthu enci yaanamwaavya mpaka umphwanya nipuro naaryawe, ni yaanankhanyereriha wiira haahiye.
Nanso ule ahaahimyacera eeraka: Ciicammo kinlamuliya ulalya nhupi woorera wo umwene wa Nluku isittatti cikhwawe, kontha yeeyo phiruminyaka.
Paahi aanalalyaa nuulumo na Nluku mmasinakokani co'Yuteya.
Nkwaha mmoca, atthu enci yahomphunyerera Yesu wiira yiiwe nuulumo na Nluku. Aheemela wakhiviru ntthiya no Kenesare.
Vano Yesu ahoona ikalawa piili cinakocenre ncenkweni waya ntthiya nne, kontha mayototha ayo yahokhuma nkalawani mmwe, yaarapihaca matthavi.
Vano, ahokela ikalawa imoca, yaari ya Simoni, ni ahonlepela wiira acuserihele ikalawa ile vakani mmaasini. Vano ahonkoma nkalawani mmwe ni ahopacera usomiha mphwinko ule.
Umaliha wawe wuulumaca nwe, ahomwiirela Simoni: Urwee nipuro no wiisa ni mwavonyerace matthavi inyu wiira ntothe.
Vano Simoni ahaakhula eeraka: Mwalimu, khanimala utotha uhiyu wothene, woohiphwanya itthu, nanso ukhala wiira nyu nhoolumaca, kinaavonyera matthavi ayo.
Vaavale, uvonyeraca waya matthavi ale, yahovarihaca ihopa cinci mpaka matthavi ayo upacera waahuwaca.
Vano yahopacera wuuvelana ntata, yaahimyaceraka asikhwaya yaari ikalawa ikina ile wiira yawaakavihere. Yahorwaaca ni yahocarihaca ihopa, ikalawa coopiili, mpaka uhala vakani uttittha.
Simoni, woonnyawe commo, ahokhoromela wamettoni wa Yesu eeraka: Pwiya, nkhume waryaka va, kontha ki natampi.
Simoni na atthu othene yaarinawe ale yahotikinihinya, mwa nlattu woototha nwe.
Ciicammo Yakopu ni Yohani asaana a Sepeteu, yaari asikhwawe Simoni, yahotikinihinya. Vano Yesu ahomwiirela Simoni: Uhoove, ukhuma nenna va mpaka uhoolo, unhala ukhala mayowaatotha atthu.
Vaavale yahopurulelaca ikalawa nnye ucenkweni, yahohiyaca cothene ni yahonttharaca Yesu.
Nkwaha mmoca, Yesu nari usittatti, ahomphwanya namakuttula mmoca. Ule umoona wawe Yesu, ahokhoroma mpaka upiiha iyuuci vathi, ni ahonvekela eeraka: Pwiya, mwatthunaka nawoorya ukivoniha!
Yesu ahonthatela ntata mpaka unkwanya, eeraka: Kinaatthuna, uvone! Wowaakuvyaca wene, makuttula ayo yahonrimyarimya.
Yesu ahonlamulela wiira: Uhinhimerye ntthu, nanso urwee weethoonyihere wa mayasataka ni wavahe itthuvo yoovonihinya waa, ilamunlyawe Musa wiira ikhale saahiti wamiithoni wa atthu.
Phimaana uttitthima wa Yesu waanatepa umwaryeela cinene, ni atthu enci yaanathukumana wiira yamwiiwe ni yavonihinye iretta caya.
Nanso Yesu ahokhuma phirwaaka utakhwani ni wonwo aanavekela.

Nihuku nimoca, Yesu asomihak'ono, yahonkomaca nenno nipuro nno mafarisi ni aalimu o malamulo, yaakhumile mwa aliteya mothene o'Kalileya, o'Yuteya ni o'Yerusalemu. Ni ikuru ca Apwiya caari ni Yesu wiira aavonihe aretta.
Yooyo ukati uyo yahowaaca alopwana, anankusile munrepani ntthu owuntakyaa. Ni yaanawaavya mananna oompiiha waaryawe Yesu.
Nanso ahoonaka mananna oompiiha wa Yesu, nlattu wa atthu enci, yahowelaca wancaarani ni yahaakaca ikhato, ni yahophoviha nrepa nne, mpaka waaryawe Yesu.
Yesu woona wawe waamini waya, ahomwiirela owuntaky'ole: Nlopwana, itampi caa ciholeveleliya.
Vano mafarisi ni mayowantikha yahopacera wuupuwela yiiraka: Tipani yoola noolumaca makufuru ula? Tipani noorya ulevelela itampi, keera ri Nluku paahi?
Nanso Yesu ucuwela wawe yoopuwelaya, ahaakoha eeraka: Nnoopuwelani wanrimani winyu va?
Itthu yootepa urika phivi? Umwiirela: Itampi caa ciholeveleliya, atthuna umwiirela: Wunwe ni weette?
Vano ncuwele wiira Mwanawe Pinatamu, haana ulamuli vathi va woolevelela itampi, vaavale ahomwiirela owuntakyaa: Mi kinawulamulela: Wunwe, ukuse nrepa naa ni urwee uwanyaa.
Wowaakuvyaca wene ahonwa, atthu ale yoonaka, ni ahokusa nrepa nawe nne, ni ahoturuwela uwani anlemelihaka Nluku.
Atthu othene yaanathamala anttottopelaka Nluku, n'umoova. Yaanawuulumaca yiiraka: Ilelo nihoona cootikhineeha.
Wahoolo ahokhuma ni ahomoona mayoliviha nsoko eehaninya Levi, nonkomile nipuro naaliviya nsoko. Yesu ahomwiirela: Ukitthare.
Vano ule ahonwa, ahohiya cothene ni ahontthara.
Vano Levi ahompankela Yesu isikuhuulu uwannyawe. Nenno nipuro nno yahaawo mayoliviha nsoko enci ni atthu akina.
Mafarisi ni mayowantikha yaanawaattokutta eetthuci a Yesu, yiiraka: Nlattuni nyu nnaalya ni nnawurya wamoca ni mayoliviha nsoko ni anatampi?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Kahiwena akumi phimmwaavya tothoro, nanso, aretta.
Mi akiweenle weehana atthu o'sariya, nanso atthu ookosakosa wiira arukunuse mirima caya.
Wahoolo ahokohiya wiira: Nlattuni eetthuci a Yohani atthukaka ni uvekela imaara cinci toko cimpankaya mafarisi, nanso awaa ayo anaalya n'uwurya?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nyu nnawaavarela untthuka ramatani atthu oolattuliya wasikuhuuluni yoothelaninya, mayothela uyo nari na ayo?
Nanso anaawa mahuku anhalaya waakhiya mayothela uyo, ni yaayo mahuku ayo phinhalaya untthuka.

Yesu ahaahimyacera tho nlikanihero nimoca eeraka: Khaawo neesera icaapha yonaanano nkuwoni yokhalayi, maana icaapha yonaanano inatepereriha waahuwa nwo. Ni nttapwatta nonaanano khaninlikana ni ikuwo yokhalayi.
Ciicammo khaawo nohela ivinyu yonaanano munrupani wo nrapala nokhalayi, kontha ivinyu yonaanano inaattuttula phupaphulaka nrupa uyo mpaka ivinyu iyo urihakyaa ni nrupa uyo unaahononnyaa.
Nanso ivinyu yonaanano inheliya munrupani wonaanano ni coopiili phinhalaya uhihononnyaa.
Ni khaawo nowurya ivinyu yokhalayi, phincivelaka tho yonaanano, kontha neera: Yokhalayi iyo phiri yomaana.
Nkwaha mmoca, nihuku no ntivela, Yesu aviraka mmamattani, eetthuci awe yaanawuntakaca icasi, phittikitthaka n'ukhura.
Mafarisi akina yahonkohaca yiiraka: Nnopankacerani itthu ihinlamuliya upankiya nihuku no ntivela?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khansomile ipankilyawe Taviti, waavoliyawe itala uyo na asikhwawe?
Ahokela inupa ya Nluku, ni ahokhura mikatthe coottakattifihiya, cahaalamuliyawe ukhura uyo, mena ale yaarinawe, nanso yaalamuliya ukhura paahi mayasataka.
Ni ahopwaherera tho eeraka: Mwanawe Pinatamu, phi mwanene ntivela.
Vano waaphilyaya ntivela nkina, ahokela nsinakoka ni ahopacera usomiha. Mommo, ahaawo ntthu oonririya ntata no moono nlopwana.
Mayowantikha ni mafarisi yaanammwehecesa, aphavelacaka umoona wakhala wiira naavoniha nihuku no ntivela, wiira amphwanyane nantuthi oomootheryaca.
Nanso Yesu aanacuweleeha coopuwelaya nnyo, phimaana ahomwiirela ntthu aarina ntata noonririy'ole: Wunwe ni uwe iriyari ila va. Ule ahonwa ni weemela.
Vaavale Yesu ahoolumaca eeraka: Nnoona cani? Wanaalamuliya upanka yoorera atthuna yoonanara nihuku no ntivela, woopola ukumi atthuna ukwanyula?
Yesu ahaaweha atthu othene yaanrukurenrye, ni ahomwiirela ntthu oonririya ntata ule: Utaphule ntata. Ahotaphula ni nne nahovona.
Nanso mafarisi ale yahoviruwaca ni yannyakulihana ayaayoru yaavyaka itthu yoomwiiriha Yesu.
Yaayo mahuku ayo, Yesu ahowela mmwaakoni wiira aswali ni ahokhala uhiyu wothene anvekelaka Nluku.
Usa waya, aheehana eetthuci awe ni ahaathanla khumi n'eeli ni ahaavaha ncina na amitthenka.
Yaari: Simoni, yoole aanvahilyawe ncina na Peturu ni munnawe Anteree; Yakopu ni Yohani; Filipe ni Partolomeu;
Mateu ni Tomee; Yakopu mwana a Alfeu; Simoni eehaninya nseloti,
Yuta mwanawe Yakopu ni Yuta Iskariyoti, yoole aahala umuuluma makhuce Yesu.

Vano Yesu aakhuruwanaka eetthuci awe, aheemela nipuro no wiicaatala. Vaavale yahaawo eetthuci awe enci ni mphwinko muulupale wookhuma uYuteya, ni uYerusalemu na ale yaakhala ncenkweni mo'pharyaa yo'Tiru ni uSitoni,
yaawile umwiiwa ni uvonihinya iretta caya; ciicammo atthu yaatulumwinya ni minepa coonanara yaanavonihinya.
Phimaana atthu othene yaanawaavya unkwanya, kontha mwa uyo caanakhuma ikuru caavoniha othene.
Vano aawehaka eetthuci awe, aheera: Nhoreriya nyu oohuva, kontha Umwene wa Nluku uri wawinyu.
Nhoreriya nyu nnovoliya itala nenna va, kontha nnaahala urupala. Nhoreriya nyu nnoonla nenna va, kontha nnaahala uthyaa.
Nhoreriya nyu, mwaraminyaka na atthu, moomoliyaka, nruwaninyaka ni mwiireliyaka oohiloka, mwa nlattu woontthara Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Ntteeliyeke nrima nenno nihuku nno ni nttikuweke, kontha itthuvo enyu iri yuulupale wirimu, maana ciicammo phaapankaya mayathumwanaya waatulumwaya minapiyu.
Nhotakhaliya nyu athaciri, kontha nhaakhela itthuvo cinyu vathi va.
Nhotakhaliya nyu nri oorupalene, kontha nnaahala uvoliya itala. Nhotakhaliya nyu nnothyaa ula ukati ula, kontha nnaahala ucukula ni wunla.
Nhotakhaliya nyu nnottottopeliya na atthu othene, kontha, ciicammo phaapankaya mayathumwanaya wamoca ni minapiyu cowootha.
Phimaana, nyu nnokiiwa va, kinoohimeryani wiira: Mwaafente eenani inyu ni mwaapanke yoorera ale anookhalelani nttima,
mwaareriheke ale anoolaphani ni mwaavekelele ale anootulumuni.
Ntthu awaattaka nrama nimoca, unrukunuseleke nikina nno. Ule nowaakha ikacako uhinkhottihere wuurula malaya.
Ule noolepela itthu phi itthu, unvaheke, ni ntthu akusaka itthu yawaa, uhinturusihe.
Itthu inoocivela upankiya na atthu, ni nyu ciicammo mwaapankeke akhunaninyu.
Mwaafentaka paahi ale anoofentani nnohala waakhela itthuvoni? Kontha hata anatampi, anaafenta paahi ale anaafentesa.
Ni mwaapankaka yoorera ale anoopankani yoorera, nnohala waakhela itthuvoni? Hata anatampi yaayo ciicammo phimpankaya.
Vano mwaasimihaka ale anaawehereryenyu wuuturuselani, nnohala waakhela itthuvoni? Ciicammo anatampi anaasimiha anatampi akhwaya, wiira yaakhele toko yeeyo.

Phimaana mwaafente eenani inyu, ni mwaapanke yoorera. Mwaasimihe yaphavelaka itthu woohiwehererya wuuturuselani; nnaahala waakhela itthuvo yinci ni ukhala asaana a Nluku o wirimu, kontha Nluku ri oorera nrima mpaka na ale oohisukuru ni oonanara nrima.
Nkhale o'kiriri toko athumwaninyu ciryaya o'kiriri.
Nhihukhumu ni nyu khannohala uhukhumwinya; nhaatthukele akhwinyu, ni nyu khannohala utthukeliya; mwaalevelele akhwinyu ni nyu phinhalenyu uleveleliya.
Nvaheke, ni nyu phinhalenyu uvahiya; namaroco omaana, ookhitteliya, owaattakeliya mpaka urihakyaa phinhalenyu uvahiya, kontha ni nliko unhalenyu umphimela, yooyo phinhalenyu uphimeliya.
Yesu ahaattonkela tho nlikanihero nikina eeraka: Ntthu oohoona nawoorya unhoolela oohoona nkhwawe? Khaanwuluwela oyeeli munlittini?
Mwiitthuci khanompwaha mwalimu awe, nanso ule ri oosomihinya ratta, nohala ukhala toko mwalimu awe.
Vano unweherani niphalapacu niri nniithoni mwa munnaa, nanso khunwacawaca ithaapwa iri nniithoni mwaa?

Unoorya cani umwiirela munnaa: Munna, nkankani kuukumiheni niphalapacu niri nniithoni mwaa, ni we uhooryaka woona ithaapwa iri nniithoni mwaa? Ntthu owiithepya! Ukumihe toko ithaapwa iri nniithoni mwaa, vano phinhalaa woona ratta wookumiha niphalapacu niri nniithoni mwa munnaa.
Kontha khuuwo mwiri womaana uneema mihokorokho coohimaana; ciicammo khuuwo mwiri woohimaana uneema mihokorokho comaana.
Khula mwiri uncuwannya ciryaya, nlattu wo mihokorokho caya, kontha khacinrukuliya imanka mmiiwani, ni hata ikhacu khacinrukuliya mmarokani.

Ntthu oorera nrima nokumiha citthu coorera mmihakhuni mwawe ciri munrimani; ntthu oonanara nrima, nokumiha citthu coonanara mmihakhuni mwawe ciri munrimani, kontha malaku anooluma itthu iri munrimani.
Nlattuni nkiirelaka: Pwiya, Pwiya, nhipankaka itthu inoohimeryakani?
Ntthu phi ntthu nowa waryaka mi, eewaka moolumo aka, ni apankaka inhimyaka; kinawuthoonyerani nonlikanana awe.

Nolikana toko ntthu, tekile inupa awe, athipaka malitti owiisa ni apaceraka unteka caasa wamwalani. Vano ahowa nkhaya ni maasi menci oolipa, yahaatta inupa ile, nanso wohoorya uttinkiha, nlattu wootekiya wamwalani.
Nanso ule neewa ni wooheettela, nolikana toko ntthu tekile inupa awe wanhaavani, woohi caasa. Ukati waawilyawe nkhaya attinkihaka inupa ile, yahomora, ni ukwanyuwaca waya nwo waari wootepa.
Wahoolo Yesu namalihilene woolumana atthu ale, ahorwaa uKafarnaumu.
Vano nanteko a nhooleli a anatoropa iminya, aankhuluvelawe venci, aanawerennya ni aahanle vakani ukhwa.
Wiiwa wawe cittonkaciyaka ca Yesu, ahaaruma mahumu a ayuta unlepela wiira arwee anvonihe nanteko awe.
Umphwanyaca waya Yesu, yahonlepelaca venci yiiraka: Yooyo nlopwana uyo unaamphwanela ukaviheriya;
kontha ri mpatthani o'nethi ihu wothene ni honitekela isinakoka.
Vaavale Yesu ahorwaa wamoca na atthu ale. Naattamenryene watthokoni, nhooleli a anatoropa ule ahaaruma asimpwanawe eeraka: Pwiya, nhiihuvihe, kontha mi akimphwanela wiira nyu nkele mpaani mwaka.
Kontha hata mi kihoona wiira khunkiphwanela uwoonananani, nanso nhimye nuulumo nimoca paahi, ni nanteko aka naahala uvona.

Maana ni mi ki ntthu oolamuliya ni kihaana anatoropa anaalamulaka, ni kinaamwiirela mmoca uyo: Urwee! N'uyo naarwaa, ni nkina uyo kamwiirelaka: Uwe woono. N'uyo naawa. Ciicammo nanteko aka kamwiirelaka: Upanke ila! N'uyo naapanka.
Vano Yesu wiiwa wawe yaale moolumo ale ahotikhinaca. Ahaarukunuwela atthu yanveleenle ale, ni aheerela: Kinawuhimeryani wiira hata uSirayeli akiphwanyile nroromelo toko nna.
Vano yaaruminye ale uturuwelaca waya uwani, yahomphwanyaca nanteko ule navonne.
Unavinre ukati vakani, Yesu ahorwaa isittatti yo'Nayini. Ahaatthukana ikwaha eetthuci awe ni mphwinko muulupale.

Waattamenryawe usittatti, ahaakumanana atthu enci anakusile mayithi arwaaka wuusikhani. Aari mwana a athiyana yaakhweliye na awannyaya, ni yaarina mwana mmoca yoole paahi. Ni yaantthariya na atthu enci o nsittatti mwemmwe.
Vaavale Apwiya woona waya anankhwele ale, yahoonela uthunku ni yaheerela: Nhunle.
Uphiya wawe ahokwanya icaneesa ile, ni yaakusile ale yaheemelaca. Vano Yesu aheera: Mmirawo, mi kinawulamula, wunwe!
Vano aakhwile ule, ahonkoma ni ahopacera wuulumaca. Ni Yesu ahaavaha anumwane.
Atthu othene yahoova ni yahonttottopela Nluku yiiraka: Nnapiyu muulupale hokhumelela warihu va; vano Nluku hothotola unethi awe.
Phimaana, itthu yaapankilyawe Yesu yaheewannyaa uYuteya wothene ni ilapo cothene cowaattamana.
Wahoolo Yohani ahohimeriya n'eetthuci awe nnya citthu nnya cothene.
Vano Yohani aheehana eetthuci awe eeli ni ahaarumaca wa Yesu wiira yankohe yiiraka: Kaahiki phi we, ule aammwehereryehu uwa atthuna nimmwehereryeke nkina?
Alopwana ale uphiyaca waya wa Yesu yaheera: Yohani Mpattisa honiruma wuukoha wiira: Kaahiki phi we, ule aammwehereryehu uwa atthuna nimmwehereryeke nkina?
Yooyo ukati uyo Yesu ahovoniha iretta ni masakha a atthu enci, ahoomola minepa cootakhala ni ahaavoniha atthu enci oohoona.

Vano Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Murwee ni mwanhimerye Yohani inoonenyu ni ineewenyu: oohoona anawoona, owuntakyaa anaweetta, omakuttula anaavonihinya, oohiiwa anawiiwa, ookhwa anawunwelelihiya, ni oothwennya anaalaleeriya nhupi woorera,
ni horeriya ule hinkakathuwa nlattu wawaka mi.
Ukhuma waya arumeyi a Yohani, Yesu ahopacera waahimyacera atthu ale mwaha wa Yohani eeraka: Mwaarweele woonani utakhwani? Ntathi woottinkihiya ni iphyoo?
Mwaarweele woonani? Nlopwana oowaraca ikuwo coovevyaala? Ale anwaraca ikuwo coovevyaala ni apuhaka, ankhala unupani ya nlamuli.
Vano mwaarweele woonani? Nnapiyu? Khweli mi kinawuhimeryani wiira mmoonnenyu uyo hompwaha nnapiyu.
Nlattu wa yoola phantikhiyaya wiira: Kinaanveleeliha wamiithoni waa mayanhupi aka; uyo naahala wulokihera iphiro uhoolo waa.
Mi kinawuhimeryani wiira mwa atthu ayariye na athiyana, khanakhumelela muulupale awile oompwaha Yohani, nanso ule ri mwankani wumweneni wa Nluku phi muulupale wompwaha uyo.
Vaavale atthu othene yeewile, mpaka mayoliviha nsoko, yahokupali isariya ya Nluku kontha yaahopattisiya ni Yohani.
Nanso mafarisi ni ataphuleli o malamulo, nlattu wookhotta upattiso wa Yohani, yahokhotta ikano ca Nluku ni yaheetapaniha asinene.
Yesu ahoolumaca tho eeraka: Kaalikanihereke apani atthu o nenna nloko nna? Anlikana ni isiyani?
Ari oolikana na amirawo anonkomacile wapacari, akhuwelelanaka ni yiirelanaka: Hi nihowoopelani mpetta, nanso khamwiinne; nihowiipelani icipo cowiikhupanya nanso khamunlile.
Kontha howa Yohani Mpattisa, hinlya nkatthe ni hinwurya ivinyu, nanso nnomwiirela: Haana ncini.
Howa Mwanawe Pinatamu, nolya ni nowurya, nanso nneera uyo nanlula ni nanhapaliya, mpwana aya mayoliviha nsoko ni mayokosa!
Nanso ankhili anaathoonyera wa asaanaya othene.
Nfarisi mmoca ahonlattula Yesu urwaa ulya uwannyawe; ukela wawe mpaani mwa nfarisi ule, ahonkoma wiira alye.
Vano nthiyana natampi o wasittatti, ucuwela wawe wiira Yesu naalya uwannyawe nfarisi, ahowa nakusile iphotiri yo nluku na alapasturu, yaaheliye makhura oonukhela.
Ahokhoroma uttuli wa Yesu onlaka, aanaaniha ni miithori inyaa ni aampoholaca ni ikharari cawe. Aananvaha ipeecu nnyaani mwawe, anttikitthelaka makhura oonukhela.
Vano woona wawe itthu ile nfarisi aanlattunle ule, aheera wanrimani wawe: Waari wiira ula aari nnapiyu, aanahala uncuwela nthiyanani nonvarakaca ula, kontha natampi.
Yesu ahomwiirela nfarisi ule: Simoni, kihaana itthu imphavelaka wuuhimyacera. Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Mwalimu, ukihimerye.
Yesu aheera: Namakopiha mmoca, ahaakopiha atthu eeli. Mmoca uyo ahonkopiha ncurukhu iminya thanu ni nkina uyo hansini (50).
Vano mayokopihiya ale ahoonacaka yooliva, mayokopiha ule ahaalevelela oyeeli. Vano ukihimyacere, wo yaayo oyeeli ayo tipani aahala unfenta cinene?
Simoni ahomwaakhula eeraka: Kinoona wiira ph'ule leveleliye ikophi yuulupale ule. Yesu ahomwiirela: Uhoolumaca ratta.

Anwehaka nthiyan'ole, ahomwiirela Simoni: We uhomoona ula athiyana ula? Kihokela mpaani mwaa, khukivahile maasi oorapiha inyaa caka, nanso ula, horapiha inyaa caka ni miithori awe, ni hokipohola ni ikharari cawe.
Khukivahile alaahuma, nanso ula aweeru mu, khahiile ukivaha ipeecu nnyaani mwaka.
Kukittikitthenle makhura mmuru mwaka, nanso ula hottikitthela inyaa caka ni makhura oonukhela.
Phimaana, kinoohimyacera wiira itampi cawe cinci nnyo ula ciholeveleliya, kontha hofenta venci. Vano ule noleveleliya vakani, ufenta wawe rina vakani.
Ni ahomwiirela nthiyan'ole: Itampi caa nnyo ciholeveleliya.
Vano yaarinawe wa meeca, yahopacera utikhinaca yiiraka: Tipani yoola noorya ulevelela mpaka itampi?
Vaavale Yesu ahomwiirela nthiyan'ole: Waamini waa uhowoopola. Urweeke wo'salama.
Cinavinrene nnya citthu nnya, Yesu ahokhuma arwaaka mmasittatti ni mmawaani, ahimyacaka ni alalyaka nhupi woorera wo Umwene wa Nluku. Vaavale, yahonveleela eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli.
Ciicammo yahaawo athiyana yaavonihinye, yaarina minepa cootakhala ni iretta cikina. Athiyana ayo yaari: Mariya neehaninya Mantalena, aakumihinye macini saapa
ni Cuwana, amwaarawe Kusa hutumu o'hano a Heroti, Susana na asikhwawe akina, yaale yaanrumeela Yesu ni mihakhu caya.
Vaavale, yahothukumana atthu enci yaakhuma mmasittatti, ni Yesu ahopacera uhimyaca ni malikanihero, eeraka:
Aakhumile ntthu umwacera ipyo. Amwacerak'ono, ipyo ikina yahomorela nceresere iphiro ni yahonyakelaciya, ni yaholyaca asaanuni.
Ipyo ikina yahomorela wamalukuni ni umelawaya yahooma, nlattu wo wuuma.
Ikina yahomorela wamiiwani, ni miiwa nnye cahonnuwa, mpaka umiriya.
Ikina yahomorela watthayani yomaana ni yaheema iminya wo khula ipyo. Wuulumaca wawe commo, ahokhuwela eeraka: Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eeweke.
Eetthuci awe yahonkoha maanaya nlikanihero nne.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nyu nhovahiya ucuwela isiiri co'mwene wa Nluku, nanso akina anhimyaceriya ni malikanihero, wiira yoonaka, ahoone ni yiiwaka, ahiiwe.
Ala phi maanaya nlikanihero: Ipyo iyo, niri nuulumo na Nluku.
Ile yaamorenle nceresere iphiro, ph'ale aneewa. Wahoolo naawa Sotwani ukumiha wanrimani waya nuulumo niiwilyaya nno, wiira ahikupali yoopwaka.
Ile imorenle wamalukuni, ph'ale aneewa nuulumo, yaakhelaka wotteeliya, nanso ukhala wiira khaarina mitithari, ankupali ukati vakani, ni waphiyaka ukati woottehattehiya, anaahiya.
Ile imorenle wamiiwani ph'ale yiiwile nuulumo na Nluku, nlattu wo weetta cintthunaya, ahomiriya ni misankiho, mihakhu n'ucivaciviya wo mwirutthuni. Vano mihokorokho caya nnyo khacinttokottha.
Ipyo imorenle nipuro niri itthaya yomaana, ph'ale yiiwile nuulumo na Nluku asunkaka ni nrima woorera ni womaana ni anawiima nhokorokho n'ukhalela nthiti.
Khaawo noparihela isamaninya, phikhuneelaka ni mwaapu, atthuna pheesaka nkhwikwicira, nanso ineesiya waculu, wiira ankela ayo yooneke waarya.
Kontha khiiwo yovithyaa ihinhala wooneleliya, ni khiiwo yowiipithyaa ihinhala wooneleliya.
Phimaana, mooneke, toko cineewenyu, maana ntthu rina, naahala uvahiya, nanso ntthu hirina, naahala waakhiya mpaka itthu irinawe.
Vaavale, yahowa anumwane Yesu na asunnawe, nanso khayoonrye umoonanana, nlattu woocara atthu.
Vano ahohimeriya wiira anumwana na asunnaa ari vate, anaaphavela uwoonanana.
Nanso Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Amaama na asunnaka ph'ale aneewa n'uttharihelela nuulumo na Nluku.
Nkwaha mmoca, Yesu ahokela nkalawani wamoca n'eetthuci awe ni aheerelaca: Nrwee nilapuwele nikhopela nikhwawe ntthiya. Vaavale yahokhumaca.
Ale yeettihacak'ono ikalawa ile, Yesu aanrupa. Vano ahowa naphuvu mpahari mmwe, ikalawa ile yahocara maasi, ni yaahanle vakani uttittha.
Yahorwaaca mpaka waaryawe vale ni yahommusa yiiraka: Mwalimu, Mwalimu, ninaakhwaaca! Wunwa wawe, ahomaaliha iphyoo ni ucaca wo maasi. Cothene caheemela n'umaalya.
Vaavale Yesu aheerelaca: Waamini winyu nwo uri vayi? Ale yahoovaca venci ni yaankohana yiiraka: Tipani yoola neeweleliya ni iphyoo ni maasi?
Wahoolo Yesu n'eetthuci awe, yahokhuma arwaaka ilapo yo'Kerasenu, uri mpika n'uKalileya.
Yesu ukhuruwa wawe nkalawani mmwe, ahonkhumelela nlopwana oovariya ni macini aakhuma usittatti. Ahokhala ukati mwinci woohiwara. Khaakhala mpaani, nanso aakhala umahiye.
Vaavale ule umoona wawe Yesu, ahokhoroma uhoolo wawe ni ahokhuwela eeraka: Kiwiirihile isiyani Yesu, Mwanawe Nluku o wirimu? Contte kinawulepela wiira uhikitulumu.

Kontha Yesu aholamulela nnepa woonanara wiira ukhume mwirutthuni mwa ntthu ule. Maana imaara cinci waananvaresa. Aanatthukiyaka ni unyolo ni uheliya nnipisini, nanso aanatankanyaca caatthukeliyawe nnyo. Ni ncini nne naananvara phinrwehaka ntakhwani.
Vano Yesu ahonkoha eeraka: Ncina naa tipani? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Mphwinko! Kontha mwirutthuni mwawe yahonkela macini menci.
Vaavale yahonlepelaca wiira ahaarwehace nlitti nooripela ni no wiisa.
Vano cahaawo ikuluwe cinci caalya nceresere mwaako; macini ale yahonlepela wiira yakele nkuluweni mmwe, ni Yesu ahotthunihera.
Vano macini ale ukhuma waya mwirutthuni mwa ntthu ule, yahokela nkuluweni, ni ikuluwe cothene caheevonyera muntthiyani ni cahottittha.
Vaavale, atthu yaaliha ikuluwe ale woonnyaya yaakhumelenle ile, yahotthawaca n'urwaa uttonkaca usittatti ni mmawaani.

Vano atthu ale, yahokhumaca wiira yoone itthu yaakhumelenle ni umwaattamerya waya Yesu, yahomoona nlopwana aakumihinye macini ule nawaracile, nari na ankhili, nonkomile wakhiviru ni Yesu ni yahoovaca.
Vaavale, atthu yaamoonne ale yahaahimerya atthu othene, mananna ceenryawe woovonihinya namacini ule.
Vano atthu othene o nttetthe wo'Kerasenu, yahonlepela Yesu wiira akhume mwiilaponi mwaya mmwe, kontha yahoovaca venci. Vano Yesu ahokela nkalawani ni ahorwaa.
Vaavale nlopwana aakumihinye macini ule, ahonlepela Yesu wiira antthukane nkwaha, nanso uyo ahomwiirela:
Uturuwele uwanyaa ni waattonkele alokwaa citthu cothene cupankilyawe Nluku. Vano ule ahoturuwa ni ahovira attonkaka waparasa yothene, citthu caapankeliyawe ni Yesu.
Wahoolo, Yesu uturuwa wawe, atthu othene yahomwaakhelela, kontha yaanammwehererya.
Wowaakuvyaca wene, ahowa nlopwana eehaninya Cayiru, aari nhooleli o nsinakoka, ni ahokhoroma uhoolo wa Yesu, ni ahonlepela wiira aphiye uwannyawe.
Kontha aarina mwana mmoca paahi, mwanthiyana, o myakha khumi na miili. Yooyo, aanawerennya ni aahanle vakani ukhwa. Vano waarwawe va, mphwinko waanamphunyerera.
Ahaawo nthiyana aawerennya iretta yoovuva iphome, aamalihile myakha khumi na miili ni aarihakacile mihakhu cawe cothene mmatothoro oovoniha ni khaawo oonrye unvoniha.
Ahowa uttuli wa Yesu ni ahokwanya mphantte woosoriya wo'hancu awe. Nananoru, iphome iyo yahomaala uvuva nwo.

Vano Yesu ahokoha eeraka: Kikwanyile tipani? Nlattu wooruna atthu othene, Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: Mwalimu, unawoona wiira atthu enci ahoorukurerya ni anawuphunyereriha, vano unaakoha wiira kikwanyile tipani?
Nanso Yesu aheera: Haawo kikwanyile, kontha kinowoona mwirutthuni mwaka mmo ihokhuma ikuru.

Vano nthiyan'ole woonnyawe wiira khoorya wiivitha, ahowa attettemelaka ni ahokhoroma wamettoni wawe, ni wamiithoni wa atthu othene ahonhimerya nlattu wo'siyani ankwanyaka ni mananna ceenryawe woovonihinya.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Mwanaka, waamini waa nwo uhowoopola. Urweeke ni nnema.
Yesu oolumacaka nanlelo, ahowa ntthu aakhuma ntthoko na nhooleli o nsinakoka, ni ahoolumaca eeraka: Mwaninyu hokhwa. Munhiye mwalimu uyo, nhimunkurumihe.
Nanso Yesu wiiwa wawe, ahomwiirela Cayiru: Uhoove, waamini paahi, mwanaa naakhala nkumi.
Vano uphiya wawe uwannyawe nhooleli ule, khaawo aantthunihenryawe unkelana mpaani, hikhanle paahi Peturu, Yakopu, Yohani, athumwane ni anumwane mwanthiyan'ole.
Atthu othene yaanawunla ni wiikhupanya. Nanso Yesu ahaamaaliha eeraka: Mmaale wunla nwo. Kakhwile, naarupa.
Vano atthu ale yaananthyaa, kontha yaacuwela wiira hokhwa.
Vaavale, ahonvara ntata ni ahokhuwela, eeraka: Mwanthiyana, wunwe!
Vano, wowaakuvyaca wene iroho awe yahonturuwela ni ahonwelela. Ni Yesu ahoruma wiira avahiye iyolya.
Mayathumwane yahotikinihinya venci, nanso Yesu ahaalamula wiira ahinhimyacere ntthu yaakhumelenle iyo.
Wahoolo Yesu aheehanaca eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli. Ahaavahaca ikuru ni nlamulo no woomola macini ni n'uvoniha iretta.
Ciicammo ahaaruma ulalya nhupi woorera wo Umwene wa Nluku ni waavoniha aretta.
Yesu aheerela: Nhikuse iphika munkwahani mmo, hata nttontto, mena nrupa, mena iyolya, mena ncurukhu atthuna ikuwo ikina.
Itthoko inkelenyu ulukama iyo, nkhale wonwo mpaka ukhuma.
Isittatti ihinhalenyu waakheleliya iyo, wookhuma va nkukutthe ntthupi no nnyaani mwinyu, nthoonyiheraka usaahiti wookhotta uwaakhelelani.
Vano yahokhuma arwaaka mmawaani mothene ulalya nhupi woorera ni waavoniha aretta miphantte cothene caaviraya.
Yaayo mahuku ayo Mwene Heroti, aaneewa citthu cothene caakhumelela, ni ahosanka kontha weeriya: Yohani Mpattisa honwelela mwa atthu ookhwa.
Akina yeera: Eliya phiwile. Akina yeera: Onwelenle mmoca o minapiyu cokhalayi.
Nanso Heroti aheera: Yohani kihonhita. Vano tipani yooyo neewaka aromolaceriyaka nnya citthu nnya? Vaavale aanaphavela umoona Yesu.
Vano amitthenka ale uturuwaca waya, yahonttonkelaca citthu cothene caapankilyaya. Vaavale Yesu ahaakusaca ni yahokhumaca ayaayoru arwaaka isittatti ineehaninya Petesayita.
Vano miphwinko nnye, ucuwela waya wiira hokhuma, cahontthara. Ule ahaakhelela ni aanaweetthuciha citthu co Umwene wa Nluku. Ciicammo aanawaavoniha ale yaaphavela uvonihinya.

Vano wahopacera wiila, eetthuci khumi n'eeli ale yahomwaattamerya ni yahomwiirela: Waamwaruse atthu ayo, arwaace mmawaani ni itthoko cowaattamana wiira yamake. Wonwo ankovahiya iyolya, kontha va niri watakhwani.
