Nanso Yesu aheerelaca: Mwaavaheke nyenyuva iyolya. Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Nirina va mikatthe mithanu ni ihopa piili paahi, kaahiki wiira nirwee naathumele iyolya ala atthu ala.
Kontha yahaawo nenno nipuro nno wookhalaka alopwana ilufu thanu. Vano Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe: Mwaathukumanihe atthu ayo mmakhunkoni, khula nikhunko atthu hansini.
Ale yahonkomihaca atthu ayo othene toko Yesu coolumacilyawe.
Vano Yesu ahokusa mikatthe mithanu ni ihopa piili nnye, ahoweha uculu, ahonsukuru Nluku. Ahomyaniha ni ahaavaha eetthuci awe wiira yaakawelace atthu ale.
Atthu othene yahokhura n'urupala; vano ikalakathela co mikatthe caahanle nnyo cahottotteliya mpaka ucara itthuttu khumi na piili.
Nkwaha mmoca Yesu avekelaka veekha, eetthuci awe yahomwaattamerya; vano ule ahaakoha eeraka: Atthu ayo aneera mi kimpani?
Ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Atthu ayo aneera, we Yohani Mpattisa, akina aneera Eliya ni akina aneera we mmoca o minapiyu cokhalayi onwelenle.
Vano ahaakohaca tho eeraka: Vano nyu nneera Mi kimpani? Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: Kristu a Nluku.
Vaavale Yesu ahaalakihera eetthuci awe, wiira ahinttonkele ntthu itthu ile.
Ahopwaherera eeraka: Mwanawe Pinatamu nolamuliya uhuva wo citthu cinci, naahala ukhottiya ni mahumu, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha, wiiviya ni wunwelela nihuku noneeraru.
Wahoolo Yesu aheerela othene: Ntthu atthunaka ukitthara mi, eekhotteke mwanene, akuseke nsalapa awe khula nihuku, ni akitthareke.
Kontha ule notthuna woopola ukumi awe, unanrihyaa. Ule unonrihyaa ukumi awe mwa nlattu wawaka mi, naahala woopola.
Ntthu nohala uphurani aphwanyaka ittuninya yothene, arihyaka atthuna eekwanyulacaka?
Kontha yoole nohala wuulihaciya muru nlattu wo mi ni moolumo aka, ciicammo Mwanawe Pinatamu naahala wuulihaceriya muru ni yooyo awaaka munttittimihoni na Athumwane na ancelo attakattifu.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Ahaawo ari va, ahinhala ukhwa ahinaya woona umwene wa Nluku.
Yesu noolumacilene ala moolumo ala, yahovira mahuku naane. Wahoolo ahaakusa Peturu, Yohani ni Yakopu, ahowela mmwaakoni wiira aswali.
Ukati waaswalyawe, makhalelo o'khove awe yahothatuwa, ni ikuwo cawe cahotteela n'uceremela toko uverunya.
Vano wowaakuvyaca wene yahowa alopwana eeli n'upacera umuulumana. Yaari Musa ni Eliya,
yaawile ni waarya ni yoolumaca ukhuma wa Yesu, waahala wiirannyaa uYerusalemu.
Peturu na akhunanawe ale yaanaarupa; vano wunwaca waya yahomoona Yesu nari owaarya, neemenle na alopwana eeli.

Alopwana eeli ale uthama waya, anhiyaka Yesu veekhawe, Peturu ahomwiirela: Mwalimu, wahorera ukhala vaava, niteke marapattha mararu, nimoca nawinyu, nikina na Musa ni nikina na Eliya. Kontha, khaacuwela itthu yaahimyawe.
Oolumacak'ono, nahowa nihutte naakhuneenle ni ntthuuci aya. Ukhuneelaciya waya ni nihutte nne, yahoovaca venci.
Nnihutteni mmwe naheewannyaa ncu niiraka: Ula phi mwanaka, nthanlilyaka! Mmwiiweleleke.
Uvira waya ncu nno, Yesu aahanle veekha. Eetthuci ale yahomaalaca, ni yaayo mahuku ayo khaawo yaanttonkenlyaya itthu yoonnyaya.
Usa waya, ukati ukhuruwacilyaya mmwaakoni, mphwinko wa atthu enci wahomwiikamela Yesu.
Vaavale wariyari wa atthu ale, ahokhuma nlopwana ni ahokhuwela eeraka: Mwalimu, kinawulepela wiira waamoone mwanaka, kontha kirina yooyo paahi.
Uhaawo nnepa woonanara unonvaresa, vano woohipica naakhuwela, ni nnepa ule unamphatela vathi, unanripithula mpaka ukhuma niphooru, ni unonhiyesa unamooceehile.
Kihaalepela eetthuci aa wiira yoomole nnepa woonanara uyo, nanso khayoonrye.
Vano Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nloko na atthu oohaamini ni oohiloka! Mpaka yakhani kinhalaka wukhalanani ni kuuvilelakani? Ukiwiihere woono mwanaa uyo.
Ukati waattameryawe wa Yesu, ncini nne nahomphatela vathi n'unripithula, nanso Yesu ahocacera nnepa woonanara ule, ahonvoniha mmirawo ule ni ahaavaha athumwane.
Atthu othene yaari ootikinihinya mwa nlattu wo'kuru cuulupale ca Nluku. Ukhala wiira atthu othene yaari ootikinihinya, nlattu wo citthu cothene caapankawe Yesu, vano aheerela eetthuci awe ale coo:
Mwiiweehe moolumo anhalaka wuuhimeryani: Uhophiya ukati woovahereriya Mwanawe Pinatamu mmatatani mwa atthu.
Nanso ale khayeeweehile, kontha yaahoovitheliya wiira ahicuwelele, ni yaanawoovaca unkoha.
Wariyari waya eetthuci ale wahokhuma unyakulihaninya aphaveliyaka ucuweliya tipani mwa yaayo aahala ukhala muulupale.
Vano Yesu, ahocuwela itthu yoopuwelaya wanrimani waya, ahonkusa mwana ni ahomweemesa,
ni aheerelaca: Ntthu nomwaakhelela ula mwan'ola mwa ncina naka, hokaakhelela mi, ni ntthu nokaakhelela mi, homwaakhelela ule kirumile. Kontha ntthu neeyeviha wariyari winyu va, yooyo phiri muulupale.
Yohani ahomwiirela: Mwalimu, nihomoona ntthu oomolaka macini mwa ncina ninyu. Nihomwaateliha ntthu uyo kontha khanakhala awihu.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nhimwaatelihe, kontha ntthu hinowiinani, ri ni nyu.
Ukhala wiira yahophiya mahuku oorwaa Yesu wirimu, aholakela uphiya uYerusalemu.
Ule ahaaruma mayanhupi awe urwaa aliteya amoca o'Samariya, wiira atthenkaceriye nipuro noomaka.
Nanso khaakheleliye, kontha ahooninya wiira norwaa uYerusalemu.
Vano eetthuci eeli, Yohani ni Yakopu, woonaca waya haakheleliyaka, yahonkohaca Yesu yiiraka: Pwiya, nnaatthuna wiira nirumeke ukhuruwa mooro wo wirimu wiira waapahe?
Vano Yesu ahaaweha ni ahaakuphula eeraka: Nyu khannocuwela ikhapila yo nnepa irinyu.
Kontha Mwanawe Pinatamu khaawile ukwanyula iroho ca atthu nanso aawile woopola. Vaavale yahorwaaca aliteya akina.
Yeettaka ni iphiro, ntthu mmoca ahomwiirela: Pwiya, kinawuttharani mapuro othene anhalenyu urwaa.
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Akhwantte ahaana makhuku, ni asaanuni ooculu ahaana ipuru, nanso Mwanawe Pinatamu kharina nipuro noomumula.
Vano ahomwiirela ntthu nkina: Ukitthare. Nanso ule ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, nkaarerihe toko, kirwee kaavithe apaapa.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Waahiye atthu ookhwa avithane ayaayoru. Nanso we urwee wahimyace umwene wa Nluku.
Ciicammo ntthu nkina aheera: Pwiya, kinawuttharani, nanso nkihiye toko kaaleehe amuci aka.
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khaawo neera alimak'ono ni awehaka uttuli, phimphwanelaka ukela wumweneni wa Nluku.
Cinavinrene nnya citthu nnya, Apwiya yahaathanla eetthuci aya akina sapini (70), ni yahaaruma eeli eeli wiira arwee uhoolo waya, aviraka mmasittatti mothene ni mapuro yaahalaya uviravira.
Ale yaheerelaca: Yoorottowola iri yinci, nanso ananteko ayo ari vakani. Munlepele mwanene imatta wiira aarume ananteko umattani wawe.
Nrwaace! Kinoorumani toko ikhontwaa iriyari yo miici.
Nhikuse itthu nciroroni, hata nrupa, mena ikwakwatta; mphironi nhinkohe ntthu nrettele.
Mwaphiyaka watthokoni, mwiireke: Nnema nikhale nna ntthoko nna!
Vano akhalaka vaava ntthu o nnema, nenno nnema nno ninhala ukhala n'uyo. Nanso, aahikhaleke, ninawuuturuwelani mwasinene.
Nkhaleke nenno ntthoko nno, nlyaka ni nwuryaka yothene irinaya, maana nanteko nolamuliya upokera. Nhittatthe ntthoko ni ntthoko.
Mwakelaka nsittatti ni mwaakheleliyaka ratta, nlye inhalenyu umeeliya.
Mwaavonihe aretta ni mwaalaleere mwiiraka: Umwene wa Nluku uri wakhiviru.
Nanso, mwakelaka nsittatti nhaakheleliyaka, nviravireke mmaphironi mwiiraka:
Mpaka ntthupi no'sittatti ninipharelenle, ninawuukukutthelani. Nanso, ncuwele wiira Umwene wa Nluku uri wakhiviru.
Mi kinoohimeryani wiira, nenno nihuku nno, unaahala unemeceriya venci uSotoma woovikana iyo isittatti iyo.
Uhotakhaliya we Korasimi! Uhotakhaliya we Petesayita! Kontha mitikiniho cipankiye iriyari inyu, cinapankiye uTiru ni uSitoni, coono anarukunusile mirima, awaraka icakho ni wiitteeleliha ni ittura.
Nanso uhukhumuni, unaahala unemeceriya uTiru ni uSitoni, wuvikanani nyu!
Vano we, Kafarnaumu, unoona wiira unaahala uwelihiya wirimu? Mena; we unhala ukuruseliya umooroni.
Nowiiwelelani uyo, nokiiwelela mi, ni nookhottani uyo, nokikhotta mi; nokikhotta mi, nonkhotta ule kirumile.
Vaavale, eetthuci sapini (70) ale yahoturuwaca anari ootteeliya nrima, yiiracaka: Pwiya, mpaka macini anaaniiwelela mwa ncina naa!
Yesu aheerela: Ni mi kaammoonaka Sotwani awuluwaka ukhuma wirimu toko uverunya.
Vano kihoovahani ulamuli wo wiira nnyakele inwaa ni ikhavi, ni wootthema ikuru cothene ca mwiinani, ni khiiwo inhala wuuhasarani.
Paahi, nhitteeliye nlattu woowiiwelelani macini, nanso ntteeliye nlattu wowantikhiya macina enyu wirimu.

Yoole ukati ule, Yesu ahotteeliya muNnepani Nttakattifu ni aheera: Kinawuttittimihani, Paapa, Mwanene irimu ni vathi, maana nhaavithela nnya citthu nnya asomi ni acuweli, nanso nhaathoonyera acikani. Khweli, Paapa, kontha commo phuucivenlyayani.
Citthu cothene kihovahiya na Apaapa, ni khaawo noncuwela Mwana, ari hikhanle Athumwane, ni khaawo naacuwela Athumwane ari hikhanle Mwana ni ule Mwana nontthunawe uncuweliha.
Yesu aarukunuwelaka eetthuci awe, ahaahimyacera anari ayaayoru eeraka: Ahoreriya miitho anoona citthu cinoonenyu.
Kinawuhimeryani wiira, minapiyu cinci ni mamwene yahophavela woona inoonenyu, nanso khayoonne, ni yahophavela wiiwa ineewenyu, nanso khayiiwile.
Nananoru, ahonwa ntaphuleli o nlamulo, aaphavela untteha Yesu ni ahoolumaca eeraka: Mwalimu, kipankekeni wiira kaphwanye ukumi woohimala?
Vano Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Yantikhiye isiyani muNlamuloni? Untaphulela cani?
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Waafente Apwiya Nluku aa, ni nrima aa wothene, ni nnepa aa wothene, ni ikuru caa cothene, na ankhili aa othene, ni unfente nkhwaa toko cineefentaa umwanene.
Vano Yesu ahoolumaca eeraka: Uhaakhula ratta. Wapanke commo ni unaahala ukhala nkumi.
Nanso ule aphavelaka wiivirelaca, ahonkoha tho Yesu eeraka: Nkhwaka tipani?
Yesu ahopwaherera wuulumaca eeraka: Nlopwana aakhuma uYerusalemu aarwa uYeriko, ahokhumeleliya na anannyatha. Yahontuphelaca, yahonrulaca coowara cawe, yahomwaattakaca n'unhiya nari mmekho.
Woohipica wene phaavirawe mayasataka yeeyo iphiro iyo, umoona wawe ahonsereka.
Woolikanaca wene ahovira nLevi nenno nipuro nno, umoona wawe ni uyo ahonsereka.
Vano nsamariya aari ni ikwaha awe, ahomphwanya, umoona wawe ahomoonela uthunku.
Ahomwaattamerya ni ahorapiha makhwatta ale ni makhura ni ivinyu, n'utthukaca. Ahonkusa mumpakhirani mwawe ni ahonrwana inupa yoomakiya ni ahontafiti.

Usa waya ahokumiha micurukhu miili co'paratha, ni ahonvaha mwanene inupa yaamakiya ile eeraka: Untafiti ula nlopwan'ola, yakhala tho itthu inhalaa urihakaca yoopwaha ula ncurukhu ula, mi kimmooliva katuruwaka.
Vano wo yaala ooraru ala, tipani nomoonaa ukhala nkhunanawe nlopwana aatupheliye na anannyatha ule?
Vano, ntaphuleli o malamulo ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Yooyo moonenle uthunku uyo. Paahi, Yesu ahomwiirela: Ni we urwee wapanke ciicammo.
Wahoolo yeettacak'ono ni iphiro, Yesu ahophiya mwa aliteya, ni nthiyana neehaninya Marta ahomwaakhelela Yesu uwannyawe.
Yooyo nthiyana uyo ahaana nhimawe eehaninya Mariya onkomile wakhiviru na Apwiya aviriyanaka caasomihaya.
Marta aanawunkuruma, avaraka miteko cinci. Vaavale ahophiya wa Yesu ni aheera: Pwiya, khannoona wiira nhimaaka uyo kihiyenre kivaraka veekha miteko nnyo? Mmwiirele awe aakikavihere.
Apwiya yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Marta, Marta! Ummakela wunkuruma uvaraka citthu cene.
Nanso, imphaveliya itthu imoca paahi; phimaana Mariya hothanla mphantte womaana ni khaawo nohala umwaakha.
Nihuku nimoca Yesu ahorwaa nipuro nooswali. Umaliha wawe uswali, mwiitthuci mmoca ahomwiirela: Pwiya, uniitthucihe mananna oovekela, toko Yohani weetthucihilyawe eetthuci awe.
Ule aheerelaca: Woovekela va, mwiireke coo: Paapa, ncina ninyu nittakattifihiye; Umwene enyu uwe;
Nnivahe iyolya ehu yo'lelo.
Nnilevelele cookosa cihu, toko cinaalevelelehu annikosera; nhinihiye mwa coothepya.
Yesu aheerela tho: Tipani wa nyu rina mpwanawe, nomwaavya uhiyu iriyari ni amwiirelaka: Mpwana, ukikopihe mikatthe miraru
kontha howa nletto aka uwani, ni akirina itthu yommaha.
Ni mpwanawe ule naamwakhula nari mpaani eeraka: Uhikinyakule. Nkhora kihotthyaa, mi na asaana aka nihorupa. Akinlamuliya wunwa wiira kuuvahe.
Kinoohimeryani wiira, pooti uhunwa nlattu wookhala mpwana awe, nanso aahala wunwela wiira hinnyakule, mpaka unvaha cothene caaphavelawe.
Phimaana, mi kinawuhimeryani wiira: Nlepeleke ni nnaavahiya; mwaavyeke ni nnaaphwanya; mwaatteke nkhora ni nnaahuleliya.
Maana ule nolepela nawaakhela, ule naavya naaphwanya ni ule naatta nkhora naahuleliya.
Vano tipani wa nyu ri thumwane ntthu, neera mwanawe anlepelaka nkatthe, anvahaka ikokoottho? Atthuna anlepelaka ihopa, anvahaka inwaa?
Atthuna anlepelaka nooce anvahaka ikhavi?
Vano nyu nri oonanara nrima, nnaacuwela waavaha asaanenyu citthu coorera, eere tho Athumwaninyu ari wirimu anaavaha Nnepa Nttakattifu yaale anonlepela!
Nihuku nimoca Yesu oomola ncini noohooriha wuulumaca. Vaavale ncini nne waakhumaya va, ntthu oohoorya wuulumaca ule, ahopacera wuulumaca, mpaka mphwinko ule wahotikinihinya.
Nanso akina yeera: Noomola macini ayo ni ikuru ca Peelsepu, nlamuli o macini.
Akina ayo yaananttehatteha anlepelaka ikanyero yookhuma wirimu.
Yesu ucuwela wawe moopuwelo aya, aheera: Umwene wothene wakawanyaka unaakwanyuwaca, ciicammo ntthoko nakawanyaka ninaamora.
Sotwani eekawanihacaka mwanene, umwene awe unhala ulipa cani? Kinookoherani commo kontha nyu nneera: Kinoomola macini ayo ni ikuru ca Peelsepu.
Wakhala wiira mi kinoomola macini ni ikuru ca Peelsepu, kaahiki asaanenyu ayo anoomola macini ni ikuru cawani? Phimaana, asaanenyu ayo phinhala wuuhukhumuni.
Wakhala wiira mi kinoomola macini ni nikokho na Nluku, khweli umwene wa Nluku uhophiya warinyu.
Ntthu o'kuru ni owiilipihaca, aronttaka inupa awe, cirinawe cothene cinkhala coosunkiya ratta.
Wahoolo awaaka ntthu nkina ootepa ulipa wompwaha ule, naantthema n'umwaakha ikaruma caakhuluvelawe nnyo, n'ukawaniha mihakhu cawe cothene.
Ule hiri ni mi, naakikhotta, ni ule hinthukumana ni mi, naamwarusa.
Nnepa woonanara wakhumaka mwirutthuni mwa ntthu, uneettakaca mapuro owuuma, waavyaka nipuro noomumula, waahiphwanyeke nipuro, uneera: Kinaaturuwela uwani ukhumilyaka.
Waturuwelaka vale, umphwanya unakweciye ni citthu cothene cinatthonkomanihinye.
Vano, unaakhuma, phirweelaka minepa cikhwawe saapa cootepa unanara woopwaha uyo, ni cakelaka cinkhala mommo, ni makhalelo awe ntthu ule ankhala ootepa unanara woopwaha ukati woopacera.
Vaavale, Yesu oolumacak'ono ala moolumo ala, yahokhuma athiyana amoca, yaari iriyari ya atthu, yahokhuwela yiiraka: Ahoreriya yuuyanre ayo ni mapele awaamwihile ayo.
Nanso Yesu wiiwa wawe aheera: Ahoreriya ale aneewa nuulumo na Nluku n'usunka wanrimani waya.
Ukati waacaraneliyawe Yesu ahoolumaca eeraka: Nna nloko nna noonanara nrima. Nanso hata ikanyero imoca khiiwo inhalaya uvahiya, mari ihikhanle paahi ikanyero ya Yona.
Kontha, toko Yona waakhanlyawe ikanyero ya atthu o'Ninive, ciicammo Mwanawe Pinatamu naahala ukhala ikanyero ya atthu o nenna nloko nna.

Ciicammo, nihuku no'hukhumu, apwiyamwene oohitto anaahala wunwa wiira yaahukhumu atthu o nenna nloko nna, kontha akhumile wiimaleloni wo'lapo wiira yeewe ikano ca Salomoni. Vano, ule ri va, phi muulupale oompwaha Salomoni.
Nihuku no'hukhumu atthu o'Ninive anaahala weemela waryaya atthu o nenna nloko nna ni waahukhumu. Kontha ahorukunusa mirima caya ni nhupi wa Yona. Vano haawo va ule ri muulupale oompwaha Yona.
Khaawo noparihela isamaninya, phweesaka nipuro nowiipithyaa, atthuna upopeela itthuttu, nanso ineesiya wammuttoni, wiira ale othene ankela yoone.
Isamaninya yo'rutthu ari miitho. Miitho aa yakhalaka omaana, irutthu aa yothene inaakhalana imwaleelo. Nanso miitho aa yakhalaka oonanara, irutthu aa inkhala mpiphini.
Vano, mmweheehe ratta, wiira isamaninya irinenyu ihittiphye.
Phimaana, irutthu inyu yothene yamwaleelaka, ihikhalanaka hata mphantte mmoca wooripela, inhala ukhala yothene yowoonnya toko waneeraya isamaninya yamwaleelaka yoonehaka.
Yesu oolumacaka nnya citthu nnya, ahokhuma nfarisi mmoca ni ahonlattula wiira alye uwannyawe. Yesu ahorwaa, ni uphiya wawe ahonkoma wa meeca.
Vano nfarisi ule ahotikhina waamoonnyawe Yesu alyaka woohipacera toko unyawa.
Vano Apwiya yahomwiirela: Nyu mafarisi, nnomakela urapiha ikoopu ni nttiisi vate waya paahi, nanso nhina mmo nnoocarana ifittina ni citthu coohiloka.
Mwaaphuku! Khannocuwela wiira ule pankile vate waya, yooyo phipankile nhina?
Phimaana nvaheke icimola itthu irinenyu, vano citthu cothene phinhalaya wuulokani.

Nanso nhotakhaliya nyu mafarisi, kontha nnawoorya uvaha mphantte wonakhumi wo lonkho, ipirincila ni matakhuru othene o munttimpeni, nanso nnaahanyuriha isariya ni nifento na Nluku! Nyu nolamuliya uttharihelela nnya citthu nnya, woohihiya cikina nnyo.
Nhotakhaliya nyu mafarisi, kontha wuucivelani ihice coopacera mmasinakokani, usalameehiya mmapacarini.
Nhotakhaliya nyu, Nnolikana toko mahiye ookhwelakhwela, pooti uvira ntthu woohicuwelela.
Vaavale, ntaphuleli o nlamulo ahomwiirela Yesu: Mwalimu, woolumacaka commo, ni hi unaaniruwana.
Nanso Yesu aheera: Ciicammo nhotakhaliya nyu ataphuleli o nlamulo, nnaaryaa atthu mirintti coolemela cinene cihinooryaya uteesa; hata nyu mwasinene nnoolwaana ukwanya ni nikokho nimoca.
Nhotakhaliya nyu, nnotekela mahiye o minapiyu yeevakacilyaya mayathumwaninyu.
Commo nnothoonyera wiira cihoocivelani ni nhokupali cipankilyaya mayathumwaninyu okhalayi, maana ayo aheeva minapiyu, vano nyu nnaatekela mahiye aya.
Phimaana Nluku n'ankhili awe, hoolumaca eeraka: Kinaahala waaveleelihera minapiyu ni amitthenka, nanso ayo ankoweeva ni ankowoomolanihaca akina ayo,
wiira nenna nloko nna, nikohakohiye iphome yo minapiyu cothene irihakyeele yompiyeru ittuninya,

ukhuma iphome ya Apeli mpaka ya Sakariya, eeveleliye iriyariru ikhipula ni nipuro nittakattifu. Khweli mi kinawuhimeryani wiira, nna nloko nna ninaahala waalikeleliya wiira phipankile nnya citthu nnya.
Nhotakhaliya nyu ataphuleli o nlamulo, kontha nhokusa mitthukulo ca ankhili; vano nyu mwasinene khannotthuna ukela, ni nnawaattiyelela atthu yaaphavela ukela.
Yesu uthama wawe vale, ataphuleli o nlamulo ni mafarisi yahopacera unvaanyiha venci n'unkohaca citthu cinci.
Ale yaavya mananna owiira amphwanyane nthwaa noonriyelela.

Yooyo ukati uyo, yahothukumana atthu ilufu ilufu cene, mpaka akina yaannyakelana ntthu ni nkhwawe. Yesu ahopacera waahimyacera eetthuci awe eeraka: Mwirattavelele ni miropo co mafarisi, uri unamirima miili.
Khiiwo yovithyaa ihinhala wooneleliya, ni khiiwo yowipithyaa ihinhala wooneleliya.
Kontha yothene yuulumacilenyu mpiphini, inaahala wiiwannyaa wakwalya, ni ile yuulumacilenyu mwaapaka mpaani, inaahala wiiwannyaa vate.
Vano asimpwanaka, kinoohimeryani wiira: Nhoove ale aneeva irutthu ni uhoolo nwo ahooryaka upanka itthu phi itthu.
Nanso mi kinawuthoonyerani nolamuliyenyu umoova: Mmooveke Nluku, neera eevaka irutthu, akhalanaka ikuru yoovonyera umooroni. Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira yooyo phinlamuliyenyu umoova.
Khaantumihinyaka asaanuni athanu inota piili? Nanso khaawo hata mwaanuni mmoca ri ooliyaliya wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Mpaka ikharari cinyu cothene co mmuru cihaalikeliya. Nhoove, nyu nhaana ifayita wowaapwaha asaanuni enci.
Nanlelo kinoohimeryani wiira, ule nokirumelela wamiithoni wa atthu, ciicammo Mwanawe Pinatamu nokonrumelela wamiithoni wa ancelo a Nluku,
nanso ule nohala ukiruna wamiithoni wa atthu, ciicammo kinaahala unruna wamiithoni wa ancelo a Nluku.
Othene nohala umuulumacera yoonanara Mwanawe Pinatamu, naahala uleveleliya, nanso ule nohala ukufurwela Nnepa Nttakattifu, khanhala uleveleliya.
Mwarwaaninyaka mmasinakokani ni wamiithoni wa ahooleli ni wa alamuli, nhisanke mwaavyaka itthu yo waakhula, ni citthu coohala wuulumaca;
kontha yooyo ukati uyo Nnepa Nttakattifu unkowiitthucihani citthu coohala wuulumaca.
Vaavale, ntthu mmoca aheera: Mwalimu, munhimerye munnaka wiira nikawane mihakhu cihiyeriyehu.
Nanso Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Nlopwana, tipani kithanlile mi ukhala mayohukhumu atthuna mayokawaniha mihakhu?
Yesu ahopwaherera eeraka: Mweette ratta, mwiisunke ni mwiicinanele cihuupahuleni isooyo, kontha ntthu wo wiira akhale omaana, kuhiwena ukhalana mihakhu cinci.
Wahoolo ahaahimyacera nna nlikanihero nna eeraka: Nlopwana thaciri ahoruwerya venci mmattani mwawe.
Vano aanawuupuwela wanrimani wawe, eeraka: Kinhala wiira cani, akinoona woohela coolya caka nnya!
Ule ahopwaherera wuupuwela eeraka: Paahi kihocuwela, kinaakwanyulaca makhupi aka othene, kiteke makina moolupale. Vano kiheleke coolya caka nnyo ni mihakhu caka cothene.
Vano kiciireleke: Uhaana mihakhu cinci coohala ulya myakha cinci, umumule, ulye, uwurye ni utteeliye.
Nanso Nluku ahomwiirela: Ntirikhi! Yoola uhiyu ula ukumi aa unaahala ukusiya, vano citthu citthonkomanihilyaa nnyo cinhala ukhala cawani?
Ciicammo phinkhalawe ntthu neesunkera mihakhu, nanso wamiithoni wa Nluku kahiwe thaciri.
Wahoolo Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe: Phimaana kinawuhimeryani wiira, nhikhale ni masukuli mphavelaka iyolya ni ikuwo yoowara.
Kontha ukumi unaavikana iyolya, ni irutthu inaavikana coowara.
Mwaawehe anakhuku, khaanaala ni khaanrottovola, khaarina icikutti hata nikhupi, nanso Nluku nawaavaha iyolya. Nyu mw'atthu o'fayita waapwaha asaanuni!
Khaawo mwa nyu, neera eekurumicaka, phooryaka wuncerera nliko wo'kumi awe.
Vano nyu nnawoolwana upanka itthu yankani, kaahiki nnokhalelani isukuli mphavelaka uvara cikina nnyo?
Nkawehani ithutu cineeraya wowunnuwa, khacinvara nteko mena khacintthava ikuwo. Nanso mi kinoohimeryani wiira, hata Salomoni ni nttittimiho nawe nothene, khaawanre toko nnya ithutu nnya.
Vano mooneke mananna Nluku cinwarihawe makukhu o ntakhwani, ankhala ilelo ni meelo ampahiya wamooroni. Commo naahala wuuwarihani nyu, atthu owaamini vakani!
Vano nhaavye mwiiraka: Kinhala ulyani ni kinhala uwuryani? Nhirecele cennyo.
Kontha amalaponi o wattuniyani phinaavya cennyo citthu nnyo, nanso Athumwaninyu anaacuwela cothene cimphavelenyu.
Uhiya commo, mwaavye Umwene wa Nluku, ni nnyo citthu nnyo nnaahala wuncereriya.
Nhoove, nyu mphwinko mwankani, kontha Athumwaninyu uhaacivela wuuvahani umwene aya.
Ntumihe cothene cirinenyu ni nvahe icimola; mwiipankele nrupa woohithaala ni nsunke mihakhu cinyu wirimu, wonwo uhimmalaya, uhimphiyawe namwinnya ni uhinliyaya nrenci.
Kontha nipuro niryaya nhakhu inyu, vaava ciicammo phiryaya nrima enyu.
Nkhale owiitthenkacene, isamaninya cinyu cikhale coopariheliyene.
Nkhale toko ananteko anommwehererya nkunya aya narweele usikuhuuluni yoothelaninya. Ale ankhala owiitthenkacene wiira, aturuwaka urweelyawe nwo ni aattaka nkhora, ahipice unhulela.
Ahoreriya ananteko anhala uphwanyinya aronttaka, aturuwaka nkunya aya. Weekhweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, nkunya aya naahala wiiwaracela ni waavaha nipuro wameeca ni waakawela iyolya mwanene.
Aturuwaka nkunya aya uhiyu iriyari atthuna mapikosa, ahoreriya ananteko anhala uphwanyinya aronttaka.
Ncuwele wiira, mwanene itthoko aacuwela ukati ummwawe namwinnya, khaahiyerera uhukhaciya itthoko awe.
Phimaana nyu nkhale owiitthenkaca kontha Mwana a Pinatamu naahala uwa ukati uhimmwehererenyu.
Vano Peturu ahonkoha Yesu eeraka: Pwiya, nenna nlikanihero nna nnonihimerya hi, atthuna atthu othene?
Apwiya yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Nhooleli a ananteko o waaminnyaa ni aankhili, ph'ule vahaceriye ni nkunya awe wiira aavahe iyolya ananteko akhwawe n'ukati aya.
Horeriya nanteko nohala uphwanyinya ni nkunya awe wanhalawe uwa, avaraka nteko womaana.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira naahala unvahacera uhooleli wo citthu cothene.
Nanso nanteko ule oopuwelacaka eeraka: Nkunya aka naapica uwa, vano phipaceraka waattakaca ananteko asilopwana na asithiyana, alyaka, awuryaka n'uhapaliya.
Vano nkunya awe ule naahala uturuwa nihuku nahaawehereryawe ni ukati wahaacuwelawe. Ule aphwanyeriyaka nokottarusiya ni waalikeleliya wamoca na atthu oohaamini.
Nanteko nocuwela itthu inoncivela nkunya awe, phihipankaka toko cinoncivelaya, naahala uttarusiya ni waafyulaciya venci.

Vano nanteko hincuwela inoncivela nkunya awe, apankaka citthu coophwanela uttarusiya, nohala waafyulaciya vakani. Phimaana ule vahiye venci, phinhala utepa uwehawehiya, ni ule tepile ukhuluveliya phinhala utepa ukohakohiya.
Wahoolo Yesu aheera: Mi kaaweenle uparihela mooro mwiilaponi ni wahokicivela woona unapharenle!
Mi kihaana upattiso unhalaka upattisiya; kinaacukula mpaka wanhalaya wiirannyaa.
Nnooniha wiira mi kiwiihile mpuha vathi va? Mena, kinawuhimeryani wiira kiwiihile ukawannya.
Kontha ukhuma nenna va mpaka uhoolo, atthu athanu anari ntthoko nimoca, anaahala uhawulana, atthu araru ayo anawaanana eeli, ciicammo eeli ayo anawaanana araru.
Ni ankohawulana: Mwana na athumwane, athumwane ni mwanaya; mwanthiyana na anumwane, anumwane ni mwanaya mwanthiyana; annyara mwana na amwaara mwanaya, ni amwaara mwanaya na annyara mwana.
Ciicammo ahohimerya mphwinko ule eeraka: Moonaka nihutte unkela ncuwa, phineerenyu inaarupa ipula, ni khweli inaarupa ipula.
Vano yawukaka iphyoo yookhuma uhitto, nyu nneera ninaaviha nttukuttha, ni khweli ninaaviha nttukuttha.
Anamirima miili! Nyu nnawoorya utaphulela makhalelo o'lapo ni makhalelo o'rimu, vano moolwane utaphulela ciryaya ala mahuku ala?
Nlattuni nyu nhiihukhumuku upanka itthu yo'sariya?
Ntthu ookasariki wa hukhumu, upanke mananna othene wiira nlattu uyo umalele mphironi; waacera huurwane mpaka wa hukhumu, hukhumu uyo ookusaka mpaka wa mayorontta ni mayorontta oorwanaka ukalaposo.
Phimaana mi kinawuhimeryani wiira, khannohala ukhuma wonwo nhinaya uliva itoosu yo wiiheerya.
Yooyo ukati uyo yahaawo atthu nipuro naaryawe Yesu, yaanttonkela mwaha wo akalileya, yaalamunlyawe Pilatu wiivakaciya, iphome aya iyo itakaniheriyaka ni isataka yaapankaya.
Vano Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nnoona wiira yaayo akalileya ayo, apankeliye commo, nlattu wootepa ukosa wowaapwaha akina ayo?
Mena! Mi kinoohimeryani wiira mwaahirukunuseke nrima, ni nyu ciicammo nnaakhwa.
Atthuna nnooniha wiira yaale atthu khumi na naane ale, yaaphituwenle inupa yoorekama yo'Silowe ni akhwaacaka, yaari ootepa ukosa wo waapwaha atthu othene ankhala uYerusalemu?
Mena! Mi kinoohimeryani wiira mwaahirukunuseke nrima, ni nyu ciicammo nnaakhwa.
Wahoolo Yesu ahottonka nna nlikanihero nna eeraka: Nlopwana ahaala mwiri wo nfikera mmattani mwawe. Warwelyawe waavya cowiima, khaaphwanyile itthu.

Phimaana ahomwiirela nlopwana aakhaliha mmattani ule: Kiheetta myakha miraru kiwaaka uwehaweha cowiima ula mwiri ula, nanso akimphwanya itthu. Uthikile. Nlattuni mwiri ula waakelaka nipuro nna ni uyo uhiimaka?
Nanteko ule ahaakhula eeraka: Nkunya, uhiye tho ula mwakha ula, mi kinaakhurerya ntotho mmo, n'uhela icaayira.
Weemaka wahorera, wahiime tho, nnaalamulaka wiira uthikiliye.
Nkwaha mmoca, nihuku no ntivela, Yesu aansomiha nsinakoka.
Vano yahowa athiyana amoca yaamalihile myakha khumi na naane awerennyaka nlattu wo macini. Woweetta va yaanawooroma ni yaanawooceela wiinuwa.
Ukati woonnyawe Yesu aheehana ni aheerela: Nthiyana, uhootopwaa iretta yaarinaa iyo.
Vaavale ahaathatela matata, ni wowaakuvyaca wene yaheenuwa n'upacera unttittimiha Nluku.

Vano nhooleli o nsinakoka ahorusiya nlattu woovoniha Yesu nihuku no ntivela, ni ahoolumacera atthu ale eeraka: Ahaawo mahuku siita yaalikeleliye uvara nteko. Mmweeke yaayo mahuku ayo mwaavonihiyeke; nhiwe tho ntivela.
Nanso Yesu ahomwiirela: Nyu anamirima miili! Khula ntthu wa nyu khanhulelaka imope cawe ni apuuru awe nihuku no ntivela ahakhelelaka wuuwuryani?
Vano naahala uhimoopola cani nantthukiya ula nihuku no ntivela? Ula ciicammo mwana a Aparahamu, aatthukiye n'utulumwinya ni Sotwani myakha khumi na naane.
Wuulumaca wawe commo, eenani awe othene yahoolihaciya muru. Nanso atthu othene yahotteeliya mwa nlattu wo citthu caapankilyawe Yesu coonttittimiha Nluku.
Vano Yesu ahokoha eeraka: Umwene wa Nluku unlikana isiyani? Atthuna kilikanihereke isiyani?
Unlikana toko inuku yo nrale, yaanlyawe ntthu mmattani mwawe, imelaka, yunnuwaka ni ukhalaka mwiri muulupale, mpaka asaanuni utekela ipuru caya mmirittani mmo.
Wahoolo ahopwaherera wuulumaca eeraka: Nilikanihereke isiyani Umwene wa Nluku?
Unlikana ni miropo caakusiye na athiyana ni yaheethela mphepani yinci, ni iphepa yothene yahottuttula.
Yesu waarwawe uYerusalemu ahovira mmasittatti ni mwa aliteya asomihaka nuulumo na Nluku.
Ntthu mmoca ahomwiirela: Pwiya, atthu anoopwa ayo ari vakani?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Mwiikhanyererihe ukelela nkhora woophurya, kontha mi kinoohimeryani wiira atthu enci anaahala waavya ukela, nanso khaanhala woorya.
Mwanene inupa onwaka arwaaka utthyaa nkhora, nyu nnari mphantte wo vate, nnaahala waatta nkhora mwiiraka: Pwiya, nnihulele. Uyo naahala uwaakhulani eeraka: Akincuwela unkhumenyu.
Vano nnokowiira: Naalyaaca ni naawuryaca wamoca ni we, ni waanasomihaka mmaphironi mwihu.
Nanso uyo nokowiirelani: Akincuwela unkhumenyu. Nkhume waryaka, nyu othene nnopanka citthu coonanara!
Vaavale unkokhala wunla ni ucekesa miino, wanhalenyu umoona Aparahamu, Isaki, Yakopi ni minapiyu cothene, wumweneni wa Nluku, nyu nnavonyeriye vate.
Atthu enci anaahala uwa, akhumaka mphantte unkhuma ncuwa, akina mphantte unkela ncuwa, akina mphantte wo'culu ni akina mphantte wo'hitto, awaaka wunkoma wameeca wumweneni wa Nluku.
Khweli ahaawo owiiheerya ankokhala oopacera, ni oopacera ankokhala owiiheerya.
Yooyo ukati uyo mafarisi akina yahowa unhimerya Yesu yiiraka: Uthame ula upuro ula, kontha Heroti nophavela uwiiva.
Nanso uyo ahaakhula eeraka: Murwee mwanhimyacere yooyo khwantte uyo, wiira ilelo ni meelo kinoomola minepa coonanara ni waavoniha aretta, ni nrotto phinhalaka umaliha.
Phatari keette ilelo, meelo ni nrotto, kontha nnapiyu khanlamuliya ukhwela uta wo'Yerusalemu.

Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, we uneevakaca minapiyu ni waavonyakaca ale aveleliheriyaa! Imaara kavi kiphavelaka waathukumaniha asaanaa, toko nankuttu wanaakhuparelawe asaanawe mmapuphani, nanso we khutthunne.
Nviriyane; inupa enyu iyo khinhala ukhaliya. Paahi, mi kinoohimeryani wiira, ukhuma nenna va, khannohala ukoona tho, mpaka wanhalenyu wiira: Horeriya ule nowa mwa ncina na Apwiya!
Nkwaha mmoca, nihuku no ntivela, Yesu ahokela mpaani mwa nhooleli o mafarisi wiira alye; atthu yaari vaavale yeera ammwehecesaka.
Vaavale ahaawo nlopwana owiipakana.
Vano Yesu ahaakoha ataphuleli o nlamulo ni mafarisi, eeraka: Wanaalamuliya uvoniha nihuku no ntivela?
Ale yahomaalaca. Vano Yesu ahonvara ntata, ahonvoniha ni ahomwiirela: Urweeke uwani.
Vaavale ahaakohaca eeraka: Kaahiki tupani wa nyu neera, mwanawe atthuna imope awe inawuluwenle nluusi, haakuvelaka ukumiha mwa nlattu wookhala nihuku no ntivela?
Ale khiiwo yaamwaakhunlyaya.
Woonawe mayolattuliya mananna yaathanlaya mapuro oopacera, ahaattonkela nna nlikanihero nna, eeraka:
Walattuliyaka ni ntthu wasikuhuuluni yoothelaninya, uhaakuveleke wunkoma nipuro noopacera, waacera uhiire wunkomaka, awaaka mayolattuliya nkina ootepa uhisimya wowuupwaha we.
Vano awaaka oolattunle ule awiirelaka: Waavahe nipuro nno ala, unkoowuulihaca muru woorwa wunkoma nipuro noomaverihela.

Nanso walattuliyaka, upacereke wunkoma nipuro noomaverihela; wiira awaaka oolattunle uyo, awiireleke: Mpwana, urweeke wonkomeke uhoolo. Vano we unkoohisimiya wamiithoni wa atthu othene arinaa wameeca.
Phimaana, ntthu nohala wiicunnuwiha naahala uyevihiya ni ule nohala wiiyeviha, naahala wunnuwihiya.

Ciicammo ahomwiirela aanlattunle ule: Wapankaka iyolya atthuna isikuhuulu, uhaalattuleke asimpwanaa, atthuna asunnaa, hata alokwaa, atthuna aattamanani aa oopuha, waacera wiira, ahikela yoolattula ni we, wakhalaka toko anaalivyaanihera.
Nanso wapankaka isikuhuulu, waalattuleke atthu oohuva, owuntakyaa, oottumpela ni atthu oohoona;
ni unhala ukhala ooreriya kontha ayo khaanhala woona itthu yowuulivyaanihera, nanso itthuvo aa unhala waakhela wanhalaya wunwelela atthu o'sariya.
Vaavale, weewilyawe nlopwana aari wameeca ni Yesu, ahoolumaca eeraka: Horeriya ule nokela ulya nkatthe wumweneni wa Nluku.
Vano Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nlopwana mmoca ahopanka isikuhuulu awe ni ahaalattula atthu enci.
Waaphilyaya ukati woolyaciya ahonruma nrumeyi awe wiira aahimyacere atthu othene yaalattuliye wiira: Mmweeke, kontha iyolya iyo ihotthonkomanihinya.
Nanso khula ntthu ahopacera wiittiyelelaca ni nkheci awe. Oopacer'oyo ahoolumaca eeraka: Kihoothuma imatta yonaanano, kimphavela urwaa woona; uhiire kihookhotta.
Nkina uyo aheera: Kihoothuma maphara mathanu o'mope; kimphavela urwaa uttehererya; uhiire kihookhotta.
Nkina uyo ahaakhula eeraka: Kithenle naanano, phimaana akinoorya urwaa.

Waturuwilyawe nrumeyi ule, ahonttonkela nkunya awe citthu cothene. Vano ahoviruwa mwanene itthoko ule ni ahonruma nrumeyi eeraka: Urwee wowaakuvyaca wene, mmaparaparani ni mmaphironi co nsittatti, waawaane atthu oohuva, owuntakyaa, oohoona ni oottumpela.
Wahoolo nrumeyi ule ahoolumaca eeraka: Nkunya, kihopanka toko caakirumilyaa, nanso nanlelo ahaawo mapuro.
Nkunya awe ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Ukhume, urwee mmaphironi ni mmiphitoni waavarelace atthu othene anhalaa waaphwanya, yaakele mpaani mwaka wiira ncariye.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira khaawo hata mmoca, wa yaale atthu yaalattuliye nohala ulawiha iyolya yo'sikuhuulu aka.
Nkwaha mmoca Yesu aantthariya na atthu enci, vano ule arukunuwelaka uttuli ahoolumaca eeraka:
Ntthu akiweelaka mi, aaheenananeke athumwane, anumwane, amwaarawe, asaanawe, asunnawe, asirokorawe ni ciicammo ukumi awe woovikana mi, khanoorya ukhala mwiitthuci aka.
Ni ntthu phi ntthu aahikuseke nsalapa awe akittharaka mi, khanoorya ukhala mwiitthuci aka.
Vano tipani wa nyu, aphavelaka uteka inupa awe, himpacera toko wunkoma, apankelaka ihisapu yovyoompo caahalawe uvarela nteko ni woonela wakhala wiira cinaatosera?
Wiira hinteke caasaru, oolwanaka umaliha inupa iyo, ni anhala uvira ayo apaceraka untarawa,
yiiraka: Ula nlopwan'ola cuwenle uhaculaca uteka nwo, nanso hoolwaana umaliha.

Atthuna, mweneni neera arwaaka umwaanana mwene nkhwawe, himpacera wunkoma, oopuwelaka wiira, anatoropa ilufu khumi (10.000) arinawe anawoorya waanana anatoropa ilufu sirini (20.000) ari ni mwene nkin'oyo?
Oonaka wiira khanoorya, naanruma mwaakhula awe urwaa wa mwene nkhwawe nari uttayi, wiira civaraninye myoono ni ikhale isalama.
Phimaana khula ntthu wa nyu, aahihiyeke citthu cothene cirinawe, khanoorya ukhala mwiitthuci aka.
Khweli, maakha ari itthu yoorera, nanso yalulaka, nnohala uturusela cani uciva waya nwo?
Paahi khaarina tho icaayira watthayani ni khaanonttelaniha, anaarihiya paahi. Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele.
Vano, mayoliviha nsoko ni anatampi yahothukumana aphavelaka umwiiwa Yesu.
Vaavale, mafarisi ni mayowantikha yahopacera waapa yiiraka: Ula uncivela waakhelela ni waalyana anatampi.
Vano Yesu ahaattonkela nna nlikanihero nna eeraka:
Tipani wa nyu neera, narina ikhontwaa iminya; inrimelaka imoca iyo, hinhiya ikhontwaa tuswini na khentta (99) nnyo cinari ucavalani, arwaaka waavyavya inrimenle iyo mpaka uphwanya?
Aphwanyaka naakusa wanikhatani, ni nokhala ootteeliya venci.
Vano aphiyaka uwannyawe, nawaalattula asimpwanawe ni aattamanani awe othene, eeraka: Asimpwanaka ntteeliye ni mi, kontha ikhontwaa yaavyaka iyo kihophwanya.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, ciicammo wirimu unkokhala utthapa, mwa nlattu woorukunusa nrima natampi mmoca, waavikana atthu tuswini na khentta (99) o'sariya ahirina itampi.
Nthiyanani, neera narina ncurukhu awe khumi wo'paratha, unrihyaka mmoca, himparihela isamaninya awe, akwecakwecaka mpaani mmo ni aavyaavyaka ratta mpaka uphwanya?
Vano attottaka, naweehana asincunawe ni aattamanani awe othene, eeraka: Ntteeliye ni mi, kontha ncurukhu waavyaka uyo kihophwanya.
Mi kinoohimeryani wiira, ciicammo wamiithoni wa ancelo a Nluku, uhaawo utthapa nlattu wa natampi mmoca norukunusa nrima.
Yesu ahopwaherera eeraka: Ahaawo nlopwana mmoca aarina asaanawe eeli.
Omwankani ule aheerela athumwane: Paapa, nkikawele mphantte wo nhakhu waahalenyu ukihiyera. Vano athumwane yahaakawelaca oyeeli mihakhu nnyo.
Anavinre mahuku vakani, omwankani ule, ahototokaniha mihakhu cawe nnye ni ahorwaa ilapo yoottayi. Wonwo ahorihakaca mihakhu cawe nnye cothene mpaka unkela umasikiini.
Vano narihakacilene mihakhu cawe cothene, yeele ilapo ile yahovola itala yinci ni ahopacera uhuva.
Vaavale ahorwaa ulepela nteko, ntthoko na nnenci o yeele ilapo ile. Nnenci ule, ahonruma uliha ikuluwe caari muncicini umattani wawe.
Nlattu wo'tala, aaphavela unlya nankanka o'kuluwe, maana khaawo aanvaha iyolya.
Vano ahoopuwela veekhawe eeraka: Ananteko akavi a apaapa arina iyolya yootosa; mi uno kikhwaaka itala!
Kinaaturuwela wa apaapa, ni keerele: Paapa, kihonkosera Nluku ni kihookoserani nyu.
Mi akinphwanela tho wiihaninya mwaninyu; nkipanke toko nanteko enyu.
Vaavale wunwa wawe ahorwaa wa athumwane. Ale umoona waya awaaka uttayi, wahaakela uthunku, yahontthimakela, yahonkapatta ni yahonsalameeha.
Vano mwana ule aheera: Paapa, kihonkosera Nluku ni kihookoserani nyu. Akimphwanela tho wiihaninya mwaninyu.
Nanso athumwane ale yaheerela ananteko aya: Mmwaane wowaakuvyaca ikuwo comaana nnyo, ni mummwarihe. Mummwarihe nnela nnikokhoni mmo ni ikwakwatta nnyaani mmo.
Ciicammo mummwaane mwamope ooneneva uyo ni munhite. Ninkhure ni nitthape,
kontha mwanaka ula ahokhwa, vano hokhala nkumi; ahorimela, vano hophwanyannya. Ni wahopaceriya utthapiya.
Yooyo ukati uyo, mwana omuulupale aari umattani. Waaturuwawe, aattameryaka uwani, aheewa macoma.
Vano ahomwiihana nanteko mmoca ni ahonkoha eeraka: Itthu iyo isiyani?
Nanteko ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Howa mwanhimaa. Vano athumwana ayo ahonhita mwamope ooneneva, kontha hooturuwa nari nkumi.
Mwana omuulupale ule ahorusiya ni khaatthuna ukela nluwani mmwe. Vano athumwane yahokhuma ni yahorwaa umpepeca,
nanso ule aheerela athumwane: Kihoovarelani nteko myakha cinci, akinahanyuriha hata nlamulo nimoca, ni khannakivaha hata ipuri imoca wiira kitthape na asimpwanaka.
Vano uturuwa wawe ula mwaninyu ula rihakacile mihakhu cinyu ni mapuuta, nhonhitela mwamope ooneneva!
Vano athumwane yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Mwanaka, we uri ni mi ukati wothene, ni cirinaka cothene ciri cawaa.
Phimaana naalamuliya utthapa n'utteeliya, kontha nhimaa ahokhwa vano hokhala nkumi, ahorimela vano hophwanyannya.
Nkwaha mmoca Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe: Ahaawo nlopwana thaciri, aarina nanteko awe. Thaciri ule ahohimeriya wiira: Nanteko aa horihakaca mihakhu caa nnyo.
Vaavale ahomwiihana ni ahonkoha eeraka: Ineewaka uromolaceriyak'eyo isiyani? Nrwee naalikele citthu cothene ciri mapuro anvaraa nteko, kontha kunkhala tho nanteko aka.
Vano nanteko ule ahoopuwela eeraka: Kinhala upankani, nkunya aka akikumihaka nteko? Urwaa wuulimani akinoorya; uvira kilepelacaka icimola, ukuuliha muru.
Kihocuwela inhalaka upanka kakumihiyaka nteko, wowiira atthu ayo yakaakhelele mmatthokoni mwaya.
Vaavale, ahomwiihana khula ntthu aakophile ncurukhu wa nkunya awe. Vano ahonkoha oopacer'ole eeraka: Unkophenle kavi nkunya aka?
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Mirinkhi iminya co makhura. Vano nanteko ule ahomwiirela: Ihisapu aa phi ila, wunkome ni wowaakuvyaca wene wantikhe: Mirinkhi hansini (50).
Wahoolo ahonkoha tho nkina eeraka: We ukophile kavi? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Anamaroco iminya o tiriku. Vano nanteko ule ahomwiirela: Ihisapu aa phi ila, wantikhe: Anamaroco thamanini (80).
Vano nkunya ule, ahonttottopela nanteko oohilok'ole, nlattu woowalaala wawe. Kontha atthu o yeela ittuniya ila, ari ootepa uwalaala munlokoni mwaya, wowaapwaha asaana ari o waarya.
Khweli mi kinoohimeryani wiira: Mphakele umpwana ntthumiriki mihakhu coohi isariya, wiira mihakhu nnyo coomwaryakani, ayo yawaakhelelekeni mmapuroni oohimala.
Ule nororomelya ni citthu vakani, naaroromelya ni citthu cinci; vano ule hinroromelya ni citthu vakani, khanroromelya ni citthu cinci.
Kontha nyu mwaahikhaleke oororomelyaa mmihakhuni coohi isariya, tipani nohala wuroromelani mmihakhuni ceekhweli?
Mwaahikhaleke oororomelyaa ni citthu ca asinene, tipani nohala wuvahani ile iri yawinyu?

Khaawo nanteko nohala woorya waarumeela akunya eeli, kontha naahala unrusanana mmoca n'unfenta nkina uyo, atthuna nohala unlemeliha mmoca n'unvenwiha nkina uyo. Khawanooryaa unrumeela Nluku n'urumeela mihakhu.
Vaavale mafarisi wiiwa waya nnya citthu nnya, ukhala wiira yaari anasooyo, yaanancuulela.
Vano Yesu aheerela: Nyu phi nyu nneehimyahimerya waatthuni, nanso Nluku hocuwela nrima enyu, kontha itthu iri yo'halali wamiithoni wa atthu, iri yo'haramu wa miithoni wa Nluku.
Nlamulo na Musa ni Minapiyu, ciheetteliya mpaka ukati wa Yohani, ukhuma yooyo ukati uyo mpaka nna, unlalennya Nhupi woomwene wa Nluku, ni khula ntthu nawiikurumica aphavelaka ukela.
Ni wari wookhwya umala irimu ni itthaya, nanso khawanooryaa ufuttiya nlepa nimoca no Nlamulo.
Ntthu naamwalanana amwaarawe, mari uhikhanle paahi nlattu wooluva, phwaathelaka akina, neetta uluva. Ni nlopwana aathelaka athiyana oomwalananiya, neetta uluva.
Yesu ahopwaherera wuulumaca eeraka: Ahaawo nlopwana thaciri, aawara ikuwo cootepa urika ni mahuku othene aalya coociva wapuwani wawe.
Ciicammo ahaawo masikiini mmoca eehaninya Lasaru, oocara makhwatta ni onkomesa wankhora wa thaciri ule;
aavyaka ulya caamoramora wameecani, ni alapwa yaanlatalata makhwatta awe.
Wahoolo ahokhwa masikiini ule, ni ahokusiya na ancelo mpaka waryawe Aparahamu; ciicammo ahokhwa thaciri ule ni ahosikhiya.
Vano thaciri ule nari umooroni, atulumwinyak'ono, ahowusa miitho awe, ahomoona Lasaru uttayi nari na Aparahamu.
Vano ahokhuwela eeraka: Paapa Aparahamu, nkoonele ikiriri! Munrume Lasaru wiira anaanihe uhathani wo nikokho nawe nno, ni awe woono aattipihe nlimi naka, kontha kinaatulumwinya ni malimi o mooro.
Vano Aparahamu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Mwanaka, wuupuweleke wiira uhaakhela citthu comaana unari nkumi, nanso Lasaru, aakhenle ukati wothene citthu coonanara; phimaana naapepeciya, we utulumwinyaka.
Uhiya commo, iriyariru hi ni nyu, nihaawo nlitti no wiisa, wahinooryaya utuphaniha ookhuma uno awaaka nwo ni wahinooryaya utuphaniha ookhuma nwo awaaka uno.
Vano ahoolumaca tho eeraka: Contte, kinawulepelani paapa, wiira munrume Lasaru uwani wa apaapa,
aavahe usaahiti asihimaaka athanu, wiira na ayo ahiwe umahuvihoni uryaka uno.
Aparahamu ahaakhula eeraka: Ayo ahaana Musa ni Minapiyu; yeeweleleke yaayo.
Nanso ule ahokhanyerera eeraka: Mena, paapa Aparahamu; akhumaka ntthu iriyari ya atthu ookhwa, anaahala urukunusa nrima.
Vaavale, Aparahamu ahaakhula eeraka: Yaahimwiiweke Musa ni Minapiyu, khaanhala ukupali mena vakani, hata onwelelaka ntthu ookhwa.
Wahoolo Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe: Cinaahala ukhumelela cowaakosiha atthu, nanso hotakhaliya ntthu nohala unkosiha nkhwawe.
Phatari natthukeleliye nsilo nsiko mmo, avonyeriyaka mpahari, wahohiyana unkosiha mmoca wa ala asaana ala.
Mwiikasoope. Munnaa ookoseraka ummameke; vano uyo arukunusaka nrima, unleveleleke.
Ookoseraka imaara saapa nihuku nimoca, ni khula ikwaha oophwanyaka wuuhimerya wiira kihorukunusa nrima, unleveleleke.
Vano amitthenka yaheerelaca Apwiya: Nnuncerere nroromelo nihu!
Apwiya yahaakhula yiiraka: Nroromelo ninyu nakhalaka toko inuku yo nrale, nnaahala wiirela ula mphupe ula: Wiiphele ni weephattye upahari. Ni uyo unaahala uwiiwelelani.
Tipani wa nyu neera, narina nanteko awe nolima mmattani atthuna nohakhela inama ni aturuwaka umattani nwo phimwiirelaka: Uweeke woono waalyeke?
Uhiya commo, nohala wiira: Waapyace iyolya, uwarace ni ukiwiihere kaalye, kamaleliyaka ni we ulyeke ni uwuryeke.
Nnoona wiira nanteko ule unaamphwanela usukuriya kontha hoopanka itthu iruminyawe?
Ni nyu ciicammo, nnavanrene cothene ciruminyenyu, wahoolo mwiireke: Niri ananteko oohi ifayita, maana nivanre paahi itthu iruminyehu.
Yesu arwaaka uYerusalemu, ahovira iriyariru uSamariya ni uKalileya.
Waakelawe aliteya amoca, yahonsiceerya anamakuttula khumi, ni yeemelacile uttayi.
Ale yaammwiihana yiiraka: Yesu, Mwalimu, unoonele ikiriri.
Vano Yesu woona wawe aheerela: Nrweeke mweethoonyihereke wa mayasataka. Vano ale yeettacak'ono, yahovona makuttula ayo.
Mmoca mwa ale woonnyawe wiira hovona, ahoturuwa akhuwelaka venci anttittimihaka Nluku.
Ahokhoroma wamettoni wa Yesu, apiihaka iyuuci vathi ahonsukuru, ni yooyo aari nsamariya.
Vano Yesu ahonkoha eeraka: Khayaari khumi avonihinye ayo? Ari vayi khentta ayo?
Khaawo tho nkina oohala uturuwa, awaaka unttittimiha Nluku, ari hikhanle yoola nsamariya ula?
Phimaana ahomwiirela: Wunweke ni urweeke, waamini waa uhowoopola.
Nkwaha mmoca, Yesu ahokohiya ni mafarisi wiira: Unhala uwa yakhani umwene wa Nluku? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Umwene wa Nluku khunoonnya wammwaya.
Ni khunhala wiiriya: Ula va! Atthuna: Uri nwo! Kontha umwene wa Nluku uri wariyari winyu.
Wahoolo aheerela eetthuci awe: Unaaphiya ukati unkelenyu uphavela woona nihuku nimoca na Mwanawe Pinatamu, nanso khannohala umoona.
Ni nnokowiireliya: Ula va! Atthuna: Uyo nwo! Nhirwee ni nhaattharatthare.
Kontha uri toko uverunya ummwaleelaya nlootho ni nlootho no'rimu, ciicammo phinhalaya wiirannyaa nihuku noowa Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Nanso woopacera nolamuliya uhuvihiya venci, ni ukhottiya ni nenna nloko nna.
Ciicammo, toko ceeranelyaya mahuku a Nowee, phinhalaya wiirannyaa mahuku oowa Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Atthu yaanlya, yaanwurya, yaanthelana n'uthelihaninya, mpaka nihuku naakenlyawe Nowee nkalawani, ni ahowa naphuvu oocara maasi, mpaka weevakaca atthu othene.
Itthu toko ila yaheerannyaa ukati wa Loti. Waanliya, waanwuriya, waantumihiya n'uthuminya, waanaaliya ni waantekiya.
Nanso nihuku naakhumilyawe Loti uSotoma, wirimu nwo wahomora mooro ni uka, ni wahaapaha othene.
Ciicammo phinhalaya wiirannyaa nihuku ninhalawe uwa Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Nenno nihuku nno, ule ri wancaarani hikhuruwe wiira akuse mihakhu cawe mpaani. Ciicammo ule ri umattani hituruwele uttuli wiira akuse itthu.
Moopuwele amwaarawe Loti.
Ule notthuna woopola ukumi awe, unanrihyaa. Ule unonrihyaa ukumi awe, naahala uphwanya.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, yooyo uhiyu uyo, atthu eeli anari nkori mmoca. Mmoca uyo naahala ukusiya, nkina uyo naahala uhinnya.
Athiyana eeli ankosila nipuro nimoca. Amoca ankokusiya ni akina ankohinnya.
Atthu eeli ankokhala umattani. Mmoca nokookusiya ni nkina nokoohinnya.
Vano ale yahonkoha yiiraka: Pwiya, unhala ukhala nipuroni? Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nipuro nikhwenle inama, nenno nipuro nno marepo anaacara.
Nkwaha mmoca Yesu ahaattonkela eetthuci awe nlikanihero nimoca, aathoonyiheraka ifayita yoovekela woohitoomwa ukati wothene,
eeraka: Isittatti imoca ahaawo hukhumu mmoca ahaamoova Nluku, ni khaariwo tho ntthu aanlemelihawe.
Ciicammo yeeyo isittatti iyo ahaawo nankhwele mmoca aarweesa unkasarela hukhumu ule, eeraka: Nkuulumele wo'sariya nlattu aka, kontha kihookoseriya.
Ule ahokhala mahuku menci akhottaka, nanso wahoolo ahoopuwela veekhawe eeraka: Mi akimoova Nluku, ni khaawo ntthu nonlemelihaka.
Nanso cinkeettelela aya ala athiyana ala, kinawoolumela nlattu aya uyo, wiira ahikinyoonyihe.
Vano Apwiya yaheera: Mwiiwe yuulumacilyawe hukhumu oohiloka uyo.
Nluku khanhala waavaha isariya ale yaathanlilyawe, anonlapela uhiyu ni uthana hata yoonaka upica waakhuliya?
Kinoohimeryani wiira naahala woolumela wo'sariya nlattu aya uyo woohipica. Kaahiki wanhalawe uwa Mwanawe Pinatamu, naahala waaphwanya atthu owaamini vathi va?
Wahoolo Yesu ahaattonkela tho nna nlikanihero nna, ale yeekhuluvela ni yeekupaleela ukhala o'sariya ni yaanyohola akhwaya, yiiraka:
Alopwana eeli yahorwaa inupa ittakattifu aphavelaka uvekela. Yaari nfarisi mmoca ni nkina uyo mayoliviha nsoko.
Vano nfarisi ule neemenle, aanvekela eeraka: Pwiya Nluku, kinawusukuruni kontha akiri toko atthu akina ayo, ari anamwinnya, oohisariya ni mayoluva. Mi akiri toko ula mayoliviha nsoko ula.
Kinaantthuka ramatani imaara piili wo khula isumana, ni kinaavaha mphantte wonakhumi wo khula itthu imphwanyaka.
Vano mayoliviha nsoko ule, neemenle uttayi, ni hitthunaka uwusera miitho awe wirimu, navanre ikhakaaca awe, aaneekhupanya eeraka: Pwiya Nluku, nkoonele ikiriri mi natampi!
Kinoohimeryani wiira ula ahokhuma arwaaka uwani nari ooleveleliyene, unhiya nkina uyo, kontha ntthu neecunnuwiha, naayevihiya, ni ntthu neeyeviha, nawunnuwihiya.
Atthu yaanawiiha asaana wiira aakwanye, nanso eetthuci awe woona waya itthu ile, yaanawaateeliha atthu ale.
Nanso Yesu aheehana waaryawe vale ni aheera: Mwaahiye asaana ayo, nhaateelihe uwa waryaka, kontha umwene wa Nluku uri wawaya.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Ule hinaakhelela umwene wa Nluku toko mwana, khanhala ukela wonwo.
Nlopwana oocuwannyaa ahonkoha Yesu eeraka: Mwalimu omaana, kiireke cani wiira kiphwanye ukumi woohimala?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Unkiihanelani omaana? Khaawo ri omaana mari hikhanle Nluku paahi.
Unaacuwela malamulo, aneera: Uheette uluva, uhiive, uhinnye, uhikhale saahiti o wootha; waalemelihe athumwana na anumwana.
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Cothene nnyo kiheettela ikhumelo umirawo aka.

Yesu umwiiwa wawe aakhulaka ala mananna ala, ahomwiirela: Nanlelo inawuhaleela itthu imoca. Urwee ni watumihe citthu cothene cirinaa, ni ncurukhu uyo waavahe amasikiini, ni unkookhalana nhakhu wirimu, wahoolo uwe ni ukitthare.
Vano ule wiiwa wawe ahocukula venci kontha aari thaciri muulupale.
Vaavale Yesu wamoonnyawe ucukula, ahomwiirela: Wari woorika ukela thaciri wumweneni wa Nluku.
Nanso wari wookhwya uvira inkamira wamwiitheni wo sinkano, woovikana thaciri ukela wumweneni wa Nluku.
Vaavale atthu yeewile ale yaheera: Wakhalaka commo, tipani nohala woorya woopwa?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Citthu cihinooryaya atthu, Nluku nawoorya.
Vano Peturu aheera: Hi nihohiya cothene caarinehu ni wuttharani.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira khaawo hiile inupa awe, amwaarawe, asunnawe, athumwane atthuna asaanawe, mwa nlattu wo'mwene wa Nluku,
phihaakhela venci cinene ukati urihula, ni wahoolo urwaa waakhela ukumi woohimala.
Yesu aheehana eetthuci awe khumi n'eeli ni ahaahimyacera eeraka: Nviriyane! Nna va ninvattela uYerusalemu, cinkowiirannyaa wonwo cothene cantikhiye ni minapiyu, cimwaacaka Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Kontha naahala uvahereriya wa amalaponi wiira antulumu, anruwane ni ansuwele;
ni wahoolo ankomwaafyulaca n'umwiiva, nanso nihuku noneeraru naahala wunwelela.
Vaavale khaawo aacuwelenle hata vakani itthu yoolumacilyawe, kontha yaari moolumo oovithyaa, phimaana khaawo aacuwelenle itthu yaahimyawe.
Naattamenryene uYeriko, ahomphwanya ntthu mmoca oohoona nonkomile ni iphiro, alepelacaka icimola.
Weewilyawe mikhitto ca atthu yaavira, ahokoha eeraka: Itthu iyo isiyani?
Ule ahaakhuliya wiira: Yesu o'Nasaree phinvira.
Vaavale ule ahokhuwela eeraka: Yesu, Mwana Taviti, ukoonele ikiriri!
Ale yaavira yaanancacera yiiraka: Unyakula! Nanso ule phaatepawe ukhuwela eeraka: Mwana a Taviti, ukoonele ikiriri!
Vano Yesu aheemela ni ahoruma wiira awiihiye, ni uphiya wawe ahonkoha eeraka:
Umphavela kiwiirihe isiyani? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, kimphavela woona.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Wooneke! Waamini waa nwo uhowoopola.
Wowaakuvyaca wene ahopacera woona, n'untthara Yesu anttitthimihaka Nluku. Ni atthu othene woona waya commo yaananttottopela Nluku.
Yesu waarwawe uYerusalemu, ahovira isittatti yo'Yeriko.
Wonwo ahaawo nlopwana eehaninya Sakeu, aari thaciri ni nhooleli o mayoliviha nsoko.
Ni aanaphavela umoona Yesu, nanso khoorya, nlattu wo mphwinko, kontha aari ookhuvyaa.
Vano ahotthimakacera uhoolo, ni ahowela mmwirini wiira amoone Yesu, kontha naari nipuro naahalawe uvira.
Vano Yesu uphiya wawe nenno nipuro nno, ahoweha nculu, ahomoona Sakeu ni ahomwiihana eeraka: Sakeu, ukhuruwe nculu mmo waakuve, kontha ilelo kinkoomaka uwanyaa.
Ule ahokhuruwa wowaakuvyaca wene ni ahomwaakhelela n'utteeliya.
Vano othene woona waya nnya citthu nnya, yahopacera uttokutta yiiraka: Aawile umaka wa ntthu o'tampi.
Vaavale Sakeu aheemela ni aheerela Apwiya: Pwiya, mi kiholakela waavaha atthu oohuva nuusu no mihakhu caka cothene. Ni wakhala wiira haawo mwinnyenryaka, kinaanturusela imaara cese.
Vano Yesu aheera: Ilelo uhowa woopwa nna ntthoko nna, kontha ni ula ciicammo ri mwana a Aparahamu.
Kontha Mwanawe Pinatamu weenle waakusa ni woopola ale arimenle.
Wahoolo, aneewacilene nnya citthu nnya, Yesu ahaattonkela nlikanihero nikina, ukhala wiira aari wakhiviru n'uYerusalemu, ni ayo yooniha toko umwene wa Nluku unhala uwa woohipica.
Vaavale ahoolumaca eeraka: Nlopwana o ntthoko noocuwannyaa ahokhuma phirwaaka ilapo yoottayi, wiira atthapeliye umwene n'uturuwa.
Vano aheehana ananteko awe khumi, ni ahaakawela micurukhu khumi co'wooru ni aheerela: Nhala mpankaka marontta mpaka wanhalaka uturuwa.
Nanso atthu o yeele ilapo ile yahonramaca ni yahaaruma mayanhupi yiiraka: Hi khanintthuna wiira ula anilamule.
Wahoolo, natthapeliyene umwene ule, ahoturuwela ilapo awe. Ahoruma wiihaninya ananteko awe yaakawenlyawe ncurukhu, wiira acuwele itthu yaaphwanyilyawe khula ntthu upanka wawe marontta.
Ahowa oopacer'ole ni aheera: Nkunya, ncurukhu uyo kiheettela marontta ni kihophwanya tho micurukhu khumi.
Nkunya awe ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Wahorera, we nanteko omaana, kontha uri ookhuluvelyaa ni itthu vakani. Vano unaahala ulamula isittatti khumi.
Ahowa onayeeli uyo eeraka: Nkunya, ncurukhu uyo kiheettela marontta ni kihophwanya tho micurukhu mithanu.
Ni uyo ahomwiirela: Ni we ciicammo unaahala ulamula isittatti thanu.
Vano ahowa oneeraru phwiiraka: Nkunya, ncurukhu inyu ph'ula, kaanoothipela.
Mi kaanaawoovani, kontha nyu nhaana nthiti; nnaatamiha iheesilenyu ni nnaarottowola ihaanlenyu.
Ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: We nanteko oohiloka! Kinawuhukhumu nlattu wo malaku aa, we waanacuwela wiira mi ki nlopwana o nthiti, kinaatamiha iheesilyaka ni kinaarottowola ihaanlyaka.
Vano wahaarweehelani ncurukhu aka uyo usunka upaanku? Waacera mi katuruwaka waanahala ukiturusela ni isawatti.
Vano aheerela atthu yaari vaavale: Mmwaakhe ncurukhu uyo ni munvahe rina micurukhu khumi.
Ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Nkunya, uyo haana micurukhu khumi!
Phimaana uyo aheera: Mi kinawuhimeryani wiira, ule rina, naahala uvahiya, nanso ule hirina, naahala waakhiya mpaka itthu irinawe.
Vano eenani aka, yahaatthuna wiira kaalamule, mwaawiihe woono, ni mweevakace koonaka.
Wahoolo Yesu noolumacilene nnya citthu nnya, ahopwaherera ikwaha yo'Yerusalemu.
Vano waattamenryawe uPetifaki ni uPetaniya, wakhiviru mwaako Olivera, ahaaruma eetthuci awe eeli, eeraka:
Murwee aliteya ari uhoolo; mwaphiyaka nwo, nnaamphwanya natthukeleliye mwapuuru hinatoko uweliya. Mwantthukule ni mwammwiihe woono.
Akhalaka wiira haawo nohala wuukohani: Nnontthukulelani? Mmwiireleke: Apwiya anaamphavela.
Ale yaaruminye ale, urwaa waya, yahomphwanya toko caahimeriyaya.
Vano untthukula waya mwapuuru ule, asinene ayo yahaakoha yiiraka: Nnontthukulelani mwapuuru uyo?
Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Apwiya anaamphavela.
Vano untthukula waya, yahommwiihera Yesu; yahaatalaca ikuwo caya waculu mwapuuru ni yahonkavihera Yesu ummwela.
Yesu eettak'ono, atthu yaanawaatala ikuwo caya mphironi.
Vano waaphilyawe wankhuruweloni wo mwaako wo Olivera, mphwinko wothene w'eetthuci awe, wahopacera utthapa n'unttottopela Nluku ni ncu nowiirunya, nlattu wo mitikiniho yoonaya, yiiraka:
Horeriya Mwene nowa mwa ncina na Apwiya! Isalama wirimu ni nttittimiho no nculu!
Vaavale waatthuni vale, mafarisi makina yahomwiirela: Mwalimu, waamaalihe eetthuci aa ayo, anaanyakula.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mi kinawuhimeryani wiira, ala yamaalacaka, maluku anaahala ukhuwela.
Vano waattamenryawe isittatti ile, oonaka caaryaya ahonlela
eeraka: Yerusalemu! Waacuwenle ilelo, itthu immwaana isalama! Nanso va uhovitheliya wamiithoni waa.
Kontha anawuphiyera mahuku, ankelaya wuuvirela eenani aa anari mmalittini, mpaka uwaameleliha mapuro othene.
Anaahala wuukwanyulaca ni weevakaca asaanaa, ankhala nsittatti mwaa, ni khaninhala ukhala nluku nootataanihinya ni nluku nikhwaya, kontha khucuwelenle ukati waawilyawe Nluku uwootola.
Wahoolo ahokela wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni ahopacera woomolaca atthu yaatumihaca,
eerelaka: Ihantikhiya wiira: Inupa aka iri inupa yo'swali. Nanso nyu nhotatusa nikhuku na anamwiinya.
Khula nihuku Yesu aaneetthuciha wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, nanso akhulupale o mayasataka, mayowantikha ni ahooleli o'nethi yaaphavela umwiiva.
Nanso khayoona mananna omwiiva, kontha atthu othene yaanviriyana ratta moolumo awe.
Nihuku nimoca, Yesu eetthucihak'ono atthu wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni aalaleeraka nhupi woorera, yahowa akhulupale o mayasataka, mayowantikha ni mahumu,
ni yahonkoha yiiraka: Umpanka nnya citthu nnya n'ulamuli wa pani? Tipani oovahile yoola ulamuli ula?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mi ciicammo kinawukohani itthu imoca; nkihimerye:
Upattiso wa Yohani waari wo wirimu atthuna wa atthu?
Vano ale yahopacera wiirelana ayaayoru coo: Naakhulaka wiira wo wirimu, naahala unikoha wiira: Kaahiki nhinkupalenleni?
Ni naakhulaka wiira: Wa atthu, unethi wothene unaahala univonyakaca, kontha unaakupali wiira Yohani aari nnapiyu.
Phimaana, yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Khanincuwela.
Vano Yesu aheerela: Hata mi akinoohimeryani kivahile ulamuli unkipankiha nnya citthu nnya.
Wahoolo Yesu ahaahimyacera nna nlikanihero nna eeraka: Ahaawo ntthu aarina imatta yo'vinyu. Ahaahiyera mayolima ni ahokhuma n'urwaa ukhala ilapo yoottayi ukati mwinci.
Waphilyaya ukati woorottowola, ahonruma nrumeyi awe wiira aakhele mphantte awe wo mihokorokho co mmattani. Nanso mayolima ale yahomwaatta n'umoomola woohi itthu.
Ule ahonruma tho nrumeyi nkina, nanso mayolima ale ciicammo yahomwattakaca, yahonrulaca ni umoomola woohinvaha itthu.
Ahonruma tho oneeraru, ni uyo ciicammo yahonrakaliha ni yahomoomola.
Vano mwanene imatta ile ahoopuwela eeraka: Kinhala wiira cani? Kinaanruma mwanaka oofentiya; pooti anaahala unlemeliha.
Nanso mayolima ukati waamoonnyaya, yaholeehana yiiraka: Ula phinhala waakhela nhakhu! Nrwee, nimwiive wiira nhakhu uyo ukhale wawihu.
Yahonvaraca ni yahompurulela nceresere imatta ni yahomwiiva. Mwanene imatta ile nohala weeriha cani?
Naahala uwa ni weeva mayolima ayo ni waavaha imatta mayolima akina. Vano atthu ale weewilyaya commo, yaheeraca: Yeeyo itthu iyo ihikhumelele!
Yesu ahaaweheeha ni ahaakoha: Cowantikhiya cinhimyani? Cinhimya wiira: Nluku nikhottiye ni mayoteka, pheesiye ukhala nowookolela nlootho.
Ntthu nohala uwuluwela waculu waya nenno nluku nno naahala unyakatyaaca, ni ule ninhala umuluwela naahala uthatuwa ntthupi.
Yoole ukati ule mayowantikha ni akhulupale o mayasataka yaaphavela untthuka Yesu, kontha yahoonenela wiira naaca yaayo, ukati waattonkawe nna nlikanihero nna, nanso yaanawoova unethi.
Vano yahopacera unrontta Yesu. Ale yahaaruma mayorontta owiihelaca unasariya, aphavelaka unvara ni moolumo awe, wiira anrweehe mmatatani mwa nlamuli.
Vaavale yahonkoha yiiraka: Mwalimu, ninaacuwela wiira nnawuulumaca ni nnawiitthuciha womaana ni khanrina nthanlo, kontha nneetthuciha iphiro ya Nluku, toko ciryaya yeekhweli.
Vano, wanaalamuliya uliviya nsoko Sesari atthuna mena?
Nanso Yesu, acuwelelaka ulavilavi aya uyo, ahaakhula eeraka:
Nkoonihere ncurukhu. Ilatarato ela ni yantikhiye wancurukhuni ila yawani? Vaavale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Ya Sesari.
Vano Yesu aheerela: Paahi, munvahe Sesari iri ya Sesari, ni Nluku iri ya Nluku.
Commo, ale khayaamoonrye unvarihaca Yesu mmoolumoni mwawe iriyari ya atthu, ni antikhinacaka maakhulelo awe yahomaalaca.
Waaphilyaya masatusi, aneera khuuwo wunwelela, ni yahonkohaca, yiiraka:
Mwalimu, Musa eenre wiira nthiyana akhweliyaka awannyawe woohaayarana asaana, ayo anaatheliya ni munnawe waacera annyarele asaana.
Vano yahaawo asilopwana saapa eerukulu imoca. Oopacer'oyo ahonthela nthiyana ni ahokhwa woohinyarana asaana.
Vano onayeeli ahaathela,
ciicammo oneeraru mpaka onasaapa ni yahokhwaca woohinyarana asaana.
Wiimaleloni ahokhwa nthiyan'ole.
Wanhala wunweleliya va, nthiyan'ole nokokhala awani? Kontha asilopwana saapa ale yahonthela nthiyan'ole.
Vano Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Asaana o'ttuninya ila, anaathela ni anaatheliya;
nanso ale yaalikeleliye upanka mphantte ittuninya immwa ni wunwelela mwa atthu ookhwa, khanhala uthela mena utheliya.
Maana khanhala ukhwa tho, kontha ari oolikana na ancelo, ari asaana a Nluku, kontha ari asaana o wunwelela.
Khweli atthu ookhwa anaahala wunwelela, maana Musa hothoonyera ukati wapharelaya nikukhu, weehannyawe Apwiya eerelaka: Nluku a Aparahamu, Nluku a Isaki ni Nluku a Yakopi.
Maana Nluku, khanakhala Nluku a atthu ookhwa, nanso ri Nluku a atthu akumi, kontha mwa yooyo othene ankhala akumi!
Vano, mayowantikha akina yaheera: Mwalimu, uhaakhula ratta!
Ukhuma vaavale, khaawo aalipile tho irima yoonkoha.
Vano Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Uneereliyani Kristu ri mwana a Taviti?
Kontha mwanene Taviti hohimya nliivuruni yo macipo eeraka: Apwiya aheerela Apwiya aka: Wunkome moono aka wonlopwana,
mpaka wanhalaka weesa eenani aa toko ntapita noonyakelela.
Taviti nomwiihana Apwiya, vano nokhala cani mwanawe?
Amwiiwaka atthu othene, Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe:
Mwiikasoope ni mayowantikha, unaacivela uwaraca ihancu, usalameehiya mmapacarini, wunkoma mapuro oopacera mmasinakokani ni mmasikuhuuluni.
Ayo anawaalyacera anankhwele, atupererihaka mpaka urekamiha iswali. Yaayo atthu ayo anaahala uttarusiya ni ihukhumu yootepa uweryaa.
Yesu nari wakhiviru ni ikasa yaaheliya coovaha, ahoona mathaciri ahelaka coovaha caya.
Ciicammo ahomoona nthiyana nankhwele oohuva, aahelaka nkasani mmwe atoosu eeli.
Vaavale aheera: Khweli, kinawuhimeryani wiira nthiyana nankhwele oohuv'ola phivahile venci wowaapwaha atthu othene.
Kontha, othene ala yaavaha itthu yaahalahala muthacirini mwaya, nanso ula muhuvani mwawe, hovaha yothene yaarinawe.
Yahaawo akina yoolumaca mwaha wo'nupa ittakattifu, mananna ceenryaya wootekiya ni maluku omaana, ni ncanko waakumihinye.
Vaavale Yesu aheera: Nnawoonaka nnya citthu nnya? Anaaphiya mahuku anhalaya uhikhala nluku nootataanihinya ni nluku nikhwaya; othene anaahala ukwanyulaciya.
Vaavale yahonkohaca yiiraka: Mwalimu, cinhala wiirannyaa yakhani nnya citthu nnya? Ni inhala ukhala ikanyeroni inthoonyera wiira citthu nnye cihanle vakani wiirannyaa?
Yesu ahaakhula wiira: Mwiinemecere, wiira hikhale nohala wuuthepyani. Maana enci anaahala uwa mwa ncina naka yiiraka: Phi mi! Ni ukati uhaattamerya. Vano nyu nhaatthare.
Ukati unhalenyu wiiwa wuuluminya co'khotto ni mikhitto; nhituthuwe. Kontha woopacera cinlamuliya ukhumelela nnya citthu nnya, nanso khunakhala phuumala wene.
Wahoolo aheerela: Ilapo inaahala waana ni ilapo ikhwaya, ni umwene unaahala waana n'umwene nkhwawe.
Itthaya inaahala uttettemela, cinaawa itala ni iretta mapuro menci, cookhumelela cowoopiha ni mithoonyero cuulupale cookhuma wirimu.

Nanso cihinakhumelela nnya citthu nnya, nnohala upacera toko woomolanihaciya n'uvariya, nrwaaninyaka mmasinakonani ni ukalaposo, nrweehiyaka wamiithoni wo mamwene ni wa alamuli, mwa nlattu wo ncina naka;
ila itthu ila inhala wukhumelelani waacera wiira mwakhale asaahiti.
Nlipe nrima, nhikhale oovelavelana itthu yo waakhula,
kontha kinawuvahani ankhili ni nuulumo nookela waavelaveliha eenani inyu ni khanhala woorya wuuvaanyihani itthu.
Vano athumwaninyu owuuyarani, asunninyu, alokwenyu ni asimpwaninyu anaahala wuukasarini wa alamuli, mpaka akina anaahala wiiviya.
Nnaahala wiinananinya na atthu othene mwa nlattu wo ncina naka.
Nanso khinhala urihya hata ikharari imoca yo mmuru mwinyu.
Nyu mwalipelelaka irima phinhalenyu uphwanya ukumi.
Wahoolo mwakela mwamoonaka Yerusalemu narukureriye na anakhotto, ncuwele wiira uhophiya ukati wookwanyulaciya.
Vano ale ari uYuteya, atthawele umyaakoni; ale anhala ukhala wasittatti akhume; ale anhala ukhala umattani, ahirwee usittatti.
Kontha, yaayo mahuku ayo anhala ukhala o mattaruso, wiira citthariheleliye cantikhiye cothene.
Kaasope ale anhala ukhala ni irukulu ni ale anhala waamwiha yooyo ukati uyo! Kontha unaahala ukhala ucukulaca venci mwiilaponi n'uviruwa wa Nluku na ala atthu ala.
Enci ankowiiviya ni ikatana, akina anaahala ukusiya n'utthukiya amwaruseliyaka ilapo cothene, ni Yerusalemu naahala unyakelaciya na amalaponi, mpaka wanhalaya umalela ukati aya.
Cinaahala ukhala mithoonyero wancuwani, wamweerini ni watthoottwani. Ni ilapo cothene cinaahala uttenkuwa, mwa nlattu wo woova unyakula wo'pahari ni mawimpi.
Atthu enci anaahala ukhwa maremmwela nlattu wo woova, yuupuwelaka citthu cinkela ukhumelela nttuniyani, kontha ikuru co nculu cinaahala uttinkihiya.
Vano phinhalawe wooninya Mwanawe Pinatamu awaaka wanihutteni ni ikuru ni nttittimiho nuulupale.
Phimaana, capaceraka ukhumelela nnya citthu nnya, munweke ni nwuseke muru, kontha woopwa winyu uhaattamerya.
Yesu ahaattonkela nna nlikanihero nna, eeraka: Mooneke mwiri wo nfikera ni miri cikhwawe.
Moonaru cipaceraka uphuwela, nyu nnaacuwela wiira iyiita iri wakhiviru.
Phimaana, moonaka nnya citthu cothene nnya, ncuwele wiira umwene wa Nluku uri wakhiviru.
Mi kinawuhimeryani wiira khanimmira nna nloko nna cihinaya wiirannyaa cothene nnya.
Irimu ni itthaya cinaamala, nanso moolumo aka khaammala.
Yesu ahopwaherera eeraka: Mwiirattavelele wiira nrima enyu uhikhale woocivaciviya ni citthu cooliya, uhapaliya ni iwasiwasi co mwirutthuni, waacera wiira nhikhale ootutuseriya naphiyaka nihuku nno.
Kontha ninhala waakhumelela toko ntapha atthu othene ankhala wattuniyani va.
Phimaana nrontte ukati wothene, nvekelaka, waacera wiira cakhumelelaka nnya citthu nnya, nsempe, ni moorye weemela wamiithoni wa Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Yesu aansomiha mahuku othene wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu. Vano uhiyu, aankhuma phirwaaka umumula mwaako wo Olivera.
Wasaka wicisuru unethi wothene waampeherya unupani ittakattifu wiira yamwiiwe.
Wahaattamerya ukati wo'sikuhuulu yo mikatthe coohi miropo, yeehaninya Paasikuwa.
Akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha, yaavya mananna omwiiva Yesu, nanso yaanoova atthu.
Vano Sotwani ahonkela Yuta, eehaninya Iskariyoti, aari mmoca wa yaale khumi n'eeli.
Ahokhuma ni ahorwaa waaleehanana akhulupale o mayasataka ni ahooleli o mayorontta, aphavelaka mananna oonvaherera Yesu.
Ale yahotteeliya ni yahovaanela unliva ncurukhu.
Yuta ahokupali ni aamwaavya nafasi oontumiha Yesu mphwinko uhiriwo.
Nahophiya nihuku no'sikuhuulu yo mikatthe coohi miropo, naaphaveliya unlya Paasikuwa.
Vano Yesu ahonruma Peturu ni Yohani, eeraka: Nrwaace mwantthenkace Paasikuwa wiira nanlye.
Vano ale yahonkohaca yiiraka: Untthuna wiira nuutthenkemanihere vayi nipuro nonlelya Paasikuwa?
Yesu aheerela: Wookela nsittatti mmo, nnaahala umphwanya nlopwana nakusile nipinka no maasi; mwanttharace mpaka inupa inhalawe ukela,
ni mwamwiirele mwanene itthoko iyo: Mwalimu naakoha: Inupa inhalaka umaka iri vayi, kinlyaka Paasikuwa n'eetthuci aka?
Vano uyo naahala wuthoonyerani nsana nuulupale niri uculu nooratteliya ni notthenkemanihiya. Mwaatthenkace mommo.
Ale yahokhuma ni yahorwaa uparasa, ni yahophwanya toko caahimeriyaya, ni yahontthenkemaniha Paasikuwa.
Waaphilyaya ukati, Yesu ahonkoma wameeca wamoca na amitthenka awe khumi n'eeli.
Vano aheerelaca: Kihophavela venci wiira kuulyaaneni Paasikuwa ula, kihinaya uhuva.
Kontha kinawuhimeryani wiira akinhala unlya tho, mpaka wanhalawe umalela wumweneni wa Nluku.
Vano ahokusa ikikhompe ni ahosukuru eeraka: Nkuseke ni nseelelaneke ayaayoru.
Khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, ukhuma nenna va, akinhala uwurya tho nhokorokho wo nvitera mpaka wanhalaya uwa umwene wa Nluku.
Ahokusa nkatthe, ni ahosukurwela, ahomyaniha ni ahaakawela eetthuci awe eeraka: Ila phi irutthu aka, ivahereriyenyu; mpankeke ciicale nkuupuwelelaka mi.
Woolikana ciicammo, umaliha waya ulya, ahokusa ikikhompe eeraka: Ila phi ikikhompe yo nleehano nonaanano mphomeni mwaka ivuviheriyenyu.
Nanso mooneke ntata nawe ule nokuuluma makhuce, niri wamoca ni mi wameecani.
Mwana a Pinatamu, naarwa toko cantikhiyaya, nanso hotakhaliya ule nohala umuuluma makhuce antthukiihaka!
Vano ale yahopacera ukohanaca ayaayoru yiiraka: Tipani yooyo wa hi, nohala upanka yeeyo itthu iyo?
Ciicammo eetthuci ale yahonyakulihana ayaayoru aphaveliyaka ucuweliya tipani mwa yaayo aahala ukhala muulupale.
Vano Yesu aheera: Mamwene o mwiilaponi anawaathawala atthu ni ale anlamula aneehaninya mayoowaana mpuha.
Nanso nyu nhikhale commo; vano ule ri muulupale wa nyu, akhale mwankani, ni ule nolamula akhaleke toko nrumeyi.
Vano muulupale tipani: Phi ule ri wameeca atthuna nrumeyi? Khanakhala ule ri wameeca? Nanso mi, wariyari winyu, kiri toko nrumeyi.
Nyu mw'atthu mpharelenle ukhala ni mi mothene nnottehattehiyaka.
Ciicammo kinawuvahani umwene toko Apaapa cikivahilyaya,
waacera wiira mwaalye ni mwawurye wameecani waka, wumweneni waka, ni munkome mmahiceni wiira nhukhumu mahimo khumi na meeli o'Sirayeli.
Simoni, Simoni, wiiwe, Sotwani holepela wiira ooveereni toko itiriku!
Nanso mi, kihoovekelela we wiira waamini waa uhikhwelakhwele; vano we, warukunusaka nrima, waalipihe irima asunnaa ayo.
Nanso ule ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, kiri tayari urwaa ni nyu, pooti ukhala ukalaposo atthuna wiiviya.
Vaavale Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Peturu, kinoohimerya wiira, ilelo unaahala ukiruna imaara ttharu nthupi uhinaya wiipa wiira khukicuwenle.
Wahoolo Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Woorumilyakani mi woohi nrupa wo ncurukhu ni woohi nrupa wophika atthuna ikwakwatta, yahaawo itthu yoohaleenleni? Yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Khiiwo.
Vano aheerelaca: Paahi, vano ule rina nrupa wo ncurukhu akuseke, ciicammo rina nrupa wophika akuseke, ule hirina ikatana, atumihe ikacako awe ni athume ikatana.
Kontha kinawuhimeryani wiira, inlamuliya utthariheleliya mwa mi ile yantikhiye, wiira: Ule hopitaaniheriya wamoca na alavilavi. Kontha ile yantikhiye wa mi, ineera ikhumelelaka.
Vano ale yaheeraca: Pwiya, cihaawo va ikatana piili! Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Wahotosa!
Vano ahokhuma n'urwaa umwaakoni wo Olivera toko caalemalenlyawe, ni eetthuci awe yahontthara.
Uphiya wawe nipuro nne, Yesu aheerelaca: Nvekele, wiira nhittehattehiye.
Vano ahaattalivana, vakani, ahokhoroma n'upacera uvekela,
eeraka: Paapa, mwatthunaka, ikipwahe ila ikikhompe ela. Uhiirannye utthuna waka, nanso utthuna winyu.
Vano ahonkhumelela ncelo mmoca o wirimu aanlipihile irima.
Vaavale, nari ni icuku cinci, phaatepawe uvekela ni ikuru. Ni nttukuttha nawe naari toko iphome niwuvelaka vathi.
Wonwilyawe waavekelawe vale, ahoturuwela nipuro nari eetthuci awe, ni ahaaphwanya arupaka ni masukuli,
ni ahaakoha eeraka: Nnorupani? Munwe ni nvekele, wiira nhittehattehiye.
Oolumacaka ono nanlelo, wahowa mphwinko wa atthu enci, uhooleliyaka ni Yuta, mmoca wa ale khumi n'eeli. Uyo ahomwaattamerya Yesu wiira ansalameehe.
Nanso Yesu ahomwiirela: Yuta, unontumiha Mwanawe Pinatamu n'unkapatta?
Ale yaari ni Yesu, woona waya itthu yaahala wiirannyaa yahonkohaca yiiraka: Pwiya, naathakeke ni ikatana?
Mmoca mwa ale, ahonrakaliha n'unthikila nnyaru no moono nlopwana na nrumeyi ankhulupale o mayasataka.
Nanso Yesu ahaakihera eeraka: Paahi! Mwaahiye. Vano ankwanyaka ninyaru nne, ahonvoniha.
Vano Yesu aheerela akhulupale o mayasataka, na ahooleli o'nupa ittakattifu ni mahumu yaawile untthuka: Mwile ni ikatana ni ikupitti wiira mwakitthuke toko kinhoolela mphwinko wowaatuphela atthu?
Mahuku othene keetthuciha wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu nanso nyu khankitthukile. Nanso, ula ph'ukati inyu, n'ukati wo'kuru co mpiphini.
Vano ale yahontthuka Yesu, yahonkusaca n'unrweehaca uwannyawe nkhulupale o mayasataka. Peturu aanantthara nttayi nttayi.
Vano wahopariheliya mooro iriyari ipuwa ni othene yahonkomaca, ni Peturu ciicammo ahonkoma nenno nipuro nno.
Vaavale, nanteko mmoca mwanthiyana, wamoonnyawe Peturu nonkomile ootthaka mooro, ahomwiirela: Ula nlopwan'ola ciicammo ari n'uyo.
Nanso Peturu ahoruna eeraka: Nthiyana, mi akinoncuwela.
Unavinre ukati vakani, ahooninya ni ntthu nkina ni ahomwiirela: Ciicammo we phi mmocaru. Nanso Peturu aheera: Nlopwana, akinakhala.
Vano inavinrene wookhalaka iwora imoca, nkina tho ahokhanyerera wuulumaca eeraka: Khweli ula aari ni yooyo, kontha ni ula nkalileya.
Nanso Peturu aanakhanyerera eeraka: Nlopwana, akineeweeha inhimyaa iyo. Nananoru, oolumacak'ono, nthupi waheepa.
Vano Apwiya, yahorukunuwa ni yahommweheeha Peturu. Vano ule ahoopuwela nuulumo naahimeriyawe na Apwiya wiira: Ilelo unaahala ukiruna imaara ttharu nthupi uhinaya wiipa.
Vaavale Peturu ahokhuma ni ahoonla n'ucukula cinene.
Ale yaantthukile Yesu yaanantarawaca, amwaattak'ono ni,
anantthukilene wiitho wawe, yahonkohaca yiiraka: Ulohe! Tipani waattile?
Ni citthu cinci cikina caamuulumelaya, akufuruku uno.
Waasilyaya, yahothukumana mahumu, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha, ni ahorwaninya upwaroni, weereliyawe:
We wakhala wiira uri Kristu, unihimerye. Vano Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Koohimeryakani, khannohala ukikupali.
Ciicammo kookohakani khannohala ukaakhula hata vakani.
Ukhuma nenna va mpaka uhoolo, Mwanawe Pinatamu naahala wunkoma moono wo nlopwana wa Nluku o'kuru cothene.
Vano othene yaheeraca: Maanaya wiira we uMwana a Nluku? Ni ule ahaakhula eeraka: Nyu nhohimya wiira phi yeemi.
Vaavale othene yahokhuwelaca yiiraka: Usaahitini umphavelehu tho? Kontha hi nihomwiiwa oolumacaka wamalakuni wawe.
Wahoolo mphwinko wothene wahonwa, wahonkusa Yesu ni wahonrwaana wa Pilatu.
Wonwo yahopacera unriyelela yiiraka: Nimphwanyile ula nlopwan'ola aporonkanihaka ilapo ehu, aateelihaka uliviya nsoko Sesari ni uyo eeciirelaka Kristu, ri Mwene.
Vano Pilatu ahonkoha eeraka: We uMwene a ayuta? Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: We uhohimya.
Vaavale Pilatu ahaahimyacera akhulupale o mayasataka ni atthu othene eeraka: Akinoona ikoosi mwa ula nlopwan'ola.
Nanso ale yaankhanyerera yiiraka: Uyo nawaatheperya atthu uYuteya wothene ni miitthuciho cawe, pacenre uKalileya mpaka hophiyana uno.
Vaavale Pilatu wiiwa wawe yeeyo, ahokoha wiira: Ula nlopwan'ola o'Kalileya?
Pilatu waacuwenlyawe wiira Yesu nokhuma nttetthe unlamulawe Heroti, ahonveleeliha wa yooyo, ni yaayo mahuku ayo Heroti aari uYerusalemu.
Heroti umoona wawe Yesu ahotteeliya venci cinene, kontha aanaphavelesa umoona. Aamakela wiiwa aromolaciyaka paahi, aawehererya umoona apankaka mitikiniho.
Ahonkohakoha imaara cinci, nanso Yesu khiiwo yaamwaakhunlyawe.
Akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayowantikha yaariwo vaavale, yaananriyelelaca citthu cowoopiha venci.
Vano Heroti na anakhotto awe yaanantarawaca n'unnyohola. Yahommwariha ihancu yooceremela ni yahonturusela wa Pilatu.
Nenno nihuku nno, Heroti ni Pilatu yahovarana myoono, kontha khalayi va khayeewanana.
Wahoolo Pilatu ahaathukumaniha akhulupale o mayasataka, alamuli ni atthu othene, ni aheerela:
Nhokiwiihera mi ula ntthu ula, toko owaatheperya atthu, nanso mi unkoha waka nyu nnari vaava, akoonne itthu, mwaha wo citthu cimootheryacilenyu.
Heroti ciicammo khaamphwanyanne hata ikoosi imoca, phimaana anihokoloseraka. Khweli khiiwo inthoonyera, yoomphwanela wiiviya.
Vano mi kinaanttarusa ni wahoolo kinaantthukula.
Ni Pilatu aalamuliya waatthukulela nantthukiya mmoca ukati wo'sikuhuulu.
Nanso mphwinko wothene, waankhuwela wiiraka: Umwiive Yesu uyo! Unitthukulele Parapasi!
Parapasi aatthukeliye nlattu wookumihaca nkhitto nsittatti ni wo wiiva.
Vano Pilatu aankhanyerera untthukula Yesu.
Nanso ale phaatepaya ukhuwela yiiraka: Unkhomele wansalapani! Unkhomele wansalapani!
Vano Pilatu ahaakohaca tho imaara yoneeraru eeraka: Pankileni yoonanara? Kontha mi khiiwo imoonnyaka yoomphwanela ukhwa. Phimaana, kanttarusaka kinaahala untthukula.
Nanso ale yaankhanyerera akhuwelaka venci, alepelaka wiira Yesu akhomeliye wansalapani. Ni yaalepelaya iyo yahotthuneliya.
Vano Pilatu ahotthuna upanka yaalepelaya.
Ahontthukula ule yaanlepenlyaya, aatthukeliye nlattu wookumihaca nkhitto ni wiiva, ni ahaavahaca Yesu wiira ampankace intthunaya.
Vaavale anankusacilene Yesu, yahonkumanana nsirene mmoca, eehaninya Simoni, aakhuma umattani. Yahonryaca nsalapa ule wanikhatani, ni ahontthara Yesu.
Yaanantthara atthu enci, ciicammo athiyana yaanawunla yiikhupanyaka.
Nanso Yesu ahaaweha ni aheerela: Athiyana o'Yerusalemu, nhikunlele mi, nanso mwiicunlele mwasinene ni monlele asaanenyu!
Kontha anaawa mahuku anhala wiiriya: Cihoreriya imyali ceekupa, cihinatoko waamwinya!
Yaayo mahuku ayo ankowiirela myaako: Nniwuluwele! Ciicammo anaahala wiirela asimyaako: Nniphottomweele!
Kontha moonaka upankiyaka mwiri nkithi nnya citthu nnya, unhala ukhala cani mwiri wowuuma uyo?
Ciicammo yahokusiya tho alopwana eeli anakhirini, wiira yeeviye wamoca ni Yesu.
Uphiya waya nipuro neehaninya Ikohi, yahonkhomelaca wansalapani wamoca na anamwiinya, mmoc'oyo aakhomeliye moono nlopwana ni nkin'oyo, moono nthiyana.
Vaavale Yesu aheera: Paapa, mwaaleveleleke, kontha khaancuwela impankaya. Vano yahokawanaca ikuwo cawe nnye, yaavyaka iparakha wiira ancuwele ntthu aahala ukusa.
Atthu othene yaari vaavale yanawoona cothene. Ciicammo ahooleli yaanantarawaca yiiraka: Uhoopola akina; vano wiicoopole mwanene aa, wakhala wiira we khweli Kristu, oothanliya ni Nluku!
Ciicammo anatoropa yahomwaattamerya Yesu n'umpanka ikhirini. Yahommaha makaari, yiiraka:
Wakhala wiira we uMwene a ayuta, wiicoopole mwanene aa!
Ciicammo waculu nsalapa awe, naheesiya nipawu naantikhiye wiira: ula phi mwene a ayuta.
Nakhirini mmoca aakhomeliye wamoca ni Yesu, aanamuulumacera makufuru Yesu eeraka: We kuhimwe Kristu? Wiicoopole o mwanene aa ni hi ciicammo unoopole.
Nanso nakhirini nkina ule aakhulaka, ahoncacera eeraka: We khummoova Nluku hata vakani, ninaryene oohukhumwinya mananna mamoca n'uyo?
Hi khweli, ihaawo isariya, yoottarusiya nlattu wo miteko caapankehu, nanso ula, khiiwo ipankilyawe yoonanara hata imoca.
Ni ahopwaherera eeraka: Yesu, wakuupuwelele wakelaka wumweneni waa nwo.
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khweli kinaawuhimyacera wiira, ilelo unhala ukhala ni mi upeponi.
Naahanle vakani uphiya ncuwa wamuru, ilapo yothene yahoripela mpaka iwora yoneeraru yocoocilo,
ni ncuwa nahoripela. Ikuwo yaakawaniha nipuro nittakattifu yahaahuwa iriyariru.
Vaavale Yesu ahokhuwela venci eeraka: Paapa, kinawuvahani nnepa aka mmatatani mwinyu! Wuulumaca wawe commo, ahohiya iroho.
Vano nhooleli a anatoropa iminya woonnyawe itthu yaakhumelenle, ahonttittimiha Nluku eeraka: Weekhweli, ula nlopwan'ola aari nasariya.
Ni miphwinko cothene caathukumanne nenne nipuro nne wiira coone itthu yaapankiya, woona waya itthu yaakhumelenle, cahomwaryaa cittokuttaka ni ciikhupanyaka.
Nanso amuci awe Yesu na athiyana yaantthanre ikhumelo uKalileya, yahohala aneemelacile nttayi nttayi yoonaka nnya citthu nnya.
Ahaawo nlopwana eehaninya Yusufu, o mphwinko wa alamuli, aari oorera nrima ni nasariya.
Uyo khaakupanli itthu yaleehaninye ni yaalakenlyaya upanka akina ayo. Yusufu aari o wArimateya, isittatti yo'Yuta, ni aawehererya umwene wa Nluku.
Ahorwaa wa Pilatu ulepela nrutthu wa Yesu.
Utamiha wawe nrutthu wansalapani vale, ahowariha isantta yo'linyu, ni ahosikha mmahiye yaathipiye wamwalani. Mahiye ale yaari ahinatoko usikhiya ntthu.
Naari nihuku nootthenkaca, ni phaapaceraya ntivela.
Athiyana yaawile ni Yesu ukhuma uKalileya, yahontthara Yusufu ni yahoona mahiye ayo ni ceerihiyaya woweesiya nrutthu ule.
Phimaana yahothamaca arwaaka utthenkaca makhura omaana ni oonukhela. Vano ntivela yahomumulaca toko cinhimyaya nlamulo.
Vano nihuku noopacera no'sumana, wicisu cinene, athiyana ale yahorwaaca umahiye anakusacile makhura oonukhela yaatthenkacilyaya.
Yahophwanyaca nluku naattheeliye nkhora wo mahiye ale ninatamihinye;
nanso ukelaca waya mmahiye mmwe khayaaphwanyacile nrutthu wa Apwiya Yesu.
Vano yahotikhinaca, nlattu weetthu yeeraneele. Yahaakhumelela alopwana eeli oowaraca ikuwo cooceremela toko waarya wo ncuwa.
Vaavale athiyana ale yahoovaca venci ni yahooromelaca vathi. Alopwana ale yahaakohaca yiiraka: Nlattuni mmwaavyaka mwa atthu ookhwa ule ri nkumi?
Uyo khaawo va, honwelela. Muupuweleke coohimenryaweni ukati warinyu uKalileya,
eeraka: Mwanawe Pinatamu nolamuliya uvahereriya mmatatani mwa anatampi, n'ukhomeliya wansalapani ni wunwelela nihuku noneeraru.
Vano athiyana ale yahoopuwelela moolumo awe.
Ukati waturuwacilyaya umahiye nwe, yahaahimyacera citthu cothene eetthuci khumi na mmoca ale na atthu yarinaya.
Yaari, Mariya Mantalena, Cuwana ni Mariya anumwane Yakopu; ciicammo athiyana akina yaarinaya, yaahimyacile nnya citthu nnya wa amitthenka.
Yaayo moolumo ayo yoonihacile toko citthu cowoothiya, ni khayaakupanli athiyana ale.

Nanso Peturu ahonwa ni ahotthawelela umahiye. Uthurumela wawe mmahiye mmwe, khiiwo yonnyawe tho, ari cihikhanle paahi isantta caawarihiyawe. Vano ahoturuwela uwani, nari ootikinihinya nlattu weetthu yaakhumelenle.
Nenno nihuku nno, eeli mwa eetthuci a Yesu, yeetta arwaaka aliteya yeehaninya Emawu, ittalivelo aya ni uYerusalemu waari wookhalaka malonce khumi ni nimoca.
Yaanvira yoopelaka mwaha, citthu cothene caakhumelenle.
Vano weeracyaa commo, yoopaka mwaha ni akohakohanaka, yooyo Yesu uyo, ahaakhumelela ni yaamweettana wamoca.
Nanso wahaaripela wiitho wiira ahincuwelele.
Vano Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Yusankihileni isiyani nnoolumacenyu mweettaka eyo? Ale acukulak'ono yaheemelaca.
Nanso mmoca wa ale, eehaninyaka Keleyopa, ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khu! Phi we paahi uri nletto uYerusalemu, uhincuwela citthu cikhumelenle ala mahuku ala?
Ule ahaakohaca eeraka: Ikhumelenle isiyani? Vano ale yahontaphulela yiiraka: Itthu inkhumelenle Yesu o'Nasaree, aari nnapiyu, o'kuru mmitekoni ni mmoolumoni, wamiithoni wa Nluku ni wa atthu othene,
