ni akhulupale o mayasataka ni alamuli ehu ahonrweha wiira ahukhumwinye ukhwa, ni ahonkhomela wansalapani.
Vano hi naammwehererya yooyo wiira phaahala woopola uSirayeli, nanso ilelo phimphiyeraya nihuku noneeraru cakhumeleleru nnya citthu nnya.
Nanso, ahaawo athiyana yaarinehu, anitutusenre urwaaca waya wicisu umahiye;
ni ahiphwanyaka nrutthu wa Yesu, ahoturuwaca yiiraka yahaaphwanyaca iyooni ya ancelo, ihimyacile wiira haawo nkumi.
Wo khweli, asikhwihu yahorwaaca umahiye nwo ni yahoona cothene caahimilyaya athiyana ale, nanso khayamoonne Yesu.
Vano Yesu aheerela: Atthu oohiiwa, ootturumala mirima ni oopica ukupali citthu cihimilyaya minapiyu!
Kristu khaalamuliya uhuva wiira akele uwaaryani wawe?
Apaceraka unttonkaca Musa, mpaka minapiyu cothene, aanawaahimerya citthu cantikhiye cinonttonka yooyo.
Vano waattamenryaya wa aliteya, Yesu ahohoolela aphavelaka upwaha.
Nanso ale yahomweemesa yiiraka: Ukhale ni hi, kontha vale uheela. Vaavale Yesu ahokhala wamoca na ale.
Vano anonkomacilene wameeca, ule ahokusa nkatthe, ahosukurwela, ahomyaniha ni ahaavahaca.
Vaavale, wahaasa wiitho ni yahoncuwelela, nanso ule ahorimyarimya.
Vano yaheerelana ayaayoru: Khawaaniviha nrima ukati waanuulumanawe mphironi anitaphulelaka cowantikhiya cittakattifu?
Wowaakuvyaca wene, ale yahoturuwelaca uYerusalemu. Wonwo, yahaaphwanya anathukumanne eetthuci khumi ni mmoca ale ni akina yaarina aya,
ale yaheeraca: Apwiya ahonwelela ni ahonkhumelela Simoni!
Vano eeli ale yahottonka yaakhumelenle ni iphiro ni ceeracilyaya wooncuwelela Yesu waamyaanihawe nkatthe.
Yuulumacak'ono nnya citthu nnya, Yesu ahowa, aheemela iriyari aya ni aheerela: Nnema nikhale ni nyu!
Nanso ale, yahotuthuwaca ni yahoova, yoonihaka toko unowakhumelela nnepa.
Nanso Uyo aheerelaca: Nnosankani? Nnaakanyacani wanrimani winyu va?
Mooneke matata aka ni inyaa caka, nkooneke, phi yemyeene; nvare irutthu aka ni mooneehe, maana nnepa khurina ithayi hata makhuva, toko mi ciryaka.
Wuulumaca wawe commo, ahaathoonyera matata awe ni inyaa cawe.
Ni nlattu wotteeliya cinene ale nanlelo khayaakupali ni yaantikhinaca, vano Yesu aheerelaca: Nhaana iyolya va?
Vaavale yahommwiihera ipilipica imoca yo'hopa yowoosiya ni ncerephe nimoca no'rawo.
Yesu aholya wamiithoni waya.
Wahoolo, Yesu aheerelaca: Ala phi moolumo yoohimenryakani kinari ni nyu, kiiraka: Caalamuliya utthariheleliya cothene cantikhiye muNlamuloni na Musa ni iliivuru yo macipo ni minapiyu cinkaaca mi.
Vaavale Yesu ahaatthukula ankhili aya wiira acuwelele cowantikhiya;
Vano Yesu aheerelaca: Commo ihantikhiya wiira Kristu aalamuliya uhuva venci ni ukhwa, ni wunwelela mwa atthu ookhwa nihuku noneeraru,
ni mwa ncina nawe ulalennye nhupi woorukunusa nrima wiira itampi cileveleliye mwiilaponi mothene, upacera uYerusalemu.
Vano nyu mw'asaahiti wo cennya citthu nnya.
Kinawuveleeliherani nyu ikhuluvelihilyaya Apaapa; nkhale wasittatti vaava, mpaka wanhalenyu uvahiya ikuru cookhuma wirimu.
Vaavale ahaakusaca aarwanaka uPetaniya, ni awuseraka matata awe nculu, ahaareriha.
Yesu nanlelo aarerihak'ono, ahaahiya ni ahokusiya arwaaniyaka wirimu.
Vano eetthuci ale anlapelak'ono, yahohokoleelaca uYerusalemu ootteeliyene venci.
Phimaana, ukati wothene yaakhalaca wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu anttottopelaka Nluku.
Wupaceroni naari nuulumo. Nuulumo nno naari ni Nluku, ni nenno nuulumo nno naari Nluku.
Nenno wupaceroni naari ni Nluku.
Citthu cothene cipankiye ni nenno, ni khiiwo itthu ipankiye woohikhala nenno.
Mwa nenno waari ukumi ni ukumi uyo waari waarya wa atthu.
Waarya unaamwaleela mpiphini, ni ipiphi khayoonrye usintta waarya nwo.
Ahowa nlopwana aaruminye ni Nluku; ncina nawe naari Yohani.
Ule aawile ukhala saahiti wiira avahere usaahiti wo waarya, wiira mwa uyo, atthu othene akupali.
Ule khaari waarya, nanso aawile uvaha usaahiti wo waarya.
Nenno nuulumo nno phi waarya weekhweli, wawilyaya nttuniyani ninawamwaleela atthu othene.
Nno naari mwiilaponi, ilapo ipankiye ni nenno, nanso ilapo iyo khicuwenle.
Naaweenle ale ari awaya, ni awaya ale khayaakhelenle.
Nanso ale othene yaakhelenle ni akupanli ncina naya, ahovahiya ikuru yookhala asaana a Nluku,
yaale ahiyariye ni iphome, hata utthuna wo'rutthu ni woohikhala utthuna wa ntthu, nanso utthuna wa Nluku.
Nuulumo nno nihothatuwa irutthu ni nihokhala ni hiyano, ni nihoona nttittimiho naya, nttittimiho niri toko na mwana mmoca ookhuma wa Athumwane, oocara nnema ni ikhweli.
Yohani naavaha usaahiti awe ni naakhuwela eeraka: Ula phi yooyo aanhimyaaka wiira: Nohala uwa uttuli waka, phiri muulupale kontha ahaawo mi kihinaya.
Maana hi othene nihaakhela uthaciri woocara nnema nawe.
Kontha Nlamulo nivahiye ni Musa; nnema ni ikhweli ciwile ni Yesu Kristu.
Khaawo tokile umoona Nluku, nanso mwanawe mmoca yooyo, ri iriyari ya Athumwane, yooyo phincuwaneehile.
Ula phiri usaahiti wa Yohani, ayuta waaveleelihilyaya mayasataka ni alevi ukhuma uYerusalemu wiira yankohe yiiraka: We tupani?
Uyo ahohimya ikhweli ni khaarunne; ahohimya eeraka: Mi akihimwe Kristu.
Vaavale ahokohiya: Vano we tupani? We Eliya? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Akihimwe. We uNnapiyu nonwehereryehu? Ahaakhula eeraka: Mena.
Wahoolo yahomwiirelaca tho: Unihimerye, we tupani, wiira naakhule ale anirumile; uneeciirela pani?
Vano ule ahaakhula eeraka: Mi ki ncu ninkhuwela ntakhwani: Nlokihe iphiro ya Apwiya, toko caahimilyawe nnapiyu Isaya.
Vano yaaruminye ale, yaari mafarisi,
ni yahonkohaca yiiraka: Vano umpattiserani uhiri Kristu, mena Eliya, mena Nnapiyu?
Yohani ahaakhula eeraka: Mi kimpattisa ni maasi, nanso wariyari winyu va haawo hinoncuwelenyu.
Yooyo nohala uwa uttuli waka, himphwanelaaka utthukula miripwe co'kwakwatta cawe.
Nnya citthu cothene nnya ceeranele uPetaniya, mphantte nkina wo'Yortani, waapattisawe Yohani.
Waasilyaya, Yohani ahomoona Yesu anweelaka, ni aheera: Mmooneke Mwakhontwaa a Nluku notamiha itampi mwiilaponi!
Ula phi yoole aanhimyacaaka kiiraka: Uttuli waka mi naawa nlopwana ri muulupale, kontha ahaawo mi kihinaya.
Hata ni mi akaancuwela, nanso kiwile upattisa ni maasi wiira athoonyeriye uSirayeli.
Vano Yohani ahovaha usaahiti eeraka: Kihoona Nnepa ukhuruwaka wirimu toko ikhuntta.
Mi akaancuwela; vano ule kirumile wiira kipattise ni maasi hokiirela coo: Ule nohalenyu umoona ummorelaka Nnepa, yooyo phimpattisa ni Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Vano mi khweli kihoona ni kinaavaha usaahiti wiira uyo ri Mwana a Nluku.
Usa waya, Yohani aari tho wamoca n'eetthuci awe eeli.
Umoona waya Yesu aviraka, aheera: Mmooneke Mwakhontwaa a Nluku!
Eetthuci awe eeli ale, umwiiwa waya oolumacaka commo, yahontthara Yesu.
Yesu ahorukunuwa ni ahoona wiira yaanantthara, ahaakohaca eeraka: Nnaavyani? Yahomwaakhula: Rapi, umakile vayi? Rapi maanaya wiira mwalimu.
Ahaakhulaca eeraka: Mmwe ni moone. Yahorwaa ni yahoona waamakilyawe Yesu, ni yahonkhalanaca nenno nihuku nno, ni yaari iwora yoneecese yocoocilo.
Anteree, nhimawe Simoni Peturu, aari mmoca mwa ale eeli yeewile yaahimilyawe Yohani ni yaantthanre Yesu.
Ule aapacenre umphwanya munnawe Simoni ni ahomwiirela: Nihomphwanya Mesiya, maanaya wiira Kristu.
Vaavale ahonrwana wa Yesu. Yesu ammwehecesaka ule, ahomwiirela: We Simoni, mwana a Yohani; we unkowiihaninya Sefa, maanaya wiira Peturu.
Waasilyaya, Yesu aholakela urwaa uKalileya, ahomphwanya Filipe ni ahomwiirela: Ukitthare.
Filipe aari o'Petesayita, isittatti ya Anteree ni Peturu.
Vano Filipe ahomphwanya Natanayeli ni ahomwiirela: Nihomphwanya ule aantikhiye ni Musa muNlamuloni, ni aahiminye ni minapiyu: Yesu o'Nasaree, mwana a Yusufu.
Natanayeli ahonkoha eeraka: Inaakhuma itthu yoorera uNasaree? Filipe ahomwaakhula eeraka: Uwe wawoone.
Yesu ahomoona Natanayeli amwaattameryaka ni ahomwiirela: Ula phiri nsirayeli eekhweli ni oohaakaakiya!
Natanayeli ahonkoha eeraka: Waakicuwela vayi? Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Hinaya uwiihana Filipe, mi kahowoona, unari wa mwirini wo nfikera.
Vano Natanayeli aheera: Mwalimu, we uMwana a Nluku, we uMwene o'Sirayeli!
Yesu ahomwiirela: Nlattu wowiirela kahowoona wantthuucini wo nfikera, phinkupalyaa? Vano unaahala woona citthu cuulupale coovikana nnya.
Ahopwaherera eeraka: Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, nnaahala woona irimu inahulyeele ni ancelo a Nluku awelaka ni ankhuruwelaka Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Anavinrene mahuku mararu, yahaawo isikuhuulu yoothelaninya uKana yo'Kalileya ni anumwane Yesu yaari vaavale.
Yesu ciicammo aholattuliya usikuhuuluni nwe wamoca n'eetthuci awe.
Umala waya ivinyu, anumwane Yesu yahomwiirela: Atthu ayo ihaamalela ivinyu.
Nanso Yesu aheerela: Maama, ihaawo itthu ni mi mena nyu? Ukati aka khunaphiya.
Vano ale yaheerela arumeyi ayo: Nvare cothene cinhalawe uwiirelani.
Cahaawo vaavale myaapu siita co maluku, ceewululaceraya ayuta, ni wo khula mwaapu waakela miliko thamanini (80) atthuna iminya wo sirini (120).
Yesu aheerelaca: Ncarihe maasi mmyaapuni mmo. Ale yahocarihaca mpaka nkalani.
Vano aheerela: Nrikeke ni mwanvaheke hutumu. Ale yahopanka ciicammo.
Hutumu aholawiha ivinyu ile, khacuwenle nipuro naakhumaya, nanso yaacuwela arumeyi paahi yaarikile maasi ale. Vaavale ahomwiihana mayopakanela
ni ahomwiirela: Atthu othene aholemalela upacera ukumiha ivinyu yomaana ni inaatosilene uwurya, phimmwiihaya yoohimaan'eyo. Nanso we uhosunka ivinyu yomaana mpaka nna va.
Vano yeela isikuhuulu ila yo'Kana yo'Kalileya ila; Yesu phaapacenryawe upanka ikanyero, athoonyiheraka nttittimiho nawe, ni eetthuci awe yahonkupali.
Inamanlene yeeyo, ahokhuruwela uKafarnaumu, wamoca na anumwane, asihimawe n'eetthuci awe, ni yaakhanle wonwo mahuku vakani.
Yahaattama isikuhuulu yo Paasikuwa ya ayuta ni Yesu ahorwaa uYerusalemu.
Ahaaphwanya anonkomile wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu atthu yaatumiha imope, ikhontwaa ni ikhuntta, ni ciicammo yaakakhanihaca ncurukhu.
Vaavale ahoritha ikhwampa ni ahoomolaca othene wapuwani vale, mpaka ikhontwaa ni imope. Ahomwarusa ncurukhu wa atthu yaakakhanihaca ncurukhu, ni ahopinttulaca meeca.
Aheerela ale yaatumihaca ikhuntta: Ntamihace va nnya citthu nnya! Nhipanke inupa ya Apaapa, inupa yo marontta!
Eetthuci awe yahoopuwela itthu yantikhiye yiiraka: Nifento nirinaka ni inupa enyu ninaakiiva.
Ayuta yahonkohaca yiiraka: Ikanyeroni innithoonyihera ulamuli aa woopanka nnya citthu nnya?
Yesu ahaakhulaca: Nkwanyule ila inupa ittakattifu ila, ni wo mahuku mararu kinaahala uteka.
Ayuta yaheeraca: Ukati wo myakha arupayini na siita (46) phitekiyaya ila inupa ila, vano we, unaahala woorya uteka ukati wo mahuku mararu?
Nanso inupa ittakattifu yaaca awe yaari irutthu awe.
Vano Yesu wonwelenlyawe mwa atthu ookhwa, eetthuci awe yahoopuwela itthu yaahimilyawe, ni yahokupali cowantikhiya, ni ciicammo nuulumo nawe.
Ule naryene uYerusalemu, ukati wo Paasikuwa, atthu enci woonaya ikanyero caapankawe, yahokupali ncina nawe.
Nanso Yesu mwanene khaakhuluvela ale, kontha aanawaacuwelaca othene.
Khaaphavela wiira avahiye usaahiti ni ntthu, kontha uyo mwanene aanacuwela iri munrimani mwaya.
Ahaawo nfarisi mmoca eehaninya Nikotemu, nkhulupale a ayuta.
Uyo ahorwaa uhiyu ukela umuulumana Yesu ni ahomwiirela: Mwalimu, nihocuwela wiira uri mwalimu unkhuma wa Nluku, kontha khaawo noorya upanka nnya ikanyero cimpankaa nnya, ari Nluku hikhanle ni uyo.
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khweli khweli kinawuhimerya wiira, ntthu aahiyaryeke tho imaara ikina, khanoorya woona umwene wa Nluku.
Nikotemu ahonkoha Yesu eeraka: Wanhala wooryaa cani, ntthu uyaryaa tho, nooluvanle? Naahala woorya uhokoleela munthuukwani mwa anumwane ni uyaryaa imaara yonayeeli?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khweli khweli kinawuhimerya wiira: Ntthu hinhala uyaryaa wo maasi ni wo Nnepa khanoorya ukela wumweneni wa Nluku.
Ule noyaryaa mwirutthuni nokhala irutthu, ni ule noyaryaa muNnepani nokhala Nnepa.
Uhitikhine kiwiirenlyaka, nnolamuliya uyaryaa tho imaara ikina.
Iphyoo inwuka mphantte untthunaya. Unawiiwa iwukaka, nanso khuncuwela unkhumelelaya, hata unkelelaya. Ciicammo phiryaya ale othene annyaryaa muNnepani.
Vano, Nikotemu ahonkoha eeraka: Cineerannyaa cani cennya citthu nnya?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: We phi mwalimu o'Sirayeli, khuncuwelela nnya citthu nnya?
Khweli khweli kinawuhimerya wiira hi ninhimyaca itthu incuwelehu, ni ninaavaha usaahiti wo itthu inoonehu, nanso nyu khannokupali usaahiti ihu.
Vano mi kiwuulumenleni citthu co vathi ni nyu khankupanli, nnohala ukupali cani kawuulumelakani citthu co wirimu?
Khaawo wenle wirimu, ari hikhanle paahi ule khuruwile wirimu, acuweliyaka ukhala Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Toko Musa caathomenlyawe utakhwani inwaa yo ncukhuma, ciicammo Mwanawe Pinatamu nolamuliya uthomennya,
wiira ule othene nomwaamini akhalane ukumi woohimala.
Kontha Nluku hofenta ittuninya mpaka wanvaherenryawe mwanawe mmoca yooyo, wiira ule nohala unkupali hirimele nanso aphwanye ukumi woohimala.
Maana Nluku honruma mwanawe wattuniyani, kahi wiira ahukhumule ittuninya, nanso wiira ittuninya yoopoliye ni uyo.
Ule nonkupali kanhukhumwinya, nanso ule hinonkupali hohukhumwinya, kontha khakupanli ncina na mwana mmoca yooyo a Nluku.
Ihukhumu phi ila wiira waarya uhowa nttuniyani, ni atthu ayo afentile venci ipiphi woopwaha waarya kontha miteko caya nnyo caari coonanara.
Kontha ule othene nopanka coonanara naarusanana waarya ni khanaattamerya wo waarya, wiira miteko cawe cihoonnye.
Ule nopanka yeekhweli nawaattamerya waarya, wiira miteko cawe coonnye, kontha ciri coopankiya mwa Nluku.
Wahoolo Yesu n'eetthuci awe ahorwaa ilapo yo'Yuta; wenwe ahaakhalanaca ni aanapattisa.
Ciicammo Yohani aanapattisa wEnomi, wo waattamana uSalimu, kontha yahaawo maasi menci, ni atthu yaanatthawelela wonwo ni yaanapattisiya.
Yohani aari hinaya utthukeliya.
Vano, eetthuci a Yohani ni nyuta mmoca yaananyakulihana nlattu wookhuca.
Yahorwaaca umoonanana Yohani ni yahomwiirelaca: Mwalimu, ule aari ni nyu ukhopela Yortani, yoole aankhalenlenyu usaahiti ule, naapattisa ni othene anaarwa umoonanana.
Vano Yohani ahaakhula eeraka: Ntthu khanoorya waakhela itthu yoohivahiya ukhuma wirimu.
Nyu mw'asaahiti o citthu cuhimenryakani kiiraka: Mi akinakhala Kristu, nanso kiruminye umwaakela nivakulo.
Ule rina mwali oohala umpakanela phiri mayopakanela; mpwanawe nonkhalela unanku mayopakanela uyo naatteeliya venci mwa nlattu wo ncu na mpakaneli. Vano wonwo utteeliya nwo, ciicammo uhokiiraneela mi.
Wanlamuliya wiira uyo oonuweke ni mi kiiyeveke.
Ule nokhuma uculu ri owaapwaha othene. Ule nokhuma ilapo yo vathi ri ovathi ni noolumaca co vathi. Ule nokhuma wirimu ri uculu wo citthu cothene.
Ule naavaha usaahiti wo citthu cinoonawe ni cineewawe, nanso khaawo nokupali usaahiti awe.
Nanso ule nokupali usaahiti awe, naatthitta wiira Nluku ri eekhweli.
Kontha mayorumiya ni Nluku nooluma ca Nluku, maana Nluku naavaha Nnepa woohi nliko.
Athumwane anaanfenta mwana ni ahonvaha cothene mmatatani mwawe.
Phimaana, ule nomwaamini mwana haana ukumi woohimala, nanso ule hinonkupali mwana khanhala woona ukumi, nanso uviruwa wa Nluku unaakhala ni uyo.
Ukati waacuwenlyawe Yesu wiira mafarisi yaheewa wiiriyaka uyo nawaapanka ni waapattisa eetthuci enci wompwaha Yohani,
hata unookhalaru wiira khanakhala Yesu phaapattisa, nanso eetthuci awe,
ahokhuma uYuteya, ni ahorwaa tho uKalileya.
Aalamuliya uttupulaniha nttetthe wo'Samariya.
Ahophiya isittatti imoca yo'Samariya yeehaninya Sikari, wakhiviru ni imatta ca Yakopi caammahilyawe mwanawe Yusufu.
Wonwo, yahaawo iluusi ya Yakopi. Vano natoomwilene nlattu wo nkwaha, Yesu ahonkoma wakhiviru iluusi iwora yonasiita yo'thana.
Vaavale, yahowa athiyana amoca o'Samariya urika maasi. Yesu aheerela: Nkivahe maasi kiwurye.
Kontha eetthuci awe yaarwele uparasa uthuma iyolya.
Vano, athiyana o'Samariya ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: We unaryene nyuta, unaakilepela mi maasi owurya kinari nthiyana nsamariya? Kontha ayuta khaaneewanana na asamariya.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Waacuwenle ivahiya ya Nluku ni ule noolepela eeraka: Ukivahe maasi kiwurye, we waananlepela, ni uyo aanawuvaha maasi makumi.
Ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Muulupale, we khurina yoorikela maasi, ni iluusi ila yo wiisa; vano ari vayi maasi makumi ayo?
Atthuna phi we muulupale owaapwaha athumwanihu Yakopi anivahile iluusi, yeeyo iwunryaya aneene, ciicammo asaanaya ni inama caya?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Ule nowurya ala maasi ala ninaahala unvola tho ntthona.
Nanso ule nohala uwurya maasi anhalaka unvaha mi, khaninonvola tho ntthona. Kontha maasi anhalaka unvaha mi, ankokhala mwirutthuni mwawe iluusi yo maasi ookhoola owuukumini woohimala.
Vano yahomwiirela athiyana ale coo: Muulupale ukivahe yaayo maasi ayo wiira mi nihikivole tho ntthona, ni kihiwe tho va urika maasi.
Yesu aheerela: Nrwee mwehane awannyu yawe woono;
Vaavale athiyana ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Akitheliye. Yesu aheerela: Nhooluma ratta winreenyu: Akitheliye.
Kontha mwahotheliya na alopwana athanu, vano ayo arinenyu ayo, khaanakhala awannyu. Va muulumacile ikhweli.
Vano athiyana ale yahomwiirela: Muulupale, kinoona wiira we nnapiyu.
Mayathumwanihu yaalompa yoola mwaako ula, nanso nyu nneera, uYerusalemu phi nipuro ninlamuliya ulompiya.
Vaavale Yesu ahomwiirela: Nthiyana, ukikupali mi wiira: Unaawa ukati, uhinhalenyu waalapela Apaapa hata ula mwaako ula, atthuna uYerusalemu.
Nyu nnolapela ihincuwelenyu; hi ninlapela incuwelehu, kontha woopwa unkhuma wa ayuta.
Nanso unaawa ukati, yooyo ukati uyo phi yoola, ale mayolapa eekhweli, wanhalaya waalapela Apaapa, munnepani ni mwikhwelini, kontha Apaapa phinaavyaya yaala atthu ala wiira akhale owaalapela.
Nluku ri Nnepa, ni wanlamuliya wiira ale anonlapela, anlapeleke munnepani ni mwikhwelini.
Yahaakhula athiyana ale yiiraka: Mi kinaacuwela wiira naahala uwa Mesiya neehaninya Kristu, ni awaaka nowonihimerya citthu cothene.
Vano Yesu aheerela: Yooyo phi mi va, kinoowuulumanani va.
Yooyo ukati uyo yahoturuwaca eetthuci awe ni yahotikhinaca waamoonacilyaya oolumanaka athiyana amoca, nanso khaawo aamwiirenle: Unkohakohani? Atthuna: Unoolumanelani athiyana ala?
Vano athiyana ale yahohiya mwaapu aya, ni yahorwaa usittatti waahimacera atthu ale wiira:
Nkaawani va, mwamoone nlopwana akihimyacile citthu cothene cimpankaka. Kaahiki khanakhala phi yooyo Kristu?
Vaavale yahokhumaca nsittatti mmwe ni yahorwaaca mpaka waaryawe Yesu.
Nanso toko commo, eetthuci awe ale yaanankhanyereriha wiira: Mwalimu, ulyeke!
Nanso uyo aheerela coo: Kihaana iyolya ihincuwelenyu.
Vano eetthuci awe ale yahokohanaca ayaayoru yiiraka: Atthuna haawo mmwiihenre iyolya?
Yesu aheerelaca coo: Iyolya aka mi uri upanka intthunaya ale akirumile n'uvara miteko caya.
Nyu khanneera wiira cihanle myeeri micese wiira waanceriye uhephiya? Nanso mi, kinwiirelani, nwuse miitho ni moone imatta nnyo, kontha uhophiya ukati woohepha.
Mayohepha nawaakhela itthuvo awe ukhuma nenna va, ni naasunka nhokorokho awe wukumini woohimala, ni naahala utteeliya ukhuma mayowaala mpaka mayohepha.
Kontha ihaawo yoohiminya yeekhweli toko ila: Mayowaala ri mmoca, nkina uyo ri mayohepha.
Mi kihoorumani urwaa uhepha ihaanlenyu; akina ahohuva avaraka nteko mwinci, vano nyu nrwaale uhepha nteko uhuvilyaya akhwinyu.
Vaavale asamariya enci o yeele isittatti ile, yahonkupali Yesu mwa nlattu wo'saahiti waavahilyaya athiyana ale yiiraka: Uyo hokihimyaca citthu cothene cimpankaka.
Vano waawilyaya asamariya umoonanana Yesu, yahonlepelaca wiira ankhalanace wamoca, ni ahokhala wonwo mahuku meeli.
Akina enci yahonkupali, nlattu wo nuulumo nawe.
Vano yaheerelaca athiyana ale: Nna va khunakhala wiira nikupanli paahi itthu inihimenryenyu, nanso nlattu woomwiiwa na asinene ni ninaacuwela wiira ula weekhweli ri moopoli o'ttuninya.
Vano uvira waya mahuku meeli, ahokhuma vaavale arwaaka uKalileya.
Kontha Yesu mwanene ahovaha usaahiti eeraka: Nnapiyu khanlemelihiya ilapo iyarenlyawe.
Phimaana, ukati waaphilyawe uKalileya, akalileya yahomwaakhelela ratta, kontha yahoona citthu cothene caapankilyawe uYerusalemu ukati waarwacilyaya upanka mphantte wo'sikuhuulu.
Vano ahokhuma tho arwaaka uKanaa wo'Kalileya, wonwo waatatusilyawe maasi ivinyu. Vano, ahaawo nkhulupale mmoca oohano, mwanawe aanawerennya uKafarnaumu.
Wiiwa wawe wiira Yesu ahowa uKalileya akhumaka uYuteya, ahorwaa umuulumana ni ahonsonttela wiira arwee anvonihe mwanawe, kontha aahanle vakani ukhwa.
Vano Yesu ahomwiirela: Nyu mwaahooneke ikanyero ni mitikiniho, khannohala ukupali.
Nkhulupale oohano ahonvekela eeraka: Pwiya, nrwee mwanaka hinaya ukhwa.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Urweeke, mwanaa uyo hovona. Nlopwan'ole ahokupali moolumo a Yesu ni ahorwaa.
Ule eettak'ono, ukati weekameliyawe na ananteko awe, yahonhimerya wiira mwaninyu uyo hovona.
Vano ule ahaakohaca iwora yaavonnyawe mwana uyo. Ale yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Ncana, iwora yonasaapa yocoocilo phaavonnyawe.
Vaavale, athumwane ale yahocuwelela wiira yaari yeeyo iwora yoolumacilyawe Yesu eeraka: Mwanaa hovona. Vano ule ahokupali wamoca ni ntthoko nawe nothene.
Ila phaari ikanyero yonayeeli yaapankilyawe Yesu, ikhumelo awe uYuteya awaaka uKalileya.
Cinavinrene nnya citthu nnya, yahaawo isikuhuulu ya ayuta, ni Yesu ahorwaa uYerusalemu.
Vano uYerusalemu, ihaawo iluusi wakhiviru wankhora wo'khontwaa, ineehaninya ni nuulumo no'parayiku, Petesayita, yaarina mapirothi mathanu.
Yaayo mapuro ayo, waankhalaka mphwinko mwinci wa aretta, oohoona, oottumpela ni owuntakyaa,

awehereryaka uttinkihiya wo maasi ale. Kontha uhaawo ukati wakhuruwawe ncelo mmoca, phuutuwanyaka maasi ale. Vano ule aapacera ukela nluusi mmwe, anootuwanihiyene maasi ale, aanvona iretta phi iretta yaarinawe.
Ahaawo vaavale nlopwana aawerennya myakha talathini na naane (38).
Vano Yesu, wamoonyawe necatalenle ni acuwelaka wiira aari ciicammwe ukati mwinci, ahonkoha eeraka: Unaatthuna uvona?
Nretta ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Muulupale, akirina ntthu ookittikhela nluusi mmo, yootuwanyinyaka maasi ayo. Kontha mi waneeraka kikeleke, naakuvela nkina mi kihinaya.
Vaavale Yesu ahomwiirela: Wunwe, ukuse ntthatto naa nno ni urwee.
Nananoru, ntthu ule ahovona n'ukusa ntthatto nawe nno, ni ahopacera weetta. Nanso nenno nihuku nno, naari nihuku no ntivela.
Phimaana, ayuta yahomwiirela oovonihinya ule: Ilelo ntivela, khunlamuliya ukusa ntthatto.
Vano ule ahaakhula eeraka: Yooyo kivonihile uyo phikiirenle: Ukuse ntthatto naa nno ni urwee.
Vaavale yahonkohaca yiiraka: Tipani yooyo wiirenle uyo, ukuse ntthatto naa nno ni urwee?
Nanso aavonihinye ule khaancuwela ule aanvonihile, maana Yesu ahokhuma nenno nipuro nno nlattu wo mphwinko.
Wahoolo Yesu ahomphwanya wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni ahomwiirela: Uhoona, vano uhovona; uhikose tho, wiira ihukhumelele tho itthu ikina yootepa.
Vano nlopwan'ole ahorwaa ni ahaahimerya ayuta wiira aari phi Yesu aanvonihile.
Vaavale ayuta yahopacera unttharatthara Yesu, nlattu woopanka nnya citthu nnya nihuku no ntivela.
Nanso uyo aheerelaca: Apaapa anvara nteko mpaka nna va, ni mi kinaavara ciicammo.
Phimaana, ayuta yaananttharatthara wootepa khula ikwaha aphavelaka umwiiva, kontha khawaari paahi uvoniharu ntivela, nanso ciicammo nlattu wo wiira Nluku ri Athumwane, ni eelikaniha ni Nluku.

Vano Yesu aheerela ayuta: Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira Mwana khanoorya upanka itthu veekhawe, ihikhanle itthu impankaya Athumwane, kontha cothene cimpankaya Athumwane, ciicammo Mwana phimpankawe.
Maana Athumwane anaanfenta Mwanaya, anaanthoonyera cothene cimpankaya ni anaanthoonyera miteko cuulupale coopwaha wiira ntikhinace.
Toko ciicammo Athumwane cinonwelelihaya ni waavaha ukumi ale akhwile, ciicammo Mwana nawaavaha ukumi ale anaatthunawe.
Athumwane khaawo nonhukhumwaya, nanso anvahacenre uhukhumu citthu cothene Mwanaya
wiira othene anlemelihe Mwana toko cinlemelihiyaya Athumwane. Ule hinonlemeliha Mwana, khaalemelihile Athumwane anrumile.
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira ule neewelela nuulumo naka ni ankupaliki ule kirumile haana ukumi woohimala, ni khanhala uhukhumwinya, nanso hovira wuukhwani ni horwaa wukumini.
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira unaawa ukati ni uhophiya, atthu ookhwa wanhalaya wiiwa ncu na Mwana a Nluku. Vano ale anhala wiiwa anaahala ukhala akumi.
Toko Apaapa ciikhalihilyaya akumi, ciicammo ahonvaha Mwanaya ikuru cowiikhaliha nkumi.
Ahonvaha ulamuli woohukhumu, kontha uyo ri Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Ihuutikiniheni yeela itthu ila, maana unaaphiya ukati unhalaya wiiwa ncu nawe, ale ari mmahiye.
Vano ale yaapanka coorera, anawunwelela arwaaka wukumini, ni ale yaapanka coonanara, anawunwelela arwaaka wuhukhumwinyani.
Mi khiiwo impankaka ni ikuru caka. Mananna cineewaka commo phinhukhumwaka, ni uhukhumu waka uri wo'sariya, maana akinaavya utthuna waka, nanso utthuna wa Apaapa akirumile.
Wakhala wiira mi kinawiipankela usaahiti, uyo khunakhala wo'khweli.
Haawo nkina nokittonkaca mi, ni kinaacuwela wiira usaahiti unkittonkaca awe uyo uri weekhweli.
Nhaaruma mayanhupi wa Yohani, ni uyo hohimyaca usaahiti weekhweli.
Nanso mi akinaamini usaahiti wa ntthu; vano kinoohimyacerani nnya citthu nnya, wiira moopwee.
Yohani aari nthuko waapharela ni waamwaleela. Nyu nhotthuna utteeliya ukati vakani nwaaryani mwawe.
Nanso mi kihaana usaahiti woovikana wa Yohani. Maana miteko cikikhuluvenlyaya Apaapa wiira kivare, cennya cinvaraka nnya, cinaakivaha usaahiti woothoonyihera wiira Apaapa phikirumile.
Apaapa akirumile, yaayo phinkivahera usaahiti mi. Nyu khannatoko wiiwa ncu naya, ni khannatoko woona makhalelo aya.
Ciicammo khannatoko ukhalana nuulumo naya wanrimani winyu, kontha khannonkupali ule anrumilyaya.
Nnosomeeha cowantikhiya, kontha nnooniha wiira phinhala wuuphwanyihani ukumi woohimala, cennyo phinkittonka mi.
Nanso, nnaakhotta ukiiwelela mi wiira nkhalane ukumi.
Mi akinaakhelela nttittimiho nookhuma wa atthu;
Kontha kinawucuwelani wiira nyu khanrina nifento na Nluku wanrimani.
Mi kiwile mwa ncina na Apaapa ni khankaakhelenle. Nanso awaaka nkina mwa ncina nawe, khweli nnamwaakhelela.
Nnohala ukupali cani nyu nnotthuna nttittimiho na atthu atthuru, nanso khannotthuna uphavela nttittimiho ninkhuma wa Nluku mmoca paahi.
Vano nhoone toko kinaahala wuukasarini wa Apaapa; nookasarini phi Musa, yooyo nonkhuluvelenyu uyo.
Kontha, mwaari oonkupali Musa, ciicammo mwaankikupali mi, maana uyo antikhile cinkittonka mi.
Nanso mwaahikupaliki cowantikhiya cawe, nnohala ukupali cani moolumo aka?
Wahoolo cinavinrene nnya citthu nnya, Yesu aholapuwela mphantte nkina wo'pahari yo'Kalileya, iri yo'Tiperiyate.
Atthu enci yaanatthara nlattu wo woona mitikiniho caapankawe ukati waavonihawe aretta.
Yesu ahowela wamwaakoni ni wonwo ahonkoma n'eetthuci awe.
Vano, yaahanle mahuku vakani mpaka Paasikuwa, isikuhuulu ya ayuta.
Yesu ahoona wiira mphwinko waanamwaattamerya, ahomwiirela Filipe: Ninkothuma vayi mikatthe coolyaca ala atthu ala?
Nanso oolumacera commo wiira aalawihe, maana uyo aanacuwela itthu yaahalawe upanka.
Vaavale Filipe ahomwaakhula eeraka: Khunhala utosa ncurukhu iminya piili woothumela mikatthe, wiira wo khula ntthu aphwanye vakani.
Mmoca w'eetthuci awe, eehaninya Anteree, munnawe Simoni Peturu, ahomwiirela:
Haawo va mmirawo mmoca rina mikatthe mithanu co mahele ni ihopa piili. Vano cinaahala utosa wowiira awanele atthu enci?
Yesu aheera: Mweerele atthu ayo yunkomace. Nenno nipuro nno yahaawo malasi menci ni othene yahonkomaca. Alopwana yonkomacile nenno nipuro nno yahaawo wookhalaka alopwana ilufu thanu.
Vaavale, Yesu ahokusa mikatthe nnye, ahosukuru ni ahaakawela eetthuci othene. Eetthuci ale yahaakawela yonkomacile ale, ni Yesu ahopanka ciicammo ihopa nnye, toko ale caaphavelaya.
Anarupalacilene, Yesu aheerela eetthuci awe: Nttottelace ikalakathela cihanle nnyo, wiira cihihononnye.
Vano ale yahottottelaca ikalakathela caahanle ukati waalyaya ni yahocariha itthuttu khumi na piili.
Woona waya atthu ale ikanyero yaapankilyawe Yesu, yaheera: Ula khweli, phi nnapiyu aalamuliya uwa nttuniyani.
Vano Yesu ucuwela wawe wiira yaaphavela unvaraca umwene, ahokhuma tho veekha arwaaka umwaakoni.
Wiila waya, eetthuci awe yahokhuruwela upahari.
Yahokelaca nkalawani n'ulapuwela nikhopela nikhwawe, mphantte wo'Kafarnaumu. Wahokela uripela ni Yesu aari hinawa woonanana ale.
Maasi ayo yahopacera ucaca ni iphyoo yinci yaanawuka.
Aneettilene nkalawani wookhalaka malonce mathanu atthuna siita, phaamoonnyaya Yesu eettaka waculu maasi ni aattameryaka ikalawa ile, yahoovaca.
Nanso Yesu aheerelaca: Phi mi! Nhoove!
Vano ale yahomwaakhelelaca nkalawani mmwe ni wo waakuvyaca wene ikalawa ile yahophiya waakelaya.

Usa waya, mphwinko waahanle nikhopela nikhwawe no'pahari, wahoona wiira vaavale yaari ikalawa imoca paahi yankani. Vano Yesu khaakenle n'eetthuci awe nkalawani mmwe, nanso eetthuci awe ale yaarwacile veekha.
Vano ikalawa cikhwawe cacikani, cahowa cikhumaka uTiperiyate, wakhiviru ni nipuro naapacilyaya ulya nkatthe anapacenrene Apwiya usukurwela.
Wahoolo mphwinko ule woonnyaya wiira Yesu khaawo ni mena eetthuci awe, yahokelaca nkalawani n'urwaaca umwaavya uKafarnaumu.
Vano umphwanya waya nikhopela nikhwawe no'pahari, yahonkoha yiiraka: Mwalimu, uwile yakhani va?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khweli, khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Nyu nnokaavyacera, kahi paahi nlattu wo woona ikanyero, nanso nlattu woolya n'urupala mikatthe.
Nhivare nteko nlattu wo iyolya invira, nanso nlattu wo iyolya imphwanyiha ukumi woohimala, unhalawe wuvahani Mwanawe Pinatamu, kontha Nluku Athumwane ahothoonyihera n'utthitta waya.
Wahoolo ale yahonkoha yiiraka: Niireke cani wiira nivare nteko untthunawe Nluku?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nteko wa Nluku ph'ula: Unkupali ule nrumilyawe.
Vano ale yahonkoha yiiraka: Ikanyeroni yo ntikiniho innooniheraa wiira nuukupali we? Unhala upankani?
Mayapaapehu aholya manaa ntakhwani, toko cantikhiyaya: Uyo haavahaca ulya nkatthe wo wirimu.
Yesu aheerela: Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Khanakhala Musa oovahileni nkatthe wo wirimu. Apaapa phinoovahani nkatthe weekhweli wo wirimu.
Kontha nkatthe wa Nluku phi yoole khuruwile wirimu ni novaha ukumi wattuniyani.
Vano yahomwiirelaca: Pwiya, ukati wothene nnivaheke yooyo nkatthe uyo.
Yesu ahaahimerya eeraka: Mi ki nkatthe wo'kumi; ule nowa wa mi khanvoliya tho itala, ni ule nokikupali mi, khanvoliya tho ntthona.
Nanso mi kihoohimeryani wiira, hata nnookoonaru, khannokupali.
Ale othene anvahiyaka na Apaapa, yaayo phinwa wa mi, ni mi akinhala woomola.
Kontha mi kikhuruwile wirimu, akiweenle uvara intthunaka, nanso uvara ile intthunaya ale akirumile.
Ni intthunaya ale akirumile phi ila, wiira hikhale ookirimela hata mmoca wa ale akivahilyaya; uhiya commo, mi kinaahala wonweleliha nihuku noomaliha.
Kontha, utthuna wa Apaapa uri wo wiira ule othene nohala umoona Mwana ankupaliki, akhalane ukumi woohimala, ni mi kimmoomunweleliha nihuku noomaliha.
Nlattu wo yeeyo, ayuta yahopacera uncocopolaca Yesu, kontha aahowiira: Mi ki nkatthe ukhuruwile wirimu.
Phimaana yaanawiiraca: Ula kahimwe Yesu, mwana a Yusufu? Khanaacuwenle athumwane na anumwane? Vano va neerelani: Kikhuruwile wirimu?
Yesu ahaakhulaca eeraka: Nhiye ukicocopolaca nwo.
Khaawo noorya uwa waryaka mi, woohiwaaninya na Apaapa akirumile, ni mi kinkomunweleliha nihuku noomaliha.
Ihantikhiya ni minapiyu wiira: Othene anaahala usomihinya ni Nluku. Othene aneewelela Apaapa ni aneetthuca ni yaayo, anaawa wa mi.
Khaawo oonne Apaapa, ari hikhanle paahi ule khumile wa Nluku; yooyo paahi phoonne Apaapa.
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira ule nokikupali mi haana ukumi woohimala.
Mi ki nkatthe wo'kumi.
Mayapaapenyu yaholya manaa ntakhwani ni ahokhwaca.
Ula uri nkatthe unkhuruwa wirimu, wiira ule othene nohala ulya hikhwe.
Mi ki nkatthe nkumi ukhuruwile wirimu; ntthu nohala ulya yooyo nkatthe uyo, naakhalana ukumi woohimala, ni nkatthe unhalaka uvaha iri phi irutthu aka inhalaka uvaha nlattu wo'kumi wo'ttuninya.
Ayuta yannyakulihana ayaayoru yiiraka: Wanhala wooryaa cani ula univaha ulya irutthu awe?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Mwaahilyeke irutthu ya Mwana a Pinatamu ni mwaahiwuryeke iphome awe, khannohala ukhalana ukumi.
Ule nolya irutthu aka ni uwurya iphome aka, haana ukumi woohimala, ni mi kinaamunweleliha nihuku noomaliha.
Kontha irutthu aka iri iyolya yeekhweli, ni iphome aka iri yoowurya yeekhweli.
Ule nohala ulya irutthu aka n'uwurya iphome aka naakhala mwa mi, ni mi mwa uyo.
Ciicammo toko Apaapa akirumile ciryaya akumi, ni mi ki nkumi mwa nlattu wa Apaapa, ciicammo ule nolya irutthu aka naakhalana ukumi mwa mi.
Ula phi nkatthe ukhuruwile wirimu, ni khawanlikana mayapaapenyu waalilyaya manaa akhwaacaka, nanso ule nohala ulya ula nkatthe ula naakhalana ukumi woohimala.
Nnya citthu nnya Yesu oolumacile ukati weetthucihawe nsinakoka uKafarnaumu.
Eetthuci awe enci wiiwa waya ala moolumo ala, yaheeraca: Iri yoorika inhimya iyo. Tipani nohala woorya?
Nanso Yesu, ucuwela wawe wiira yaanttokuttaca nlattu wo moolumo awe, ahaakohaca eeraka: Ila itthu ila inawukakathulihani?
Waahala ukhala cani nnamoonne Mwanawe Pinatamu awelaka, arwaaka nipuro naaryawe woopacera?
Nnepa phimmaha ukumi, nanso irutthu khiiwo imphwanyerehu; moolumo anoohimeryakani mi ari nnepa ni ari ukumi.
Nanso ahaawo iriyari inyu atthu oohikupali. Kontha Yesu aanawaacuwela ukhuma ale yahaankupali na ale yaahala umuuluma makhuce.
Ni ahopwaherera eeraka: Nlattu wo yeela, phinoohimeryakani, khaawo noorya uwa wa mi, woohiireliya na Apaapa.
Ukhuma yoole ukati ule, eetthuci awe enci yahonhiyaca ni khayaantthanre tho.
Vano, Yesu ahaakoha khumi n'eeli ale eeraka: Ni nyu ciicammo nnophavela ukihiyaca?
Simoni Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, ninhala urwaa wa pani? Nyu nhaana moolumo ookumi woohimala,
ni hi ninaakupali n'ucuwela wiira nyu Nttakattifu a Nluku.
Yesu ahaakohaca eeraka: Mi akuthanlileni nyu atthu khumi n'eeli? Nanso mmoca wa nyu ri Sotwani.
Ule aamwaaca Yuta, mwana a Simoni Iskariyoti, kontha yooyo phaahala umuuluma makhuce, nari mmoca mwa ale khumi n'eeli ale.
Cinavinrene nnya citthu nnya, Yesu eettakaca uKalileya, kontha khaatthuna uviravira uYuteya, nlattu ayuta yaanamwaavyaca wiira amwiive.
Vano, isikuhuulu ya ayuta, yeehaninya isikuhuulu yo marapattha, yahaattamerya.
Asunnawe yahorwaaca waaryawe ni yahomwiirelaca: Ukhume nna nipuro nna ni urwee uYuteya, wiira ciicammo eetthuci aa yoone miteko cinvaraa.
Kontha khaawo naavya ucuweliya waatthuni, apankaka miteko cawe mmwiitihoni. Woopanka nnya citthu nnya, wiithoonyihereke waatthuni.
Kontha hata asunnawe yaayo khayaankupali.
Vano Yesu aheerelaca: Ukati aka khunaya uphiya, nanso nyu mahuku othene nhaana ukati.
Ittuniya khinoorya wuramani, nanso mi inaakirama, kontha mi kinaavaha usaahiti aya, kihimyaka wiira miteko caya ciri coonanara.
Nrwaaceke nyu usikuhuuluni nwo; mi nna va akinhala urwaa, kontha ukati aka khunaya uphiya.
Yesu waahimyacera wawe nnya citthu cothene nnya, ahohala uKalileya.
Vano asunnawe urwaa waya usikuhuuluni, ni uyo ciicammo ahorwaa woohiicooneeha, nanso aarweele wo mwiitiho.
Vano, ayuta yaanamwaavyaca wasikuhuuluni vale ni yaanakohaca yiiraka: Ri vayi yooyo?
Wariyari wa atthu ale yahaawo mattokuttoku menci nlattu wa Yesu. Akina yeera: Uyo ri omaana. Vano akina yeera: Mena, nawaathepyaca atthu.
Nanso khaawo aamuulumacera woonene, kontha yaanawooviya ayuta.
Vano isikuhuulu ile yeettaka iriyariru, Yesu ahorwaa wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni aanasomiha.
Vano, ayuta yaanatikhinaca yiiraka: Ula noorya cani cowantikhiya hisomihinye?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Insomihaka mi khiri yawaka, nanso yawawe yoole kirumile.
Ntthu atthunaka upanka utthuna wa Nluku, naahala woonenela wakhala wiira cinsomihaka cinkhuma wa Nluku, atthuna cinkikhumakhuma yeemi.
Ule neehimyahimerya, naavya nttittimiho nawe, nanso ule naavya nttittimiho nawe ule nrumile, uyo ri eekhweli, ni mwa yooyo khuuwo wootha.
Musa khoovahileni Nlamulo? Nanso wariyari winyu khaawo neettela. Nnokaaveryani ukiiva?
Mphwinko wahaakhula wiiraka: We uhaana ncini. Tipani nowaavya uwiiva?
Yesu ahaakhulaca eeraka: Kivanre nteko mmoca paahi ni othene nhotikinihinya.
Musa hoorumani wuula, unokhalaru wiira khakhumanne Musa nanso ikhumelo yo mayathumwaninyu, nihuku no ntivela nnaamuuliha ntthu.
Ntthu nawuulihiya nihuku no ntivela, wiira nihihanyurihiye Nlamulo na Musa, vano isiyani nkiviruwelaka, nlattu woonvoniha ntthu nihuku no ntivela?
Nhinhukhumule ntthu nlattu woomoona ciryawe, nanso munhukhumule ni isariya.
Vano akina uYerusalemu yeera: Khanakhala phi yoola naaviya ula wiira eeviye?
Ninaamoona wuulumaca woohivitha, ni khiiwo inoolumeliyawe. Maanaya wiira alamuli ayo anaancuweleeha wiira khweli ula phi Kristu?
Vano hi ninaacuwela unkhumawe, nanso wahoolo awaaka vale Kristu, khaawo nohala ucuwela unkhumawe.
Vano Yesu aheetthuciha wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni ahokhuwela eeraka: Nyu nnaakicuwela, ni unkhumaka nnaacuwela; mi akiwile utthuna waka, nanso Ule kirumile ri eekhweli, Yoole nyu hinoncuwelenyu.
Mi kinaancuwela, kontha kinkhuma uwannyawe ni phikirumile.
Vano ayuta yaaphavela untthuka, nanso khaawo anvanre, kontha ukati awe waari uhinaphiya.
Vaavale enci yaariwo yahonkupalela ni yaaneera: Awaaka Kristu, naahala upanka tho ikanyero cuulupale coopwaha nnya cimpankawe ula nlopwan'ola?
Vano mafarisi ale wiiwa waya mphwinko ule uttokuttaka nlattu wo nnya citthu nnya, wamoca na akhulupale o mayasataka, yahaaruma mayorontta wiira yantthuke.
Yesu aheerelaca: Uhanle ukati vakani wookhala ni nyu, wahoolo kinaaturuwela wa yoole kirumile.
Nnaahala ukaavya nanso khannohala ukiphwanya; ciicammo nipuro niryaka, nyu khannoorya uphiya.
Wahoolo ayuta yaheerelana ayaayoru: Ula nohala ukelela vayi uhinhalehu umphwanya? Atthuna norwaa wa ayuta amwareenle umakereku wiira aasomihe akereku?
Maanaya isiyani itthu yuulumacilyawe iyo eeraka: Nnaahala ukaavya nanso khannohala ukiphwanya, ciicammo nipuro niryaka nyu khannoorya uphiya?
Nihuku noomaliha, nihuku nuulupale no'sikuhuulu, Yesu aheemela ni aheera: Ntthu ninvonle ntthona, awe wa mi, aawurye.
Ntthu nokikupali, toko cinhimyaya cowantikhiya, cinaamphattuwaca myooloko co maasi makumi.
Iyo oolumacenre nlattu wo Nnepa waahalaya waakhela ale yaahala unkupali, kontha mpaka yoole ukati ule Nnepa waari uhinawiihiya, kontha Yesu aari hinaya uttittimihinya.
Vano akina o mumphwinkoni mmwe, yeewile ala moolumo ala, yaheera: Ula weekhweli ri Nnapiyu.
Akina yeera: Uyo ri Kristu. Nanso akina yaanakoha yiiraka: Kristu aanhala ukhumelela uKalileya?
Cowantikhiya khacinhimya wiira Kristu nohala ukhuma munlokoni mwa Taviti, aliteya o'Petelehemu, waakhalawe Taviti?
Vaavale mphwinko ule wahokawannya nlattu wa Yesu
Akina yaaphavela untthuka, nanso khaawo oonrye ummara.
Wiimaleloni, mayorontta yahoturuwelaca wa akhulupale o mayasataka ni mafarisi, yaayo yaakohile yiiraka: Nhimmwaanenleni?
Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Khaawo ntthu pacile wuulumaca toko yooyo nlopwana uyo.
Vano yahaakoha tho mafarisi ale yiiraka: Maanaya wiira ni nyu ciicammo nhothepiya?
Pooti haawo nkhulupale mmoca, atthuna nfarisi nkupanli yooyo?
Hata mena! Nanso ula mphwinko woohicuwela malamulo ula, uholaphiya.
Nikotemu, mmoca wa ale, aapacile umoonanana Yesu, ahaakoha eeraka:
Nlamulo nihu ninaanhukhumu ntthu, woohipacera toko umwiiwaca wiira icuweliye itthu ipankilyawe?
Vano ayo yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Pooti ni we ciicammo uri o'Kalileya? Uwehaweheehe ni unaahala woona wiira uKalileya khanakhumelela nnapiyu.
Paahi, vaavale khula ntthu ahokhuma arwaaka uwannyawe.
Nkwaha mmoca Yesu ahorwaa umwaakoni wo Olivera.
Wicisuru, ahohokolela tho wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, ni atthu othene yaanarwaa umoonanana, ni nonkomile, aaneetthuciha.
Vano mayowantikha ni mafarisi, yahommwaana waaryawe Yesu, nthiyana mmoca aaphwanyinye eettaka uluva, ni yahomweemesa iriyari ya atthu ale,
ni aheereliya Yesu: Mwalimu, ula nthiyana ula hophwanyinya eettaka uluva.
Ni muNlamuloni, honiruma Musa wiira ula himunthiyana ula nonlamuliya uvonyakaciya ni maluku. Vano we, uneera cani?
Vano yoolumacera commo wiira amoonace, waacera amootheryace ni ukhale phummara wene. Nanso Yesu ahooroma ni ahopacera wantikha vathi ni nikokho.
Ukhala wiira yaanankhanyereriha unkoha, Yesu aheenuwa ni aheerelaca coo: Ule ri woohi itampi, apacere unvonya ni nluku ula nthiyana ula.
Vano ahooroma tho apwahereraka wantikha vathi.
Nanso mafarisi ale, wiiwa waya ala maakhulelo ala, yahopacera umwaryaa mmoca mmoca, apaceraka oolupale ni asintteryaka acikani ale, ni aahanle paahi Yesu na athiyana ale.
Vano Yesu eenuwaka ni ahimoonaka tho ntthu nkina, ari hikhanle paahi nthiyan'ole, ahonkoha eeraka: Nthiyana, ari vayi mayowuukasari ayo? Khaawo oohukhumwile?
Nthiyan'ole ahaakhula eeraka: Mena, Pwiya! Paahi, Yesu ahomwiirela: Hata mi akinoohukhumu. Urwee ni uhikose tho.
Wahoolo, Yesu ahoolumela tho eerelaka: Mi kiri waarya wo nttuniyani; nokitthara mi, khanhala weetta mpiphini; uhiya commo, naakhalana waarya wo'kumi.
Vano mafarisi yahomwiirela: We uneevaha usaahiti umwanene; maanaya usaahiti aa khunakhala wo'khweli.
Vaavale Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Toko cinsaahitihaka kimwanene, maanaya wiira usaahiti aka uri wo'khweli, kontha kinaacuwela unkhumaka ni unkelaka, nanso nyu khannocuwela unkhumaka hata unkelaka.
Vano nyu nnohukhumu toko cinhukhumwaya apinatamu, nanso mi akinonhukhumu ntthu.
Mi kahukhumuku, uhukhumu waka nwo uri weekhweli, maana akiri veekha, nanso mi kiri na Apaapa akirumile.
Ciicammo muNlamuloni mwinyu mmo nhantikhiya wiira usaahiti wa atthu eeli phinkhala weekhweli.
Mi kimwanene kinawiivahera usaahiti, na Apaapa akirumile anaakivahera usaahiti.
Vano ale yahonkoha yiiraka: Athumwana ayo ari vayi? Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khannokicuwela mi hata Apaapa. Mwaakicuwenle mi, ciicammo mwaanaacuwela Apaapa.
Oolumaca ala moolumo ala, ukati waasomihawe mpaani mo'nupa ittakattifu, nari ukhipulani nipuro naasunkiya coovaha. Khaawo aantthukile, kontha waari uhinaya uphiya ukati awe.
Imaara ikina tho, Yesu aheerela: Kinaakhuma, ni nyu nnaahala ukaavya, nanso nnohala ukhwa ntampini mwinyu mmo; unrwaaka mi, nyu khannoorya urwaa.
Vaavale ayuta yeera: Pooti ule nophavela wiciiva? Maana neera: Unrwaaka mi nyu khannoorya urwaa.
Ni ahopwaherera eeraka: Nyu nri o vathi, vano mi kiri o'culu; nyu nri onttuniyani mu, vano mi akihimweni o nttuniyani mu.
Phimaana mi kiwiirelakani nnaakhwa ntampini mwinyu mmo, maana mwaahikupaliki wiira mi phi mi, nnaakhwa ntampini mwinyu mmo.
Vano ahokohiya: Umpani wee? Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Yeeyo yuuhimenryakani ikhumelo wupaceroni.
Kihaana citthu cinci cowuuhimeryani ciwaacakani ni wuuhukhumuni nyu, nanso ule kirumile ri eekhweli, mpaka citthu cimwiiwilyaka, cennyo phinhimyacaka nttuniyani.
Nanso ayo khayaacuwela wiira aaca Athumwane.
Vano, Yesu aheerela: Mwammusaka Mwanawe Pinatamu, phinhalenyu ucuwela wiira mi phi mi, ni khiiwo impankaka wo mi paahi, nanso kinoolumaca toko Apaapa cikiitthucihilyaya.
Ni ule kirumile ri ni mi; khakihiile veekha, maana mi kinaampankelesa itthu inoncivela.
Vaavale nahimilene nnya citthu nnya, enci yahonkupali.
Vano Yesu aheerela ayuta yaankupanli: Nyu mwakhalaka nnuulumoni mwaka, nri eetthuci aka eekhweli;
Ni nnaahala ucuwela ikhweli, ni ikhweli inaahala wutaphulani.
Yahomwaakhulaca yiiraka: Hi niri nloko na Aparahamu ni khaninatoko ukhala ipottha ya ntthu; vano uneerelani: Nnaataphuliya?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Othene ale ampanka itampi ari ipottha yo'tampi.
Maana ipottha khinkhala ukati wothene watthokoni, nanso Mwana naakhala ukati wothene.
Vano Mwana ootaphulakani, weekhweli nnaahala wiithawala.
Mi kihocuwela wiira nri nloko na Aparahamu, nanso, nnophavela ukiiva, nlattu khannaakhelela nuulumo naka.
Mi kinoolumaca citthu coonnyaka Apaapa, ni nyu nnopanka citthu coonnenyu athumwaninyu.
Vano ahaakhuliya wiira: Apaapehu phi Aparahamu. Yesu aheerelaca: Mwaari asaana a Aparahamu, mwaanvara miteko ca Aparahamu.
Nanso vano nnophavela ukiiva mi, nlattu wo wuhimeryani ikhweli yiiwilyaka wa Nluku; Aparahamu khaapankile commo.
Vano nyu nnovara miteko ca athumwaninyu. Vaavale yahomwiirelaca: Hi khaninakhala asaana o muluvani; nihaana athumwanihu, ari Nluku.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Waari wiira Nluku ri athumwaninyu, mwankifenta, maana mi kinkhuma wa Nluku ni kiri va. Akiwile wo mi paahi, nanso uyo hokiruma.
Nlattuni nhiiweehaka inoolumacaka? Maanaya wiira khannoorya wiiwa moolumo aka.

Nyu nri nloko na Sotwani, ri athumwaninyu, ni nnotthuna umpankela cimphavelawe. Uyo ri mayowiiva ikhumelo wupaceroni, ni khantthuna uphavelaca ikhweli, maana mwa uyo khiiwo ikhweli. Oolumacaka cowootha, neehimya mwanene kontha ri mayowootha ni athumwane wootha.
Khannokikupali mi nlattu wo wuhimeryani ikhweli.
Vano tipani mwa nyu nokiirela mi kinatampi? Mi kuulumak'ono ikhweli, nlattuni nhikikupaliki?
Ule ri a Nluku nawiiwa moolumo a Nluku; phimaana nhikiviriyanaka, maana khannakhala a Nluku.
Vano ayuta yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Maanaya wiira, khanirina isariya yowiira we nsamariya ni uhaana ncini?
Nanso Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mi akirina ncini, uhiya commo, kinawattittimiha Apaapa, nanso nyu nnaakihanyuriha.
Mi akinaavya nttittimiho naka, nanso haawo naavya ni nohukhumu.
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Ntthu asunkaka nuulumo naka, khanhala umoona nookhwa.
Vano ayuta yahomwiirela: Nihooneeha wiira we uhaana ncini. Aparahamu hokhwa, ni ciicammo minapiyu nnyo, vano we uneera: Ntthu asunkaka nuulumo naka, khanhala unlawiha nookhwa.
We umuulupale wompwaha Aparahamu, athumwanihu akhwile? Ni ciicammo minapiyu cikhwile? Vano, we uneehelaca ukhala pani?
Vano Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mi keettittimihaka veekhakaru, nttittimiho naka khaninkhala nttittimiho. Apaapa ankittittimiha mi, aneerenyu wiira phi Nluku inyu.
Nyu khamwacuwenle, nanso mi kinawaacuwela. Vano keeraka akaacuwenle, kinhala ukhala mayowootha toko nyu, nanso mi kihaacuwela ni kinaattharihelela nuulumo naya.
Vano athumwaninyu Aparahamu yahotteeliya nlattu wo woona nihuku naka; yahoona ni yahotthapa.
Commo ayuta yahonkoha yiiraka: Khunaya ukhalana iyaakha hansini (50), mpaka uhomoona Aparahamu?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Aparahamu ahinaya uyariya, Mi phi Mi.
Vaavale yahokusaca maluku wiira anvonyakace, nanso Yesu aheeta n'ukhuma wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu.
Yesu waavirawe, ahomoona nlopwana oohoona iyarelo.
Eetthuci awe yahonkoha yiiraka: Mwalimu, ula awaaka uyaryaa oohoona, kosile tupani? Kosile ph'ula atthuna mayathumwane?
Vaavale Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Ula khakosile, hata mayathumwane, nanso yiiranenle wiira cithoonyiheriye mwa uyo miteko ca Nluku.
Kinlamuliya uvara miteko cawe ule kirumile, nanlelo unari uthana. Uhiyu nawaattamerya, wahinhalawe ntthu woorya uvara nteko.
Kinari nttuniyani, kinkhala waarya wo nttuniyani.
Noolumilene commo, ahosuwela vathi, ni aheethyaa itthaya ile ni isenye ni ahonhikela wamiithoni wawe.
Vano ahomwiirela: Urwee wakhuce iluusi yo'Silowe, maanaya wiira mayorumiya. Uyo ahorwaa, ahokhuca ni ahopacera woona.
Vano aattamanani awe ni ale yancuwenle khalayiru, wiira aari nacimola, yeera: Kahimweni phi yoola onkoma alepelacaka icimola?
Nanso akina yeera: Phi yooyo. Vano akina yeera: Mena, noolikana ni yooyo. Vano mwanene phiiraka: Phi yeemi.
Vano ahokohiya wiira: Atthukuwile cani miitho aa ayo?
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Nlopwana neehaninya Yesu aheethyaa itthaya ni isenye, phukihikelaka wamiithoni n'ukiirela: Urwee iluusi yo'Silowe ni wakhuce. Vaavale kahorwaa, phukhucaka, vano kinawoona.
Vaavale yahonkoha yiiraka: Ri vayi yooyo? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Akincuwela.
Vano ahorwaninya umafarisi yoole aari oohoona iyarelo ule.
Naari nihuku no ntivela Yesu neetheelyawe itthaya ni isenye, ni untthukula miitho.
Vaavale, mafarisi ale ciicammo yahonkoha mananna ciinryawe oonaka, ni ule ahaakhula eeraka: Aakihikenle itthaya wamiithoni waka va yoweethennya ni isenye, phukhucaka; vano kinawoona.

Vano mafarisi akina yeera: Yooyo nlopwana uyo khanakhala a Nluku, kontha khanlemeliha nihuku no ntivela. Akina yeera: Noorya cani mayokosa upanka mitikiniho cuulupale? Vaavale wahaawo uhiiwanana ayaayoru.
Wahoolo ahokohiya tho oohoona ule: Vano we uneera cani nlattu wawawe uyo ootthukunle miitho uyo? Ule wowaakhula eenre: Kineera nnapiyu.
Ayuta khayaakupali wiira phi yoole aayariye oohoona ule. Phimaana, yaheehana mayathumwane
ni yahaakoha yiiraka: Phi yoola mwaninyu nomwiirelenyu yareele oohoona? Vano, wiiraceele cani oonaka?
Vaavale, mayathumwane yahaakhula yiiraka: Nincuwela wiira ula mwanihu ni yareele oohoona,
nanso nna va ciinryawe oonaka khanincuwela, atthuna tipani antthukunle miitho ayo, khanincuwela. Munkoheke mwanene, honnuwa, nawiicaakhulela.
Vano mayathumwane yoolumacera commo, maana yaanawoova ayuta, ni ayo yahovaanela wiira, nohala urumelela uyo wiira phi Yesu Kristu, oomoliye nsinakoka mmo.
Phimaana mayathumwane ayo yiiraka: Uyo honnuwa, munkoheke mwanene.
Vaavale, aheehaninya imaara yonayeeli, nlopwana aari oohoona ule ni aheereliya: Wowiira alemelihiye Nluku, uhimye ikhweli; hi ninaacuwela wiira uyo nlopwana uyo natampi.
Vano ule ahaakhula eeraka: Akhala wiira natampi, akincuwela. Kincuwela itthu imoca, mi kaari oohoona, vano kinawoona.
Yahonkohaca tho yiiraka: Oopankile isiyani yooyo? Oohunle cani miitho ayo?
Vaavale ule ahaakhulaca eeraka: Kihoohimeryani ni khantthunne wiiwa; nnophavelelani tho wiiwa imaara ikina? Atthuna nnophavela ni nyu ukhala eetthuci awe?
Vaavale, yahonruwanaca n'umwiirela: Mwiitthuci awe phi we, hi eetthuci a Musa.
Hi nincuwela wiira Nluku muulumanne Musa, nanso uyo mena khanincuwela unkhumawe.
Nlopwan'ole ahaakhula eeraka: Iyo phiri yootikineeha nlattu woohicuwela unkhumawe, nanso hokitthukula miitho.
Vano ninaacuwela wiira Nluku khaneewa anatampi, nanso, woovirikana wene, ntthu amoovaka Nluku ni apankaka utthuna wawe, uyo naamwiiwa.
Yompiyeru ittuniya, khawanaaya wiiwannya wiira haawo ntthu unhunle miitho ntthu oohoona iyarelo.
Ula nlopwan'ola ahaari a Nluku, khiiwo yaahalawe woorya upanka.
Nanso ayo yahomwaakhula yiiraka: We uyariye ntampini ni unaaniitthuciha hi? Ni yahomoomola.
Vano Yesu aheewa wiira aari oohoona ule hoomoliya; waankumanannyawe, ahonkoha eeraka: We unaankupali Mwanawe Pinatamu?
Vaavale ule ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, tipani yooyo, wowiira kinkupali?
Yesu ahomwiirela: Uhomoona, ni phi yooyo nomuulumana uyo.
Vano nlopwan'ole aheera: Kinaakupali, Pwiya, ni ahonlapela.
Yesu ahopwaherera eeraka: Mi kiwile nttuniyani mu wiira kihukhumu, wiira ale ahinoona yoone, ni anoona akhale oohoona.
Vaavale mafarisi akina yaari wakhiviru ni ule yahonkoha yiiraka: Maanaya wiira ni hi ciicammo na atthu oohoona?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mwaari oohoona, khamwaakhalana itampi mena imoca, nanso vano nneera: Hi ninawoona, itampi cinyu nnyo cinawupharelelani.
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira: Ntthu hinkelela wankhora wo'khontwaa, nanso nopephenya nipuro nikina, uyo namwinnya ni nammalukuni.
Nanso ule nokelela wankhora, phi nhakheli o'khontwaa.
Mayankhora naanhulela nhakheli; ikhontwaa cinawiiwa ncu nawe, ni ule nawiihana ni macina o'khontwaa cawe ni naakumihera vate.
Vano nakumihenrene vate ikhontwaa cothene ciri cawawe, naahoolela, ni nnyo cinaantthara, maana cinaacuwela ncu nawe.
Nanso mena vakani khacinontthara oohincuwela, nanso cinaantthawa, maana khacincuwelela ncu na nkina.
Yesu ahopanka nna nlikanihero nna, nanso ayo khayaacuwelenle maanaya ile yoolumacenryawe.
Vano Yesu ahaahimyacera tho eeraka: Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira mi ki nkhora wo'khontwaa.
Ale othene awile kihinawa, aneehaninya anamwinnya ni anammalukuni; phimaana ikhontwaa nnyo khaceewelenle.
Mi ki nkhora. Ntthu akelaka wa mi, nawoopwa, naakela, naakhuma ni naaphwanya nnyepu.
Vano namwinnya noweela paahi winnya, wiiva ni ukwanyulaca; mi kiweenle wiira nkhalane ukumi ni ukumi mwinci.
Mi ki nhakheli ooloka. Nhakheli ooloka naavaha ukumi awe nlattu wo'khontwaa cawe.
Nanteko hiri mwanene ikhontwaa, nawoona uwaka mwiici, vano naahiya ikhontwaa nnyo n'utthawa; vano mwiici ule unawiivakaca n'umwarusa.
Ule naatthawa, kontha ri nanteko ni khanwacawaca ikhontwaa nnyo.
Mi ki nhakheli ooloka; kinaacuwela ikhontwaa caka ni nnyo cinaakicuwela mi,
ciicammo toko Apaapa cinkicuwelaya mi, ni mi kinawaacuwela Apaapa, ni kinaavaha ukumi aka nlattu wo'khontwaa caka.
Kihaana ikhontwaa cikina tho, coohikhala co nna ncici nna. Mi kinlamuliya uhakhela, nnyo cinaahala wiiwa ncu naka; vano unaahala ukhala nhuwo mmoca ni nhakheli aya.
Phimaana Apaapa anaakifenta, maana mi kinaavaha ukumi aka wiira kiphwanye tho.
Khaawo nokaakha ukumi aka; woohiyana commo, mi kinaavaha wotthuna waka. Kihaana nlamulo no wiira kivahe atthuna kiphwanye tho. Nna nlamulo nna kaakhenle na Apaapa.
Vano nlattu wo yaala moolumo ala, yahokhumelela manyakunyaku iriyari ya ayuta.
Akina ayo yeera: Uyo haana macini ni hovahuwa; nnonviriyanelani?
Vano akina yeera: Ala mananna owuulumaca ala khaanakhala o ntthu namacini; nawoorya ntthu namacini untthukula miitho ntthu oohoona?
Yaapankiya uYerusalemu isikuhuulu yoovahereriya inupa. Waari ukati weeyiita,
ni Yesu eettakaca wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, arwaaka mphantte wo'pwaro ya Salomoni.
Vano ayuta yahonrukurerya ni yahonkoha yiiraka: Mpaka yakhani wanhalaa unihiya nitikhinacaka? Mari unari Kristu, unihimerye woohinivitha.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Kihoohimeryani, khankupanli. Miteko cinvaraka mwa ncina na Apaapa, cinkihimya mi.
Nanso nyu khankupanli, kontha khannakhala ikhontwaa caka.
Ikhontwaa caka cinawiiwelela ncu naka, ni mi kinaacuwela, ni nnyo cinaakitthara.
Mi kinaavaha ukumi woohimala; khacinhala urimela tho ni khaawo nohala ukaakha mmatatani mwaka.
Itthu ikivahilyaya Apaapa, phiri yuulupale woopwaha cothene, ni inari mmatatani mwa Apaapa khaawo noorya waakha.
Mi na Apaapa niri amoca.
Ayuta yahokusa tho maluku wiira ammonyakace.
Yesu aheerelaca: Kihoothoonyerani miteko cinci coorera cinkhuma wa Apaapa; vano nnokivonyakaca nlattu wo nteko phuvi?
Ayuta yahomwaakhulaca, yiiraka: Khaninoovonyakaca nlattu wo miteko coorera, nanso nlattu wo'kufuru. Kontha we unari ntthu, unawiipanka Nluku umwanene.
Yesu ahaarukunusela eerelaka: Ihantikhiya muNlamuloni mwinyu wiira: Mi kiheera: Nyu nri anluku.
Kontha wakhala wiira Nluku heehana anluku, ale arumiheliye nuulumo nawe, cowantikhiya khacinooryaa ufuttiya.
Vano ule ttakattifihiye na Apaapa ni aveleelihiyaka mwiilaponi, nyu nnomwiirela: We unaakufuru, kontha kihowiira: Ki mwana a Nluku.
Kaahivareke miteko ca Apaapa, pooti uhikikupali.
Nanso kavaraka, nhikikupaliki mi, nkupali ikanyero cimpankaka nnyo, wiira ncuwele ni nkupali wiira Apaapa ari mwa mi ni mi kiri mwa ayo.
Yaanawaavyaca tho untthuka, nanso uyo ahootopwaa mmatatani mwaya.
Vano ahokhuma tho arwaaka mphantte nkhwawe wo Yortani, nipuro naapacenryawe upattisa Yohani, ni ahokhala wonwo.
Enci yaanarwaa umoonanana ni yeeraca: Khweli, Yohani khapankile hata ikanyero imoca, nanso cothene caahimyawe Yohani amwaacaka ula, caari ceekhweli.
Paahi, vaavale enci yahonkupali.
Ahaawo nlopwana eehaninya Lasaru, o'Petaniya, aawerennya, aakhala aliteya a Mariya ni Marta mwamunnawe.
Mariya, mwanrokorawe Lasaru, phi yooyo aattikitthenle Apwiya makhura oonukhela ni aapohonle inyaa ni ikharari cawe.
Asirokorawe Lasaru yaholeehera unhimerya Yesu wiira: Pwiya, naawerennya ule nonfentenyu.
Waakhela wawe ihapari ile, Yesu aheera: Ila ikwerere ila khinakhala yookhwiya, nanso yo wiira attittimihiye Nluku, wiira Mwana a Nluku mwa yeeyo akhale oottittimihiya.
Vano, Yesu aanawaafenta ooraru Marta, Mariya, ni Lasaru.
Ukati weewilyawe wiira Lasaru naawerennya, ahopica tho mahuku meeli nipuro naaryawe nne.
Wahoolo, aheerela eetthuci awe: Nrwee tho uYuteya.
Eetthuci ale yahomwiirela: Mwalimu, nanlelo ayuta anawaavyaca wiira yuvonyakace, ni umphavela uturuwela wonwo?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Khaciri iwora khumi na piili wanihukuni? Ntthu eettaka uthana, khankakathuwa, kontha nawoona waarya wo yeela ittuniya ila.
Nanso, eettaka uhiyu, naakakathuwa, kontha mwa uyo khuuwo waarya.
Noolumacilene commo, ahoncerera eeraka: Mpwana ehu Lasaru naarupa, nanso kinkoommusa.
Wahoolo eetthuci yahomwiirelaca: Pwiya, wakhala wiira naarupa, naahala uvona.
Yesu, oolumacera commo, aacaka ihaali yo nookhwa a Lasaru, nanso ale yoopuwelaca wiira aahimya umumula woorupa ikhove.
Vano, Yesu ahaahimerya woonene eeraka: Lasaru hokhwa;
kihotteeliya nlattu woohikhala mi wonwo, wiira nyu nkhale ookupali, nanso nrwee namoonanane.
Vano, Tomee, eehaninya Titimu, aheerela eetthuci: Ciicammo nrwee, wiira nakhwe ni uyo.
Yesu uphiya wawe aamphwanyile Lasaru nasikhiye ni anavinre mahuku macese.
Vano uPetaniya waari wakhiviru n'uYerusalemu, ittalivelo aya yaari yo malonce mararu.
Ayuta enci yahorwaaca unkhittuwela Mariya ni Marta, nlattu wookhweliya mwanrokoraya.
Marta ukati waacuwenlyawe wiira Yesu naawa, ahonsiceerya, nanso Mariya aahanle uwani nonkomile.
Vano Marta ahomwiirela Yesu: Pwiya, mwaari vaava, mwanrokoraka khaahala ukhwa.
Nanso ciicammo kinaacuwela wiira, hata nna va, cothene mwanlepelaka Nluku, naahala wuuvahani.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Mwanrokoraa naahala wunwelela.
Marta aheera: Mi kinaacuwela wiira naahala wunwelela nihuku noomaliha.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Mi kiri yunwelelo ni ukumi. Ntthu nokaamini mi, hata akhwe naakhala nkumi;
ni othene ari akumi akaaminiki mi khanhala ukhwa woohimala. Unawaamini yeeyo?
Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Aye, Pwiya, mi kinawaamini wiira we Kristu, Mwana a Nluku aahala uwa nttuniyani.
Noolumacilene commo, ahokhuma ni ahomwiihana Mariya mwanrokorawe, ni ahomwiirela: Mwalimu howa ni naawiihana.
Ule, wiiwa wawe commo, ahonwa wowaakuvyaca wene ni ahorwaa umuulumana.
Kontha nanlelo Yesu aari hinaya uphiya wa aliteya nwe, aari nipuro naankumanannyawe Marta.
Ayuta yaari ni Mariya uwannyawe ankhittuwelaka, umoona waya onwaka wowaakuvyaca ni akhumaka, yahonttharaca, yooniha toko aarwa wunla umahiye.
Mariya ukati waaphilyawe nipuro naaryawe Yesu, umoona wawe, ahokhoroma wamettoni wawe ni aheera: Pwiya, mwaari vaava, mwanrokoraka khaahala ukhwa.
Yesu, umoona wawe Mariya onlaka, ni ciicammo ayuta yaanveleela, yahommwerya iroho ni ahocukula,
ni ahokoha eeraka: Munsikhile vayi? Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Pwiya, mmwe mwawoone.
Yesu ahoonla.
Vano ayuta yaheeraca: Nkoonani mananna caanfentawe.
Nanso akina yeera: Ula aantthukunle miitho ntthu oohoona, khaahala woorya upanka mananna oohikhwa ula?
Yesu, nanlelo acukulaka, ahorwaa umahiye; yaari o nikhuku yaakhuneeliye ni nluku wankhora va.
Vano, Yesu aholamulela eeraka: Ntamihe nluku nno. Marta mwanrokorawe khwile ule, aheera: Pwiya, naanukha kontha ahovira mahuku macese nasikhiyene.
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Akuuhimenrye mi wiira, waaminiki unawoona nttittimiho na Nluku?
Vaavale nahotamihinya nluku nne. Vano Yesu ahowusera miitho wirimu ni aheera: Paapa, kinawusukuruni kontha nhokiiwa.
Mi kinaacuwela wiira imaara cothene nnaakiiwa, nanso kuulumacenre commo nlattu wo mphwinko uri va, ukupali wiira nhookiruma.
Noolumacilene commo, ahokhuwela ni ncu nowiirunya: Lasaru ukhumele vate!

Ahokhuma aakhwile ule, nawarihiye isantta, natthukaciye ni miripwe co'santta metto ni myoono, ni ciicammo mmuru mmo nakhuneeliye ni ikuwo. Vano, Yesu ahaalamulela eerelaka: Muntaphule ni munhiye arwee.
Ayuta enci yaawile unkhittuwela Mariya, woona waya itthu yaapankilyawe Yesu, yahonkupali.
Wahoolo akina yahorwaa woonanana mafarisi ni yahaattonkacera cootikineeha caapankilyawe Yesu.
Vano, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mafarisi yaholattula nkuttano wo mphwinko wa akhulupale, ni yaheeraca: Nipankekeni? Kontha ula nlopwan'ola naapanka ikanyero cinci.
Nanhiyaka ciicale, othene anaahala unkupali; wahoolo ankowaaca aroma ni anaahala unaakha nipuro nihu nna ni ilapo ehu ila.
Wahoolo Kayifasi, mmoca mwa ale, aari nkhulupale o mayasataka yoole mwakha ule, ahaaleehacera, eeraka: Nyu khiiwo incuwelenyu,
hata khannoopuwela wiira phatari nlopwana mmoca akhwele unethi ni ilapo yothene ihirimele.
Vano, ule kheeciirenle mwanene, nanso, naryene nkhulupale o mayasataka o yoole mwakha ule, ahovaha usaahiti wowiira Yesu aalamuliya ukhwela ilapo
ni kuhimweni paahi wo'lapo, nanso ciicammo wiira aathukumanihe asaana a Nluku amwaryaacile mwiilaponi mothene wiira akhale unethi mmoca.
Ukhuma nenne nihuku nne, yahovaanela umwiiva.
Toko commo, Yesu kheetta tho eecooneehaka iriyari ya ayuta, nanso ahokhuma arwaaka ncoko wo waattamana utakhwani, nttetthe mmoca uneehaninya Farayimi; waakhanlyawe n'eetthuci awe.
Wahaattamerya ukati wo Paasikuwa ya ayuta, ni atthu enci o yoole ncoko ule yahorwaaca uYerusalemu nihinaphiya nihuku no Paasikuwa, wiira yeerapihace.
Wonwo yaanamwaavyaca Yesu, ale anaryene wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu yaanawiirelana ntthu ni nkhwawe: Nnoonela cani? Uyo naahala uwa usikuhuuluni?
Vano, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mafarisi yahovahaca nlamulo yiiracaka: Wakhala wiira haawo nocuwela nipuro niryawe, ahimyace, wiira atthukiye.
Mahuku siita hinaphiya Paasikuwa, Yesu ahorwaa uPetaniya, waaryawe Lasaru, ule amunwelelihilyawe mwa atthu ookhwa.
Wahoolo, Yesu ahovahiya iyolya, ni Lasaru phaarinawe wameecani. Marta aanakavihera.
Vano, Mariya ahokusa iphotiri yo makhura oonukhela cinene o'fayita, ahottikitthela inyaa ca Yesu ni ahopohola ni ikharari cawe. Inupa yothene yannukhela.
Nanso Yuta Iskariyoti, mmoca w'eetthuci awe, ule aahala umuuluma makhuce, aheera:
Nlattuni ahitumihiyaka ala makhura ala ni ncurukhu iminya ttharu ni ncurukhu uyo waakawela amasikiini?
Uyo eerela commo, kahi wiira aaphavela waatafiti amasikiini, nanso nlattu wo wiira aari namwinnya ni, naryene namasunka nrupa, aamwinnya caakela munrupani mmo.
Vano Yesu aheera: Unhiye! Ula nthiyana ula nosunkera ila nihuku ninhalaka usikhiya;
kontha amasikiini, ari ni nyu ukati wothene, nanso mi akiri ni nyu ukati wothene.

Vaavale mphwinko mwinci wa ayuta wahocuwela wiira Yesu aari nenno nipuro nno, ni wahorwaa wonwo. Khawaarwenle wiira wamoone Yesu paahi, nanso ciicammo wiira wamoone Lasaru, ule aamunwelelihilyawe mwa atthu ookhwa.
Ciicammo akhulupale o mayasataka yaholakela umwiiva Lasaru;
kontha mwa nlattu wa yooyo, ayuta enci yaawaca yaanankupali Yesu.
Usa waya, mphwinko mwinci waawile usikuhuluni, wiiwa waya wiira Yesu ri mphironi awaaka uYerusalemu,
yahokusaca miritta co mikhutta ni yahonsiceerya, akhuwelacaka yiiraka: Hosaana! Horeriya ule nowa mwa ncina na Apwiya! Horeriya Mwene o'Sirayeli.
Vano Yesu ahomphwanya mwapuuru ni ahonwela, toko cantikhiyaya wiira:
Uhoove unethi wo'Siyoni, Mwene enyu naawa, nammwenle mwana a puuru.
Eetthuci awe wupaceroni kayeeweehile itthu ile, nanso Yesu ukati waattittimihiyawe, ale yahoopuwelaca wiira nnya citthu nnya cahantikhiya nlattu wawawe ni ciicammo ciheerannyaa.
Vano mphwinko waarinawe ukati waamunwelelihilyawe Lasaru mwa atthu ookhwa, waanvaha usaahiti.
Ciicammo, mphwinko wahomwiikamela kontha waheewa wiira ahopanka nne ntikiniho nne.
Vaavale mafarisi yaheerelana ayaayoru: Khiiwo imphurehu! Nkoonani, atthu othene anantthara.
Vano, mwa ale yaarweele unlapela Nluku usikuhuuluni yo Paasikuwa, yahaawo akereku akinaku.
Ale yahomwaattamerya Filipe aari o'Petesayita yo'Kalileya wiira anlepele eeraka: Muulupale, nimphavela umoona Yesu.
Filipe ahorwaa unttonkela Anteree, ni Anteree wamoca ni Filipe yahorwaa unhimerya Yesu.
Vano Yesu ahaakhulaca eerelaka: Uhophiya ukati wottittimihiya Mwanawe Pinatamu.
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani, wakhala wiira impeyu yo tiriku inaamorela watthayani n'uhikhwa, iyo inkhala yeeyoru paahi, nanso yakhwaka, inawiima mihokorokho cinci.
Ule nofenta ukumi awe, unanrihyaa, nanso ule norusanana ukumi awe vathi va, nawisunkera ukumi woohimala.
Ule nokivarela nteko, nolamuliya ukitthara, ni nipuro niryaka, nanteko aka nokhala vaavale. Uyo nokivarela nteko, Apaapa anaahala unlemeliha.
Vano nrima aka unaacukula, ni kinhala uhimyani? Paapa, nkoopole yoola ukati ula? Mena; weekhweli mi yeela phiweenlyaka, yoola ukati ula.
Paapa, nttittimihe ncina ninyu. Vano nahowa ncu no wirimu neera: Mi kihottittimiha ni nanlelo kinaahala uttittimiha.
Vano mphwinko waariwo vaavale weewilyaya ncu, wooniha toko uhookukutta. Akina yeera: Ncelo phuulumacile.
Vano, Yesu aheera: Nna ncu nna niwile nlattu wa nyu, woohikhala nlattu wa mi.
Uhophiya ukati woohukhumwinya ila ittuninya ila, nna va nhooleli o'ttuninya nawoomoliya.
Ni mi, kawusiyaka watthayani, kinaahala waasamula othene wiira awe wa mi.
Uyo oolumacenre commo, nlattu wo mananna caahalaya ukhala makhwelo awe.
Wahoolo, mphwinko waheera: Hi niheewa muNlamuloni wiira Kristu nokokhala woohimala, vano unwa cani we wiiraka Mwanawe Pinatamu nolamuliya uwusiya? Tipani yooyo Mwanawe Pinatamu uyo?
Yesu ahaakhulaca eeraka: Nanlelo wo'kati vakani, waarya uri ni nyu. Mweette nnarinene waarya, wiira ipiphi ihuututusereni, maana ule neetta mpiphini khancuwela unkelawe.
Vano nkupali waarya, nnarinene, wiira nkhale asaana o waarya. Yesu ahooluma citthu nnya ni ahokhuma eetaka.
Aanopankaru ikanyero cinci uhoolo waya, khayaankupanli,
wiira nitthariheleliye nuulumo na nnapiyu Isaya, nineera: Pwiya, tipani kupanli nhupi ihu? Tupani oonihinye moono wa Apwiya?
Phimaana, khayoonrye ukupali, kontha Isaya aheera tho:
Ahottiyeleliya miitho n'uturumalihiya mirima, waacera ahoone ni miitho, hata ni mirima ahicuwelele, arukunusaka mirima caya, wiira mi kaavonihe.
Ila oolumacile Isaya kontha ahoona waarya wa Yesu ni ahooluma amwaacaka uyo.
Vano, ahooleli enci a ayuta yahonkupali Yesu, nanso nlattu wo mafarisi khayaathoonyihera ukupali waya nwo, kontha yoova woomoliya nsinakoka.
Kontha yaafenta venci nttittimiho na atthu woovikana nttittimiho na Nluku.
Yesu ahokhuwela, eeraka: Ule nokikupali mi, khanakikupaliki mi paahi, nanso ule kirumile.
Ni ule nokoona mi, nomoona ule kirumile.
Mi kiri waarya uwile nttuniyani, wiira ale othene ankikupali mi ahikhale mpiphini.
Ntthu eewaka moolumo aka ni hisunkaka, mi akinonhukhumu, kontha mi akaweenle uhukhumu ittuninya nanso kaweenle woopola.
Ule nokikhotta ni haakhelelaka moolumo aka, haana oonhukhumu. Nuulumo nenna ninoolumacaka phinhala unhukhumu nihuku noomaliha.
Kontha mi akineecuuluma kimwanene, nanso Apaapa akirumile, ayo phinkileehera itthu yowuuluma ni yoolalya.
Mi kinaacuwela wiira nlamulo naya niri ukumi woohimala. Citthu cinoolumacaka mi, toko Apaapa cinkileehenraya, commo phinoolumaka.

Vano, ihinaphiya isikuhuulu yo Paasikuwa, Yesu ahocuwela wiira ukati awe wahophiya wookhuma ila ittuninya ila n'urwaa wa Athumwane. Yesu naafentilene awawe yaari nttuniyani, ahaafenta mpaka wiimaleloni.
Ukati waalyaya, Sotwani aheesa wanrimani wa Yuta Iskariyoti, mwana a Simoni, wiira amuulume makhuce Yesu,
Ahocuwela wiira Athumwane yahommaha ikuru cothene mmatatani mwawe ni ule aakhuma wa Nluku, ni aaturuwela wa Nluku.
Vano ahonwa waaliya vale, ahorula ihancu yo waculu, ahokusa ikuwo ineepoholeliya, ni aheetthukela.
Wahoolo ahohela maasi mpasiyani ni ahopacera urapiha inyaa c'eetthuci awe, apoholaka ni ikuwo yeetthukenlyawe.
Vaavale Yesu waamwaattamenryawe Simoni Peturu, aheereliya: Pwiya, nyu nnaarapiha inyaa caka mi?
Vano Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Itthu impankaka mi, we khuncuwelela nna va, nanso unaahala ucuwelela wahoolo.
Vaavale Peturu ahomwiirela: Khunhala ukirapiha inyaa caka. Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Mi kaahuurapiheke, khurina mphantte ni mi.
Vano, Simoni Peturu ahonlepela eeraka: Pwiya, kahi paahi inyaaru, nanso ciicammo, matata ni muru.
Yesu ahonhimerya eeraka: Ule rapile khamphavela tho urapa, nanso upohola inyaa paahi, kontha ri orerene. Vano, nyu nri orerene, nanso kahi othene.
Kontha ule aanancuwela aahala umuuluma makhuce. Phimaana eeraka: Kahi othene nri oorerene.
Wahoolo narapihilene inyaa caya, ahokusa coowara ni ahoturuwela wameeca, ahaakohaca eeraka: Nhocuwelela yupankilyakani iyo?
Nyu nnokiirela Mwalimu ni Pwiya. Nnawuuluma ratta, kontha phi yeemi.
Vano, mi kinaryene Pwiya ni Mwalimu, kihoorapihani inyaa, ni nyu ciicammo nnolamuliya urapihana inyaa ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Kontha mi kihoovahani nlikanihero, no wiira toko cupankilyakani mi, ni nyu mwapanke ciicammo.
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, ipottha khinompwaha nkunya aya, hata nrumeyi khanompwaha nrumile.
Vano, ucuwela winyu nnya citthu nnya, mwattharihelelaka, nri ooreriya.
Akinwaacani nyu othene, kontha mi kinawaacuwela ale yaathanlilyaka, nanso wiira citthariheleliye cihimilyaya cowantikhiya cineera: Ule nolya nkatthe aka hokiwusera ikokoottho awe.
Ukhuma nenna va, kinawuhimeryani, wahinaya wiirannyaa, wiira weerannyaka, nkupali wiira mi phi mi.
Khweli, khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, ntthu nomwaakhelela nrumilyaka, nokaakhelela mi, ni ntthu nokaakhelela mi nomwaakhelela ule kirumile.
Noolumacilene nnya citthu nnya, Yesu ahocukula munnepani ni aheera: Khweli khweli, kinawuhimeryani wiira, mmoca wa nyu naakuuluma makhuce.
Vano, eetthuci awe yahoweehanaca ntthu ni nkhwawe, woohincuwelela tipani aamwaacawe.
Mwiitthuci awe mmoca, ule aanfentawe, ahoncuserera Yesu.
Vaavale Simoni Peturu ahonvaha ikanyero amwiirelaka: Unkohe wiira nomwaaca pani?
Vano, ule mwiitthuci aancusereresa Yesu ule, ahonkoha eeraka: Pwiya, tipani?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Phi ule nohalaka ummaha ikiphantte yo nkatthe wooreriya. Wahoolo ahokusa ikiphantte yo nkatthe ni ahorerya n'ummaha Yuta mwana a Simoni Iskariyoti.
Unavinrene ukati vakani, wowaakuvyaca ule ahowariya ni Sotwani. Vano, Yesu aheera: Imphavelaa upanka, upanke woohipica.
Nanso khaawo aari wameeca eeweehile itthu yaamuulumacenryawe commo.
Ukhala wiira Yuta aari namasunka nrupa wo ncurukhu, akina yoopuwela wiira Yesu aamwiirela athume itthu imphavelehu wasikuhuuluni atthuna eera wiira aavahe itthu atthu oohuva.
Ule, waakhela wawe ikiphantte ile, wowaakuvyaca wene ahokhuma. Ni waari uhiyu.
Vano Yuta ukati waakhumilyawe, Yesu aheera: Nna va, hottittimihiya Mwanawe Pinatamu, ni Nluku hottittimihiya mwa ule.
Ukhala wiira Nluku hottittimihiya mwa Mwanawe, ciicammo Nluku naahala unttittimiha Mwanawe, n'unttittimiha wowaakuvyaca wene.
Asaanaka, nanlelo wo'kati vakani kiri ni nyu; nnaahala ukaavya, ni itthu yaahimacenryaka ayuta ciicammo kinawuhimeryani nyu akinaku va: Nipuro ninrwaaka mi, nyu khannoorya urwaa.
Vano kinawuvahani nlamulo nonaanano: Nfentane ntthu ni nkhwawe. Toko mi cufentilyakani, ciicammo nfentane ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Commo phinhalenyu ucuweliya wiira othene nri eetthuci aka, mwakhalanaka nifento ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Simoni Peturu ahonkoha eeraka: Pwiya, nnokela vayi? Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nipuro ninrwaaka, khannoorya ukitthara nenna va, nanso wahoolo nnaakittharaka.
Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, nlattuni kihuuttharakani nenna? Kinaavaha ukumi aka nlattu wawinyu.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Uvaha ukumi aa nlattu wo mi? Khweli, kinawuhimerya wiira ntthupi uhinaya wiipa, unaakiruna imaara ttharu.
Nhicukulace wanrimani winyu, munkupali Nluku, ciicammo nkikupali mi.
Uwani wa Apaapa ahaawo mapuro menci ookhala. Wahaari commo, mi kaanaawuhimeryani. Kontha kinrwaa wutthenkemaniherani mapuro ookhala.
Karwaka wutthenkemaniherani mapuro, kinaturuwa ni kimmowukusani, wiira mapuro anhalaka ukhala mi, ni nyu ciicammo mwakhale.
Nyu nnaacuwela iphiro inrwaaka mi.
Tomee ahomwiirela: Pwiya, khanincuwela unkelelenyu; ninkocuwela cani iphiro?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Mi ki iphiro, ni ikhweli, ni ukumi; khaawo nowa wa Apaapa woohivira wa mi.
Mwaakicuwenle mi, mwaanawacuwela Apaapa. Ukhuma nenna va nhaacuwela ni nhoona.
Aheera tho Filipe: Pwiya, nnithoonyere Athumwaninyu, ni yeeyo inaanitosa.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Filipe, ukati mwinci kiri ni nyu, ni khankicuwenle? Ule nokoona mi, noona Apaapa; vano we uneerelani: Nnithoonyere Athumwaninyu?
Khunkupali wiira mi kiri mwa Apaapa ni Apaapa ari mwa mi? Moolumo anoohimeryakani, akinkhumana mi, nanso Apaapa ari mwa mi, anaavara miteko caya.
Nkupali wiira kiri mwa Apaapa, ni Apaapa ari mwa mi. Mwaahikikupali mi, nkupali nlattu wo miteko cinvaraka.
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira ule nokikupali mi ciicammo naahala uvara miteko cimmaraka mi ni naahala uvara cikhwawe cuulupale coopwaha nnya, kontha mi kinrwaa wa Apaapa.
Yothene inhalenyu ulepela mwa ncina naka, yeeyo kinaapanka, wiira Apaapa akhale oottittimihinya mwa Mwana.
Mwalepelaka itthu mwa ncina naka, mi kinaahala upanka.
Mwakifentaka, nnaattharihelela malamulo aka.
Ni mi kinkowavekela Apaapa, ni ayo anawuvahani Mpepeci nkina, nohala ukhala ni nyu ukati wothene,
Nnepa Weekhweli. Ittuninya khinoorya waakhela, kontha khinoona, hata khicuwenle; nyu nnaacuwela, kontha unkhala ni nyu ni unkokhala mwa nyu.
Akinoohiyani akhwaacuni, kinawuuweelani nyu.
Wo'kati vakani, ittuninya khinhala ukoona tho, nanso nyu nnaahala ukoona, kontha kiri nkumi, ni nyu ciicammo nnaahala ukhala akumi.
Nenno nihuku nno, phinhalenyu ucuwela wiira mi kiri mwa Apaapa, ni nyu mwa mi, ni mi mwa nyu.
Ule rina malamulo aka ni attharihelelaka, yooyo phinkifenta, ni ule nokifenta naahala ufentiya na Apaapa, ni mi ciicammo kinaanfenta ni wiithoonyihera mwa yooyo.
Yuta, woohikhala Yuta Iskariyoti, ahomwiirela: Pwiya, nnohala wiithoonyihera cani wa hi ni woohiithoonyihera nttuniyani?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Ntthu nokifenta, naahala uttharihelela nuulumo naka, ni Apaapa anaahala unfenta, ni ninaahala uwa mwa yooyo n'umpanka inupa ehu yookhala.
Ule hinkifenta khanttharihelela moolumo aka, ni nuulumo nineewenyu khaninakhala nawaka, nanso na Apaapa akirumile.
Yeeyo kinawuhimeryani, nanlelo kinari ni nyu,
nanso Mpepeci, Nnepa Nttakattifu, unhalaya uveleeliha Apaapa mwa ncina naka, yooyo unaahala wusomihani citthu cothene ni unaahala uwuupuserani cothene cuhimenryakani.
Kinawuhiyerani nnema; nnema naka kinawuvahani. Akinoovahani toko cinvahaya ittuninya. Nhicukulace wanrimani winyu ni nhoove.
Nheewa yuhimenryakani wiira, kinaarwa ni kinaaturuwela wa nyu. Mwaakifentile, mwanhala utteeliya kontha mi kinrwaa wa Apaapa, nlattu Apaapa ari oolupale ookipwaha mi.
Kinoohimeryani nna va, wahineerannyaa, wiira ukati unhalaya wiirannyaa, nyu nkupali.
Akinhala wuulumaca venci ni nyu, kontha hophiya nlamuli o'ttuniya. Uyo khiiwo iryawe mwa mi,
nanso, waacera ittuniya icuwele wiira mi kinawaafenta Apaapa ni kimpanka toko Apaapa cikirumilyaya. Munwace, nikhume va.
Mi ki mwiri weekhweli uneehaninya nvitera; Apaapa ari mayolima.
Miritta cothene ciri mwa mi, caahiimeke mihokorokho, ayo anaathikila, ni miritta cothene cineema mihokorokho anaakwatthacera, wiira ciime tho venci.
Nyu nhorapihiya ni nuulumo nuuhimenryakani.
Nkhale mwa mi, ni mi kikhale mwa nyu. Toko miritta cihineemaya veekha, caahikhaleke wanviterani, ciicammo nyu mwaahikhaleke mwa mi.
Mi ki nvitera, nyu nri miritta. Ntthu nokhala mwa mi, ni mi mwa uyo, nawiima mihokorokho cinci, kontha woohikhala mi, khiiwo inhalenyu woorya upanka.
Vano ntthu aahikhaleke mwa mi, naavonyeriya uta toko cineerihiyaya nritta wo wuuma, naattottiya n'upahiya wamooroni.
Nanso mwakhalaka mwa mi, ni moolumo aka akhalaka mwa nyu, nnaahala ulepela imphavelenyu, ni inaahala wiirannyaa.
Commo phinttittimihiyaya Apaapa, wiira mwiime mihokorokho cinci, ni nnaahala ukhala eetthuci aka.
Toko Apaapa cikifentilyaya, ni mi ciicammo kihoofentani. Nkhale nnifentoni mwaka.
Vano mwattharihelelaka malamulo aka, nnaakhala nnifentoni mwaka; toko mi cinttharihelelaka malamulo a Apaapa ni kikhalaka nnifentoni mwaya.
Kinoohimeryani nnya citthu nnya wiira utteeliya waka ukhale mwa nyu, ni ciicammo utteeliya winyu ukwanele.
Vano nlamulo naka phi nna: Nfentane ntthu ni nkhwawe, toko mi cufentilyakani.
Khaawo rina nifento toko nna, woovaha ntthu ukumi awe nlattu wa asimpwanawe.
Vano nyu, mwapankaka inoolamulelakani, nnaakhala asimpwanaka.
Akinowiihanani tho ipottha, maana ipottha khincuwela impanka pwiya aya, nanso kinowiihanani asimpwanaka, kontha cothene ceewilyaka Apaapa kihoocuwelihani.

Khanhimweni nyu nkithanlile mi, nanso, phi mi kuthanlileni nyu ni kihoorumani wiira mwiime mihokorokho, ni mihokorokho cinyu cikhale coohimala; wiira cothene cinhalenyu uvekela wa Apaapa mwa ncina naka, ayo yuvaheni.
Paahi iyo phinoolamulakani, wiira nfentane ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Ni ittuninya yooramakani, ncuwele wiira nyu nhinaya, ipacenre ukirama mi.
Vano mwaari o nttuniyani, ittuninya yaanoofentani toko awaya. Nanso, nyu khannakhala o nttuniyani, vano kihoothanlani ni kihookumihani nttuniyani. Phimaana, ittuninya inawuramani.

Muupuwele nuulumo nuuhimenryakani: Ipottha khinompwaha nkunya aya. Wakhalaka wiira kihoomolanihaciya mi, ni nyu ciicammo nnaahala woomolanihaciya. Wakhalaka wiira ahottharihelela nuulumo naka, ciicammo anaahala uttharihelela nawinyu nno.
Nanso cothene nnyo, anhala wupankani nlattu wo ncina naka, maana khaanoncuwela ule kirumile.
Vano mi kahaawile kaahimeryaka itthu, khayaakhalana itampi, nanso vano, khuuwo wootthawelela nlattu wo'tampi caya.
Ule nokirama, ciicammo naarama Apaapa.
Vano mi kahaapankile miteko iriyari aya, cennyo cihinapankawe ntthu, khayaakhalana itampi, nanso vano, ayo ahoona ni ahokirama mi na Apaapa.
Vano iyo yiiranenle wiira citthariheleliye cowantikhiya muNlamuloni, ciiraka: Kihoraminya woohittheka itthu.
Nanso awaaka Mpepeci, uri Nnepa weekhweli unkhuma wa Apaapa, kinhalaka wuuveleeliherani, uyo unaahala uvaha usaahiti aka.
Ni nyu ciicammo nnaahala uvaha usaahiti, kontha nri ni mi ukhuma wupaceroni.
Kinawuhimeryesani nnya citthu nnya, wiira nhiihapusace.
Vano mafarisi anaahala uwoomolani nsinakoka mwaya, ni unaahala uwa ukati unhalaya uwiivani yoonihaka toko ayo ari mananna oonlapela Nluku.
Maana anhala wupankani commo nlattu khaanaacuwela Apaapa, hata mi.
Vano, nnya citthu nnya kinoohimeryani wiira, waphiyaka ukati, muupuwele wiira khweli kahoohimeryani. Akuuhimenryeni ikhumelo wupaceroni, maana mi kaari ni nyu.
Nanso vano, kinrwaa wa ule kirumile, ni khaawo wa nyu nokikoha eeraka: Unrwaa vayi?
Uhiya commo, nlattu wowuhimeryani nnya citthu nnya, ucukula uhocara munrimani mwinyu.
Nanso mi kinawuhimeryani ikhweli. Iri itthu yoorera wa nyu wiira kirwee, maana mi kaahirweke, Mpepeci khanhala uwa, nanso mi karwaka, kinaahala wuveleliherani.
Vano uyo awaaka, naahala wooryaca ittuninya ni itampi caya, nsariyani ni nhukhumuni.
Ntampini, kontha khaankikupali mi;
nsariyani, maana kinrwaa wa Apaapa, ni khannohala ukoona tho.
Muhukhumwinyani, maana nlamuli o yeela ittuninya ela hohukhumwinya.
Nanlelo kihaana citthu cinci cowuhimeryani, nanso nyu khannohala woorya uvilela nna va;
nanso wawaaka Nnepa weekhweli, uyo unaahala uweettihani mwikhwelini, kontha khunhala wiicuuluma, nanso unhala uhimya cothene ciiwilyaya ni wuhimeryani citthu cinhala uwa.
Uyo unaahala ukittittimiha, kontha unhala waakhela iri yawaka, ni unaahala wuhimeryani.
Vano cothene cirinaya Apaapa, ciri cawaka; phimaana kiwiirelakani wiira unaahala waakhela iri yawaka ni unaahala wuhimyacerani.
Wo'kati vakani khannohala ukoona, nanso ukati vakani tho nnaahala ukoona.
Vaavale, eetthuci awe akina yaaneerelana ayaayoru: Inhala ukhala isiyani, iyo inniirelawe iyo: Wo'kati vakani khannohala ukoona tho, nanso ukati vakani tho nnaahala ukoona, ni kinrwaa wa Apaapa?
Vano yeeraca coo: Maanaya isiyani, ukati vakani? Khanineweeha inaacawe iyo.
Vano Yesu acuwelaka wiira aaphavela ukohiya, ahaakohaca eeraka: Nnokohana ayaayoru iwiirenlyakani: Wo'kati vakani khannohala ukoona, nanso ukati vakani tho nnaahala ukoona?
Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, nnaahala wunla n'ucukula, ni ittuninya inaahala utteeliya; nyu nnaahala ucukula, nanso ucukula winyu nwo unaahala uthatuwa utteeliya.
Vano nthiyana ahalaka vakani uyara, naacukula, maana ukati awe uhophiya, nanso nannyanrene mwana, khanoopuwela tho masukuli ale nlattu woonnyara ntthu nttuniyani.
Ciicammo nyu nna va nnaacukulaca, nanso ikwaha ikinaku kinaahala uwoonani; mirima cinyu cinaahala utteeliya, ni utteeliya winyu nwo khaawo nohala utamiha tho.
Nenno nihuku nno, khiiwo inhalenyu ukikoha. Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, mwaavekelaka Apaapa itthu phi itthu mwa ncina naka, ayo anaahala wuuvahani.
Vano mpaka nna va khiiwo ilepenlenyu mwa ncina naka; nlepele ni nnaavahiya, wiira utteeliya winyu nwo umalele.
Nnya citthu nnya kinoohimeryani ni malikanihero; unaahala uphiya ukati unhalaka wuhimeryani woohi malikanihero, nanso kinhala wuhimeryani wakwalyaa ihaali ya Apaapa.
Wo nenno nihuku nno nnaahala uvekela mwa ncina naka, ni kakinwiirelani wiira kinaahala wuvekelelani wa Apaapa.
Maana Apaapa anene anawufentani, nlattu nyu nnaakifenta ni nnaakupali wiira mi kinkhuma wa Nluku.
Kikhumile wa Apaapa ni kihokela nttuniyani; vano kinaahiya ittuninya ni kinrwaa wa Apaapa.
Vaavale eetthuci awe ale yaheeraca: Vano phinoolumacenyu wakwalyaa, woohikhala ni malikanihero.
Vano nihoona wiira nnaacuwela citthu cothene ni khannophavela wiira ntthu ookoheni; phimaana, nihokupali wiira nkhumile wa Nluku.
Vaavale Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Vano nhokupali?
Paahi, unaawa ukati ni uhophiya, wanhalenyu umwarusiya, khula ntthu uwannyawe, ni nnohala ukihiya veekha, nanso, akiri veekha, kontha Apaapa ari ni mi.
Nnya citthu nnya kinoohimeryani wiira nkhalane nnema mwa mi. Nttuniyani, nnawoona mahuviho, nanso ntteeliye, mi kihotthema ittuninya.
Vaavale Yesu noolumacilene nnya citthu nnya, ahowusa miitho awe awehaka uculu ni aheera: Paapa, ukati uhophiya; munttittimihe mwaninyu, wiira mwaninyu uyo oottittimiheni nyu,
toko cimmahilenyu ulamuli wa atthu othene, wiira aavahe ukumi woohimala ale othene yaavahilenyu.
