Ukumi woohimala ph'ula; ncuweliye nyu, Nluku mmoca eekhweli, ni Yesu Kristu, munrumilenyu.
Mi kihoottittimihani mwiilaponi, kimaliheraka nteko nkikhuluvenlenyu wiira kivare.
Vano, nkittittimihe, Paapa, mwanene enyu, ni nttittimiho naarinaka ukati waaryaka ni nyu, ittuninya ihinaya ukhala.
Kihocuweliha ncina ninyu mwa atthu othene akivahilenyu nttuniyani. Yaari awinyu, ni nyu nhokivaha mi, ni ayo ahottharihelela nuulumo ninyu.
Vano, ayo anaacuwela wiira citthu cothene cikivahilenyu, cinkhuma mwa nyu.
Maana mi kihaavaha moolumo akivahilenyu, ni ayo ahaakhelela, ni khweli anaakupali wiira kinkhuma mwa nyu, ni ahokupali wiira phi nyu nkirumile.
Kinawaavekelela ayo. Akinvekelela ittuninya, nanso wa ale akivahilenyu, maana ari awinyu.
Vano, citthu cothene ciri cawaka ciri cawinyu, ni citthu cawinyu ciri cawaka, ni nlattu wo cennyo kinaattittimihinya.

Vano mi akinhala ukhala tho nttuniyani, nanso ayo ankhala nanlelo nttuniyani, ni mi kimmwa warinyu. Paapa Nttakattifu, mwaasunke mwa ncina ninyu, ncina nikivahilenyu, wiira ayo akhale mmoca, toko cirihu hi.

Vano ukati waaryaka ni ayo, kihaakhikicera mwa ncina ninyu nikivahilenyu, ni kihaasunka, ni khaawo rimenle mena mmoca, ari hikhanle paahi ule aalikeleliye urimela, wiira citthariheleliye cowantikhiya.
Nanso vano, kimmwa warinyu, ni ila kinooluma nttuniyani wiira ayo akhalane utteeliya waka woomalela.
Mi kihaavaha nuulumo ninyu, ni ittuninya ihaarama, maana ayo khaanakhala o nttuniyani, toko mi cihiryaka o nttuniyani.
Akinoovekelani wiira mwaakumihe nttuniyani, nanso kinoovekelani wiira mwaakihe mwa Ntakhali.
Ayo khaanakhala o nttuniyani, toko mi cihiryaka o nttuniyani.
Mwaattakattifihe mwiikhwelini; nuulumo ninyu niri ikhweli.
Toko mi nkirumilenyu uttuniyani, ni mi ciicammo kihaaruma nttuniyani.
Nlattu wawaya ayo kinawiittakattifiha, wiira ni ayo akhale oottakattifihiya mwikhwelini.
Akinaavekelela ala paahi, nanso ni ayo ankela ukikupali mi nlattu wo nuulumo naya ala,
wiira othene akhale amoca, toko cirinyu mwa mi ni mi mwa nyu, ni ayo akhale mwa hi, wiira ittuninya ikupali wiira nhokiruma.
Mi kihaavaha nttittimiho nikivahilenyu, wiira akhale amoca, toko hi cirihu amoca.
Mi mwa ayo, ni nyu mwa mi, wiira umoca aya umalele, ni ittuninya icuwele wiira nyu nhokiruma ni nhaafenta, toko cikifentilenyu mi.
Paapa, kintthuna wiira ale akivahilenyu akhale nipuro niryaka mi, waacera wiira yoone nttittimiho nikivahilenyu, kontha nhokifenta ihinaya wumpiya ittuninya.
Paapa o'sariya, ittuninya khinoocuwelani, nanso, mi kihoocuwelani, ni ala anaacuwela wiira nyu nhokiruma.
Mi kihaacuweliha ncina ninyu ni nanlelo kinawaacuweliha, wiira nifento nikifentilenyu nikhale na ayo, ni mi ciicammo kikhale na ayo.
Vaavale Yesu noolumilene ala moolumo ala, ahokhuma n'eetthuci awe arwaaka nikhopela nikina no mooloko uneehaninya Ketoromi, waari iluwani, ni ahaakelanaca ale.
Yuta, namakhuce, ciicammo aancuwela nne nipuro nne, maana Yesu aankhalaka imaara cinci n'eetthuci awe.
Vano Yuta ahorwaa nenne nipuro nne, nari na anatoropa ni mayorontta akina yaaruminye na akhulupale o mayasataka ni mafarisi, anakusacile mithuko, isamaninya ni ikatana.
Yesu ahocuwela citthu cothene caahala umwiirannyaa, ahaasicerya ni ahaakoha eeraka: Nnomwaavya pani?
Vano ale yahaakhula yiiraka: Yesu, o'Nasaree. Vano Yesu aheerelaca: Phi mi. Ni Yuta namakhuce aari vaavale ni yaale.
Ukati weenryawe Yesu, phi mi, yahoteteruwelaca uttuli n'uwuluwela vathi.
Yesu ahaakoha tho eeraka: Nnomwaavya pani? Yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Yesu o'Nasaree.
Vano Yesu aheerelaca: Kihoohimeryani wiira phi mi. Wakhala wiira nnokaavya mi, mwaahiye arwaace atthu aka ala.
Iyo yiiraneele wiira nitthariheleliye nuulumo neenryawe: Khakirimenle hata mmoca kivahilenyu.
Vaavale, Simoni Peturu ahotholola ikatana yaarinawe ahonrakaliha n'unthikila nnyaru no moono nlopwana na nrumeyi ankhulupale o mayasataka. Ncina nawe nrumeyi uyo naari Malku.
Nanso Yesu ahomwiirela Peturu: Uhele ikatana iyo munluwoni mmo. Kinlamuliya uwurerya ikikhompe ikivahilyaya Apaapa.
Vano anatoropa ni nhooleli aya, ni mayorontta a ayuta yahommara Yesu n'untthuka.
Woopacera yaanrweehile wa Anasi, nvokohawe Kayifasi, nkhulupale o mayasataka o yoole mwakha ule.
Vano, Kayifasi phahimenrye ayuta wiira phatari ukhwa ntthu mmoca nlattu wo'nethi.
Vaavale Simoni Peturu ni mwiitthuci nkina yahonttharaca Yesu. Akhalaka ula mwiitthuci ula oocuweliya ni nkhulupale o mayasataka, ahokela wapuwani vale ni Yesu,

nanso Peturu aahanle vate, wakhiviru ni nkhora. Akhumaka mwiitthuci nkina ule, aari oocuweliya ni nkhulupale o mayasataka, ahoturuwa ni ahomuulumana mwanthiyana aakhaliha nkhora ni ahonkusa Peturu n'unkelana.
Vano, mwanthiyana o wankhora ule, ahonkoha Peturu eeraka: We khunakhala mwiitthuci awe nlopwan'ole? Ahaakhula eeraka: Akihimwe!
Ananteko ni mayorontta yaari vaavale, yahoparihelaca mooro, nlattu wooririya, ni yaanootthaca. Peturu aari iriyari aya, ni uyo aanoottha.
Vaavale nkhulupale o mayasataka aanankohakoha Yesu ihaali yeetthuci awe ni cosomiha cawe.
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Mi kuulumacile wakwalyaa wa atthu othene; kihosomiha imaara cinci mmasinakokani ni wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, onthukumanaya ayuta othene, ni khiiwo yuulumacilyaka yovithyaa.
Unkikoherani commo? Waakoheke atthu yiiwile itthu yoolumacaka, kontha ayo anaacuwela yuulumacilyaka.
Oolumacak'ono, mayorontta mmoca aari vaavale ahomwaatta Yesu ni ahomwiirela: Phi ciicammo cineeraa woomuulumana nkhulupale o mayasataka?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Nari kinoolumacile unyala, ukihimerye yuulumacilyaka, nanso nari kinoolumacile uratta, unkaattelani?
Vaavale Anasi ahonveleeliha Yesu natthukiyene wa Kayifasi, nkhulupale o mayasataka.
Vano Simoni Peturu, ootthaka mooro, ahokohiya wiira: We keera ciicammo mwiitthuci awe? Uyo ahoruna eeraka: Akihimwe!
Vano nrumeyi a nkhulupale o mayasataka, nloko awe ntthu aathikiliye nnyaru ni Peturu, ahomwiirela: Akiwoonne we uluwani ni yooyo?
Imaara imoca tho Peturu ahoruna. Ni yooyo ukati uyo, nthupi waheepa.
Wahoolo ahokusiya Yesu wa Kayifasi ni ahorwaninya uhano. Waari wicisu ni ayo khayaakenle uhano nwe wiira ahiihele iharamu kontha yaaphavela unlya Paasikuwa.
Vano Pilatu ahokhuma wiira oolumane ni aheera: Tthekileni ula nlopwan'ola?
Ale yahomwaakhulaca yiiraka: Ula ahaari mayottheka, khanoowiihera.
Nanlelo Pilatu aheerelaca: Munkuseke nyu ni munhukhumuku toko cineeraya malamulo enyu. Vano ayuta yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Hi khanilamuleliye umwiiva ntthu.
Iyo yeeranenle wiira nitthariheleliye nuulumo na Yesu, nihimyacaka mananna caahalawe ukhwa.
Pilatu ahokela tho mpwaro mo'hano, ahomwiihana Yesu ni ahonkoha eeraka: We uMwene a ayuta?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Ala makohero ala anookhuma we atthuna unooruminya nlattu wawaka mi?
Pilatu ahonkoha tho eeraka: Mi kinookhala nyuta? Atthu aa ni akhulupale o mayasataka phikiwiihenre mi. We utthekileni?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Umwene aka khunakhala wo'ttuninya ila. Unari commo, arumeyi aka yaanakaakiha, wiira kihirwaninye wa ayuta, nanso vano umwene aka khunakhala wo va.

Vano Pilatu ahomwiirela: Maanaya wiira we o mwene? Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: Phi we uneera mi mwene. Phimaana, mi kiyarenle yeeyo, ni nlattu wo yeeyo phiweenlyaka nttuniyani, wiira kithoonyere usaahiti weekhweli. Othene yoole ri eekhweli naakiiwelela.
Pilatu ahonkoha eeraka: Ikhweli isiyani? Noolumilene commo, ahohokoleela wa ayuta ni aheerela: Mi khiiwo ikoosi inoonaka mwa ula.
Uri nlemalelo enyu wutthukulelani ntthu mmoca nlattu wo Paasikuwa. Nnotthuna wiira kintthukule mwene a ayuta?
Vaavale yahokhuwelaca tho othene yiiraka: Uyo mena, ninontthuna Parapasi! Nanso Parapasi aari nannyatha.
Vano, Pilatu ahonkusa Yesu ni ahoruma wiira aafyulaciye.
Anatoropa yahotthava ikhara yo miiwa, yahommwariha mmuru; ciicammo yahommwariha ihancu yooceremela.
Vaavale yahomwaattamerya n'umwiirela: Salama, mwene a ayuta! Ni yahomwaatta ilatuma.
Imaara ikina tho Pilatu ahokhuma ni aheerela: Mmooneke, kihoowiiherani, wiira ncuwele wiira akinoona ikosilyawe.
Vano Yesu ahokhuma nawarihiye ikhara yo miiwa ni ihancu yooceremela. Pilatu aheerela: Nlopwana uyo ph'ula!
Vano wamoonnyaya, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mayorontta, yahokhuwela yiiracaka: Unkhomele! Unkhomele! Pilatu aheera: Munkuseke nyenyuva mwasinene ni munkhomeleke, kontha mi akinoona ikosilyawe.
Vaavale ayuta yahomwaakhula amwiirelaka: Hi nihaana nlamulo. Toko cinhimyaya nlamulo nno, uyo nolamuliya ukhwa, maana neeciirela mwana a Nluku.
Vano Pilatu eewaka coolumaciya nnye, ahotepaca woova,
ni akelaka tho mpwaro, ahonkoha Yesu eeraka: We o vayi? Nanso Yesu khaamwaakhunle.
Vano Pilatu ahomwiirela: Khunkaakhula? Khuncuwela wiira mi kihaana ulamuli wo wuutaphula atthuna wukhomela wansalapani?
Yesu ahaakhula eeraka: We khawakhalana ulamuli wokiriha itthu mi, nari uhivahiye wirimu. Phimaana, kiwiihile wa we, yooyo phirina itampi yuulupale.

Ukhuma yoole ukati ule, Pilatu aaphavela mananna oontaphula Yesu, nanso ayuta yaankhuwela yiiraka: Wantaphulaka uyo, khunakhala mpwanawe Sesari! Othene yoole neepanka mwene, nokhala mwiinani awe Sesari!
Vano wiiwa wawe Pilatu ala moolumo ala, ahonwiiha Yesu vate ni ahonkoma mpwaro nnooluminya milattu, nipuro nineehaninya ipuwa, ni nuulumo no'parayiku, Kapata.
Naari nihuku nootthenkaciya Paasikuwa, iwora yoothana, ni aheerela ayuta: Mwene enyu uyo ph'ula.

Nanso ayo yaanakhuwela yiiraka: Muntamihe va! Muntamihe va! Mwankhomele wansalapani! Pilatu aheerela: Mpaka kinaankhomela mwene enyu? Akhulupale o mayasataka yaheera: Khanirina mwene nkina, nari hiri Sesari paahi.
Vano Pilatu ahaavaha wiira ankhomele. Vaavale ayo yahonkusa Yesu.
Vano Yesu mwanene ahokusa nsalapa wanikhatani wawe ni ahorwaa nipuro nineehaninya Kolokota, maanaya wiira nipuro no'kohi ni nuulumo no'parayiku,
wonwo waakhomeliyawe Yesu, wamoca na atthu eeli, uno n'uno, ni Yesu iriyari.
Pilatu ahantikha nipawu ni aheesa waculu nsalapa. Yantikhiye yaari: Yesu o'Nasaree, Mwene a ayuta.
Vano ayuta enci yahosoma yaantikhiye ile, maana nipuro naakhomeliyawe Yesu naari no waattamerya wasittatti, ni yaantikhiye ni iparayiku, ilatinu ni ikereku.
Akhulupale o mayasataka a ayuta phamwiirelaya Pilatu: Uhantikhe Mwene a ayuta, nanso wiire: Uyo neeciirela, Ki Mwene a ayuta.
Pilatu ahaakhula eeraka: Yantikhilyaka kihaantikha.

Vano anatoropa anankhomenlene Yesu, yahokusaca coowara cawe ni yahokawaniha miphantte micese, wo khula natoropa mphantte mmoca, ni yahokusaca ihancu. Ihancu ile, yaari yoohittotthiya yothene, ukhuma nculu mpaka vathi.

Vaavale yaheerelana: Nihaahule, nanso nipanke mwaavi wiira nimoone nohala ukusa, wiira citthariheleliye cowantikhiya cineera: Cihokawanihaciya coowara caka ni ihancu aka ihopankeliya mwaavi. Commo phipankilyaya anatoropa ayo.
Vano wakhiviru waya nsalapa wa Yesu, yahaawo anumwane ni munnaya, ni Mariya amwaarawe Kolope, ni Mariya Mantalena.
Yesu woonnyawe anumwane wamoca ni mwiitthuci oofentiya, aheera: Maama, mwaninyu ph'uyo.
Vaavale ahomwiirela mwiitthuci ule: Anumwanaa ph'ayo. Ukhuma yoole ukati ule, mwiitthuci ule ahaakusa uwannyawe.
Woona wawe Yesu wiira cothene cahomalela, wiira citthariheleliye cowantikhiya, aheera: Ukivola ntthona!
Wahaawo vaavale mwaapu woocara nthiikila. Nahoruwennya ntthoce ni, nahohomeeriya muntathini, ahorweeheliya umalakuni wawe.
Vano ukati waalawihilyawe nthiikila ule, aheera: Cihomalela! Ni ooromihaka muru ahohiya iroho.
Ayuta yahonvekela Pilatu wiira capwesakaciye metto caya, ni cakurusaciye mirutthu nnye wiira nihiphiye nihuku no ntivela cinari wansalapani, maana naari nihuku nuulupale nootthenkaciya.
Anatoropa yahorwaa ni yahopwesakaca metto ca ntthu oopacera ni ca nkina aakhomelaninyawe.
Nanso waaphilyaya wa Yesu, maana yahomoona wiira hokhwa, khacaapwesiye metto cawe.
Vaavale natoropa mmoca ahonhoma mpararini ni nivaka, ni yahokhuma maasi ni iphome.
Ule oonne iyo ahohimyeeha, ni usaahiti awe uri weekhweli, ni ule naacuwela wiira nohimya ikhweli, wiira ni nyu nkupali.
Iyo ikhumelenle wiira citthariheleliye cowantikhiya cineera: Hata nikhuva nawe nimoca khaninhala upwesiya.
Imaara ikinaku cowantikhiya cinhimya: Ayo anaahala umoona ule yaanhomilyaya.

Wahoolo, Yusufu o wArimateya, aari mwiitthuci a Yesu, unookhalaru wiira kheecuwaneha nlattu wo woova ayuta, ahonlepela Pilatu wiira antthunihere ukurusa nrutthu wa Yesu. Pilatu ahontthunihera. Vaavale, Yusufu o wArimateya ahorwaa ukurusa nrutthu wa Yesu.
Ciicammo Nikotemu, yoole aamphwanyile Yesu uhiyu, ahorwaa, nakusile anamaroco talathini na cese (34) o miira ni elayi.
Vano yahokusaca nrutthu wa Yesu ni yahowarihaca isantta n'uttikitthela makhura oonukhela, toko cilemalenlyaya ayuta wootthenkemaniha masikhanelo.
Nipuro naakhomeliyawe Yesu, yahaawo iluwani, ni mommo yahaawo mahiye onaanano, yaari ahinaya usikhiya ntthu.
Naari Nihuku Nootthenkaca a ayuta, ni nlattu wowiira mahiye yaari wakhiviru, Yesu ahosikhiya vaavale.
Nihuku noopacera no'sumana, wicisuru ninlelo unaripenlene, Mariya Mantalena ahorwaa umahiye ni ahoona wiira nluku naakhuneeliye mahiye nne nahotamihinya.
Vaavale, Simoni Peturu, ni mwiitthuci nkina aanfentawe Yesu ahontthawelela ni ahomwiirela: Apwiya ahokumihinya mmahiye mmo, ni khanincuwela weesiyaya.
Vano ahokhuma Peturu ni mwiitthuci nkina ule ni yahorwaaca umahiye.
Oyeeli yaantthimakaca, nanso mwiitthuci nkina uyo ahotthimakaca venci wonvikana Peturu ni phaapacenre uphiya umahiye.
Waphilyawe umahiye nwe, khaakenle mmahiye mmo, nanso ahooroma ni ahoona isantta iyo.
Vano Simoni Peturu, anttharaka mwiitthuci aahoonle ule, ahophiya ni ahokela mmahiye mmo. Ni ule ciicammo ahoona isantta iyo.
Nleeso naari wiimuru wa Yesu khanaari ni isantta iyo, nanso naahinnye mphantte aya.
Vano ahokela tho mwiitthuci nkina ule, aaphile woopacera umahiye nwe, ahoona ni ahokupali.
Maana yaari ahinaya wiiweeha cowantikhiya cineera: Uyo aalamuliya wunwelela iriyari ya atthu ookhwa.
Vaavale eetthuci ale yahoturuwaca.
Nanso Mariya nanlelo aari wankhora wo mahiye vale, onlaka. Onlak'ono, ahooroma ni ahothurumela mmahiye mmwe,
ni ahoona ancelo eeli anawanre cootteela, anonkomacile nipuro neesiyawe Yesu, mmoca wiimuru ni nkina wiimetto.
Vano ayo yahaakoha yiiraka: Athiyana, nnonlelani? Ale yahaakhula yiiraka: Kontha ahookusiya Apwiya aka, ni akincuwela weesiyaya.
Anoolumilene commo, yahorukunuwela uttuli ni yahomoona Yesu neemenle, nanso khayaancuwelenle wiira aari Yesu.

Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Athiyana, nnonlelani? Nnomwaavya pani? Vano ale yoonihaka toko phi nlopwana nanteko o'luwani ile, yahaakhula yiiraka: Muulupale, akhala wiira phi we waatamihile, ukihimerye weesilyaa, mi kinkowaakusa.
Yesu ahomwiirela: Mariya! Vano ule anrukunuwelaka ahomwaakhula ni iparayiku eeraka: Raponi! Mwalimu!
Vano Yesu ahomwiirela: Uhikivare, maana akinaaya uwela wa Apaapa. Nanso urwee wa asunnaka waahimyacere wiira: Kinrwaa wa Apaapa ni wa Athumwaninyu, wa Nluku aka ni wa Nluku inyu.
Paahi, Mariya Mantalena ahokhuma ni ahorwaa waahimyacera eetthuci wiira: Kihoona Apwiya! Ni ahohimyaca citthu caaleeheriyawe.

Nihuku noopacera no'sumana, waatthekuwilyaya ncuwa, cinatthennyene mikhora nipuro naathukumannyaya eetthuci nlattu wo woova ayuta, ahowa Yesu, ni aheemela iriyari aya ni aheerela: Nnema nikhale ni nyu!
Wuulumaca wawe commo, ahaathoonyera matata awe ni iparari cawe. Vaavale eetthuci ale yahotteeliya woona waya Apwiya.
Vano Yesu aheerela tho: Nnema nikhale ni nyu! Toko Apaapa cikirumilyaya, ni mi ciicammo kinawurumani.
Noolumacilene commo, ahaawucelela ni aheerelaca: Mwaakhele Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Mwaalevelelaka atthu itampi caya, anaaleveleliya, nanso mwahaaleveleleke, khaanleveleliya.
Vano Tomee, mmoca weetthuci khumi n'eeli, eehaninya Titimu, khaari na ale ukati wawilyawe Yesu.

Aheereliya n'eetthuci akina ale wiira: Nihoona Apwiya! Nanso uyo ahaakhula eeraka: Mi kaahooneke mmatatani mwaya makhwatta ookhomeliya waya kihelaka nikokho naka, ni kaahiheleke ntata naka mpararini mwaya, akinhala ukupali.
Anavinrene mahuku naane, yahothukumana tho eetthuci awe, ni Tomee aari vaavale. Mikhora cinatthennyene, ahowa Yesu, aheemela iriyari aya ni aheerelaca: Nnema nikhale ni nyu.
Wowaakuvyaca wene ahomwiirela Tomee: Uhele nikokho naa nno va ni woone matata aka ayo. Uwiihe ntata naa nno ni uvare iparari caka. Uhikhale oohikupali, nanso ukhale ookupali.
Tomee ahomwaakhula eeraka: Apwiya aka ni Nluku aka!
Yesu ahomwiirela: Kontha uhokoona, phinkupalyaa? Ahoreriya ale ahoonne nanso akupaliki.
Khweli, Yesu hopanka mitikiniho cinci iriyari y'eetthuci awe, cihaantikhiye nliivuruni mu.
Nanso nnya, cantikhiye wiira nkupali wiira Yesu phi Kristu, Mwanawe Nluku, ni wiira, mwakupaliki, nkhalane ukumi mwa ncina nawe.
Cinavinrene nnyo, Yesu aheecoonihera tho w'eetthuci awe upharyaa yo'Tiperiyate. Ceenryawe wo wiicooneeha waari coo:
Vaavale yaari wamoca Simoni neehaninya Peturu, Tomee, Titimu, Natanayeli, aari o'Kana yo'Kalileya, asaana a Sepeteu, n'eetthuci eeli akina.
Simoni Peturu aheerela: Kinkoototha ihopa. Akina ale yahomwiirela: Hi ciicammo ninrwaa ni we. Yahokelaca nkalawani, ni yoole uhiyu ule khiiwo yaaphunryaya.
Vano waasaya va, Yesu aari upharyaa, nanso, eetthuci ale khayancuwelenle wiira aari phi yooyo.
Yesu ahaakoha eeraka: Asaanaka, nhaana va itthu iyolya? Yahomwaakhula yiiraka: Khanirina.
Vano aheerela: Nvonyere ntthavi nno moono nlopwana wo'kalawa ni nnaaphwanya ihopa. Vano ale yahopanka ciicammo ni yahovariha ihopa cinci, mpaka khayoorya upurula ntthavi nno.
Vaavale mwiitthuci oofentiya ni Yesu, ahomwiirela Peturu: Phi yaayo Apwiya! Vano Simoni Peturu, weewilyawe wiira yaari Apwiya, ahowara ikuwo cawe, maana aari ciico, ni ahotuphela mpahari.
Vano eetthuci akina ale yaari nkalawani mmwe yahopurula ntthavi nne ni ihopa nnye, maana khayattalivanne ni ucenkweni, waari wookhalaka malinca tuswini (90).
Waaphilyaya ucenkweni, yahoona makhala omooro ni waculu waya cinaaneeliye ihopa, ni ciicammo cahaawo mikatthe.
Yesu aheerelaca: Mmwaanace ihopa civarihilenyu nnyo.
Simoni Peturu ahokela nkalawani ni ahopurulela ntthavi nne ucenkweni, ninacanre ihopa cuulupale iminya wo hansini na ttharu (153), ni caahoocararu ihopa muntthavini mmwe, nne khanaahuwile.
Yesu aheerelaca: Mmwaace, mwaalyace. Vaavale khaawo hata mwiitthuci mmoca aankohile eeraka: Tupani we? Kontha yaancuwela wiira yaari Apwiya.
Vano Yesu ahaattamerya, ahokusa nkatthe ni ihopa, ni ahaavahaca.
Ila yaari imaara yoneeraru yeethoonyihenryawe Yesu w'eetthuci awe, nonwelenlene mwa atthu ookhwa.

Anamanlene ulyaca, Yesu ahonkoha Simoni Peturu eeraka: Simoni, mwana a Yohani, unaakifenta mi woovikana ala? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Aye, Pwiya, nyu nnaacuwela wiira kinawufentani. Yesu ahomwiirela: Ulihe ikhontwaa caka.
Ahonkoha tho imaara yonayeeli eeraka: Simoni, mwana a Yohani, we unaakifenta? Ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Aye, Pwiya, nyu nnaacuwela wiira kinawufentani. Yesu ahomwiirela: Usunke ikhontwaa caka.

Imaara yoneeraru, Yesu ahonkoha eeraka: Simoni, mwana a Yohani, we unaakifenta? Peturu ahocukula ukohiya wawe imaara yoneeraru weereliyawe: We unaakifenta? Ni ahomwaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, nyu nnaacuwela citthu cothene, ni nnaacuwela wiira mi kinawufentani. Yesu ahomwiirela: Ulihe ikhontwaa caka.

Khweli khweli kinawuhimeryani wiira, ukati waaryaa mmirawo, weewariha umwanene ni weetta mapuro yaatthunaa, nanso ukati unkelaa wuuluvala, unkotaphula matata aa, akina ankowuwariha ni ankowukusa yurwanaka nipuro nihimphavelaa.
Oolumacenre commo, wiira anthoonyere Peturu nookhwa aahalawe unttittimihera Nluku. Wahoolo noolumacilene commo, ahomwiirela tho: Ukitthare mi.
Vano, Peturu ahorukunuwa ni ahoona wiira mwiitthuci oofentiya ni Yesu aanantthara, ule aamphitenrye wakhakaacani nihuku no nkatthe wa Apwiya n'umwiirela: Pwiya, namakhuce uyo tupani?
Umoona wawe, Peturu ahonkoha Yesu eeraka: Vano ula?
Yesu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Katthunaka wiira ula akhale nkumi mpaka mi uwa, yawaa isiyani? Vano we ukitthare mi.

Vaavale iriyari ya asunna ale wahanyiheriya wiira ule mwiitthuci ule khaahala ukhwa. Yesu kheenre wiira ule mwiitthuci ule khaahala ukhwa, nanso eenre: Katthunaka wiira ule akhale nkumi mpaka mi uwa, yawaa isiyani?
Ula phi mwiitthuci novahera usaahiti wo cennya citthu nnya caantikhilyawe. Ninaacuwela wiira usaahiti awe uyo weekhweli.
Nanso cihaawo citthu cikhwawe cinci cipankilyawe Yesu. Caahiminye cothene nnyo imoca imoca, kinoona wiira wattuniyani wothene khayaakhala ikhato yo weesa cennyo iliivuru caahala wantikhiya nnyo.
Yoowe Teyofilu, kihaantikha iliivuru yoopacera, kittonkaka citthu cothene cipacenryawe Yesu upanka ni wiitthuciha
mpaka nihuku niwelihiyawe wirimu, naavahilene malamulo amitthenka yaathanlilyawe, mwa Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Ukhwa wawe, ahonwelela ni aheethoonyihera wa amitthenka nari nkumi ni woonihera mithoonyero cinci coohivaanyihaninya. Ahaakhumelelaca mpaka mahuku arupayini (40) oolumacaka ihaali co'mwene wa Nluku.
Vano aalyaanak'ono, ahaalamulela wiira: Nhikhumace uYerusalemu, nanso nwehererye nkhuluveliho wa Apaapa, toko wakiiwilenyu.
Kontha, Yohani aapattisa ni maasi, nanso nyu nnohala upattisiya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, woohittalivana ala mahuku ala.
Vano, ale yaathukumanne yahonkoha, yiiraka: Pwiya, yoola ukati ula phinhalenyu uwusawusa umwene wo'Sirayeli?
Vaavale ahaakhula eeraka: Khuwaacileni ucuwelaca ukati atthuna mahuku Apaapa yeesilyaya ni ulamuli aya.
Nanso nnaahala waakhela ikuru wankelaya wuukhuruwelani nyu Nnepa Nttakattifu, ni nnohala ukhala asaahiti aka ukhuma uYerusalemu, mpaka uYuteya wothene n'uSamariya ni mpaka umalenlyaya ilapo.
Vano wuuluma wawe nnya citthu nnya, Yesu ahowelihiya uculu, ni ammwehacak'ono, nihutte nimoca nahaattiyelela wamiithoni waya.
Vano aweheehak'ono uculu, Yesu aanawela. Nananoru yahowaaca alopwana eeli anawaracile ikuwo cootteela,
ni yaheerelaca: Alopwana akalileya, mweemelacenreni va mmwehacaka uculu? Yesu yooyo thamihiye wariyari winyu uyo, awelihiyaka wirimu, naahala uwa tho toko ciicammo cimoonnenyu arwaaka wirimu.
Vaavale, yahoturuwelaca uYerusalemu, akhumacaka umwaakoni uneehaninya Olivera, uri wakhiviru n'uYerusalemu, mattalivelo aya yaari o malinca ilufu.

Vano uphiyaca waya usittatti nwo yahorwaa mpaka nsana no'culu yaathukumanesa aya: Peturu, Yohani, Yakopu, Anteree, Filipe, Tomee, Partolomeu, Mateu, Yakopu mwana a Alfeu, Simoni o mphwinko wa aseloti, ni Yuta mwana a Yakopu.
Othene ala yaakhala avekelaka, wamoca na athiyana, ni Mariya anumwane Yesu, na asunnawe.
Yaayo mahuku ayo aheemela Peturu iriyari ya asunna nenno nipuro nno, yahothukumana wookhalaka iminya wo sirini (120) ni uyo aheera:
Asunnaka, caalamuliya utthariheleliya cowantikhiya toko caahimilyaya Nnepa Nttakattifu wamalakuni wa Taviti, nlahanya wa Yuta, aahoolenle mphwinko waantthukile Yesu.
Kontha ahaalikeleliya ni hi, ni aanapanka mphantte wo yeela iyuulupale ila.
Uyo ahophwanya nthala wo'hisapu yo'khirini, ni amorelaka vathi, ahophulya iriyariru. Marupo awe othene yahomwareela vathi.
Yeeyo itthu iyo yahocuwelaciya na atthu othene yaakhala uYerusalemu, mpaka waavahiyaya nthala nno ncina, ni nuulumo naya neehaninyaka Akelitama, maanaya wiira Nthala No'phome.
Kontha ihantikhiya nliivuruni yo Macipo, wiira: Itthoko awe iyo khinhala ukhaliya, ni hikhale tho nohala ukhala, ni: Aheliye nkina uhooleli waarinawe uyo.
Vano wanlamuliya wiira, alopwana yaale yeettanehu ukati wothene, Apwiya Yesu waaryaya ni hi,
ikhumelo upattiso wa Yohani, mpaka nihuku nikhumilyawe Yesu wariyari wihu awelihiyaka wirimu, mmoca wo yaala akhale saahiti wamoca ni hi, oohimyaca wunwelela wawe.
Vano yahothoonyiheriya eeli: Yusufu, eehaninyaka Parsapa, eehaninya tho Yustu, ni Matiya.
Vaavale, ukati waavekelaya, yaheeraca coo: Nyu Apwiya, nnocuwela mirima ca atthu othene, nnithoonyere wo yaala eeli ala, ule nthanlilenyu,
wiira attiye nipuro neeyuulupale yoomitthenka, yolwannyawe Yuta, arwaaka nipuro nawe.
Wahoolo, yahopankaca mwaavi woovonyinya, ni iparakha iyo yahommorela Matiya. Uyo nathanliyene, ahotakaniheriya na amitthenka khumi na mmoca ale.
Uphiya waya nihuku no Pentekoste, othene yaathukumanne nipuro nimoca nenno.
Nananoru, yahowa yooruma, toko uwuka wo'phyoo yo'kuru yaakhuma wirimu, ni yahocara inupa yothene yonkomacilyaya.
Vano yahoona malimi oolikana o mooro, oomwaryeela, nahommorela khula ntthu.
Othene yahocariya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu ni yahopacera wuulumaca iluuka cikina, toko Nnepa waavahenryaya wiira yuulume.
Vano uYerusalemu yaanakhalaca ayuta, atthu anattiini, yaakhuma ilapo cothene ciri vathi.
Wahoolo wiiwannya waya yooruma ile, yahothukumana atthu enci, yaatikhinaca venci, kontha khula ntthu aanaweewa yuulumacaka ni nuulumo nawe.
Vaavale othene wahooma mwaano ni yaanatikhinaca, yiiraka: Nkoonani! Othene anoolumaca ala khaanakhala akalileya?
Vano nineewa cani, khula ntthu, ni nuulumo nihu niyaryannehu?
Nihaawo va apartu, ameetto ni alamu, na ale ankhalaca uMesopotamiya, uYuteya, uKapatosiya, uPontu ni nttetthe wo wAsiya,
uFirisiya, uPanfiliya, wIciipitu ni ale ankhala mittetthe co'Liipiya, wakhiviru n'uSirene, ni aletto ankhuma uRoma, ayuta na ale owaamini ittiini ya Yuta,
akereta ni aarapu, othene neewaca ni moolumo ehu ahimyacaka citthu cuulupale ca Nluku!
Othene yahotikhinaca n'usanka, ni yaankohanaca yiiraka: Itthu ila inhimyani?
Nanso akina ayo yaanawaatarawa yiiraka: Anoohapalaciya ayo.
Vano Peturu, aheemela wamoca na ale khumi na mmoca ale, ni ahoolumaca wowiirunya eerelaka: Alopwana o'Yuteya ni othene nnokhala uYerusalemu, ncuwele ila itthu ila. Nviriyane moolumo aka.
Khawanakhala toko wanoonihenyu wiira ala ari oohapalaciya, ni ula ukati ula unari nanlelo wo wicisu.
Nanso ila itthu inkhumelela ila ihiminye ni nnapiyu Yoweli eeraka:

Nluku neera: Anaaphiya mahuku oomalihera, kinhalaka umwarusela Nnepa aka mwa atthu othene. Asaanenyu asilopwana na asithiyana anaahala ulalya nhupi aka, amirawo enyu anaahala wooniheriya citthu ca Nluku ni owuuluvala anaahala uloha ittora;
mpaka ipottha caka conlopwana ni conthiyana, kinaahala umwarusela Nnepa aka yaayo mahuku ayo ni cinaahala ulalya.
Kinaahala ukurusa mitikiniho uculu wirimu, ni mithoonyero ilapo yo vathi; iphome, mooro n'utthuwa mwiisi.
Ncuwa ninaahala uthatuwa ipiphi, ni mweeri uthatuwa iphome, nihinaphiya nihuku nuulupale no waarya na Apwiya.
Ni othene yaale anhala wiihana ncina na Apwiya anaahala woopwa.

Alopwana o'Sirayeli, nviriyane ala moolumo ala: Yesu o'Nasaree, ri nlopwana owaamininya ni Nluku, aari wariyari winyu ni malakalaka, mitikiniho ni ikanyero. Cennyo Nluku cipankilyawe mwa yooyo iriyari inyu, toko cincuwelenyu mwasinene.
Yooyo Yesu uyo vahereriyenyu woolakela ni ucuwelaca wa Nluku, nyu nhomwiiva munkhomelaka wansalapani ni matata a atthu oohiloka.
Nanso Nluku homunweleliha, atthemaka uweryaa wo nookhwa, kontha khawoorannyaa utthukiya ni nookhwa.
Maana Taviti amwaacaka yooyo, aheera: Wamiithoni waka mi kaanawoonesa Apwiya, kontha ari moono aka nlopwana, wiira mi kihikukuvanihaciye.
Phimaana, nrima aka uhotteeliya, ni nlimi naka nihotthapa, ciicammo irutthu aka inaahala ukhala ni nkhuluvelo.
Kontha khunhala ukihiya mmahiye, ni khunhala unhiya Nttakattifu aa onttaka.
Uhokicuweliha iphiro cookumi, ni unaakicariha utteeliya kakhalaka wamiithoni waa.
Asunnaka, kinawuhimeryani woohuuvithelani wiira, naankolo ehu Taviti ahokhwa ni uvithiya, ni mahiye aya ayo ahaawo wariyari wihu mpaka nihuku no'lelo.
Vano naryene nnapiyu ni ahocuwela wiira Nluku ahonkhuluveliha wiira wahoolo ntthu mmoca o'cuulu awe naahala ukhala wahiceni wawe.
Noonnene Taviti yeeyo itthu iyo, ahoolumaca ihaali yo wunwelela wa Kristu, wiira khahinnye veekha mmahiye ni irutthu awe yunttaka.
Nluku homunweleliha yooyo Yesu uyo, ni hi othene niri asaahiti.
Vano howelihiya, ri moono nlopwana wa Nluku, haakhela wa Athumwane Nnepa Nttakattifu waakhuluvelihiye, vano homwarusela, phi yooyo nnoonenyu ni nneewenyu.
Kontha Taviti khawenle wirimu, nanso uyo naahimya eeraka: Apwiya aheerela Apwiya aka: Wunkome moono aka nlopwana,
mpaka wanhalaka weesa eenani aa toko ntapita noonyakelela.
Phimaana, woohaakaaka unethi wothene wo'Sirayeli ucuwele wiira, yoola Yesu nkhomenlenyu ula Nluku hompanka ukhala Apwiya ni Kristu.
Vano ale wiiwaca waya nnya citthu nnya, cahaatthitta wanrimani waya ni yahonkohaca Peturu ni amitthenka akina ayo yiiraka: Asunna, niireke cani?
Peturu ahaakhula eeraka: Nrukunuse nrima, ni khula ntthu wo nyu akhale oopattisiya mwa ncina na Yesu Kristu wiira nleveleliye itampi cinyu, ni mwaakhelihiye ivahiya yo Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Kontha yookhuluvelihiya iri yawinyu, ya asaanenyu ayo ni yaale othene ari uttayi, maanaya wiira othene yaale Apwiya Nluku ihu anhalaya weehana.
Ni moolumo makina menci, aanawaalopola aakhanyererihaka wiira: Mwiicoopole ikhapila yo'tampi ila.
Vano, ale yaakupanli nuulumo nno yahopattisiya, ni nenno nihuku nno wahokhala wuncererannyaa atthu ilufu ttharu.
Yaanaweettela miitthuciho ca amitthenka, yaanawaatanaca, yaammeelana nkatthe ni yaanvekela.
Wo khula ntthu yahaawo ihisima. Cahaawo ikanyero cinci ni malakalaka yaakhumelela nhina mwa amitthenka.
Othene yaaminni yaakhalaca wamoca ni cothene caaphwanyaya yaantakaniha.
Yaanaatumihaca imatta caya ni mihakhu caya, phikawelanaka. Atthu othene yaakaweliya nliko yoole waaphavelawe khula ntthu.
Khula nihuku yaathukumana wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, yaanaamyaaniha nkatthe mmatthokoni ni yaanalya coolya caya woohi itwaana n'utteeliya nrima,
anttittimihaka Nluku ni yaanapatthanana atthu othene. Commo Apwiya yaanawoncerera khula nihuku ale yoopwa.
Peturu ni Yohani yaarwaca uswalini inupa ittakattifu, ukati woneeraru woococilo.
Ahokusiya nlopwana mmoca aari owuntakyaa iyarelo, arwaaniyaka inupa ittakattifu, eesiya mahuku othene wankhora weehaninya Nkhora Woorera, wiira aalepele icimola ale yaakela.
Ule woonaca wawe Peturu ni Yohani, akelacaka inupa ittakattifu, ahaalepelaca wiira anvahace icimola.
Vano Peturu anweheehaka nari wamoca ni Yohani, aheera: Uniwehe!
Ule ahaawehaca awehereryaka waakhelihiya itthu phi itthu.
Nanso Peturu ahomwiirela: Akirina iparatha mena iwooru, nanso kinawuvaha ile irinaka: Mwa ncina na Yesu Kristu o'Nasaree, wunwe ni weette!
Vano anvarelaka ntata no moono nlopwana, ahonwusa, ni woohipica caholoka metto cawe ni mareca awe.
Vaavale nlopwan'ole ahotupha ni aheemela, ahopacera weetta ni ahaakelana wamoca wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, eettaka, atuphaka ni anttottopelaka Nluku.
Vano ahooninya na atthu othene eettaka ni anttottopelaka Nluku,
ni ahocuweleliya wiira phi yooyo onkomesa wa Nkhora Woorera wo'nupa ittakattifu alepelacaka icimola. Atthu othene yahotikhinaca n'usanka venci mwa nlattu w'etthu yankhumelenle.
Vano ule nanvarenle Peturu ni Yohani, atthu othene atikhinacaka yahotthawelela mpirothi nneehaninya mwa Salomoni.
Vaavale Peturu woona wawe commo, aheerela atthu ale: Annasirayeli, nnotikhinacani ikhumelenle ila ni nnoniweheeherani toko wiira nimweettihile ula ntthu ula ni ikuru cihu atthuna unattiini ihu?
Nluku a Aparahamu, a Isaki ni a Yakopi, Nluku o mayapaapehu, homunnuwiha karumeya awe Yesu, mmuulumilenyu makhuce munkhottaka wamiithoni wa Pilatu, ule nalakenlene untthukula.
Nanso nyu nhonkhotta Nttakattifu ni Nasariya, mpaka nholepela utthukuliya namwiiva.
Vano nyu nhomwiiva Mwanene ukumi, yoole Nluku munwelelihilyawe mwa atthu ookhwa, yooyo unkhalenlehu usaahiti.
Ni waamini mwa ncina na Yesu, nenno ncina nno phinvonihile ula nlopwana nnomoonenyu ula ni muncuwenlenyu ula. Nroromelo ninwa mwa yooyo, phinvahile ukumi womaana, toko othene cinoonenyu.
Vano, asunnaka, mi kihocuwela wiira nyu mpankacile ila itthu ila nlattu woohicuwela ni ciicammo asuulupale enyu.
Nanso Nluku ni yaala mananna ala phittharihelenlyawe itthu yaahimilyawe khalayi wamalakuni wo minapiyu, wiira Kristu awe aalamuliya uhuva.
Vano nrukunuse nrima, ni nturuwele wa Nluku, wiira itampi cinyu cifuttiye,
wiira wo mphantte wa Apwiya uwe ukati woomumula, ni wiira anrume Kristu athanleliyenyu, ri Yesu.
Yooyo wanlamuliya wiira akhale wirimu, mpaka uphiye ukati Nluku wanhalawe upanka citthu cothene conaanano, toko cuulumacilyawe mahuku menci avinre, wamalakuni wo minapiyu cawe cittakattifu.
Maana Musa heera: Apwiya Nluku anaahala ummusa wariyari wa asunnawe nnapiyu mmoca oolikana toko mi. Mmwiiwe citthu cothene cinhalawe wuuhimeryani.
Vano nohala uhimwiiwelela yooyo nnapiyu uyo, naahala woomoliya wariyari wa atthu.
Weekhweli, minapiyu cothene cuulumacile, ukhuma Samuweli mpaka minapiyu cikina, cahohimyaca ala mahuku ala.
Nyu mw'asaana o minapiyu ni nleehano nipankilyawe Nluku ni mayapaapehu, amwiirelaka Aparahamu: Muucuuluni waa, unethi wothene wo mwiilaponi ummorerihiya.
Vano Nluku homunweleliha Karumeya awe, ni hooveleeliherani nyu woopacera, wiira ooreriheni, oorukunusakani mirima wiira khula ntthu ahiye coonanara cawe.
Ukati woolumanaya Peturu ni Yohani atthu ale, phawaya mayasataka, nhooleli omayoorontta Inupa Ittakattifu ni masatusi.
Ale yahonyonyaciya nlattu wa amitthenka, kontha yaanaasomiha atthu ni waahimerya wiira, mwa Yesu uhaawo wunwelela wa atthu ookhwa.
Yahaavaraca ni watthukelaca nkalaposo mpaka wasilyaya kontha waheela.
Nanso atthu enci yeewile nhupi ule yahokupali, mpaka uphiyera alopwana ilufu thanu.
Usa waya, yahothukumana uYerusalemu, akhulupale, mahumu o'ttiini ni mayowantikha malamulo a Nluku
wamoca ni Anasi nkhulupale o mayasataka, Kayifasi, Yohani, Alisantere ni othene yaari nrukulu na nkhulupale omayasataka.
Aheehanihinya Peturu ni Yohani wariyari waya, ni ukohaciya yiireliyaka: Nnopanka nnya citthu nnya ni ikuru cawani atthuna mwa ncina nawani?
Vano Peturu oocarene Nnepa Nttakattifu ahaakhula eeraka: Alamuli a atthu ni nyu mahumu, mwiiwe!
Wakhala wiira ilelo ninaakohaciya nlattu woompankela itthu yoorera nretta, ni mananna ciinryawe woovonihinya,

ncuwele nyu othene wamoca na atthu othene o'Sirayeli wiira, mwa ncina na Yesu Kristu, o'Nasaree, yooyo munkhomenlenyu, ni Nluku amunwelelihilyawe mwa atthu ookhwa, khweli mwa ncina nawe phivonihiyawe ula nlopwan'ola.
Yooyo Yesu uyo phiri nluku nikhottiye ni nyu mayoteka, nenno pheesiye ukhala nowookolela nlootho.
Khuuwo tho woopwa mwa nkina, kontha ilapo yo vathi khaniwo tho ncina nikina noovahiya na atthu ninlamuliya unoopola.
Vano, woona waya maakhulelo a Peturu ni Yohani, acuwelaka wiira ari atthu oohisoma ni oohisilimu, yahotikhinaca ni yahooneneliya wiira yeetta ni Yesu.
Umoonaca waya ntthu aavonihinye ule nari na ale, khayaarina tho nuulumo noovirikana.
Ukumihaciya waya mpwaroni mmwe, yahovaanela ayaayoru,
yiiraka: Naapankekeni ala alopwana ala? Kontha atthu othene ankhala uYerusalemu anaacuwela wiira yahopankaca nthoonyero woocuwannyaa ni khaninoorya ukhotta.
Nanso wowiira naateelihe urumaneeha wa atthu othene, noopopihace wiira ahinhimyacere tho ntthu nenno ncina nno.
Vano, yaheehanaca, ni yahaalamulelaca wiira ahuulumace ni ahisomihe mwa ncina na Yesu.
Peturu ni Yohani yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Nweheehe ila itthu ila wari inari yomaana wamiithoni wa Nluku, uwiiwelelani nyu wompwaha Nluku.
Kontha hi khaninoorya uhiya uttonka citthu coonnehu ni ciiwilehu.
Wahoolo anoopopihaciyene venci, yahaahiyaca, kontha khayoona mananna o waattarusa mwa nlattu wo'nethi, kontha othene yaananttottopela Nluku mwa nlattu w'etthu yeeranele,
kontha nlopwana aavonihinye wootikineeha ule ahaana woovikana myakha arupayini (40) ceyarelo.
Utthukulaciya waya, yahaaphavelaca asunnaya ni yahaattonkelaca citthu cothene coolumacilyaya akhulupale o mayasataka ni mahumu.
Vano ale wiiwa waya, yahowusaca ncu naya wo nkwaha mmoca anhimeryaka Nluku yiiraka: Apwiya, nyu phi nyu mpattusile irimu, itthaya, ipahari ni citthu cothene ciriwo.
Nhoolumaca mwa Nnepa Nttakattifu, wamalakuni wa Taviti, apaapehu, karumeya enyu, mwiiraka: Nlattuni aviruwacaka amalaponi, na atthu yuupuwelaka citthu coohi itthu?
Mamwene o mwiilaponi ahonwa, ni alamuli ahothukumana wiira yaanane Apwiya ni amwaanane mayotthapeliya aya.
Kontha weekhweli, yahothukumana yeela iparasa ila Heroti ni Ponsiyu Pilatu, wamoca amalaponi ni atthu o'Sirayeli, wiira amwaanane Nttakattifu, nrumeyi inyu Yesu yoole ntthapenlenyu,
wiira ampankace cothene cennyo, ntata ninyu ni utthuna winyu waalikelenlenyu wiira cikhumelele.
Vano Apwiya, moone woopopihaca waya ni mwaavahe arumeyi inyu wiira ahimyace nuulumo ninyu woohoovelela.
Mwaatalak'ono ntata ninyu wiira mwaavonihe aretta, mpanke mithoonyero ni malakalaka, mwa Ncina na nrumeyi enyu Yesu nttakattifu.
Vano waavekelaya, nahottettemela nipuro naathukumannyaya nno. Atthu othene wahaacara Nnepa Nttakattifu ni yaanaahimyaca n'upisihiya nrima nuulumo na Nluku.
Mphwinko wa atthu othene yaakupanli, yaarina moopuwelo ni nrima mmoca. Khula ntthu, khaawo eekhalihera itthu phi itthu iyo ukhala yawawe, nanso cothene caari ceemooca.
Amitthenka ayo yaanavaha usaahiti wo wunwelela Apwiya Yesu ni ikuru cinci, ni iraati yuulupale yaari na ale othene.
Wariyari waya khaariwo nanthwennya, maana ale yaarina imatta atthuna inupa caya, yatumihaka, yaanawiiha ncurukhu uyo,
ni yaanawaasunkiha amitthenka. Vano phikaweliyaka khula ntthu toko caaphavelawe.
Yusufu, yaanvahacilyaya amitthenka ncina na Parnapee, maanaya wiira mwana oopisiha nrima, nLevi ooyareela uSipere,
ukhala wiira ahaana imatta awe, ahotumiha, vano ahowaana ncurukhu uyo ni ahosunkiha wamettoni wa amitthenka.
Vano nlopwana mmoca ncina nawe Ananiya, na amwaarawe yeehaninya Safira, yahotumiha imatta aya.
Nanso aheewanana na amwaarawe uvitha ncurukhu nkin'oyo, ni waahanle uyo yahorweeha usunkiha wa amitthenka.
Vano Peturu ahonkoha eeraka: Ananiya, nlattuni unhiyaka Sotwani ucara wanrimani waa, mpaka we woothaca Nnepa Nttakattifu, ni wiivithelaka mphantte wo ncurukhu?
Vano yeeyo khayaakhala yawaa? Ni inatumihiye, ncurukhu uyo khawaakhala wawaa? Iwuupuwelihile isiyani upankaka yeeyo itthu iyo? Khawathepile atthu, nanso Nluku.
Vano Ananiya wiiwa wawe ala moolumo ala, ahowuluwa n'ukhwa. Wahaakela woova venci atthu othene yeewile ile yaakhumelenle ile.
Yahonwaca amirawo n'ukhuneelaca nrutthu ule, yahokusaca n'urwaana uvitha.
Cinavinrene iwora ttharu, yahokela amwaarawe, ahicuwelaka itthu yeeranele.
Vano Peturu ahaakoha eeraka: Nkihimerye, ula phi nttenko utumihilenyu imatta iyo? Ale yahaakhula yiiraka: Phi yooyo.
Vaavale Peturu aheerela: Nlattuni nleehanaka uttehatteha Nnepa wa Apwiya? Mooneke wankhora va, inyaa ca atthu yaarwanne umahiye awannyu, ciicammo ni nyu anaahala wuukusani.
Yooyo ukati uyo, yahowuluwela wamettoni wa Peturu ni ukhwa. Ukelaca waya amirawo ale, yaaphwanyile anakhwile, yahaakusaca n'urwaa waavitha nipuro naavithiye awannyaya.
Vano wahokela woova venci wakereca wothene ni atthu othene yeewile ihapari yeeranele ile.
Vano ikanyero ni cootikineeha cinci caanapankyaa mmatatani mwa amitthenka wariyari wa atthu. Othene yaakupanli, yaholemalela uthukumana wamoca, mpirothi mwa Salomoni.
Atthu akina ayo khayaatthuna waatakaneelana, nanso atthu ayo yaanttottopela citthu coorera.
Vaavale, ukati wothene, mphwinko wa amwaamini, alopwana na athiyana, weera wuncereryanaka mwa Apwiya,
mpaka yaanawaakusa aretta yaarwanaka mmaphironi yeesaka mmikorini ni mmarepani, wiira wanhalawe uvira Peturu, irunku awe yaakhuneele ni yaavonihe.
Ciicammo yaanawaaca atthu enci o maparasa cowaattamanana uYerusalemu, yaawanaka aretta aya mpaka ni ale yoopopihiya ni minepa coonanara, ni othene yaanavonihinya.
Nanso wunwa wawe nkhulupale o mayasataka na ale othene yaarinawe, maanaya wiira, nloko no masatusi, wahaakela urama,
yahaatthuka amitthenka ni waarweha ikalaposo ya atthu othene.
Nanso uhiyu, ncelo mmoca a Apwiya ahohula mikhora co'kalaposo nnyo, ahokumiheraca vate ni aheerelaca:
Nrwaaceke ni mweethoonyihereke wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, ni mwaahimyacere atthu ayo moolumo othene ookumi ala.

Vano wiiwa waya ala moolumo ala, waaseelyaya wicisuru yahokela wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni yahopacera usomiha. Nanso uphiya wawe nkhulupale o mayasataka na ale yaarinawe, yaholattula mphwinko wa akhulupale ni mahumu othene o'Sirayeli, ni yaholamula urweeliya amitthenka ukalaposo.
Nanso mayorontta warwacilyaya waaweha, khayaaphwanyacile nkalaposo mmo, ni uhokolyaca waya yahohimyaca yiiraka:
Niphwanyile ikalaposo iyo yootthukiyene ni ikattiyatto caya, ni mayorontta aneemelacile mmikhorani mwaya, nanso uhula wihu khaninphwanyile ntthu.
Vano weewilyawe nnya citthu nnya nhooleli o mayorontta o'nupa ittakattifu, ni akhulupale o mayasataka, yahotikhinaca yiiraka: Inhala ukhala isiyani yeeyo itthu iyo!
Woohipica wene, ahowa ntthu ni ahoolumaca eeraka: Atthu yaarwannenyu ukalaposo ayo ari wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu yaasomihaka atthu.
Vano arwaaka ni mayorontta, nhooleli uyo ahaawaana amitthenka woohinkhitto, kontha yaanawoovaca uvonyakaciya ni atthu.
Yahaawaanaca ni waathoonyera umphwinkoni wa akhulupale. Vano nkhulupale o mayasataka ahaakohaca eeraka:
Hi nihowaatelihani wiira nhisomihe tho ni nenno ncina nno, nanso vano, nhocariha nYerusalemu cineetthucihenyu ni nnophavela unootherya iphome awe yooyo nlopwan'oyo.
Vano, Peturu na amitthenka akhwawe yahaakhula yiiraka: Ninlamuliya umwiiwelela Nluku, woovikana atthu.
Nluku o mayapaapehu homunweleliha Yesu, yoole nyu mwiivilenyu, munthomyaka wansalapani.
Yooyo, Nluku homweesa moono nlopwana, homunnuwiha anvahaka ukhala Nkhulupale ni Moopoli, wiira avahe uSirayeli urukunusiya mirima ni uleveleliya wo'tampi.
Vano, hi n'asaahiti wo cennyo citthu nnyo mpaka ciicammo Nnepa Nttakattifu waavahilyawe Nluku ale anomwiiwelela.
Vano, ale wiiwaca waya, yahoviruwaca ni yaaphavela weevakaca.
Nanso ntthu mmoca o mphwinko wa akhulupale, nfarisi eehaninya Kamaliyeli, mwalimu o malamulo, oottittimihinya ni unethi wothene, aholamula ukumiheriya vate asilopwana ale ukati vakani.
Vaavale aheera: Annasirayeli, mwiinemecere itthu inkelenyu waapanka ala alopwana ala.

Kontha, ahinaphiya ala mahuku ala, ahokhumelela Tewutasi eehenle ukhala ittiitthu, ni wookhalaka atthu iminya cese ahaathukumaniha, nanso aheeviya, ni othene yaantthara yahomwaryaca ni khiiwo yaaphunryaya.
Ukhwa wawe Tewutasi, mahuku o ntthitto, ahowa Yuta, nkalileya, ni ahaakusa atthu enci. N'uyo ciicammo aheeviya, ni atthu othene yaantthara yahomwaryaca.
Phimaana, kinoohimeryani wiira: Nheerihe itthu ala alopwana ala, mwaahiyace. Kontha, wakhala wiira ala meetthuciho ala, atthuna ula nteko ula unkhuma wa atthu, unaakhwelakhwela.
Nanso, wakhala wiira unkhuma wa Nluku, nyu khannohala woorya ukwanyula, wiira ni nyu nhikhale toko nnomwaanana Nluku.
Vaavale yahonkupali yoole. Vano yaheehanaciya amitthenka ale ni yahaafyulaciya, alamuleliyaka wiira ahuulumace tho mwa ncina na Yesu, ni yahotthukulaciya.
Ale yahokhumaca upwaroni anatteeliyene, nlattu wo wooninya waaphwanela uhuvihiya mwa ncina na Yesu.
Mahuku othene, wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni mmatthokoni khayaahiyaca wiitthuciha n'unlalya Yesu Kristu.

Yaayo mahuku ayo, wuncererannyaa waya eetthuci, wahaawo uttokuttaninya wa ayuta yoolumaca ikereku yattokuttaka ayuta yoolumaca iparayiku, kontha minankhwele caya caanaliyalesiya khula nihuku naakawaninya iyolya.
Phimaana amitthenka khumi n'eeli ale, yahaathukumaniha eetthuci othene ni yaheerela: Khawanrera hi uhiya nuulumo na Nluku, wiira nivare nteko wo hutumu.
Nanso, asunnaka, mwaathanle, wariyari winyu alopwana saapa oorera nrima, oocara Nnepa Nttakattifu n'ankhili, yaayo phinhalehu waavaha ula nteko ula.
Nanso hi nteko ehu unhala ukhala woovekela ni wiitthuciha nuulumo na Nluku.

Mawooni ale yahaacivela atthu othene, ni ahothanliya Siteva, nlopwana oocara nroromelo ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, Filipe, Porokoru, Nikanora, Timona, Parmenasi ni Nikolayu o wAntiyokiya, ookela ittiini ya ayuta.
Ala yahothoonyiheriya wa amitthenka, ni ayo yaalompelelak'ono yahaathatela matata.
Ni nuulumo na Nluku naanawunnuwa, ni eetthuci yaanawuncererannya venci uYerusalemu, ni mayasataka menci yaanakupali n'uroromela.
Siteva, nari oocara nnema ni ikuru, aanapanka cootikineeha ni ikanyero cuulupale wariyari wa atthu.
Yahonwa atthu yaari o nsinakoka yeehaninya ootaphuliya, ni yo'Sirene, ni ya atthu o'Alisantiriya, o'Silisiya ni wo wAsiya, ni yahopacera unyakulihana ni Siteva.
Nanso khayoorya unvelaveliha ni moolumo, nlattu wo ankhili ni Nnepa waarinawe.
Vano yahothuminya atthu, wiira yuulumace yiiraka: Nihomwiiwa Siteva oolumacaka makufuru onnyohola Musa ni Nluku.
Vano wahonkuruma unethi ule, mahumu o'ttiini ni mayowantikha, ni yahontthukaca Siteva n'unrwaanaca upwaro wo mphwinko wa akhulupale.
Wonwo yaheesiya mayomootheryaca yaamwiirela: Ula nlopwan'ola, khanhiya wuulumaca, anyoholaka nipuro nittakattifu nna, wamoca ni Nlamulo.
Kontha nihomwiiwa eeraka: Yesu o'Nasaree, naahala ukwanyula nna nipuro nna, n'upittinkula ilema cinihiyenryawe Musa.
Vano othene yonkomacile mpwaroni, anweheehaka Siteva, yahoona ikhove awe inari toko ya ncelo.
Vano nkhulupale o mayasataka ahonkoha Siteva eeraka: Ciri ceekhweli cinootheriyaa nnyo?
Siteva ahaakhula eeraka: Asunnaka ni mayapaapa, nkiiwe! Nluku o waarya ahonkhumelela Aparahamu, athumwanihu, nari uMesopotamiya, hinaya uthamela uHarani,
ni ahomwiirela: Ukhume mwiilaponi mwaa, iriyari ya aloko aa, ni urwee ilapo inhalaka wuthoonyera.
Vano, ule ahothama ilapo yo'Kasiti ni ahorwaa ukhala uHarani. Wahoolo, ukhwa waya athumwane, Nluku ahommwiiha ila ilapo inkhalenyu ila ilelo.
Nluku khaammahile Aparahamu yoohiyeriya, hata ikhato yankani yo'lapo, nanso ahonkhuluveliha wiira wahoolo naahala ummaha ni nloko nawe, hata aanohikhalanaru mwana.
Vano Nluku aheera: Ucuulu aa unkokhala aletto ilapo ihiri yawaya, unkelaya upankiya ipottha ni uhuvihiya myakha iminya cese.
Nanso mi kinaahala uttarusa ilapo inhala wupankani ipottha iyo, ni wahoolo nnaahala ukhuma wonwo ni nnaahala ukilapela nenna nipuro nna.
Vaavale ahonvaha Aparahamu nleehano no'cantto. Ni Aparahamu ahonnyara Isaki ni ahomuuliha icantto nihuku nonanaane neyarelo. Wahoolo Isaki ahonnyara Yakopi, ni uyo ahoyara minaankolo khumi na miili.
Minaankolo cahonrama Yusufu, n'untumiha wIciipitu, nanso Nluku aari ni Yusufu.
Ahomoopola mmahuvihoni mothene ni ahonvaha nnema ni ankhili wamiithoni wa Farawoo, mwene o wIciipitu, aamweesile ukhala nlamuli o yeele ilapo ile ni wapuwani wothene wa amwene.
Vano yahovola itala wIciipitu wothene ni uKanaa, ni yeeyo, yahowaana uhuva venci, ni mayapaapehu khayoona iyolya.
Nanso, Yakopi wiiwa wawe wiira wIciipitu yahaawo iyolya, ahaaruma mayapaapehu, imaara yoopacera.
Ikwaha yonayeeli, Yusufu aheecuwaneeha wa asunnawe, ni aloko awe ale yahocuweliya ni Farawoo.
Vano, Yusufu ahoruma wiira arweeliye Yakopi athumwane na aloko awe othene, yaari atthu sapini na thanu (75).
Yakopi ahorwaa ilapo yo wIciipitu ni ahokhwela wonwo wamoca ni mayapaapehu.
Vaavale, mirutthu caya nnyo cahorwaninya uSikeni n'uvithiya mmahiye yaathumilyawe Aparahamu mwa asaana a Hamori uSikeni.
Vano waattamenryaya ukati wooviriha yaankhuluvelihilyawe Nluku Aparahamu, unethi wahonnuwa ni wuncererannyaa wIciipitu,
mpaka waakhumelenlyawe tho mwene nkina, ahaancuwela Yusufu.
Yoola mwene ula, ahaanyokhaca aloko ehu ni ahaatulumu mayathumwanihu, mpaka uhaawacawaca asaanaya ooyaryaa naanano, wiira ahikhale akumi.
Yooyo ukati uyo, phayarelyawe Musa, aari oorera wamiithoni wa Nluku. Cahovira myeeri miraru aleliyaka wapuwani wa athumwane.
Ukati wahinnyawe, mwana mwanthiyana a Farawoo ahonkusa ni ahonlelya toko mwanawe oonyara.
Musa ahosomihinya ucuwelaca wothene wo wIciipitu ni ahokhalana ikuru mmoolumoni ni mmitekoni cawe.
Ukati Waapiihenryawe myakha arupayini (40), ahoopuwela urwaa waathotola asunnawe annasirayeli.
Vano waamoonnyawe nlopwana mmoca ahuvihiyaka woohi isariya, ahomwaakiha ni ahonlivyaanihera munnaciipitu uyo mpaka umwiiva.
Musa ooniha wiira asunnawe ayo yaanacuwelela wiira Nluku nophavela woopola mwa uyo, nanso atthu ayo khayaacuwelenle itthu.
Usa waya, ahaattamerya annasirayeli eeli yaattakanaka, ni aaphavela waataniha, eeraka: Alopwana, nyu nri amuciru, nnaattakelana isiyani?
Nanso ule aamwaatta nkhwawe ule, ahonkakha Musa, eeraka: Tipani oopankile nlamuli ni hukhumu wariyari wihu?
Umphavela ukiiva, toko cimwiivilyaa ncana munnaciipitu ule?
Nlattu wo yaala moolumo ala, Musa ahotthawa n'urwaa ilapo yo'Mitiya waaryawe nletto. Wonwo waayanryawe asaana eeli.
Uvira waya myakha arupayini (40) ahophwanyiya ni ncelo nari itakhwa yo mwaako Sinayi wanikukhuni noopharela.
Vaavale woona wawe itthu ile, Musa ahotikhinaca. Vano aattameryaka wiira ooneehe, aheewa ncu na Apwiya niiraka:
Mi Phi Mi Nluku o mayathumwana, Nluku a Aparahamu, a Isaki ni a Yakopi. Musa athukumelacaka nlattu wo woova, khoorya uweheeha.
Vano Apwiya yahomwiirela: Urule ikwakwatta ciri nnyaani mwaa nnyo, kontha nipuro niryaa nna, niri nittakattifu.
Kontha kihooneeha uhuva wo'nethi aka wIciipitu, kiheewa wiipulela waya nwo ni kihokhuruwa wiira koopole. Vano uwe woono, kimphavela wuuruma wIciipitu.

Vano ula, phi yooyo Musa nkhottilyaya umwiiwelela amwiirelaka: Tipani oopankile nlamuli ni hukhumu? Yooyo, Nluku ahonruma ukhala nhooleli ni moopoli, akaviheriyaka ni ncelo aankhumelenle wanikukhuni noopharela.
Yooyo ahaakumiha atthu ale, wo mitikiniho ni mithoonyero caapankilyawe ilapo yo wIciipitu, mpharyaa mookhwiila ni ntakhwani, ukati wo myakha arupayini (40).
Ula, phi yooyo Musa aahimyacenre asaana a Sirayeli eeraka: Nluku naahala ummwaana nnapiyu wariyari wa asunninyu oolikana toko mii.
Ciicammo, phi yoola Musa aari mumphwinkoni ntakhwani, ni ncelo aamuulumanne nari mwaako wo Sinayi nari wamoca ni mayapaapehu. Yoole aakhenle moolumo makumi wiira anivahe.
Yoole, mayapaapehu yahaantthunnyaya umwiiwelela, nanso yahonhanyuriha, mpaka wanrimani waya yahoturuwelaca wIciipitu,
amwiirelaka Aroni: Unipankele anluku oohala unihoolela. Maana Musa nikumihile ilapo yo wIciipitu uyo, khanincuwela itthu inkhumelenle.
Yaayo mahuku ayo yahompankaca pontto o mwamope ni yahonvahaca isataka pontto ule ni yahotteeliya nlattu wo miteko caavanryaya ni matata aya.

Nanso Nluku ahaarerya ittuli ni waahiya alapelaka itthoottwa co wirimu, toko cantikhiyaya iliivuru yo minapiyu yiiraka: We itthoko ya Sirayeli, yoole ukati uvinre wo myakha arupayini (40) ule, uhotoko ukiivela inama n'ukivaha isataka ntakhwani?
Mena! Uhiya commo, nhothata ikhilompi ya Moloke, ni itthoottwa ya nluku inyu Refaa, anluku yaapankilenyu wiira mwaalapele. Phimaana kinawutamiherani uPapiloniya.
Heema o'saahiti aari wariyari wo mayapaapehu ntakhwani, toko caalamunlyawe Nluku anhimyaceraka Musa wiira ampanke anlikanihaka nthinto woonnyawe.
Mayapaapehu umwaakhela waya heema ule, yahonkusa ukati waarwaya ni Yosuwe uthawala ilapo ca amalaponi, cennyo coomonlyawe Nluku wariyari waya. Heema ule ahokhala wonwo mpaka ukati wa Taviti.
Yooyo ahophwanya nnema wamiithoni wa Nluku ni ahonvekela wiira aphwanye nipuro nookhala Nluku a Yakopi.
Nanso Salomoni phaantekenle inupa iyo.
Nanso Nluku Ooculu khankhala inupa cootekiya ni matata a atthu. Toko cihimilyawe nnapiyu eeraka:
Irimu phi ihice aka, ni itthaya phi ntthatto no'nyaa caka; hinnupani inhalenyu ukitekela, aneera Apwiya, atthuna unkokhala vayi nipuro naka noomumula?
Khaanakhala matata aka apankile nnya citthu nnya cothene?
Atthu oohanyuriha, ooturumaliha nrima ni ottiyamaru! Nyu ukati wothene nnaakhottela Nnepa Nttakattifu toko ciirihilyaya mayathumwaninyu ni nyu ciicammo nhopanka!
Nnapiyuni hinlupatthilyaya mayathumwaninyu? Mpaka aheevakaca ale yaapacenre uhimyaca uwa wa Nasariya, yooyo nyu nkhanlenyu anamakhuce ni anamwiiva.
Nyu mwaakhelenle Nlamulo mmatatani mwa ancelo, nanso khantthunne wiiwelela.
Vano ale wiiwa waya itthu ile, yahorusiya wanrimani waya ni yaanancekesera miino ule.
Nanso Siteva, nacanre Nnepa Nttakattifu, ahoweheeha wirimu ni ahoona waarya wa Nluku ni Yesu, aari moono nlopwana wa Nluku,
ni aheera: Nkoonani, irimu ihohulya ni Mwanawe Pinatamu eemenle, moono nlopwana wa Nluku.
Nanso ale yahokhuwaca wowiirunya, n'uttiyelela uwaru, ni othene weemara imoca yahontuphelaca.
Vaavale yahonkumihaca wasittatti vale, n'unvonyakaca. Ni asaahiti ale yahohiyaca ikuwo caya nnyaani mwa mmirawo mmoca eehaninya Saulu.
Vano waanvonyakacaya ni maluku, Siteva aholompa eeraka: Pwiya Yesu, mwaakhelele iroho aka!
Paahi, akhoromaka, ahokhuwela venci eeraka: Pwiya, nhaahukhumule mwa nlattu wo yeela itampi ila! Wuulumaca wawe commo, ahorupa.

Ciicammo Saulu ahorumeleliha wiiviya wa Siteva. Nenno nihuku nno, yahopacera ulupatthiya venci ikereca yo'Yerusalemu. Vano othene, waahiya amitthenka, yahomwaryeela mmittettheni co'Yuteya n'uSamariya.
Vano alopwana akina eemaani yahonsikha Siteva ni yahomunlela venci.
Nanso Saulu aankwanyulaca ikereca, akelaka khula inupa, ni aanawaakhupa alopwana na athiyana phaatthukelaka nkalaposo.
Toko commo, ale yaamwarusiye yaanalalya nhupi woorera wa Apwiya mapuro othene yaaviraya.
Vano Filipe ahorwaa iparasa yo'Samariya, ni aanlalyera ihaali ya Kristu.
Atthu othene yaanaaviriyana ratta citthu caahimyawe Filipe, yiiwelelaka ni woona mitikiniho caapankawe.
Kontha minepa coonanara caanawaakhuma anamacini enci, cikhuwelaka venci, ni atthu enci owuntakyaa ni ale oottumpela yahovonihinya.
Vano atthu ale othene yahotteeliya venci mparasa mmwe.
Ahaawo nlopwana mmoca eehaninya Simoni, aapankaca inyanka, aatikinihacaka atthu o'Samariya, eehelelaka ukhala ntthu muulupale.
Atthu othene, ukhuma asinkani, mpaka yaarina iyuulupale, yaanaanviriyana yiiraka: Ula ntthu ula ri ikuru ca Nluku, neehaninya, ikuru cuulupale.
Atthu enci yaanantthara, maana aapacenre khalayi waasintta ni inyanka cawe nnyo.
Vano, Filipe waalalyawe nhupi woorera woomwene wa Nluku ni wo ncina na Yesu Kristu, yahonkupali ni yahopattisiya alopwana na athiyana.
Mpaka Simoni ahokupali n'upattisiya, ni aanantthara Filipe woohinhiyahiya, ni noominye mwaano, aanaweheeha mithoonyero ni malakalaka yaapankiya.
Vano amitthenka yaari uYerusalemu yaheewa wiira uSamariya nihaakheleliya nuulumo na Nluku, yahaaveleeliha Peturu ni Yohani.
Waphilyaya, yahaavekelela wiira atthu ale yaakhele Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Maana uyo, waari uhinankhuruwela hata ntthu mmoca mwa ale. Yaapattisiye paahi, mwa ncina na Apwiya Yesu.
Vano Peturu ni Yohani yahaathatela matata ni ale yahaakhelaca Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Nanso woonnyawe Simoni wiira, mwa nlattu woothatela matata amitthenka, phimphwanyinyaya Nnepa Nttakattifu, ahaavaha ncurukhu,
eerelaka: Nkivahe ni mi cennya ikuru nnya, wiira khula ntthu nohalaka unthatela matata, aakhele Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Nanso Peturu ahomwaakhula eeraka: We ni ncurukhu aa uyo nrimelace, unooniha wiira ivahiya ya Nluku imphwanyinya ni ncurukhu?
We khurina mphantte ni khunoophwanela ula nteko ula, kontha nrima aa khuri ratta wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Urukunuse nrima ni uhiye yoonanara impankaa iyo, waavekele Apwiya, yatthunaka anawulevelela inoopuwelaa wanrimani waa.
Kontha kinoona wiira we hoocara yamwe owaawa, ni itampi aa ihootthukaca.
Nanso Simoni ahaakhula eeraka: Nkivekelele wa Apwiya, wiira cihikikhumelele cothene cinhimyenyu.
Vano anavahilene usaahiti ni ulalya nuulumo na Apwiya, yahoturuwelaca uYerusalemu ni yaanalalya nhupi woorera mmittettheni mothene mwa asamariya.
Vaavale, ncelo mmoca a Apwiya ahomwiirela Filipe: Wunwe ni urwee mphantte woohitto, uri iphiro yo wuuthakoni inkhuma uYerusalemu irwaaka uKasa.

Ule ahonwa ni ahorwaa. Ahonkumanana nlopwana mmoca o'Tiyopiya, aari nanhuninya ni aari nrumeyi muulupale, aawehaweha n'usunka mihakhu cothene ca Kanttasi, Apwiyamwene o'Tiyopiya. Aarweele ulompa uYerusalemu.
Vano waahokolyawe, nonkomilene nkaaroni mwawe, eera asomaka wowiiwannya, iliivuru ya nnapiyu Isaya.
Vano Nnepa wahomwiirela Filipe: Waattamerye ile ikaaro ile ni utthukane ikwaha.
Filipe ahotthawelela wonwo, ni ahomwiiwa asomaka iliivuru ya nnapiyu Isaya ni ahonkoha eeraka: We unawiiwaka insomaa iyo?
Nanso ule ahaakhula eeraka: Kaahala wiiweeha cani woohikhala ntthu ookihoolela? Vano ahomwiihana wiira awele Filipe nkaaroni ni amunkomane.

Vano cowantikhiya caariwo, nipuro naasomawe nno, caari phi nnya: Hokusiya toko ikhontwaa irwaaninyaka wa namwiiva, ni aari oomaala toko mwakhontwaa nari ni ntthu naacula, ciicammo ule khatthukunle malaku awe.
Waahuvihaciyawe ahothuwiya isariya. Tipani nohala woorya uttonka ucuulu awe? Maana uhokumihinya ukumi awe mwiilaponi mu.
Vano nanhuninya ule ahomwiirela Filipe: Kinawuvekela, ukihimerye: Nnapiyu ula nomwaaca pani? Neettonka mwanene, atthuna nomwaaca nkina?
Vano Filipe atthukulaka malaku awe, ni apaceraka usoma cowantikhiya nna nipuro nna, ahonlalyeera Yesu.
Wahoolo yeettacak'ono ni iphiro, yahophiyaca nipuro no maasi, nanhuninya ahoolumaca eeraka: Maasi ayo ph'ala. Inhiiha isiyani wiira kipattisiye?
Filipe aheera: Unawuuphwanela, wakupaliki ni nrima aa wothene. Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Kinaakupali wiira Yesu Kristu ri Mwanawe Nluku.
Vano aheemesiha ikaaro ile, ni oyeeli yahokelaca mmaasini mmwe, ni Filipe ahompattisa.
Vano waakhumacaya mmaasini mmwe, Nnepa wa Apwiya wahonkusa Filipe, mpaka nanhuninya ule khaamoonne tho, ni ule ahopwaherera ikwaha awe iyo nari ootteliyene nrima.
Vaavale Filipe aaphwanyannya ilapo yo wAsoto, ni apwahereraka aanvira alalyaka nuulumo na Apwiya mmaparasa mothene mpaka uphiya uSesareya.
Vano Saulu waatepawe woopopihera weeva eetthuci a Apwiya, ahorwaa wa nkhulupale o mayasataka,
ni ahovekela iwarakha, yo weettana mmasinakoka o'Tamasiku, wiira akela aaphwanyaka wonwo atthu anari Iphiro ya Apwiya, aatthukeke ni waarwaana uYerusalemu, hata akhale alopwana atthuna athiyana.
Vano eettaka ni iparapara, naattamenrye uTamasiku, wowaakuvyaca wene, wahomwareela waarya waakhuma wirimu, ni wahomwaleela nipuro naaryawe nne.
Vano ule ahowuluwela vathi ni aheewa ncu naamwiirela: Saulu, Saulu, unkilupatthelani?
Saulu ahonkoha: Tupani we, Pwiya? Uyo ahaakhula: Phi mi Yesu, unonlupatthaa.
Nanso wunwe ni ukele nsittatti mmo, unaahala uhimeriya itthu yoohala upanka.
Vano asikhunanawe ale, yaheemelaca ni woohuulumaca. Yaanawiiwa ncu nno, nanso khaawo yaamoonaya.
Vaavale Saulu ahonwa vathi vale. Vano waapattakunlyawe miitho khiiwo yoonawe. Avareliyaka ntata, ahokusiya mpaka uTamasiku.
Ahokhala mahuku mararu woohoona, ni yaayo mahuku ayo khaawunrye ni khaalilye itthu.
Vano uTamasiku ahaawo mwiitthuci mmoca eehaninya Ananiya. Ahohimeriya na Apwiya munttorani, yiiraka: Ananiya. Ni ule ahaakhula eeraka: Phi mi va, Pwiya!
Vaavale Apwiya yahomwiirela: Wunwe, ni urwee iphiro ineehaninya Yowookwa, waphiye inupa ya Yuta ni wamwaavyavye Saulu o'Tarsu, kontha neera aswaliki.
Nnyoonini, ahomoona akelaka nlopwana mmoca, neehaninya Ananiya, ni honthatela matata wiira ahokoleele woona.
Nanso Ananiya ahaakhula eeraka: Pwiya, atthu enci kinaweewesa mwaha wa yooyo nlopwana uyo, khacimala citthu coonanara cinaapankawe attakattifu inyu uYerusalemu.
Uyo wile uno ni iwarakha ivahiyawe na akhulupale o mayasataka wiira aatthuke othene anromola ncina ninyu.
Nanso Apwiya yahomwiirela: Urwee, kontha mi kihonthanla ula nlopwan'ola wiira akuse ncina naka arwaane iriyari ya amalaponi ni wo mamwene, ni ciicammo wa asaana o'Sirayeli.
Kontha mi kinaahala unthoonyera mananna anhalawe uhuva nlattu wo ncina naka.

Wahoolo Ananiya ahorwaa. Vano ukela wawe mpaani mmwe, ahonthatela matata, amwiirelaka: Munnaka Saulu, Apwiya Yesu, yukhumelenle ni iphiro waawaa uno, ahokiruma wiira uturuwele woona ni wuucare Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Wowaakuvyaca wene cahomora mmiithoni mwawe citthu cookhala toko makahapapa, ni ahoturuwela woona. Wahoolo ahonwa ni ahopattisiya.
Ni ulya wawe, yahonlipa makhuva ni ahokhala uTamasiku mahuku vakani nari wamoca ni eetthuci ale.
Woohipica, Saulu ahopacera unlalya Yesu mmasinakokani, arumelelihaka wiira uyo mwana a Nluku.

Vano othene yaamwiiwa yaanatikhinaca yiiraka: Khanakhala ula phi yoole aamalamaliha uYerusalemu atthu anlapela nenna ncina nna? Ni uno khaweenle waavara ni waatthuka wiira aarweehe wa akhulupale o mayasataka?
Nanso Saulu aanatepa wiikurumica ulalya, aavirikanihaka ankhili ayuta yaakhala uTamasiku, athoonyiheraka wiira Yesu phiri Kristu.
Uvira waya mahuku menci, ayuta yahovaanela ayaayoru umwiiva.
Nanso itthu yaaleehannyaya aheewa Saulu. Uhiyu n'uthana yaanankhalelela mmikhorani wiira amwiive.
Nanso eetthuci awe yahonkusa uhiyu ntthuttuni, ni yahonkuruselaca ni iluwani.
Uphiya wawe uYerusalemu, ahotteha utakaneela n'eetthuci, nanso othene yaanamoova ni khayaakupali wiira uyo khweli hokhala mwiitthuci.

Nanso Parnapee, ahonkusa ni ahonrweha wa amitthenka ni ahaattonkela ceenryawe wowoonanana Apwiya ni iphiro, ni ceenryaya woomuulumacera, ni mananna ceenryawe wowuulumaca n'ulipa irima mwa ncina na Yesu uTamasiku.
Ahaakhalanaca wamoca uYerusalemu, eettanaka mapuro othene, oolumacaka n'ulipa irima mwa ncina na Apwiya.
Aanawuulumaca ni waanyakulihanana ayuta yoolumaca ikereku, nanso ale yaaphavela umwiiva.
Vano yeeyo itthu iyo, wiiwaca waya amwaamini, yahonkusaca mpaka uSesareya ni wonwo yahonveleeliha uTarsu.
Vano ikereca cothene, ukhuma uYuteya, uKalileya mpaka uSamariya, cahokhala co'salama, caanalipihereriya, cuncererannyaka, ceettaka ni waahisima Apwiya n'upisihiya nrima ni Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Vano Peturu aviraka miphantte cothene, ciicammo ahokhuruwela wa attakattifu yaakhalaca uLita.
Wonwo ahomphwanya nlopwana mmoca, eehaninya Inenyasi, nari wankorini wookhalaka myakha naane, kontha aari owuntakyaa.
Peturu ahomwiirela: Inenyasi, Yesu Kristu nawuvoniha! Wunwe ni utthenkemanihe nkori aa. Ule wowaakuvyaca wene ahonwa.
Vaavale yahomoonaca atthu othene yaakhala uLita ni uSarona, mpaka na ale yahaakupali Apwiya.
Vano uYopa ahaawo mwiitthuci mmoca nthiyana eehaninya Tapita, nna ncina nna nataphuleliyaka, maanaya wiira Torka. Aanvara miteko coorera ni aari ntthu oovaha.
Yaayo mahuku ayo, ahowerennya ni ahokhwa. Vano narapihiyene, ahaataleliya wansana nooculu.
Ukhala wiira uLita waari wakhiviru n'uYopa, vano weewilyaya eetthuci wiira Peturu aari wonwo, yahaarumaca alopwana eeli urwaa unlepela yiiraka: Unaakuvele woohipica.
Peturu ahotthuna ni ahaatthukana ikwaha. Uphiya wawe, ahoveleeliya nsana no'culu. Minankhwele cothene cahonrukurerya, cunlaka ni cinthoonyiheraka ikuwo caapankawe Torka ukati waaryawe ni yaayo.
Nanso Peturu ahaakumiha atthu othene, ahokhoroma ni ahovekela. Vano arukunuwelaka nrutthu aheera: Tapita, wunwe! Ule ahopattakula miitho ni wamoonyawe Peturu ahonkoma.
Vano uyo ahommara ntata ni ahonwusa. Wahoolo aheehana attakattifu ni minankhwele. Ahaathoonyihera nari nkumi.
Vano yeeyo yaheewannyaa uYopa wothene, ni atthu enci yahaakupali Apwiya.
Vaavale Peturu ahokhala uYopa mahuku menci, uwannyawe mayottuttha marapala, eehaninya Simoni.
Ahaawo nlopwana mmoca aakhala uSesareya, eehaninya Koroneliyu, aari nhooleli a anatoropa, weehaninya nkupitti wo wItaliya.
Aari nattiini oomoova Nluku ni ntthoko nawe nothene. Aanawaavaha atthu icimola cinci ni aananvekela Nluku woohihiyerera.
Nihuku nimoca, wookhalaka ukati woneeraru woococilo, nlopwan'ola ahomoona ratta nnyoonini ncelo mmoca a Nluku namwaattamenrye amwiirelaka: Koroneliyu!
Ule ahonweheeha ni ahomoova venci, ahonkoha eeraka: Isiyani, Pwiya? Vano ncelo ule ahomwiirela: Mavekelo aa ni icimola caa cihowela ni ciri coohiliyaliya ni Nluku.
Vano, waarume alopwana uYopa wiira eehaninye Simoni eehaneliyaka tho ncina na Peturu.
Yooyo makile wa Simoni mayottuttha marapala, ni inupa awe iri wakhiviru ni ipahari.
Vaavale athamakaru ncelo aamuulumana ule, pheehanawe ananteko awe eeli ni natoropa mmoca nattiini, aari wa yaale yaanvarela nteko.
Vano ahaattonkacera cothene ni ahaarumaca uYopa.
Waasilyaya nihuku nikhwawe, yeettaka ni iphiro, ni anaattamenrye usittatti, wookhalaka iwora yoothana, Peturu ahowela wataratoni wiira aswali.
Yahonvola itala, aanaphavela ulya, nanso ukati waapyaceriyawe, yahomphwanya iwiriphi.
Vano ahoona irimu inahulyeele ni iwaaka itthu yookhala toko ikuwo yuulupale inatthukiye malootho oomacese ikuruseliyaka vathi.
Cahaawo inama cothene co metto micese, cowiipurula co vathi ni inuni co wirimu.
Ni aheewa ncu nimwiirelaka: Wunwe Peturu! Wiive ni ukhure.
Nanso Peturu ahokhotta eeraka: Mena vakani, Pwiya! Kontha akinapaca ukhura itthu yo'haramu ni yo mwiikho.
Imaara yonayeeli nahowa tho ncu nimwiirelaka: Ile ipankilyawe Nluku ukhala yo'halali, uhiihane iharamu.
Yeeyo itthu iyo yaheerannyaa imaara ttharu, ni wowaakuvyaca wene ikuwo ile yahoturuseliya wirimu.
Vano Peturu oopuwelaka n'usanka maanaya iyooni ile, wowaakuvyaca wene, yaale asilopwana yaaruminye ni Koroneliyu ale yahowaaca akohakohaka inupa ya Simoni ni yaheemelaca wakhiviru nkhora.
Vaavale yaanawiihana n'ukohakoha yiiraka: Vaava homaka nlopwana neehaninya Simoni, aarina tho ncina na Peturu?
Oopuwelaka Peturu mwaha wo'yooni yaamphwanyile, vano Nnepa wahomwiirela: Ahowaaca alopwana araru anawuphavela.
Wunwe, ukhuruwe ni waatthukane ikwaha woohaakanyaca itthu, kontha phi mi kaarumile.
Vano Peturu ahokhuruwa wiira oonanane alopwana ale, ni aheera: Nhokiphwanyaca. Phi mi nnokiphavelenyu. Mwaweela isiyani?

Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Nhooleli a anatoropa neehaninya Koroneliyu, nlopwana o'sariya ni oomoova Nluku ni rina usaahiti womaana ilapo yothene yo'Yuteya, holakiheraciya ni ncelo nttakattifu wiira awiihane uwannyawe ni eewe moolumo aa.
Vaavale Peturu ahaakharipulelaca mpaani ni ahaavaha mapuro oomaka. Waasilyaya nihuku nikhwawe, ahonwa ni ahaatthukana ikwaha. Ciicammo asunna akina yaakhala uYopa yahonrwaana.
Usa waya ahophiya uSesareya. Koroneliyu aanawaawehererya naathukumanne na amuci awe ni asimpwana awe aakhuluvelawe.
Vaavale Peturu waaphilyawe, ahaakheleliya ni Koroneliyu, ni ule ahonkhoromela mmettoni mwawe n'unlapela.
Nanso Peturu ahommusa eeraka: Wunwe, ni mi ciicammo kipinatamu.
Amuulumanak'ono ahokela ni ahaaphwanya atthu enci anathukumanne mwemmwe,
ni aheerela: Nyu nnaacuwela wiira unawaateelihiya nyuta untakaneelana atthuna umwaattamanana ntthu o'khapila ikina. Nanso Nluku hokithoonyera wiira uhimwiirele hata ntthu mmoca nharamu.
Phimaana wiihaninya waka kiwaaka woohikhotta. Nanso kinawukohani wiira mwaakiihanelani?

Vano Koroneliyu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Ilelo anaaphiyera mahuku macese, kiswaliki uwanyaka mpaka yoola ukati ula, umpiheraya woneeraru yocoocilo. Wowaakuvyaca wene ahowa waaryaka mi nlopwana mmoca oowara ikuwo co wooneela
ni aheera: Koroneliyu, mavekelo aa ayo aheewiya, ni coovaha caa cihophiya ni khacinliyaliya ni Nluku.
Vano unrume ntthu uYopa wiira amwiihane Simoni neehaninyaka Peturu; makile inupa ya Simoni namattuttha marapala, ri wakhiviru ni ipahari.
Phimaana, woohipica, kihoruma wiihaninya we, ni uhopanka ratta wawilyaa va. Vano, hi othene niri va, wamiithoni wa Nluku, niri tayari wiira niiwe citthu cothene cilamuleliyaa ni mphantte wa Apwiya.
Vaavale, Peturu ahoolumaca eeraka: Kinaakupali weekhweli wiira Nluku kharina wahawulaniha atthu.
Nanso, wo khula ilapo, yoole nomoova ni nopanka co'sariya nawaamininya.
Nuulumo naavelelihenryawe Nluku asaana o'Sirayeli, naahimeryaka nhupi woorera wo'salama mwa Yesu Kristu: Uyo phiri Apwiya a atthu othene.
Nyu nnaacuwela nuulumo nihimyaciye uYuteya wothene, nipaceraka uKalileya, unavinrene upattiso waalalyawe Yohani.
Mananna Nluku cintthapenlyawe Yesu o'Nasaree ni ikuru ni Nnepa Nttakattifu. Yoole eettile miphantte cothene, apankaka yoorera ni aavonihaka othene yaahuvihiya ni sotwani, maana Nluku aari ni yooyo.
Vano phi hi asaahiti o citthu cothene cipankilyawe mwiilaponi yo'Yuteya ni uYerusalemu. Yooyo aamwiivilyaya mpaka unthomya wansalapani,
Nluku homunweleliha nihuku noneeraru ni apankenle wiira ooninye,
woohikhala na atthu othene, nanso na asaahiti yaathanliye woopacera ni Nluku, maanaya wiira phi hi ninlyanne n'ummuryana wamoca, nonwelenlene mwa atthu ookhwa.
Uyo honiruma waalaleerya ni waattonkeleeha atthu othene wiira yooyo phithanliye ni Nluku ukhala hukhumu a atthu akumi ni ale ookhwa.
Mwa yooyo, minapiyu cothene cinanvahera usaahiti ciiraka: Mwa ncina nawe, othene yaale anonkupali anaahala uleveleliya itampi caya.
Peturu oolumacak'ono nnya citthu nnya phaamorelaya Nnepa Nttakattifu atthu othene yeewa nuulumo nno.
Amwaamini ayuta yaawile ni Peturu, yahotikhinaca nlattu wo waamorela amalaponi ivahiya yo Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Kontha yaanaweewa yuulumacaka iluuka cootikineeha, ni amunnuwihaka Nluku.
Phimaana Peturu ahokoha eeraka: Nawoorya ntthu waathuwa maasi wiira ahipattisiye? Ala ari toko hi naakhenle Nnepa Nttakattifu!
Vaavale aholamula wiira apattisiye mwa ncina na Yesu Kristu. Paahi, ale yahonlepela wiira aakhalane mahuku vakani.
Yooyo ukati uyo, amitthenka wamoca na asunna yaari uYuteya yaheewaca wiira: Ciicammo amalaponi ahaakhela nuulumo na Nluku.
Vano warwelyawe Peturu uYerusalemu, ahonyakulihanana mphwinko wa anacantto
yiiraka: Uhokela mmapaani mwa alopwana oohuula ni uhaalyana.
Nanso Peturu ahopacera waataphulela nuulumo nno toko ceeranele aya, eeraka:

Mi kaari isittatti yo'Yopa, vano kivekelak'ono yahokiphwanya iwiriphi ni iyooni. Kahoona itthu imoca yookhala toko ikuwo yuulupale yootthukiya malootho macese ikhuruwaka wirimu ni yahophiya mpaka waaryaka.
Vano wawehilyaka nhina waya mmo, kahoona inama co mwiilaponi, co metto micese, masene, cowiipurula ni asaanuni o wirimu.
Vano kaheewa ncu nimoca naakiirela: Wunwe, Peturu! Wiive ni ukhure.
Vano mi kahaakhula kiiraka: Mena vakani, Pwiya! Kontha khinapaca ukela wamalakuni waka, itthu yo'haramu ni yo mwiikho.
Nanso imaara yonayeeli, nahokaakhula ncu nookhuma wirimu niiraka: Uhiihane tho we iharamu itthu ipankilyawe Nluku ukhala yo'halali.
Yeeyo yaheerannyaa imaara ttharu, ni, wahoolo cothene cahoturuseliya wirimu.
Wowaakuvyaca wene, yooyo ukati uyo yaheemelaca wakhiviru inupa yaarihu asilopwana araru yaakhumaca uSesareya wiira yakoonanane mi.
Vaavale Nnepa wahokiirela kaarwane woohaakanyaca. Yahorwaaca ni mi, ciicammo asunnaka siita ale ni nahokela mpaani mwa nlopwan'ole.
Vano ule ahonihimerya ceenryawe womoona ncelo neemenle uwannyawe ni ceereliyawe: Umwiihanihe uYopa Simoni, neehaninya Peturu.
Yooyo nohala wuhimerya moolumo, yaayo anhala uwoopola we ni itthoko aa yothene.
Ukati waapacenryaka wuulumaca, wahaakhuruwela Nnepa Nttakattifu, toko waanikhuruwenlyaya hi wiipaceroni.
Vano, kahoopuwela nuulumo na Apwiya, ukati wenryaya: Yohani hopattisa ni maasi, nanso nyu nnokopattisiya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Maana, wakhala wiira Nluku haavaha ivahiya imocaru inivahilyawe ukati waaminiihu Apwiya Yesu Kristu, mi kaari pani oophwanela unkhottela Nluku?
Vano ale wiiwa waya nnya citthu nnya, yahothova ni yahonttottopela Nluku yiiraka: Maanaya, Nluku ciicammo haavaha amalaponi urukunusa nrima wiira aphwanye ukumi.
Vano ale yaamwaryacile nlattu wo mahuviho yaapankiyawe Siteva, yahophiyaca mpaka uFenisiya, uSipere ni wAntiyokiya. Yaahimyacenre paahi nuulumo nno, ayuta.
Nanso akina ayo yaari o'Sipere ni o'Sirene, yaayo yahorwaaca mpaka wAntiyokiya, ciicammo yaanawoolumana akereku, yaahimeryaka nhupi woorera wa Apwiya Yesu.
Ntata na Apwiya naari na ale ni enci yaaminni yaheevaherera wa Apwiya.
Ihapari caya ale caheewannyaa ukereca yaari uYerusalemu. Phimaana yahonrumaca Parnapee urwaa wAntiyokiya.
Ule uphiya wawe ni oonaka nnema na Nluku, ahotteeliya ni waapisiha nrima othene wiira akhanyerere mwa Apwiya ni nrima wothene.
Kontha aari nlopwana omaana, oocara Nnepa Nttakattifu ni oororomela. Vaavale atthu enci yahowiihiya wa Apwiya.
Wahoolo Parnapee ahokhuma arwaaka uTarsu umwaavya Saulu.

Vano umphwanya wawe, ahonkusa anrwaanaka wAntiyokiya. Wookhalaka wo mwakha mmoca wothene, yaanathukumana yeele ikereca ile ni yaanawiitthuciha miphwinko cinci. Vaavale, wAntiyokiya eetthuci yaheehaninya akristu imaara yoopacera.
Yaale mahuku ale, cahokhumaca minapiyu uYerusalemu cirwaka wAntiyokiya.
Ahonwa mmoca mwa ale, eehaninya Akapu, ahaahimyacera ni ikuru co Nnepa Nttakattifu wiira inaahala uwa itala yuulupale mwiilaponi mothene, ni iyo yahokhumelela ukati wa Sesari Kalautiyu.
Vano eetthuci, wo khula ntthu ni citthu caarinawe, yaholakela waaveleelihera cowaakavihera asunna yaakhalaca uYuteya.
Commo yahopanka, yaaveleeliheraka mahumu coovaha caya, mmatatani mwa Parnapee ni Saulu.
Yooyo ukati uyo, mwene Heroti ahoruma wiira atthukiye atthu o'kereca akina ayo wiira aatulumu.
Vaavale ahoruma wiira eeviye Yakopu munnawe Yohani ni ikatana.
Vano woonnyawe wiira itthu iyo ihaacivela ayuta, ahopwaherera ni ahontthukiiha Peturu. Yaari mahuku o'sikuhuulu yo mikatthe coohi miropo.
Nantthukiihilene, ahonvonyera nkalaposo. Vano ahonvaherera wiira asunkiye ni miphwinko micese caarina anatoropa acese wo khula mphwinko, aphavelaka unhukhumu waatthuni, wumaleloni Paasikuwa.
Peturu ahotthukeliya nkalaposo, nanso ikereca mwa nlattu wa Peturu yaanavekela Nluku woohihiyerera.
Ukati waaphavelawe Heroti unhukhumu waatthuni, yooyo uhiyu uyo, Peturu aanrupa wariyari wa anatoropa eeli, natthukiye n'unyolo miili, ni mayorontta o wankhora yaanaakhaliha awehawehaka ikalaposo iyo.
Nananoru, ahowa ncelo a Apwiya ni waarya wahomwaleela ikalaposo iyo. Uyo ahonkwanya Peturu mmarupelani ni ahommusa eeraka: Wunwe wowaakuvya! Vano unyolo ule wahomora mmyoononi mmo.
Ncelo ule ahomwiirela: Wiitthukele ni uware ikwakwatta. Ule ahopanka. Wahomwiirela tho: Uware ikacako ni ukitthare.
Vano akhumaka, ahonttharelela, hicuwelaka wiira yaari yeekhweli itthu yeerannyaa nlattu wa ncelo; ooniha toko nttora.
Yahompwaha mayorontta oopacera ni onayeeli, yahophiyaca wankhora wo'yuma waari mphantte wo'sittatti, yoole weehulyeele, ni akhumaka, yahohapuwelaca mparaparani. Wahoolo ncelo ule ahonhiya.
Vaavale Peturu ahokhakammwa ni aheera: Vano kihocuweleeha wiira Apwiya ahonruma ncelo aya ni hokoopola mmatatani mwa Heroti ni citthu cothene caawehereryaya ayuta.
Vano ukhakammwa wawe, ahorwaa uwannyawe Mariya, anumwane Yohani, eehaninya Marku. Wenwe yahothukumana atthu enci avekelaka.
Ukati waattilyawe nkhora, ahowa nanteko mwanthiyana eehaninya Rote wiira ancuwele ntthweene.
Waacuwelenlyawe ncu na Peturu, ahotteeliya venci cinene mpaka uhinhulela, nanso ahoturuwa atthimakacaka wiira ahimyace wiira Peturu ri wankhora.
Vano ale yahomwiirelaca: Uhovahuwa. Nanso ule aanakhanyerera eeraka, Peturu phiri wankhora! Vano yaheeraca: Ncelo awe uyo!
Nanso Peturu aampwaherera waatta nkhora, vano ale yahohulaca ni yahomoona ni wooma mwaano.

Wahoolo ule athoonyathonyaka ni ntata, aheerelaca: Mmaale! Vano ahaattonkacera mananna cikumihinyawe na Apwiya nkalaposo ni aheera: Mwanhimyacere nnya citthu nnya Yakopu na asunna. Ukhuma wawe vale ahorwaa nipuro nikina.
Usa waya, anatoropa yahonyakulihana venci nlattu w'etthu yaamwiiraneele Peturu.
Vano Heroti ahomwaavyavya ni woohimphwanya, ahaakohakoha mayorontta ni aholamula wiira yiivakaciye. Vano akhumaka uYuteya ahorwaa uSesareya, ni ahokhala wonwo mahuku vakani.

Heroti ahaarusanana atthu yaakhala uTiru ni uSitoni. Vano ale wiiwanana waya, othene yahorwaa umoonanana. Yaapacenre umuulumana toko Palastu, nanteko muulupale a mwene, ni yahonlepela uvarana myoono, kontha ilapo aya iyo yaahepheliya ni ilapo ya mwene.
Nihuku naaleehaninye, Heroti nawanrene ikuwo co'mwene, nonkomile wahiceni, ahoolumacera atthu ale.
Vano yaankhuwela yiiraka: Nna ncu nna na nluku, khanihimwe na ntthu!
Yoole ukati ule, ncelo a Apwiya ahonrakaliha, nlattu woohinttittimiha Nluku, ni aholiya na asunku ni ahokhwa.
Phimaana nuulumo na Apwiya naanawunnuwa ni wuncererya.
Parnapee ni Saulu, umaliha waya nteko aya, yahoturuwaca uYerusalemu, antthukanaka ikwaha Yohani, neehaninya Marku.
Ikereca yo wAntiyokiya cahaawo minapiyu ni aalimu: Parnapee, Simeyoni, eehaninya Niyeri, Lusiyu nsirene, Manahemu, onnuwile wamoca ni nlamuli Heroti, ni Saulu.
Ukati waavekelaya Apwiya n'utthuka, Nnepa Nttakattifu waheera: Nkaawayanihere Parnapee ni Saulu wiira avare nteko weehanenlyaka.
Vano atthukaka, avekelaka ni yaathatelaka matata, yahaaveleelihaca.
Saulu ni Parnapee anaveleelihiyene ni Nnepa Nttakattifu yahorwaaca uSalusiya ni yaholapuwela uSipere.
Uphiyaca waya uSalamina, yaanlalyaa nuulumo na Nluku mmasinakokani ca ayuta. Ciicammo yaari ni Yohani nkaviheri.
Vano uvira waya wacivirini yothene mpaka uPafu, yahomphwanyaca nyuta nanyanka, nnapiyu owootha, eehaninya Paryesu.
Aari ni nlamuli Sersiyu Paulu, nlopwana oocuwelaca. Yooyo ahoruma wiihaninya Parnapee ni Saulu, kontha aanaphavela wiiwa nuulumo na Nluku.
Nanso nanyanka Elimasi, kontha ciicammo phaataphuleliyaya ncina nawe nno, aanawaavanyiha, aphavelaka wiira nlamuli ule hikupali nuulumo na Nluku.
Nanso Saulu, ciicammo eehaninya Paulu, nacanre Nnepa Nttakattifu ahonweheeha nanyanka Elimasi aheera:
We mwana a Sotwani uhoocara wootha ni coonanara, mwiinani o'sariya cothene! Khunhiya upahula iphiro ca Apwiya ciri co wookwa?

Phimaana nno va nihooweela ntata na Apwiya ni unaahala ukhala oohoona, uhoonaka ncuwa ukati vakani. Nananoru, yahomphwanya itthapwe n'uripela ni arukureryacaka, aanamwaavya ntthu oohala unvarela ntata.
Vano, nlamuli ule woona wawe itthu yeeranele ile, ahokupali n'utikinihinya ni miitthuciho ca Apwiya.
Vano akhumaka uPafu, Paulu ni asikhunanawe yahorwaaca uPerike yo'Panfiliya. Wahoolo Yohani aahiyacaka ale, ahoturuwela uYerusalemu.
Nanso ale, akhumaka uPerike yaholapuwela wAntiyokiya yo'Pisitiya. Vano nihuku no ntivela yahorwaaca usinakoka ni yahonkomaca.
Usominya waya Nlamulo ni Minapiyu, akhulupale o nsinakoka yaheerelaca: Asunnaka, wakhala wiira nhaana nuulumo no waalaka atthu ala, nhimyaceke.
Paulu ahonwa ni ahowusa ntata wiira umaaliye, eeraka: Alopwana o'Sirayeli ni nyu asenci nnomoova Nluku, mwiiwe!
Nluku o yoola unethi wo'Sirayeli ula, ahaathanla mayathumwanihu ni ahaattittimiha ukati waaryaya ilapo yo wIciipitu, waakumihilyawe ni ikuru cawe.
Ciicammo ahaavilela wookhalaka myakha arupayini (40) anari ntakhwani.
Vano ahokwanyula maloko saapa o'Kanaa ni ahaavaha ila ilapo ila ukhala yawaya.
Cahokhala myakha iminya cese wo hansini (450). Cinamanlene nnya citthu nnya, ahaathanla ahukhumu mpaka nnapiyu Samuweli.
Vano ale yaholepela wiira avahiye mwene, ni Nluku ahaavaha Saulu, mwana a Kisi, o nihimo na Pencamii, ni uyo aholamula myakha arupayini (40).
Nanso Nluku ahonkhotta mwene Saulu, ahaawaanela mwene Taviti, ni yooyo ahommahera usaahiti eeraka: Kihomphwanya Taviti mwana a Yesee, nlopwana notthara nrima aka, nohala upanka intthunaka yothene.
Munlokoni mwawe yoola nlopwan'ola, Nluku hommwaana uSirayeli Moopoli neehaninya Yesu, toko caakhuluvelihilyawe Nluku.
Vano hinaya uwa Yesu, Yohani aholalyeera upattiso woorukunusa nrima wa atthu othene o'Sirayeli.
Nanso Yohani waamaliherawe miteko cawe aheera: Akihimwe phi mi ule nonlikanihenyu. Nanso uhoolo waka mi naahala uwa ule hinkiphwanela mi untthukula miripwe co'kwakwatta cawe.
Asunnaka nri asaana o nloko na Aparahamu ni nyu asenci nnomoova Nluku, wa hi nihoveleelihiya nuulumo ninhimyaca woopwa.
Atthu yaakhala uYerusalemu ni alamuli aya ahincuwelaka Yesu, ukati waanhukhumwaya yahottharihelela caahimyaya minapiyu cinsomesiya mahuku othene o ntivela.
Hata yanohiphwanyaru ikoosi yophwanelanyaa wiiviya, yahonlepelaca Pilatu wiira eeviye.
Vaavale cineeranelene cothene cantikhiye ni caamwaaca, yahontamihaca wamwirini ni yahonsikhaca mmahiye.
Nanso Nluku homunweleliha wa atthu ookhwa.
Vaavale Yesu ahooninya mahuku menci ni atthu yaakhumanyawe uKalileya arwaaka uYerusalemu. Yaayo nna co, phiri asaahiti iriyari yo'nethi.
Hi ninoohimeryani nhupi woorera: Itthu yaakhuluvelihiyaya mayapaapehu,
yeeyo Nluku hottharihelela wariyari wihu hi asaanaya, amunwelelihaka Yesu toko cantikhiyaya ncipo nonayeeli nliivuruni yo macipo niiraka: We uri mwanaka, mi ilelo kihooyara.
Commo Nluku homunweleliha wariyari wa atthu ookhwa wiira huntte, wo yaala mananna ala aheera: Mi kinawuvahani iparakha cittakattifu ni ceekhweli caakhuluvelihiyawe Taviti.
Phimaana mphantte nkhwawe wo'cipo wiiraka coo: Khunhala unhiya Nttakattifu aa onttaka mmahiye.
Kontha, Taviti nahoolenlene unethi toko caatthunnyawe Nluku, horupa ni haatthara mayathumwane ni hontta.
Nanso ule munwelelihilyawe Nluku khonttile.
Vano asunnaka, ncuwele wiira nyu nnohimeriya uleveleliya wo'tampi mwa yooyo.
Ni mwa yooyo othene ale anonkupali, anaaphwanya isariya wo citthu cothene, cennyo cahooryaya uphwanya ni Nlamulo na Musa.
Vano mwiikasoope, wiira ihukhumeleleni ile ihiminye ni minapiyu:
Nkoonani nyu mayotarawa, ntikinihinye ni nrimyarimye, maana iriyari yo mahuku enyu yaala mi kinaapanka miteko caahalenyu uhikupali ntthu oottonkelakani.
Vano waakhumacaya nsinakoka, yahaavekelaca wiira nihuku no ntivela nimmwa, yawaahimerye tho yaale moolumo ale.
Umala waya nkuttano ule, ayuta enci na ale yeevaherenre ittiini ya ayuta, yahontthara Paulu ni Parnapee. Yaayo yaanalipihera yaahimeryaka wiira akhanyerere nnema na Nluku.
Vano ntivela nkina uyo, yahothukumana atthu othene o nsittatti mmwe, wiira yowiiwe nuulumo na Apwiya.
Nanso ayuta, woonnyaya atthu enci ale, wahaacara urama, ni atarawaka, yaanaavanyiha itthu yaahimyawe Paulu.

Vano Paulu ni Parnapee, yahoolumaca woohipupha yiiraka: Mwaalamuliya upacera nyu uhimeriya nuulumo na Nluku, nanso va nnaakhotta. Vano nheehukhumu mwasinene wiira khawuphwanenleni ukumi woohimala, phimaana nirukunuwelaka wa amalaponi.
