Kontha Apwiya ciicammo phinilamulenlyaya yiiraka: Mi kuupankileni imwaleelo ya amalaponi wiira nkhale oophwanyiha woopwa mpaka umalenlyaya ilapo.
Vano amalaponi wiiwa waya commo, yahotteeliya venci ni yaanattottopela nuulumo na Apwiya, ni yahokupali othene yaalikeleliye ukumi woohimala.
Phimaana nahomwaryela nuulumo na Apwiya nttetthe wothene.
Nanso ayuta yahaatheperya athiyana yaari anattiini ni oocuwannyaa, wamoca ni asuulupale omparasa. Yahokumihaca nkhitto woonlupattha Paulu ni Parnapee, aphavelaka woomolaca mwiilaponi mwaya mmo.
Vano ale akukutthaka ntthupi no nnyaani mwaya, yahorwaaca wIkoniyu.
Vaavale eetthuci ale, wahaacara utteeliya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Ciicammo wIkoniyu Paulu ni Parnapee yahokelaca nsinakoka mwa ayuta ni yahoolumaca mpaka waakupanlyaya atthu enci, ukhuma ayuta mpaka akereku.
Nanso ayuta oohaamini yahaatheperya amalaponi mpaka wiinanaca na asunna.
Vano yahokhalaca wonwo ukati mwinci yaalalyaka Apwiya n'ulipa irima. Ni Apwiya, ahovaha usaahiti ni nuulumo no nnema naya, apankaka ikanyero ni malakalaka mmatatani mwa amitthenka.
Nanso, atthu o'sittatti yahokawannya. Akina yaari mphantte wa ayuta ni akina ayo wa amitthenka.
Wahoolo wahokhumelela nkhitto wa amalaponi na ayuta, waatakaneeliye na akhulupale wiira yaahuvihe ni yaavonyakace.
Ale ucuwela waya, yahotthawelaca uListra ni uTerpe, ciri isittatti co'Likayona ni cowaattamana.
Wonwo yaanlaleera nhupi woorera.
Vano uListra ahaawo nlopwana mmoca onkomesa, oopahuwa inyaa iyarelo, owuntakyaa ni oohipaca weetta.
Yooyo nlopwana uyo ahomwiiwa Paulu oolumacaka. Vano Paulu unweha wawe, ahomoona wiira haana ukupali wiira avonihinye,
ahomwiirela akhuwelaka: Wunwe ni weemele ratta! Ule ahotupha n'upacera weetta.
Vano atthu ale, ukati woonnyaya itthu yaapankilyawe Paulu, yahokhuwelaca ni nuulumo no'Likayona yiiraka: Anluku, owiitatusa atthu, ahonikhuruwela mpaka warihu!
Vano Parnapee eehaneliya ncina na Yupiter ni Paulu eehaneliya ncina na Merikuriyu, maana ula phaari nhooleli oottonka nuulumo.
Mayasataka a Yupiter, ahowaana wankhora waya ikwiitti yaari uhoolo wo'parasa, imope ni ikhara co maluwa. Kontha wamoca na atthu ayo yaaphavela waavahaca isataka.
Vano wiiwaca waya nnya citthu nnya, amitthenka Paulu ni Parnapee yahaahulaca coowara caya ni yahokelaca iriyariru mphwinko wa atthu ale ni ukhuwela yiiraka:

Alopwana, nnopankelani nnya citthu nnya? Hi ciicammo n'atthu toko nyu, nuwiihenreni nhupi woorera wiira nhiye citthu coohi itthu, munrukunuwele Nluku nkumi, pattusile irimu, itthaya, ipahari ni citthu cothene ciriwo.
Yoole aatthunihile maloko avinre, wiira atthu othene apanke intthunaya,
nanso mothene mmo, Nluku khehiyerenre uvaha usaahiti awe. Hothoonyera yoorera, oovahakani wirimu ipula ni ukati wooruwerya, acarihaka coolya n'utteeliya wanrimani winyu.
Hata anowuulumacaru commo, nanlelo yahokhalana itafawuti yowaattiyelela atthu ale wiira ahaavahace isataka.
Wahoolo yahowaaca ayuta ookhuma wAntiyokiya ni wIkoniyu. Yahotheperya mphwinko ule wiira unvonyakace Paulu ni wahompurulacera uceresere waya isittatti amoonihaka toko hokhwa.
Nanso eetthuci yahonrukureryaca Paulu, ni uyo ahonwa ni ahorwaa usittatti. Waasilyaya, ahokhuma wamoca ni Parnapee arwaaka uTerpe.
Yaholalya nhupi woorera yeele isittatti ile, mpaka ukhumelela eetthuci enci. Vano yahoturuwela uListra, wIkoniyu ni wAntiyokiya,
aalipiheraka ni aakhanyererihaka eetthuci wiira apwaherere waamini waya, aathoonyiheraka wiira ninlamuliya uhuva venci wowiira nikele wumweneni wa Nluku.
Vaavale yahaathanla wo khula ikereca mahumu. Anavekenlene ni utthuka, yahaavaherera wa Apwiya yakupanlyaya.
Attupulanihaka uPisitiya yahorwaaca uPanfiliya.
Ulalya waya nuulumo uPerike, yahorwaaca wAtaliya,
ni vaavale yaholapuwelaca wAntiyokiya, wonwo waaruminyaya wo nnema na Nluku uvara nteko waavahiyaya.
Vano uphiyaca waya, yahothukumaniha ikereca, ahimyacaka cothene caapankenlyawe Nluku wariyari waya, ni ceenryawe wowaahulela amalaponi nkhora wowaamini.
Paahi, yahokhalaca wenwe ukati mwinci anari wamoca ni eetthuci.
Vano atthu akina yaakhuma uYuteya yaanaweetthuciha asunna yiiraka: Mwaahuuleke icantto toko cinhimyaya ilema ca Musa, khannoorya woopwa.

Vano Paulu ni Parnapee khayeewananne na atthu ale mpaka unyakulihaninya venci. Vaavale wahovaaneliya wiira oyeeli ale, ni atthu akina, arwaace uYerusalemu, wa amitthenka ni wo mahumu, wiira woolumaceriye nlahanya uyo.
Yahoveleelihiya ni ikereca, ni yahovira mittetthe co'Fenisiya ni uSamariya, ahimyacaka urukunusa nrima wa amalaponi. Ihapari iyo yahaatteeliha nrima asunna othene.
Waaphiyacilyaya uYerusalemu, yahaakheleliya woorera ni ikereca, na amitthenka, ni mahumu. Vano yahohimyaca citthu cothene caapankilyawe Nluku mwa ayo.
Nanso yahokhuma atthu akina o mphwinko wo mafarisi yaakupanli, yiiraka: Anlamuliya wuulihiya icantto n'utthara Nlamulo na Musa.
Vaavale, yahothukumana amitthenka ni mahumu wiira awehawehe itthu iyo.

Vano unanyakulihaninyene venci, Peturu ahokusa nlove eeraka: Asunnaka, nyu nnaacuwela wiira, ikhumelo yo khalayi, Nluku hokithanla mi wariyari winyu, wiira amalaponi yiiwe wamalakuni waka, nuulumo no nhupi woorera ni akupali.
Phimaana, Nluku nocuwela mirima, haavaha usaahiti, aawiiheraka Nnepa Nttakattifu, toko waanivahilyawe hi.
Ni khanihawulanihile hata vakani hi ni ayo, ni waamini waya haarapiha mirima caya.
Kaahiki vano, nnonttehatteherani Nluku, mwaavahaka eetthuci nrintti muulupale, hata asipaapehu yaayo uhinatoko aya uvilela ni hata hi?
Nanso ninaakupali wiira nihoopoliya wo Nnema na Apwiya Yesu, toko ayo ciicammo coopoliyaya.
Vano mphwinko wothene wahomaala, aviriyaninyaka Parnapee ni Paulu, yaattonkaca mithoonyero ni mitikiniho cothene caapankilyawe Nluku mwa ayo wariyari wa amalaponi.
Wahoolo umaliha waya wuulumaca, Yakopu aheera: Asunnaka, nkiviriyane.
Simoni ahottonkaca mananna ceenryawe Nluku woopacera waawehanana atthu o mwiilaponi wiira aapanke unethi wo ncina nawe.
Yeeyo itthu iyo inawaatana ni moolumo o minapiyu, toko cantikhiyaya yiiraka:
Caviraka nnya citthu nnya, kinaahala uturuwela tho unteka heema wuluwile a Taviti. Kinaahala ulokihaca nkwanyuwacilyawe mmo, ni kinaahala unwusawusa,
wiira atthu ahanle ayo yaaphavele Apwiya, ciicammo amalaponi othene aneehaneliya ncina naka, aneera ph'Apwiya ampanka nnya citthu nnya,
cicuweliye ukhuma unankhuma.
Phimaana, kinoona wiira nihaakukureehe amalaponi anonkupali Nluku.
Nanso, naantikhele wiira akhotte iyolya yoovahereriya anluku, uluva, inama conyopholiya n'uhilya iphome.
Kontha Musa ikhumelo yo khalayi, haana wo khula isittatti, ale anonlalya, ni wo khula ntivela naasominya mmasinakokani.

Vaavale amitthenka, mahumu ni ikereca yothene yaholakela waathanla alopwana yaari nenno nipuro nno, ni yahaaruma wamoca ni Paulu ni Parnapee, urwaa wAntiyokiya. Mayothanliya ayo yaari Yuta, neehaninya Parsapa, ni Sila, ahooleli eeli wariyari wa asunna.
Yahovahereriya iwarakha yaantikhilyaya ni ntata naya yiiraka: Hi asunninyu, niri amitthenka ni mahumu, ninawuveleeliherani isalamu akristu amalaponi nnokhala wAntiyokiya, uSiriya ni uSilisiya.
Maana niheewa wiira asunna akina akhumile wariyari wihu woohileeha, anawukukureehani ni moolumo, aphavelaka uturusela uttuli ankhili enyu.
Vano, nihoonela ukhala yoorera, uthukumana wiira naathanle alopwana ni wuveleeliherani wamoca ni asunnihu oofentiya, ari ala: Parnapee ni Paulu,
alopwana anleva ukumi aya nlattu wo ncina na Apwiyehu Yesu Kristu.
Phimaana nihaaruma uno Yuta ni Sila, yaayo anhala wuhimeryani, wamalakuni waya nnya citthu nnya.
Maana Nnepa Nttakattifu uhoonela urera wamoca ni hi wiira nihuuryaceni mirintti cuulupale nanso nuuhimeryeni nnya citthu coolemela nnya:
Nkhotte iyolya yoovahereriya anluku, nhilye iphome, nhikhure inama conyopholiya ni nhiluve. Mwesempihaka nnya citthu nnya nnaapanka ratta. Nkhale ni isalama.
Vano ale yaaruminye yahophiyaca woohipica wAntiyokiya, yahothukumaniha unethi ni yahovaha iwarakha ile.
Waasominyaya iwarakha ile, yahotteeliya venci nlattu woolipiheriya mirima.
Vano Yuta ni Sila, yaari minapiyu, yahaapisiha ni waalipihera mirima asunna ni ikano cinci.
Vaavale ale yahokhalaca ukati vakani, vano asunna ale yahaalevaca wiira aturuwele wo'salama waaruminyaya.
Nanso Sila wahoncivela uhala wonwo.
Paulu ni Parnapee yahopicapica wAntiyokiya, yiitthucihaka ni alalyaka wamoca na akina enci, nuulumo na Apwiya.
Anavinrene mahuku vakani, Paulu ahomwiirela Parnapee: Nrwee nituruwele, wiira naathotole asunnihu mmasittatti mothene nlalyelehu nuulumo na Apwiya, wiira noone cineettaya.
Vano Parnapee aaphavela unkusa Yohani, eehaninya Marku.
Nanso Paulu khoonenle ukhala isariya unkusa ule aakhottile ikhumelo uPanfiliya, ni khaanviranne mmitekoni mwaavaraya.
Vaavale wahokhala uhiiwanannya, mpaka umwalanaca. Vano Parnapee, ahonkusa Marku ni ahokela ikalawa arwaaka uSipere.
Nanso Paulu ahonthanla Sila. Navekeleliyene na asunna ni nnema na Apwiya, ahokhuma.
Paahi, ahovira uSiriya ni uSilisiya, alipiheraka ikereca.
Ciicammo ahophiya uTerpe ni uListra. Ahaawo wonwo mwiitthuci mmoca eehaninya Timotiyu, mwana a mwaamini mmoca nyuta, nanso athumwane yaari akereku.
Mwa nlattu wo yooyo yaanavaha usaahiti woorera asunna o'Listra ni yaari wIkoniyu.
Vano Paulu ahotthuna wiira amweettane munkwahani mwawe mmo, phimaana ahomuuliha icantto nlattu wo ayuta yaakhalakhalaca yaayo mapuro ayo, maana othene yahocuwela wiira athumwane ayo yaari akereku.
Isittatti cothene caaviraya, yaanawaahimerya asunna itthu yaavaaneliye na amitthenka ni mahumu o'Yerusalemu wiira itthariheleliye.
Commo ikereca nnyo caanalipiheriya munroromeloni, ni wo khula nihuku atthu o waamini yaanawuncererya.
Vano Paulu na akhunanawe yahorwaa ilapo yo'Firisiya ni yo'Kalata, nlattu wowaateelihiya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu ulalya nuulumo wAsiya.
Uphiya waya umpikani wo'Misiya, yahomananiha urwaa uPitiniya, nanso Nnepa wa Yesu khawaatthunihenre.
Vano uvira waya uMisiya yahokhuruwela uTrowate.
Vano, Paulu, ahooniheriya uhiyu munttorani, nawile nlopwana mmoca o'Masetoniya neemenle, ni anlepelaka wiira: Uvire uMasetoniya ni unikavihere.
Wahoolo uvira waya iyooni ile, nananoru nahophavelaca wiira nirwee uMasetoniya naalalyere nhupi woorera, nikupaliki wiira Apwiya phiniihanenlyaya.
Ulapuwa wihu nikhumaka uTrowate, nahorwaa uSamotrisiya, ni usa waya nahophiya uNeyapolisi.
Ni nahopwahera mpaka uFilipu, yaari isittatti yoopacera, nttetthe wo'Masetoniya ni yaari yoothawaliya ni nkolooni o'Roma. Mwemmwe nsittatti mmwe nahokhala mahuku vakani.

Vano nihuku no ntivela, nahokhuma nsittatti mmwe nirwaaka nipuro nowaattamerya mooloko, woonenlehu wiira ninaaphwanya nipuro noohala uswali. Wonkomacilehu, nahoolumana athiyana yaathukumanne nenno nipuro nno.

Vaavale, ahaawo nthiyana mmoca eehaninya Litiya, mayotumihaca ikuwo cookhwiila, aakhuma isittatti yo'Tiyatira, ni aanttittimiha Nluku. Uyo aviriyanaka, Apwiya yahontthukula nrima awe waacera wiira aviriyaneehe itthu yaahimyawe Paulu.
Wahoolo, ahopattisiya uyo ni ntthoko nawe nothene, ni ahonilepela eeraka: Mwakupaliki wiira mi ki mwaamini a Apwiya, mphiyace uwanyaka ni nkhalace wonwo. Ni ahonooryaca.
Vano nihuku nimoca nirwaaka nipuro no'swali, ahonikhumelela mwanthiyana mmoca ipottha aarina nnepa wo'hako. Yooyo awaseraka vale, aanawaaphwanyiha mihakhu cinci akunya awe.
Yoola mwanthiyana ula, anttharak'ono Paulu ni hi, aankhuwa eeraka: Ala alopwana ala ari arumeyi a Nluku Ooculu ni anoohimeryani iphiro yo woopola.

Vano ule aampwaherera upanka ciicammo mahuku menci. Wumaleloni, Paulu khawaancivenle, ni ahorukunuwa ni wiirela nnepa ule: Mwa ncina na Yesu Kristu, kinawulamula wiira ukhume mwirutthuni mwawe ula! Yooyo ukati uyo nnepa ule wahonhiya.
Vaavale asinene ipottha ile, waacuwenlyaya wiira khiiwo tho inhalaya uphura, yahonvara Paulu ni Sila ni yahaarwehaca nipuro na anamuuluma milattu.
Waarweehaciyaya wa anamuuluma milattu, waheeriya: Ala asilopwana ala ayuta ni anaakukuvaniha isittatti ehu ila,
ni anaamwarusela ilema cihinlamuliyehu waakhela ni weettela, kontha hi aroma.
Vano mphwinko wahonwa, n'upacera unvaanyiha Paulu ni Sila, ni ahooleli yaholamula wiira arulaciye coowara caya ni yaafyulaciye.
Wahoolo waafyulaciya waya venci, yahokelihiya nkalaposo. Vaavale, mayowaarontta anantthukiya ule, aholakiya wiira aarontte sana sana.
Vano ule waakhela wawe nlamulo nne, ahaavonyera nkalaposo yo nhina ni ahaatthukelela inyaa caya wanipisini.
Vano waphilyaya uhiyu iriyari, Paulu ni Sila yaanavekela ni umwiipela Nluku icipo, anantthukiya akina ayo yiiwaka.
Nananoru, yahottettemela venci itthaya mpaka caasa o'kalaposo uthukumela. Wowaakuvyaca wene, mikhora cothene cahohulyaa ni unyolo wothene wahotthukuwa.
Mayowaarontta anantthukiya ule ahonwa, ni woonnyawe mikhora co'kalaposo nnye cinahulyeele, ahotholola ikatana awe munluwoni wiira eeciive, kontha ooniha wiira anantthukiya ayo ahotthawatthawa.
Nanso Paulu ahokhuwela eeraka: Uhiihasare! Nihaawo othene va!
Vano mayowaarontta anantthukiya ule aholepela nthuko, ahokela atthawaka ni attettemelaka, ahokhoromela waaryawe Paulu ni Sila.
Vaavale ahaakusaca mpaka vate ni ahaakoha eeraka: Asuulupaale, kipankekeni wiira koopwee?
Ayo yahaakhulaca yiiracaka: Unkupali Pwiya Yesu, ni unaahala woopwa, we ni itthoko aa yothene.
Vano yahonlalyeera nuulumo na Nluku, ni atthu othene o watthokoni wawe.
Yoole ukati wo'hiyu ule, mayowaarontta anantthukiya, ahorapihaca makhwatta yaafyonyolaciyaya waatthukiyaya. Wahoolo, ule ahopattisiya wamoca na atthu yaarinawe watthokoni.
Vano ahaakusaca mpaka uwannyawe, ahaavahaca iyolya ni othene o wapuwani wawe yahotteeliya nlattu woomwaamini Nluku.
Vaavale usa waya, ahooleli yahaaruma anatoropa aya ukalaposo yiiraka: Mwaatthukulace ale alopwana ale.
Vano mayowaarontta anantthukiya ahomwiirela Paulu: Ahooleli yaholamula wiira: We ni Sila ntthukulaciye. Phimaana nkhumaceke ni nrwaaceke ni nnema.

Nanso Paulu ahaakhula ayo eeraka: Woohipacera toko unikohakoha citthu cikosilehu, nanso anoonivara ni unaafyulaca waatthuni n'univonyera nkalaposo ni hi ninari aroma. Vano nna va amphavela unikumiha mmwiitihoni? Mena, uhikhale commo! Awaaceke asinene yaayo yaanitthukile ayo yaanitthukuleke!
Vano anatoropa ale yahottonka ciicammo wa ahooleli. Vano ale weewilyaya wiira Paulu ni Sila yaari aroma yahoovaca.
Vaavale yahorwaaca waalepela isontte, ni yahaakumihaca nkalaposo mmwe, yahaalepelaca wiira akhumace nsittatti mmo.
Ukhumaca waya nkalaposo mmwe, yahorwaaca wa Litiya. Vano woonanaciyaya na asunna, yahaapisiha mirima ni yahorwaaca.
Vano uvira waya wAnfipoli ni wApoloniya, yahophiyaca uTesalonika waaryaya isinakoka ya ayuta.
Paulu, toko caalemalenlyawe, ahorwaa usinakoka mitivela miraru aahimeryaka cowantikhiya,
ahaathoonyihera ni waahimyacera wiira Kristu aalamuliya uhuva, ni wunwelela wariyari wa atthu ookhwa. Ni aheera: Ula Yesu noohimeryakani ula phiri Kristu.
Akina yahokupali ni yahontthara Paulu ni Sila, ciicammo mphwinko muulupale wa akereku anattiini, na athiyana enci oocuwannyaa.

Vano nlattu wo nttima, ayuta yahaarweelaca anamaphinka oonanara nrima ni yahopacera nkhitto wasittatti vale, ni yahotuphelaca inupa ya Yasoni aphavelacaka unvara Paulu ni Sila wiira yaarwaanace wamphwinkoni.
Nanso uhaaphwanyaca waya yahonkusaca Yasoni na asunna akina ni yahaarwaanaca wa alamuli o nsittatti, akhuwelaka yiiraka: Phi yaala amporonkaniha ittuniya yothene, vano ahophiya mpaka uno,
Yasoni phaakhelenle. Othene ala anaavaanyihaca malamulo a Sesari aneeraca, haawo mwene nkina neehaninya Yesu.
Vano wiiwa waya ala moolumo ala, yahaakukureeha alamuli ni atthu othene o waparasa.
Wahoolo ahotthukuliya Yasoni wamoca ni akhwawe ayo analivihiye ncurukhu waahukhumwinyaya.
Wowaakuvyaca wene uhiyu, asunna ale yahonveleelihaca Paulu ni Sila uPereya. Vano uphiyaca waya wonwo, yahorwaaca nsinakoka mwa ayuta.

Atthu o'Pereya yaari atthu oophavela waavikana atthu o'Tesalonika, kontha yahaakhelela nuulumo nno woohi itwaana, asomeehaka cowantikhiya nnyo khula nihuku, aphavelaka ucuwela wakhala wiira citthu nnyo caari ceekhweli.
Phimaana akina mwa ayo yahokupali, athiyana akereku oocuwannyaa, ni alopwana enci.
Nanso, ukati waacuwenlyaya ayuta o'Tesalonika wiira nuulumo na Nluku ninaalalennya ciicammo ni Paulu uPereya, yahorwaaca ukukuvaniha n'uporonkaniha mphwinko ule.
Vano, wowaakuvyaca wene asunna ale yahonkumiheraca Paulu mphantte wo'pahari, nanso Sila ni Timotiyu yahohalaca wonwo.
Ale yaammeleelacile Paulu yahonkusaca mpaka wAtena ni yahoturuwa analeeheriye nlamulo no wiira Sila ni Timotiyu arwaace yamoonanane uyo wowaakuvyaca.
Vano Paulu ukati wawehereryacawe wAtena, ahonyoonyinya warohoni wawe nlattu wa apontto oolapeliya yaacanre isittatti.
Phimaana aanrwaa nsinakoka woolumana ayuta na amalaponi anattiini. Ciicammo, aamphiya upacari mahuku othene, woolumana atthu yaathukumana.

Vano acuweli akina yaari eetthuci o'Pikoreu ni o'Sitoyiku yaanannyakulihanana ni yaankohana yiiraka: Nohimyani ula mayohorahora ula? Akina ayo yaanawuulumaca yiiraka: Nokhala toko naahimyaca anluku akina. Kontha aanlalyaa nhupi woorera wa Yesu ni wunwelela.
Vano yahonkusaca ni yahonrwaana wapuwani wa alamuli uneehaninya Ariyopaku, yiiraka: Unawoorya unihimyacera miitthuciho cinsomihaa conaanano?
Ninawoona citthu cinwiiwehu nnyo ciri cootikineeha, phimaana nimphavela ucuwela maanaya isiyani inhimyacaa iyo.
Vano atthu othene o wAtena ni aletto yaakhalaca wonwo, khiiwo tho itthu ikhwawe yaavaraya uhikhanle wuuluma paahi ni wiiwa ihapari conaanano.
Paulu nari iriyari ipuwa Ariyopaku, ahonwa ni aheera: Alopwana o wAtena, kihovira mothene ni kinoona wiira mwa anattiini.

Kontha mi mwaaviraviraka mmo keera koonaka citthu cinlapelenyu. Ciicammo kihoona ikhipula yaantikhiye coo: wa nluku oohicuweliya. Vano yooyo nyu nnonlapelenyu uyo nhincuwelaka khweli yooyo mi phinoohimeryakani.
Nluku pattusile ittuninya ni citthu cothene ciriwo, naryene yooyo mwanene irimu ni itthaya, khankhala mmakwittini, cootekiya ni matata a atthu.
Khanrumeeliya ni citthu co matata a atthu, toko wiira ihaawo inhuvelawe, ni nophavela itthu, kontha yooyo phinvaha ukumi, umumula ni citthu cothene.
Wa ntthu mmoca paahi, hopanka ikhapila cothene ca atthu wiira cikhale ilapo yothene yo vathi va, ni aheesa khalayiru ukati, toko caalamulenlyawe ni miinano coohala ukhala,
wiira cimwaavye Nluku, pooti cimwaapaapelak'ono cinaahala umphwanya, ukhala wiira khari uttayi wa khula ntthu wa hi.
Kontha mwa yooyo phinkhalehu akumi, ninaweetta ni nihaawo akumi. Ciicammo toko cihimilyaya atthu inyu anttonkaca co khalayi yiiraka: Kontha wa yooyo ciicammo, niri ikhapila awe.
Vano ninaryene ikhapila ya Nluku, khaninlamuliya wuupuwela wiira Nluku naalikana ni iwooru, ni iparatha, atthuna ni maluku oorattarattiya ni inutto, anari moopuwelelo a pinatamu.
Phimaana Nluku khahelelenle ukati wahaacuwelaya itthu atthu ayo. Nenna va nolamula wiira atthu othene, ni miphantte cothene arukunuse mirima.
Kontha Nluku heesa nihuku ninhalawe uhukhumu wo'sariya ittuninya yothene mwa nlopwana mmoca nthanlilyawe. Kontha haathoonyihera atthu othene, wamunwelelihilyawe Yesu wariyari wa atthu ookhwa.
Vaavale weewiyawe wuulumaca mwaha wo wunwelela wa atthu akhwile, akina yahopacera unnyohola ni akina yahoolumaca yiiraka: Yuulumacilyaa iyo ninawiiwaka ukati nkhwawe.
Yooyo ukati uyo Paulu ahokhuma wariyari waya vale.
Yahaawo atthu akina yaantakaneelanne, ni yahokupali. Mwa yaayo ahaawo Tiyonisiyu, o mphantte w'Ariyopaku, ni athiyana amoca yeehaninya Tamari ni akina tho yaarinawe.
Cinavinrene nnya citthu nnya, Paulu ahokhuma wAtena ni ahorwaa uKorintu.

Vano wonwo ahomphwanya nyuta mmoca eehaninya Akila, uwannyawe uPontu, aawile nananoru akhumaka wItaliya, wamoca ni Prisila, amwaarawe. Kontha Sesari Kalautiyu aholamulela wiira ayuta othene akhumace uRoma. Paulu ahorwaa woonanana,
ni ukhala wiira oyeeli yaavara nteko mmoca yooyo, ahaakhalanaca aavaranaka yooyo nteko uyo, kontha waari wo waapanka aheema.
Mitivela cothene aanawaakhanyereriha nsinakoka mmwe, aphavelaka wiira ooryace ayuta mpaka akereku.
Ukati waaphiyacilyaya Sila ni Timotiyu akhumacaka uMasetoniya, Paulu aavarecesile nteko woolalya nuulumo na Nluku, aahimeryaka ayuta wiira Yesu phi Kristu.
Vano ale anvaanyihacaka ni antarawacaka, Paulu ahokukutthaca coowara cawe eerelacaka: Iphome enyu iyo, yuukhaleleni wamuru winyu va, mi kihootopwaa. Ukhuma nenna va, mi kinrwaa wa amalaponi!
Paulu ukhuma wawe vale, ahokela inupa ya nlopwana eehaninya Titu Yustu, aari oonlapela Nluku, inupa awe yaanowaattamanana wa sinakoka.
Nanso Krisipu, nhooleli oosinakoka, ahaakupali Apwiya ni itthoko awe yothene. Ciicammo akorintu enci yaheewa, yahokupali ni yahopattisiya.
Vano Paulu aholoha nttora uhiyu, weereliyawe na Apwiya coo: Uhoove, nanso upwaherere wuulumaca ni uhimaale,
kontha mi kiri ni we, ni khaawo nohala wupanka yoonanara, kontha ila isittatti ila kihaana atthu enci.
Vano wonwo ahokhala mwakha mmoca ni myeeri siita, aasomihaka nuulumo na Nluku.
Nanso Kaliyu nari nlamuli o wAkaya, yahokhuma ayuta ni yaholeehana unriyelelaca Paulu citthu coonanara, ni yahonrwaana upwaro wooluminya milattu, yiiraka:
Ula nawaatheperya atthu mananna oonlapela Nluku, avirikanihaka cinhimyaya nlamulo.
Vano Paulu waaphavelawe wuulumaca, Kaliyu aheerela ayuta: Nyenyu ayuta, waari wiira yaari itthu yoohi isariya, atthuna ikhirini yootepa woopiha, mi kaanhala uvaherani isariya yowiiwelelani.
Nanso wakhala wiira uri nlattu wo nuulumo, wo macina, atthuna wo nlamulo ninyu, cennyo citthu nnyo ntafitiki mwasinene, mi akimphavela ukhala hukhumu o cennyo citthu nnyo!
Vaavale ahoomolaca mpwaro mmwe.
Vano, othene yahonvaraca Sostene, nhooleli o'sinakoka ni yahomwattakaca uhoolo waya ipwaro yo wuuluminya milattu nanso Kaliyu, khaawacawacile cennyo citthu nnyo.

Wahoolo Paulu ukhala wawe wonwo mahuku menci, wiimaleloni ahaaleeha asunna ale ni aholapuwela uSiriya, antthukanaka nloko Prisila ni Akila. Ahinakhuma, ahomettha mputu nari uSenkereya kontha ahomoopa natiri.
Uphiya wawe wEfesu, ahaahiyaca vaavale. Vano ule ahokela nsinakoka ni aanvaanyihana na ayuta.
Yahonlepelaca wiira akhale tho wonwo mahuku vakani, nanso uyo khaatthunne.
Vano ule ahaaleeha eeraka: Nluku atthunaka, kinaahala uturuwela tho. Vaavale ahokhuma wEfesu.
Uphiya wawe uSesareya, ahokhuruwa ikalawa n'urwaa uYerusalemu. Usalamiha wawe ikereca, ahorwaa wAntiyokiya.
Wonwo ahokhala ukati vakani. Wahoolo aholapuwela nttetthe wo'Kalata ni uFirisiya, aalipiheraka eetthuci othene.
Yooyo ukati uyo, wEfesu ahophiya nyuta mmoca o'Alisantiriya, eehaninya Apolu, nlopwana oocuwela wuulumaca ni owiiweeha cowantikhiya.
Aari ntthu aasomihinye iphiro ya Apwiya ni oovihaviha munnepani. Aanawuulumaca ni wiitthuciha wanreranaya ihaali ca Yesu, nanso aacuwela paahi upattiso wa Yohani.
Yooyo ahopacera wuulumaca wowiiwannyaa nsinakoka. Nanso weewilyawe Prisila ni Akila, yahonkusaca ni yahonhimyacera wanreranaya iphiro ya Nluku.
Vano Apolu waalakenylawe uvira wAkaya, asunna yahonlipiha irima, ni yahaantikhelaca iwarakha eetthuci wiira amwaakhelele. Uphiya wawe ahaakavihera venci ale yaakupanli wo nnema ncina na Apwiya,
kontha aanawaahimerya ni ikuru cinci ni wooryaca ayuta, aathoonyeraka mwa cowantikhiya wiira Yesu phiri Kristu.
Vaavale, Apolu nari uKorintu, Paulu ahovira mittetthe co masika, ahophiya wEfesu, ni ahaaphwanya wonwo eetthuci akina.
Vano ahaakoha eeraka: Nhaakhelaca Nnepa Nttakattifu ukati wakupanlinyu? Ale yahomwaakhulaca yiiraka: Mena, hata khaninatoko wiiwa wiira uhaawo Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Vano, Paulu ahaakohaca eeraka: Nyu mwaakhenle upattisoni? Ale yahaakhulaca yiiraka: Upattiso wa Yohani.
Vano Paulu aheerelaca: Yohani pankile upattiso woorukunusa nrima, eerelaka atthu wiira ankupali ule aahala uwa uhoolo wawe, amwaacaka Yesu.
Vano ale, aneewacilene commo, yahopattisiya mwa ncina na Apwiya Yesu.
Paulu ahaathatelaca matata, wahaakhuruwela Nnepa Nttakattifu, ni yahopacera wuulumaca iluuka conaanano n'ulalya nhupi wa Nluku.
Ale othene yaari alopwana khumi na eeli.
Ukati wo myeeri miraru, Paulu ahokela nsinakoka, wonwo ahoolumaca woolipa nrima, aavaanyihaka wiira ooryace co'mwene wa Nluku.

Nanso akina ayo yahanca wiithoonyihera uturumaliha nrima ni uhikupali, yuulumacaka coonanara co Iphiro wamiithoni wo mphwinko. Paulu, ahokhuma wariyari waya, ahaakusa eetthuci ni ahopacera waasomiha mahuku othene icikola ya Tiranu.
Yeeyo itthu iyo yaheerannyaa myakha miili, aaceraka wiira atthu othene yaakhala wAsiya yiiwe nuulumo na Apwiya, ukhuma ayuta mpaka akereku.
Vano Nluku aanapanka cootikineeha cahaalikeleliye ni matata a Paulu,
mpaka waarwaneliyaya aretta maleeso ni coowara cawe, ni cennyo caanawaavoniha aretta ni minepa coonanara caanakhuma.
Ayuta akina ananlociya oweetteetta, yahotteha uromola ncina na Apwiya Yesu wa ale yaarina minepa coonanara, yiiraka: Kinawuhakhani mwa ncina na Yesu nonlalyawe Paulu.
Ala yaapankaca nnya citthu nnya yaari asaana saapa a nyuta mmoca eehaninya Seva, nkhulupale omayasataka.
Nanso nnepa woonanara wahaakhula wiiraka: Kinancuwela Yesu ni kinaacuwela iryawe Paulu, vano nyu mwaapani?
Vano ule aarina nnepa woonanara ahaatuphelaca ni waattakaca othene ni ahaakhanyerera mpaka warakalihaca ni waarulaca ikuwo, ni yahokhumaca mpaani mmo n'utthawa.
Yeeyo ihapari iyo yahocuweliya na atthu othene, ukhuma ayuta mpaka akereku yaakhalakhalaca wEfesu. Vano wahaakela woova, ni ncina na Apwiya Yesu naanalemelihiya.
Enci yaakupali yahowaaca ulaphulula woonene itampi caya ni miteko coonanara caavaraya.

Ciicammo enci yaapankaca miteko co'nyanka, yahothukumaniha ikitaapu caya ni cahopahiya yoonaka atthu othene. Waalikeliya waya ihisapu caya, yahophwanyinya wiira waari ncurukhu aya ilufu hansini (50.000) makopiri o'paratha.
Commo nuulumo na Apwiya naanawunnuwa n'ulemelihiya ni ikuru.

Cineeranelene nnya citthu nnya, Paulu aholakela warohoni wawe urwaa uYerusalemu, aviraka uMasetoniya ni wAkaya ni aheera: Wanhalaka urwaa uYerusalemu, ciicammo kinlamuliya upwahera uRoma wiira kathotole.
Ahaaruma mayonkavihera eeli wiira arwee uMasetoniya, ayo yaari Timotiyu ni Erastu. Vaavale Paulu ahokhala ukati vakani wAsiya.
Vano yooyo ukati uyo, yahaawo ipokoho yuulupale nlattu wo Iphiro ya Apwiya.
Mayohana mmoca o'paratha eehaninya Timetriyu, aapankesa asikasa oohaninya a Tiyana, yaaphwanyiha ncurukhu mwinci ananteko ayo.
Vano ahaalattula akhunanawe yaavaranawe nteko mmoca, aheerela: Alopwana, nnaacuwela wiira yoola nakoso ula phinniphwanyiha ifayita.

Nanso nnawoonaka ni wiiwa wiira khunakhala paahi wEfesu, nanso ciicammo wAsiya wothene, yooyo Paulu uyo nawooryaca ni waavololihaca atthu eeraka: Anluku oopankiya ni matata a atthu, khaanakhala anluku eekhweli.

Kuhiwena wiira woopihile paahi uhikupaliya nteko ehu, nanso ciicammo wahoopiha uvyavyehiya ikwiitti ya nluku muulupale Tiyana, uhittittimihinya ni ukwanyulaciya iyuulupale awe yeele inlapeliya ukhuma wAsiya mpaka ittuninya yothene.
Vano wiiwaca waya commo, yahoviruwaca venci ni yahokhuwelaca yiiracaka: Muulupale phi Tiyana a annefesu!

Vaavale isittatti yothene yahorekecya nlattu wo'pokoho, ni othene wamocaru yahokhumaca arwaaka nipuro naapankiya mihapo. Vano yahaavaraca asikhunanawe Paulu, yaari amasetoniya, yeehaninya Kaiyu ni Aristarku.
Vano Paulu aphavelaka wiithoonyihera waatthuni, eetthuci yahomwaatelihaca.
Ciicammo asuulupale akina, yaari asimpwanawe Paulu, yaholeehera wiira hiileve arwaaka unhaponi nwo.
Akina yaanakhuwela wo mananna mamoca ni akina ayo ni mananna makina, kontha mphwinko wothene wahoporonkanihinya. Ni atthu enci khayaacuwela itthu yaathukumanenlyaya.
Vano, ahokumihinya Alisantere iriyari yo mphwinko, akhanyererihiyaka na ayuta wiira arwee uhoolo. Ula athoonyathonyaka ni ntata, aaphavela wiicaakiha uhoolo wa atthu ale.
Nanso waacuweliyawe wiira ule aari nyuta, othene yahokhuwela weemara imoca wookhalaka iwora piili yiiraka: Muulupale phi Tiyana a annefesu!
Mayowantikha o'sittatti wowaamaaliha atthu ale ahoolumaca eeraka: Nyu annefesu, hincuwela tipani wiira isittatti yo wEfesu, phinkhaliha ikwiitti ya muulupale Tiyana ni pontto awe khuruwile wirimu?
Vano, inari itthu yoohivaanyihinya, phatari mmaalace, ni hikhale nohala uvara itthu n'upupha.
Kontha ala asilopwana yaawiihilenyu ala khaanakhala mayohukhaca ni hata oonkufuru nluku ihu.
Vano wakhala wiira Timetriyu ni mayohana aanveleenle ahaana nlattu ni ntthu, woorera ukasari, ahaawo mayowuuluma nlattu ni alamuli, mwaahiyeke yaakasaraneke ayaayoru.
Nanso, wakhala wiira ihaawo itthu ikhwawe inaanelenyu, iyo inkowooneliya unkuttanoni woocuweliya, toko cinhimyaya nlamulo.

Kontha wahoopiha ni hi unitthekiha ni uniriyeleliha wiira phi hi nipattusacile nkhitto uyo, mwa nlattu wo itthu ikhumile ilelo iyo, ni khaninkela noonaka yowaakhula wiira nihimyace itthu ithukumaneliye.
Paahi, wuulumaca wawe commo, ahomwarusa nthukumano uyo.
Wahoolo umala waya ipokoho ile, Paulu ahoruma wiihaninya eetthuci ale, ni naapisihilene nrima, ahaaleeha ni ahorwaa uMasetoniya.
Vano waavirawe cennye mittetthe nnye, aalipiheraka irima eetthuci ni aalopolaka venci, wumaleloni ahorwaa uKeresiya,
wonwo waalokenlyawe myeeri miraru. Waaphavelawe ukela ikalawa yorwaa uSiriya, ayuta yahomuuluma makhuce. Phimaana ahoopuwela uturuwa, aviraka co'Masetoniya.
Vano ahoveleeliya ni Sopaturu o'Pereya mwana a Piru, Aristarku ni Sekuntu uTesalonika, Kaiyu o'Terpe, ni Timotiyu, mpaka ciicammo Tikiku ni Trofimu o wAsiya.
Yaayo yahohoolela ni yahorwaa uniwehererya uTrowate.
Wahoolo uvira waya mahuku o mikatthe coohi miropo, naholapuwa nkalawani nikhumaka uFilipu. Uvira waya mahuku mathanu nahorwaa woonanana uTrowate, wonwo waakhanlehu mahuku saapa.
Waaphilyaya nihuku noopacera no'sumana, nahothukumana wiira nikawane nkatthe. Vano Paulu aphavelaka ukhuma nihuku no meelo, ahaalaka ni ahoolumaca mpaka uhiyu iriyari.
Vaavale cahaawo isamaninya cinci nsana nooculu nenne naathukumannehu.

Vano mmirawo mmoca eehaninya Yutiku, onkomile wacanelani, ahorupa cinene ukati woolumacawe venci Paulu. Vano cahomooryaca ikhove nnyo ni ahokurukuttuwa nari ikatti yoneeraru yooculu, mpaka uwuluwela vathi. Ni ahoteesiya nari ookhwene.
Nanso Paulu ahokhuruwa ni ahomooromela mmirawo ule n'unkwapatta ni aheera: Nhisanke! Ula haawo nkumi!
Vano awelaka tho, ahomyaa nkatthe ni aholya. Ni ahopwaherera wuulumaca mpaka usa, wahoolo pharwelyawe.
Paahi, mmirawo ule ahokusiya nari nkumi, ni yaholipaca makhuva.
Wahoolo nahokela nkalawani ni naholapuwela wa Asosi, wonwo waahalehu umwaakhelela Paulu, kontha ciicammo pheereliyehu wiira nohala urwaa mwentta vathi.
Vano waniphwanyilyawe wAsosi, nahomwaakhelela ukalawani ni nahopwahera uMitilene.
Usa waya naholapuwa. Nahokhuma uhoolo waya ilapo yo'Khiyu. Nihuku nonayeeli nahonyakela uSamosi, ni wasilyaya nahophiya uMiletu.
Paulu aholakela uhivira wEfesu, aaceraka wiira hipicapice nttetthe wo wAsiya, kontha aakuvyacera wiira, wooryaaka nihuku no Pentekoste namphwanye nari uYerusalemu.
Vano uMiletu Paulu ahoruma wiihaninya mahumu o'kereca yo wEfesu.
Vano waakumanacilyaya ni Paulu aheerela: Nyu nnaacuwela ciinryaka makhalelo ukati wothene waaryaka ni nyu, ukhuma nihuku noopacera niphilyaka nttetthe wo wAsiya.
Kihaarumeela Apwiya ni wiiyeviha venci, ni miithori, ni kilawihaciyaka venci ni wootheryaciya na ayuta ukikhumelenle.
Akihiile hata vakani wuhimeryani citthu comaana, ni wuusomihani nuulumo na Nluku waatthuni ni mmatthokoni mothene.
Kihothoonyihera wa ayuta mpaka akereku, wiira anlamuliya unkupali Nluku arukunusaka nrima ni waroromela Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Vano nlattu wookhanyererihiya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, kinrwaa uYerusalemu, woohicuwela itthu inhala ukikhumelela wonwo.
Nanso kinaacuwela wiira, mmaparasa mothene, Nnepa Nttakattifu unaakihimerya wiira utthukiya ni uhuvihiya unaakiwehererya.
Nanso akinhelela ukumi aka ukhala ittiitthu. Inoonaka ukhala ittiitthu uri upihera mphantte aka n'umaliha nteko ukivahilyaya Apwiya Yesu, wiira kivahe usaahiti wo nhupi woorera wo nnema na Nluku.
Vano kihocuwela wiira nyu othene kuuvirenlyakani wariyari winyu kuulalyeerakani umwene wa Nluku, khaawo hata mmoca wa nyu, nohala woona tho ikhove aka.
Phimaana ilelo mi kinawuhimeryani, kiiraka kihootopwaa ni akirina nlattu wo'phome enyu othene.
Kontha akihiile wuhimeryani cothene cilakenlyawe Nluku.
Mwiirattavelele mwasinene ni ikhontwaa cothene, cennyo ciweesenryayani Nnepa Nttakattifu ukhala ahooleli, wiira nhakhele ikereca ya Nluku, yeele ithumilyawe ni iphome awe.
Mi kinaacuwela wiira, kakhumaka, wariyari winyu cinaahala ukela miici cooluwa, cihinhala wiinanela ikhontwaa.
Maana wariyari winyu, anaahala wiikumiherera atthu owiitthuciha citthu cowootha wiira yaahokolosere uttuli eetthuci.
Phimaana, mmwehawehe, muupuwelaka wiira, wo myakha miraru uhiyu ni uthana akihiile unlakihera ni miithori khula ntthu.
Vano va, kinawuvahererani wa Apwiya ni nuulumo naya no nnema, nirina ikuru yo wulipiherani nyu ni wuphwanyihani yoohiyeriya mwa ale othene ari oottakattifihiya.
Akikhalenle nttima hata iparatha ya ntthu, atthuna iwooru, ni atthuna coowara.
Nyu mwasinene nnaacuwela wiira mi kaavara nteko ni matata aka kiphavelaka itthu yophwanya mi na ale yaarinaka.
Mi kihoothoonyiherani mothene wiira, navaraka nteko, ninlamuliya waakavihera ale oohuva ni wuupuwela moolumo Apwiya Yesu yiinryaya: Ureriya uri uvaha, woovirikana waakhela.
Paahi, ule wuulumaca wawe nnya citthu nnya, ahokhoroma wamoca na ale othene ni ahovekela.
Vaavale yahocukulaca venci, ni ankwapattacaka Paulu wo nifento, yahonvahaca alaahuma.
Nanso yahocukula venci mwa nlattu wo nuulumo noolumacilyawe eeraka: Khannohala woona tho ikhove awe. Vaavale yahonveleelaca mpaka ukalawani.
Wahoolo umwalanaca wihu na ale yaaniveleenle, nahokela nkalawani n'ulapuwela uKosi. Usa waya nahophiya uRotes, n'urwaa uPatara.
Wonwo, nahophwanya ikalawa yaarwa uFenisiya, nahokela n'upwaherera ikwaha iyo.
Ukati waattamenryehu uSipere, nahorwaa mphantte wo'hitto, ni nahorwaa uSiriya mpaka uphiya uTiru, kontha nwe caalamuliya upwakhuliya mirintti.
Waaphwannyehu eetthuci, nahokhala wonwo mahuku saapa. Na ale aleeheriyaka ni Nnepa, yahomwiirelaca Paulu wiira hirwee uYerusalemu.
Vano uvira waya ale mahuku ale, nahokhuma n'upwaherera ikwaha, niveleeliyaka ni eetthuci othene khula ntthu na amwaarawe ni asaanawe mpaka uta waya isittatti; nahokhoroma mpharyaa ni nahovekela.
Uleehana wihu, nahokela ikalawa ni ale yahoturuwelaca uwani.
Ukati waamalihilehu ikwaha yo'Tiru, nahophiyaca uPetolemita, wonwo waasalameehilehu asunnihu ni nahaakhalana nihuku nimoca.
Waasilyaya, nahokhuma n'urwaa uSesareya. Vano uphiya wihu uwannyawe nlalyeri Filipe, mmoca wa atthu saapa yaathanliye uYerusalemu, nahonkhalana wamoca.
Yooyo ahaana asaanawe acese asithiyana, yaari asimwali yaalalya.
Waamalihilehu wonwo mahuku menci, ahowa nnapiyu mmoca aakhuma uYuteya eehaninya Akapu.

Ni awaaka unoonanana, ahokusa ncako wa Paulu eetthukelaka nnyaani ni mmatatani mwawe ni aheera: Ila phinhimyaya Nnepa Nttakattifu: Ciicale ayuta o'Yerusalemu phinkelaya umpanka mwanene ula ncako ula n'urwaaninya mmatatani mwa amalaponi.
Ukati weewilehu ala moolumo ala, ukhuma hi mpaka atthu o nenno nipuro nno, nahonlepela Paulu wiira hirwee uYerusalemu nwo.
Vano ule ahaakhula eeraka: Nnokunlihacerani nkicukulihaka wanrimani? Kontha mi kiri tayari, kihimwena paahi utthukiyaru, nanso mpaka ukhwa uYerusalemu mwa ncina na Apwiya Yesu.
Vano, nihitthunaka unkhanyereriha, nahomwiirela: Upankiye utthuna wa Apwiya!
Uvira waya ale mahuku ale, ni utthenkaca wihu ikwaha, nahorwaa uYerusalemu.
Ciicammo eetthuci akina yaakhumacile uSesareya ni hi, antthukanaka ikwaha Menasoni o'Sipere, mwiitthuci o khalayi aahalehu unlukamela uwannyawe.
Uphiya wihu uYerusalemu, asunnihu yahonaakhelela n'utteeliya.
Usa waya, Paulu ahorwaa ni hi ukela umoonanana Yakopu, ni mahumu othene o'kereca yahothukumana.
Paulu ahaasalameeha ni ahaattonkacera wo'hisima nteko awe waapankilyawe Nluku wariyari wa amalaponi.
Wamwiiwilyaya Paulu, yahonlemeliha Nluku n'umwiirelaca: Munna, nkoonani ari ilufu kavi ayuta yaaminni ni othene ari oovarecesa nlamulo.
Ayo ahohimeriya wiira unaweetthuciha ayuta othene ari wariyari wa amalaponi wiira aheettele malamulo a Musa, weerelaka wiira ahoolihe icantto asaanaya, ni aheettele ilema ciri co malamulo.
Vano ninhala wiira cani? Khweli khweli anaahala ucuwelaca wiira uhowa.
Phimaana upanke inoohimeryehu. Ahaawo ari ni hi asilopwana acese. Wootthuna waya ahomoopa natiri.
Weetthukuryace wamoca na ayo ni waalivele, wiira ametthace mputu. Vano othene ankocuwelaca wiira khinakhala yeekhweli inootheryaciya iyo, nanso we unaweettela nlamulo.
Vano, amalaponi yiivaherenre, nihantikhela cilakenlehu nnyo niiraka, anlamuliya ukhotta iyolya yoovahereriya anluku, ahilye iphome, ahikhure inama yoonyopholiya ni aheette uluva.
Vaavale, Paulu, aakusaka ale asilopwana ale, usa waya aheerapiha wamoca na ale, ahokela inupa ittakattifu, wiira aahimerye mahuku o wiirapiha, mpaka ukati wapankeliyaya itthuvo.
Waahanlyaya vakani umala mahuku saapa ale, ayuta yaakhuma o wAsiya, umoona waya Paulu nari inupa ittakattifu, yahopankaca ipokoho ni mphwinko wothene, ni yahonvara.

Yahokhuwaca yiiraka: Annasirayeli, nnaakuvele! Ula phi nlopwana neetthuciha miphantte cothene ni unethi wothene wiira uhanyurihe nlamulo ni nna nipuro nna, ni ciicammo, haakeliha amalaponi inupa ittakattifu ni hokufurela nna nipuro nittakattifu nna.
Kontha wahinaya, yahomoona Trofimu o wEfesu, nari ni yooyo nsittatti mmwe ni yaanyihera wiira Paulu ahonkeliha inupa ittakattifu.
Iparasa yothene yahorekecya ni unethi wothene wahotthawela wonwo, ni ammaraka Paulu, yahompurulela uta waya inupa ittakattifu ni wowaakuvyaca wene mikhora cahotthukiya.
Ale yaavyacaka umwiiva, ihapari ile yahocuweliya ni nkhulupale a anatoropa ilufu o'Roma wiira iparasa yo'Yerusalemu yothene yaanrekecya.
Vano, ule ahaakusa anatoropa ni ahooleli a anatoropa iminya, ahotthimakaca n'ukela iriyari yo'nethi. Umoona waya awaaka nkhulupale na anatoropa ale, yahohiyaca umwatta Paulu.
Waattama wawe nkhulupale ule, ahonvara Paulu n'ulamulela wiira atthukiye n'unyolo miili, ni ahokoha wiira: Tipani ula ni pankile isiyani?
Wamphwinkoni vale, akina yaankhuwela wo mananna mamoca ni akina wo mananna makhwawe; wahoolo ule, hicuwelelaka itthwene, nlattu wo'pokoho ile, aholamulela urwaaninya Paulu ukwartelu.
Uphiya wawe wammuttoni wo'kwartelu, anatoropa ale yahonteesa Paulu nlattu wo'pokoho yo mphwinko,
kontha mphwinko wa atthu waantthara ukhuwelaka wiiraka: Mmwiive!
Paulu ukati waarwaninyawe ukwartelu, ahomwiirela nkhulupale a anatoropa: Kinaavahiya ukati wo wiira kuhimeryeni itthu? Ule ahomwaakhula eeraka: Unawuulumaca ikereku?
Khunakhalaka we nciipitu, wo mahuku avinre, waakusile ni weettiha anannyatha ilufu cese ntakhwani?
Paulu ahomwaakhula eeraka: Mi ki nyuta, uwanyaka uTarsu, isittatti yocuwannyaa yo'Silisiya. Contte kinawulepelani wiira nkivahe ukati wo woolumana atthu ala.
Waavahiyawe ukati, Paulu, neemenle wammuttoni, ahaavaha atthu ale ikanyero ni ntata. Wahomaaliya venci cinene, ni ule ahoolumaca ni nuulumo neeparayiku eeraka:
Asunnaka ni mayapaapa, nkiiwe vano wowiicaakiha wamiithoni winyu.
Vano weewilyaya oolumacaka ni iparayiku, yahomaalaca venci. Ahopwaherera eeraka:

Mi nyuta, kiyarele uTarsu, iparasa yo'Silisiya, nanso kuunuwenle yeela iparasa ila ni kisomihinye venci ni Kamaliyeli, toko cinhimyaya nlamulo na anhakhalayi, ni kinrumeelaka ratta Nluku, toko cirinyu nyu othene nihuku no ilelo.
Kihoomolanihaca mayotthara ila iphiro ila mpaka weevakaca, kaatthukaka ni kaarwaanaka nkalaposo alopwana na athiyana,
toko ciryaya asaahiti mayasataka ni mahumu othene. Kahaakhela iwarakha yoorwaana wa asunna uTamasiku, wiira kaawiihe anatthukiyene kaarwanaka uYerusalemu yaayo yaari wonwo, wiira attarusiye.
Vano waakhumelenle coo: Keettaka ni iphiro ni kinaattamenryene uTamasiku, nihalaka vakani uphiya ncuwa wamuru, nananoru wahokirukurerya waarya wookhuma wirimu.
Paahi, kahowuluwela vathi, ni kaheewa ncu nimoca naakiirela: Saulu, Saulu, unkilupatthelani?
Ni mi kahokoha kiiraka: Tupani we, Pwiya? Ni ule ahokaakhula eeraka: Mi ki Yesu o'Nasaree nomoomolanihacaa.
Ale yaari ni mi yahoona waarya nwe, nanso woohicuwelela waakhumelelaya ncu nooluma ni mi.
Vano kahokoha kiiraka: Kipankekeni Pwiya? Ni Apwiya yahokiirela: Wunwe, urwee uTamasiku, nwo unkoohimeriya cothene cilamulenlyaka wiira upanke.
Kahokhala oohoona nlattu wo waarya nwe. Ale yaarinaka yahokivarela moono mpaka uphiya uTamasiku.
Nlopwana mmoca eehaninya Ananiya, owiiyeviha toko ciryaya nlamulo ni oottittimihinya ni ayuta othene yaakhalaca wonwo,
ahowa ukaavya ni eemelaka wakhiviru ni mi, aheera: Munna Saulu, moone! Yooyo ukati uyo kahaancera woona ni kahommweheeha ule.
Vano, ule aheera: Nluku o mayathumwanihu hoothanla wiira ucuwelele utthuna wawe, umoone Nasariya ni wiiwe nuulumo ninkhuma wamalakuni wawe,
kontha unkokhala saahiti awe uhoolo wa atthu othene, ni wo citthu cothene cinoonaa ni cineewaa.
Nna va, umpicapicerani? Wunwe, upattisiye ni urapihe itampi caa, uvekele wiihanaka ncina nawe.
Uturuwela waka uYerusalemu ukati waavekelaka wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, wahokiphwanya nttora,
ni kahoona Apwiya yaakuulumana yiiraka: Waakuvyace ni ukhume nenna va nYerusalemu, kontha khunhala waakheleliya usaahiti unokaaca.
Mi kaheera: Pwiya, weekhweli ayo anaacuwelaca wiira mi kaanrwaaka mmasinakokani waatthuka ni waafyulaca othene anookupalini.
Ukati waamwarusiyaya iphome ya Siteva saahiti aa, mi kahaawo ni kahopanka cennyo, kisunkaka coowariya cawaya ale yaamwiiva.
Nanso ule ahokiirela: Urwee, kontha mi kinkowuruma uttayi wa amalaponi.
Atthu ale umwiiwa waya Paulu oolumaka commo, yahokhuwelaca yiiraka: Munkumihe nlopwan'ola mwiilaponi mu, kontha khunomphwanela ukhala nkumi!
Vano ale akhuwelak'ono ni arulacaka coowara caya, amwaruselaka ntthupi uculu,
nkhulupale a anatoropa aholamulela wiira Paulu arwaaninye ukwartelu ni akohiye aafyulaciyaka, wiira nicuwele nlattuni uneetthi onkhuwelelaka commo.
Ukati waatthukiyawe ni ikhwampa, Paulu ahomwiirela nhooleli aariwo: Wanawuphwanelani umwaafyulaca nroma woohihukhumwinya?
Wiiwa wawe itthu ile, nhooleli a anatoropa ahomwaavya nkhulupale awe wiira anlopole, amwiirelaka: Umphavela upanka isiyani? Kontha ula nlopwan'ola nroma.
Nkhulupale a anatoropa ule uwa wawe, ahonkoha Paulu eeraka: Ukihimerye, we nroma? Ule ahaakhula eeraka: Aye, phi yeemi.
Nkhulupale a anatoropa ule ahaakhula eeraka: Kiholiva ihisapu yinci yo ncurukhu kiphavelaka wiihaninya nroma. Paulu aheera: Mi ki nroma eeyarelo.
Wowaakuvyaca wene ale yaahala unkohakoha ni umwaafyulaca, yahothamaca. Nkhulupale a anatoropa ule ahoova ukati waacuwenlyawe wiira Paulu aari nroma, nlattu woolamulela utthukiya.

Usa waya, nkhulupale a anatoropa aphavelaka ucuwela yaariyeleliyawe Paulu na ayuta, ahontthukula, ni aholamulela wiira athukumane asuulupale o mayasataka ni mphwinko wa akhulupale othene, ni ahoruma uwaaninya Paulu, ahonthoonya uhoolo waya.
Vano Paulu aaweheehaka mphwinko wa akhulupale, aheera: Alopwana, asunnaka, kihokhala mpaka nihuku no'lelo na ankhili aka othene omaana wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Nanso nkhulupale o mayasataka, Ananiya, ahaaruma yaattamanannyawe wiira anvahe ilatuma.
Vano Paulu aheera: Nluku naahala wurakaliha, isiri yoosirinkiya! We uhowunkoma va wiira ukihukhumu toko cinhimyaya nlamulo, vano unaahanyuriha nlamulo unaaruma utupheliya mii?
Ale yaattamanannyawe yaheera: Unaanruwana nkhulupale o mayasataka a Nluku?
Paulu ahaakhula eeraka: Akaacuwela, asunnaka, wiira ula ri nkhulupale o mayasataka, maana ihantikhiya: Uhimuulume pufya nhooleli o'nethi aa.

Vano Paulu acuwelaka wiira mphantte wa akhulupale yaari masatusi ni akina ayo yaari mafarisi, ahokhuwela eeraka: Alopwana, asunnaka, mi ki nfarisi, mwana a nfarisi! Kinaahukhumwiya nlattu wo nwehereryo aka wo wunwelela mwa atthu ookhwa.
Vano wuulumiya waya ala moolumo ala, wahokhuma unyakulihana mafarisi ni masatusi, ni mphwinko ule wahokawannyaca.
Maana masatusi aneera khuuwo wunwelela ni hata ancelo, mena nnepa, nanso mafarisi anaakupali nnya citthu nnya cothene.

Vaavale wahaawo unyakula venci, ni yunwaka aalimu o malamulo o mphantte wo mafarisi, yaanhimyaca yiiracaka: Khaninoona ikoosi mwa ula ntthu ula. Tupani nocuwela wakhala wiira uhaawo nnepa atthuna ncelo onhimenrye?
Yahokhuma ipokoho yuulupale, ni yoovaka venci uthakaciya Paulu na ale, nkhulupale a anatoropa aholamula Ukumihiya Paulu n'urweehiya ukwartelu.
Vano uhiyu nkhwawe, Apwiya, anari mphantte wa Paulu, yaheera: Ulipe nrima! Maana mananna cisaahitihilyaa nlattu wawaka mi uYerusalemu, unlamuliya upanka ciicammo uRoma.
Vano usa waya, ayuta akina yahovaanela ni yaholupela yiiracaka khayaahala ulya hata uwurya ahinaya umwiiva Paulu.
Ni yahaawo woovikana atthu arupayini (40) yaalakenle commo.
Vano ala yahorwaa woolumana akhulupale o mayasataka ni mahumu ni yaheerela: Niholupela ni ikilapho wiira, khaninhala ulya itthu nihimwiivile toko Paulu.

Vano, nyu ni mphwinko wa akhulupale, munlepele nkhulupale a anatoropa wiira awiihiye iriyari inyu, wiira niphwanye ihapari co'khweli co nlahanya wawawe. Hi niri owiitthenkacene umwiiva uyo hinaya uphiya va.
Vaavale mwaanculawe Paulu, mwana a mwanrokorawe, aheewa mavaaneliyo ale, ahorwaa ukwartelu ni ahonttonkela cothene Paulu.
Uyo ahomwiihana nhooleli mmoca a anatoropa iminya, n'umwiirela: Munkuse mwammirawo ula mpaka wa nkhulupale a anatoropa. Uyo haana itthu yoorera uhimyaca.
Vaavale ule ahonkusa mpaka wa nkhulupale a anatoropa ni aheera: Nantthukiya Paulu, akiihanaka, ahokilepela wiira kinkuse mwammirawo ula, maana haana itthu yoorera wuuhimyacera.
Ni nkhulupale, anvarelaka ntata ni anrwehaka mphantte nkina, ahonkoha: Urinani yoorera ukihimyacera?
Ni ule aheera: Ayuta ahovaanela wiira meelo yulepele wiira unrwaane Paulu upwaro wo mphwinko wa akhulupale aphavelaka unkoha itthu phi itthu.

Nanso nyu nhikweehaciye, maana wookhalaka atthu arupayini (40) anonlupattha, ni ayo aholakela, pooti ulaphiya, uhilya n'uhiwurya mpaka umwiiva, ni aholikaneliya, ahalaka wuuwehereryani nyu mwaavahe ilepenlyaya.
Vaavale nkhulupale ule ahonleeha mmirawo ule, n'umwiirela ahinhimerye ntthu wiira phanttonkelawe.

Aheehana ahooleli awe eeli a anatoropa iminya ni aheerelaca: Yeettaka iwora yonakhentta yo'hiyu, mwaatthenkace anatoropa iminya piili, ni sapini (70) o'khavalu, ni iminya piili o mavaka, wiira arwee mpaka uSesareya,
muntthenkacere Paulu mpakhira wiira aphiye ookhikicerya wa nlamuli Felisi.
Nkhulupale ule ahantikha iwarakha yaattonka coo:
Kalautiyu Lisiya, kinveleeliheraka oolemelihiya nlamuli Felisi, isalamu.
Uyo nlopwana uyo tthukiye na ayuta, mpaka yaahanle vakani umwiiva, ukati waphiilyaka na anatoropa aka, kihomoopola, maana kahomoonelela wiira uyo nroma.
Kiphavelaka ucuwela itthu yootheriyawe, kahonrwaana upwaro waya.
Vano kahoonenela wiira waari nlattu wo nlamulo naya, nanso khayaariwo ikoosi yomwaaca uyo yoophwanela wiiviya atthuna ukela nkalaposo.
Vano uhimeriya waka wiira hovaaneliya wiiviya, kihooveleeliherani nyu wowaakuvyaca wene. Ni ciicammo kihaalamulela ale yaanriyelela wiira yuuhimeryeni itthu inonriyelelaya.
Vano anatoropa, attharihelelaka toko caalamuliyaya, yahonkusa Paulu uhiyu, ni yahophiya wAntipatrite.
Usa waya, yahaahiya anakhavalu unrwaana ule, ni yahohokoleela ukwartelu.
Vano waaphilyaya anakhavalu uSesareya, yahommaha iwarakha nlamuli ule wamoca ni Paulu.
Vaavale nlamuli ule ahosoma iwarakha ile n'unkoha wiira aari o nttetthe wo vayi. Ahohimeriya wiira aari nsilisiya.
Vano ule aheera: Kinaahala wiiwa ikoosi iyo yawaacaka anowootheryaca ayo. Vano aholamula wiira Paulu awehawehiye nari wapuwani wa nlamuli Heroti.
Anavinre mahuku mathanu, nkhulupale o mayasataka Ananiya ahorwaa uSesareya ni mahumu akinaku ayuta ni mayowaakihera milattu, eehaninya Terutulu, yaale yaawile wa nlamuli umootheryaca Paulu.
Vano weehaninyawe Paulu, Terutulu ahopacera unriyelela eeraka:

Oolemelihiya Felisi, naari ni mpuha ukati mwinci muulamulani mwaa, ula unethi ula, ni mananna cilokiherenryaa ila ilapo ila. Mahuku othene ni miphantte cothene, oolemelihiya Felisi, nihoonela urera waya ni usukurwela wothene ala mananna ala.
Nanso, wo wiira kihukusere ukati mwinci, kinawulepela we ni ikiriri caa wiira univiriyane vakani paahi.
Nihoonela wiira ula nlopwan'ola ri ntthu ookukuryeha, nohaculaca nceece mwa ayuta ilapo yothene. Ula ri nhooleli muulupale o nikhoto na anattiini o'Nasaree
ni mpaka hotteha uhanyuriya inupa ittakattifu. Phimaana nimphavela unhukhumu toko cinhimyaya nlamulo nihu.
Nanso nkhulupale a anatoropa neehaninya Lisiya ahonkusa Paulu ni ikuru cinci mmatatani mwihu
ni aholamula wiira yaanriyelela ayo yiithoonyihere. Vano unkohe ni unaahala ucuwela ikhweli umootheryaca unompankehu.
Ayuta ciicammo yahohimyaca coomotheryaca nnye, akhuluvelihaka wiira caahimyaya nnye caari co'khweli.
Vano Paulu waavahiyawe nlove ni nlamuli wiira oolumace, ule aheera: Kihocuwela wiira myakha cinci civinre unari mayahukhumu ila ilapo ila. Phimaana, wootteeliyene kinawiicaakiha.
Woohirika, unaahala woonenela wiira ahinavira mahuku khumi na meeli, kahorwaa uYerusalemu ulompa
ni akiphwanyinye wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu kinnyakulihananaka ntthu hata utheperyaa mphwinko wa atthu nsinakoka hata mparasa.
Ni hata vakani khiiwo yoothoonyera ikhweli wo itthu inootheryaciyaka va.

Nanso kinoohimerya ikhweli muulupale wiira mi kintthara Iphiro ineehanaya ayuta nikhoto na anatiini, nanso commo phinonlapelaka Nluku a anhakhalayi ihu. Kinaakupali citthu cothene cantikhiye muNlamuloni na Musa ni Minapiyu.
Ni kihaana mwa Nluku yooyo nwehereryo uyo wa ala atthu ala, wiira unaahala ukhala wunwelela, wa atthu o'sariya ni ayo oohi isariya.
Phimaana kinaamananiha ni ikuru cothene ukati wothene wamiithoni wa Nluku ni wa atthu ukhala oorera nrima.
Kahothwaa myakha cinci, kihowa uYerusalemu uwiiha icimola ni coovaha kiwiiheraka unethi aka.
Vano kipankakene commo, kinari owiirapihene, kahophwanyinya wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu, woohiikelakeliha na atthu atthuna munceeceni.
Nanso ahaawo ayuta akina yaari o'lapo yo wAsiya, yaalamuliya ukhala va wamiithoni waa ni uhimyaca ikoonnyaya, akhala wiira ahaana itwaana ni mi.
Atthuna yaala ari vaava ala yaalamuliya uhimya yootakhala iphwannyaya wo mi waakusiyaka wa mphwinko wa akhulupale,
ari hinookhala ula. Ukati kithoonyilyaka wa ayo, kahokhuwela kiiraka: Nlattu wo wunwelela wa atthu ookhwa phimaana kihukhumwinyaka ilelo iriyari inyu.
Vano Felisi, aari oocuwelaca Iphiro ile, ahontteeleliha eeraka: Wanhalawe uphiya nkhulupale a anatoropa Lisiya, kinaahala uhimyaca ikoosi inyu ila.
Ni ahonlamulela nhooleli a anatoropa iminy'ole wiira nanlelo aansunke Paulu, nanso anhiye utthampuwa vakani ni antthunihere wiira awacawaciye na asimpwanawe ale.
Vano anavinre mahuku menci, Felisi ahowa ni Trusila, amwaarawe, yaari nyuta, yahoruma urweeliya Paulu ni yahomwiiwa oolumacaka ihaali yo nroromelo na Kristu Yesu.
Nanso Paulu wapacenryawe wuulumaca ihaali yo'sariya, wiivaraca wa ntthu ni ihukhumu immwa, Felisi ahoova ni aheera: Vano, paahi! Ukhumeke. Wanhalaka woonela va, kinaahala uwiihana tho.
Ni yooyo ukati uyo aawehererya wiira naahala uvahiya ncurukhu ni Paulu, phimaana aammwiihana imaara cinci amoopanaka mwaha.
Uvira waya myakha miili, Felisi ahorentteliya ni Porisiyu Festu. Nlattu woophavela waaciveliha ayuta, Felisi ahonhiya Paulu nkalaposo.
Vano waavinryaya mahuku mararu uphiya wawe mwiilaponi mmwe, Festu ahokhuma uSesareya arwaaka uYerusalemu,
wonwo, akhulupale o mayasataka ni ayuta oocuwannyaa waphilyaya wariyari wawe, athoonyeraka caamootheryacaya Paulu.
Vano aholepeliya Festu wiira Paulu arweehiye uYerusalemu, mananna ahaatthunawe Paulu, maana yaatthenkemanihaca umwiipithela wiira amwiive ni iphiro.
Vaavale Festu ahaakhula eeraka: Paulu hotthukiya uSesareya, ni mi kinrwaa wonwo naanano va.
Arwaaceke ni mi akhulupale awe akinaku ni mwahimyaceke cimmootheryenyu ula ntthu ula, akhala khweli wiira ihaawo ipankilyawe yoovonyiha.
Uvira waya mahuku wookhalaka naane atthuna khumi, ahorwaa uSesareya, ni usa waya, ahaalattula mayahukhumu ni ahoruma wiira awiihiye Paulu waaryawe.
Vano Paulu waawiihiyawe, ayuta yaakhumile uYerusalemu yahothukumana anrukureryaka, amootheryacaka citthu cinci ni co woopiha ni cahaacuwelelaya.
Vano Paulu ahopacera wiicaakiha eeraka: Khiiwo ipankilyaka yoovonyiha munlamuloni no ayuta, inupa ittakattifu, atthuna wa Sesari.
Vaavale Festu, aphavelaka waafentelela ayuta, ahonkoha Paulu eeraka: We unaatthuna urwaa uYerusalemu ni wonwo uhukhumwinya iriyari aka mi nlattu wo wootheryaciya?
Vano Paulu ahaakhula eeraka: Nna va kiri mpwaro mwa Sesari, unlamuliyaka uhukhumwinya. Khiiwo yeerihilyaka ayuta, toko cincuwelaa venci cinene.

Akhala wiira khweli kihokosa nlattu woopanka itthu inkiphwanela wiiviya, akinkhotta ukhwa. Nanso akhala wiira wootheryaciya umpankiyaka na ala ayuta ala khunakhala wo'khweli, khaawo rina ihathuwa yokirweha wa ale. Kinaalepela kirwaaninye wa Sesari!
Wahoolo nakohilene mayonlaka awe, Festu aholamula eeraka: We unlepenle Sesari, mweeco unarwaa wa Sesari.
Anavinre mahuku vakani, mwene Akiripa ni Pernise, yahophiyaca uSesareya wiira yansalameehe Festu.
Kontha yaanavira mahuku menci, Festu ahonttonkela mwene ule ihaali ya Paulu, eeraka: Haawo va nlopwana mmoca tthukiye, anhilyawe Felisi.
Vano warweelyaka uYerusalemu, akhulupale o mayasataka ni mahumu a ayuta ahomootheryaca yooyo, alepelaka wiira ahukhumwinye.
Vano mi keerenle khinakhala ilemalelo ya aroma unhukhumu ntthu hinaya wiicaakiha mwa ale anomootherya ni ukhalana ukati wo wiicaakiha wootheryaciya nwe.
Ni awaacaka ni mi va, mena akipicapicihile nlahanya ula. Kahaalattula mayamilattu waaseelo ni kaholamula wiira arweeliye nlopwana uyo.
Vano mayomootheryaca wonwacilyaya wiira yuulume, khayaamootheryacile itthu yawehereryaka ukhala ikoosi.
Woovirikana commo, yaarina citthu co nceece paahi ni uyo, nlattu wo'ttiini aya ni mwaha wo nlopwana mmoca neehaninya Yesu, khwile, nonhimyawe Paulu nanlelo ri nkumi.
Vano phikhanlyaka kakayi woohicuwelela matholatholelo ula mwaha ula. Phimaana kukohaka wiira pooti urwaa uYerusalemu wiira ahukhumwinye wonwo nlahanya wo cennya citthu nnya.
Nanso Paulu aholepela wiira awehereriye Sesari. Vano kaholamula wiira asunkiye mpaka wanhalaka unveleeliha wa Sesari.
Vaavale Akiripa ahomwiirela Festu: Ni mi wahokicivela umwiiwa yooyo nlopwana uyo. Vano uyo ahaakhula eeraka: Meelo unaahala umwiiwa.
Vaavale, usa waya Akiripa ni Pernise, yahowaaca n'ukelaca wansana wamoca na akhulupale a anatoropa na alopwana o'hisima o'sittatti mmwe. Festu aholamula ni Paulu ahowiihiya.

Vano Festu aheera: Mwene Akiripa ni atthu othene ari va ni hi, mmooneke ula nlopwan'ola! Ayuta othene ahokilepela nlahanya wawawe yoola uYerusalemu, ni wa Sesareya va, akhuwelaka wiira khaalamuliya ukhala tho nkumi.
Nanso kihoonela wiira, khiiwo yoophwanela uyo ukhwa, nanso, maana holepela urweehiya wa Sesari, kiholakela unveleeliha uRoma.

Paahi, akirina ikina tho mwa uyo wiira kiwantikheleni nyuva, nri oolupale oolemelihiya. Phimaana, mi kihommwiiha wamiithoni winyu, venci venci wa we, mwene Akiripa, wiira, inhala uphwanyinya mutholatholiyani, koone yoorera wantikha.
Maana khavankikhalela ratta unveleeliha nantthukiya woohihimyeeha itthwene isiyani inootheraciyawe.
Vaavale Akiripa ahomwiirela Paulu: We uhotthuniheriya wuulumaca wiira wiicakihe. Wahoolo Paulu ahopanka ikanyero ni ntata ni ahopacera wiicakiha:
Mwene Akiripa, ilelo kihotteeliya nlattu wookhala wamiithoni waa, wiira kiicakihe cothene cinriyeleliyaka na ayuta,
ni venci venci kontha unaacuwela ilema ni ipokoho caya ayo. Phimaana, kinawulepela wiira ukiviriyane woopisa nrima.
Ayuta othene anaacuwela mananna cikhanlyaka ukhuma isimirawo, ukhuma ilapo iyaryenlyaka mpaka uYerusalemu.
Maana ayo anaakicuwela ikhumelo yo khalayi ni pooti ukivahera usaahiti wiira, mi kaari nfarisi, kaattharihelela nikhoto noovarecesa ilema co'ttiini ihu.
Vano, kinaahukhumwinya nlattu wo nwehereryo weetthu yaalupelenlyawe Nluku mayapaapehu o khalayi,

wiira maloko ehu khumi na meeli umvarele nteko Nluku wo'kuru uhiyu n'uthana, ula phi nkhuluvelo ummwehereriya wiira utthariheleliye. We mwene, nlattu wo yoola nwehereryo ula, phinriyeleliyaka ni ayuta.
Nlattuni atthu va nnoonenyu wiira khawanooryanyaa Nluku wonweleliha atthu ookhwa?
Ni mi ciicammo kahokupaleela wiira kaalamuliya upanka mananna menci wiira kikhotte ncina na Yesu o'Nasaree.
Ni phi yeeyo ipankilyaka uYerusalemu. Kitthuniheriyaka ni nkhulupale o mayasataka, kihaavonyera attakattifu enci nkalaposo, ni ale wahukhumwinyaya wiiviya, ni mi kaankupaleela.
Vano imaara cinci kaanrwaa wo khula sinakoka wiira kaattaruse, ni kaanaakhanyereriha wiira akufuru. Ni urusiya waka na ale, kihophiya mpaka isittatti co'lapo cikina koomolanihacaka.
Ikwaha imoca mi kaarwa uTamasiku, nlattu wootthuniheriya ni uleveliya ni nkhulupale o mayasataka.
Mwene, waari uthana ncuwa wamuru, mi kinari mphironi, kahoona waarya wo wirimu, woopwaha waarya wo ncuwa, waakirukurenrye mi na ale yaarinaka.
Othene nahowuluwela vathi. Vaavale kaheewa ncu nakiirela ni nuulumo neeparayiku: Saulu, Saulu, unkoomolanihacerani? We wahikiiweleleke mi toko mwannama, uneeweryaa umwanene.
Vano kahonkoha kiiraka: Tupani we, Pwiya? Ni Apwiya yahaakhula yiiraka: Phi mi Yesu, nomoomolanihacaa.
Vano wunwe, weemele. Mi kuuphwanyenre wiira kuupanke nrumeyi ni saahiti w'etthu nnya nlattu wawaka mi ni itthu inhalaka wuthoonyera.
Mi kinaahala uwoopola munethini waa, ni mwa amalaponi, wonwo unoveleelihaka

wiira waatthukule miitho ni waakumihe mpiphini waarwanaka uwaaryani, ni ukhuma nkuruni ca Sotwani waarwanaka wa Nluku ni wiira aleveleliye itampi caya ni yaakhele mphantte wa ale anttakattifihiya nlattu wo nroromelo naka mi.
Commo, mwene Akiripa, mena akihanyurihile iyooni yo wirimu.

Woopacera kaalalyenre ale ari uTamasiku, wahoolo ale yaari uYerusalemu ni uYuteya wothene, ni ciicammo amalaponi, keerelaka wiira arukunuse nrima ni ahokoleelace wa Nluku, apankaka miteko cinthoonyihera urukunusa nrima nwo.
Phimaana ayuta waakitthukilyaya wapuwani wo'nupa ittakattifu ni akimananihaka ukiiva.

Nanso kaalikelela nkavihero na Nluku mpaka nihuku no'lelo, ni nlattu wo yeeyo, kiri va ni kinaampanka namooni ukhuma wa atthu ookhicera mpaka atthu oocuwanyaa. Khiiwo inhimyaka woovikana ihimyacile minapiyu ni Musa wiira yaanhala ukhumelela:
Wiira Kristu aalamuliya uhuva ni naryene oopacera wunwelela mwa atthu ookhwa, aanawiiha waarya wunethini wawe ni wa amalaponi.
Vano yoole ukati ule Festu ahonteeleliha wiicaakiha wa Paulu ni aheera ni ncu nowiirunya: We uhovahuwa, Paulu! Usoma waa nwo unoorweha wuuvahuwani!
Vaavale Paulu ahaakhula eeraka: Mi akivahuwile, Festu oottittimihyaa. Inhimyaka iri yo khweli ni yokupalyaa.
Amwene nhocuwela nnya citthu nnya, ni kinoohimeryani wa kwalyaa. Kihokupali wiira khiiwo yoovithyaa, maana khayiiranyeele nipuro phi nipuro.
Mwene Akiripa, unaakupali minapiyu? Mi kinaacuwela wiira unawaakupali.
Vano Akiripa ahomwiirela Paulu: We unooniha wiira ukati vakani unaakooryaca wiira kikhale nkristu?
Paulu ahaakhula eeraka: Ukati vakani atthuna mwinci, kinaanlepela Nluku wiira, woohikhala we paahi, nanso mpaka ale othene ankiiwa ilelo akhale na ayo toko mi, nanso woohikhala ni unyolo toko ula.
Vano wo yoole ukati ule, ahonwa mwene ule ni ciicammo nlamuli ule, ni Pernise, na ale yonkomannyawe.
Ni nakhumilene, atthu ale yeera yuulumacaka ntthu ni nkhwawe, yiiracaka: Ula ntthu ula khiiwo ipankilyawe yoophwanela wiiviya atthuna utthukiya.
Vano Akiripa ahomwiirela Festu: Ula ntthu ula khweli aanhala utaphuliya, ahaavekenle urwaaniya wa Sesari.
Ukati waalakeliyaya wiira nirwee wItaliya, Paulu wamoca na anantthukiya akina, yahovahereriya nhooleli a anatoropa mmoca eehaninya Cuuliyu, aari o nikhoto no mayonkhaliha mwene Sesari.
Nahokelaca ikalawa yo wAtraamitu yaarwa miphantte co wAsiya, nahokela mpahari ni nahorwaca, nintthukanaka ikwaha Aristarku, mmasetoniyu o'sittatti yo'Tesalonika.
Waasilyaya, nahophiya uSitoni, ni Cuuliyu, anwacawacaka Paulu wo nnema, ahontthunihera wiira oonanane asimpwanawe, wiira ale ankavihere caaphavelawe.
Ukati wakhumilehu nwe, nahovira uhitto waya uSipere, nlattu iphyoo nnyo caari coovirikana.
Vano, ulapuwa wihu ipahari yoohulyaa, mphantte wo'Silisiya ni uPanfiliya, naheemela uMira uLisiya.
Waphwannyawe nhooleli ule ikalawa yo wAlisantiriya, yaarwaa wItaliya, yeeyo yahonikusa.

Naheetta vakani vakani mahuku menci, ni cahonikhuna itafawuti wowiira niphiye uNitu. Waahooryehu upwaherera ikwaha ehu, nlattu wo'phyoo caavirikana, nahorwaa mphantte wo uhitto wo'Kereta uhoolo wa Salimona.
Naheemela wacivirini vale ni itafawuti ni nahophiya nipuro neehaninya Miselo Coorera, cineemela ikalawa, wakhiviru ni iparasa yo'Laseya.
Wahovira ukati mwinci, ni waari ukati wo masakha wowiira nipwaherere ikwaha ehu, ni ciicammo ikwaha eyo yaari yootepa woopiha, ni ukati wontthuka ramatani wahomala, vaavale Paulu ahaalopola eerelaka:
Alopwana, mi kinoona wiira ikwaha ehu ila inhala ukhala yookukuryaa ukhuma va, kontha citthu cinci cinaahala utankanyaa ni urihakyaaca, woohikhala ikalawaru ni mirintti, nanso mpaka ukumi ihu.
Nanso nhooleli ule, aankupali paahi nahota ni mwanene o'kalawa woovikana yaahimyawe Paulu.

Kontha nselo uyo khawaari woorera weemela ukati wo iyiita, atthu enci yaholakela upwaherera ikwaha iyo, awehereryaka uphiya uFenisi ni wonwo avirihe ukati wo iyiita. Uyo waari nselo wo'Kereta, waakelela mphantte wo uculu ni woohitto.

Vaavale wapacenryawe uwuka kuusi vakani vakani akhumaka mphantte wo'hitto, ale yuupuwelaka wiira ahophwanyaca itthu yaaphavelaya, yahonkhula nankora ni yaheettiha ikalawa nceresere wo'civiri yo'Kereta.
Nanso unamanle ukati vakani, ahowuka wacivirini vale nkhaya neehaninya Eurakilo, aakhuma mphantte unkhuma ncuwa.
Ikalawa ele yahosinyinyiya ni ikuru, wahinooryaya ulipana iphyoo ele, nahohiya weettiha n'utthara iphyoo.
Waavirehu uhitto waya iciviri yankani yeehaninya Kawuta, nahokhuna masakha wowiira niphwanye ikalawa ikani.

Vano, uphwanya wihu, yahoteeseriya nkalawani yuulupale ni yahotthukeleliya ni mikhoyi, kontha yoova wiira naahala uphara unhaavani wo nselo wo Sirite. Vaavale yahokurusa ntthanka ni yahohiya ikalawa wiira yeette.
Usa waya, anattarusiyene venci ni nkhaya ule, yahopacera urihakacela vate mirintti nnyo.
Vano nihuku noneeraru, yahovonyeraca mpahari ikaruma co'kalawa.
Uvira waya mahuku menci woohoonnya ncuwa mena itthoottwa nlattu wo nkhaya mwinci, vaavale nroromelo no woopwa nahovolola.
Vano othene uviriha waya ukati mwinci woohilya, Paulu aheemela iriyari aya ni aheera: Nyenyu alopwana, mwalamuliya ukitthunela wenryaka nihikhume uKereta, kaaceraka wiira ninemecere ila ihasara ila.
Nanso nna va, kinwiirelani nlipe nrima, maana khaawo mwa nyu nohala ukhwa, nanso ikalawa paahi phinhala ukwanyulaciya.
Maana, yoola uhiyu ula, ncelo a Nluku yooyo kiryaka awawe ni nonrumeelaka, aari ni mi,
eeraka: Paulu, uhoove! Unlamuliya uphiya wa Sesari. Nlattu wo nnema nawe, Nluku hoovaha ukumi wa atthu othene ari ni we munkwahani mmo.
Phimaana, nlipe nrima, alopwana. Kontha kinaankupali Nluku aka wiira inaakhumelela toko cihimeriyaka.
Nanso ninlamuliya ucuserihiya mpaka wacivirini.
Vano waphilyaya uhiyu wonakhumi na micese, nirweheliyaka uno n'uno ipahari yo Atiriyatiku, wookhalaka uhiyu iriyari, anahota ale yoopuwela wiira yahaattamerya wari itthaya.
Vano uphima waya meesero o maasi ale, yahoona wiira yaari miliko talathini na saapa (37). Unavinre ukati vakani, yahophima tho ni nliko ule ni yahoona wiira yaari miliko sirini na saapa (27).
Vano noovaka ukhittaniha ikalawa ile ni maluku, yahaavonyera anankora acese ni yaanavekela wiira use.
Anahota ale yahomananiha upanka mananna ootthawa nkalawani mmwe, yahokumiheraca ikalawa mpahari, yoothererihaka wiira yaarwaa unvonyera nankora mpahari mphantte wo'hoolo wo'kalawa.
Vaavale Paulu ahomwiirela nhooleli a anatoropa wamoca na anatoropa ale wiira: Ala atthu ala yaahikhaleke nkalawa mu, nyu khannohala woorya wiicoopola.
Commo, anatoropa ale yahothikilaca nkhoyi wo'kalawa ile ni yahohiya imoraka.
Uhalaka vakani usa, Paulu aheerela atthu ale wiira alye, eeraka: Ilelo ninawoonannya nihuku nonakhumi na macese akhanlenyu ni nweherenrenyu woohilya.
Vano mi kinoolepelani wiira nlye, commo phinhalenyu ukhala akumi. Khaawo wa nyu nohala ummora ikharari hata imoca.
Paahi, wuulumaca wawe commo, ahokusa nkatthe ni ahosukuru wa Nluku wamiithoni wa atthu othene. Vano ahomyaniha ni aholya.
Othene yaholipihiya nrima ni yaholyaca.
Munkwahani mmwe, naari atthu iminya piili wo sapini na siita (276).
Wahoolo analyaacilene mpaka uvona, yahorihelaca itiriku mpahari wiira ikalawa ivenwe.
Waasilyaya, khayaacuwelenle ilapo yaaryaya, nanso yoonne icenkweni uttayi, wonwo waalakenlyaya urwaa ni ikalawa ile, wanooranele.
Vano, yahothikila mikhoyi ca anankora n'utaphula mikhoyi co'leemi ni phihiyaka umorela mmaasini. Vano yahowehihera ntthanka uhoolo iphyoo phittharaka arwaaka ucenkweni.
Nanso ikalawa yahophara nipuro no mihaava mpaka ukwanya vathi. Mpatta wo'hoolo wahophara ni ikalawa yaheemela, ni mpatta wo'ttuli wahokwanyuwa nlattu wo mawimpi oocaca cinene.
Anatoropa ale yaholakela wiira yeevakace anantthukiya ale wiira hikhale nohala utthawa, arampelaka mpahari.
Nanso nhooleli a anatoropa aaphavela unemecera ukumi wa Paulu, ahaahiiha caalakenlyaya. Vano ahaalamulela ale yoorya urampela, wiira woopacera yiituphelihe mpahari wiira alapuwele ucenkweni.
Vano akina ayo yaalamuliya ulapuwa ni ithaapwa, akina ni maphalapacu o'kalawa. Paahi, wo yaala mananna ala othene yaholapuwela ucenkweni anari akumi.
Uphiya wihu ucenkweni, nahocuwela wiira iciviri ile yeehaninya Malta.
Atthu o yeele iciviri ile yahonaakhelela sana sana, kontha yahoparihelaca mooro mwa nlattu wo'pula yaarupa ni uririya.
Paulu ahaattamerya wamooroni vale, avonyeraka nivici norevela, ivili itthawaka uviha nwe, yahomwaakeryaca ntata.
Ukati woonnyaya yaakhalaca wacivirini ale, inwaa ile inampharelenle wantatani, yaheerelana ayaayoru: Khweli ula nlopwan'ola nannyatha, kontha, noopweelene mpahari, isariya khinonhiya ukhala nkumi.
Nanso ule ahotathela inwaa ile wamooroni, ni khayaamwiirihile itthu hata vakani.

Vaavale atthu ale yaawehererya wiira Paulu naanhala umwiipa ntata atthuna wowaakuvyaca uwuluwa n'ukhwa. Nanso, ale anaweherenryene, ni ahoonaka itthu yoonanara, yahaarukunusa ankhili aya yiiraka: Ula ri mmoca a anluku.
Wo waattamana yooyo mphantte uyo, nahaawo nipuro naari na nlopwana oocuwanyaa eehaninya Pupiliyu muulupale o'civiri ile, ule ahonaakhelela womaana ni univaha mapuro oorupa mpaka mahuku mararu.
Vaavale, athumwane Pupiliyu yaamwerennya mmirimani mo'phome ni waaviha irutthu. Paulu ahorwaa waathotola, uphiya wawe ahaavekelela aathatelaka matata ni ahaavoniha.
Wiirannyaa waya ila itthu ila, aretta akina o wacivirini yahowaaca ni yahovonihinya.
Ale yahonivaha ihisima cuulupale. Niphavelaka upwaherera ikwaha, ale yahonivahaca cothene caaphavelehu.
Uvira waya myeeri miraru, nahokela ikalawa yo wAlisantiriya yaalokenle ukati wooririya ncivirini mmwe ni aarina ikanyero yeehaninya Tiyoskoru, maanaya anluku o mavatta.
Waphilehu uSirakusa, nahokhala mahuku mararu,
upwaha wihu nahophiya uRekiyu. Usa waya, yaawuka iphyoo yookhuma uhitto, ni ukati wo mahuku meeli, nahophiya uPutoli.
Nwo nahaaphwanya asunnihu akina yaanilepenle wiira naakhalane mpaka mahuku saapa, ni commo phaapwahenrehu uRoma.

Vano wiiwa waya asunna wiira nineera niwaaka, yahonisiceerya mpaka ipacari ya Apiyu ni isittatti ineehaninya Uloca Ttharu. Vano Paulu woonnyawe, ahonsukuru Nluku ni nlattu wo yeeyo, yahonlipa makhuva.
Uphiya wihu uRoma, Paulu ahottuniheriya ukhala mphantte awe, nari ni natoropa aanrontta.

Uvira waya mahuku mararu, ule ahaalattula akhulupale a ayuta, ni waathukumanaya, aheerelaca: Asunnaka, Khiiwo ipankilyaka yoohanyurihela unethi hata yowaahanyurihela anhakhalayi, nanso kihotthukiya ukhuma uYerusalemu, kivahereriyaka mmatatani mwa aroma.
Ale anakikohacilene, yahophavela ukitthukula yiiracaka khanoonne ikoosi yoorerela wiiviya.
Nanso ukhotta waya ayuta, kaholepela wiira nlattu aka ula woolumaceriye ni Sesari, kihikhalanaka itthu yooriyelela unethi aka.
Phimaana kiwiihanakani wiira kaawooneni ni kiwuulumaneni, kontha nlattu wo nwehereryo wo'Sirayeli phitthukeliyaaka n'ula unyolo ula.
Vano ale yahomwiirela: Hi khanaakhelenle iwarakha yookhuma uYuteya yowuhimya we, ni ciicammo khaawo munna wile unihimerya itthu yoonanara ipankilyaa.
Nanso hi naaphavela wiiwa itthu inoopuwelaa, kontha weekhweli hi ninaacuwela wiira mapuro othene nikhoto ninyu nna ninawuuluminya pufya.

Uleehaninya waya nihuku noonkumanana, yahowa atthu enci wiira amoonanane Paulu unupani waamakilyawe. Vano ikhumelo wicisu mpaka ucoocilo, ahaathoonyihera usaahiti wo umwene wa Nluku, aphavelaka wooryaca ihaali ya Yesu, ukhuma Nlamulo na Musa ni Minapiyu.
Yahaawo akina yooryaciye ni ile yaahimyawe, nanso akina ayo yahokhanyerera uhikupali.
Vaavale, waheewananyaya ayaayoru, yaholeehaca, ni Paulu ahoolumaca eeraka coo: Nnepa Nttakattifu uhooluma ratta waacaka mayathumwaninyu ni nnapiyu Isaya, ukati wenryawe:
Urwee wa ula unethi ula ni wahimerye wiira: Nnaahala wiiwa nanso khannohala wiiweeha; nnaahala woona nanso khannohala ucuwelela.
Kontha nrima wo'nethi ula uri wooturumala; uhottiyela manyaru wiira uhiiwe, uhohicila wiira uhoone, ni uhicuwelele ni nrima aya; urukunusaka nrima ni mi kaavonihaka.
Vano ncuwele wiira uno woopola wa Nluku uno aveleeliheriye amalaponi, ni ayo anaahala wiiwa!
Noolumacilene ala moolumo ala, ayuta yahokhuma anyakulihanaka venci ayaayoru.
Ukati wo myakha miili Paulu ahokhala uwannyawe, inupa yaasimilyawe. Wonwo aanawaakhelela atthu othene yaarwa umoona,
aanlalyaa umwene wa Nluku ni aaneetthuciha wakwalyaa woohaatelihiya wuulumaca ihaali ca Apwiya Yesu Kristu.
Mi Paulu, nrumeyi a Yesu Kristu, kiihaninye ukhala mmitthenka, kithanliye nlattu wo nhupi woorera wa Nluku.
Yoola Nhupi ula, Nluku ahokhuluveliha minapiyu cawe mwa cowantikhiya cittakattifu,
nlattu wa Mwanawe, aayareele munlokoni na Taviti toko pinatamu.
Hocuwaneehiya ni Nnepa unttakattifiha, ukhala Mwanawe Nluku ni ikuru, mo wunwelela mwa atthu ookhwa, ri Yesu Kristu Apwiy'ehu.
Mwa yooyo ni nlattu wo ncina nawe, nihaakhela nnema n'umitthenka, wiira neehane, wariyari wa amalaponi othene, atthu oohala wiiwelela, unkhuma munroromeloni.
Ni nyu ciicammo, nri mwa ale yiihaninye ukhala a Yesu Kristu.
Wa othene oofentiya ni Nluku, ari uRoma, yeehaninye ukhala attakattifu. Nnema ni isalama wa nyu, ninkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Woopacera kinaansukuru Nluku aka, mwa Yesu Kristu, nlattu wawinyu, kontha ittuninya yothene inaahimya ikupalelo enyu.
Nluku nonvarelaka nteko ni nrima wothene, kilalyaka nhupi woorera wa mwanawe, uyo phiri usaahiti aka wo mananna cinwupuwelakani woohihiyerera
nnovekelaka ukati wothene. Kinvekela wiira, ukati nkina n'utthuna wa Nluku, akivahe nafasi oorera wuthotolani.
Kontha kinaaphavela uwoonananani, wiira kawukaweleni ivahiya imoca yo muNnepani, wiira nkhale oolipiheriya.
Iyo iri yo wiira, mi ni nyu nikhale oolipiheriya ni nroromelo nawinyu ni nawaka.
Asunnaka, ncuwele wiira imaara cinci kiholakela wuthotolani, nanso mpaka nna va kinawaateelihiya. Imphavelaka iri yo wiira kiphwanye mwa nyu nhokorokho, toko cimphwanyaka wa amalaponi akinaku.
Kontha kiri mayolokihiya na akereku ni asenci, acuweli ni oohicuwela.
Phimaana, kiri tayari ulalya nhupi woorera wa nyu ciicammo nri uRoma.
Akinoolihaceriya muru nhupi woorera, kontha ciri ikuru ca Nluku co woopola ale othene anroromela, upacera nyuta ni ciicammo nkereku.
Kontha isariya ya Nluku inooniheriya ni nhupi woorera, maana, ukhuma umpaceroni mpaka ummaleloni uri nlattu wo nroromelo, toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Nasariya nohala ukhala nkumi nlattu wo nroromelo.
Uviruwa wa Nluku unawoonihinya wirimu mwa cothene co mpiphini ni cootakhala ca atthu anvitha ikhweli nlattu woohitthara isariya.
Maana itthu iri yoocuwannyaa mwa Nluku inaathoonyiheriya wa ayo, kontha Nluku hoonihera.

Kontha yompiyeru ittuninya, makhalelo oohoonnya a Nluku, ari ikuru cawe coohimala ni iyiinluku irinawe, cinawoonnya woohivithya, cooniheriyaka mwa citthu cumpilyawe. Yaayo atthu anvitha isariya ayo khaanleveleliya.
Kontha anancuwenlene Nluku, khaanlemelihile toko Nluku ni khaansukhunru, nanso aheepanka oohi itthu mwankhilini mwaya, aripelihaka mirima caya ceelolo.
Yiiciirelaka a ankhili, ahothatuwa oovahuwa
ni ahaakakhaniha nttittimiho na Nluku hinkhwa, alikaniheraka ni ilatarato ya ntthu nokhwa, atthuna toko asaanuni, inama co metto micese ni cowiipurula.
Phimaana, Nluku haavaherera yaayo atthu ayo utthuna wo mirima caya, wiira atarawace irutthu caya ayaayoru.
Kontha yaayo ahaakakhaniha ikhweli ya Nluku ni citthu co woothiya, alapelaka n'uvarela nteko citthu coopattusiya phinhiyaka Mpattusi, ri oorerihiya woohimala. Ameni!
Mwa nlattu wo yeeyo, Nluku haavaherera mwa citthu caaphavelaya co'haaya. Mpaka athiyana ahorukunusa makhalelo aya eekhuruwano ni makinaku ahiri eekhuruwano.
Woolikana commo, alopwana ahohiya waathukumanana athiyana, ahokusa inanna ikina yaathukumananaka alopwana akhwaya, ni commo ahaakhela nttaruso no waaphwanela nlattu wo'tampi caya.
Nlattu woovyavyeeha uncuwela Nluku, uyo mwanene haavaherera utthuna wa ankhili aya oohi ifayita, wiira apanke cahaalamuliya upanka.
Mirima caya cihocara uhisariya, coonanara, isooyo ni ilema coohiloka. Ciicammo uhaacara urama, wiiva, unyakulihana, wootha n'ulavilavi. Ari oohankawaani,
mayowaapa, eenani a Nluku, mayoveha, mayowiicoona ni mayowanyihera, mayopantturerya coonanara, ooheewelela mayathumwanaya,
ari oohaankhili, oohikhuluvelyaa, oohaafenta akhwaya, oosilili.
Ayo anaacuwela nlamulo na Nluku nineera: Othene aneettela yaayo mananna ayo unawaaphwanela ukhwa. Nanso khaampanka paahi cennyo citthu nnyo, ciicammo anawaarumeleliha ampanka cennyo citthu nnyo.
Phimaana we unaahukhumu akhwaa, khunleveleliya, kontha uheehukhumu, nlattu wo mananna anaahukhumwaa akhwaa ni we upankaka cennyo.
Khweli ninaacuwela wiira ihukhumu ya Nluku iri yeekhweli ni inaaca ale ampanka cennyo citthu nnyo.
We uri ntthu, unaahukhumu ampanka cennyo ni we upankaka cennyo, unoopuwela wiira unaahala wootopwa ihukhumu ya Nluku?
Atthuna unthanya imaani awe yuulupale, ikiriri cawe ni uvilela wawe, woohicuwela wiira imaani ya Nluku inawuurukunusa nrima?
Nanso, nlattu woohanyuriha n'uturumala waa nrima, unawiiviruweliha wanhalaya uphiya nihuku no'hukhumu ya Nluku.
Nluku naahala untthuvela khula ntthu toko ciinryawe mavarelo nteko.
Uyo naahala waavaha ukumi woohimala ale ankhanyerera upanka coorera, yaavyaka waarya ni nttittimiho n'uhikhwa.
Nanso naahala waaviruwela ale ampanka coonanara, anhanyuriha ikhweli ni antthara coohi isariya.
Mahuviho ni coowerya cinkonkhuna khula ntthu nopanka yoonanara, upacera ayuta mpaka amalaponi;
nanso waarya, nttittimiho, ni imaani wa ale othene ampanka yoorera, woopacera ayuta mpaka amalaponi.
Kontha Nluku kharina nthanlo.
Maana othene kosile woohi Nlamulo, ciicammo woohi Nlamulo phinhalawe urimela, ni othene kosile ni Nlamulo, ciicammo ni Nlamulo phinhalawe uhukhumwinya.
Kontha khaanakhala ale aneewa Nlamulo phiri o'sariya wamiithoni wa Nluku, nanso ale antthara Nlamulo phinhala wiihaninya anasariya.
Maana amalaponi ahirina Nlamulo yapankaka ilema caya toko cinhimyaya Nlamulo, anoohikhalanaru Nlamulo, veekhayaru anaathatuwa nlamulo.
Ala anthoonyera cinhimyaya Nlamulo naantikhiye wanrimani waya. Toko commo, ankhili ni moopuwelo aya ciicammo anaavaha usaahiti, yiiriyelelaka ni yiicaakihaka.
Cothene nnyo cinhala woonnya nihuku ninhalawe Nluku uhukhumula isiiri ca atthu, mwa Yesu Kristu, toko cinhimyaya nhupi woorera unlalyaka.
Vano we uneehaninya nyuta, unkhuluvela Nlamulo ni uneehelaca uncuwela Nluku.
Unaacuwela utthuna wa Nluku ni Nlamulo ninaawiitthuciha uthanla itthu yoorera.
Uhokupali wiira uri nhooleli a atthu oohoona, uri nthuko wa ale ari mpiphini,
uri mayoweetthuciha atthu oohicuwela, mwalimu a asaana, kontha muNlamuloni uhaana mananna oocuwelaci ni eekhweli.
Vano we unaasomiha akina, uhiisomihaka umwanennya? We, unlalya wiira uhinnyinye, ni we winnyaka?
We uneera uheettiye uluva, weettak'ono? We unaakhotta anluku, unennyerani ciri mpaani mwaya mmo?
We uneettottopa nlattu wo Nlamulo, uhinlemelihaka Nluku unhanyurihelani Nlamulo?
Vano ihantikhiya wiira: Ncina na Nluku ninaatarawaciya na amalaponi nlattu wawaa.
Kontha wuula icantto unkhalana ifayita wattharihelelaka Nlamulo, nanso wahanyurihaka Nlamulo, unkhala toko oohuula.
Wakhala wiira oohuula naattharihelela Nlamulo, uyo khanhala wiireliya tho o wuula?
Ule huunle, nanso attharihelelaka Nlamulo, naahala wuuhukhumu we, unarina Nlamulo no wantikhiya ni wuunle uhittharihelelaka Nlamulo.
Kontha nyuta khanakhala ule neethoonyera mwirutthuni paahi, ni wuula khunakhala nwe umpankiya mwirutthuni paahi.

Nanso nyuta eekhweli ph'ule nocuwannya makhalelo o nrima awe, uri wuula umpankiya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, woohikhala toko Nlamulo nowantikhiya. Ayo, uttottopeliya waya nwo khunkhuma wa atthu, nanso unkhuma wa Nluku.
Vano ifayita yookhala nyuta phivi? Atthuna, wuula icantto uhaana ifayita aya?
Khweli uhaana ifayita aya, ni mananna menci! Ifayita yoopacera iri yo wiira Nluku haavaherera ayuta nhupi awe.
Vano wakhala wiira akina khaakupanli, uhikupali waya nwo unaahala ukwanyula ikhweli ya Nluku?
Mena vakani! Nluku akhale ookhweli. Atthu othene akhale owootha. Toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Nvaheriye isariya mmoolumoni mwinyu ni mwattheme mwakhalaka oohukhumwinya.
Nanso, wakhala wiira uhisariya wihu nwo unthoonyera isariya ya Nluku, ninhala wiira cani? Nluku khanasariya nlattu wooviruwa wawe? Kinoolumaca toko ntthu.
Mena vakani! Waari commo, Nluku aahala uhukhumula cani ittuninya?
Nanso wakhala wiira wootha waka unthoonyera ikhweli ya Nluku n'unttittimiha yooyo, vano kinhukhumweliyani nanlelo toko natampi?
Vano nihineerelani: Nrwee nipanke yoonanara wiira iwe yoorera? Akina anaanootherya wiira hi phineerehu commo. Ayo anaahala uhukhumwinya wo'sariya.
Vano niireke cani? Hi nihaana ifayita yo waapwaha akina? Mena vakani! Kontha nihoonihera wiira othene, ukhuma ayuta mpaka amalaponi, ari oothawaliya ni itampi.
Toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Khaawo nasariya mena mmoca,
khaawo noocuwelaca; khaawo nomwaavya Nluku.
Othene ahorimela, ni aheepanka oohi itthu, khaawo nopanka yoorera hata mmoca.
Mmilo aya uri toko mahiye, ni anawootha ni nlimi naya. Yamwe o'mpoma ri mmattereni mwaya.
Malaku aya ari oocara ikilapho ni yamwe owaawa.
Metto caya cinaakuvela weeva akhwaya,
nnoviraya mmo anaatankanya ni anhiya masakha;
khaancuwela iphiro yeemaani.
Wanrimani waya va khaammoova Nluku.
Vano nihocuwela wiira cothene cinhimyaya Nlamulo, cinaaca ale aneettela nenno wiira malaku othene amaale, ni ittuninya yothene ikhale vathi waya ihukhumu ca Nluku,
kontha khaawo nohala uvaheriya isariya wa Nluku nlattu woottharihelela Nlamulo, nanso nlattu wo Nlamulo phincuwelehu itampi.
Vano Nluku honoonihera mananna cinaavaherawe isariya atthu, woohikhala wo Nlamulo. Nenno Nlamulo na Musa nno ni Minapiyu phinvahera usaahiti,
isariya ya Nluku nlattu wookupali mwa Yesu Kristu wa ale othene anaamini. Khuuwo uhawulana,
kontha othene ahokosa ni ari uttayi ni waarya wa Nluku,
ni ahovaheriya isariya yo nnema nawe no mahala mwa Yesu Kristu.
Nluku honvaherera Kristu wiira akhale isataka yo nlevelelo wa ale ammwaamini. Commo Nluku phaathoonyenryawe isariya awe yoohittarusa itampi caapankiye khalayi.
Pankenle iyo wiira athoonyere isariya awe ula ukati ula, maana Nluku ri o'sariya ni nawaavahera isariya ale ammwaamini Yesu.
Vano wiittottopa nwo uri vayi? Unaatamihinya. Uttharihelelaka isiyani? Utthara wo Nlamulo? Mena vakani, nanso munroromeloni.
Hi nincuwelela wiira ntthu novaheriya isariya ni Nluku nlattu wo nroromelo, woohikhala nlattu woottharihelela Nlamulo.
Atthuna, Nluku ri a ayuta paahi? Kahimwena ciicammo Nluku a amalaponi? Khweli ciicammo ri Nluku a amalaponi!
Nluku ri mmoca paahi ni nawaavahera isariya ayuta na amalaponi munroromeloni.
Maanaya wiira nlattu wo nroromelo, Nlamulo nno khaninhelela? Mena vakani! Uhiya commo, nineera wiira Nlamulo nno nihaana ifayita.
Vano ninhala uhimyani nlahanya wa athumwanihu okhalayi, aneehaninya Aparahamu?
Wakhalaka wiira Aparahamu vaheriye isariya ni Nluku nlattu wo miteko, uyo haana yowiittottopela, nanso khunakhala wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Vano, cowantikhiya cittakattifu cinhimyani? Aparahamu honkupali Nluku, phimaana ahovaheriya isariya.
Ncahara umpokerawe nanteko, khunaalikeleliya ukhala icontte, nanso unaalikeleliya ukhala ikophi.
Vano ule hinvara miteko co nlamulo, nanso ankhuluvelaka Nluku nonlevelela natampi, nroromelo nawe nno phinontatusa ukhala nasariya.
Ciicammo Taviti nohimya wiira horeriya ntthu novaheriya isariya ni Nluku, woohikhala nlattu wo miteko cawe:
Horeriya ule, noleveleliya coonanara cawe, ni cifuttiyaka itampi cawe.
