Horeriya ntthu hinaalikeleliya itampi cawe na Apwiya.
Vano woono ureriya uno uri paahi wa ale owuula icantto, atthuna na ale oohuula icantto? Nineera wiira Aparahamu hovaheriya isariya nlattu wo nroromelo nawe.
Weeraneele cani? Weeraneele noonle icantto atthuna hinaya wuula? Khaweeraneele noonle, nanso hinaya wuula.

Commo ahoola icantto toko ikanyero ni nthoonyero wo'sariya yo nroromelo naarinawe hinaya wuula. Phimaana uyo ri athumwanaya atthu othene anroromela ahinaya wuula icantto, wiira na ayo avaheriye isariya.
Ciicammo ri athumwanaya atthu owuula, woohikhala wuularu paahi, nanso ciicammo aneettela malinca o nroromelo naarinaya athumwanihu Aparahamu ahinaya wuula icantto.
Kuhimweni nlattu wo Nlamulo, Aparahamu ni nloko nawe phaakhelenlyawe yookhuluvelihiya yo wiira ayo yaahala ukhala mayowaakhela ittuninya, nanso nlattu wo'sariya inkhuma munroromeloni.
Vano wakhalaka wiira ale aneettela Nlamulo phiri mayowaakhela, nroromelo nno khanirina ifayita ni yookhuluvelihiya iyo khirina ifayita,
maana Nlamulo nno nimmwiiha uviruwa wa Nluku. Kontha nipuro nihiri Nlamulo, ciicammo khuuwo ukosa.

Phimaana yookhuluvelihiya inkhuma munroromeloni, wiira wiirannye toko ciryaya nnema, ni commo unethi wothene wa Aparahamu ukhuluvele, woohikhala paahi ale aneettela Nlamulo, nanso ciicammo ale arina nroromelo narinawe Aparahamu. Kontha Aparahamu ri athumwanihu othene.

Toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Mi kihoohela ukhala athumwanaya ilapo cinci. Uyo ri athumwanihu wamiithoni wa Nluku nkupanlyawe, Nluku naavaha ukumi atthu ookhwa ni neehana citthu cahaariwo apankaka toko cahaawo.

Vano Aparahamu ahaana nroromelo ni nwehereryo, hata yaanoohikhalaru inanna yoowehererya, phimaana ahokhala athumwanaya ilapo cinci, toko cihimilyawe Nluku wiira: Commo phinhalaya ukhala nloko naa nno.
Vano Aparahamu woohivololaca munroromeloni, ahocuwelela wiira irutthu awe ihooluvala, maana ahaana myakha iminya ceyarelo, ni amwaarawe yeehaninya Sara yaari amwali eekupa.
Wanookhalaru commo, khaakanyacile yookhuluvelihiya ya Nluku, nanso aholipiheriya munroromeloni mwawe ni ahonttittimiha Nluku,
kontha Aparahamu ahokupali wiira Nluku aanhala uttharihelela itthu yaakhuluvelihilyawe.
Phimaana, ahovaheriya isariya nlattu wo nroromelo nawe.
Weeriyaka ahovaheriya isariya, khanaaciya uyo paahi,
nanso ciicammo annaaca hi, ninhala uvaheriya isariya va, ninonkupali Nluku, munwelelihile Yesu Apwiy'ehu mwa atthu ookhwa.
Yooyo vahereriye wuukhwani nlattu wa cookosa cihu ni onwelenle nlattu wo'sariya cihu.
Vano ninavaheriyene isariya nlattu wo nroromelo, nihaana mpuha ni Nluku mwa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Yaayo aniphwanyihile ihathuwa, munroromeloni, wo nenna nnema nna ninnivaha ikuru, ni ninawiittottopa, niwehereryaka nttittimiho na Nluku.
Ni woohikhala yeeyoru, nanso ninawiittottopa yaniphwanyaka mahuviho, nicuwelaka wiira mahuviho ayo anwiiha uvilela;
ni uvilela nwo unwiiha makhalelo oorera, ni makhalelo oorera ayo anwiiha nwehereryo.
Ni nwehereryo khunnipattihaca ihaaya, maana nifento na Nluku niheettheliya munrimani mwihu mwa Nnepa Nttakattifu uvahiyehu.
Maana hi ninaryene ootteetthya, waaphilyaya ukati, Kristu hokhwa nlattu wa anatampi.
Kontha urikarika uphwanyannya ntthu neeleva wiira ankhwele nasariya, hata ntthu eevahereraka unkhwela oorera nrima.
Nanso Nluku honithoonyera nifento nawe toko cinikhwenlyawe Kristu, ni hi ninaryene anatampi.
Ukhala wiira nna va, nihovaheriya isariya ni iphome awe, utepa n'upwaha yooyo naahala unoopola uviruwa wa Nluku.
Maana hi ninaryene eenani a Nluku, nihaatanihiya ni yooyo nlattu wookhwa wa mwanawe. Vano ninaatanihiyene, ninaahala woopwa nlattu wookumi awe.
Ni woohikhala yeeyo paahi, nanso ninawiittottopa mwa Nluku ni mwa Yesu Kristu Pwiy'ehu, yooyo naataanihile.
Toko cikenlyaya itampi mwiilaponi ni ntthu mmoca, ni itampi iwaanaka ukhwa, ciicammo ukhwa uhomwaryeela mwa atthu othene, kontha atthu othene ahokosa.
Uhinaya uphiya ukati wo Nlamulo, itampi yahaawo mwiilaponi, nanso itampi khinaalikeleliya woohikhala Nlamulo.
Vano, ukhwa uhothawala ukhuma wa Atamu mpaka Musa, mpaka wa ale ahikosile toko ceenryawe Atamu, yooyo ri nthoonyero wa ule aahala uwa.

Phimaana, khuuwo ulikanihera ivahiya ni itampi. Maana, atthu enci ahokhwa nlattu wo'tampi ya ntthu mmoca, nanso utepa nnema na Nluku, maanaya wiira ivahiya yo nnema na ntthu mmoca, Yesu Kristu, nihocarihiya wa atthu enci.

Khinlikaniheriya ivahiya ya Nluku ni mahuviho o'tampi a ntthu mmoca, kontha wo'tampi imoca phiwilyaya uhukhumwinya uwaanne utthukeliya, nanso ivahilyawe Nluku, cinavinrene itampi cinci, ihowaana uvaheriya isariya.
Wakhalaka wiira itampi ya ntthu mmoca, ukhwa uhothawala nlattu wa yooyo, utepa ale anaakhela nnema n'uvaheriya isariya, anaahala uthawala mukumini nlattu wa ntthu mmoca, Yesu Kristu.
Maana toko itampi wawilyaya mwa ntthu mmoca, imwareelaka mwa atthu othene wiira ahukhumwinye, ciicammo nteko wa ntthu mmoca o'sariya uhowaana isariya yowaavaha ukumi atthu othene.
Toko enci ciheliyaya ukhala anatampi nlattu woohiiwelela wa ntthu mmoca, ciicammo enci anaahala uvaheriya isariya nlattu wo wiiwelela wa ntthu mmoca.
Vano Nlamulo niwile wiira itampi yuncererye. Nanso nipuro nuncereriye itampi, phincivile nnema,
waacera wiira, toko cithawanlyaya itampi muukhwani, ciicammo nnema nno nithawale nsariyani nivahaka ukumi woohimala, mwa Yesu Kristu Apwiy'ehu.
Vano ninhala wiira cani? Nipwaherereke upanka itampi wiira nnema nuncererye?
Mena vakani! Hi ihonikhwelela itampi, ninhala ukhala cani nanlelo ntampini?
Atthuna nyu khannocuwela wiira hi othene nipattisiye mwa Yesu Kristu, nipattisiye muukhwani mwawe?
Maanaya mupattisoni nihokhwa n'usikhiya ni yooyo. Toko Kristu cunwelenlyawe mwa atthu ookhwa nlattu wo nttittimiho na athumwane, ni hi ciicammo neette mukumini wonaanano.
Wakhalaka wiira nihaatanihiya ni uyo muukhwani mwawe, ciicammo phinhalehu ukhala owaatanihinya nwunwelelani mwawe.
Kontha nihocuwela wiira makhalelo ehu okhalayi ahokhomeliya ni uyo wansalapani, waacera irutthu yo'tampi ikwanyulaciye wiira nihikhale tho ipottha yo'tampi.
Maana ntthu khwile, hoopoliya ntampini.
Vano wakhalaka wiira nikhwile wamoca ni Kristu, ninaakupali wiira ninhala ukhala akumi wamoca ni uyo.
Maana nihocuwela wiira, Kristu nonwelenlene mwa atthu ookhwa, uyo khankhwa tho. Nookhwa khanhala unthawala tho.
Kontha uyo hokhwela itampi ikwaha imoca weemaara cothene, nanso akhalaka nkumi, nokhala nkumi mwa Nluku.
Vano nyu mwiicaalikelele wiira nri atthu owuukhwelelani itampi, commo nri akumi wa Nluku, mwa Yesu Kristu.
Phimaana, nhihiyerere itampi ipwahereraka uthawala irutthu inyu inkhwa, nttharihelelaka cintthunenyu.

Nhivaherere miphantte co'rutthu cinyu ntampini toko ikaruma coopankela citthu coohi isariya, nanso mwiivaherere wa Nluku, toko ntthu turuwile wuukhwani awaaka wukumini, ni munvaherere miphantte co'rutthu cinyu, toko ikaruma co'sariya.
Kontha itampi khinhala wuuthawalani, maana khannohooleliya tho ni Nlamulo, nanso nnohooleliya ni nnema.
Yeeriya cani? Vano ninlamuliya ukosa kontha khaninhooleliya tho ni Nlamulo, nanso ninhooleliya ni nnema? Mena vakani!
Khannocuwela wiira nyu mweevahereraka unvarela nteko ntthu mmwiiwelelaka, nnothatuwa ipottha awe? Vano nyu mwavarelaka nteko itampi nnaakhwa, nanso ale ammwiiwelela Nluku anaavaheriya isariya.
Vano kinaansukuru Nluku, mwaahookhalaru ipottha co'tampi, nhottharihelela ni nrima enyu wothene coosomihinya cihimeriyenyu.
Nyu nhotaphuliya ntampini ni nhothatuwa ipottha co'sariya.

Mi kinoolumaca toko ntthu, nlattu wookenkennya wo'rutthu. Ciicammo toko nyu civaherenrenyu ukhala ipottha miphantte cinyu co'rutthu, iri iharamu ni coonanara cothene. Vano nvaherere miphantte co'rutthu cinyu wiira nrumeele isariya innirwana wuuttakattifihiyani.
Ukati waarinyu ipottha yo'tampi, khamwaarumeela isariya.
Vano nhephileni wo citthu cinwuulihacihani muru nna va? Kontha ummaleloni waya cennyo uri ukhwa.
Nanso vano, wataphuliyenyu ntampini ni nthatuwaka ipottha ca Nluku, ihephilenyu iyo inoorweehani wuuttakattifuni, ni ummaleloni uri ukumi woohimala.
Kontha ncahara wo'tampi uri ukhwa, nanso ivahiya ya Nluku uri ukumi woohimala, mwa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Vano asunnaka, kinwuulumelani toko atthu oocuwela nlamulo. Nyu khannocuwela wiira nlamulo ninaanthawala ntthu nari nkumi?
Wanlikana toko, nthiyana atheliyaka toko cinhimyaya nlamulo, noluttaana na awannyawe ukati uryaya akumi, nanso yakhwaka awannyawe ayo, nthiyan'oyo hotaphuwa munlamuloni noothelana.

Phimaana, nthiyan'oyo atheliyaka ni nlopwana nkina, awannyawe anari akumi, naalikeleliya ukhala mayoluva, nanso awannyawe ayo yakhwaka, uyo nohala ukhala ootaphuwa munlamuloni noothelana. Vano atheliyaka ni nlopwana nkina khanhala ukhala mayoluva.
Asunnaka, ni nyu ciicammo nhokhwa muNlamuloni, nlattu wo'rutthu ya Kristu, wiira nkhale awawe yooyo onwelenle mwa atthu ookhwa, waacera wiira nithoonyere mihokorokho wa Nluku.
Maana ukati weettelehu co mwirutthuni, coociva co'tampi caakhuma muNlamuloni caanitthumiri mwirutthuni mwihu, wiira nithoonyere mihokorokho co nookhwa.

Nanso ninataphuwilene muNlamuloni, nihokhwa nlattu wo ile yaanitthukile. Phimaana, nihotaphuwa muNlamuloni wiira ninrumeele Nluku woohikhala wo mananna okhalayi, nittharihelelaka Nlamulo nowantikhiya, nanso wo mananna onaanano, nittharihelelaka Nnepa wa Nluku.
Vano ninhala wiira cani? Nlamulo niri itampi? Mena vakani! Mi akaahala ucuwela itampi, nanso kicuwenle nlattu wo Nlamulo. Khweli akaahala ucuwela nttima Nlamulo nno naheenre: Uhikhalane nttima.
Nanso itampi, ithawanle wawilyaya ikettelo, ikooniheraka ilema cothene co nttima. Maana nahaari Nlamulo, itampi khayaakhala.
Khalayi mi kaaryaka woohi Nlamulo kaari nkumi, nanso wawilyaya ikettelo, itampi ihophwanya nipuro ni mi kihokhwa.
Vano kihoonenela wiira yeeyo ikettelo yaahala ukivaha ukumi iyo, ihommwiiha nookhwa.
Maana itampi yahophwanya nafasi nlattu wo'kettelo, ni yeeyo ikettelo iyo yahokithepya mpaka ukiiva.
Wo'khweli nlamulo na Musa niri nittakattifu, ni ikettelo ciri cittakattifu, co'sariya ni coorera.

Maanaya wiira itthu yoorera iyo ihokiwiihera nookhwa? Mena vakani! Uhiya commo, itampi iyo wo wiira yiithoonyere ukhala itampi, ihokiwiihera nookhwa nlattu w'etthu yaari yoorera, wiira, nhina mo'kettelo, itampi ikhale itthu yootepa unanara.
Maana nihocuwela wiira nlamulo niri no muNnepani, nanso mi kiri o mwirutthuni, kontha kihotumihinya toko ipottha yo'tampi.
Kontha mi akincuwela itthu invaraka, maana akimpanka ile intthunaka, nanso kimpanka ile inrusananaka.
Vano kapankaka ile ihintthunaka, kinaakupali wiira nlamulo niri noorera.
Phimaana, nopanka cothene nnyo akihimwe mi, nanso itampi iri mwa mi.
Kihocuwela wiira khiiwo yoorera mwa mi, kinaaca mwirutthuni mwaka. Kontha kinaatthunaka wiira kipanke yoorera, nanso akinoorya upanka.
Kontha akimpanka yoorera intthunaka, nanso yoonanara ihintthunaka, yeeyo phimpankaka.
Vano kapankaka itthu ihintthunaka, akihimwe mi kimpanka, nanso itampi iri mwa mi phimpanka.
Vano nlamulo ninkiphwanya phi nna, kaphavelaka upanka yoorera, kimpanka yoonanara.
Maana mmoopuweloni mwaka, ninaakicivela nlamulo na Nluku;
nanso kinawoona mwirutthuni mwaka, nlamulo nikina naanaka ikhotto ni nlamulo no moopuwelo aka, nikipankaka nantthukiya o nlamulo no'tampi niri mwirutthuni mwaka.
Mi ntthu ootapana! Tupani nohala ukoopola ila irutthu inkirweeha wuukhwani ila?
Kinaansukuru Nluku mwa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu! Toko mi, ni moopuwelo aka, kiri ipottha yo Nlamulo na Nluku, nanso mwirutthuni mwaka kiri ipottha yo nlamulo no'tampi.
Phimaana, vano khuuwo uhukhumwinya wa ale ari mwa Yesu Kristu.
Kontha nlamulo no Nnepa wookumi, mwa Yesu Kristu, nihokoopola mmalamuloni mo'tampi ni mo nookhwa.

Maana ile ihoonryaya Nlamulo upanka nlattu wookenkennya wo'rutthu, yeeyo Nluku hopanka anveleelihaka mwanawe, anlikanihaka ni ntthu ookosa wiira akhale isataka nlattu wo'tampi. Commo Nluku hottarusa itampi co mwirutthuni,
waacera wiira meettelo o Nlamulo atthariheleliye mwa hi nihineettela co mwirutthuni, nanso nineettela utthuna wo Nnepa.
Maana ale aneettela co mwirutthuni, anoopuwela citthu cinciveliha irutthu, nanso ale aneettela co muNnepani, anoopuwela citthu cincivela Nnepa.
Maana moopuwelo o'rutthu ari nookhwa, nanso moopuwelo o muNnepani uri ukumi ni imaani.
Vano moopuwelo o'rutthu ari mwiinani aya Nluku, maana khaanttharihelela Nlamulo na Nluku ni khaanoorya weettela.
Phimaana, ale ari oothawaliya ni irutthu, khaanoorya unciveliha Nluku.
Kontha nyu khanri oothawaliya ni irutthu, nanso nri o muNnepani, wakhalaka wiira khweli Nnepa wa Nluku unkhala ni nyu. Ni ntthu hirina Nnepa wa Kristu, uyo khari a Kristu.
Nanso wakhalaka wiira Kristu ri ni nyu, irutthu inyu iyo, khweli, ihokhwa nlattu wo'tampi, nanso nnepa enyu uyo uri nkumi nlattu wo'sariya.

Vano wakhalaka wiira Nnepa awe ule munwelelihile Yesu wariyari wa atthu ookhwa unkhala ni nyu, yoole munwelelihile Kristu wariyari wa atthu ookhwa ciicammo naahala uvaha ukumi irutthu cinyu cinkhwa, mwa Nnepa awe unkhala ni nyu.
Vano asunnaka, hi niri atthu oolokihiya, khunakhala wo mwirutthuni wo wiira neettele co mwirutthuni.
Kontha mweettaka toko o mwirutthuni, nnaahala ukhwa, nanso mweettaka toko o muNnepani, mwiivaka miteko co mwirutthuni, nnaahala ukhalana ukumi.
Maana othene aneettihiya ni Nnepa wa Nluku ari asaana a Nluku.
Kontha khamwaakhenle nnepa wo wuupankani ipottha wiira nkhale ni woova, nanso mwaakhenle Nnepa wo wuupankani asaana a Nluku, yooyo unnikhuweliha niiraka: Apa, maanaya wiira Paapa.
Yooyo Nnepa uyo phinvaha usaahiti ni nnepa ehu wiira hi n'asaana a Nluku.
Vano nakhalaka asaana a Nluku, niri mayowaakhela o citthu cothene ca Nluku wamoca ni Kristu. Nahuvaka ni yooyo, ninaahala uttittimihinya wamoca ni yooyo.
Maana mi, kinoona wiira mahuviho annikhuna nna va khaanlamuliya ulikaniheriya ni nttittimiho ninwehereryehu wooniheriya.
Vano ikhiyumpe yothene inaawehererya ni nroromelo nuulupale wooniheriya wa asaana a Nluku.
Khweli ikhiyumpe ihokhala yookenkennyaa, woohikhala nlattu wotthuna waya, nanso nlattu wotthuna Mwanene Nluku. Phimaana, Nluku ahokhuluveliha ula nwehereryo ula,
aaceraka wiira, ikhiyumpe yoopoliye mpotthani ni mukwanyulaciyani, wiira ipanke mphantte wo woopoliya ni nttittimiho na asaana a Nluku.
Nihocuwela wiira mpaka nna va ikhiyumpe yothene inawiipulela ni inaahuva toko nthiyana cinnyarawe.
Woohikhala yeeyo paahi, nanso yeehi ene nirina mihokorokho coopacera co muNnepani, ninawiipulela venci, niwehereryaka woohipupha, upankiya asaana a Nluku, ukati wo woopoliya wo'rutthu cihu.
Vano ni nwehereryo, nihoopoliya. Nanso nwehereryo unoonnya, khunakhala nwehereryo. Unkhala cani nwehereryo ile inoonnya?
Nanso nawehereryaka ile ihinoonnya, ninwehererya woopisa nrima.
Toko ciicammo, Nnepa unaanikavihera muukenkennyani mwihu, maana khanincuwela mavekelelo, nanso yooyo Nnepa uyo unaanivekelela ni moolumo o wiipulela ahinooryehu uhimya.
Vano ule noona mirima cihu naacuwela imphavelaya Nnepa, maana Nnepa unawaavekelela attakattifu toko cintthunawe Nluku.
Hi ninaacuwela wiira Nluku naapanka citthu cothene wo nnema wa ale anonfenta, yiihaninye nlattu wotthuna wawe.
Kontha wa ale yaacuwenlyawe khalayiru, ciicammo haalikelela ukhala oolattana toko ciryawe mwanawe, waacera wiira uyo akhale oopacera mwa asunnawe othene.
Ale yaalikelenlyawe, ciicammo heehana. Ale yeehannyawe, haavahera isariya. Ale yaavahenryawe isariya, haattittimiha.
Vano ninhala wiira cani mwa cennya citthu nnya? Nluku nari ni hi, tipani nohala unooryaca?
Yoole hinnemecenre mwanawe, mpaka unvaherera nlattu wa hi, vano nohala uhinivaha cani wamoca ni yooyo citthu cothene?
Tipani nohala waakasari ale athanliye ni Nluku? Nluku yooyo phinaavahera isariya.
Tipani nohala waattarusa? Phi Yesu Kristu paahi khwile ni onwelenle, yooyo ri moono wo nlopwana wa Nluku ni neera anivekelelaka.
Tipani nohala unimwalaniha nnifentoni na Kristu? Mena itafawuti, atthuna masukuli, atthuna woomolanihaciya, atthuna itala, atthuna uthaaleliya, atthuna cowoopiha, atthuna ikhotto.
Vano toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Nlattu wo wufentani, khula nihuku ninrweehiya wuukhwani, ninlikanihinya toko ikhontwaa cirwaaninyaka wuuhitiyani.
Nanso mwa cothene nnya, niri mayotthema mwa ule nifentile.
Maana mi kihokupali wiira, mena nookhwa, mena ukumi, mena ancelo, mena asotwani, mena citthu ciriwo, mena citthu cimmwa, mena anakuru,
mena isancamelo, mena yiisero, mena itthu phi itthu yoopattusiya, khinhala unimwalaniha nnifentoni na Nluku, niri mwa Yesu Kristu, Apwiy'ehu.
Mi akinootha, kinhimya ikhweli mwa Kristu, kimpanka usaahiti n'ankhili aka muNnepani Nttakattifu.
Kihaana masukuli menci n'ukiwerya nrima woohihiyerera.
Mpaka mi kaamphavelaka wiira kilaphiye ni kimwalanihinye ni Kristu nlattu wa asunnaka o'khapila aka.
Ayo ari annasirayeli. Nluku haapanka ukhala asaanawe ni haakawela nttittimiho nawe, hopanka maleehano ni haavaha Nlamulo, mananna oovekela ni mikhuluveliho.
Ayo phiri ucuulu wo mayathumwanihu o khalayi, ni Kristu toko ntthu ri o yeeyo ikhapila iyo. Yooyo ri oopacera wo citthu cothene, Nluku attittimihiye ukati wothene. Ameni!
Nihuupuwele wiira nuulumo na Nluku nihovonyanihiya, maana kuhimweni wiira asirayeli othene ari asirayeli eekhweli.
Kuhimweni nlattu wookhala ucuulu wa Aparahamu, phinhalaya ukhala othene asaana a Aparahamu. Uhiya commo, mwa Isaki, phinhalaya ukhumelela ucuulu aa.
Maanaya wiira ale annyariya mwirutthuni, khaanakhala asaana a Nluku, nanso ari asaana a Nluku, ale annyariya munkhuluvelihoni.
Kontha nkhuluveliho waapankiye coo: Wo yoola ukati ula kinaahala uwa, ni Sara kinhala umphwanya nannyanre mwana.
Ni woohikhala yooyoru, nanso ciicammo Repeka, ahorupala irukulu ya nlopwana mmoca neehaninya Isaki, athumwanihu.
Nanso asaana ale ahinaya uyaryaa ni ahinaya upanka itthu yoorera atthuna yoonanara, waacera wiira utthuna wa Nluku ukhale woohimala toko cithanlilyawe,
woohikhala nlattu wo miteko, nanso nlattu wa ule neehana, ahohimeriya wiira: Omuulupale naahala unrumeela omwankani.
Toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Kihonfenta Yakopi, nanso kihonrusanana Isawu.
Vano ninhala wiira cani? Maanaya wiira Nluku khanakhalaka o'sariya? Mena vakani!
Maana uyo homwiirela Musa: Kinaahala umoonela ikiriri ule nomoonelaka ikiriri, ni kinaahala umoonela uthunku ule nomoonelaka uthunku.
Phimaana, kuhimwena wiira uri utthuna ni ikuru ca ntthu, nanso ciri ikiriri ca Nluku.
Maana yowantikhiya inomwiirela Farawoo coo: Nlattu wo yeeyo phuuwusenryaka wiira mwa we, kithoonyere ikuru caka ni wiira ncina naka nilalennye miphantte cothene co mwiilaponi.
Phimaana, Nluku naamoonela ikiriri ule nontthunawe ni naanturumaliha nrima ule nontthunawe.
Nanso akina mwa nyu ankokiirela: Vano Nluku uyo nonipinttelelani? Tupani nokhotta utthuna wa Nluku?
Tupani we, ntthu, onnyakulihanana Nluku? Vano itthu yowumpiya inootoko unkoha mumpile wiira: Ukumpenleni toko coo?
Mayowuupa uloko kharina ihathuwa yo wuupa mwaapu wo'fayita ni mwaapu woohi ifayita n'uloko yooyo?
Vano nirinani yoohimya, wakhala wiira Nluku nophavela uthoonyera uviruwa n'ucuweliha ikuru cawe? Uyo hoorya waavilela ale o waaphwanela uviruweliya ni yaahala ukwanyulaciya.
Ciicammo, Nluku hotthuna uthoonyera nttittimiho ni ikiriri cawe cinci, cinikurusenlyawe hi naatthenkaciye ihinaya itthu, wiira naakhelele nttittimiho nawe.
Hi niihaninye, kahi paahi iriyari ya ayuta, nanso ciicammo iriyari ya amalaponi.
Toko Nluku cinhimyawe nliivuruni mwa Hoseya eeraka: Kinaahala wiirela unethi aka ule uhiri wawaka ni kinaahala umwiirela oofentiya aka ule hinonfentaka,
ni: Nipuro neerenlyawe: Nyu khannakhala unethi aka, vaava phinhalaya wiireliya asaana a Nluku nkumi.
Ciicammo Isaya aheera nlattu wa Sirayeli: Asaana a Sirayeli ahookhalaru enci toko nhaava wo mpharyaa, anhala uhala ale phinhala woopwa.
Maana wowaakuvyaca wene ni woomalela, Apwiya anaahala uhukhumu ilapo.
Toko Isaya ciinryawe: Wahaari wiira Apwiya a anakhotto khayaanihiyenre ucuulu, naahala ukhala toko asotoma ni akomora.
Vano ninhala wiira cani? Amalaponi yahaavya isariya, ahophwanya isariya inkhuma munroromeloni;
nanso Sirayeli, aavya nlamulo naahala uwaana isariya, khaphwanyile.
Nlattuni? Kontha khayaavya ni nroromelo, nanso wo miteko. Ahokakathuwa wanlukuni nookakathula.
Vano toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Kinaweesa uSiyoni nluku nookakathula ni mwala woowulusa; ni ule nokhuluvela nenno nluku nno khanhala wuulihaciya muru.
Vano asunnaka, utthuna wo nrima aka ni mavekelo aka wa Nluku uri wo wiira Asirayeli yoopwe.
Maana kinaavaha usaahiti wiira ayo anawiikurumica wa Nluku, nanso wiikurumica waya nwo kuhimwe nlattu woocuwelaca.
Vano, ahicuweleehaka isariya inkhuma wa Nluku ni aphavelaka uttharihelela isariya caya, khaaneevaherera nsariyani ca Nluku.
Maana umalela wo Nlamulo, ri Kristu, wiira avaheriye isariya ule nokupali.
Vano Musa hantikha mwaha wo'sariya inkhuma muNlamuloni eeraka: Ntthu nohala upanka nnya citthu nnya, cennyo phinhala unkhaliha nkumi.
Nanso isariya inkhuma munroromeloni ineera: Uhiire wanrimani waa: Tipani nohala uwela wirimu? Iyo inhimya wiira Kristu akhuruwe.
Ciicammo uhiire: Tipani nohala ukhuruwela nlitti nooripela ni no wiisa? Iyo inhimya wiira Kristu onwelele mwa atthu ookhwa.
Vano cowantikhiya cineera cani? Nuulumo niri wakhiviru ni we, wamalakuni waa ni wanrimani waa. Maanaya wiira, nna phi nuulumo no nroromelo ninlalyehu:
Walaphululaka ni malaku aa wiira Yesu ph'Apwiya, ni wanrimani waa ukupaliki wiira Nluku homunweleliha mwa atthu ookhwa, unawoopwa.
Maana, ntthu nokupali ni nrima awe naaphwanya isariya, ni ntthu nolaphulula ni malaku awe nawoopwa.
Maana yowantikhiya ineera coo: Ule nonkhuluvela Yesu, khanhala wuulihaciya muru.
Kontha khuuwo uhawulanihinya ayuta na amalaponi, maana yaayo Apwiya ayo ari a atthu othene ni anawaareriha othene aneehana,
kontha ule neehana ncina na Apwiya, nawoopwa.
Vano anhala umwiihana cani ule hinkupanlyaya? Ayo anhala unkupali cani ahihimeriye? Ni anhala wiiwa cani ahikhanle owaalalyeera?
Vano anhala ulalya cani ahiruminye? Toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Coorera ciri inyaa ca atthu anlalya nhupi woorera!
Nanso kuhimweni wiira asirayeli othene ahokupali nhupi woorera. Kontha Isaya neera coo: Pwiya, tipani kupanli nhupi ihu?
Maana, nroromelo nimmwa ni wiiwa; wiiwa nuulumo na Kristu.
Nanso kinaakoha: Ayo khayiiwile? Khweli aheewa. Ncu naya niheewannya ilapo yothene, ni moolumo aya aheewannya mpaka umalenlyaya ittuninya.
Vano kinaakoha tho kiiraka, maanaya wiira Sirayeli kheeweehile? Woopacera, Musa eenre: Kinaahala uwunlihani ihace na ale ahiri unethi aka; kinaahala wuuviruwelihani n'unethi woohaankhili.
Ni Isaya aholipihera eeraka: Ahokiphwanya ale yahaakaavya, ni kiheethoonyera wa ale yahaakiphavela.
Nanso Nluku ahomwiirela Sirayeli: Mahuku othene kahotaphulela matata unethi woohitthuna wiiwelela ni woohanyuriha.
Vano kinaakoha wiira: Nluku hokhotta unethi awe? Mena vakani! Kontha mi ki nsirayeli, ucuulu wa Aparahamu, nihimo na Pencamii.
Nluku khakhottile unethi awe, yooyo ucuwenlyawe khalayiru. Atthuna nyu khannocuwela inhimyaya cowantikhiya cimwaacaka Eliya, waavekelawe aakasariki asirayeli wa Nluku eeraka:
Pwiya, minapiyu cinyu ciheevakaciya ni ikhipula cinyu cihokwanyulaciya, vano kihanle phi mi ni ciicammo amphavela ukiiva?
Vano Eliya aakhuliye cani ni Nluku? Kiheesunkera atthu ilufu saapa, ahinakhoroma anlapelaka Paali.
Mpaka ilelo ahaawo atthu ahalahanle yaathanlilyawe Nluku wo nnema nawe.
Aathanlile ni nnema nawe, khunakhala nlattu wo miteko caya. Wahaari commo, nnema na Nluku khanaakhala nnema neekhweli.
Vano niireke cani? Itthu yaaphavelawe Sirayeli, khooryanihile, nanso yooryanihinye na atthu athanliye ni Nluku. Akina ayo yahoturumaliha mirima caya.
Toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Nluku haavaha nrima woorupa, haavaha miitho ahinoona ni manyaru ahineewa mpaka nihuku no'lelo.
Ni Taviti heera: Isikuhuulu caya nnyo cithatuwe itapha, wiira avarihiye ni attarusiye.
Miitho aya attorwaace wiira ahoone ni ittuli aya ikhurutuwe ukati wothene.
Vano mi kinaakoha: Maanaya akakathuwile wiira awuluwe? Mena vakani! Uhiya commo, nlattu wo makosa aya, phiwilyaya woopwa wa amalaponi, wiira ahaculace ihace na asirayeli.
Wakhala wiira makosa aya ahowiiha ifayita yo nttuniyani, ni ukenkennya waya nwo uhowiiha ifayita ya amalaponi, utepa n'upwaha ayuta yarukunusaka nrima!
Vano kinoohimeryani nyu amalaponi, maana mi ki mmitthenka a amalaponi, kinaattittimiha nteko aka,
kiwehereryaka uhacula ihace muunethini mwaka ni mwa yeeyo yoopole asirayeli akina.
Wakhala wiira ukhottiya waya nwo uri waatanihinya wo'ttuninya, waamininya waya nwo unkokhala ukumi wa atthu ookhwa.
Vano, wakhala wiira nlipu uyo nttakattifu, ciicammo nkatthe uyo uri nttakattifu. Ni wakhala wiira ntithari uyo nttakattifu, ciicammo miritta nnyo ciri cittakattifu.

Nanso wakhalaka wiira miritta cikina nnyo cihothikiliya, ni we unari nlivera wo ntakhwani, uhopharelelihiya ni cikina nnyo, vano umpanka mphantte woorokoci unkhuma muntitharini wo nlivera woophattennya,
uhitarawe miritta cithikiliye. Weettottopaka, ucuwele wiira khunakhala phi we unliha ntithari, nanso ntithari uyo phinooliha we.
Vano we unkowiira coo: Miritta nnyo cihothikiliya, wiira mi kipharelelihiye.
Khweli, ayo ahothikiliya nlattu wohaamini, ni we uri oolipa nlattu wo nroromelo. Uhiittottope, nanso woove.
Toko Nluku cihinemecenryawe miritta ceephattu, ni we ciicammo khanhala wuunemecera.

Phimaana uweheehe mananna ciryawe Nluku eemaani ni oohiperwa. Ri oohiperwa wa ale awuluwile, ni ri eemaani ni we, nanso unlamuliya ukhanyerera mwiimaanini mwawe. Uhiya commo we ciicammo unaahala uthikiliya.
Na ayo ciicammo, yahokoleelaka waamini, anaahala upharelelihiya, maana Nluku nawoorya waaphareleliha tho.

Nyu amalaponi nri toko nritta wo nlivera wo ntakhwani uthikiliye ni upharelelihiye, woohikhala weephattu wo nlivera woophattennya. Ayuta ari toko nlivera woophattennya. Phimaana, ni Nluku wankokhala wookhwya uphareleliha tho wamwirini waya, cennyo miritta coovacuwa nnyo.
Asunnaka, kimphavela wiira nyu ncuwele isiiri yeekhweli, nhuupuwele wiira nri acuwelaci. Maana uturumala nrima wo'Sirayeli uhaaphwanyiha amalaponi ukati wookela muunethini mwa Nluku.
Ni commo Sirayeli othene naahala woopoliya, toko cantikhiyaya yiiriyaka: Moopoli nohala ukhuma uSiyoni ni naahala utamiha coonanara mwa Yakopi.
Nna phiri nleehano naka na ayo, katamihaka itampi caya nnyo.
Vano nlattu wo nhupi woorera, ayo ari eenani nlattu wa nyu, nanso muuthanliyani, ari oofentiya nlattu wo mayathumwanihu.
Kontha ivahiya ni wiihana wa Nluku ciri coohifuttya.
Toko nyu amalaponi caarinyu khalayi oonhanyuriha Nluku, nhooneliya ikiriri nlattu woohanyuriha wa ayuta,
vano ayo ahohanyuriha, wiira Nluku oonele ikiriri toko ciwoonenlyaweni nyu.
Maana Nluku haavaherera othene muuhanyurihani, wiira oonele ikiriri othene.
Weekhweli, uthaciri wa ankhili ni ucuwelaca wa Nluku ciri cuulupale! Khaawo noorya utaphulela moopuwelo a Apwiya hata ucuwela iphiro caya.
Tipani cuwenle moopuwelo a Apwiya? Atthuna tipani aari mayamiruku aya?
Pani aapacenre unvaha itthu Nluku, wiira ni uyo aturuseliye?
Maana citthu cothene ciri cawawe ni cinkhuma mwa yooyo. Phimaana, mwa yooyo nikhale nttittimiho noohimala. Ameni!
Vano asunnaka kinawuvekelani, wo'kiriri ca Nluku, wiira unvaherere irutthu inyu toko isataka ikumi, ittakattifu ni yooncivela Nluku, phiri unlapela winyu woophwanela.
Nhittharihelele meettelo o nttuniyani, nanso nkhale oopittinkuliya mmoopuweloni mwinyu onaanano, waacera wiira ncuwele yoorera, yooncivela ni yoomalela intthunawe Nluku.
Phimaana, wo nnema nivahiyaka, kinowiirelani nyu othene, hikhale ntthu noopuwela wahinreraya, nanso oopuwele toko ciryaya nroromelo ninvahilyawe Nluku khula ntthu.
Toko cirinehu irutthu irina miphantte cinci, ni wo khula mphantte ukhalanaka nteko aya,
ciicammo ni hi nihookhalaru enci, niri irutthu imoca mwa Kristu, ni wo khula mphantte uri wooluttana ni nkhwaya.
Hi nihaana ivahiya coovirikana toko cinrehu woovahiya nnema. Wakhala wiira ntthu haana ivahiya yoolalya nhupi wa Nluku, atthumiri toko ciryaya nroromelo nawe.
Wakhala urumeela, avarecese urumeela; wakhala usomiha, avarecese usomiha;
wakhala ulipihera, apanke ni ikuru; wakhala ucanka, acanke ni nrima raati; ule nohoolela, ahoolele woohipupha; ule ri mayakiriri, apanke wotteeliya.
Vano nifento ninyu nno nikhale neekhweli. Nkhotte yoonanara ni nvarecese iri yoorera.
Nfentane ntthu ni nkhwawe ni nifento neekhweli, mwaattittimihaka akhwinyu wiivikaniha nyu.
Nvare nteko n'utteeliya, nhikhale owoolwaa. Mwaarumeele Apwiya ni mwiikurumice munnepani.
Ntteeliye munwehereryoni, nvilele mmahuvihoni, nkhanyerere uvekela.
Mmeelane irinenyu na atthu attakattifu muuthwennyani mwaya. Mwaakhele aletto.
Mwaarerihe ale anowoomolanihacani, mwaarerihe ni nhaalaphe.
Ntteeliye ni ale antteeliya ni munle ni ale anoonla.
Nkhale o nrima mmoca ntthu ni nkhwawe. Nhikhale o wiittottopa, nanso nkhale tayari waatakaneelana atthu oohiihelaca. Nhikhale owiihela ucuwelaca.
Nhinturusele yoonanara oopankileni yoonanara, nanso mwaavye upanka yoorera wamiithoni wa atthu othene.
Mphavele mananna ookhala ni imaani na atthu othene.
Asunnaka oofentiya, nhilivyaaniherane ayaayoru, nanso nhiye urusiya ni Nluku, maana ihantikhiya wiira: Phi mi kinlivyaanihera. Mi kinaahala uturusela, Apwiya phineera.
Uhiya commo: Mwiinani inyu avoliyaka itala, munvaheke iyolya; avoliyaka ntthona, munvaheke maasi owurya. Mwapankaka commo, nnomwiitthelela makhala o mooro wamuru wawe.
Phimaana nhiihiyerere nttheminyaka ni citthu coonanara, nanso nttheme coonanara mpankaka coorera.
Atthu othene anlamuliya weewelela ahooleli o mwiilaponi, maana khaawo nhooleli oohikhuma wa Nluku. Ahooleli ariwo yeesiye ni Nluku.
Vano ule naahanyuriha ahooleli o mwiilaponi, nohanyuriha ile yeesilyawe Nluku, ni ale anhanyuriha yeesilyawe Nluku, aneewiihera ihukhumu asinene.
Kontha ahooleli khaanlamuliya wooviya, ari hiri ule nopanka yoonanara. We unaatthuna uhoova ahooleli? Upanke yoorera ni ayo anaahala wuuttottopela.

Maana ahooleli ari arumeyi a Nluku wiira ukhale ni imaani. Nanso wapankaka yoonanara, wooveke, maana wammwiihaya mattaruso khawanakhala wo pure, kontha ari arumeyi a Nluku, atthu anasariya, waacera yaattaruse ale ampanka yoonanara.
Phimaana, phatari wiivaherera wa ahooleli, woohikhala paahi nlattu wo woova uttarusiya, nanso ciicammo nlattu wo wuupuwela wanrimani winyu.
Nlattu wo yeeyo, phinlivenyu nsoko, kontha ahooleli ari arumeyi a Nluku, anvara ula nteko ula ukati wothene.

Munvahe khula ntthu ile inomphwanela uvahiya: amphwanela waaliva nsoko, mwaalive nsoko; amphwanela waavaha ncanko, mwaavahe ncanko; amphwanela uttittimihinya, mwaattittimihe ni amphwanela ulemelihiya, mwaalemelihe.
Nhinkophele ntthu, wari ihikhanle paahi ikophi yo nifento ntthu ni nkhwawe, maana ule nonfenta nkhwawe, nottharihelela Nlamulo.
Vano ala phi malamulo aneera: Uhiluve, uhiive, uhinnye ni uhikhalane nttima. Wakhalaka wiira nihaawo nlamulo nikina tho, othene ammalela wo nna nlamulo nna: Unfente nkhwaa toko cineefentaa umwanene.
Ule rina nifento khanompanka yoonanara nkhwawe, kontha nifento uri uttharihelela Nlamulo.
Mpanke commo ncuwelaka ukati urihu. Ihophiya iwora yo wunwa waarupilenyu, kontha woopwa wihu uri wakhiviru woovirikana ukati waaminniihu.
Niri uhiyu iriyari ni uhanle vakani usa. Vano nihiye miteko co mpiphini ni niware ikaruma co nwaaryani.
Neette ratta toko nineetta uthana, woohikhala wo nlula ni woohapaliya, woohikhala wooluva n'uhilemeliha irutthu, woohikhala unyakulihana n'uramana.
Uhiya commo, mwaaware Apwiya Yesu Kristu ni nhikhale owiihiyerera wuutthumirini cinociveliha irutthu.
Munvarecese ule ri ookenkennyaa munroromeloni, woohikuphulaca moopuwelo awe.
Kontha, mmoca naaroromela wiira pooti ulya cothene, nanso nkina rina nroromelo nookenkennya nolya matapa paahi woohikhala inama.
Ule nolya cothene, hintarawe ule hinlya cothene, ni ule hinlya cothene, hinhukhumu ule nolya cothene, maana Nluku homwaakhelela.
Vano we pani oonhukhumu nanteko a nkina? Kontha, wakhala wiira nanteko uyo naavonyiha atthuna khanvonyiha, nkunya awe phinonhukhumu. Nanteko oyo naahala weemela, maana Apwiya phinoorya unvarelela.
Ahaawo atthu anoopuwela wiira ahaawo mahuku moolupale uvikana mahuku makina, nanso akina anoopuwela wiira mahuku othene ari oolikana. Khula ntthu alipane mawooni awe.

Ule novahera ifayita nihuku nikina, nopanka commo wiira aattittimihe Apwiya. Ule nokhura inama, nokhura mwa Apwiya, maana naansukuru Nluku, ni ule hinkhura inama, hinkhura mwa Apwiya, ni naansukuru Nluku.
Kontha mwa hi khaawo neekhala mwanene ni khaawo neekhwela mwanene.
Maana nakhalaka akumi, ninaakhalela Apwiya; nakhwaka, ninaakhwela Apwiya. Pooti ukhwa atthuna ukhala akumi, othene niri a Apwiya.
Vano ila phi itthu ikhwenlyawe Kristu ni unwelelaka, wiira akhale Apwiya a atthu ookhwa ni akumi.
Vano we, unonhukhumwelani munnaa? We, unontarawelani munnaa? Maana othene nihaana weemela wamiithoni wa Nluku wiira nihukhumwinye.
Maana ihantikhiya wiira: Kiheelupelela; aneera ph'Apwiya, uhoolo waka mi, makutha othene anaahala ukikhoromela, ni nlimi nothene ninaahala ulaphulula wiira mi ki Nluku.
Commo, khula ntthu mwa hi, naahala waakhula wa Nluku nnye caavarawe.
Phimaana, nrwee nihiye uhukhumwana. Uhiya commo, niphavele mananna oohinkakatusa atthuna unrimeliha munnihu.
Mi kinaacuwela ni kinaakupali mwa Apwiya Yesu wiira khiiwo iyolya iri yo'haramu veekhayaru, ari hikhanle paahi ule nohelelela ukhala iharamu. Yooyo phinonkhalela iharamu.
Wakhala wiira munnaa naacukula nlattu w'etthu inlyaa, commo we khumpanka wo nifento. Nlattu wo iyolya aa, uhinrimelihe munnaa yoole nkhwenlyawe Kristu.
Ile iri yo'halali wa nyu, ihithatuwe itthu yo'haramu.
Maana umwene wa Nluku khunakhala iyolya wala yoowurya, nanso iri isariya, imaani n'utteeliya muNnepani Nttakattifu.
Kontha ule nonrumeela Kristu, naanciveliha Nluku ni naakupaliya na atthu.
Phimaana niilipihe wiira nivare itthu immwaana imaani n'ulipiherana.
Uhikwanyulace nteko wa Nluku nlattu wo'yolya. Coolya cothene ciri co'halali, nanso unaananara ulya iyolya inonkakatusa ntthu.
Phatari uhikhura inama, mena uwurya ivinyu, mena upanka itthu phi itthu inhala unwulusa munnaa.
Nanso we, wamiithoni wa Nluku, usunke itthu ikupanlyaa. Horeriya ule hineehukhumu w'etthu inoonawe wiira iri yoorera.
Nanso ule naakaaka naahukhumwinya alyaka, maana khanlya ni nroromelo, ni citthu cothene cihinkhuma munroromeloni, cineehaninya itampi.
Vano hi niri oolipa munnepani, ninlamuliya waakavihera ale ari ookenkennyaa, ni nihiicivihereke yeehiru.
Khula ntthu wa hi nolamuliya uncivihera nkhwawe mwa coorera, wiira akhale oolipa munnepani.
Maana Kristu kheecivihenre mwanene, nanso, toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Ale anooruwanani nyu, ankiruwana mi.
Kontha cothene cantikhiye khalayi, caantikheliye wiira ciniitthucihe uvilela n'unilipihera, waacera nikhalane nwehereryo.
Vano, Nluku novaha uvilela n'upisa irima oovaheni nrima wo'mooca, toko ciryawe Yesu Kristu,
waacera wiira, ni nrima mmoca ni ncu nimoca munttittimihe Nluku ni Athumwanaya Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Phimaana, nvarecesaneke ntthu ni nkhwawe, toko Kristu coovarecesilyaweni wiira Nluku attittimihiye.
Vano kinowiirelani coo: Kristu heepanka nrumeyi a ayuta nlattu woofenta ikhweli ya Nluku, wiira atthitte cookhuluvelihiya caapankeliyaya mayathumwanihu;
waacera wiira amalaponi anttittimihe Nluku nlattu wo'kiriri cawe, toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Phimaana mi kimmowuttottopela wariyari wa amalaponi ni kimmowiipa icipo coottottopela ncina naa.
Cowantikhiya cineera tho coo: Nyu amalaponi, ntteeliye wamoca n'unethi wa Nluku.
Cowantikhiya cineera tho coo: Mwaattottopele Apwiya, nyu amalaponi othene; atthu othene yiipe icipo co waattottopela.
Nnapiyu Isaya n'uyo neera coo: Unaahala uphuwela ntithari wa Yesee, ule nohala wunwa wiira alamulele unethi; uyo naawehereriya na amalaponi.
Nluku o nwehereryo, oocariheni utteeliya ni imaani nlattu woonkhuluvela, wiira nkhale athaciri muuwehereryani wo'kuru co Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Asunnaka, mi kihokupali wiira, khweli nyu nri ootepa urera nrima n'ucuwelaca, ni nri tayari ulakana ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Kihimyaka citthu cikhwawe, kiwantikhenleni woohuuvithani, venci venci wiira kuwuupusereni tho, nlattu wo nnema nivahiyaka ni Nluku,

yookhala nanteko a Yesu Kristu wariyari wa amalaponi, kivaraka nteko wo mayasataka, woolalya nhupi woorera wa Nluku, waacera wiira amalaponi athatuwe yooveleela yooncivela Nluku, yoottakattifihiya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Vano kinawiittottopa mwa Yesu Kristu nlattu wo nteko wa Nluku.
Akinhala wiihumiti wuulumaca itthu, ari ihikhanle ile ipankilyawe Kristu mwa mi, mmoolumoni ni mmitekoni, waacera keettihe amalaponi wiira amwiiwelele Nluku,
ni ikuru co'kanyero ni mitikiniho, ni ikuru co Nnepa wa Nluku, wiira, ukhuma uYerusalemu, aattamanani, mpaka uLiriku, kiholaleera nhupi woorera wa Kristu.
Ikhumelo, kihopanka mananna oolalya nhupi woorera, mapuro yaaryawe hinacuweliya Kristu, waacera wiira kihiteke waculu caasa oothipeliya na akina.
Nanso, toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Ale ahinatoko ulaleeriya anaahala umoona, ni ale ahinatoko umwiiwa anaahala uncuweleeha.
Phimaana, imaara cinci kihaateelihiya wuthotolani.
Nanso vano, nlattu woohikhala nipuro noolalya nnya mittetthe nnya, waankicivela wuthotolani.
Vano kinoopuwela wuthotolani woorwa uSpanya. Kinaahala wuthotolani woovira ni wuuvahani ukati wookikavihera munkwahani mwaka kirwaaka wonwo, nanso kinamaleliye unukheliya waka nwo ni nyu.
Nanso nna va kihanle vakani ukhuma kirwaaka uYerusalemu, mmitekoni co waakavihera attakattifu.
Maana amasetoniya ni akaya, ahopanka ncanko n'utteeliya wiira yaavahe attakattifu oothwennya o'Yerusalemu.

Commo yahoonela ukhala yomaana, ni khweli ari oolokihiya na attakattifu o'Yerusalemu. Maana wakhalaka wiira amalaponi ayo anaapanka mphantte wo mihakhu co munnepani ca ayuta, anlamuliya ciicammo waarumeela ayuta ni citthu cirinaya.
Paahi, kamalihaka ula nteko ula ni kicuwelaka wiira ahaakhelela ula ncanko ula, phinhalaka urwaa uSpanya n'uvira wuthotolani.
Kihocuwela wiira, wanhalaka wuthotolani, kinaahala uphwanya iparakha cinci ca Kristu.
Nanso kinawulepelani asunnaka, mwa ncina na Yesu Kristu ni nnifentoni no Nnepa Nttakattifu, wiira mwaane ikhotto wamoca ni mi, nkivekelelaka wa Nluku.
Nkivekelele mi wiira kikutuphuwe wa ale oohaamini o'Yuteya, ni nteko aka uYerusalemu waakheleliye ratta na atthu attakattifu;
waacera wiira, Nluku atthunaka, kuuthotoleni n'utteeliya ni kaamumule wamoca ni nyu.
Vano Nluku eemaani akhale ni nyu othene. Ameni!
Vano naawa nwo mwanrokorihu Fepe, norumeela ikereca yo'Senkereya.

Kinawulepelani wiira mmwaakhelele nnifentoni na Apwiya, toko cinreranaya atthu attakattifu, ni munkavihere wo citthu cothene cimphavelawe, maana yooyo phiri nkaviheri muulupale wa atthu enci mpaka ni mi ciicammo.
Kihonsalamiha Prisila ni Akila, akhunanaka mwa Yesu Kristu.
Ayo ahohuva nlattu wawaka mi. Kinawaasukuru, woohikhala yeemiru, nanso ikereca ca amalaponi othene.
Ciicammo kinaasalamiha ikereca inthukumana uwannyaya. Kinansalamiha munnaka oofentiya Epenetu o wAsiya, pacenre umwaamini Yesu.
Kinansalamiha Mariya oovarenleni nteko mwinci.
Kinansalamiha Antroniku ni Yuniyasi, aloko aka yaari wamoca ni mi nkalaposo. Yaayo ancuwannya wariyari wa amitthenka ni yaari mwa Kristu mi kihinaya.
Ciicammo kinansalamiha Ampiliyatu, munnaka oofentiya mwa Apwiya.
Kinansalamiha Urpanu, nkhunanihu mwa Kristu, ni ciicammo munnaka oofentiya Estaki.
Kinansalamiha Apelesi, owaamininya mwa Kristu. Kinawaasalamiha ari o ntthoko na Aristopulu.
Kinansalamiha nloko aka Herotiyanu. Kinawaasalamiha o ntthoko na Narsisu, ale ari mwa Apwiya.
Kinansalamiha Trifena ni Trifosa, athiyana anvara nteko cinene mwa Apwiya. Kinansalamiha oofentiya Persite, vanre nteko venci mwa Apwiya.
Kinansalamiha Rufu, oothanliya mwa Apwiya, ari anumwane ni amaama.
Kinansalamiha Asinkritu, Felekonte, Ermesi, Patropasi, Ermasi, ni asunna ari ni yaayo.
Kinansalamiha Filoloku, Culiya, Nerewu ni mwanrokorawe, ni ciicammo Olimpa ni attakattifu othene arinaya.
Nsalamihane ntthu ni nkhwawe ni isalama ittakattifu. Ikereca ca Kristu cothene cinawusalamihani.
Asunnaka, pasoopa ni ale ankumakumiha ukawanaca ni anvaanyiha miitthuciho caakhenlenyu. Mwasempe yaayo.
Maana ayo khaanonrumeela Kristu Apwiy'ehu, nanso anrumeela mathuukwa aya. Ni moolumo aya owiicivihera, anawaathepya atthu ookenkennyaa munnepani.
Othene aheewa cineerenyu woottharihelela cowantikhiya, phimaana kihootteeliya cinene, nanso kineera, ncuwele iri yoorera ni nhittharihelele iri yoonanara.
Wowaakuvyaca wene, Nluku o nnema, naahala unnyakata Sotwani vathi inyaa cinyu. Nnema na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu nikhale ni nyu.
Nkhunanaka Timotiyu nawusalamihani, ni ciicammo asilokwaaka Lusiyu, Yasoni ni Sosipaturu, anawusalamihani.
Mi Tersiyu, kantikhile ila iwarakha ya Paulu ila, kinawusalamihani mwa ncina na Apwiya.
Kaiyu, akaakhelenle mi ni ikereca yothene nawusalamihani. Erastu, mayosunka ncurukhu o'sittatti, ni munnihu Kwartu, anawusalamihani.
Nnema na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu nikhale ni nyu othene. Ameni.
Vano ninttittimihe Nluku, maana uyo nawusunkani oolipene munroromeloni, toko ciryaya nhupi woorera unlalyaka uri wa Yesu Kristu. Yooyo wooniheriye wo'siiri yaavithiye ukati uvinre,
nanso nna va ukumiheriye vate ni ucuwelihiye mwa cowantikhiya co minapiyu, n'ulamula wa Nluku oohimala, wiira unethi wothene unkupali ni umwiiwelele.
Paahi, attittimihiye Nluku mmoca ncuweli, ukati wothene mwa Yesu Kristu. Ameni!
Mi Paulu, kiihaninye wootthuna wa Nluku, wiira kikhale mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu, wamoca ni munna aka Sostene,

kinaasalamiha ikereca ya Nluku iri uKorintu, na ale oottakattifihiya mwa Yesu Kristu, yiihaninye wiira akhale attakattifu, na ale ari mapuro othene aromolaka ncina na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu ri Apwiya aya ni Apwiy'ehu:
Nnema ni isalama cinkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu cikhale ni nyu.
Vano, ukati wothene, kinaansukuru Nluku aka nlattu wa nyu ni nlattu wo nnema nawe nivahiyenyu mwa Yesu Kristu.
Kontha mwa cothene nnyo nhothacirihiya mwa yooyo, nnuulumoni ni muucuwelacani mothene.
Ciicammo, usaahiti wa Kristu uri woocuwannya mwa nyu,
wiira ukati unwehereryenyu uwa wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, ihuuhaleleni mena ivahiya imoca.
Ayo ammowulipihani mpaka ummaleloni, wiira nhicovaciye naphiyaka nihuku na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Nluku ri oororomelyaa, yooyo wiihanneni wiira mwaatane mwa mwanawe Yesu Kristu Apwiy'ehu.
Asunnaka, kinawulepelani mwa ncina na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, wiira othene muulumace itthu imoca ni nhiihawulanace, nanso nkhale wamoca, mmoopuweloni ni mmawoonini.
Kontha, kihoohimeriya ni ntthoko na Kolowe wiira nnaanyakulihana ayaayoru.
Kontha akina wa nyu aneera: Mi a Paulu. Nkin'oyo neera: Mi a Apolu. Nkin'oyo neera: Mi a Peturu. Ni nkin'oyo neera: Mi a Kristu.
Kristu ri ookawannyaca? Paulu hokhomeliya mwa nlattu wa nyu? Mpattisiye mwa ncina na Paulu?
Mi kinaansukuru Nluku, maana mwa nyu khaawo kimpattisilyaka, ari hikhanle Krisipu ni Kaiyu,
waacera wiira hikhale nohala wiira mpattisaciye mwa ncina naka.
Ciicammo kihaapattisa amuci o ntthoko na Estefana; waahiya ala, akimmoona tho nkina kimpattisilyaka.
Maana Kristu khakirumile wiira kipattise, nanso wiira kilalyee nhupi woorera; woohikhala nlattu wa ankhili a pinatamu, waacera wiira ikuru co nookhwa a Kristu wansalapani cihikhale cithiru.
Khweli, nhupi wo wansalapani uri woovyaavyaa wa atthu arimenle, nanso wa hi niri owoopwa, uri ikuru ca Nluku.
Maana ihantikhiya wiira: Kinaahala waakwanyulaca ankhili a atthu ni kinaahala umalihaca ucuwelaca wa acuweli.
Vano mayankhili ri vayi? Nsomi ri vayi? Mayocuwelaca ilapo ila ri vayi? Nluku haapanka ankhili o mwiilaponi ukhala alolo.
Vano Nluku n'ankhili awe, khaahiyerenre atthu wiira ancuwelele n'ankhili aya. Uhiya commo, Nluku aholakela woopola ale ankupali ni pankile ni nhupi woorera unlalyehu, yooyo unheliya ukhala nlolo.
Kontha ayuta anlepela mitikiniho, ni akereku anaavya ankhili;
nanso hi ninonlalya Kristu khomeliye, ri nkakathulo wa ayuta ni ulolo wa amalaponi;
nanso wa ale yiihaninye, upacera akereku mpaka ayuta, Kristu phiri ikuru n'ankhili a Nluku.
Maana ile inkhala toko ulolo wa Nluku, phiri ankhili oovikana a atthu; ile inkhala toko ukenkennya wa Nluku, phiri yootepa ulipa woovikana ikuru ca atthu.
Vano asunnaka, muupuwele mananna caarinyu nhineehaninya ni Nluku. Atthu vakani phaari oocuwelaca, atthu vakani phaari okuru ni atthu vakani phaari o maloko oocuwannyaa.

Uhiya commo, Nluku hothanla citthu cooneliya ukhala cilolo co mwiilaponi, wiira aapattihace ihaaya aankhili. Nluku hothanla citthu cooneliya ukhala cookenkennya co mwiilaponi, wiira aapattihace ihaaya okuru ayo.
Nluku hothanla citthu cowiimaaliha ni coothanyinya co mwiilaponi ni nnye cihiri ittiitthu, wiira akhwelakhwelihe ciri ittiitthu nnyo;
waacera wiira hikhale nohala wiittottopa wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Nlattu wa Nluku, phirinyu mwa Yesu Kristu, yooyo ri ankhili a Nluku wa hi, maanaya wiira, isariya, uttakattifu, ni woopola,
toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Ule neettottopa, eettottopeke mwa Apwiya.
Vano asunnaka, waawilyaka uwoonananani, kuulalyeerakani isiiri ya Nluku, khakipankile wo wiira kiwooryaceni ni moolumelo aka atthuna ni ankhili aka.
Kontha khiiwo yaalakenlyaka wuucuwelihani waaryaka ni nyu, ari hiri paahi Yesu Kristu khomeliye.
Waaryaka ni nyu, kaari ookenkennyaa, o woova ni oottettemela venci.
Nhupi aka n'ulalya waka khawaari wo moolumo ni ankhili oophavela paahi uwooryacani, nanso koothoonyerani ni ikuru co Nnepa Nttakattifu,
waacera wiira nroromelo ninyu nno nihikhuluvele ankhili a atthu, nanso nikhuluvele ikuru ca Nluku.
Vano nahooluma ni ankhili wariyari wa ale a ankhili; woohikhala ankhili o ula ukati ula, ni woohikhala anakuru o ula ukati ula, ahiri ittiitthu.
Nanso ninoolumaca ankhili a Nluku, isiiri civithiye, cennye cilamulenlyawe Nluku ukhuma unankhuma, mwa co waarya cihu,
cihicuwenlyaya anakuru othene o yoola ukati ula, maana yaacuwenle, khayaakhomela Apwiya o nttittimiho.
Nanso, toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Hata miitho khayoonne, hata manyaru khayiiwile, hata vakani khikenle munrimani mwa ntthu itthu yaatthenkacenryawe Nluku ale anonfenta.
Nanso Nluku honithoonyera ni Nnepa awe. Maana Nnepa unaaneelela citthu cothene ni mpaka citthu co'siiri ca Nluku.
Khaawo nocuwela moopuwelo a ntthu, ari uhikhanle nnepa awe uri ni yooyo. Ciicammo phiryaya moopuwelo a Nluku, khaawo nocuwela, ri uhikhanle Nnepa wa Nluku.
Vano hi khanaakhenle nnepa wo nttuniyani; naakhenle Nnepa unkhuma wa Nluku, wiira nicuwele citthu civahiyehu ni Nluku.
Hi ciicammo khanuulumacile ni moolumo oosomihinya ni ankhili onttuniyani, nanso nuulumacile ni moolumo oosomihinya ni Nnepa, nitaphulelaka citthu co munnepani wa atthu o munnepani.
Vano ntthu o nttuniyani khankupali citthu co Nnepa wa Nluku, kontha nohelelela ukhala cilolo, ni khanoorya wiiweeha, maana nnyo cineeweehiya munnepani.
Ntthu o munnepani nawiiweeha cothene, nanso uyo khaneeweehiya ni ntthu.
Toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Tipani cuwenle moopuwelo a Apwiya wo wiira aalakihacere? Khaawo. Nanso hi nihaana moopuwelo a Kristu.
Vano asunnaka, akiwuulumacenreni toko atthu o munnepani, nanso kiwuulumacenreni toko atthu o nttuniyani, toko asaana asinkani mwa Kristu.
Kuuvahileni uwurya mahaaca, akuuvahileni iyolya yoolipa, maana khamoorya. Hata nna va khannoorya.
Kontha nanlelo nri ni makhalelo o nttuniyani. Maana, nnaaramanaca ni nnaahawulana ayaayoru. Commo khanri ni makhalelo o nttuniyani ni khanneetta toko ananttuniyani?
Vano ntthu oolumacaka wiira: Mi a Paulu, ni nkina eeraka: Mi a Apolu; commo khanri ananttuniyani?
Vano Apolu tipani? Paulu tipani? Ayo ari arumeyi awaaminihileni, ni uyo uri nteko Apwiya ummahilyaya khula ntthu.
Mi kihophattya, Apolu homicera, nanso Nluku phunnuwihile.
Maanaya wiira, hata ule nophattya khanakhala itthu, ni ule nomicera khanakhala itthu, nanso Nluku nonnuwiha phiri itthu.
Vano, ule nophattya ni ule nomicera, othene anvara nteko mmoca, ni khula ntthu nawaakhela itthuvo awe toko ciinryawe mavarelo nteko.
Maana hi ninvara wamoca nteko wa Nluku; nyu nri imatta ni inupa ya Nluku.
Vano toko civahiyaaka nnema na Nluku, kihonteka caasa toko funtti oowalaala; vano nkina noteka waculu wawe caasa uyo. Nanso, khula ntthu aweheehe cineerawe wooteka va.
Kontha khaawo noorya unteka tho caasa nkina, uvikana tekiy'oyo, ri Yesu Kristu.
Vano, wakhalaka wiira waculu caasa va ntthu noteka ni iwooru, iparatha, maluku o'fayita, ithaapwa, irette atthuna mikhutta,
nteko wo khula ntthu unaahala wooniheriya, maana nihuku na Apwiya ninaahala woonihera woonene, kontha nihuku nno ninhala wooniheriya ni mooro, ni mooro uyo unaahala ucuwaneeha nteko wo khula ntthu.
Vano ile itekilyawe ntthu yaahivyeeke, uyo naahala waakhela itthuvo awe.
Wakhalaka wiira itekilyawe ile inaavya, uyo naahala ulya ihasara, nanso nohala woopwa toko ntthu nootopwa wamooroni.
Ncuwele wiira nyu nri inupa ya Nluku ni Nnepa wa Nluku unkhala mwa nyu.
Vano ntthu akwanyulacaka inupa ya Nluku, Nluku naahala unkwanyulaca, maana inupa ya Nluku phi nyu, nri attakattifu.
Vano hikhale neethepya. Akhalaka ntthu neecoona ukhalana ankhili nttuniyani mu, eepanke toko nlolo, wiira akhale a ankhili.
Maana ankhili o'ttuninya ila uri ulolo wamiithoni wa Nluku; toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Nluku nawaavariha atthu a ankhili muulavilavini mwaya mmo.
Ni ihantikhiya tho wiira: Apwiya anaacuwela moopuwelo a atthu a ankhili, wiira ari oohi itthu.
Phimaana, hikhale neettottopa nlattu woontthara ntthu, maana citthu cothene ciri cawinyu.
Pooti ukhala Paulu, Apolu, atthuna Peturu; pooti ukhala ittuninya, ukumi, atthuna ukhwa; pooti ukhala citthu conaanano, atthuna co'hoolo; cothene ciri cawinyu,
ni nyu nri a Kristu, ni Kristu ri a Nluku.
Vano, wanlamuliya wiira atthu ayo anoone toko mayokavihera a Kristu ni mayanikhupi o'siiri ca Nluku.
Itthu imphaveliya wo mayanikhupi, iri yo wiira aphwanyinye nari ookhuluvelyaa.
Nanso wo mi, khinakhala itthu yuulupale uhukhumwinya ni nyu, atthuna ni mayahukhumu a atthu. Hata mi akineehukhumu.
Maana koopuwelaka, akinoona itthekilyaka, nanso akineeciirela ooloka, kontha ankihukhumu ari Apwiya paahi.

Phimaana nhinhukhumu ntthu ukati uhinaya, mmwehererye mpaka uwa Apwiya. Yaayo phinhala umwaleela citthu coovithiya co mpiphini, ni anaahala woonihera cowuupuweliya co munrimani; vano khula ntthu phinhalawe uttottopeliya ni Nluku.

Asunnaka, nnya citthu cihimilyaka nnya kiheettela mi ni Apolu nlattu wo wufentani, waacera wiira mwiitthuce mwa hi yowantikhiya ineera: Nhituphe yantikhiye. Hikhale nohala unttottopela ntthu mmoca, antarawaka ntthu nkhwawe.
Vano tupani oovahile iyuulupale yo waapwaha akhwaa? Urinani we ihaakhenlyaa? Wakhalaka wiira uhaakhela, uhiittottope!
Maana nhaana cothene caaphavelenyu! Vano nhothaciri! Mpaka nhothatuwa mamwene woohikhala hi! Phatari nnari mamwene, ni hi niwaaka ulamula ni nyu!
Kontha mi kinoona wiira Nluku honeesa hi amitthenka nipuro no wiiheerya, toko atthu oohukhumwinya ukhwa. Maana nihothatuwa nthwelelo wo mwiilaponi, wa ancelo ni wa atthu.
Hi n'alolo nlattu wa Kristu, nanso nyu nri a ankhili mwa Kristu; hi niri ookenkennyaa, nanso nyu nri o'kuru; nyu nri oottittimihinya nanso hi niri ootarawaciya.
Mpaka nna va ninaahuva itala, ntthona n'uthaaleliya; ninawaattakaciya ni khanirina ntthoko nihu,
ninaakhulummwa nlattu woovara nteko ni matata ehu. Vano naruwaninyaka, ninaareriha; noomolanihaciyaka, ninaavilela;
nootheraciyaka, ninaaphavela waatanaca. Mpaka nna va, ninheleleliya ukhala ikokhola co nttuniyani ni iharamu ya atthu othene.
Akinwantikhelani nnya citthu nnya wiira kuupattihaceni ihaaya, nanso kinwantikhelani wiira kuulopoleni toko asaanaka oofentiya.
Hata yiiriyaka mwahaana mayosomiha enci mwa Kristu, khamwaakhalana mayathumwaninyu enci, maana mi, kihooyarani mwa Yesu Kristu nlattu wo wulalyeerani nhupi woorera.
Kinoolepelani wiira nkhale mayokitakiha.

Nlattu wo yeeyo, kihooveleeliherani Timotiyu, ri mwanaka nonfentaka ni ookhuluvelyaa mwa Apwiya, yooyo nohala uwuupuserani makhalelo aka mwa Kristu, toko cineetthucihaka miphantte cothene ni mmakereca mothene.
Akinaku yaaneettottopa venci, yoonihaka toko akinhala tho uwa wuthotolani.
Nanso Apwiya yatthunaka, kinaawa woohipica wuthotolani, vano vaava phinhalaka ucuwela, woohikhala paahi inoolumacaya owiittottopa ayo, nanso uwa woona ikuruni cirinaya.
Maana, umwene wa Nluku kuhimweni wo moolumo, nanso wo'kuru.
Vano nnophavelani? Mpaka kuuweeleni ni ikopo, atthuna ni nifento no nnepa wowiimaaliha?
Vano, waheewannya wiira iriyari inyu uhaawo uluva, ni yeeyo itthu iyo, ihineerannya na amalaponi. Maanaya wiira, haawo ntthu naathukumanana amwaara a athumwane.
Ni mothene mmo, nyu nnawiittottopa! Mwaalamuliya ucukula n'umoomola iriyari inyu ntthu pankile yeeyo itthu iyo!
Hata kinoohikhalaru wonwo mwirutthuni, nanso kihaawo munnepani, ni kihonhukhumu pankile yeeyo itthu iyo toko kiri wonwo.
Mwa ncina na Apwiya Yesu Kristu, nyu ni mi ninathukumanne munnepani, ni ikuru ca Yesu, Apwiy'ehu,
avahereriye yooyo ntthu uyo wa Sotwani, wiira irutthu awe ikwanyulaciye, nanso nnepa awe woopoliye nihuku na Apwiya Yesu.
Wiittottopa winyu nwo khunakhala woorera. Khannocuwela wiira miropo vakani cinaattuttuliha iphepa yo weethennya?
Mwiirerihe nkumihaka miropo co khalayi iriyari inyu, wiira nkhale iphepa yonaanano, toko cirinyu woohi miropo. Ciicammo, Kristu Mwakhontwaa ehu o Paasikuwa hohitiya nlattu wawihu.
Phimaana, nipanke isikuhuulu woohi miropo co khalayi, ni woohikhala ni miropo coonanara mena coohiloka, nanso ni mikatthe coohi miropo, comaana ni ceekhweli.
Kihowantikhelani iwarakha wiira nhaatakaneelane atthu ooluva.
Koolumacaka commo, akinaaca anooluva o nttuniyani, atthuna anasooyo, atthuna anamwinnya, atthuna anaalapela anluku; maanaya wiira unari commo, mwaalamuliya ukhuma nttuniyani.

Nanso vano, kinowantikhelani wiira nhintakaneelane ntthu neeciirela munnihu nari ooluva atthuna nasooyo, atthuna aalapelaka anluku, atthuna oohankawaani, atthuna oohapaliya, atthuna namwinnya. Yooyo ntthu uyo nhinlyaane mena vakani.
Vano kaahala waahukhumu cani atthu ahiri o nkereca? Nyu khannolamuliya waahukhumu arinenyu nkereca?
Ale ahiri o nkereca, Nluku naahala waahukhumu. Mmoomole iriyari inyu ule nopanka yoonanara.
Vano ntthu akoseriyaka ni munnawe, khanlamuliya unkasari wa mayahukhumu oohoopwa; nolamuliya unrwaana wa atthu attakattifu.
Khannocuwela wiira attakattifu phinhala uhukhumu ittuninya? Wakhalaka wiira phi nyu nnohala uhukhumu ittuninya, vano nnoolwaana cani uhukhumu citthu cikani?
Khannocuwela wiira phi hi ninhala waahukhumu ancelo? Eere tho citthu co wattuniyani va!
Vano nyu mwakoseranaka ayaayoru, nnaavyerani tho atthu ahiri ni nyu mwa Kristu?
Paahi, wo wiira kuupattihaceni ihaaya, kinwiirelani coo: Khaawo ntthu a ankhili wariyari winyu va owoorya uhukhumu milahanya ca asunninyu?
Nanso wariyari winyu naakhuma mmoca urwaa unkasari munnawe wa atthu oohi nroromelo.
Mwakumiheranaka milattu ayaayoru, unthoonyera wiira nhotthemiya. Wanari commo, khawaarera uhaleela isariya? Khawaarera ukhala owiiyeriya?
Nanso woovirikana commo, phi nyu nnopanka coohi isariya, mwaathepyaka ni mwennyeraka asunninyu!

Atthuna khannocuwela wiira atthu oohisariya khaanhala ukela wumweneni wa Nluku? Nhiithepye. Hata mayoraruwa, mena anaalapela anluku, mena anooluva, mena alopwana atthuna athiyana anaathukumanana akhwaya,
mena anamwinnya, mena anasooyo, mena ananhapaliya, mena owiitha malaku, mena mayothepya, khaanhala ukela wumweneni wa Nluku.
Wariyari winyu va, akina phaaryaya ciicammo, nanso nyu nhorapihiya, nhottakattifihiya, nhovaheriya isariya mwa ncina na Apwiya Yesu Kristu ni mwa Nnepa wa Nluku ihu.
Haawo ntthu neera: Cothene ciri co'halali. Nanso mi kinoohimeryani wiira cothene khacinkikavihera. Cothene ciri co'halali. Nanso mi akinlamuliya uhiyerera cikooryacaka.

Haawo ntthu neera: Coolya nnyo ciri co nnapwiipwini ni napwiipwi uyo ri o coolya. Nanso mi kinoohimeryani wiira Nluku naahala ukwanyulaca coopiili. Irutthu khiri yoopankela cooluva, nanso iri ya Apwiya, ni Apwiya phiri anene irutthu.
Nluku honweleliha Apwiya ni ciicammo naahala ununweleliha ni ikuru cawe.
Khannocuwela wiira irutthu cinyu nnyo ciri miphantte ca Kristu? Vano mi kaanhala ukusa mphantte wo'rutthu ya Kristu n'upanka mphantte wa puuta? Mena vakani!
Atthuna khannocuwela wiira ntthu nonthukumanana puuta, nokhala irutthu imoca ni uyo? Maana, toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Oyeeli ankhala irutthu imoca.
Nanso ule noluttaana ni Apwiya, ri nnepa mmoca na ayo.
Ntthawe cooluva. Itampi phi itampi impankawe ntthu, iri uta waya irutthu, nanso ule neetta uluva nokosera irutthu awe.
Khannocuwela wiira irutthu cinyu nnyo ciri inupa yo Nnepa Nttakattifu, unkhala ni nyu, yooyo uvahiyenyu ni Nluku? Nyu khanhimwe o nyenyuva.
Kontha nthuminye ni nttenko mwinci. Phimaana, munttittimihe Nluku mwirutthuni mwinyu mmo.
Vano, toko iwarakha ikantikhenlenyu iyo, waanaarera wiira nlopwana hinkwanye nthiyana.
Nanso nlattu wooluva, khula nlopwana nolamuliya ukhalana amwaarawe, ni wo khula nthiyana, akhalane awannyawe.
Nlopwan'oyo nolamuliya uttharihelela ilamuleliyawe waapankela amwaarawe, ni athiyana ayo, ciicammo yaapankele awannyaya.
Athiyana ayo, khaanlamula irutthu aya, nanso anlamula ph'awannyaya. Ciicammo alopwana ayo khaanlamula irutthu aya, nanso anlamula ph'amwaaraya.

Nlopwana na amwaarawe ahikhottane, ari uhikhanle wiiwanana oyeeli wo'kati vakani nlattu wo mavekelo amphavelaya upanka, ni wahoolo athukumaneke, waacera wiira Sotwani hikela ooryaca nlattu woohivilela.
Iyo kinoohimeryani wanreranaya, woohikhala toko nlamulo.
Waankicivela wiira alopwana othene akhale toko ciryaka mi, nanso, khula ntthu haana ivahiya wo mphantte wa Nluku; mmoc'oyo hovahiya mananna awe ni nkin'oyo hovahiya mananna awe.
Vano ale ari athupa na ale ookhweliya awannyaya, kinhimya wiira waanaarera anakhanle ciicammo toko ciryaka mi.
Nanso yaahooryeke uvilela, athele, kontha phatari uthela, woohikhala wiivalela makhala o mooro.
Vano ale oothela, kinawaalamulela, woohikhala mi, nanso Apwiya, wiira nthiyana haamwalanane awannyawe.
Nanso wakhalaka wiira haamwalanana awannyawe, hitheliye, atthuna ahokoleelane na awannyawe. Ciicammo nlopwana haamwalanane amwaarawe.
Vano akina ayo kineerela co, woohikhala Apwiya: Akhalaka wiira munna mmoca honthela nthiyana hiri mwaamini, ni uyo atthunaka umunkomana nlopwan'oyo, himmwalanane.
Ni nthiyana rina wannyawe hiri mwaamini, n'uyo atthunaka umunkomana, himmwalanane nlopwan'oyo.

Maana wannyawe hiri mwaamini, nottakattifihiya nlattu wa amwaarawe ari mwaamini, ni nthiyana hiri mwaamini, nottakattifihiya nlattu wa awannyawe ari mwaamini. Wahaari commo, asaanenyu ayo khayaakhala oottakattifihiya, nanso vano ari attakattifu.
Nanso hiri mwaamini uyo aphavelaka umwalana nkhwawe, amwalananeke, kontha commo, nlopwana mwaamini atthuna nthiyana mwaamini, hotaphuwa munlamuloni noothelana, maana Nluku wiihanenleni imaani.
Vano, we nthiyana, unaacuwela wakhala wiira unaahala woopola awannyaa? Atthuna we nlopwana, unaacuwela wakhala wiira unaahala woopola amwaaraa?
Vano khula ntthu akhale toko civaheriyawe na Apwiya, ni ciinryawe wo wiihaninya ni Nluku. Commo phinlamulelaka mmakereca mothene.
Haawo eehaninye noonle icantto? Hiipanke toko oohuula icantto. Haawo eehaninye huunle icantto? Huule icantto.
Icantto iyo khinakhala itthu; uhuula icantto, ciicammo khunakhala itthu, nanso irina ifayita uri weettela malamulo a Nluku.
Vano khula ntthu akhale toko ciinryawe wo wiihaninya.
Wiihaninye unari ipottha? Uhisanke. Nanso wakhala wiira unawoorya wootopwa, utthumiri ukati.
Maana ule eehaninye mwa Apwiya nari ipottha, ri ootaphuliya na Apwiya, ni ciicammo, ule eehaninye nari ootaphuwa, ri ipottha ya Kristu.
Nthuminye ni nttenko mwinci; nhiipanke ipottha ya atthu.
Phimaana asunnaka, khula ntthu akhale wamiithoni wa Nluku toko ciihaninyawe.
Vano ihaali yo mamwali, akirina nlamulo na Apwiya, nanso kinhimya cinoonelaka, toko caakhenlyaka wa Apwiya ikiriri cookhala ookhuluvelyaa.
Nlattu wa cookhumelela co ula ukati ula, kinoona wiira wanaarera nlopwana ukhala toko ciryawe.
We uhothela? Uhimwalane. We kuthenle? Uhimwaavye nthiyana.
Nanso wathelaka khunkosa, ni mwali atheliyaka khankosa. Ale anthelana, ankhala owunkuruma mmakhaleloni mwaya, ni mi kaaphavenle waanemecera.
Nanso kinwiirelani coo: Ukati uneera uwukuwaka. Vano kineera: Ale athenle, akhaleke toko oohithela;
ciicammo ale anonla, akhaleke toko khaanonla, na ale ootteeliya, akhaleke toko oohitteeliya, na ale anthuma akhaleke toko khaarina itthu.
Ni ale antthumiri ittuninya, akhaleke toko khaantthumiri, maana makhalelo o'ttuninya ila, anaavira.
Vano imphavelaka iri yo wiira ntaphuwe mmisankihoni mwinyu. Ule hithenle, nowacawaca citthu ca Apwiya, ni mananna o waaciveliha Apwiya.
Nanso ule thenle, nowacawaca citthu co nttuniyani, mananna o waaciveliha amwaarawe,

commo ri owiikawaniha. Ciicammo athiyana ayo, akhalaka athupa atthuna mwali, anwacawaca citthu ca Apwiya, wiira akhale attakattifu, mwirutthuni ni munnepani. Nanso ale atheliye, anwacawaca citthu co nttuniyani, mananna o waaciveliha awannyaya.

Kinoolumacera commo kontha kimphavela wuukaviherani. Akinonkhanyereriha ntthu hata itthu imoca. Uhiya commo, kimphavela wiira mpanke inowaacani ni yoorera, yo wiira mwiivaherere muntekoni wa Apwiya ni ikuru cothene.
Vano wakhalaka wiira uyo khanoorya unvilela mwali mpakanenlyawe, ni macuso awe ayo aneera aviraka, phatari unthela, commo khankosa.
Nanso nlopwan'oyo alakelaka uhithela ni ooryaka uvilela ilakenlyawe iyo, uhinthela mwali uyo, commo naapanka sana.
Vano ule nonthela mwali ule, naapanka itthu yoorera, nanso ule hinonthela naapanka itthu yootepa urera.
Nthiyana ootheliya akhalaka nkumi, nokhala ooluttana na awannyawe. Nanso yakhwaka awannyawe ayo, ri ootaphuwa wiira atheliye ni ule nontthunawe, akhalaru mwa Apwiya.
Kinoona wiira naahala ukhala ootteeliya, akhalaka woohitheliya, ayo mananna anoonelaka mi, ni kinaakupali wiira ni mi ciicammo kihaana Nnepa wa Nluku.
Vano, mwaha wo coolya cinvahereriya anluku, nihocuwela wiira othene niri atthu oocuwelaca. Ucuwelaca unwaana wiittottopa, nanso nifento ninaalipihera.
Akhalaka wiira haawo neecoona ucuwelaca, nanlelo khanaya ucuwela itthu.
Nanso ntthu nonfenta Nluku, uyo ri oocuweliya ni Nluku.
Phimaana, mwaha wo coolya cinvahereriya anluku, ninaacuwela wiira anluku khaanakhala ittiitthu mwiilaponi mu; Nluku ri mmoca paahi.
Maana anookhalaru anluku, atthuna owirimu atthuna mwiilaponi mu, anookhalaru anluku enci ni mapwiya enci,

hi nineera Nluku ri mmoca paahi, Athumwanihu, apattusile citthu cothene ni atthunne wiira hi nikhale akumi. Apwiya amoca paahi ari Yesu Kristu. Mwa yooyo cipattusiye citthu cothene, ni hi ciicammo niri akumi mwa uyo.
Commo, kahi wiira atthu othene ahaana ucuwelac'ono. Kontha akina, nlattu wowaalemalela anluku, anaalya coolya cinveleeliheriya yaayo, ni nlattu wookenkennya ankhili aya, na ayo anaarawula.
Kihimweni iyolya inhala unicuwannyeeha wa Nluku, maana naahilyeke khiiwo inhaleelehu ni nalyaka khiiwo imphurehu.
Mwiikasoope, wiira wiithawala winyu nwo, uhikhale wo waakakatusa ookenkennyaa.
Kontha awoonaka ntthu ookenkennyaa unonkomile nkwiitti, ulyaka coolya cinvahereriya anluku, n'uyo naahala utakaneela ulya.
Vano, nlattu woocuwelaca waa, naarimela munnaa ookenkennyaa, yooyo nkhwenlyawe Kristu.
Toko commo, waakoseraka asunnaa ni waatankanyaka ankhili aya ookenkennyaa, unonkosera Kristu.
Phimaana, wakhala wiira iyolya eyo inaankakatusa munnaka, akinlamuliya ukhura tho inama, wiira kihinkakatuse.
Mi akiri ootaphuwa? Akihimwe mmitthenka? Akimoonne Yesu Apwiy'ehu? Nyu khanhimwe nhokorokho wo nteko uvanryaka mwa ncina na Apwiya?
Hata kihikhale mmitthenka mwa atthu akina ayo, nanso mwa nyu, ki mmitthenka, maana nyu nri nthoonyero woomitthenka uryaka mwa ncina na Apwiya.
Vano wiicaakiha waka mwa ale ankinyokha, phi coo:
Hi khunniphwanela waakhela iyolya ni yoowurya?
Ciicammo khunniphwanela waatthukana ikwaha asaarihu, toko cimpankaya amitthenka akina, Peturu na asunnaya Apwiya Yesu?
Kaahiki kiri mi paahi ni Parnapee, ninlamuliya uvara nteko wo wiira niihephele?
Khaawo norwaa utoropani phiihephelaka mwanene. Khaawo nophattya mwiri wo nhokorokho unliya, ni phihilyaka. Khaawo nohakhela imope woohiwurya ileeti aya.
Maanaya wiira akinoolumaca commo toko ntthu, kontha Nlamulo nno phinhimyaya commo.
Kontha muNlamuloni na Musa nhantikhiya wiira: Khunlamuliya utthuka malaku o'mope wanttikitthaya itiriku. Vano maanaya wiira Nluku nowacawaca imope paahi?
Uyo khannaaca hi? Wo'khweli cowantikhiya cinnaaca hi. Ntthu nolima ni ule neepettha itiriku naawehererya waakhela mphantte ummwaaca.
Vano hi naalaka mwa nyu citthu co munnepani, ninaatepana nahephaka mwa nyu mphantte wo citthu cinruweryenyu?
Akina anhepheliya ni nyu, vano hi? Ciicammo hi naalamuliya uhepheliya wo waapwaha ayo. Nanso, khanintthumiri commo; ninaavilela cothene, wiira nihikukureehe nhupi woorera wa Kristu.
Khannocuwela wiira ale anvara nteko inupa ittakattifu anlya co mpaani mommo? Ni anvara nteko ukhipulani anlya cookhipulani?
Ciicammo Apwiya aholamula wiira, ale anlalya nhupi woorera, alyeeke co nhupi woorera.
Nanso mi akinatoko utthumiri mphantte unkiphwanela. Akinantikha wiira nyu nkipankele yeeyo, maana phatari kikhwe, nanso kihintthunenle ntthu ukaateeliha wiittottopa waka.
Akinlamuliya wiittottopa nlattu woolalya nhupi woorera, maana iyo iri itthu inlamuliyaka upanka. Kihotakhaliya mi kaahilalyeke nhupi woorera!
Kontha kaalakenle ulalya wotthuna waka, kaammwehererya uliviya, nanso ukhala wiira kihooruminya, phi nteko ukhuluveliyaka.
Toko commo, kinliviyani? Iri ifayita yoolalya nhupi woorera wo mahala ni woohikhanyerera uliviya toko mayolalya nhupi woorera.
Maana, kinaryene ootaphuwa, kiheepanka toko ipottha ya atthu othene, wiira kooryaanihe atthu enci cinene waarwaana wa Kristu.
Kahokhala toko nyuta wiira kooryaanihe ayuta; wa ale aneettela Nlamulo, kahokhala toko ni mi phineettelaka, wiira kooryaanihe aneettela Nlamulo, hata kinaaheettelaru Nlamulo.

Vano wa ale ahineettela malamulo, ni mi kahokhala toko ooheettela malamulo, wiira kooryaanihe ale ahineettela malamulo. Hata kinookhalaru toko ntthu ooheettela Nlamulo na Nluku, nanso kineettela nlamulo na Kristu.
Kahokhala toko ookenkennyaa, wiira kooryaanihe ookenkennyaa. Kahopanka mothene mwa atthu othene wiira wo mananna othene koopole akina.
Kimpanka cothene nnyo nlattu wo nhupi woorera, kiwehereryaka waakhela ikhuluvelihilyawe.
Khannocuwela wiira ale ampanka masinttano ootthimakaca, anookhalaru wiira othene anaatthimakaca, notthema mmoca paahi? Phimaana, nnolamuliya utthimakaca mwiikuruvalelaka wiira nttheme.
Mayotthimakaca, nawiikuruvalela ukati wothene; waacera wiira aphwanye itthuvo immala, nanso hi nineekuruvalela, wiira niphwanye itthuvo ihimmala.
Ni ciicammo mi akintthimakaca toko ntthu notthimakaca woohikhomo; kinawaana, woohikhala wo pure.
Nanso kinaahuviha irutthu aka mpaka upanka toko ipottha, wiira kaalaleeraka akina, kihikela kakhottiya ni Nluku.
Vano asunnaka, kimphavela uwuupuserani wiira, mayapaapehu yeetta anakhuneeliye ni nihutte ni othene yaavira mpharyaa.
Yahopattisiya mwa ncina na Musa nnihutteni ni mpharyaa.
Othene yaalilye iyolya imoca yo munnepani
ni yaawunrye iluusi imoca yo munnepani, maana yaawunrye maasi o mwala wo munnepani waaveleela. Ni mwala waaveleel'oyo aari Kristu.
Nanso, Nluku khaatteeliye na atthu akina ayo, phimaana yahokhwaca ntakhwani.
Vano nnya citthu nnya cikhanle nthoonyero ehu, wiira nihikhale oophavela citthu coonanara, toko ayo caaphavenlyaya.
Nhiipanke mayowaalapela anluku toko atthu akina ayo, maana ihantikhiya wiira: Unethi wahonkoma wiira ulye ni uwurye ni wahonwa wiira wiine.
Nihikhale mayoluva, toko caapankilyaya mayapaapehu, awuluwaka wo nihuku nimoca, atthu ilufu sirini na ttharu (23.000).
Nihaattehattehe Apwiya, toko caapankilyaya mayapaapehu, akhwaacaka nlattu wooluminya ni inwaa.
Nhittokutte, toko caattokuttaya mayapaapehu, yiivakaciyaka ni ncelo.
Nnya citthu nnya ceeranenle yaayo toko nthoonyero, ni cihantikhiya waacera wiira cinilopole hi ninkhala ula ukati woomalihera ula.
Vano ule noona wiira heemela ratta, eerattavelele wiira hiwuluwe.

Uttehattehiya wuuphwanyileni unawaakhuna atthu othene. Nanso Nluku ri ookhuluvelyaa ni khanhala utthuna wiira nttehattehiye mpaka uvikana ikuru cinyu. Uhiya commo, mwattehattehiyaka, uyo naahala wukutuphulani waacera wiira moorye uvilela.
Phimaana asunnaka oofentiya, ntthawe waalapela anluku.
Kinwuulumanani nyu atthu a ankhili; muupuwele nyenyuva inoolumacaka.
Khannocuwela wiira ikikhompe yo'parakha inrerihehu iri waatana wo'phome ya Kristu? Nkatthe ummeelanehu, uri waatana wo'rutthu ya Kristu?
Maana hi, nihookhalaru enci, niri nkatthe mmoca, irutthu imoca, kontha nimmeelana nkatthe mmoca.
Moone unethi wo'Sirayeli; khaahimwe ale anvara nteko ukhipulani phinlya cookhipulani?
Vano kiireke cani? Kiireke, cooveleeliheriya anluku ciri ittiitthu? Atthuna anluku ayo ari ittiitthu?
Mena! Kinwiirelani coo: Citthu cinveleelihaya akaafiri, anaaveleelihera macini, khaanonveleelihera Nluku. Akintthuna wiira nyu mwaatane na macini.
Khannolamuliya uwurya ikikhompe ya Apwiya ni ikikhompe yo macini; khannolamuliya wunkoma meeca a Apwiya ni wunkoma meeca o macini.
Hi ninawonliha ihace Apwiya? Hi niri oolipa wo waapwaha ayo?
Cothene ciri co'halali, nanso cothene khacinkikavihera. Cothene ciri co'halali, nanso kuhimwena wiira cothene cinaakavihera.
Hikhale nowacawaca cawawe paahi, nanso awacawace ni nnyo ca nkhwawe.
Nkhureke inama yothene intumihinya upacari, nanso nhikohakohe, nlattu wookenkennya moopuwelo enyu;
maana ilapo ela iri ya Apwiya ni cothene ciriwo ciri ca Apwiya.
Vano ntthu oohaamini awiihanelakani iyolya uwannyawe, ni nyu mwarwaka, nlye yothene inhalenyu uwaaneliya, woohikohakoha nlattu wookenkennyaa moopuwelo enyu.
Nanso, ntthu awiirelakani: Ila iri yoovahereriya anluku; nhilye, nlattu wa ule oohimenryeni ni nlattu wo moopuwelo enyu;
maanaya ari moopuwelo a nkina, woohikhala awinyu. Vano kinhala uhukhumweliyani ni ntthu nkina nlattu wootaphuwa waka?
Wakhala wiira kinaalya ni kinaasukuru, akinlamuliya uhukhumwinya nlattu w'etthu impankaka kisukuruku.
Phimaana mwalyaka, mwawuryaka atthuna mwapankaka itthu phi itthu, mpanke cothene wonttittimiha Nluku.
Nhikhale ikhokolo yo waakakatusa ayuta, atthuna amalaponi, atthuna ikereca ya Nluku.
Ciicammo mi kinaavya wiira kaacivelihe othene, wohaavya citthu cawaka paahi, nanso ca atthu enci wiira yoopwe.
Vano nkhale mayokitakiha, toko mi ciryaka mayontakiha Kristu.
Khweli asunnaka, kinawuttottopelani, kontha mwa cothene nnaakuupuwela ni nnaasunka ikettelo ciwiitthucihilyakani.
Vano kimphavela ncuwele wiira Kristu ri muru wa nlopwana, nlopwana ri muru wa nthiyana, ni Nluku ri muru wa Kristu.
Vano, nlopwana novekela atthuna nolalya nhupi wa Nluku nakhuneenle muru awe, nonyoholaca muru awe.
Nthiyana novekela atthuna nolalya nhupi wa Nluku woohiitthuka nleeso mmuru, nonyoholaca muru awe, maana nokhala toko noomettha.
Phimaana, nthiyana aahiitthukeke nleeso, phatari ametthe ikharari nnyo. Nanso wakhalaka wiira noona ihaaya umettha nwo, nolamuliya wiitthuka nleeso.
Maana, nlopwana khanlamuliya ukhuneela muru awe, nlattu wookhala uyo ilatarato ni nttittimiho na Nluku, nanso nthiyana ri nttittimiho na nlopwana.
Kontha nlopwana kakhumile mwa nthiyana; nthiyana phikhumile mwa nlopwana.
Nlopwana khoompiye nlattu wa nthiyana; nthiyana phuumpiye nlattu wa nlopwana.
Phimaana, nthiyana nolamuliya wiitthuka nleeso mmuru nlattu wa ancelo, toko ikanyero yo nlamulo.
Nanso mwa Apwiya, nthiyana khankhala woohi nlopwana, ni nlopwana khankhala woohi nthiyana.
Maana, toko nthiyana wakhumilyawe mwa nlopwana, ciicammo nlopwana nokhuma mwa nthiyana. Ni cothene cinkhuma wa Nluku.
Mooneleke mwasinene, wanaarera nthiyana unvekela Nluku woohiitthuka nleeso?
Vano makhalelo a ntthu anwiitthucihani wiira, nlopwana onnuwihacaka ikharari uri wiinyoholaca,
ni nthiyana onnuwihacaka ikharari, unthoonyera nttittimiho. Maana ikharari nnyo cinttiya nipuro no nleeso.
Nanso, akhalaka wiira haawo novaanyiha, acuwele wiira hi khanirina yeeyo ilemalelo iyo, ni mena ikereca ca Nluku.
Nanso kinoohimeryani wiira akinoottottopelani, maana mmikuttanoni mwinyu mmo nnopanka coonanara, nhiyaka upanka coorera.
Kontha, kihohimeriya wiira uhaawo uhawulana ayaayoru mwathukumanaka nkereca mmo, ni mi mphantte nkinaku kinaakupali.
Mpaka nyu nheekawanihaca ayaayoru, wiira wariyari winyu va acuwannye ale ari eekhweli.
Vano mwathukumanaka, khannothukumanela wiira nlye nkatthe wa Apwiya.
Maana khula ntthu nolya iyolya awe woohaawehererya akhwawe. Ciicammo nkina navoliye itala, nkina naahapaliya.
Maanaya wiira khanrina itthoko yo wiira nlye ni nwurye? Atthuna nnotarawaca ikereca ya Nluku ni waapattihaca ihaaya ale ahirina, nnooniha wiira mi kinawuttottopelani? Mena vakani.
Maana kihaakhela wa Apwiya ile yuuvahilyakani, wiira Apwiya Yesu, uhiyu waavahereriyaya, yahokusa nkatthe;
ni asukurwelaka, yahomyaniha ni wiira: Ila phi irutthu aka ivahereriyenyu; mpankeke ciicale nkuupuwelelaka mi.
Woolikana ciicammo, umaliha waya ulya, yahokusa ikikhompe, yiiraka: Ila phi ikikhompe yo nleehano nonaanano mphomeni mwaka; mpankeke ciicale imaara cothene wanwuryenyu nkuupuwelelaka mi.
Maana ukati wothene unkhurenyu ula nkatthe ula ni unwuryenyu ila ivinyu ila, nnolalya makhwelo a Apwiya, mpaka wanhalaya uwa.
Phimaana ule nokhura nkatthe ni nowurya ivinyu ya Apwiya, woohikhala ratta munnepani, nokosera irutthu ni iphome ya Apwiya.
Vano khula ntthu eewehawehe ni wahoolo akhuureke nkatthe uyo ni awuryeke ivinyu iyo.
Maana ule nokhura ni nowurya woohiiwehaweha, nokhura ni nowurya uhukhumwinya wawe.
Phimaana iriyari inyu iyo ahaawo enci owoocyaca ni oowerennya ni enci ahokhwa.
Nanso neewehawehaka, khaninhala uhukhumwinya.
Nahukhumwinyaka na Apwiya, maanaya wiira anaanimamaca, wiira nihittarusiye wamoca ni ittuninya.
Paahi asunnaka, mwathukumanaka wiira nlye nkatthe wa Apwiya, mmwehereraneke.
Vano ntthu avoliyaka itala, alye uwannyawe, waacera wiira ukati unthukumanenyu ihikhale itthu yo wuuhukhumuni. Vano citthu cikina nnyo, kinaahala wuuhimeryani wanhalaka uwa uwoonananani.
Vano asunnaka, ihaali yoovahiya co munnepani, kimphavela wiira nyu nhitikhinace.
Nhocuwela wiira khalayi waarinyu amalaponi, mwaankusiya wiira mwaalapele anluku oohuulumaca, toko ceerenyu wo weettihiya.
Phimaana ncuwele wiira, khaawo rina Nnepa wa Nluku, phiiraka: Yesu alaphiye! Ciicammo khaawo neera: Yesu ph'Apwiya! Wari hikhanle muNnepani Nttakattifu.
Vano, ivahiya nnyo ciri coohiyana, nanso Nnepa wa Nluku uri mmoca.
Ni miteko nnyo cihohiyana, nanso Apwiya ayo ari amoca.
Mavarelo aya nteko ari oohiyana, nanso Nluku ri mmoca yooyo phinvaha ikuru cothene mwa othene.
Khula ntthu mavarelo awe nteko, novahiya ni Nnepa wa Nluku.
Kontha ni yooyo Nnepa oyo, mmoca novahiya nuulumo na ankhili, nkina novahiya nuulumo noocuwelaca,
nkina novahiya nroromelo, nkina novahiya uvoniha,
nkina novahiya upanka mitikiniho, nkina novahiya ulalya nhupi wa Nluku, nkina novahiya ucuwelela minepa, nkina novahiya wuuluma iluuka cikina ni nkina novahiya utaphulela.
Nanso Nnepa mmoca yooyo, phinvaha ikuru cothene nnya, anvahaka khula ntthu toko cintthunaya.
Toko irutthu ciryaya imoca ni ikhalanaka miphantte cinci, miphantte cothene cikhalaka irutthu imoca, ciicammo Kristu phiryawe.
Maana, mo'rutthu imoca, othene nipattisiye ni Nnepa mmoca: Pooti ukhala nyuta, atthuna nkereku, atthuna ipottha, atthuna ootaphuwa, hi othene nivahiye uwurya muNnepani mmoca.
Maana irutthu kihimwe yo mphantte mmoca, nanso yo miphantte cinci.
Vano nnyaa neeraka: Wahiryaka ntata, akihimwe o mwirutthuni. Toko commo khaninhiya ukhala no mwirutthuni.
Nnyaru neeraka: Wahiryaka niitho, akihimwe o mwirutthuni, toko commo, khaninhiya ukhala no mwirutthuni.
Vano irutthu yothene yaari niitho, wiiwa nwo wahala ukhala vayi? Irutthu yothene yaari nnyaru, wiimurya nwo wahala ukhala vayi?
Nanso Nluku heesa wo khula mphantte wo'rutthu, toko citthunnyawe.
Vano miphantte cothene cinari mphantte mmoca, irutthu iyo yaahala ukhala vayi?
Khweli cihaawo miphantte cinci, nanso irutthu iri imoca.
Vano niitho khaninlamuliya wiirela ntata: Akinoophavela. Hata muru khunlamuliya wiirela inyaa: Akinoophavela.
Woovirikana commo, miphantte co'rutthu cinoonnya toko cookenkennya, cinaaphaveliya venci;
ni cinoonehu toko coohittittimihya mwirutthuni, cennyo phinttittimihehu venci. Ciicammo miphantte cirinehu mwirutthuni cihinoonihaciya, phinwacawacehu venci.
Nanso miphantte co'rutthu cinoonihaciya nnyo, khacimphavela uwacawaciya. Mothene mmo, Nluku hotthenkemaniha irutthu, avahaka nttittimiho ninci ile yahaarina nttittimiho,
waacera wiira ihikawanihaciye irutthu, nanso miphantte nnyo ciwacawacane.
Maana mphantte mmoca wo'rutthu wahuvaka, miphantte cothene cinaahuva, ni mphantte mmoca wo'rutthu wattittimihinyaka, miphantte cothene cinatteeliya.
Vano, nyu nri irutthu ya Kristu, ni khula ntthu wa nyu ri mphantte wo yeeyo irutthu iyo.

Nluku haahela atthu o'kereca ukhala woopacera amitthenka, wonayeeli oolalya nhupi wa Nluku; woneeraru, aalimu; wahoolo, ampanka mitikiniho; wahoolo, ale arina ivahiya yoovoniha; ivahiya yookavihera; ivahiya yootthenkaca, ni ale anooluma iluuka cikina.
Maanaya wiira othene nri amitthenka? Othene nrina ivahiya yoolalya nhupi wa Nluku? Othene nri aalimu? Othene nhaana ivahiya yoopanka mitikiniho?
Othene nhaana ivahiya yoovoniha? Othene nnawuuluma iluuka cikina? Othene nri mayotaphulela iluuka cikina?
Nanso mphavelace ratta ivahiya cuulupale. Vano mi kinawuthoonyerani iphiro yoorera cinene.
Mi pooti wuulumaca iluuka ya atthu ni ya ancelo, nanso kaahikhalaneke nifento, kinkhala toko ilaata inruma, atthuna inttiwi innyakula.

Pooti mi ukhalana ivahiya yoolalya nhupi wa Nluku n'ucuwela isiiri cothene n'ucuwelaca wothene, pooti mi ukhalana nroromelo nothene mpaka woorya uphela myaako, nanso kaahikhalaneke nifento, akihimwe itthu.
Mi pooti waakawela amasikiini mihakhu caka cothene ni pooti uleva irutthu aka wiira ipahiye, nanso kaahikhalaneke nifento, akimphurela itthu.
Nifento niri noovilela, nooloka. Nifento khaninrama, khanineehelelela, khanineecoona.
Nifento khanineetta pufya, khanimpanka cawayaru, khaninviruwa, khaninwusawusa coonanara civinre.
Nifento khanintteeliya yaahikhaleke isariya, nanso nintteeliya yakhalaka ikhweli.
Nifento ninaahuvela cothene, ninaakupali cothene, ninaaweherera cothene, ninaavilela cothene.
Nifento khanimmala. Nanso ulalya unaamala, iluuka cinaamala ni ucuwelaca unaamala.
Maana nincuwela mphantte vakani ni ninlalya mphantte vakani.
Nanso yawaaka iri yoomalela, ile iri yoohimalela inaakhwelakhwela.
Vano mi waaryaka mwana, koolumaca toko mwana, koona citthu nnyo toko mwana, koopuwela toko mwana. Waphiyenryaka ihirimu ya ntthu muulupale, kihohiya citthu ceesaana nnyo.
Maana vano ninoona toko nloolani, woohicuwelela; wahoolo ninhala woona coo ni coo. Vano kinaacuwela vakani; wahoolo kinhala ucuwela toko ciinryaka woocuweliya.
Paahi, vano cihaawo citthu ttharu: nroromelo, nwehereryo ni nifento. Nanso mwa cennya ttharu nnya, nuulupale niri nifento.
Vano ntthare nifento ni mwaavye ratta ratta ivahiya co munnepani, venci venci ulalya.
Maana ule noolumaca ni iluuka cikina, khanoolumela atthu; nomuulumela Nluku, maana khaawo nomwiiwa, kontha noolumaca co'siiri co munnepani.
Ule nolalya nhupi wa Nluku, naacera wiira aalipihere, aapisihe nrima ni aapepece atthu.
Ule nooluma ni iluuka cikina, neelipihera mwanene, nanso ule nolalya nhupi wa Nluku, nolipihera ikereca.

Vano mi waankicivelaka wiira othene muulume iluuka cikina, nanso venci venci ulalya nhupi wa Nluku. Ntthu nolalya nhupi wa Nluku, phiri muulupale wompwaha ule noolumaca iluuka cikina, kaahiki wiira ataphulele, wiira ikereca ilipe.
Asunnaka, mi kawaaka uwoonananani, kiwuulumelakani iluuka cikina, nnohala uphurani kaahuuhimeryekeni cowooniheriya, ucuwelaca, ulalya nhupi wa Nluku atthuna usomiha?
Toko cineeraya ikaruma coohi iroho, toko nnya; ceece atthuna ipiitu, ciiwannyaka ncu naya, caahivirikaneke marumelo aya, inhala ucuwannya cani itthu inhimyaya khula ikaruma?
Ni ciicammo, nipalapatta noopiyaka woohilikanaca, tupani nohala wiitthenkemaniha wiira arwee ukhottoni?
Ciicammo phiryaya ni nyu mwaahuulumaceke iluuka yoocuweliya, inhala wiiwannyaa cani itthu inhimyenyu? Maana wanhala ukhala toko nnooluma wo pure.
Khweli, woohaakanyaca, cihaawo iluuka cinci mwiilaponi, nanso khiiwo hata iluuka imoca yoohihimya itthu.
Vano mi kaahiiweke inhimyaya iluuka iyo, kinhala ukhala nletto awe ookhuma uttayi noolumac'ole, ni ciicammo ule nohala ukhala nletto aka.
Ni nyu ciicammo nnophavela wunnuwa nvahiyani co munnepani, venci venci mwaavye ulipihera ikereca.
Phimaana, ule nooluma iluuka ikina, nolamuliya uvekela wiira oorye utaphulela.
Maana, mi kavekelaka ni iluuka ikina, nnepa aka unaavekela, nanso moopuwelo aka ankhala oohi ifayita.
