Vano kiireke cani? Kinlamuliya uvekela munnepani ni mmoopuweloni mwaka; ciicammo kinlamuliya wiipa munnepani ni mmoopuweloni mwaka.
Vano we wavekelaka munnepani paahi, hineew'oyo nohala wiira cani ameni wamalihaka uvekela nwo? Maana ule kheewile yuulumacilyaa.
Uvekela waa nwo pooti ukhala woorera, nanso nkin'oyo khiiwo inlipihenre.
Vano kinaansukuru Nluku, maana kinawuulumaca iluuka cinci wowuvikanani nyu othene.
Nanso, kinaakupaleela wuulumaca nkereca moolumo mathanu owiiwannyaa, wiira kaasomihe akina ayo, woovirikana wuuluma moolumo ilufu khumi (10.000) oohiiwannyaa.
Asunnaka, nhuupuwele toko asaana. Nkhale asaana ni citthu coonanara, nanso mmoopuweloni, nkhale toko oolupale.
MuNlamuloni nhantikhiya wiira: Mwa atthu o'luuka cikina ni wo malaku a atthu akina, kinaahala woolumana ala atthu ala, nanso hata ciicammo khaanhala ukiiwa, Apwiya phineera.
Maanaya wiira, wuulumaca iluuka cikina uri ikanyero ya atthu oohaamini; kaahimwe a atthu owaamini. Coolaleeriya ca Nluku, khacihimweni ca atthu oohaamini, nnyo ciri ca atthu o waamini.
Vano ikereca yathukumanaka nipuro nimoca, ni othene yuulumacaka iluuka cikina, yakelaka mommo atthu oohicuwela itthu atthuna oohaamini, khaanhala uwiirelani nhovahuwaca?
Nanso, wakhalaka wiira othene nnolalya nhupi wa Nluku ni phukelaka ntthu oohaamini atthuna oohicuwela itthu, uyo nawooryaciya ni naahukhumwinya mwa nnye cineewawe.
Isiiri co munrimani mwawe cinaahala woonnya, ni naahala wooromihela muru awe vathi n'unlapela Nluku n'upanka usaahiti wiira, khweli Nluku ri wariyari winyu.

Asunnaka, vano nipankekeni? Mwathukumanaka, khula ntthu haana icipo, nkina naasomiha, nkina nohimya cowooniheriya ni nkina noolumaca iluuka ikina ni nkina naataphulela. Cothene nnyo cipankiyeke wiira atthu ayo alipiheriye.
Wakhalaka wiira haawo ntthu mmoca, atthuna eeli, atthuna araru anooluma ni iluuka cikina, apankeke khula ntthu weekwaha awe, nanso akhaleke mayotaphulela.
Nanso aahikhaleke mayotaphulela, amaale nkereca mmo, oolumace uyo ni Nluku paahi.
Cakhalaka minapiyu, cuulumace miili atthuna miraru paahi, vano akina ayo asomeleleke.
Wakhala wiira haawo onkomile ni imphwanyaka yowooniheriya, nkin'oyo amaale.
Maana othene pooti ulalya nhupi wa Nluku, mmoca anttharaka nkhwawe, wiira othene yiitthuce ni apisihiye nrima.
Minepa co minapiyu, cineewelela minapiyu,
maana Nluku kahimwena o'poronka, nanso ri eemaani. Toko ciryaya ikereca cothene ca attakattifu,
athiyana ayo amaale nkereca mmo, kontha khaattuniheriye wuulumaca, nanso yiiwelele, toko cinhimyaya Nlamulo.
Nanso yatthunaka wiitthuca itthu, yaakohe asiwannyaya uwani, maana iri itthu yowuuliha muru wuulumaca nthiyana nkereca.
Maanaya wiira nuulumo na Nluku nikhumakhumile wa nyu? Nnoona toko nuuweenleni nyu paahi?
Wakhalaka wiira haawo neecoona ukhala nnapiyu atthuna ntthu o munnepani, akupali inwantikhelakani ila wiira niri nlamulo na Nluku.
Nanso akhalaka ntthu nohala utikhinaca, uyo naahala utikhinaciya.
Phimaana asunnaka, mwaavye ratta ukhalana ivahiya yoolalya nhupi wa Nluku ni nhimwaateelihe ntthu wuulumaca iluuka cikina.
Nanso cothene nnyo, mpanke ni nttittimiho ni wootthenkemannyaa.
Vano asunnaka, kinowupuserani nhupi woorera wuulaleenryakani, yooyo waakhenlenyu ni unoolipiherani;
kontha mwavarecesaka yoola nhupi ula toko culaleenryakani, uyo phinhala uwoopolani, kaahiki wiira waamini winyu nwo ukhale wo pure.
Woopacera, kihoolaleeryani ile yaakhelenlyaka, wiira Kristu khwile nlattu wo'tampi cihu, toko cantikhiyaya,
hovithiya ni honwelela nihuku noneeraru, toko cantikhiyaya.
Ahooninya ni Peturu; ciicammo ahooninya na amitthenka khumi n'eeli.
Wahoolo ahooninya na asunna iminya thanu weekwaha imoca; nhina wo yaayo atthu ayo, akina ahaawo akumi mpaka ilelo, nanso akina ahokhwa.
Ahooninya ciicammo ni Yakopu na amitthenka othene.
Umoona waya yaayo othene ayo, wiimaleloni ni mi Paulu kahomoona Yesu.
Maana mi ki mwankani wa amitthenka othene, mpaka khunkiphwanela wiihaninya mmitthenka, kontha kihoomolanihaca ikereca ya Nluku.

Nanso wo nnema na Nluku, kiri iryaka, ni nnema nikithoonyenryawe, kanihimwe no pure; maana kihovara nteko wo waapwaha amitthenka othene. Akivanre ni ikuru caka, nanso ni ikuru co nnema na Nluku niri mwa mi.
Phimaana, pooti ukhala mi atthuna amitthenka akina ayo, yeela phinlalyehu ni yeeyo phikupanlinyu.
Vano wakhalaka wiira unaalalennya wiira Kristu honwelela mwa atthu ookhwa, nlattuni akhumelelaka akina yiiraka khuuwo wunwelela?
Wakhalaka wiira khuuwo wunwelela wa atthu ookhwa, mweeco Kristu khonwelenle.
Ni wakhalaka wiira Kristu khonwelenle, mweeco ulalya wihu nwo uri wo pure, ni nroromelo nihu nno niri no pure.

Hi nineereliya asaahiti owootha a Nluku, nlattu woolipihera wiira Nluku homunweleliha Kristu, na ayo yiiraka Nluku khamunwelelihile. Commo, wakhalaka wiira atthu ookhwa khaanonwelela, mweeco uyo khamunwelelihile Kristu.
Maana wakhalaka wiira atthu ookhwa khaanonwelela, ciicammo Kristu khonwelenle.
Ni, wakhalaka wiira Kristu khonwelenle, nroromelo ninyu nno niri no pure, ni nanlelo nri ntampini.
Mweeco ale anrupa mwa Kristu ahorimela.
Wakhalaka wiira nwehereryo urinehu mwa Kristu uvelavenle paahi wo yoola ukumi ula, mweeco niri oohaawa, waavikana atthu othene.
Nanso ikhweli iri: Kristu honwelela mwa atthu ookhwa, ni yooyo phiri oopacera wunwelela mwa ale anrupa.
Maana, nookhwa wile mwa nlopwana mmoca, ni ciicammo wunwelela wa atthu ookhwa uwile mwa nlopwana mmoca.
Toko ciryaya mwa Atamu, atthu othene anaakhwa; ciicammo mwa Kristu, atthu othene anaakhala akumi.
Nanso wo khula ntthu nokowunwelela ikwaha awe; Kristu ri oopacera wunwelela; wahoolo ankowunwelela ale ari mwa Kristu, wanhalawe uwa.
Vano phinhalaya uphiya nihuku noomaliha, Yesu wanhalawe waakwanyulaca alamuli o'culu, anakuru ni anamasintta othene n'unvaha umwene uyo Nluku Athumwane.
Maana Kristu nolamuliya ukhala mwene mpaka weesa eenani awe othene vathi inyaa cawe.
Mwiinani nohala wiiheerya ukwanyulaciya, ri nookhwa.
Maana Nluku heesa citthu cothene vathi inyaa cawe Yesu. Vano eeraka citthu cothene phinlamula, khantakanihenre Nluku.
Vano wakhalaka wiira citthu cothene cinamwiiwelela Kristu, vano Kristu yooyo naahala waarumeela athumwane anvahacenre cothene. Commo Nluku naamalihera ulamula cothene mwa atthu othene.
Wakhala wiira khuuwo wunwelela, anhala wiira cani ale apattisiye nlattu wa atthu ookhwa? Wakhalaka wiira atthu ookhwa khaanonwelela, ampattiseriyani mwa yaayo?
Ni hi nlattuni niivahereraka mw'etthu yo woopiha ukati wothene?
Asunnaka, khula nihuku mi kimmoona nookhwa! Kinoolumaca commo kiittottopaka nlattu wawinyu nyu, maana othene niri owaatana ni Yesu Kristu Apwiy'ehu.
Wakhalaka wiira mi kaananne masene wEfesu toko ntthu, kiphurenleni yeeyo? Wakhalaka wiira atthu ookhwa khaanonwelela, nilyeke ni niwuryeke, maana meelo ninaakhwa.
Nhithepiye: Upatthani woonanara unaatankanya ilema coorera.
Nkhale ni makhalelo omaana, toko ciryaya isariya ni nhikufuru, maana ahaawo akina ahinoncuwela Nluku. Kineerela commo wiira uwuuliheni muru.
Vano ntthu mpaka naakoha eeraka: Atthu ookhwa anonwelela cani? Anhala ukhalana irutthuni?
Nlolo! Ipyo inaalaa, impacera ukhwa, phimelakaru.
Ni waalaka, khunaala irutthu inhala uwa, nanso ipyo paahi toko yo tiriku atthuna ipyo ikina.
Nanso Nluku naavaha irutthu toko cintthunawe, ni wo khula ipyo, irutthu imphwanelanaya.
Khunakhala wiira irutthu cothene ciri cimocaru; maana cikina ciri ca atthu, cikina ca asinama, cikina ca asaanuni ni cikina co'hopa.
Maana cihaawo irutthu co wirimu ni irutthu co vathi; imoca iri yo makhalelo o wirimu ni ikina iri yo makhalelo o vathi.
Ncuwa niri ni waarya waya, mweeri uri ni waarya waya ni itthoottwa ciri ni waarya waya. Ciicammo itthoottwa cihaana mananna menci o waarya.
Commo phinhalaya wiira wo wunwelela atthu ookhwa. Inaasikhiya irutthu inkhwa, ni inonwelela irutthu ihinkhwa.
Inaaliya woohi nttittimiho ni inonwelela ni nttittimiho. Wansikhiyaya inkhala yookenkennya, nanso wanonwelelaya inkhala yo'kuru.
Insikhiya irutthu yo woonnya, nanso inonwelela irutthu yo munnepani. Wakhalaka wiira ihaawo irutthu yo woonnya, ciicammo ihaawo irutthu yo munnepani.
Maana ihantikhiya yiiriyaka: Nlopwana oopacera, Atamu, hompiya wiira akhale ntthu nkumi. Nanso, Atamu owiiheerya, ri Nnepa unvaha ukumi.
Oopacera khanakhala o munnepani, nanso o mwirutthuni; wahoolo phuwaka o munnepani.
Nlopwana oopacera aari o wumpiya ni itthaya; nlopwana onayeeli ri o wirimu.
Ale ari o vathi, ari toko ntthu oompiye ni itthaya, ni ale ari o wirimu ari toko ntthu o wirimu.
Toko cilattannehu ni ntthu o vathi, ninlamuliya ciicammo ulattana ni ntthu o wirimu.
Vano asunnaka, kinoohimeryani wiira, kihimwena irutthu ni iphome phinhala waakhela umwene wa Nluku, hata ile inkhwa, khinkhala yoohikhwa.
Paahi, kinawuhimeryani isiiri: Kuhimweni wiira othene ninaahala ukhwa, nanso othene ninaahala upittinkuliya,
wo'kati mmoca, uphila n'uweha, wanhalaya uruma nipalapatta nowiiheerya. Nipalapatta ninaahala uruma, atthu akhwile anaahala wunwelela oohuntta ni hi ninaahala upittinkuliya.
Kontha ila irutthu inontta ila, inlamuliya uwara irutthu ihinontta, ni ila irutthu inkhwa ila, inlamuliya uwara irutthu ihinkhwa.

Ni ila irutthu inontta ila wanhalaya ukhala irutthu ihinontta, ni ila irutthu inkhwa ila wanhalaya ukhala ihinkhwa, mweeco phinhalaya utthariheleliya cowantikhiya cineera: Nookhwa hokwanyulaciya ni hottheminya.
We nookhwa, utthema waa uri vayi? We nookhwa, uri vayi uluma waa nwo?
Uluma wo nookhwa iri itampi ni ikuru co'tampi niri Nlamulo.
Ninaansukuru Nluku nonivaha utthema mwa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Phimaana, asunnaka oofentiya, nkhale oolipa ni oohittinka. Mwiikuruvalele mmitekoni mwa Apwiya, ncuwelaka wiira nteko enyu mwa Apwiya khunakhala wo pure.
Vano ihaali yo ncanko wa atthu attakattifu, ni nyu mpankeke toko ciinryaka woolamula ikereca co'Kalata.
Nihuku noopacera no'sumana, khula ntthu wa nyu atotokanihe ncanko uwannyawe, toko cirinawe, waacera wiira uhitotokanihinye kinari wonwo.
Vano kawaaka, kinaahala waaruma ni iwarakha ale anhalenyu waakupalela, wiira arwaane ncanko oyo uYerusalemu.
Wakhalaka wiira ni mi kinaarwa, ninhala urwaaca wamoca.
Kinaahala wuuphwanyani woovira kirwaaka uMasetoniya, maana kinlamuliya urwaa wonwo.
Pooti mi uwa ukhala ukati mwinci ni nyu, atthuna uviriha iyiita kinari ni nyu, wiira nkikavihere ikwaha inhalaka upanka.
Kontha mi akintthuna uwoonani paahi woovira, kimphavela ukhala ni nyu ukati vakani, Apwiya yakitthuniheraka.
Nanso kinaahala ukhala wEfesu mpaka Pentekoste.
Kontha uhohulyaa nkhora wookivaha ihathuwa yoovara nteko wa Apwiya, ni ahaawo eenani enci.
Timotiyu awaaka, mpanke mananna owiira uyo hikhale owoova wariyari winyu, maana novara nteko wa Apwiya, toko cinvaraka mi.
Hikhale nohala unvyaavyeha. Nanso munkavihere ni nnema wiira aakoonanane, maana kinaammwehererya wamoca na asunna.
Vano ihaali ya munnaka Apolu, kihonleehera wiira aawoonananeni asunna othene, nanso uyo khatthunne urwaa nananoru, nohala urwaa wanhalawe uphwanya ihathuwa.
Nrontte, nkhale oohittinka munroromeloni, mwiisempihe ni mwiilipihe.
Cothene cinvarenyu, nvare ni nifento.
Vano asunnaka, nhocuwela wiira ntthoko na Estefana phiri noopacera waamini ilapo yo wAkaya ni aheevaherera mmitekoni cittakattifu, kinawulepelani
wiira mwiivaherere wa yaayo, toko ciicammo ale ari arumeyi ni akaviheri.
Kihotteeliya uwa wa Estefana, Fortunatu ni Akayiku, kontha ayo ahokwanihera citthu caakihaleela.
Maana ayo ahowaana itthu inririiha nnepa aka ni nnepa enyu. Weekhweli atthu toko ala, mwaattittimihe.
Ikereca co wAsiya cinawusalamihani. Akila ni Prisila, ni ciicammo ikereca iri wapuwani waya, anawusalamihani mwa ncina na Apwiya.
Asunna othene anawusalamihani. Nsalamihane ntthu ni nkhwawe ni nifento nittakattifu.
Nnya isalamu nnya, mi Paulu kinantikha ni ntata naka.
Wakhalaka wiira haawo hinaafenta Apwiya, alaphiye. Maranatha! Maanaya Mmwe Apwiy'ehu!
Nnema na Apwiya Yesu nikhale ni nyu.
Nifento naka nikhale ni nyu othene mwa Yesu Kristu.
Mi Paulu, mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu nlattu wootthuna Nluku, ni munnaka Timotiyu, kinaantikhela ikereca ya Nluku iri uKorintu, wamoca na attakattifu othene o wAkaya:
Nnema ni isalama, cinkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni a Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, cikhale ni nyu.
Attottopeliye Nluku ni Athumwanaya Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, Apaapa o'kiriri ni Nluku o nipepeco nothene,
nonipepeca mmasakhani mwihu mothene, wiira, ni nipepeco naakhenlehu wa Nluku, ciicammo naapepece ale ankhuna masakha.
Maana toko cincivilyaya mahuviho a Kristu mwa hi, ciicammo mwa Kristu, ninawinciva nipepeco.
Nanso hi nahuvihiyaka, uri wo wiira nyu mpepeciye ni moopoliye. Hi napepeciyaka, uri wo wiira ni nyu mpepeciye ni nenno nipepeco nno nimmwaana upisa nrima, wiira nvilele mahuviho ankhunehu ayo.
Commo, nwehereryo urinehu wa nyu uri woolipa, maana ninaacuwela wiira, wo yaayo mananna ampankenyu mphantte mmahuvihoni mwihu, ciicammo nnaapanka mphantte mumpepeconi mwihu.
Asunnaka, khanintthuna wiira ntikhinace masakha akhunnehu wAsiya. Yaayo masakha ayo yaari moolupale wahinooryehu uvilela, ni khanaarina nwehereryo wowiira ninaakhala akumi.
Khweli nahoona wiira niholakeliya wiiviya, wiira hi nihiikhuluvele naasinene, nanso ninkhuluvele Nluku, nonweleliha atthu ookhwa.
Uyo honaakihera ni naapwaherera unaakihera mwa cowoopiha co nookhwa. Khweli hi nihaana nanlelo nwehereryo mwa yooyo, nikupaleelaka wiira uyo naapwaherera unaakihera,
nyu nnikaviheraka ni mavekelo enyu. Commo enci anaahala usukuru nlattu wo hi, wanooneliyehu ikiriri nlattu wo waakhuliya mavekelo a atthu enci.

Uno phi wiittottopa wihu, kontha ankhili ihu anaavaha usaahiti, mananna ankhalehu mwiilaponi, venci venci wiiwanana urinehu ni nyu, unhooleliya n'uttakattifu ni ikhweli cinkhuma wa Nluku, woohikhala nlattu wa ankhili wa ntthu nanso toko ciryaya nnema na Nluku.
Maana khiiwo iwantikhenlehuni inhalenyu uhoorya usoma n'uhiiweeha. Kinaakupali wiira,
toko cinrenyu wooniiweeha mphantte nkina, nnaahala wiiweeha wiira, pooti wiittottopa nlattu wo hi, toko hi cinhalehu wiittottopa nlattu wo nyu nihuku na Apwiya Yesu.
Ni yoola nkhuluvelo ula, kiholakela uwa uwoonananani toko nyu, wiira nrerihiye imaara yonayeeli.
Kahotthuna wiira kiwootoleni woorwa uMasetoniya, ni wooturuwa wonwo, wiira nkikavihere ikwaha aka yorwaa uYuteya.
Vano walakenlyaka commo, maanaya wiira akuupuwenle sana? Atthuna kakhalanaka mawooni, kimpanka toko o nttuniyani, mpaka ukhalana moolumo meeli aneeriya aye, aye, ni mena, mena?
Nanso, toko Nluku ciryawe ookhuluvelyaa, nhupi unoovahehuni khunakhala wowiira: aye ni mena.
Maana Yesu Kristu, Mwana a Nluku, laleeriyenyu ni mi, Sila ni Timotiyu, khawaari wo aye ni mena, nanso mwa yooyo waari aye.
Maana, mikhuluveliho cothene cipankilyawe Nluku, enci ari mwa Kristu aneera khweli. Phimaana mwa yooyo, noromoliya Ameni wiira Nluku attittimihiye.
Khweli Nluku phintthuna wiira hi ni nyu nikhale oolipa mwa Kristu. Uyo honitthapela
n'unitthitta toko awawe n'unihela Nnepa awe munrimani mwihu toko nkhuluveliho.
Nluku phi saahiti aka, maana uyo naacuwela nrima aka. Kiholakela uhituruwela uKorintu kaaceraka wuunemecerani.
Kuhimweni wiira nimphavela ulamula nroromelo ninyu, nanso nimphavela uvaraca nteko wamoca, wiira ntteeliye, maana nroromelo phinoolipihani.
Maana mi kuupuwenle veekha wiira kihihokoleele wuucukulihani.
Vano mi koocukulihakani, nohala ukitteeliha nrima tipani, mari nhikhanle nyu kuucukulihilyakani va?
Kiwantikhenleni wiira, kawaaka kihikhale oocukulaca na ale yaalamuliya ukitteeliha nrima. Maana kinaakhuluvela wiira utteeliya waka nrima nwo uri wawinyu.
Mi kihaantikha ni mahuviho menci ni icuku co munrimani, ni miithori, woohikhala wiira ni nyu ncukulace, nanso wiira ncuwele mananna cineeraka wo wufentani.
Vano, wakhalaka wiira haawo ntthu kicukulihile, khakicukulihile mi paahi, nanso ni nyu othene hoocukulihani.
Ahukhumwinyaru na atthu othene wanaatosa.
Nanso, phatari unlevelela n'umpepeca, wiira hivololace acukulacaka cinene.
Vano kinawuvekelani wiira yooyo mmoonihere nifento ninyu.
Phimaana kiwantikhelakani, wiira kuulawiheni ni kicuwele ari nnari owiiwelela mwa cothene.
Vano, ule nonlevelelenyu, ni mi kinaanlevelela. Yakhalaka itthu yonlevelela, ari kinatokile ulevelela, kiholevelela nlattu wa nyu wamiithoni wa Kristu,
wiira Sotwani hikhalane ifayita mwa hi, maana khanintikhina moopuwelo awe.
Vano waaphilyaka uTrowate wiira kilalyee nhupi woorera wa Kristu, Apwiya yahokihulela nkhora,
nanso, nrima aka khawaataphuwile, nlattu woohimphwanya munnaka Titu; phimaana, kaholeeha ni kahorwaa uMasetoniya.
Kinaansukuru Nluku mwa Kristu, nonihoolela n'utthema, ni nlattu wa hi, nawoonnya mapuro othene unukhela woocuweliya Kristu.
Maana hi, mwa Nluku, niri nhiriri woorera wa Kristu, wa ale anoopwa na ale anrimela.
Wa ale ari oorimela, uri nhiriri woonukha nookhwa; wa ale ari o woopwa, uri nhiriri woonukhela ukumi. Tipani nokwanihera nnya citthu nnya?
Maana hi khanihimwe toko atthu akina ampanka marontta nuulumo na Nluku, nanso hi ninonlalya Kristu wamiithoni wa Nluku, niri ookhuluvelyaa, toko arumeyi a Nluku.
Vano maanaya wiira nipacereke wiittottopa tho naasinene? Atthuna ninaaphavela iwarakha co wuhimyacani nyu atthuna cookhuma mwa nyu, toko cimpankaya akina ayo?
Nyu nri iwarakha ehu, yantikhiye munrimani mwihu, yoocuweliya ni yoosominya na atthu othene.

Nnothoonyera toko iwarakha ya Kristu, iphattuwacile muntekoni wihu, yaantikhiye, woohikhala ni itinta nanso ni Nnepa wa Nluku nkumi; woohikhala wanipawuni no maluku, nanso wanipawuni no munrimani wa atthu.
Uyo phiri nkhuluvelo urinehu ni Nluku, mwa Yesu Kristu.
Khanineera wiira nimpankela commo nlattu wo woorya wihu, nanso woorya wihu nwo unkhuma wa Nluku.
Uyo phinnikhaliha arumeyi o nleehano nonaanano, woohikhala yowantikhiya, nanso wo muNnepani; maana yowantikhiya inawiiva, nanso Nnepa unaakhaliha ukumi.
Nteko unwiihile nookhwa, utthittiye wamalukuni, uhokhala wo waarya, mpaka asaana o'Sirayeli wahinooryaya unwehanana Musa, nlattu wo waarya wo'khove awe, hata yaanowaaryaru ukati vakani.
Vano unhala uhitepa cani waarya nteko wo muNnepani?
Wakhalaka wiira nteko wo'hukhumu waari wo waarya, vano nteko wo'sariya utepa n'upwaha.
Maanaya, itthu yaari khalayi yo waarya, vano khinaarya toko yonaanano, itepile waarya.
Maana wakhalaka wiira ile ikhwelakhwenle yahaana waarya waya, utepa n'upwaha yonaanano ihimmalamala.
Vano, ukhala wiira nihaana nwehereryo, ninawuulumaca ni wiilipiha.
Ni khaninakhala toko Musa, eettiyelela ni ikuwo wiitho wawe, wiira asaana o'Sirayeli ahoone waarya waahala ukhwelakhwela.
Nanso ankhili aya ahottiyeleliya. Kontha, mpaka nihuku no'lelo, yasomaka nleehano nokhalayi, ikuwo iyo nanlelo inawaattiyelela, woohithoonyeriya wiira Kristu phintamiha ikuwo iyo.
Nanso mpaka ilelo, casominyaka ca Musa, ikuwo iyo inawaattiyelela munrimani mwaya mmo.
Vano mmoca mwa ayo arukunusaka nrima eevahereraka wa Apwiya, ikuwo iyo inaatamihinya.
Maana Apwiya ari Nnepa, ni nipuro niryaya Nnepa wa Apwiya, uhaawo utaphuwa.
Ni hi othene, ni ikhove yoopattakuliya, niweheehaka toko iloola waarya wa Apwiya, ninaapittinkuliya, waarya ni waarya, nlataratoni mwaya, toko Apwiya, ari Nnepa.
Ukhala wiira hi nihaana ula nteko woolalya Nhupi ula, toko cooneliyehu ikiriri, khaninvololaca.

Nanso ninaakhotta citthu co'siiri ni co wuuliha muru, ni khanineetta pufya, khaninootootha ni khanincipulaca nuulumo na Nluku. Uhiya commo, mananna oolalya ikhweli wakwalya, wamiithoni wa Nluku phinaakupaliha atthu ayo ikhweli ihu.
Nanso Nhupi ihu wakhalaka woovithya uri wa ale anrimela.
Vano anluku o'kati ula ahaattiyelela ankhili a atthu oohaamini, wiira ahoone waarya wo nhupi woorera wo nttittimiho na Kristu, yooyo ri ilatarato ya Nluku.
Maana hi khanineelalya, nanso ninlalya wiira Yesu Kristu phiri Pwiya, ni wiira hi n'arumeyi enyu, wo nifento na Yesu.
Kontha yooyo Nluku eenre: Mpiphini ukhale waarya, phi yooyo nomwaleela mirima cihu, wiira noone nttittimiho na Nluku, niri mwa Kristu.
Nanso nihaana ula nhakhu ula mmyaapuni cooloko, wiira waarya wo'kuru caya ukhale wa Nluku, woohikhala wawihu.
Mothene mmo ninaahuvihiya, nanso khanincukulihiya; ninaasankihiya, nanso nwehereryo khunnirimeela;
ninawoomolanihaciya, nanso khanimmwalanihinya; ninaarakalihiya, nanso khaninkwanyuliya.
Ukati wothene ninkusa mwirutthuni mwihu ukhwa wa Yesu, wiira ukumi awe ukhale ni hi.
Kontha, hi niri akumi va, ukati wothene nineeciheriya nookhwa nlattu wa Yesu Kristu, wiira ukumi awe woonnye mwirutthuni mwihu.
Vano wa hi noonnya nookhwa, nanso, mwa nyu, unoonnya ukumi.
Nikhalanakene yooyo nnepa wo nroromelo uyo, toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Mi kihokupali, phimaana kuulumacaka. Ciicammo ni hi nihokupali; phimaana nuulumacaka.
Ninaacuwela wiira Nluku onwelelihile Apwiya Yesu, ciicammo naahala ununweleliha wamoca ni Yesu, n'uneesa uhoolo wawe wamoca ni nyu.
Kontha citthu cothene ciiraneenle nlattu woofentiya nyu, wiira nnema na Nluku naaphwanye atthu enci, ni yaayo apanke mavekelo oosukuru ni oonttittimiha Nluku.
Phimaana khaninvolola, pooti irutthu ihu utankanyaa, nanso nnepa ehu unawiicinka khula nihuku.
Maana mahuviho ehu oovenwa ni o'kati vakani, anwiiha waarya woohimala ni woohilikanihera itthu.
Hi khanintthara citthu cinoonnya, nanso nintthara citthu cihinoonnya, kontha nnye cinoonnya ciri co'kati vakani, nanso nnye cihinoonnya ciri co'kati wothene.
Vano hi nihocuwela wiira, irutthu irinehu vathi va yakwanyulaciyaka, wa Nluku nihaana irutthu ikina, irutthu yoohumpiya ni matata a atthu, nanso irutthu yoohimala yo wirimu ihinkwanyuwaca tho.
Toko commo, ninawiipulela, niphavelaka uvahiya yeeyo irutthu yo wirimu iyo,
maana nawaraka, khaninhala uphwanyinya pwitipwiti.
Khweli, hi nirina ila irutthu ila, ninawiipulela n'ucukula, khanimphavela wiira niruliye, nanso nimphavela wiira niwarihiye, waacera wiira irutthu inkhwa ittheminye n'ukumi.
Maana Nluku mwanene phinitthenkemanihile nlattu wo yeeyo, ni honivaha Nnepa, toko nkhuluveliho woowehererya ile inwa.
Phimaana nihaana nkhuluvelo, ni ninaacuwela wiira, ninari ninlelo mwirutthuni, niri uttayi na Apwiya.
Maana nineetta ni nroromelo, woohikhala wo citthu cinoonehu.
Nanso nihaana nkhuluvelo; phatari uhiya irutthu cihu wiira nirwee nakhale na Apwiya.
Phimaana ninlamuliya unciveliha, niikurumicaka, pooti ninari mwirutthuni atthuna nihiri mwirutthuni.
Maana hi othene ninaahala weemela wamiithoni wa Nluku wiira nihukhumwinye, wiira khula ntthu aakhele toko ciinryawe woovara nteko mwirutthuni mwawe, pooti ukhala coorera atthuna coonanara.
Vano ukhala wiira nihocuwela umoova Nluku, nimphavela waacuweliha atthu akina. Nluku honicuwela, phimaana nimphavela wiira ni nyu nnicuwele.

Hi khanimphavela wiira niihimyace tho wa nyu, nanso ninoovahani ukati wo wiittottopa nlattu wawihu hi, wiira nkhalane yowaakhula ale aneettottopa nlattu w'etthu iryaya, woohikhala wiittottopa w'etthu iri munrimani mwaya.
Maana, nakhalaka toko oovahuwa, nimpanka nlattu woonfenta Nluku, ni neesaka ankhili ihu wanipuroni, iyo iri nlattu wowuufentani nyu.
Maana nifento na Kristu nihonooryaca, kontha nihocuwela wiira mmoca aakhwenle othene, ni othene ahokhwa.
Yesu aakhwenle atthu othene, wiira ale ari akumi, ahikhale tho akumi mwa yaayo, nanso akhale akumi mwa ule khwile onwelelaka.
Vano, ukhuma nna va mpaka uhoolo, khaninoncuwela tho ntthu toko ciryawe mwirutthuni. Wakhala wiira khalayi naancuwela Kristu toko ciryawe mwirutthuni, vano khaninoncuwela tho toko commo.
Phimaana, ntthu akhalaka mwa Kristu, ri ikhiyumpe yonaanano. Citthu co khalayi nnyo cihovira; vano cothene ciri conaanano.
Cothene nnyo cinkhuma mwa Nluku mwanene naataanihile ni yooyo mwa Yesu Kristu, anivahaka Nhupi wo waataniha,
maanaya wiira, Nluku ri mwa Kristu eecaatanihaka ni ittuniya, woohuupuweleliya tho itampi ca atthu, ni honivaherera Nhupi wo waataniha.
Phimaana hi niri amwaakhula a Kristu, maana Nluku phinlalyaa mwa hi. Mwa nifento na Yesu Kristu, ninawulepelani wiira mwaatane ni Nluku.
Kristu hicuwenle itampi, Nluku hompanka ukhala itampi nlattu wo hi; wiira mwa yooyo, nikhale isariya ya Nluku.
Vano, ukhala wiira ninvara nteko wamoca ni Nluku, ciicammo ninawulipiherani wiira nhaakhele wo pure nnema na Nluku.

Maana uyo neera coo: Mi kihowiiwa waphilyaya ukati woothoonyera iraati aka, ni kihowaakuvela waphilyaya nihuku no woopwa. Vano ula ukati ula uri woothoonyera iraati ya Nluku, ni nna nihuku nna niri no woopwa.
Khiiwo ipankilehu yoonhapusa ntthu mwiikhwelini, wiira nteko ehu uhihanyurihiye.
Uhiya commo, nihopanka cothene nithoonyeraka wiira hi n'arumeyi a Nluku n'ukhanyerera, n'ucukula, n'uthanyiya n'uhuvihiya.
Hi n'arumeyi a Nluku ni waafyulaciya, n'utthukeliya nkalaposo, n'ucocopolaciya, n'uvara miteko cookhulumula, n'uhirupa n'utthuka.
Hi n'arumeyi a Nluku ni makhalelo eettakattifu, n'ucuwelaca, n'uvilela, n'uloka, ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, ni nifento noohipanttureriya.
Hi n'arumeyi a Nluku ni nuulumo neekhweli, ni ikuru ca Nluku, ni ikaruma co'sariya, pooti ukhala co waakiha atthuna co waanana;
n'uttottopeliya atthuna uhanyurihiya, n'utthapeleliya atthuna utarawaciya, toko mayothepya nanso eekhweli;
toko oohicuweliya nanso oocuweleehiya; toko oohala vakani ukhwa, nanso akumi; toko oottarusiya, nanso oohiiviya;
toko oocukulihiya, nanso ukati wothene ootteeliya; toko oothwennya, nanso naathacirihaka enci; toko oohikhalana itthu, nanso ookhalana citthu cothene.
Vano ninoohimeryani nyu akorintu, woohuuvithani wiira, nihotthukula nrima ehu wothene.
Hi khaninwiinananani, nanso phi nyu nnoniinanana.
Mi kinwuulumelani toko asaana aka. Vano mpanke toko hi cupankilehuni. Ciicammo nnitthukulele mirima cinyu.
Nhaatakaneelane atthu oohaamini mmitekoni mwinyu mmo. Isariya n'uhisariya cinaweetta wamoca? Ipiphi ni waarya cinawaatanaca?
Uhaawo wiiwanana Kristu ni Sotwani? Uhaawo upatthani, mwaamini ni nkaafiri?

Nihaawo nleehano, ikhipula ya Nluku ni ikwiitti? Maana hi niri ikhipula ya Nluku nkumi, toko mwanene ciinryawe: Kinaweettana ni waakhalana ayo; kinhala ukhala Nluku aya ni ayo anhala ukhala unethi aka.
Phimaana, Apwiya aneera: Nthame wariyari waya va, mwiihawulanihe, nhikwanye citthu coohiloka, ni mi kinaahala uwaakhelelani,
ni: Kinhala ukhala athumwaninyu ni nyu nnohala ukhala asaanaka, aneera pha Apwiya owoorya cothene.
Vano asunnaka oofentiya, toko cikhuluvelihiyehu, niirapihe mahirihiri othene, o mwirutthuni ni o munnepani, nunnuwihaka uttakattifu ihu n'umoova Nluku.
Nnihele munrimani mwinyu mmo; khaawo nintthekenlehu, khaawo nimpankilehu yoohiloka ni khaawo ninlyaacenrehu.
Akinoolumacera commo wiira kuuhukhumuni, maana kihoohimeryani wiira nyu nri munrimani mwihu, wiira hi nikhwe nkhaye atthuna nikhale akumi.
Kinawukhuluvelani venci ni ciicammo kinawiittottopa nlattu wa nyu. Kontha kiri oopisihiya nrima; kihookhalaru mmahuvihoni; kiri ootteeliya venci.
Vaavale uphiya wihu uMasetoniya, khanaamumunle; maana, yahoniphwanya mahuviho, ikhotto na atthu akina ni woova munrimani mwihu.
Nanso, Nluku ri mpepeci a atthu oohuva, honipepeca nlattu woophiya Titu;
kuhimwena paahi nlattu woophiya wawe, nanso nlattu wo mpepeco ninvahilenyu. Uyo honittonkela isalamu cinyu, n'ucukula winyu. Ukiwacawaca winyu nwo uhoncerera utteeliya waka.
Kihoocukulihani wupaceroni nlattu wo'warakha yantikhilyaka, nanso akineera keerelani, maana kinoona wiira ile iwarakha ile yahoocukulihani ukati vakani.
Vano kinaatteeliya, woohikhala wiira nlattu woocukulihiya winyu, kontha ucukula winyu nwo uhoorukunusani nrima. Maana nhocukulaca toko Nluku cintthunawe, ni khamphwanyile ihasara nlattu wo hi.
Maana, ucukulaca wotthuna Nluku, unaanrukunusa nrima ntthu wiira oopwee; khummwiiha irikariko. Nanso ucukula wo'ttuninya unaammwiiha nookhwa.

Nyu nhovilela masukuli, toko cinoncivelaya Nluku. Vano mooneke cirottovonlenyu ciri wiikurumica, wiicaakiha, urusanana coonanara, ihisima, unukhelana ni wiivaherera unttarusa kosile. Mwa cothene nnyo nheethoonyihera wiira khannamakosa.
Phimaana, hata kaahowantikharu iwarakha ile, mi akaantikhile nlattu wa ule kosile ni hata wa ntthu koseriye. Kaantikhenle wiira kuuhimereni wiira Nluku naacuwela unirattavelela urinenyu.
Paahi, yeeyo phinikurunusile nrima. Ni woovikana ula mpepeco ula, nihotteeliya venci nlattu wa Titu untteelihilenyu nrima ukati waaryawe ni nyu.

Mi kahonhimerya wiira kaheettottopa nlattu wa nyu, ni nyu khankicukulihile. Ciicammo toko caaryaya ceekhweli citthu cihimilehu, wiittottopa urinehu mwa nyu wamiithoni wa Titu, waheethoonyera ukhala weekhweli.
Ni nifento nawe nno mwa nyu ninawunnuwa ukati wothene oopuwelaka mananna caamwiiwelelenyu ni mananna cinrenyu woomwaakhelela ni ihisima.
Kihotteeliya venci nlattu wo wuukhuluvelani.
Vano asunnaka, ninawuucuwelihani nnema na Nluku nivahiyaya ikereca yo'Masetoniya.
Yaahokhalaru mmahuvihoni, utteeliya waya waari winci, yaahokhalaru n'umasikiini, yahovaha venci ni nrima raati.
Kontha, mi ki saahiti o yaayo, wiira ayo, n'utthuna waya, ahovaha cothene coonryaya mpaka upwahiha.
Ayo yahonilepela n'unikhanyereriha wiira nipanke nnema no waakavihera atthu attakattifu.
Ni yahopanka woopwaha, woohikhala toko caawehereryehu. Woopacera, yaheevaherera wa Apwiya, wahoolo, nlattu wotthuna wa Nluku, yaheevaherera wa hi.
Vano nihonlepela Titu wiira, amalihere nteko upacenryawe ni hihiyerere upanka nenno nifento nno wariyari winyu.
Nyu nhothoonyera wiira nri mwa cothene, athaciri: munroromeloni, nnuulumoni, muucuwelani, wiikurumica ni nnifentoni nirinehu wa nyu. Vano mwiivaherere mmitekoni coocanka.
Kuhimwena wiira kinawulamulani, nanso kimphavela wooneeha ikhweli yo nifento ninyu, kilikaniheraka wiivaherera wa atthu akina ayo.
Maana nhocuwela nnema na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu wiira, nookhalaru thaciri, heepanka oothwennya nlattu wowuufentani nyu, wiira nlattu woothwennya wawe, nkhale athaciri.
Toko commo, mi kinaavaha mawooni aka kiiraka, nnolamuliya upanka ncanko, maana ukhuma mweecana phi nyu mwaari oopacera ucanka, woohikhala ucankaru, nanso mwahothoonyera iraati yookavihera.
Vano mmalihere nteko upacenrenyu, mpanke ciicammo wo'raati yaarinenyu wupaceroni, nvahaka toko cirinenyu.
Maana ntthu akhalaka tayari uvaha, ncanko awe unaakupaliya w'ele irinawe ni woohikhala ihirinawe.
Kontha utthuna wihu kuhimwena wiira akina yookokwe ni nyu nkhale oolemeliya, nanso nlikaaneke.
Ula ukati ula, uruwerya winyu nwo unaahala waakavihera ahirina, waacera wiira na ayo yaruweryaka yawuukavihereni nyu, commo phinhalenyu ulikana,
toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Ule aattottenle venci khaarina yinci; n'ule aattottenle vakani, khayaanhaleenle itthu.
Vano kinaansukuru Nluku kontha uyo hohela wanrimani wa Titu, wonwo wuukaviherani nwo toko cirinehu hi.
Titu hotthuna inlepenlehu, ni holakela uwa wonwo woohipica wiira aawoonananeni.
Wamoca ni yooyo, ninawuuveleeliherani munnihu oottittimihinya venci mmakereca mothene nlattu wo nteko woolalya nhupi woorera.

Wanookhalaru commo, uyo munna uyo hothanliya ni ikereca cothene, wiira nimweettane, anikaviheraka mmitekoni mwihu co nifento nimpankehu wo nttittimiho na Apwiya, n'uthoonyera wiira, khweli nimphavela ukavihera.
Ninawiikasoopa wiira hikhale nohala uniphuculaca nlattu wo mananna cineerehu wookawa coovaha nnyo.
Utthuna wihu uri woopanka ile inaacivela Apwiya na atthu othene yoonaka ukhala yomaana.
Ciicammo ninaanveleeliha ni yaayo, munnihu nkina tho. Imaara cinci nihonlawiha ni nihomoona wiira ri tayari wuukaviherani. Vano uyo hokupali venci wuukaviherani nwo, kontha nawuukhuluvelani.
Vano ihaali ya Titu, kinoohimeryani wiira uyo ri mpatthani aka o wantekoni nhina mo wuukaviherani. Vano ihaali ya asunna akina ayo, ari ahooleli o mmakereca ni ammwiiha nttittimiho na Kristu.
Phimaana, wo wiira ikereca cikina nnyo cicuwele, mwaathoonyereke nifento nirinenyu, ni wiittottopa urinehu nlattu wa nyu.
Vano ihaali yo waakavihera asunnihu o'Yuteya, mi khakinlamuliya uwantikhelani.

Kinaacuwela wiira nnophavela waakavihera, phimaana kinawiittottopa wamiithoni wa amasetoniya, kiiraka, asunna o wAkaya aheetthenkemaniha ukhuma mweecana, ni wiikurumica winyu nwo unawaalipiha nkoso atthu enci.
Mothene mmo, kihaaveleelihaca asunna waacera wiira wiittottopa urinehu wa nyu wo yoola mwaha ula, uhikhale wo pure, nanso nyu nkhale owiitthenkaca toko caawiirenlyakani.
Wakhala wiira ahaawo amasetoniya anwaa ni mi, yuuphwanyeni nneetthenkemanihile, waacera wiira hi ni nyu nihuulihaciye muru maana nihookhuluvelani.
Phimaana kihoonela ukhala itthu yomaana waahimerya asunna ayo wiira awootoleni ni amalihe utthenkemaniha coovaha caakhuluvelihilenyu. Commo nvahe wo nrima raati, woohi isooyo.
Vano kinwiirelani wiira ule naala vakani, ciicammo nohala uhepha vakani, ni ule naala venci, nohala uhepha venci.
Khula ntthu acanke toko cupuwenlyawe munrimani mwawe, woohicukulaca ni woohikhanyererihiya, maana Nluku noncivela ule novaha wotteeliya.
Nluku okuru, naawuuncererani nnema nawe, wiira mwa citthu cothene, ukati wothene nkhalane cothene cimphavelenyu, ni cucareni mmitekoni mothene.
Toko cowantikhiya cineera: Hokawa, haavaha mihakhu cawe oothwennya; isariya awe iyo khimmala.
Ule nonvaha ipyo ntthu naala, ni nonvaha nkatthe ntthu nolya, ciicammo naahala wuncerera waala winyu ni mihokorokho co'sariya cinyu.
Nluku naahala wuuthacirihani venci wo citthu cothene; iyo inhala upankeliya waacera atthu enci ansukuru Nluku nlattu wo nyu.
Kontha nteko unvarenyu, kuhimwe wiira nnaakavihera paahi asunna attakattifu, nanso ciicammo nnaavaha ikuru cooswali ansukuruku venci Nluku.

Ayo anaahala unttottopela Nluku, maana nteko unvarenyu ula, unawaathoonyera mananna civaherenrenyu muulaphululani nhupi woorera wa Kristu, yooyo ukupanlinyu ni unttharenyu. Asunna anaahala unttottopela Nluku, nlattu wo cennyo cinaavahenyu atthu ayo ni nrima raati, ni ciicammo atthu akina ayo.
Ayo anaahala wuuswalelani wa Nluku, ni anhala ukhala owuufentani nlattu wo nnema nuulupale nuuvahilyawe Nluku.
Ninaansukuru Nluku nlattu woovahiya yootikiniha!
Mi Paulu, kinawulepelani ni imaani n'uloka wa Kristu, yeemi nokiirelenyu kakhalaka ni nyu, kinawiiyeviha, nanso kaahikhaleke ni nyu kiri oolipa nrima.
Kinoolepelani wiira kakhalaka ni nyu, nhikikhanyererihe ukhala oosilili, toko cinoopuwelaka waapanka ale anoopuwela wiira hi nintthara mananna cineeraya atthu o nttuniyani.
Hata nihookhalaru apinatamu, khaninaana ikhotto toko apinatamu.
Ikaruma co'khotto cintthumirihu nnyo khacihimwena co mwirutthuni, nanso ciri co'kuru ca Nluku wiira cikwanyulace inupa coolipa.
Ninaakwanyulaca ikano coonanara ni citthu cothene cinkhumelela ciphavelaka uhapusa ucuwelaca wa Nluku, ni ninaatthukela moopuwelo othene wiira amwiiwelele Kristu.
Vano nyu mwakhalaka owiiwelela, hi ninaahala ukhalana ihathuwa yo waattarusa atthu oohiiwelela.
Vano nyu nnoweha paahi citthu cinoonnya. Wakhalaka wiira ntthu hokupali ukhala ni Kristu, nolamuliya wiicoonela mwanene wiira, toko caaryawe uyo, ni hi niri ni Kristu.
Hata mi kiittottopaka nlattu wo'lamuli univahilyaya Apwiya, khunkuuliha muru, maana ula ulamuli ula uri wooteka ni woohikhala wo waakwanyula atthu.
Akimphavela wiira moonihe toko kinawopopihani ni iwarakha caka nnyo.
Maana akina aneera: Iwarakha cawe nnyo ciri coorika, nanso akhalaka mwanene uyo, nokhala owoolwaa, ni moolumo awe ayo ari ovyaavyaaca.
Ayo atthu ayo acuwele wiira khiiwo itthu ivirikanne yantikhilehu ninari uttayi, ni impankehu ninari wamoca ni nyu.
Khanimphavela wiira nikhale toko akina aneeciirela ph'atthu eekhweli. Maana yeephimaka ni yiilikaniheraka, anvara citthu nnyo woohaankhili.
Hi khanineettottopa woopwaha nlipa, nanso wiittottopa wihu nwo ninvelaveliha munlipani na Nluku ninikhuluvenlyawe, nenno nuuphwanyileni nyu ciicammo.
Hi khanintepa wiittottopa, toko caarihu nihinaya wuphwanyani nyu, maana nihoophwanyani nyu ni nhupi woorera wa Kristu.
Hi khanintupha nlipa nivahiyehu, niittottopaka nlattu wo nteko uvanryaya akina. Uwehererya wihu uri wo wiira, ukati unonnuwaya nroromelo ninyu nno, nteko ehu uyo unawuncererya venci,
wiira nilalyee nhupi woorera ilapo coottaliva ni nyu, woohiittottopa nlattu wo nteko uvanrehu mphantte wa akina.
Mothene mmo, ule neettottopa, eettottopeke mwa Apwiya,
maana khankupaliya ule neehimya, nanso nokupaliya ph'ule nohiminya na Apwiya.
Vano kinawulepelani wiira nvilele ulolo waka nwo. Khweli, contte, nkivilele.
Ihace irinaka ni nyu, inkhuma wa Nluku. Mi kihookhuluvelihani wannyinyu mmoca paahi, Kristu, kiphavelaka wuthoonyiherani wa yooyo, khampa mwali ooloka.
Itthu inoovaka ni imphavelaka usempiha, iri yo wiira ankhili inyu ahihononnye, mpaka uhiya unlapela Kristu, toko ceenryaya inwaa ni miruku caya, inthepyaka Eva.
Nyu nnaankupaleela ntthu noolalyeerani Yesu nkina oohikhala oolalyeenrehuni, atthuna nnawaakhelela nnepa nkina, atthuna nhupi nkina mpaka waamini.
Mi akineecoona ukhala mwankani iriyari ya amitthenka oolupale.
Mi pooti uhikhala mayolalya ratta, nanso kiri mayocuwelaca. Ni khweli nihoothoonyerani mwa cookhumelela cothene.
Vano ihaawo ikosilyaka waneeyevihaka va wiira munnuwihiye, kuulalyeerakani ni mahala nhupi woorera wa Nluku?
Akristu o'kereca cikina ahokikavihera ni iyolya ukati woolalyeerakani.

Ukati waaryaka ni nyu ni kithwennyaka, khaawo aanvahacilyaka mirintti; maana asunna ayo waakhumilyaya uMasetoniya, yahokiwaanela ile yaakihaleela. Kihopanka mananna othene wiira kihuuvahaceni mirintti ni kinaapwaherera upanka ciicammo.
Toko ciryaya ikhweli ya Kristu mwa mi, khaawo nohala ukaakha uno wiittottopa uno ilapo yo wAkaya.
Nlattuni? Kontha akinoofentani? Nluku naacuwela wiira mi kinawufentani!
Ni ile impankaka, kinaapwaherera upanka wiira kihaavahe ihathuwa ale aneettottopa aphavelaka wiireliya anlikana ni hi.
Maana yaayo atthu ayo ari amitthenka owootha, ananteko oothepya, akhalaka toko amitthenka a Kristu.
Iyo kihimwe yootikhinaca, maana Sotwani nawiipanka toko ncelo o waarya.
Phimaana, khannitutusera yeepankaka toko atthu o'sariya. Ummaleloni waya unhala ukhala toko cineeraya woovara miteko caya nnyo.
Kinawaakuleliha kiiraka: Hikhale nohala ukooniha toko nlolo. Nanso nyu mwahikikupaliki, nkaakhelele toko caahalenyu umwaakhelela nlolo, wiira ni mi kiittottope vakani.
Karomolaka ihaali yowiittottopa, akinoolumaca toko Apwiya, nanso toko nlolo.
Ukhala wiira enci anawiittottopa wo mananna o nanttuniyani, ni mi kinaahala wiittottopa.
Nyu nlattu wookhala oocuwelaca, nnawaavilela alolo ayo!
Khweli nyu mpaka nnawaavilela ale anoopankani ipottha atthuna anoonuulani, atthuna aneettottopa ni mpaka wuurakalihani mmaramani.
Nlattu wo'haaya caka, kinaakupali wiira mwa cothene nnyo naari ootepa ukenkennya. Wa ile impankaya akina ayo yiittottopaka, kinoolumaca toko nlolo, ni mi kinawiihumiti.
Ayo aheperi? Ni mi ciicammo ki nheperi. Ari annasirayeli? Ni mi ciicammo ki nsirayeli. Ari ucuulu wa Aparahamu? Ni mi ciicammo kiri ucuulu wa Aparahamu.
Ayo ari arumeyi a Kristu? Kinoolumaca toko oovahuwa! Mi utepa n'upwaha: Kihovara miteko venci, imaara cinci kihotthukeliya, kihaafyulaciya venci ni imaara cinci kiholakeliya wiiviya.
Imaara thanu kaattiyaka na ayuta acampooku talathini na khentta (39).
Imaara ttharu kafyulaciyaka ni ikopo; imaara imoca kihovonyakaciya ni maluku; imaara ttharu kihokhuna masakha mpahari, kihohuva uhiyu n'uthana nkalawani ipahari icacaka.
Kaari ni ikwaha cinci, kihokhuna cowoopiha mmamyoolokoni, mwa anannyatha, mwa atthu o nloko naka, mwa amalaponi; co mmaparasa, co muthakoni, co mpahari, ni co woopiha ca asunna o wootha.
Kihovara nteko woolipa n'urettheela, imaara cinci kihokhala woohirupa, nihokivola ntthona ni itala, ni imaara cinci kaanaatthuka, kahovilela uririya n'uthaaleliya.
Uhiya ala masakha ala ni citthu cikhwawe, khula nihuku anaakilemela masukuli makhwawe arinaka, ihaali yo'kereca cothene.
Vano ntthu akhalaka ookenkennyaa, mi akinkenkennya? Ntthu apankaka itampi, mi akinkhala ni masukuli menci?
Wakhalaka wiira kinawiittottopa, wanlamuliya ukhala wo citthu cinthoonyera ukenkennya waka.
Nluku ri Athumwane Yesu ri oottottopeliya ukati wothene, naacuwela wiira akinootha.
Vano nlamuli o'Tamasiku, aathanliye ni mwene Areta, aholamula wiira ironttiye isittatti iyo wiira kitthukiye.
Nanso kahoheliya muntthenkani ni kahokumiheriya waparoni yo'luwani, commo kahotopwa mmatatani mwaya mmo.
Vano mi khweli akinlamuliya wiittottopa, nanso kinlamuliya uhimyaca cowooninya ni cowooniheriya ca Apwiya.
Kinancuwela nlopwana mmoca mwa Kristu aakusiye arweehiyaka irimu yoneeraru cahomala myakha khumi na micese. Wakhala mwirutthuni atthuna munnepani, akincuwela, nanso Nluku naacuwela.
Mi kinaacuwela wiira ula nlopwan'ola hokusiya, wakhala mwirutthuni atthuna munnepani, akincuwela, nanso Nluku naacuwela.
Aakusiye arwaaniyaka upeponi ni aheewa citthu cinci cihinhiminya ni cihintthunihinya wuulumaca pinatamu.
Mwa yooyo nlopwan'oyo kinaahala wiittottopa, nanso mwa mi akinhala wiittottopa, nari uhiri nlattu wookenkennya waka.
Hata kilakelaka wiittottopa akaahala ukhala nlolo, nanso kaahala wuulumaca ikhweli. Kineekhottiha upanka commo kaaceraka wiira hikhale ookuuluma pufya wo citthu cinooninya ni cineewiya wa mi.
Kihovahiya mwiiwa mwirutthuni mwaka, uwile toko nlayikha na Sotwani wiira ukihuvihe, waacera wiira kihiittottope nlattu wo cootikhineeha cuulupale cooniheriyaaka.
Kihaavekela Apwiya imaara ttharu wiira akumihe mwiiwa uyo.
Nanso ayo ahokiirela: Nnema naka ninaawutosa, kontha ikuru caka cinoonnya mukenkennyani. Vano mi kinhala wiittottopa n'utteeliya mukenkennyani mwaka, waacera wiira ikuru ca Kristu coonnye mwa mi.
Phimaana nlattu wo nifento na Kristu kinaatteeliya mukenkennyani, muruwaninyani, muthwennyani, muttharatthariyani, muhuvani. Maana kakhalaka ookenkennyaa phinkhalaka oolipa.
Kihokhala toko nlolo, nlattu wookikhanyereriha. Kaalamuliya uttottopeliya ni nyu, hata kihoohikhalaru oocuwannyaa toko amitthenka akina ayo.
Citthu cinkithoonya wiira kimmitthenka phi nnya: ikanyero, mitikiniho ni malakalaka n'uvilela venci cithoonyiheriye wariyari winyu.
Kuupankileni isiyani yo wuuyevihani woopwaha ikereca cikina? Itthu ivirikanihilyaka iri yoohuuryacani mirintti. Vano kinawulepelani nkilevelele yuukosenryakani.

Vano kimphavela wuthotolani imaara yoneeraru ni akinhala wuuryani mirintti, kontha akimphavela nhakhu uphwanyilenyu, nanso kinoophavelani nyenyuva. Uhiya commo, asaana acikani khaamphavelaca nhakhu phaavahaka mayathumwanaya, nanso anannyari phimphavelaca nhakhu phaavahaka asaanaya acikani.

Ni ciicammo wotthuna waka ni nifento nirinaka wa nyu, kinaahala urihakaca cirinaka cothene, ni wiihuviha kimwanene kontha kinawufentani venci. Vano nyu nnohala ukifenta vakani nlattu wowuufentani venci?
Vano nyu nnaahala ukupali wiira mi akuuryeeleni mirintti. Nlattu mi woowalaala, kihoottipihani n'uwalaala.
Mi kihoohukhacerani mwa nlattu wa ntthu nrumilyaka?
Kahonleehera Titu wiira oothotoleni, aawile ni nkhunanawe. Uyo hoohukhacerani? Hi khanipankile ni nnepa mmoca yooyo, neettelaka itthu imoca?
Ukati wothene nyu nnoopuwela wiira hi ninawiicaakiha wariyari winyu. Ninooluma wamiithoni wa Nluku toko atthu ari mwa Kristu ni cothene cimpankehu, ninaacera wulipiherani.

Vano kinoova wiira kihuuphwanyeni nnari oovirikannyaaca ni mi kinari oovirikannyaaca. Ni ciicammo kinawoova uphwanya inttewo, uramanaca, urusihana, ukawannyaca, uhimyahimya, uhankawani, wiittottopa n'uhiiwanana.

Ni kinawoovelela wiira wanhalaka uwa wuthotolani, Nluku aka hikuulihacihe muru wariyari winyu, maana kinoova wunla nlattu wa atthu ookosa ahintthuna urukunusa nrima mwa coohiirya, cooraruwa ni coothepya caavaraya.
Vano ikwaha inhalaka uwa wuthotolani, inhala ukhala ikwaha yoneeraru. Yooriyeleliya yothene wowiira ikupaliye inlamuliya ukhaleliya usaahiti na atthu eeli atthuna araru.
Maana kahoolopolani, ikwaha yonayeeli waaryaka ni nyu. Vano ukati uhiryaka ni nyu, kinaantikhela ale yaakosile khalayi na akina ayo, wiira katuruwaka akinhala waanemecera,
maana kinoona wiira nyu nnophavela usaahiti unthoonyera wiira Kristu phinoolumaca mwa mi. Uyo khahimwe ookenkennyaa wa nyu, nanso ri okuru iriyari inyu.
Kristu aahookhomeliyaru muukenkennyani, ri nkumi nlattu wo'kuru ca Nluku. Ciicammo mwa Kristu hi niri ookenkennyaa, nanso ninaahala ukhala akumi n'uyo nlattu wo'kuru ca Nluku waacera nuurumeeleni.
Mwiiwehawehe wakhala wiira khweli nri munroromeloni; mwiicuwelele mwasinene. Khannocuwela wiira Yesu Kristu ri mwa nyu? Mari uhiri wiira khankupaleeliye.
Mi kinaakupali wiira nnaahala ucuwela wiira hi khanihimwe oohikupaleeliya.
Vano hi ninaanvekela Nluku wiira nhipanke yoonanara, woohikhala paahi wiira nikupaleeliye, nanso wiira mpanke yoorera, hata ninookhalaru toko oohikupaleeliya.
Kontha khiiwo inoolumehu yo woothiya, nanso ninooluma ikhweli.
Maana ninaatteeliya nlattu wookenkennya wihu, wanwoonehuni nnari oolipa. Vano ninoolepelani wiira munnuwe munnepani.
Phimaana kiwantikhelakani nnya citthu nnya kinari uttayi wiira, kinari wakhiviru ni nyu, kihikela koonyokhani, toko ikuru cikivahilaya Apwiya, woohikhala wuukwanyulacani, nanso wuulipihani.
Asunnaka, mothene mmo mi kinawuleehani, mwaavye ukhala omaana, nlipiherane, nkhalane moopuwelo mamoca, nkhale mumpuhani. Ni Nluku o nifento ni o mpuha, nohala ukhala ni nyu.
Nsalamihane ntthu ni nkhwawe ni nifento nittakattifu.
Attakattifu othene anawusalamihani.
Nnema na Apwiya Yesu Kristu, nifento na Nluku, ni waatana wo Nnepa Nttakattifu, cikhale ni nyu othene.
Mi Paulu mmitthenka, ooruminya woohikhala wookhuma wa atthu ni mena wo mphantte wa pinatamu, nanso wa Yesu Kristu ni Nluku athumwanihu, amunwelelihile mwa atthu ookhwa,
ni asunna othene ari ni mi, nantikhelaka ikereca co'Kalata, niiraka:
Nnema ni isalama wa nyu, cinkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni wa Yesu Kristu,
eevaherenre nlattu wo'tampi cihu wiira anoopole nttuniyani nrihu moohiloka mu, toko cintthunawe Nluku Athumwanihu,
ri onttittimiho noohimala. Ameni.
Vano kinawutikhinacani nyu nlattu woonsempa woohipica ule wiihanneni ni nnema na Kristu, mpaka utthara nhupi nkina uneereliya nhupi woorera,
uhiri nhupi weekhweli. Itthu ineerannya va iri yowiira atthu akinaku anawukukureehani, aphavelaka uttinttaniha nhupi woorera wa Kristu.
Hata nikhale hi atthuna ncelo o wirimu oolalyeerakani nhupi woovirikana wuulaleenryakani, alaphiye!
Vano toko cihimilehu, kinawaakuleliha: Akhala wiira haawo nolalya nhupi woovirikana waakhenlenyu, alaphiye!
Nnoona wiira kimphavela uttottopeliya na atthu atthuna ni Nluku? Atthuna kimphavela waaciveliha atthu? Yiiriyaka kaaphavelaca waaciveliha atthu, akaakhala nrumeyi a Kristu.
Asunnaka, kimphavela ncuwele wiira nhupi woorera unlalyaka mi khunkhuma wa ntthu.
Maana mi ciicammo, akaakhenle mwa ntthu ni akiitthucihiye. Uhiya commo, mi kaakhenle mwa Yesu Kristu ni wooniheriya.
Vano nyu nheewa mananna ceettaaka nttiinini ya ayuta ni coomolanihacaka wo nkhitto ikereca ya Nluku, kiphavelaka wiira kikwanyulace.
Nttiinini ya ayuta, mi kaamwaapwaha ayuta enci o macusa aka, ni kaari mayovarecesa ilema co mayapaapa.
Nanso Nluku hokaawayaniha ukhuma munthuukwani mwa amaama ni hokiihana wo nnema nawe. Vano wancivenlyaya
ukithoonyera Mwanawe wiira kinlalye iriyari ya amalaponi, khakinkohakohile hata ntthu mmoca.
Akirweele uYerusalemu wiira koonanane ale yaari amitthenka mi kihinaya ukhala, nanso kahorwaa wArapiya, ni kahohokoleela tho uTamasiku.
Wahoolo cinavinrene myakha miraru, kahorwaa uYerusalemu wiira kancuwele Peturu coo ni coo, ni kahokhala ni yooyo mahuku khumi na mathanu.
Nanso akoonne amitthenka akina tho, ari hinookhala Yakopu, munnaya Apwiya.
Vano itthu inowantikhelakani iri yeekhweli, wamiithoni wa Nluku kinhimyaca wiira akinootha.
Wahoolo kahorwaa mittetthe co'Siriya ni uSilisiya.
Mi akaacuweliya mmakereca co'Yuteya ciri mwa Kristu.
Nanso yaaneera wiiwa paahi wiira: Yoole aanoomolanihaca khalayi ule, vano neera alalyaka nroromelo nenno naaphavelawe ukwanyulaca nno.
Ayo yaananttittimiha Nluku nlattu wawaka.
Wahoolo cinavinrene myakha khumi na micese, kahorwaa tho uYerusalemu. Ila ikwaha ila kaari ni Parnapee, ciicammo kahontthukana ikwaha Titu.
Kaarweele nwo nlattu wo wooniheriya, kahaahimyacera utthikini asuulupale oocuwannyaa nhupi woorera unlalyaka iriyari ya amalaponi, wiira itthu ipankilyaka ni impankaka ihikhale yo pure.
Nanso, hata Titu yooyo aari ni mi, khaalamuleliye wuula icantto, aanokhalaru nkereku.
Vano ula nlahanya ula waawusawusiye nlattu wa asunna akina owootha yeetakaneeliha wariyari wihu, wiira anihottele utaphuwa urinehu mwa Yesu Kristu wiira anipanke ipottha.
Nanso hi khaneewelenle ayo hata vakani, waacera ikhweli yo nhupi woorera yuuphareleleni.
Vano ale yooneliya ukhala asuulupale, yaaryaya iyo mi khinkivirikaneela maana Nluku kharina nthanlo, yaayo khiiwo itthu yuncerenryaya munhupini mwaka mmo.
Uhiya commo, ayo ahokupaleela wiira mi kihokhuluveliya ulalya nhupi woorera mwa atthu ahikhanle ayuta, toko Peturu wakhuluveliyawe waalaleera ayuta.
Kontha yooyo aanvarelenle Peturu mmitekoni coomitthenka co waalaleera ayuta, ciicammo yooyo phikivarelenle mmitekoni co waalaleera amalaponi.

Vaavale Yakopu, Peturu ni Yohani, yaacuwannyaa toko mavatta o'kereca, yoonelaka ukhala ikhweli nnema nivahiyaka, yahonivaha ntata mi ni Parnapee, athoonyeraka umoca. Ayo yaheewanana wiira ninlamuliya urwaa wa amalaponi, ni ayo urwaa wa ayuta.
Paahi, yahonilepela wiira noopuwelele amasikiini, iri itthu yaavyaka upanka.
Nanso, Peturu waphiilyawe wa Antiyokiya, kahonkuphula coo ni coo, nlattu woovonyiha.
Maana, ahinaya uwa akina yaaruminye ni Yakopu, uyo aanlya na amalaponi. Nanso uwaaca waya ale, ahohiya waalyana amalaponi ni ahaamwalanana nlattu wo woova anacantto.
Ni ayuta akina yahontakaneelana Peturu unamirima miili waapankawe, mpaka Parnapee ahopahuliya ni unamirima miili waarinaya.

Vaavale woonnyaka wiira ale khayeettela ikhweli yo nhupi woorera, kahomwiirela Peturu uhoolo wa atthu othene: We o nyuta, nanso mananna cinlyaa na amalaponi ayo, uri toko kuhimwe nyuta. Vano uhaakhanyererihe amalaponi ayo ukhala toko ayuta!
Hi ayuta ooyaryaana ni khaninakhala amalaponi mayokosa toko cineereliyaya,

nanso ninaacuwela wiira khaawo novaheriya isariya nlattu woottharihelela Nlamulo, nanso novaheriya isariya nlattu wo nroromelo mwa Yesu Kristu. Phimaana, hi ayuta ciicammo ninaankupali Yesu Kristu wiira nivaheriye isariya nlattu wo nroromelo mwa Kristu, woohikhala nlattu woottharihelela Nlamulo, maana khaawo nohala uvaheriya isariya nlattu woottharihelela Nlamulo.
Vano, wakhalaka wiira hi ninaavya uvaheriya isariya mwa Kristu, yeehi ayuta ninaahala wooneliya ukhala amalaponi, ale aneehaninya mayokosa. Maanaya wiira Kristu phi nrumeyi o'tampi? Mena vakani!
Vano katekaka tho ikwanyunlyaka, kinaacuwela wiira ki ntthu mayokosa.
Kontha nlattu wo Nlamulo, mi kihokhwela Nlamulo, wiira kikhale nkumi mwa Nluku.
Kihokhomeliya ni Kristu. Akihimwena tho mi kiri nkumi, nanso Kristu phinkhala mwa mi. Ukumi urinaka mwirutthuni, uri nlattu wo nroromelo mwa Mwana a Nluku, akifentile ni eevaherenre nlattu wo mi.
Akinkhweliha nnema na Nluku, maana isariya yawaaka nlattu wo Nlamulo, mweeco Kristu khwile wo pure.
Nyenyu akalata, mwaaphuku! Nlwennye naani? Wamiithoni winyu, kihoolalyeerani Yesu Kristu khomeliye wansalapani.
Wahokicivela ucuwela itthu imoca paahi, maanaya wiira mwaakhenle Nnepa Nttakattifu nlattu woottharihelela Nlamulo, atthuna nlattu woororomela nuulumo niiwilenyu?
Maanaya wiira commo nyu mw'aphuku! Nnapacenrene muNnepani, nna va nnophavela umalihera mwirutthuni?
Vano uhuva winyu nwo waari wo pure? Wakhala commo, waari wo pure!
Ule noovahani Nnepa awe ni apankaka mitikiniho wariyari winyu, nopanka cennya citthu nnya nlattu woottharihelela Nlamulo, atthuna nlattu woororomela nuulumo niiwilenyu?
Muupuwele cowantikhiya cinhimyaya: Aparahamu honkupali Nluku, phimaana ahovaheriya isariya.
Phimaana ncuwele wiira, ale anroromela phiri asaana a Aparahamu.

Cowantikhiya cahoona khalayiru wiira Nluku aanhala waavahera isariya amalaponi nlattu wo nroromelo. Commo uyo ahonlalyeera Aparahamu eeraka: Nlattu wo we, maloko othene o mwiilaponi anaahala urerihiya.
Phimaana, ale anroromela anaarerihiya wamoca na Aparahamu nlopwana o nroromelo.
Vano ale ankhuluvela Nlamulo ari oolaphiya, maana ihantikhiya wiira: Holaphiya ule hinttharihelela cothene cantikhiye nliivuruni yo Nlamulo.
Ni khweli, wamiithoni wa Nluku, khaawo novaheriya isariya nlattu wo Nlamulo, maana ihantikhiya wiira: Nasariya nohala ukhala nkumi nlattu wo nroromelo.
Vano Nlamulo khaninkhuma munroromeloni, nanso Nlamulo nno ninaakhuluveliha ukumi paahi wa ale anttharihelela malamulo ayo.
Kristu honoopola nkilaphoni no nlamulo, eepankaka uyo ikilapho nipuro nawihu, kontha ihantikhiya wiira: Holaphiya ule othene nohala uthomennya wamwirini.
Kristu pankenle commo, waacera wiira urerihiya wankhuluvelihilyawe Nluku Aparahamu waaphwanye amalaponi mwa Yesu Kristu, wiira naakhelele munroromeloni Nnepa waakhuluvelihiye.
Asunnaka, kinooluma kilikaniheraka makhalelo a atthu. Nleehano na atthu eeli natthukelaniyaka, khaawo noorya ukhotta atthuna wuncerera itthu.
Commo Nluku ahonkhuluveliha Aparahamu ni ucuulu awe. Cowantikhiya khacineera: Na asiculawe, toko yaahimya atthu enci, nanso ucuulu awe, aaciyaka mmoca paahi, ri Kristu.
Vano, kimphavela wuuhimeryani ila: Nlamulo, naawile cinavinre myakha iminya cese wo talathini (430), khaninfutta nleehano naatthukiye ni Nluku nihinaya nlamulo, wowiira nihifutte yookhuluvelihiya.
Maana wakhala wiira yowaakhela inkhuma munlamuloni, khinkhuma munkhuluvelihoni. Nanso yowaakhela ikhumile munkhuluvelihoni Nluku wanvahilyawe wo mahala Aparahamu.

Vano Nlamulo nno naari no'siyani? Nlamulo naawile wiira nithoonyere citthu cineenanana utthuna wa Nluku. Naahala ulokela mpaka waahalaya uwa ucuulu wa Aparahamu ule naaciya munkhuluvelihoni. Nlamulo naawiihiye na ancelo ni naakheleliye ni Musa, mayowaataniha.
Vano mayowaataniha khahimwe mmoca, nanso Nluku ri mmoca.
Maanaya Nlamulo ninaavirikaniha mikhuluveliho ca Nluku? Mena vakani! Kontha ninavahiye nlamulo naahala uvaha ukumi, khweli ntthu aanhala uvahiya isariya nlattu wo nlamulo nno.
Nanso cowantikhiya cihotthukela cothene vathi waya itampi, waacera wiira yookhuluvelihiya, yoopankiya nlattu wo nroromelo mwa Yesu Kristu, ivahiye wa ale anroromela.
Waaryaya nihinaya uwa nroromelo, naawehawehiya ni Nlamulo, wo nenno phaatthukeliyehu, mpaka ukati waahalaya uthoonyiheriya nna nroromelo nna.
Commo, Nlamulo phinihoolenle mpaka uwa Kristu, waacera wiira nivaheriye isariya munroromeloni.
Phimaana, waphilyaya ukati wo nroromelo, khaninhooleliya tho ni Nlamulo.
Maana nyu othene nri asaana a Nluku munroromeloni mwa Yesu Kristu,
kontha ale apattisiye mwa Kristu, ahonwara Kristu.
Vano khaawo nyuta mena nkereku, mena ipottha mena ootaphuwa, mena nlopwana mena nthiyana, kontha nyu othene nri mmoca mwa Yesu Kristu.
Phimaana nyu wakhala wiira nri mwa Kristu, nri ucuulu wa Aparahamu ni mayowaakhela coorera caakhuluvelihilyawe Nluku.
Nanso kinoohimeryani wiira, mwana nohala waakhela mihakhu ca athumwane nari mwankani, khanvirikana ni ipottha, nookhalaru mwanene cothene.
Nanso uyo nolamuliya waakhalana oonhoolela ni akaviheri mpaka ukati uhiminye na athumwane.
Ni hi ciicammo, naarihu amirawo, naapankiya ipottha ni ilema co nttuniyani.
Nanso uphiya waya ukati waahiminye, Nluku ahonveleeliha Mwanawe, aayariye ni nthiyana, ni aahooleliye ni Nlamulo,
wiira aataphule ale yaahooleliya ni Nlamulo, waacera wiira hi naakhelele ihathuwa yoopankiya asaana a Nluku.
Vano, nlattu wookhala asaanawe, Nluku horuma Nnepa wa Mwanawe munrimani mwihu, ni uyo unaakhuwela wiiraka: Apa, maanaya wiira Paapa.
Commo, nyu khannakhala tho ipottha, nanso asaana a Nluku, ni nlattu wookhala asaanawe, uyo hoopankani mayowaakhela.
Khalayi, waarinyu nhinancuwela Nluku, mwaari ipottha ca anluku, ayo yahaari anluku eekhweli.
Nanso nna va, uncuwela winyu Nluku, atthuna kiireke, Nluku wucuwelani wawe, nnoturuwelelani tho ilema co nttuniyani, ciri coohi ifayita ni coohi ikuru? Nnophavela tho upankiya ipottha ni cennyo?
Nyu nnawaavyavya uhelelela myakha, myeeri, mahuku, ni ukati umpankiya isikuhuulu!
Phimaana, mi unaakoopiha wiira ikuru cinoopankelakani nnyo ciri co pure.
Vano asunnaka, mi kihoovarani metto wiira nkhale toko mi, maana mi kihokhala toko nyu. Khiiwo itthu ikitthekenlenyu.
Toko cincuwelenyu wiira, nlattu wo'retta phaapacenryaka wuulaleerani nhupi woorera.
Waanokhalaru wiira iretta aka iyo yaari yoorika wa nyu, nanso khankitarawile ni khankikhottile; nhokaakhelela toko ncelo a Nluku atthuna toko mwanene Yesu Kristu.
Vano ikhumelenle isiyani mutteeliyani winyu? Kinaavahera usaahiti wiira, wooryaneele, mwaamphela miitho enyu n'ukivaha mii.
Vano ciicale kihothatuwa mwiinani inyu nlattu wo wuhimeryani ikhweli?
Atthu ayo anthoonyera wuuwacawacani nyu, nanso khunakhalaka. Ayo anaavyavya wumwalanihani nyu ni mi wiira mwakhalane ayo.
Vano ukati wothene unaarera uwacawaca itthu iri yomaana, kahi paahi uwacawaca kinari ni nyu.
Asaana aka, nlattu wawinyu nyu, mi nanlelo kineera kihuvaka toko athiyana oophavela urukurerya nipirothi mpaka Kristu utekyaa mwa nyu.
Mi waankicivelaka ukhala ni nyu nenna va, ni uwuulumacerani mananna makina, maana kihosanka nlattu wawinyu nyu.
Vano nyu nnophavela uhooleliya ni Nlamulo, nkihimerye itthu imoca: Nyu nnawiiwa inhimyaya Nlamulo?
Maana ihantikhiya wiira Aparahamu ahaana asaana eeli, mmoc'oyo a nthiyana ipottha ni nkin'oyo a nthiyana ootaphuwa.
Mwana a nthiyana ipottha yariye ni mananna o'rutthu, nanso mwana a nthiyana ootaphuwa, yariye nlattu wookhuluvelihiya.

Nanso nnya citthu nnya cintthumiriya toko nlikanihero, maana asithiyana eeli ala phinthoonyera maleehano meeli. Nleehano nimoca niri no mwaako Sinayi ni ninthoonyera Hakari. Ale ari o nenna nleehano nna annyara ipottha.
Vano Hakari ri nthoonyero wo mwaako Sinayi uri wArapiya, ni Hakari ri nthoonyero wo Yerusalemu o'lelo, ri oopankiya ipottha wamoca na asaanawe.
Nanso Yerusalemu o wirimu ri ootaphuwa; yooyo phiri anumwanihu.

Maana ihantikhiya wiira: Utteeliye we mwali eekupa, we uhinatoko unnyara mwana; ukhuwele utteeliyaka we uhinaya woona uweryaa wo marukureryo o nipirothi, kontha athiyana oohinnya anaahala waayaraca asaana enci wahohiyana athiyana atheliye.
Nanso nyu, asunnaka, nri asaana o nkhuluveliho, toko Isaki.
Vano, yoole ukati ule, mwana ooyariya mwirutthuni aammoomolaniha mwana ooyariya muNnepani. Yeeyo nanlelo inawiirannya.
Cowantikhiya cinhimyani? Cineera: Woomole ipottha ni mwanaya, kontha mwana o'pottha khanhala ukhala mayowaakhela mihakhu wamoca ni mwana a nthiyana ootaphuwa.
Phimaana, asunnaka, hi khanihimwe asaana o'pottha, nanso niri asaana a nthiyana ootaphuwa.
Kristu honitaphula, wiira weekhweli nikhale ootaphuwa. Phimaana nkhale oolipa ni nhihokoleele tho upotthani.
Nkiviriyane ratta inoohimeryakani mi Paulu, kinwiirelani coo: Mweehiyereraka wuulihiya icantto, Kristu khanoophurelani itthu.
Nanlelo kinaahimyaca wiira ntthu othene neehiyerera wuulihiya icantto, naalamuliya utthara Nlamulo nothene.
Nyu nnaavyavya uvaheriya isariya ni Nlamulo, nhomwalana ni Kristu, wannemani nhomora.
Kontha hi, muNnepani ninaawehererya ni nroromelo uvaheriya isariya, iri nwehereryo ehu.
Maana nakhalaka mwa Kristu, wuula atthuna uhuula icantto khinakhala itthu. Yuulupale niri nroromelo ninkhuma nnifentoni.
Vano nyu mwaantthimakaca sana; tupani oohiihileni upwaherera wiiwelela ikhweli?
Wonwo wooryaciya nwo khunkhuma wa ule wiihanneni.
Miropo vakani cinaattuttuliha iphepa yoweethennya yothene.
Mi kinaakhuluvela wiira, mwa Apwiya khannohala wuupuwela mananna makina. Ule nookukureehani, hata akhale pani, naahala uhukhumwinya.
Asunnaka, wakhalaka wiira kinaapwaherera ulalya icantto, nlattuni nanlelo koomolanihaciyaka? Mi kaalalya wuula icantto, nhupi wo wansalapani khawaankakathula ntthu.
Phimaana, mi waankicivela wiira aneettupulacile ale anookukureehani.
Kontha nyu asunnaka, mwiihaneliye utaphuwa. Vano nhivaherere utaphuwa nwo utthuna wo'rutthu, nanso nwacawacane ntthu ni nkhwawe wo nifento.
Maana Nlamulo nothene ninthukumaniheriya ni nuulumo nimoca, niri nna: Unfente nkhunanaa toko cineefentaa umwanene.
Nanso mwalumanaka ni nrakalihanaka ntthu ni nkhwawe, mwiikasoope wiira nhiivakane.
Vano kinowiirelani coo: Mweette muNnepani ni nhittharihelele utthuna wo'rutthu.
Maana irutthu inaana ni Nnepa ni Nnepa unaana ni irutthu, ni nnya cinawiinanaca; phimaana nyu khannoorya upanka intthunenyu.
Nanso wakhala wiira nneettihiya ni Nnepa, khannohooleliya tho ni Nlamulo.
Vano miteko co'rutthu cinaacuwannyaa, ciri toko nnya: uluva, iharamu, uraruwa,
waalapela anluku, inyanka, wiinanaca, uvaanyihana, ihace, urusihana, wiittottopa, uhiiwanana, unyakulihana,
urama, uhapaliya, nlula ni citthu coolikana toko nnya. Toko cuhimenryakani wupaceroni kiiraka, ale ampanka nnya citthu nnya khaanhala waakhela umwene wa Nluku.
Nanso nhokorokho wo Nnepa uri: nifento, utteeliya, isalama, uvilela, ulokihana, imaani, ukhuluvelyaa,
wiimaaliha, wiivaraca. Khaniwo nlamulo ninvaanyiha nnya citthu nnya.
Ale ari a Yesu Kristu, ihokhomeliya irutthu aya wansalapani, ni utthuna waya ni ucivelaciya waya.
Vano nahooleliyaka ni Nnepa, neetteke ni Nnepa.
Phimaana nihiittottope, nihivirusane ntthu ni nkhwawe, nihikhalelane nttima ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Asunnaka, wakhala wiira ntthu naaphwanyeriya apankaka itampi, nyu nri o muNnepani va, munttikitthe woopisa nrima. Mwiirattavelelaka mwanene enyu wiira ni nyu nhittehiye.
Nkavihane mirintti ntthu ni nkhwawe, commo phinhalenyu uttharihelela nlamulo na Kristu.
Kontha ntthu eecaalikelelaka ukhala oocuwannyaa, hikhanle oocuwannyaa, neethepya mwanene.
Nanso khula ntthu aweheehe cimpankawe, phinhalawe ukhalana yowiittottopa veekhawe, woohilikanihera ni nkina.
Kontha khula ntthu nolamuliya ukusa nrintti awe.
Vano ule nosomihinya nuulumo na Nluku, ammeele ule nonsomiha, citthu coorera cothene cirinawe.
Nhikhale oothepiya: Nluku khanveehiya, kontha citthu cothene cinaalawe ntthu, cennyo naahala uhepha.
Kontha ule naala cinciveliha irutthu, nokohepha ukwanyuliya. Nanso ule naala cinciveliha Nnepa, nokohepha ukumi woohimala.
Vano nihitoomwe upanka yoorera, kontha naahihiyeke, waphiyaka ukati ninaahala uhepha.
Phimaana, ninarinene nafasi, naapankeleke othene yoorera, venci venci ale ari amuci o muNnepani.
Mmweheehe manepa moolupale kinwantikhelakani ni ntata naka.
Ale othene amphavela waaciveliha atthu, ayo anawukhanyererihani wuula icantto, wiira ahittharatthariye nlattu wo nsalapa wa Kristu.
Kontha hata yaayo anoola icantto ayo, khaanttharihelela Nlamulo, nanso amphavela wiira nyu muule icantto wiira ayo attottopeliye mwirutthuni mwinyu.
Nanso mi akintthuna wiittottopa, ari uhikhanle paahi nlattu wo nsalapa wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu. Kontha wansalapani wa Yesu, citthu co'ttuninya cihokikhwela mi ni mi kihokhwela cennyo.
Kontha wuula icantto atthuna uhuula icantto khinakhalaka itthu, nanso itthu yuulupale iri ukhala ikhiyumpe yonaanano.
Vano othene anhala weettela ala makhalelo ala, isalama ni ikiriri cikhale na ayo ni ciicammo cikhale ni Sirayeli a Nluku.
Phimaana, hikhale tho ookiwiihera itafawuti, kontha mwirutthuni mwaka kimmwaana ikanyero cinkihimya wiira kiri a Yesu.
Asunnaka, nnema na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu nikhale ni nnepa enyu. Ameni.
Paulu, mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu, mwa nlattu wotthuna Nluku, kinawaaveleelihera iwarakha ila atthu attakattifu ari wEfesu ni ale ari eekhweli mwa Yesu Kristu:
Nnema ni isalama wa nyu cinkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Attittimihiye Nluku ni Athumwanaya Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu. Yooyo nirerihile ni iparakha cothene co munnepani ciri mapuro o wirimu mwa Kristu,
toko Nluku cinithanlilyawe mwa Kristu wo nifento nawe ihinaya upattusiya ittuniya, wiira nikhale attakattifu ni oohicovaciya wamiithoni wawe.
Honaalikelela khalayiru ni honikusa wiira nikhale asaanawe mwa Yesu Kristu, wooncivela ni wootthuna wawe,
wiira uttittimihiye waarya wo nnema nawe, ninivahilyawe wootosa mwa Yesu oofentiya.
Mwa yooyo niholiveliya milattu cihu ni ihisapu yo'phome awe, wiira nileveleliye itampi cihu, toko ciryaya mihakhu co nnema nawe,
nenno hokhala oonicarihela hi ni ankhili othene ni ucuwelela,
anicuwelihaka ikano cintthunawe toko wanoncivelaya mwanene itthu ihimilyawe,
wiira citthu cothene cituruseliye uthukumanihiya mwa Kristu, waphilyaya ukati waaciye, ukhuma ciri wirimu mpaka ciri vathi va.
Mwa yooyo, ciicammo nihothanliya ni waalikeleliya khalayiru, toko caatthenkemanihilyawe ule nopanka citthu cothene, apankaka toko cintthunawe,
wiira nikhale nttittimiho no waarya wawe, hi nipacenre ukhuluvela mwa Kristu.
Ni nyu ciicammo, nneewilene nuulumo neekhweli, uri nhupi woorera uwiihile woopwa winyu, ni ciicammo nnari omwaamini Kristu, nhotthittiya ni Nnepa Nttakattifu waakhuluvelihiye.
Yooyo ukhanle nthoonyero wo nhakhu unkelehu waakhela, mpaka woopoliya wa ale ari a Nluku wiira waarya wawe uttittimihiye.
Phimaana kineewilene mi ukupali urinenyu wa Apwiya Yesu, ni nifento nirinenyu na attakattifu othene,
akinhiya unsukuru Nluku mwa nlattu wa nyu, kiwuupuwelakani nnovekelaka,
wiira Nluku a Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, athumwanaya owaarya, yuvaheni Nnepa wa ankhili ni mawooni waacera mwaacuwele.
Kinaavekela wiira miitho o nrima enyu amwaleeliye, waacera ncuwele nkhuluvelo wiihaneliyenyu ni mihakhu cowaarya cinkelaya waakhelihiya attakattifu
ni ncuwele monnuwelo urinaya ikuru cawe, wa hi nikupanli, toko cineeraya woolipa ikuru cawe.
Ikuru cennyo coonihenryawe mwa Kristu, amunwelelihaka mwa atthu ookhwa ni amweesaka moono wonlopwana mapuro o wirimu,
waculu wa alamuli ooculu, anakuru, anamasintta, macini, ni macina othene anhiminya, woohikhala yoola ukati ula paahi, nanso ciicammo mpaka ukati ummwa.
Uyo heesa citthu cothene vathi waya inyaa ca Kristu, ni wo citthu cothene honvaha wiira akhale muru wo'kereca,
iri irutthu awe, incarihela citthu cothene, mwa yoole nocariha citthu cothene.
Nyu nnakhwilene mwa nlattu coottheka ni itampi cinyu
caavarenyu khalayi, weettenyu toko waneeriyaya nttuniyani, munttharaka nhooleli o'kuru o wanlakani, nttharaka nnepa unaacika asaana oohanyuriha.
Wariyari waya, ni hi ciicammo pheettelehu, ucivaciviya wo mwirutthuni, nipankaka utthuna wo'rutthu ni wuupuwela wihu; iphattuwelo naari atthu oorusananinya ni oophwanela uttarusiya toko akina ayo.
Nanso Nluku, ri thaciri muulupale nkiririni, mwa nlattu wo nifento nawe ninci, ninifentannyawe,
hi ninari ookhwene mwa nlattu wa coottheka cihu, honivaha ukumi wamoca ni Kristu; wo nnema na Nluku nhoopoliya.
Uyo honunweleliha wamoca ni Kristu Yesu, ni hononkomiha mapuro owirimu mwa Kristu,
wiira anithoonyere ukati wohoolo, ucaracara wo nnema nawe ni nlattu wooloka wawe ni hi, mwa Kristu Yesu.
Kontha nyu moopoliye wo nnema, mwa nlattu wookupali winyu, ni khannakhala phi nyu nkhumanne, iyo iri ivahiya ya Nluku.
Khawanakhala wo miteko cinyu, wiira hikhale nohala wiittottopa.
Kontha niri ikhiyumpe awe, nipattusiye mwa Yesu Kristu wiira nivare miteko coorera, cennyo Nluku citthenkemanihilyawe khalayiru wiira neettele.
Phimaana, muupuwele wiira nyu khalayi, mwaari amalaponi eyarelo, ni mweehaninya atthu oohuula ni atthu aneeciirela owuula mwirutthuni mwaya ni matata a atthu;
yooyo ukati uyo, khamwaarina Kristu, mwaari oomwalanihinya ni nloko no Sirayeli, mwaari oothanyinya mmaleehanoni yaakhuluvelihiye, khamwaarina Nluku nttuniyani ni khiiwo yaawehereryenyu.
Nanso vano, mwa Kristu Yesu, nyu, khalayi mwaari uttayi, nhophiya wakhiviru, mwa iphome ya Kristu.
Kontha uyo phiri isalama ehu. Yooyo aathukumanihile ayuta ni amalaponi wiira akhale amoca, ni hokwanyula mpika, waari iriyariru, yoole waakawaniha.
Yooyo, ni irutthu awe, homalamaliha ikano co malamulo, caari coolakaninya, waacera wiira aatanihe oyeeli wiira akhale ntthu mmoca onaanano yeettihanaka wo'salama,
aaceraka waataniha oyeeli ni Nluku wiira akhale irutthu imoca, nlattu wo nsalapa, amalamalihaka wiinanaca.
Kristu wawilyaawe, hoolaleerani nhupi woorera wo'salama nyu mwaari uttayi, ni ciicammo isalama wa ale yaari wakhiviru;
kontha mwa yooyo, oyeeli nihohuleliya mikhora wa Athumwanihu wo Nnepa mmoca yooyo.
Commo, khannakhala tho oothanyinya mena atthu oweettakaca, nanso mwanenci a attakattifu ni nri nrukulu na Nluku;
ntekiye mmavattani mwa amitthenka ni mo minapiyu, nari Kristu Yesu yooyo, nluku no wanloothoni;
mwa yooyo, inupa yothene, inari yoolipihaciya ratta, inawunnuwa wiira ikhale inupa ittakattifu ya Apwiya.
Mwa yooyo ciicammo nyu, wamocaru nneera ntekiyaka wiira nkhale inupa ya Nluku muNnepani.
Mwa nlattu wo yeela itthu ila, mi Paulu ki nantthukiya a Kristu Yesu, mwa nlattu wo wufentani nyu amalaponi.
Khweli nhotoko wiiwa miteko co nnema na Nluku, nivahereriyaka mi wiira kuhimeryeni nyu;
toko civahiyaka ula nteko ula, kicuwelihiyaka isiiri ni mawooni, ni moolumo awantikhenlyakani vakani.
Phimaana mwasomaka vale, nnaahala woonenela ciinryaka woocuwelela isiiri ya Kristu.
Cennyo, myakha civinre cokhalayi, khayaavahiye ucuwela apinatamu, toko vano, wanooniheriyaya muNnepani amitthenka attakattifu ni minapiyu,
ncuwelaka wiira amalaponi ni ayuta ari mayowaakhela ncina ni anaapanka mphantte wo'rutthu imoca yeeyo awehereraka uphwanya ncina nikhuluvelihiye mwa Yesu Kristu ni nlattu wo nhupi woorera.
Mwa yooyo nhupi uyo, kihothanliya ukhala nrumeyi, toko ciryaya ivahiya yo nnema na Nluku, kivahiyaaka, toko cineerawe woovara nteko ni ikuru cawe.
Mi, kinari mwankani o mattakattifu othene, kihovahiya nna nnema nna wiira kaahimerye amalaponi nhupi woorera wo mihakhu cohaalikelyaa ciri mwa Kristu
ni waathoonyihera atthu othene miteko co'siiri yo nnema na Nluku, ikhumelo khalayi, cennyo caavithiye mwa Nluku pattusile citthu cothene,
wiira akhulupale othene ni alamuli ari mapuro o wirimu acuweliye ankhili oolupale a Nluku ni ikereca
toko utthuna woohimala upankilyawe mwa Yesu Kristu Apwiy'ehu,
umwaamini wihu yooyo nihotthuniheriya uphiya uhoolo wa Nluku ni nkhuluvelo ni wohoova.
Phimaana, kinawulepelani wiira nhivolole nlattu wowuhuvelani nyu, kontha phiri waarya winyu.
Nlattu wo yeela itthu ila, kinakhoroma wamiithoni wa Apaapa,
yaale ari athumwanaya atthu othene, ukhuma ari wirimu mpaka ari vathi va.
Mi kinaavekela wiira, toko ciryaya nhakhu wo waarya wawe, ni Nnepa awe oovaheni wiira nlipihaciye ni ikuru, warohoni winyu;
commo, ni waamini Kristu akhale wanrimani winyu, nyu nnaryene oophuwa mitithari ni owiithipelaca nnifentoni,
wiira ncuweleehe weekhweli wamoca ni attakattifu othene, mwikhuvi mwaya, mwittayi mwaya, masancamelo aya ni wiiserya waya,
ni ncuwele nifento na Kristu nimpwaha ucuwelaca wothene, wiira oocareni Nluku mothene.
Akhale oovahiya yoole rina ikuru cothene wiira apanke citthu cothene coopwaha cinvekelehu atthuna cinoopuwelehu, toko ciryaya ikuru cawe ciri mwa hi;
mwa yooyo ukhale waarya nkereca ni mwa Kristu Yesu, ukati wothene woohimala. Ameni!
Mi nantthukiya, nlattu wa Apwiya, kinawulepelani wiira mweetteke eeyintthu toko Nluku ciwiihannyaweni.
Nkhale owiiyeviha ni upisa nrima, nvilelanaka ni nifento.
Mwaavye na ankhili othene wiira nsunke wo'salama umoca wo muNnepani.
Iri irutthu imoca ni Nnepa mmoca paahi, toko cikhanlenyu owiihaneliya ukhuluvela umoca ukhanlenyu owiihaninya;
ri Pwiya mmoca, uroromela umoca, upattiso mmoca;
Nluku mmoca ni athumwanaya atthu othene, nawaalamula othene, novara nteko mwa atthu othene ni ri mwa atthu othene.
Nanso nnema nno khula ntthu hovahiya, toko Kristu ciinryawe woophima ivahiya.
Phimaana yiiriyaka: Wawelawe wirimu, haakusa ootthukiya enci ni haakawela ivahiya atthu othene.
Maanaya wiira cani howela, hikhanle ciicammo yoole akhuruwile mpaka mittetthe cootepa wiiserya co vathi?
Ule khuruwile, phi yoole wenle uculu waya irimu, wiira acarihe citthu cothene.
Ni yooyo haavaha akina ukhala amitthenka, akina ukhala minapiyu, akina ukhala alalyeeri, akina ukhala ahakheli ni akina ayo aalimu,
aphavelaka waatthenkemanihaca atthu attakattifu, wiira avare nteko awe ni itekiye irutthu ya Kristu,
mpaka othene wanhalehu uphiya nlipa no'mooca no nroromelo ni uncuweleeha mwana a Nluku, mpaka uphiyera nlopwana eekhweli, vano ninaahala wunnuwa toko Kristu n'unlikanana uyo.
Commo, wiira nihikhale tho toko asaana, oorecihaciya miphantte cothene, nikakhaciyaka mmaceresere ni iphyoo co meetthuciho, ampankelelaya atthu oolavilavi wiira yaakosihe akhwaya.
Nanso nittharaka ikhweli ni nifento, nunnuwe wo citthu cothene mwa Kristu ri muru.
Mwa yooyo irutthu yothene, inari yoothotokanihiya ratta ni yooluttaninya mmapokottoni mwaya, toko ciirihiyaya wooluttanihiya khula mphantte, inawunnuwiha irutthu wiira itekiye wo nifento.
Phimaana, kinaahimyaca ila itthu ila ni kinaavaha usaahiti wa Apwiya wiira nheette tho toko cineettaya amalaponi akina ayo, yuupuwelaka citthu cithiru,
ooripelihiya ankhili, ari uttayi ni ukumi wa Nluku, nlattu woohicuwela itthu irinaya, ni utaruma mirima caya.
Yaayo, ahothatuwa oolocwaaka, akelakelaka ilema coohiloka, wiira ni ikhwilu caya nnyo apankeke citthu cothene coonanara.
Nanso nyu khamwiitthucihiye commo Kristu,
wakhala wiira nhotoko wiiwa ni mwa yooyo phiitthucihiyenyu, toko ciryaya ikhweli mwa Yesu.
Mwaha weekhuruwano, kinwiirelani munrule ntthu okhalayi, notankanyaa nlattu woottharatthara citthu coothepya,
ni mananna owuupuwela winyu akhale onaanano,
ni mummware ntthu onaanano, pattusiye nlikaniho na Nluku, nsariyani ni muttakattifuni ookhuma nkhwelini.
Phimaana nhiyeke wootha, nhimeryaneke ikhweli wo khula ntthu ni munnawe, kontha niri ayaayoru.
Nrusiyeke nanso nhikose; nihikele ncuwa nnarusiyene,
ni nhinvahe Sotwani nipuro.
Ule ennya, hinnye tho, nanso avare nteko, apankaka iri yoorera ni matata awe, wiira akhalane itthu yommeela ule hirina.
Nihikhume nuulumo noonanara wamalakuni winyu, nanso nikhale noorera, noolipiha nrima toko wamphaveliyaya, wiira avahiye nnema ale aneewa.
Nhicukulihe Nnepa Nttakattifu wa Nluku, yooyo utthitteliyenyu nihuku nowoopoliya.
Cukhaleni uttayi, icuku cothene, urusiya, uviruwa ni itwaana, makufuru ni coonanara cothene.
Nkhale oorerihana, o'kiriri, nlevelelanaka ntthu ni nkhwawe, toko Nluku culevelenlyaweni mwa Kristu.
Vano, nkhale oontakiha Nluku, toko asaana oofentiya.
Mweette nnifentoni toko Kristu wanifentilyawe, eevahereraka nlattu wa hi, ukhala yoovaha ni wiipanka isataka ya Nluku, yoonukhela womaana.
Nanso uluvaluva ni citthu cothene coonanara, atthuna uphavelaca, nnya citthu nnya cihiiwannyee warinyu, toko caaphwanenlyaya attakattifu.
Hata myaha coonanara, hata moolumo oohiloka, atthuna uvirusana, nnya citthu nnya khacuuphwanenleni. Nanso, nvare miteko coonsukuru Nluku.
Ncuweleke wiira khaawo hata puuta, atthuna nopanka itthu yoonanara, mayocivaciviya, commo unkhala waalapela anluku oohimaana, ncuwele wiira kharina mphantte wo'mwene wa Kristu ni wa Nluku.
Hikhale nohala wuuthepyani ni moolumo oohi itthu, kontha ni cennya citthu nnya, phimaana uviruwa wa Nluku wamorelaka asaana oohiiwa.
Phimaana, nhaalemalelane yaayo atthu ayo.
Kontha khalayi mwaari mpiphini, nanso vano nri waarya mwa Apwiya. Mweetteke toko asaana owaarya,
kontha nhokorokho aya waarya uri munnemani, nsariyani, ni mwiikhwelini,
nlawihaka ile iri yowaacivela Apwiya.
Cihikhale cowuurumelani miteko coohi mihokorokho ciri co mwipiphini, nanso mmwamwihe.
Kontha citthu cimpankaya mapuro owipithyaa, wakelelihaka uttonka, cinkhala citthu cowuuliha muru.
Nanso nnya citthu nnya cothene camwamwihiyaka ni waarya, cinaacuwannyaa, kontha waarya unacuwaneeha citthu cothene.
Phimaana wiiriyaka: Wunwe, we unrupa, ni wunwe iriyari ya atthu ookhwa, ni Kristu naahala wumwalela.
Phimaana mwiweheehe sana cineettenyu, nhikhale toko ohaankhili, nanso toko acuwelaci,
mphimaka ukati, kontha mahuku ayo vano ari oohiloka.
Phimaana nhikhale toko aphuku, nanso mwaavye ucuweleeha utthuna wa Apwiya.
Ni nhihapaliye ni ivinyu, immwiiha ihasara, nanso wucareni Nnepa.
Nhimeryaneke ni macipo a Nluku ni macipo o muNnepani, mwiipaka ni mwatthapelaka wanrimani winyu Apwiya,
ninsukuruku ukati wothene Nluku ihu ni athumwanihu, mwa ncina na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Mwiiwelelane ntthu ni nkhwawe munlemelihaka Kristu.
Athiyana, yeeweleleke awannyaya, toko Apwiya,
kontha nlopwana phi muru wa nthiyana, toko ciicammo Kristu ciryawe muru wo'kereca, yeeyo iri irutthu awe, ikhalenlyawe moopoli.
Toko ikereca cimwiiwelelaya Kristu, ciicammo athiyana yeeweleleke awannyaya mwa citthu cothene.
Alopwana, mwaafenteke amwaarinyu, toko Kristu wafentilyawe ikereca ni mwanene hovaha ukumi awe nlattu wo yeeyo
wiira attakattifihe, arerihaka ni arapihaka ni maasi o nuulumo nawe,
wiira eethoonyihere mwanene, ikereca yo waarya, yoohi mahirihiri, ni yoohi mahinyanki, ni hata itthu yoolikanana, nanso ittakattifu ni yoohipahuwa.
Ciicammo alopwana, yaafenteke amwaaraya toko irutthu aya iyo. Ule naafenta amwaarawe neefenta mwanene.
Kontha khaawo nothanya irutthu awe, nanso, naaliha n'unemecera, toko ciicammo Kristu cineerihawe ikereca;
kontha niri mphantte wo'rutthu awe.
Phimaana, nlopwana naahala waahiya athumwane na anumwane, nokowaaluttana amwaarawe, ni oyeeli ankhala irutthu imoca.
Yuulupale phi ila isiiri ila, nanso mi kimmwaca Kristu ni ikereca.
Vano kineera, khula ntthu aafente amwaarawe, toko waneefentawe mwanene, ni athiyana yaalemelihe awannyaya.
Nyu asaana, mweeweleleke athumwaninyu ni anumwaninyu mwa ncina na Apwiya, kontha iyo phi isariya.
Waalemelihe athumwana ni anumwana, nna phi nlamulo noopacera no nkhuluveliho,
wiira weette ratta ni ukhale nkumi mahuku menci mwiilaponi mu.
Ni nyu, mayapaapa, nhaaviruse asaanenyu, nanso mwaakhalaneke ratta mwaahimeryaka ni mweetthucihaka ikano ca Apwiya.
Vano nyu, ipottha, mmwiiwelele nkunya enyu o vathi va, munlemelihaka ni umoova ni nrima enyu wothene toko wammwiirihenyu Kristu.
Mmwiiwelele woohinvarela nteko nlattu womoona wiira nhiminye, nanso nvare nteko toko ipottha ya Kristu, mpankaka ni nrima enyu utthuna wa Nluku.
Munvarele nteko wo'raati, toko nteko wa Apwiya, woohivara toko nteko wa ntthu,
ncuwelaka wiira khula ntthu, apankaka itthu yoorera, naahala waakhelihiya na Apwiya, hata ikhale ipottha, atthuna ntthu phi ntthu.
Ni nyu, akunya, mwaapankeke ciicammo, toko ayo cinwiirihayani, nhiyaka woopopihaca, ncuwelaka wiira nkunya enyu ri nkunya o'pottha enyu, ni ri wirimu, ni uyo khanaahawulaniha atthu.
Woomalihera, asunnaka kinwiirelani wiira mwiilipihace mwa Apwiya ni ikuru coolipa waya.
Mmwareke ikaruma cothene ca Nluku, wiira mweemele woohittenkuwa, mwaananaka ulavilavi unnilupatthawe Sotwani,

Kontha ikhotto ehu khiri yo waanana irutthu ya ntthu, nanso naananeke alamuli, anamasintta, naananeke ahooleli o mpiphini ari yoola ukati ula, naananeke anakuru anhoolela minepa coonanara ciri mapuro o wirimu.
Phimaana, nkuseke ikaruma cothene ca Nluku, wiira nkhale woohittenkuwa naphiyaka nihuku noonanara, ni wiira nnatthemilene, nkhale woohittenkuwa.
Nhittenkuwe, nkhale owiitthukela nnyununi mwinyu ncako wo'khweli, ni mmware wakhakaacani winyu va nikula no'sariya,
ni mmware ikwakwatta nnyaani mmo, mwiitthenkemanihe wiira mwahimye nhupi woorera wo'salama.
Nkuse nkhikicero wo nroromelo, yooyo unhalenyu uttipihera myuupa cothene co mooro ca mwiinani.
Ciicammo, mmware ikofiyo yo'yuma yo woopwa, ni ikatana yo Nnepa, niri nuulumo na Nluku.
Nvekeleke nlompaka ukati wothene muNnepani, mmwehawehaka ni uwehererya wohenyeenya ni waavekelela attakattifu othene.
Nkivekelele ciicammo mi wiira kivahiye nuulumo nookhuluvelya, wanhalaka uhula malaku aka, wiira kuulume woolipiha nrima, wiira cicuwannyee isiiri co nhupi woorera,
yooyo ukhanlyaka mwaakhula, kitthukeliyaka mmakalaposo; wiira mwa Kristu kiwiiye kuulumacaka, toko mi waalikeleliyaka upanka.
Paahi, wiira nyu ncuwele mphantte aka ni itthu impankaka, Tikiku, munnaka oofentiya ni nkaviheri eekhweli a Apwiya, nawuhimeryani citthu cothene.
Phimaana mi kuuveleeliherakani uyo, wiira ncuwele makhalelo ehu ni upisiheni mirima cinyu.
Isalama ikhale ni nyu asunnaka ni nifento ni waamini, yookhuma wa Nluku athumwanihu ni wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Nnema akhalane othene ale anaafenta weekhweli Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Mi Paulu ni Timotiyu, ipottha ca Yesu Kristu, wa attakattifu othene mwa Yesu Kristu wamoca na ahooleli ni matiyakonu ari uFilipu:
Nnema ni isalama wa nyu, cinkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Vano kinaansukuru Nluku aka imaara cothene cinwupuwelakani.
Ukati unoovekelelakani nyu othene, kinkhala ootteeliya
nlattu woonitakaneelana mulalyani nhupi woorera ukhuma nihuku noopacera mpaka nna va.
Kihokupalela ukhala ikhweli wiira, yoole pacenre nteko womaana mwa nyu, naahala umalihera mpaka nihuku na Yesu Kristu.

Maana ila itthu ila iri yo'sariya uwupuwelelani nyu othene, kontha kihoohelani wanrimani waka ni nyu nhopanka mphantte muntekoni ukivahilyawe Nluku ni nnema nawe, muutthukiyani mwaka, mpaka caakihilyaka ni kithoonyenryaka nhupi woorera.
Kontha Nluku phiri saahiti muunukheliyani urinaka wa nyu othene, ni ikiriri ca Apwiya Yesu Kristu.
Vano mi kinaanvekela Nluku wiira nifento ninyu nno nuncererye cinene muucuwelacani ni mwaankhilini mothene,
