waacera wiira nthanle citthu comaana ni nkhale atthu eekhweli ni oohicovaciya mpaka nihuku na Kristu,
nnacanrene mihokorokho co'sariya cinhalawe uttittimiheriya n'ulapeliya Nluku mwa Yesu Kristu.
Asunnaka, kimphavela ncuwele wiira, citthu cikikhumelenle cihokavihera wiira nhupi woorera urwee uhoolo.
Kontha wamiithoni wo mayorontta o'hano ni atthu othene, uhocuweliya wiira kiri nkalaposo nlattu wa Kristu.
Nlattu wootthukiya waka, asunnaka enci aholipa irima n'ukhuluvela mwa Apwiya, anaalalya nuulumo woohoova.
Weekhweli akina ayo anonlalya munttimani ni nhaceni, nanso akina anonlalya Kristu ni nrima wo'raati.
Ale anlalya wo'raati, anlalya wo nifento, kontha ahocuwela wiira kiheesiya ukhala mwaakihi o nhupi woorera.
Nanso akina ayo anonlalya Kristu woohi ikhweli yaavyaka imphavelaya. Ayo anooniha toko anoncerera mahuviho o matthukeliyo aka.

Vano iyo irina maanani? Nanso imphavelaka iri yowiira, mananna phi mananna, hata ukhale yeeriyaru, atthuna pooti ukhala weekhweli, Kristu alalennye. Commo, nanlelo kinaatteeliya ni kinaavira kitteeliyaka.
Maana kinaacuwela wiira iyo inaakiwiihera utaphuliya, nlattu weeswali cinyu ni wookaviheriya ni Nnepa wa Yesu Kristu.

Toko commo, kinaawehererya n'uroromela wiira khiiwo inhala ukuulihiiha muru. Nanso, n'ukhuluvela wothene, Kristu nohala ukhala owunnuwihiya mwirutthuni mwaka, ukhuma khalayi mpaka nna va, pooti ukhala nkumi atthuna ukhwa.
Maana wa mi, ukumi ri Kristu, ni ukhwa iri ifayita.
Nanso wakhalaka wiira ukumi wo mwirutthuni unwiiha nhokorokho wo miteko caka, vano akincuwela yoothanla.
Vano miphantte coomiili cinaakaameleliha, kiphavelaka ukhuma wiira kakhale ni Kristu, maana iyo phi itthu yoorera venci.
Nanso nlattu wa nyu, itthu yoorerela iri ukhala mwirutthuni.
Kinarinene ula nkupalelo ula, kihocuwela wiira kinaahala ulokela ni nyu othene, waacera wiira nrwee uhoolo ni utteeliya munroromeloni,
wiira kawaaka tho nwo, wiittottopa winyu mwa Yesu Kristu wuncererye nlattu wawaka.

Nanso nnolamuliya paahi weetta toko ciinryaya nhupi woorera wa Yesu wiira, hata wanhalaka uwa wuwehani, pooti uhikhala ni nyu, kiiwe wiira nri nnepa mmoca, mwaanaka wamoca ni nroromelo no nhupi woorera.
Nhikhale owoopopihiya na ale anoovaanyihani. Wo yaayo uri nthoonyero wookwanyuwa, nanso wa nyu, uri nthoonyero wo woopwa, ni iyo inkhuma wa Nluku.
Maana nyu nhovahiya ihathuwa kahi paahi yoonkupali Kristu, nanso ciicammo yoohuva mwa yooyo.
Kontha nyu nnaana yeele ikhotto yaakoonnenyu kaanaka ile, nanlelo kineera kaanaka toko cineewenyu.
Vano, nyu nhaana nlipihero mwa Kristu, nhaana mpepeco wo nifento, nhaana umoca wo muNnepani, nhaana nnema ni woonelana uthunku.
Wakhala wiira cennyo citthu nnyo ciri ni nyu, nkwanihere utteeliya waka nwo, mwiiwananaka, nfentanaka, nkhalanaka umoca ni makhalelo mamoca paahi.
Nanso ihikhale impankenyu ni nttima atthuna ni wiittottopa, nanso mwiiyevihaka; khula ntthu amooneke nkhwawe ukhala muulupale.
Hikhale nowacawaca cirinawe paahi, nanso khula ntthu ciicammo awacawace ca akhwawe.
Nkhalane moopuwelo mamoca yaari mwa Yesu Kristu.
Uyo, narinene makhalelo a Nluku, khaakenle iyiinluku iyo,
nanso aheerula mwanene, akusaka makhalelo o'pottha, eelikanihaka na atthu.
Ni akhalaka toko ntthu, heeyeviha mwanene, akhalaka owiiwelela mpaka ukhwa, ukhwa wo wansalapani.
Phimaana Nluku homunnuwiha venci ni honvaha ncina niri waculu wo macina othene,
waacera wiira, mwa ncina na Yesu, akhoromele makutha othene ari wirimu ni vathi, ni vathi waya itthaya,
ni nlimi nothene nilaphulule wiira Yesu Kristu ri Pwiya, wiira Nluku Athumwane attittimihiye.
Vano, asunnaka oofentiya, toko cinkiiwelelenyu ukati wothene, woohikhala paahi kinari ni nyu, nanso venci venci wahiryaka ni nyu, nvarele nteko yoopwelo enyu ni woova ni uttettemela.
Maana Nluku phinvara nteko ukhuma muutthunani mpaka muupankani mwinyu toko cintthunawe.
Mpanke cothene woohittokutta ni woohaanihana,
waacera wiira nkhale oohicovaciya ni eekhweli, asaana a Nluku oohootheryaciya iriyari ya atthu oohapusiya ni oorimela, wanaaryenyu iriyari aya toko itthoottwa wammwaleelaya mwiilaponi,

nvarecesaka nuulumo neekumi. Mwapankaka commo, kinaahala wiittottopa nlattu wawinyu nyu naphiyaka nihuku na Kristu, maana iyo inthoonyera wiira, wiikurumica waka ni nteko aka wothene khunakhala wo pure.
Hata kivahereriye toko isataka wiira kitakaniheriye ni isataka yo nroromelo ninyu mwa Nluku, mi kinaatteeliya n'utthapa ni nyu othene.
Phimaana ntteeliye ni ntthape ni mi, nlattu wo yeeyo.
Vano mwa Apwiya Yesu, kinaakhuluvela wiira kuuveleelihereni Timotiyu, wiira ni mi kitteeliye, nlattu woocuwela ihapari cinyu nnyo.
Maana uyo khaawo nonlikaniheraka, oorera uwacawaca makhalelo enyu;
kontha othene anwacawaca ciri cawaya paahi woohikhala ciri ca Yesu Kristu.
Nanso nnaacuwela makhalelo awe ni civanryawe nteko ni mi mulalyani nhupi woorera, toko mwana na athumwane.
Phimaana kinaawehererya wuuveleeliherani Timotiyu, kacuwelelaka inhala ukiiraneela.
Nanso mwa Apwiya kinaakhuluvela wiira ni mi kinaawa woohipica.
Kihoonela wiira wanaarera wuveleeliherani Epaforotitu, munnaka, ni nkhunanaka o muntekoni ni onkhottoni, yooyo nrumilenyu uwaana nnye caakihaleela.
Maana naanukheliya ni nyu othene ni naacukula nlattu woocuwela nyu wiira aanwerennya.
Ni khweli, aanwerennya mpaka uhala vakani ukhwa, nanso Nluku homoonela ikiriri, ni woohikhala uyo paahi, nanso ni mi, wiira kihikhalane masukuli waculu masukuli.
Phimaana kuuveleeliherakani wowaakuvya, wiira wanhalenyu umoona tho, ntteeliye, ni mi akiwukuwe masukuli ayo.
Vano mwa Apwiya, mmwaakhelele n'utteeliya wothene, ni mwaattittimihe atthu toko ula.
Maana nlattu wo miteko ca Kristu, aahanle vakani ukhwa, woohiwacerera ukumi awe, waacera wiira alikanihe nteko wahaleela wookikavihera wahooryenyu.
Yoomalihera asunnaka, ntteeliye mwa Apwiya. Akintoomwa uwantikhelani citthu cimoca cennyo, kontha nno nkavihero nno niri nlipihero ninyu.
Mwiikasoope na ale ankhala toko alapwa, ratta na anattiini owootha, mwiikasoope na ale ankhanyereriha icantto!
Maana anacantto eekhweli phi hi, ninonlapela Nluku muNnepani, nineettottopa mwa Yesu Kristu, ni khaninkhuluvela co'rutthu,
unookhalaru wiira mi ciicammo kahaana ukhuluvela co'rutthu. Wakhalaka wiira haawo noopuwela ukhuluvela cennyo, utepa n'upwaha mi.
Kuulihiye icantto nihuku nonanaane, unethi wo'Sirayeli, nihimo na Pencamii, nheperi eekhweli, muNlamuloni kaari nfarisi,
toko oovarecesa, kaari mayowoomolaniha ikereca; toko isariya iri muNlamuloni, kaari oohicovaciya.
Nanso itthu yoonelaka wiira yo'fayita, nna va, kinoona ukhala yoorihya nlattu wa Kristu.

Ni khweli, kinaalikelela ukhala citthu cothene coorihya, kontha waacuwela Apwiya aka Yesu Kristu, iri itthu yuulupale woopwaha nnya citthu nnya. Nlattu wawawe yooyo kihoriha citthu cothene ni kinaalikelela ukhala ikokhola, waacera wiira kimphwanye Kristu
ni kiphwanyinye mwa yooyo, woohikhala isariya caka cinkhuma muNlamuloni, nanso cinkhuma munroromeloni mwa Kristu, cicuweliyaka ukhala, isariya cinkhuma wa Nluku mwa nroromelo.
Kimphavela uncuwela Kristu ni ikuru co wunwelela wawe, kipankaka mphantte muhuvani mwawe, kithatuwaka toko uyo muukhwani mwawe
wiira ni yooyo nkhuluvelo uyo, ni mi kunwelelihiye muukhwani.
Kahi wiira mi kihophiya ukhomoni, atthuna kihokhala oomalela urera, nanso kinaapwaherera utthimakaca wiira kiphwanye yeeyo ikhalenlyaka nantthukiya a Yesu Kristu.
Asunnaka, mi akineehelelela wiira kihophwanya, nanso itthu imoca kinaapanka; kiliyalaka citthu cihiilyaka uttuli ni kaakuvelaka ciri uhoolo waka,
kinaapwaherera ukhomoni, wiira kiphwanye itthuvo wirimu yiihaneliyaka ni Nluku mwa Yesu Kristu.
Vano hi othene niri akristu ookhomaala, ninlamuliya ukhalana ala moopuwelo ala, ni moopuwelaka mananna makina, Nluku naahala wuucuwelihani.
Nanso, nrwee neette toko ciryaya yeeyo iphwanyilehu.
Vano asunnaka, nkhale mayokitakiha ile ikoonenlenyu, ni mwaaweheehe atthu aneettela mananna yuulakihenrehuni.
Maana, toko cuhimenryakani imaara cinci, mpaka nna va kinawuhimeryani kunlaka wiira, ahaawo enci ari toko eenani o nsalapa wa Yesu.
Vano imalelo aya uri urimela, nluku aya ri napwiipwi, ni ansamela citthu cowuuliha muru, maana anoopuwela citthu co nttuniyani paahi.
Nanso hi niri atthu o wirimu, wonwo unommwehereryehu Moopoli, Pwiya Yesu Kristu.
Yooyo nohala upittinkusa irutthu cihu cookenkennya, wiira cithatuwe toko ciryaya irutthu awe yo waarya, atthumiriki ikuru cirinawe coolamulela citthu cothene.
Phimaana, asunnaka oocivela ni oofentiya, utteeliya waka ni ikhwerempa aka kineera, toko ciicale nkhale oolipa mwa Apwiya.
Kinawulepelani Evotiya ni Sintike wiira nkhalace owiiwanana mwa Apwiya.

Vano kinawulepela we nkhunanaka eekhweli, wiira waakavihere ala athiyana ala, kontha ahokivarana mi nteko woolalya nhupi woorera, wamoca Kelemente, ni akaviheri akinaku, yantikhiye macina aya nliivuruni yo'kumi.
Ntteeliye mwa Apwiya ukati wothene, kinawuhimeryani tho wiira ntteeliye.
Makhalelo enyu o nifento ayo akhale owoonnya na atthu othene. Apwiya ari wakhiviru.
Ihikhale itthu yowuukukureehani, nanso mwa cothene cinvekelenyu, cikhale coocuweliya ni Nluku muuswalini mwinyu, n'usukuru.
Ni nnema na Nluku, nimpwaha ucuwelaca wothene, ninaahala usunka mirima cinyu ni moopuwelo enyu ayo mwa Yesu Kristu.

Yoomalihera asunnaka, yothene iri yeekhweli, yothene iri yoohisimya, yothene iri yo'sariya, yothene iri yoorera, yothene iri yo nifento, yothene iri yoottottopeliya, yakhala wiira iri yomaana atthuna yoottittimihya, yeeyo phinlamuliya ukhala mmoopuweloni mwinyu mmo.
Cennyo ciitthucilenyu, caakhenlenyu, cikiiwilenyu ni cikoonnenyu, mpanke cennyo, ni Nluku o nnema naahala ukhala ni nyu.
Vano, kihotteeliya venci mwa Apwiya, ukhala wiira nhokuupuwela tho; wo khweli mwahaana ininya ni mi nanso khamwaarina nafasi.
Nanso akinoolumacera commo nlattu woohikhalana, maana kiheetthuca utteeliya ni itthu irinaka.
Kinaacuwela uhuva ni kinaacuwela upuha. Mananna othene ni citthu cothene, kiri owiitthucene, ukhalana atthuna uvoliya itala, winciveliya atthuna uthwennya.
Kinawooryaniha citthu cothene mwa ule nokilipihera.
Nanso, nhopanka ratta nlattu woopanka mphantte mmasukulini mwaka.
Ni ciicammo, nyu afilipu nnaacuwela wiira, wupaceroni nhupi woorera, waakhumilyaka uMasetoniya, khayaariwo hata ikereca imoca ikivahile ni waakhela, ari nhikhanle nyu paahi.
Maana imaara cinci, mwahokiveleelihera kinari uTesalonika ile yaakihaleela.
Ni kuhimwena wiira kaaphavela coovahiya, nanso kimphavela wiira nhokorokho enyu uyo wuncerere itthuvo enyu.
Nanso kihaakhela cothene ni kihaana yootosa; kihocara, waakhenlyaka ni Epaforotitu iveleelihilenyu, toko itthu yoonukhela ratta ni itthuvo cooncivela venci Nluku.
Nluku aka naahala wuuvahani cimphavelenyu cothene, toko ciryaya mihakhu cawe nnyo ni waarya mwa Kristu Yesu.
Vano, Nluku ehu ni Athumwanihu, attittimihiye ukati wothene. Ameni!
Kihaasalamiha attakattifu othene mwa Yesu Kristu. Asunnaka ari ni mi anawusalamihani.
Attakattifu othene anawusalamihani, venci venci ale ari itthoko ya Sesari.
Nnema na Apwiya Yesu Kristu nikhale ni nyu othene. Ameni!
Paulu, mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu, wootthuna wa Nluku, ni munnihu Timotiyu,
wa attakattifu ni asunna ookhuluvelyaa mwa Kristu, ari uKolosi: Nnema ni isalama wa nyu, cinkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu.
Ninaansukuru Nluku Athumwane Pwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, ukati wothene unoovekelelehuni,
toko ciiwilehu nroromelo ninyu mwa Yesu Kristu ni waafenta winyu attakattifu othene,
nlattu wo nkhuluvelo usunkeriyenyu wirimu. Yooyo wiiwilenyu wupaceroni wo nuulumo neekhweli no nhupi woorera,
wuuphwanyileni nyu, toko cimwareenlyaya nttuniyani mothene. Unaahala wiima mihokorokho ni wunnuwa, ciicammo phineerannyaya mwa nyu, ikhumelo nihuku niiwilenyu ni ncuwelaka weekhweli nnema na Nluku.
Nyu mwiitthucile ni Epafra, nkhunanihu oofentyaa, ri nanteko eekhweli a Kristu wa nyu.
Yooyo nihimenrye nifento ninyu no Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Phimaana, hata hi ikhumelo nihuku nimwiiwilehu, khaneemelenle wuuvekelelani n'ulepela wiira wuucareni ucuweleeha wotthuna wa Nluku, mwaankhilini ni ucuwelaca wo munnepani.
Commo, nnaahala weettela utthuna wa Apwiya, toko cinaacivelaya, nkhalanaka mihokorokho co miteko cothene comaana, munnuwaka ni muncuwelaka Nluku.
Ciicammo ninaawuvekelelani wiira nkhale oolipiheriya ni ikuru cothene, toko ciryaya ikuru co waarya wawe, wiira mwa cothene nkhale oopisa nrima woohihiyerera, n'utteeliya,
mwaasukuruku Apaapa, anipankile oophwanelannya waakhela coohiyeriya ca attakattifu wumweneni wo waarya.
Uyo honikumiha mpiphini ni honirweeha wumweneni wa Mwanawe oofentiya.
Nlattu wo'phome awe uyo, nihaakhela woopwa, ukhanle uleveleliya itampi cihu.
Kristu phiri oolattana ni Nluku hinoonnya, muulupale o citthu cothene cipattusiye.
Kontha mwa yooyo citthu cothene cihopattusiya, ciri wirimu ni vathi, cowoonnyaa ni cohoonnyaa, umwene ni ikuru, iyuulupale ni ulamuli. Nluku hopattusa cothene mwa Kristu; cothene cipattuseriye yooyo.
Uyo nenne nenne ri yooyo, citthu cothene cihinapattusiya. Mwa yooyo cothene cihaawo.
Uyo ri muru wo'rutthu iri ikereca. Yooyo phiri oopacera, ntthaara mwa atthu ookhwa, wiira mwa citthu cothene akhale oopacera.
Kontha commo phaancivenlyaya Nluku, wiira mwa Kristu, ikhale iyuulupale awe yothene,
wiira napankilene nnema ni iphome awe wansalapani, aatanihe citthu cothene, ukhuma ciri mwiilaponi mpaka ciri wirimu.
Ni nyu ciicammo, khalayi mwaari uttayi ni Nluku ni mwaari eenani nlattu wo moopuwelo enyu wo miteko cinyu coonanara.
Vano howaatanihani ni irutthu awe, nlattu wo nookhwa awe, waacera wiira oothoonyihereni wamiithoni wawe nnari attakattifu, oohikosi ni oohicovaciya,
mwakhalaka nanlelo oothipelyaa ni oohittinka munroromeloni, nhiihiyerere uhapusiya munwehereryoni wo nhupi woorera wiiwilenyu ni ulaleeriyaya atthu othene o vathi, yooyo, ukipankile nrumeyi mi Paulu.
Vano kinaatteeliya mmahuvihoni mwaka nlattu wawinyu ni kinaakwanihera inhaleela mmahuvihoni mwa Kristu mwirutthuni mwaka, nlattu wo'rutthu awe iri ikereca.
Kihokhala nrumeyi o'kereca toko Nluku cikivahilyawe nteko nlattu wawinyu nyu, wiira kilalyee nuulumo na Nluku woohihiya itthu,
isiiri yaavithiye myakha cinci ni maloko maloko ene, nanso vano ihothoonyiheriya wa attakattifu awe.
Kontha Nluku hotthuna waathoonyera ciryaya nhakhu wo waarya wo yeela isiiri ila iriyari ya amalaponi, maanaya, Kristu mwa nyu, ri uwehererya wo waarya.
Yooyo nonlalyehu hi, naalopolaka ni naasomihaka na ankhili atthu othene, wiira naathoonyihere atthu othene anari oomalela mwa Kristu.
Phimaana kiikurumicaka nlattu wo yeeyo, kaanaka ikhotto toko ciryaya ikuru cawe cimmara nteko mwa mi.
Vano unaakicivela wiira ncuwele cineeraka wo waana ikhotto nlattu wawinyu nyu, ni alawutiseya, ni ale ahinaayaka woonanana.
Mi kinawiikurumica wiira mirima caya nnyo cilipiheriye, yaataanihinye nnifentoni ni aphwanye nhakhu woocuwelaca isiiri ya Nluku, ri Kristu.
Mwa yooyo, cihovithiya mihakhu cothene ca ankhili ni ucuwelaca.
Kinoohimeryani commo, wiira hikhale ntthu owuthepyani ni moolumo ookhala toko omaana.
Hata kinoohikhalaru ni nyu mwirutthuni, nanso munnepani kiri ni nyu, kitteeliyaka ni koonaka meetthenkemanihero enyu ni makhalelo enyu ayo munroromeloni mwa Kristu.
Vano, toko cimwaakhelenlenyu Pwiya Yesu Kristu, ciicammo mweette mwa yooyo,
nkhale oomela mitithari mwa yooyo, nthipelyaka ni nlipiheriyaka munroromeloni, toko ciitthucihiyenyu, ntepaka unsukuru Nluku.
Mwiikasoope, waacera wiira hikhale nohala wuutthukani ni miitthuciho coohi ifayita ni coothepya, toko ikano ca atthu ni ilema co nttuniyani, cihiri ca Kristu.
Maana iyuulupale yothene ya Nluku iri mwirutthuni mwa Yesu.
Ciicammo mwa yooyo nri oomalela. Uyo phiri muru wa anakuru ni wa alamuli othene.
Kontha mwa yooyo phuulihiyenyu, woohikhala wuulihiya ni matata, nanso uhiya citthu co mwirutthuni, wonwo phiri wuula mwa Kristu.
Nhosikhiya wamoca ni Uyo muupattisoni, ciicammo mwa Yooyo nhonwelela munroromeloni mo'kuru ca Nluku, amunwelelihile mwa atthu ookhwa.
Vano nyu mwaari ookhwa ntampini mwinyu ni oohuula mwirutthuni mwinyu, Nluku hoovahani ukumi wamoca ni Kristu. Uyo hoolevelelani makosa enyu othene;
ni hofutta iwarakha yo'kophi ni malamulo aya yaakhanyererihiyehu utthara. Uyo homaliha yeeyo ikophi iyo n'ukhomela wansalapani;
aakutuphulaka anakuru ni alamuli, ahaalamwiha waanamwincini ni ahaatthema wansalapani.
Vano, hikhale nohala wuuhukhumuni nlattu wo iyolya ni yoowurya, atthuna nihuku no'sikuhuulu, atthuna woonnya wo mweeri, atthuna ntivela.
Maana cothene nnyo ciri irunku yo citthu caahala wiirannyaa, nanso ikhweli iri mwa Kristu.
Hikhale nohala wuuhuruwacani akhalaka toko owiiyeviha, aalapelaka ancelo. Ayo anttonka citthu coonilyaya ni ucuwelaca waya wo mwirutthuni unawaattottopiha.
Atthu toko ala, ahottalivana ni Kristu uri muru. Yooyo phinliha irutthu yothene, ni phinluttaniha, mpaka wunnuwa toko cintthunawe Nluku.
Wakhalaka wiira nhokhwa ni Kristu nlattu wo'lema co nttuniyani, nnottharelani tho ikano caya, toko nanlelo nri ananttuniyani, aneera:
Nhipanke ila, nhilawihe ile, nhikwanye iyo!
Maana cothene nnya catthumiriyaka, cinaamala toko malamulo ni miitthuciho ca atthu.
Kontha nnya citthu nnya cinkhala toko cimmwaana ucuwelaci, toko ittiini, wiiyeviha wo wootha n'uwacawaca venci irutthu, nanso wohoorya utthema coociva co mwirutthuni mwaya.
Vano, toko cunwelenlenyu ni Kristu, mwaavye citthu co wirimu wunkomilyawe Kristu, moono wo nlopwana wa Nluku.
Muupuwele citthu co wirimu, woohikhala ciri vathi.
Kontha nhokhwa, ni ukumi inyu uvithiye wamoca ni Kristu, mwa Nluku.
Vano Kristu, ri ukumi inyu, wanhalawe wiithoonyihera, ni nyu ciicammo nnaahala uthoonyiheriya wamoca ni yooyo munttittimihoni mwawe.
Vano mwiive makhalelo enyu o nttuniyani: uluva, iharamu, wunlela citthu coohiloka, ucivelaciya coohiloka ni isooyo, iyo ineehaninya waalapela anluku akina.
Nlattu wo cennya citthu nnya uviruwa wa Nluku phimmwaya wo yaale oohanyuriha.
Maana cennya citthu nnya, ni nyu pheettelenyu ni phaari makhalelo enyu ukati uvinre.
Nanso nna va, nkutuphule cothene nnya: urusiya, uviruwaca, woonelana nttima, uveeha ni wuulumaca coohiloka.
Nhithepyane ntthu ni nkhwawe, maana nyu nhorula meettelo ni makhalelo enyu okhalayi.
Vano nhowara meettelo onaanano ari oopittinkuliya muucuwelacani, anlattaananaka ule mpattusile.
Mwa yooyo, khaawo nkereku atthuna nyuta, owuula atthuna oohuula, khatooro ni anammawaani, ipottha ni ootaphuwa, nanso Kristu ri othene mwa citthu cothene.
Vano nyu, toko cirinyu oothanliya ni Nluku, attakattifu ni oofentiya, mwiiwarihe ikiriri, nkhale eemaani, owiiyeviha, oorera nrima ni oovilela.
Nvilelaneke ntthu ni nkhwawe ni nlevelelaneke, akhalaka wiira haawo koseriye ni nkhwawe. Toko Apwiya culevelenlyayani, ciicammo ni nyu nlevelelaneke.
Venci venci, nikhale nifento, kontha nenno nifento nno phinluttaniha cinene citthu cothene.
Vano nnema na Kristu nihoolele mirima cinyu, toko ciihaninyenyu mwa irutthu imoca, ni nkhale oosukuru.

Nuulumo na Kristu nikhale venci ni nyu, mwiitthucihanaka, ni nlakanaka ntthu ni nkhwawe na ankhili othene, munttittimihaka Nluku, ntthapaka ni macipo, ni mwiipaka icipo co munnepani, nsukuruku wanrimani winyu.
Ni yothene impankenyu ni moolumo, atthuna ni miteko, mpanke mwa ncina na Apwiya Yesu, ni mwa yooyo munsukuruku Nluku Apaapa.
Nyu athiyana, mweewelele awannyu, toko cimphwanelanaya mwa Apwiya.
Nyu alopwana, mwaafente amwaarinyu ni nhaarusanane.
Asaana, mwa cothene, mweewelele mayathumwaninyu, maana commo, phinaacivelaya Apwiya.
Nyu mayapaapa, nhaanyoonyihe asaanenyu, wiira ahivolole.
Nyu ipottha, mwa cothene, mmwiiwelele nkunya enyu o mwiilaponi mu, woohinrumeela paahi mwamoonaka, wiira mwaacivelihe atthu, nanso munrumeele ni nrima wowiiyeviha, moovaka Apwiya.
Vano cothene cimpankenyu, mpankeke ni nrima enyu wothene, toko nnaapankela Apwiya, woohikhala toko nnaapankela atthu,
ncuwelaka wiira nnohala uvahiya na Apwiya, itthuvo yoohiyeriya. Pwiy'enyu phi Kristu, yooyo nonrumeelenyu.
Maana ule nopanka itthu yoohi isariya, ciicammo nohala waakhela yoohi isariya, kontha Nluku kharina nthanlo.
Nyu akunya, nwacawace ipottha cinyu wo'sariya ni woophwanelelya, ncuwelaka wiira ni nyu ciicammo nhaana Nkunya enyu wirimu.
Nkhanyerere uvekela, nronttaka ni munsukuruku Nluku.
Ni ciicammo nnivekelele hi, wiira Nluku anihulele nkhora wo nuulumo ni nikumihere woonene isiiri ca Kristu, nlattu wa yooyo phitthukeliyaka.
Nkivekelele wiira kilalyee cennyo isiiri nnyo urattene toko cimphwanelaya wuulumaca.
Nkhaleke a ankhili na ale oohaamini; ntthumiriki ratta ukati urinenyu.
Ukati wothene moolumelo enyu akhaleke oociva toko oolukiya ni maakha, wiira ncuwele woomwaakhula khula ntthu.
Vano Tikiku, munnaka oofentiya, ni nanteko ookhuluvelyaa, ni nkhunanaka mwa Apwiya, naahala wuuhimeryani mananna aryaka.
Yooyo, kinooveleeliherani wiira ncuwele mananna arihu ni ntthukuwe munrimani mwinyu.
Munkwahani mwawe mmo, kinawuveleeliherani Onesimu, munnihu ookhuluvelyaa ni oofentyaa, ri mmoca wa nyu. Ayo anaahala wuhimeryani cothene cinnikhuna uno.
Nawusalamihani Aristarku, nantthukiya nkhunanaka, ni Marku, munnawe Parnapee. Vano nyu nholeeheriya wiira oophwanyakani Marku, mmwaakheleleke.
Ciicammo nawusalamihani Yesu, neehaninya Yustu. Yaayo araru ayo phiri ayuta ankikavihera mi uvara nteko wo'mwene wa Nluku. Yaayo, phiri mpepeco aka.
Nawusalameehani Epafra, ri awinyu, ni nrumeyi a Yesu Kristu, yooyo neekurumica ukati wothene oovekelelakani, wiira nkhale nanlelo oolipa ni ookupaleeha utthuna wothene wa Nluku.
Wa yooyo, kinaanvahera usaahiti wiira khweli nawuwacawacani, ni ale ari uLawutiseya ni uHiyerapoli.
Nawusalameehani oofentyaa Luka, tothoro oovoniha, ni ciicammo Temasi.
Isalamu asunna o'Lawutiseya, ni Ninfa, ni ikereca iri wapuwani wawe.
Vano wanhalaya usominya iwarakha ila iriyari inyu, mpanke mananna owiira, ciicammo yasominye ukereca ya alawutiseya, ni ile ikhumile uLawutiseya nsome ni nyu.
Ciicammo munhimerye Arkipu wiira awacawace nteko wa Apwiya waakhelenlyawe.
Paahi, nnya isalamu nnya co ntata naka mi Paulu. Muupuwelele utthukiya waka. Nnema nikhale ni nyu. Ameni.
Mi Paulu, Sila ni Timotiyu, nantikhelaka ikereca ya annatesalonika, mwa Nluku Athumwane ni mwa Apwiya Yesu Kristu: Nnema ni isalama wa nyu.
Ukati wothene ninaansukuru Nluku nlattu wa nyu, nuuhelakani mmavekeloni mwihu woohihiyerera.
Ninaawuupuwelelani wariyari wa Nluku Athumwanihu, nlattu wo miteko co nroromelo ninyu, wo nteko wo nifento ni nkhuluvelo wo nwehereryo mwa Pwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Ninaacuwela, anna oofentiya ni Nluku, wiira uyo hoothanlani,
maana nhupi ihu woorera khuwile wa nyu nnuulumoni paahi, nanso ciicammo ni ikuru, ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, ni weekhweli. Nyu nnaacuwela makhalelo yaarihu wariyari winyu, nlattu wowufentani.
Ni nyu nhothatuwa mayonitakiha ni mayowaatakiha Apwiya, mwaakhelaka nuulumo mmahuvihoni, n'utteeliya muNnepani Nttakattifu.
Maana nhokhala nthoonyero wa aamini o'Masetoniya ni wAkaya.

Kontha, nlattu wa nyu, nihoruma nuulumo na Apwiya, woohikhala uMasetoniya ni wAkaya paahi, nanso nroromelo ninyu nno mwa Nluku nihomwaryeela mapuro othene, mpaka uhikhalana tho hi isukuli yo wuulumaca itthu phi itthu.
Maana atthu o mapuro othene phinlalyaa mananna ciinrehu wo waakheleliya ni cinrenyu wonturuwela Nluku mwaahiyaka anluku mpaka unrumeela Nluku nkumi ni eekhweli,
n'unwehererya mwanawe ukhuma wirimu, yooyo amunwelelihilyawe mwa atthu ookhwa, acuweliyaka ukhala Yesu, nonoopola ittaruso immwa.
Maana nyu anna, nnaacuwela wiira ciphiilehu mpaka warinyu kuhimwe wo pure.
Nanso ninahuvilene n'ukukureehiya uFilipu, toko cincuwelenyu, mwa Nluku ehu, naanookhalaru iriyari yo'khotto yuulupale, naholipa irima yowiira nuulalyereni nhupi woorera wa Nluku.
Maana ulalya wihu nwo khawaari wo woothiya, hata woohiirya ni hata woovirikannya;
nanso, toko ciheleliyehu ikhweli ni Nluku wiira nikhuluveliye uvahiya wo nhupi ule, vano ninoolumaca woohikhala wiira nittottopeliye na atthu, nanso ni Nluku nolawiha mirima cihu.
Toko cincuwelenyu, hi khaninatoko wuuthepyani ni khaninapanka mananna oocivaciviya, Nluku phi saahiti.
Ni khaniphavenle uttottopeliya na atthu, atthuna ni nyu atthuna na akina. Hata wanooniphwanelaru toko cirihu arumeyi a Kristu, wiira nnihephele.
Hi naheeyeviha wariyari winyu, toko cimpankawe namanantthu na asaanawe.
Vano hi, toko ciinrehu wo wutthunani, kuhimweni wiira nuulalyenreni paahi nhupi wa Nluku, nanso nihotthuna uvaha ukumi ehu, nlattu wo wufentani.
Maana nyu, anna, nnaalipelela irima nteko uvanrehu mpaka unikhulumula, maana nivarak'ono uhiyu n'uthana, wiira nihuusankiheni, phaalalyehu nhupi wa Nluku.
Nyu ni Nluku nri asaahiti o makhalelo ehu o'kiriri, omaana ni oohicovaciya, nyu amwaamini va.
Ni nyu, nnaacuwela wiira wo khula ntthu ninompanka toko thumwana ntthu cinaapankawe asaanawe,
ninawuhimeryani, wuupepecani n'uwoopereryani, wiira nkhale ni mananna omaana anoncivela Nluku, wiihanneni wumweneni wawe ni nttittimiho.

Phimaana, hi khaninhiyerera unsukuru Nluku. Maana nnaakhenlene nuulumo niniiwilenyu, niri na Nluku, mwaakhelenle woohikhala toko nuulumo na atthu, nanso, weekhweli, niri nuulumo na Nluku, nenno ninvara nteko woorera mwa nyu nnokupali va.
Kontha nyu asunnaka, nri mayotakiha o'kereca ca Nluku ciri uYuteya mwa Kristu Yesu. Maana ciicammo nhohuva, wo mphantte wa akhwinyu, cennyo citthu nnyo, na ayo cihuvilyaya mwa ayuta.
Yaayo, yeevile Apwiya Yesu ni minapiyu, ni ciicammo anoomolanihacile, ni oohinciveliha Nluku ni ari eenani a atthu othene,
mpaka anaanikukuvaniha moolumanelo amalaponi wiira ayo yoopwe, mpaka wacanryaya itampi caya. Nanso wuumaleloni, uviruwa wa Nluku, ale wahaaphwanya.
Vano hi, asunnaka, niri oomwalanihinya wo'kati vakani, wamiithoni winyu, woohikhala wo wanrimani, ninaapanka ikuru cinene, woophavela wiira niwe naawooneni iwacihi.
Phimaana, nahotthuna wiira nuuphwanyeni, venci venci mi Paulu, woohikhala ikwaha imoca paahi, nanso imaara cinci, nanso Sotwani honikukuryeehela ikwaha iyo.
Nyu nri nkhuluvelo ehu, n'utteeliya wihu, ni ikhwerempa ehu yo nttittimiho wamiithoni wa Yesu Kristu wammwawe. Khannakhala phi nyu?
Khweli, phi nyu waarya wihu n'utteeliya wihu!
Phimaana, nihooryaka tho uvilela, niholakela uhala veekhehu wAtena,
ni nihonveleeliha munnihu Timotiyu, nkaviheri a Nluku munhupini mwa Kristu, wiira oolipihereni ni oopisiheni nrima munroromeloni mwinyu mmo,
wiira hikhale nohala usanka nlattu wo marikariko. Maana nyu nnaacuwela wiira yeeyo phithanleliyehu.
Maana, ukati waarihu ni nyu, nahoohimeryani wahinaya, wiira ninaahala ucukulihaciya, ni khweli, yeeyo phikhumelenle, ni nyu nnaacuwela.
Phimaana, wahooryanihilyaka nanlelo wuwehereryani, phirumilyaka waaviya ucuweliya ciryaya nroromelo ninyu nno, koovaka ulawihiya nyu ni mayottehatteha, ni nteko ehu ukhalaka woohi ifayita.

Nanso vano, waturuwilyawe Timotiyu akhumaka iriyari inyu, honiwiihera ihapari coorera co nroromelo ninyu ni nifento ninyu, ni cinkhalenyu nnuupuwelelaka woorera ukati wothene ni mphavelaka ni nyu unoona, toko hi ciicammo wa nyu.
Ciicammo, asunnaka, unookhalaru ukukureehaciya ni misankiho, nihopepeciya mwa nyu nlattu wo nroromelo ninyu,
maana nna va niri ratta, nlattu woocuwela wiira nyu nri mwa Apwiya.
Vano ninhala usukuruni wa Nluku nlattu wa nyu, nlattu wotteeliya urinehu ukhumaka mwa nyu wamiithoni wa Nluku ihu?
Hi ninaaswali uhiyu n'uthana, wo'kuru cinene, wiira niwooneni na asinene n'ulokihera itafawuti co nroromelo ninyu.
Paahi, yooyo Nluku ihu uyo ni Athumwanihu, ni Yesu Apwiy'ehu, anihoolele iphiro mpaka warinyu.
Ni Apwiya awunnuwiheni n'uwuncererani nnifentoni ntthu ni nkhwawe ni wa atthu othene, ni ciicammo hi ni nyu,
wiira nrima enyu ucuwannye muttakattifuni, wohootheriya itthu, wamiithoni wa Nluku Athumwanihu, wanwaya Apwiy'ehu Yesu, na attakattifu awe othene.
Woomalihera, asunnaka, hi ninawuvekelani ni wuulipiherani wiira, mwa Apwiya Yesu, toko cinrenyu wowaakhela miitthuciho cihu cinoncivela Nluku, mpanke tho nanlelo ciicammo.
Maana nri nhina wo miitthuciho cuvahilehuni wo mphantte wa Apwiya Yesu.
Khweli uno ph'utthuna wa Nluku: uttakattifu inyu, uri wowiira nhuluwe uluva.
Khula ntthu wa nyu acuwele ukhalana irutthu awe woorera ni wo'hisima,
woohilalusa toko amalaponi ahinoncuwela Nluku.
Toko commo, hikhale nohala unrusiha n'umweetta uttuli munnawe; maana, nhina wo citthu coohiloka toko nnyo, khampa cuhimenryehuni umpaceroni woohuuvithani, Apwiya ph'anene ikuhukuhu.
Nluku khaniihanenle wiira nikhale aharamu, nanso attakattifu.
Phimaana, ule nokhotta nnya citthu nnya, khanonkhottela ntthu, nanso nonkhottela Nluku, yooyo noovahani Nnepa awe Nttakattifu.
Vano nhina wo mwaha wo nifento, pooti nyu uhantikheliya, kontha nyu nheetthucihiya ni Nluku wiira nnolamuliya ufentana ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Ni khweli nneera mpankanaka ciicammo ntthu ni nkhwawe uMasetoniya wothene. Phimaana asunnaka, mpankeke tho nanlelo ciicammo.
Mphaveleke wiira nkhale oomaalyaa, nsunkaka ile iri yawinyu n'uvara nteko ni matata enyu, toko culamulenlehuni,
wiira nkhale ooloka na ale ari uta ni wiira ihuuthweeni itthu.
Vano asunnaka, hi khanintthuna wiira nhicuwele nlahanya wa ale anrupa, wiira nhicukulace toko akina ahirina nwehereryo ayo.
Maana, nakupaliki wiira Yesu hokhwa ni honwelela, ciicammo Nluku, mwa Yesu, nawaawiiha ale anrupa.
Nanlelo ninawuhimeryani, mo nuulumo na Apwiya, wiira: Hi nihanle akumi va mpaka wanhalaya uwa Apwiya, khaninhala upacera woonanana, ahinaya ale anrupa.

Phimaana, yaayo Apwiya ayo, anavahilene nlamulo naya, nineewiyene ncu na ncelo muulupale, ni niiwannyaka nipalapatta na Nluku, naahala ukhuruwa ukhuma wirimu, ni ale akhwile mwa Kristu phinhala upacera wunwelela.
Wahoolo, hi nihanle akumi va, ninaahala ukusiya wamoca ni yaayo, nirwaaninyaka mmahutteni, wiira naakumanane Apwiya uculu, ni ciicammo ninhala ukhala na Apwiya ukati wothene.
Paahi, nlipiheraneke ntthu ni nkhwawe ni moolumo ala.
Vano, asunnaka, naanceraka wuulumaca ihaali yo mahuku n'ukati, pooti uhiwantikhelani itthu,
maana nyenyuva nnaacuweleeha wiira nihuku na Apwiya ninhala uphiya toko namwinnya wammwawe uhiyu.
Kontha weeriyaka: Nnema ni nkhikicero, vano utankulaciya wootutuseriya phinhalaya waaphwanya, toko cineerawe wooyara nthiyana oorupala irukulu, ni khanhala usempa.
Nanso nyu, asunnaka, vano khanri mpiphini, wowiira nno nihuku nno nuututusereni toko namwinnya.
Maana nyu othene nri asaana o waarya ni asaana o'thana; hi khaninakhala o'hiyu ni o mpiphini.
Vano nihirupe, toko akina ayo, nanso nirontte ni nikhale oolipa.
Maana anrupa ayo, anrupa uhiyu, ni anhapaliya ayo, anhapaliya uhiyu.
Nanso hi, niri o'thana va, nikhale oolipa, niwaraka nkhikicero wo'khakaaca wo nroromelo ni wo nifento, nikhalanaka ikofiyo yo'yuma yo nkhuluvelo wo woopwa.
Maana Nluku khanaalikelenle univiruwela, nanso wiira noopwe, mwa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Ule khwile nlattu wawihu, wiira, pooti ukhala ukumi, pooti ukhwa, nikhale wamoca ni yooyo.
Phimaana, mpepecaneke ntthu ni nkhwawe ni nlipiheraneke ntthu ni nkhwawe, toko cimpankesenyu.
Vano asunnihu, ninawulepelani wiira, mwaalemelihe ale anvara nteko wariyari winyu, ni ahoolelaka miteko wamoca, ni yuulakakani mwa Apwiya.
Mwaattittimihe ni nifento, nlattu wo miteko cinvaraya. Mpankane nnema ayaayoru.
Ni ciicammo anna, ninawulepelani wiira mwaalake atthu owoolwaa, mwaapepece oocukulaca, mwaakavihere ookenkennyaa ni nkhale owaavilela othene.
Mmweheehe, wiira hikhale nohala unlivyaanihera yoonanara nkhwawe, nanso ntthare nanlelo yoorera ntthu ni nkhwawe, ni ciicammo mwa atthu othene.
Ntteeliye ukati wothene.
Nvekele woohihiyerera.
Nsukuru mwa citthu cothene, maana commo phiri utthuna wa Nluku mwa Yesu Kristu wa nyu.
Nhittipihe Nnepa.
Nhihanyurihe coolaleeriya ca Nluku,
nanso cothene mphime, ni nvarecese iri yoorera.
Mwiikhottihe yoohiloka yothene.
Vano yooyo Nluku o nnema oottakattifiheni mwa citthu cothene ni nnepa enyu wothene, iroho ni irutthu inyu cisunkiye, wiira cikhale coohicovaciya wammwaya Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Eekhweli ph'ule nowiihanani ni ciicammo nohala upanka.
Asunnaka, nnivekelele.
Mwaasalameehe anna othene na alaahuma oottakattifihiya.
Mwa ncina na Apwiya, kinawulepelani kikhanyereraka wiira ila iwarakha ila asomeliye anna othene.
Nnema na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu nikhale ni nyu. Ameni.
Mi Paulu, Sila ni Timotiyu, nantikhelaka ikereca ya atesalonika, mwa Nluku Athumwanihu ni Apwiya Yesu Kristu:
Nnema ni isalama wa nyu, wo mphantte wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni Apwiya Yesu Kristu.
Asunnaka, ukati wothene hi ninaalamuliya unsukuru Nluku nlattu wa nyu, maana nroromelo ninyu nno ninawunnuwa venci, ni nifento no khula ntthu wa nyu, ninawuncereryaa mwa ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Mpaka hi ninaasama nlattu wa nyu mmakereca mwa Nluku, nlattu woopisa winyu nrima ni nroromelo ninyu, ni wanvilelenyu ukati unoomolanihaciyenyu n'uhuvihiya.
Commo, uri nthoonyero wo'hukhumu yo'sariya ya Nluku wiira, khweli wuuphwaneleni umwene wa Nluku, yooyo unhuvahuvelenyu.
Ciicammo, malivo a Nluku anhala ukhala owaahukhumu toko cinoopankayani anoohuvihani ayo.
Ni nyu nnohuvihiya va, nnaahala umumula ni hi, yawaaka Apwiya Yesu ukhuma wirimu, ni ancelo o'kuru cawe
ni nthuko wo mooro, eeviheraka ikuhukuhu ale ahinoncuwela Nluku ni ale ahineewelela nhupi woorera wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu.
Yaayo, anaahukhumwinya, ni urimelihiya woohimala wamiithoni wa Apwiya ni nttittimiho no'kuru caya.
Vano Apwiya anaawa wiira attottopeliye na atthu attakattifu awe ni wiipanka ootikineeha nenne nihuku nne, wa yaale othene ankupali ale, kontha nyu nhokupali usaahiti ehu uyo.
Phimaana, hi ninawuvekelelani ukati wothene, wiira Nluku ihu uyo awooneleni vatthu nhina mo wiihaninya winyu, ni attharihelele utthuna wawe wooloka ni miteko co nroromelo ni ikuru.
Commo, ncina na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu nittottopeliye mwa nyu, ni nyu mwa uyo, toko ciryaya nnema na Nluku ehu ni Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Vano asunnaka, noolumaka ihaali yoowa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu ni ukumanaca wihu ni yooyo, ninoolepelani wiira
nhiitthaale nthepyaciyaka mmoopuweloni mwinyu mmo ni nhisanke, hata munnepani mwinyu, pooti ukhala ni moolumo, pooti ukhala iwarakha yowantikhiya ni hi, cihimyaka wiira nihophiya nihuku na Apwiya.
Hikhale nohala wuuthepyani, maana nnyo khacinhala ukhumelela nihinaphiya nihuku nomahanyuriho, wiira eethoonyere ule ri owiihelela ni omatankanyo.
Yooyo novaanyiha ni nohanyuriha citthu cothene cinromoliya Nluku atthuna cinlapeleliyawe Nluku, mpaka wunkoma wakhipulani wa Nluku, eepankaka toko phi Nluku ene.
Khannoopuwelela wiira mi waaryaka ni nyu kihoohimeryani nnya citthu nnya?
Vano nyu nnaacuwela inomwiikittha, wiira athoonyeriye paahi waphiyaka ukati waalikeleliyawe.
Toko commo, miteko coonanara cineera cikhumelelaka, niwehereryaka paahi utamihinya ule nomwiikittha.
Vano khweli naahala uthoonyiheriya ntthu oohiloka, yoole nohala uwuceleliya ni malaku a Apwiya Yesu mpaka ukhwa ni ukwanyulaciya wammwawe.
Vano, yooyo oohiloka uyo nohala uwa uvara nteko wa Sotwani, ni ikuru cothene, ni ikanyero ni malakalaka owoothiya.
Yooyo nowa wathepya woohi isariya ale anrimela, maana khaatthunne ufenta ikhweli wiira yopwee.
Phimaana, nlattu wo yeela itthu ila, Nluku aarumaka wuukosani, wiira akupali uthepiya,
wiira ahukhumwinye othene yaale ahikupanli ikhweli, nanso caacivenle citthu coohi isariya.
Phimaana, ninlamuliya unsukuru Nluku mwa nyu, anna oofentiya ni Apwiya, maana Nluku hoothanlani ukhuma umpaceroni wiira moopwee, muuttakattifihiyani ni Nnepa ni nroromelo neekhweli.
Uyo howiihanani nhina mo nhupi ehu, wiira mphwanye nttittimiho na Apwiyehu Yesu Kristu.
Vano commo, asunnaka, nkhale oolipa ni nsunke miitthuciho civahiyenyu, pooti ukhala co moolumo, atthuna cantikhilehu.
Vano, Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu ni Nluku athumwanihu, anifentile ni unipepeca woohimala ni univaha nwehereryo woorera,
apepece nrima enyu uyo ni oolipihereni mmitekoni coorera cothene ni moolumo oorera.
Paahi, asunnaka, nnivekelele, wiira nuulumo na Apwiya nikhalane nipuro ni nittottopeliye, toko cineerannyaya wariyari winyu.
Nnivekelele wiira noopwee mwa atthu oohiloka ni oonanara nrima, maana nroromelo khaninakhala na atthu othene.
Nanso, Apwiya ari eekhweli. Anhala wuulipiherani ni wuusunkani mwa Ntakhali.
Ni hi ciicammo ninawukhuluvelani mwa Apwiya, kuhimwena wiira nnopanka paahi cuhimenryehuni, nanso nneera mpwahereraka uvara culamulenlehuni.
Vano Apwiya yeettihe nrima enyu nnifentoni na Nluku ni uvilela wa Kristu.
Vano hi ninawuulamulelani, asunnihu, mwa ncina na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, wiira munhuluwe munninyu othene neetta woohicuwannyaca ni wooheettela ilema co miitthuciho cuvahilehuni.
Kontha nyu nnaacuwela manitakihero, maana khaninatoko ukhala owoolwaa iriyari inyu,
ni khaninatoko ulya iyolya yo mahala ya ntthu, nanso ninvara nteko mpaka utoomwa, uhiyu n'uthana, wiira hikhale nohalehu untoomwiha.
Kuhimweni wiira khanaaphwaneliya ulihiya, nanso wowiira niwiitthuciheni hi, wiira nnitakihe.
Maana waarihu nanlelo ni nyu, nahoolamulelani wiira: Ntthu aahitthuneke uvara nteko, hilye.
Maana khweli, nihoohimeriya wiira, wariyari winyu va, ahaawo atthu aneetta woohicuwannyaca, woohivara nteko, ni apankaka citthu coohicuwannyaa.
Wo yaayo, ninaalamulela n'uhimyaca, mwa Apwiya Yesu Kristu, wiira, avarak'ono nteko ni womaalyaa, alyeeke iyolya aya.
Vano nyu asunnaka, nhitoomwe upanka nnema.
Nanso akhalaka wiira haawo ntthu hintthuna wiiwelela nuulumo no'warakha iwantikhenlehuni ila, muncuweleehe ni nhintakaneelane, wiira oone ihaaya.
Nanso, nhimwaalikelele toko mwiinani, munhimeryeke toko munninyu.
Vano, Apwiya o mpuha, yaayo, yuvaheni ukati wothene mpuha wo mananna othene. Apwiya akhale ni nyu othene.
Paahi, nnya isalamu nnya ciri co ntata naka, mi Paulu. Ila phi ikanyero yo khula iwarakha; ciicale phineerihaka wootthitta.
Nnema na Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu nikhale ni nyu othene.
Mi Paulu mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu, nlattu wooruminya ni Nluku, moopoli ihu ni Yesu Kristu, ri uwehererya wihu,
kinwantikhela we Timotiyu, mwanaka eekhweli munroromeloni: Nnema, ikiriri ni mpuha wo mphantte wa Nluku Apaapa ni wa Yesu Kristu Apwiy'ehu.
Kaarwaaka uMasetoniya kahoolepela wiira ukhale nanlelo wEfesu, ni waahimyacere atthu akina ayo wiira ahiitthucihe citthu cikina,
ni ahiye uviriyana ihantisi ni uttonkiya wo mayaranacelo unoolwaninya umalihaciya, unkumihaca uvaanyihana ni iporonka, ni unliyaliha nteko wa Nluku ni nroromelo.
Itthu imphavelaya nna nlamulo nna, uri ukhalana nifento nookhuma wanrimani woorerihiya, wa ankhili omaana ni uroromela wo'khweli.
Akina ayo ahohapuwa wo nnya citthu nnya, ahorimela mmoolumoni mo citthu cithiru,
aphavelaka ukhala aalimu o malamulo, ahicuwelaka itthu inhimyaya ni hata inkhanyererihaya.
Nihocuwela wiira Nlamulo niri noorera, ntthu uyo attharihaka wanreranaya.
Ciicammo nihocuwela wiira nlamulo nno khanipankeliye atthu ooloka, nanso alavilavi ni oohanyuriha, akaafiri na anatampi, ni atthu ooveeha, atthu owiiva na ale aneeva athumwanaya ni anumwanaya,
ale aneetta uluva ni anruparupa alopwanaru, mayotumiha ipottha, mayowootha ni anlupela vathiru, ni citthu cikina ciriwo, cinaavirikaniha atthu wiira ahicuwelele miitthuciho cikumi,
toko nhupi woorera wo waarya wa Nluku oottottopeliya ukirumilyawe.
Mi kinawaasukuru Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, akivahile ikuru ni akaalikelelaka ukhala eekhweli wiira kaavarele nteko aya,
kaahokhalaru khalayi va mayokufuru, mayowoomolanihaca atthu ni mayohanyuriha ikhweli, nanso kihooneliya ikiriri maana kaapanka woohicuwela itthu ni akaamini ikhweli.
Ciicammo nnema na Apwiy'ehu ni nroromelo, ni nifento niri mwa Yesu Kristu nihokicareeha.
Yoohiminya toko ila, iri yeekhweli ni yoorera ukhuluveliya: Yesu Kristu howa nttuniyani wiira oopole mayokosa, toko ciinryaka mi ootepana.
Phimaana kooneliyaka ikiriri, mi mayottheka ootepa, wiira Yesu Kristu athoonyere iyuulupale awe yoovilela, akipankaka toko nthoonyero wa ale yaahala waamini, wiira aphwanye ukumi woohimala.
Wa mwene oohimala, oohikhwa, ohooninya, Nluku mmoca, attittimihiye ni waarya mahuku othene. Ameni.
Mwanaka Timotiyu, kinawuvaha nnya miitthuciho nnya, toko ciryaya coolaleeriya nlattu wawaa, wiira, toko cennya, we waane ikhotto yomaana,
ukhalane nroromelo na ankhili omaana, kontha atthu akina anaakhottilene ankhili omaana, ahokwanyulaca nroromelo naya.
Nhina wo yaayo, haawo Himeneu ni Alisantere. Yaale anvahilyaka Sotwani wiira yiitthuce uhihanyuriha.
Wahinaya itthu, kinaaleehera wiira mwaavekelele atthu othene, mwaasonttelele, munsukuruku Nluku;
mwaavekelele mamwene ni othene anhoolela wiira nikhalane ukumi womaana ni nnema ni malokelo othene ni imaani.
Iyo phi itthu yoorera ni yooncivela Nluku, Moopoli ihu,
nophavela wiira atthu othene yoopwe ni acuwele ikhweli.
Maana ri Nluku mmoca paahi ni mayowaataniha mmoca paahi ri iriyariru Nluku na atthu: ntthu neehaninya Yesu Kristu,
eevaherenre veekhawe wiira oopole othene. Ula phi saahiti apankiye yooyo ukati uyo.
Nlattu wo yeeyo phivahaceriyaka ukhala nlalyeri ni mmitthenka ni mwalimu a amalaponi munroromeloni ni mwiikhwelini. Kinoohimeryani ikhweli, akinootha.
Vano kimphavela wiira alopwana othene avekele mapuro othene, awusaka matata aya mattakattifu, woohirusiya ni woohinyakulihana.
Ciicammo kineera, athiyana othene awaraceke ratta, yiihisimaka, woohikhala utthava ikharari ni uwaraca iwooru, hata uwara cooceremela ni ikuwo co nttenko muulupale,
nanso akhalaneke miteko comaana, toko cinlamuliyaya ukhala athiyana oonlapela Nluku.
Athiyana anlamuliya wiitthuca anamaanle, yiiwelelaka.
Akintthuniha wiira athiyana yiitthucihe, hata unlamula nlopwana, nanso, amaale.
Maana paceriye upattusiya ph'Atamu, ni wahoolo Eva.
Atamu khanakhala thepiye, nanso athiyana ayo, nlattu woothepiya, ahokhala mayokosa.
Nanso athiyana anhala woopwa yaayaraka asaana, yakhalaka munroromeloni, nnifentoni ni anari attakattifu, akhalaka ratta.
Nna niri nuulumo neekhweli nineera, ntthu aphavelaka ukhala nhooleli o'kereca, uri nteko woorera umphavelawe oyo.
Nanso nhooleli nolamuliya ukhala oohicovaciya, nlopwana oonthela nthiyana mmoca paahi, eemaani, eekhweli, oolemelihiya, oocuwela waakhelela aletto ni owoorya usomiha.
Yooyo hikhale oohapaliya, hikhale oosilili, nanso akhale mayannema, owiinanana nkhitto ni oohi isooyo,
ni oocuwela weettiha ratta ntthoko nawe, akhalane asaana oomwiiwelela ni o'hisima yinci.
Vano, ntthu hinoorya uhoolela ntthoko nawe, nohala woorya cani uhoolela ikereca ya Nluku?
Hikhale mwaamini onaanano, wiira hikhale owiicoona ahukhumwinyaka wamoca ni Sotwani.
Ciicammo nolamuliya ukhalana usaahiti womaana na atthu ammoona vate, wiira hikhale oovanyihinya, wiira hivarihiye muntaphani na Sotwani.
Woolikanaca wene, matiyakonu anlamuliya ukhala oolemelihiya, owuulumaca umoca, oohihapaliya ni oohicivaciviya citthu coohimaana.
Anlamuliya uvarecesa ikano co nroromelo na ankhili omaana.
Anlamuliya upacera ulawihiya toko; wahoolo yakhalaka oohicovaciya, anaavaraka nteko wootiyakonu uyo.
Ciicammo, athiyana ayo, anlamuliya ukhala oolemelihiya, oohaapa, nanso akhaleke ookhuluvelyaa mothene.
Tiyakonu nolamuliya ukhalana amwaarawe amoca paahi ni oocuwela weettiha uratta asaanawe ni ntthoko nawe.
Vano matiyakonu anhala uvara nteko ratta ayo, anaaphwanya mapuro omaana ni nkhuluvelo munroromeloni mwa Yesu Kristu.
Kinwantikhela nnya citthu nnya, kinoohalaru vakani uwa uwoona;
wiira kapicaka, ucuwele mananna anlamuliyaya wiikasoopa atthu ayo mpaani mwa Apwiya mmo, iri ikereca ya Nluku nkumi, nipotto ni nivatta neekhweli.

Khawantikhinnyaa wiira isiiri co waamini wihu ciri cuulupale: Nluku thoonyiheriye ni irutthu, vahiye isariya muNnepani, ooninye na ancelo, lalennye mwiilaponi, kupaliye nttuniyani, ni aakheleliye uwaaryani.
Nnepa unaahimyaca woohivitha itthu, wiira mahuku oomaliha, akina ayo anaahala uhiya waamini, yiiwelelaka minepa coothepya ni miitthuciho ca asotwani.
Cennyo miitthuciho nnyo cinkhuma wa atthu owiithepya ni owootha, aturumalihile ankhili aya.
Ayo anawaateeliha uthelaninya n'uliya coolya cipattusilyawe Nluku wiira atthu ankupali ni ancuwela ikhweli yaakhelele ni asukuru nnema nawe.
Kontha cothene cipattusilyawe Nluku ciri coorera, ni caakheleliyaka wo nnema khiiwo yoonanara.
Khweli, mwa nlattu wo nuulumo na Nluku ni iswali cothene cinaattakattifihiya.
Vano we weetthucihaka asunnaa nnya citthu nnya phinhalaa ukhala nrumeyi omaana a Yesu Kristu oolihiya moolumo o nroromelo ni miitthuciho comaana cineettelaa.
Uvaanyihe ihantisi cookufuriha ni cootirikhi, nanso we wiilamalelihe ukhala eemaani.
Nteko wo mwirutthuni urina ifayita vakani, nanso imaani ihaana ifayita yinci, kontha inaakhuluveliha ukumi ukhuma nenna va mpaka unkelehu.
Ila iri itthu yeekhweli ni yoorera ukupali.
Phimaana nivaraka nteko ni naanaka ikhotto kontha ninoweesa uwehererya wihu nwo wa Nluku nkumi, moopoli atthu othene, venci venci amwaamini.
Ulamulele ni wiitthucihe nnya citthu nnya.
Hikhale nohala wuuveeha nlattu wookhala we mmirawo, nanso ukhale nthoonyero wa atthu eekhweli nnuulumoni, mmeetteloni, nnifentoni, munroromeloni ni wo mananna eettakattifu.
Uvare nteko woosoma nuulumo na Nluku waatthuni, uhimyacaka ni wiitthucihaka mpaka wanhalaka uwa.
Uhivyaavyeehe ivahiya iphwanyihinyaa ni nhupi wo minapiyu uthateliyaka matata na ahooleli.
Ukhalele ankhili nnya citthu nnya, ni weettele cennyo paahi wiira atthu othene yoone makhalelo aa.
Wiinemecere umwanene ni unemecere miitthuciho ca Apwiya, weettelaka cinhimyaya, kontha wapankaka commo unaahala woopwa umwanene mpaka anwiiwa ayo.
Uhinkuphule nlopwana muulupale, nanso unhimerye toko athumwana; amirawo ayo waahimerye toko asunnaa;
athiyana oolupale waahimerye toko anumwana; asithiyana ayo waahimerye toko asirokoraa, wo mananna eettakattifu.
Waattittimihe athiyana ookhweliya awannyaya anlamuliya ukaviheriya.

Nanso nankhwele uyo akhalanaka asaana atthuna ucuulu, ayo anlamuliya upacera wiitthuca uvara miteko ceemaani wapuwani waya, awacawacaka ntthoko naya yaameelaka mihakhu cihiyeriyaya na athumwanaya, kontha yeeyo phi itthu inoncivela Nluku.
Ule ri nankhwele eekhweli ni ooh'amuci awe, nonwehererya Nluku ni naakhanyerera ulompa n'uswali uhiyu n'uthana.
Nanso ule oocivelaciya, hata akhalaka nkumi, ri ookhwa.
Waalamulele wiira ahikhale oocovaciya.
Vano ntthu aahaawacawaceke aloko awe wootepa owatthokoni wawe, nokhotta nroromelo ni hompwaha nkaafiri.
Hikhale nthiyana nohala wantikhiya nliivuruni ya athiyana ookhweliya awannyaya, hinapiihera myakha sitini (60) ceyarelo ni akhaleke oopaca utheliya ni nlopwana mmoca paahi,

akhale oocuwanyaa ni akhalane usaahiti wo miteko coorera, toko waawacawaca asaana, waakhelela aletto, urapiha inyaa ca atthu attakattifu, waakavihera atthu oohuva ni wiivaherera uvara miteko cothene coorera.
Uhaatakanihere yeeyo iliivuru iyo amwaavano ookhweliya awannyaya, kontha yapaceraka upanka cootthuna co'rutthu aya, ankowunlela utheliya mpaka unhanyuriha Kristu.
Vano ankohukhumwinya mwa nlattu woofutta wiiwanana woopacera.
Uhiya commo ankhala owoolwaa, amakelaka weetta itthoko ni itthoko, nanso khunakhala woolwaru ciicammo mayowaapa ni anaporonka, yuulumacaka citthu cahaalamuliyaya wuulumaca.
Phimaana kinawulaka wiira amwaavano ookhweliya awannyaya, phatari atheliye, aayare asaana, akhale mwanene itthoko ni ahinhiyere mwiinani ikhato yootarawa.
Kontha akina ahohapuwa n'untthara Sotwani.
Wakhala wiira haawo nthiyana mwaamini rina nankhwele uwannyawe, ankavihereke; huncerere mirintti ikereca, waacera wiira akaviheriye ale ari minankhwele ceekhweli.
Mahumu aneettiha woorera ikereca anlamuliya utthuviya ihisima yoopitaanihinya, venci venci ale anvara nteko nnuulumoni ni wiitthuciha,
kontha cowantikhiya cinaahimya ciiraka: Khunlamuliya utthuka malaku o'mope wanttikitthaya itiriku, ni uheeriya tho: Nanteko nolamuliya upokera.
Uhikupali yooriyeleliya humu uhikhanle weewa asaahiti eeli atthuna araru.
Vano ale ari ntampini waattaruse wamiithoni wa atthu othene wiira akina ayo yoove.
Kinawulamulela wamiithoni wa Nluku, ni Apwiya Yesu Kristu, ni wamiithoni wa ancelo oothanliya, wiira usunke nnya ikano nnya woohaahawulaniha atthu ni woohifentelela.
Uhipuphe woonthatela ntthu matata, wiira uhaalikeleliye itampi ca atthu akina. Wiisunke ratta ni ukhale nttakattifu.
Uhipwaherere uwurya maasi paahi, ciicammo uwuryeke vakani ivinyu, mwa nlattu wo napwiipwi ni iretta caa cihinookhuma nnyo.
Itampi ca atthu akina cinaacuwannyaa cihinaphiya uhukhumuni, nanso ca akina ayo cinhala ucuwannyaa uhoolo.
Ciicammo, miteko coorera ciri cowoonnyaa ni hata civithiye cinaacuwannyaa.
Ale atthukiye toko ipottha, yaattittimihe akunya aya toko cimphwaneliyaya uttittimihinya, wiira ncina na Nluku ni miitthuciho cihu cihihanyurihiye.

Arina akunya aya aamini, khaanlamuliya waalemeliha vakani, nlattu wookhala asunna o munroromeloni, nanso anlamuliya uvara nteko venci cinene, ukhala wiira atthu anaavarelaya nteko ari owaamini ni oofentiya. Cothene nnya, unlamuliya wiitthuciha ni woopererya.
Vano akhala wiira haawo neetthuciha cikina coohilikana ni moolumo makumi a Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, ni meetthuciho eemaani,
uyo ri owiittottopa ni khiiwo incuwelawe. Nothoonyera wiira ri nretta munnepani nlattu woovaanyiha n'unyakuliha mwa nlattu wo moolumo, anonwiihera urama, waanihana, utarawana, waanyihera coonanara
nanthola ukati wothene na atthu oohaankhili ni oohicuwela ikhweli, ni anoona wiira ittiini immwiiha mihakhu.
Khweli, ittiini inaawiiha mihakhu cinci waahikhaleke ucivaciviya,
maana khiiwo iwiihilehu mwiilaponi mu ni khiiwo inhalehu ukusa.
Phimaana, nakhalanaka coolya ni coowara, nitteeliyeke.
Vano ale amphavela ukhala mathaciri, anwuluwela muuttehattehiyani, ntaphani ni cowunlela cinci cookukuryaa ni coonanara, cinaarimeliha atthu mpaka ukwanyuwaca.
Maana nifento no ncurukhu niri ntithari wo citthu cinci coonanara. Atthu akina, nlattu wo waacivelesa ncurukhu, ahohapusa nroromelo naya mpaka wiiphwanyiha mahuviho menci.
Nanso we, ntthu a Nluku, utthawe cothene nnyo ni ukuse isariya, imaani, nroromelo, nifento, uvilela ni wiimaaliha.
Waane ikhotto yomaana munroromeloni. Uvarecese ukumi woohimala, yooyo wiihaneliyaa ni ulaphulunlyaa womaana wamiithoni wa asaahiti enci.
Wamiithoni wa Nluku, novaha ukumi cothene, ni wa Yesu Kristu, alaphulunle womaana wamiithoni wa Ponsiyu Pilatu, mi kinawuhimerya wiira,
usunke nlamulo noorera nna ni noohaakanyaciya, mpaka uwa wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu,
ninhalawe Nluku uruma utthariheleliya wo'katini waya. Uyo ri oottittimihinya, rina ulamuli wothene, Mwene o mamwene ni Pwiya o mapwiya.
Maana ri mmoca yooyo, hinkhwa ni nokhala wo waarya uhinaattameriya, hinatoko wooninya ni ntthu ni khanooryaa wooninya. Wa yooyo akhale nttittimiho ni ikuru mahuku othene. Ameni.
Waalamulele mathaciri o yeela ittuniya ila wiira ahikhale owiihelela, ni ahiroromele mihakhu caya cihinlokela, nanso anroromele Nluku nonivaha cothene, wiira cinitteelihe nrima.
Waalamulele wiira apanke coorera, akhale oolipa avaraka miteko comaana, akhalaka ooloka ni oocuwela uvaha.
Toko commo, ayo anaahala wiitotokanihera mihakhu caya, ni wiitekela nipuro noolipa ukati unhala uwa uyo, ni commo phinhalaya uvarecesa ukumi weekhweli.
We Timotiyu, usunke ikhuluveliyaa. Wiisempihe myaha cithiru ni coonyohola ni moopuwelo oovaanyiha uneehaninya ucuwelaca;
akina waattharattharaya cennyo, yahohapuwa munroromeloni. Nnema nikhale ni nyu.
Mi Paulu, mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu, wootthuna wa Nluku, toko nkhuluveliho wookumi uri mwa Yesu Kristu,
kinaawantikhela we Timotiyu, mwanaka oofentiya: Nnema, ikiriri ni mpuha wo mphantte wa Nluku Apaapa ni wa Yesu Kristu Apwiy'ehu.
Kinaansukuru Nluku, nonvarelaka nteko na ankhili omaana, toko caavarenlyaya mayapaapa okhalayi, kuuvekelelaka we ukati wothene, uhiyu n'uthana.
Kinawuupuwela miithori aa ni kinaaphavela venci uwoona, wiira utteeliya waka nwo ukhale woocareeha.
Ciicammo kinawuupuwela nroromelo naa noohithepya naarinaya ikhumelo apiipyaa Loyiti ni anumwana Eunisi, ni kihokupali wiira nenno, ciicammo niri ni we.
Phimaana, kinaawuupusera tho kiiraka uwusawuse ivahiya ya Nluku irinaa, yaakhenlyaa nlattu wowuthatela matata aka.
Maana Nluku khanivahile nnepa wo woova, nanso wo'kuru, wo nifento ni woohittinka.
Paahi, uhuulihiye muru nlattu wo'saahiti wa Apwiya, hata wo mi, kiri nantthukiya awe, nanso ukhale ni mi mmahuvihoni mwaka nlattu wo nhupi woorera, ni ikuru ca Nluku,
anooponle ni aniihanne ni nteko nttakattifu, woohikhala nlattu wo miteko cihu, nanso nlattu woolakela wawe ni nnema. Nna nnema nna, nivahiye mwa Yesu Kristu ikhumelo yo khalayi,
nithoonyiheriye mwa nlattu woowa Moopoli ihu, Yesu Kristu. Uyo hommaliha nookhwa ni hothoonyihera ukumi ni ukumi woohimala nlattu wo nhupi woorera.
Vano nlattu wo nhupi ula, kihopankiya ukhala nlalyeri, mmitthenka ni mwalimu.
Phimaana kinaahuva, nanso khunkuuliha muru, kontha kinaancuwela nkupanlyaka ni kihokupaleeha wiira uyo phirina ikuru yowiira asunke inkhuluvelihilyaka mpaka nenno nihuku nno.
Ukhalane meettelo o moolumo makumi akiiwilyaa, ni ukhalane nroromelo ni nifento na Yesu Kristu.
Usunke ikhuluvelihiyaa yoorera mwa Nnepa Nttakattifu unkhala mwa hi.
Uhocuwela wiira atthu othene wAsiya ahokimwaryaa, kimwaacaka Ficelo ni Hermocene.
Apwiya yoonele ikiriri ntthoko na Onisiforu, kontha imaara cinci hokilipiha nrima ni khanatoko wuulihaceriya muru utthukiya waka,
nanso hophiya uRoma, hokaavyavya mpaka ukiphwanya.
Apwiya nenno nihuku nno amoonele ikiriri inkhuma wa Apwiya. Ni we unaacuwela ratta woopwaha mi, miteko cikivarenlyawe wEfesu.
Vano we mwanaka, wiilipihe munnemani niri mwa Yesu Kristu.
Moolumo akiiwilyaa kaahimyaceraka asaahiti enci, yaayo waahimyacere atthu eekhweli ni oocuwela waasomiha akhwaya.
Uvilele ni mi mmahuvihoni mwaka, toko natoropa omaana a Yesu Kristu.
Khaawo natoropa neekelakeliha milahanya cikina, kontha nolamuliya unciveliha nhooleli awe.
Ciicammo khaawo mayotthawa nowarihiya ikhwerempa yootthema, hipankile toko cilamuleliyawe.
Mayolima novara nteko phimpacera ulya cowiima.
Weesere nuutta inoohimeryaka, kontha Apwiya anawuvaha ucuwelaca citthu cothene.
Umuupuwele Yesu Kristu onwelenle iriyari ya atthu ookhwa, ucuulu wa Taviti, toko ciryaya nhupi aka.
Nlattu wa yooyo, kinaahuva mpaka utthukiya toko nammalukuni, nanso nuulumo na Nluku khanitthukiye.
Phimaana, cothene kinaavilela mwa nlattu wa atthu oothanliya, wiira na ayo akhalane woopwa uri mwa Yesu Kristu ni waarya woohimala.
Nuulumo neekhweli phi nna: Wakhwilehu ni yooyo, ninkookhala akumi ni yooyo.
Navilelaka ni yooyo, ninkolamula ni yooyo. Nankhottaka, uyo nokonikhotta.
Nakhalaka oohikhweli, uyo nokhala eekhweli, kontha khanoorya wiikhotta.
Uhimyace nnya citthu nnya. Wuulumace woohikhuwakhuwa wamiithoni wa Nluku, wiira asempe moolumo oonyakulihana ahimmwaana itthu, uhiri paahi waatankanya aneewa ayo.
Uphavele wiithoonyihera wa Nluku unari ookupaliyene, toko nanteko hirina yoomuulihaciha muru, wiitthucihaka ratta nuulumo neekhweli.
Ciicammo usempe moolumo oohifayita ni ookufuru, kontha anoolumaca ayo anaapwaherera ukufuru nwo,
ni moolumo aya ayo anaakhuura mmirimani toko mwankokho. Mwa yaayo, anawaalikeleliya Himeneu ni Filetu.
Ayo ahohiya ikhweli, yuulumacaka wiira wunwelela wa atthu ookhwa nwo uhovira, ni anawaarimeliha atthu akina.
Nanso ikhalelo yoopacera ya Nluku ihaawo yoohittinka ni ihotthittiya ila yowantikhiya ila: Apwiya anaancuwela ule ri awaya; ni: Ule noromola ncina na Apwiya ahiye coonanara.
Inupa yuulupale cinaakhala myaapu co'wooru ni co'paratha, ciicammo cinaakhala co mwiri ni cooloko. Cihaawo ciri nteko aya uttittimihera, cikina nnyo uhittitthimihera.
Phimaana ntthu eerattavelelaka mwanene coonanara, nohala ukhala ikaruma yo nttittimiho, ittakattifu ni yoonvaha ifayita mwanene uyo, eetthenkaceraka uvara miteko coorera.
Utthawe coonanara cimpankiya ceemirawo. Utthare isariya, nroromelo, nifento, ni isalama, na ayo arina nrima woorera yaalepelaka Apwiya.
Unsempe nanrokottole oosikini ni oohi ifayita, kontha we uhocuwela wiira cimmalela munkhittoni.
Ipottha ya Apwiya khinlamuliya weettela nkhitto, nanso ifentane na atthu othene, icuwele usomiha, ivilele.
Inlamuliya waattarusa ni imaani atthu owiihelela, awehereryaka wiira Nluku naahala waarukunusa nrima, yaacuwelihaka ikhweli,
wiira aturuwele wiciinanela ni akutuphuwe itapha ca Sotwani aatthukile, wiira apanke intthunawe.
Vano ucuwele wiira, mahuku oomalela unaawa ukati wookukuryaa.
Kontha atthu ayo anhala ukhala owiihelela, osooyo, owaanyihera, owiicoona, ookufuru, oohiiwelela mayathumwanaya, oohisukuru, akaafiri,
oohaafenta amuci aya, oohitthuna uhimeriya, oohimyahimya, oohiivaraca, oosilili, owiinanana yoorera,
owuuluma makhuce, oopupha, owiittittimiha, oopatthanana citthu coociveliha irutthu, woohikhala ni Nluku;
ookhala toko nattiini nanso akhottaka ikuru caya. Ciicammo na ayo waatthawe.
Phi yaala ankela mmapaani yaathonkocaka athiyana oohilipalipa ni oocara itampi aneehiyerera akusiyaka ni citthu coociva co nttuniyani,
ansoma ukati wothene nanso khancuweleeha ikhweli.
Toko Yanesi ni Yamperesi waamwiinanannyaya Musa, ayo ciicammo anawiinanana ikhweli. Moopuwelo aya ari oohononnyaa ni ahokhottiya munroromeloni.
Nanso ayo khaamphiya uttayi toko akina ayo, uhaankhili waya nwo unawaacokonwela atthu othene.
We unawoonaka cineeraka wo wiitthuciha va, makhalelo aka, waamini waka, uvilela waka, ufenta waka, nthiti naka,
mpaka woomolanihaciya waka ni uhuva ukiphwanyile, citthu cikikhumelenle wAntiyokiya, wIkoniyu, ni uListra. Imaara kavi kivilelaka woomolanihaciya! Nanso citthu cothene nnyo Apwiya ahokoopola.
Khweli othene amphavela ukhala attaatthu mwa Yesu Kristu, awehereryeke woomolanihaciya.
Nanso atthu oonanara nrima ni owootha anaavira atepaka uthepya na ayo athepiyaka.
Nanso we uvarecese citthu cusomihilyaka, cennyo ciitthucilyaa kontha we unaancuwela oosomihile.
Kontha we ikhumelo iyankani uhocuwela cowantikhiya cittakattifu wiira ankhili anawucuweliha woopwa wanroromelaka Yesu Kristu.
Cowantikhiya cothene cinkhuma wa Nluku, ni cihaana ifayita yoosomiha, yoottarusa, yookuphula ni wiitthuciha isariya,
wiira ntthu a Nluku akhale oomphwanela ni ootthenkacyaa wiira avare miteko coorera.
Kinawulamulela wamiithoni wa Nluku ni wa Yesu Kristu, nohala waahukhumu atthu akumi ni ookhwa, wanhalawe uwa wumweneni wawe wiira
ulalyee nuulumo nno ni wiitthenkemanihe ukati wothene, ukuphule, uvaanyihe cowoothiya, ulake ni nrima weemani ni uvarecesaka wiitthuciha.
Kontha unaaphiya ukati unkelaya atthu waarusa miitthuciho cikumi, nanso aphavelaka wiiwa citthu cithiru, ankowaathukumaniha aalimu enci oohimya cowaacivela.
Ayo ankokhotta uviriyana ikhweli, nanso unkowaacivela wiiwa coohimyaciya co'ttiini.
Vano we wiiwehawehe mo citthu cothene, uvilele mahuviho, uvare nteko wa nlalyeri ni weettele nteko aa.
Vano uhophiya ukati woovuvihiya iphome aka toko isataka, ukati wookhwa.
Kihaana ikhotto yomaana, kihomalihera nteko aka uyo, kihosunka nroromelo.
Nenna va ikhwerempa yo'sariya kinoosunkeriya, yeele inkelaya ukivaha Apwiya ari mayahukhumu o'sariya, naphiyaka nenno nihuku nno, ni khunakhala mi paahi, nanso atthu othene anfenta uwa waya.
Uphavelace uwa woono wowaakuvyaca wene.
Kontha Temasi, mwa nlattu woonciva ittuninya, hokihiya ni horwaa uTesalonika; Keresente horwaa uKalata; Titu horwaa uTalamasiya.
Uno kihanle paahi ni Luka. Woowa va ukiwaanele Marku, kontha haana ifayita ni nteko aka.
Tikiku kihonruma wEfesu.
Woowa va ukiwiihere ikacako aka kihiilyaka uTrowate mpaani mwa Kharpu, ciicammo iliivuru nnyo, venci venci marapala o wantikhaciya ayo.
Alisantere mayohana hokipankaca coonanara; Apwiya anaanliva toko ciinryawe woovara nteko.
Ciicammo we umweette ratta yooyo, kontha khamala uvaanyiha moolumo ehu ayo.
Wiicaakiha waka woopacera, khaawo kirumelelihile, nanso atthu othene anookimwaryaa. Nanso yeeyo itthu iyo Nluku haalikelele.
Phimaana Apwiya ahokaakiha ni ahokivaha ikuru wiira mwa nlattu wo mi, nuulumo na Nluku nikhale noweetteliya, asenci othene yiiwe, ni kihoopoliya mwaano mo kharamu.
Ciicammo Apwiya anaakoopola mmitekoni coonanara ni anaahala ukikusa owoopwene wumweneni waya wo wirimu. Nawaya nikhale nttittimiho mahuku othene.
Kinanveleelihera isalamu Prisila ni Akila mpaka inupa ya Onisiforu.
Erastu hohala uKorintu, nanso Trofimu kinhile awerennyaka uMiletu.
Uphavelace uwa woono ihinaya uphiya iyiita. Eupulu, Prutente, Linu, Kalautiya na asunna othene anawuveleelihera isalamu.
Apwiya akhale ni nnepa aa. Nnema nikhale ni nyu.
Mi Paulu, ipottha ya Nluku ni mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu, toko ciryaya nroromelo na atthu oothanliya a Nluku ni ucuwelaca ikhweli inthoonyera waamini wihu,
munwehereryoni wookumi woohimala, yooyo, Nluku hinootha uroromelihilyawe ukati uhinaya.
Nanso, mukatini mwawe, uyo howiiha nuulumo nawe mulalyani ukhuluveliyaka ni nlamulo na Nluku moopoli ehu.
Mi kinaawantikhela Titu, mwanaka eekhweli, toko ciryaya nroromelo nihu: Nnema ni isalama, cinkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni wa Yesu Kristu, moopoli ihu.
Mi kuuhiyenre uKereta, wiira ulokiherere citthu caahaleela ni waatthapela mahumu wo khula iparasa, toko culamulenlyaka:
Humu, nolamuliya ukhala oohicovaciya, ookhalana amwaarawe amoca paahi, akhalane asaanawe owaamini ni yaayo ahikhale oopanka citthu co wuuliha muru ni oohileelyaa.
Nhooleli nolamuliya ukhala oohicovaciya, toko mayanikhupi a Nluku, ni oohiittottopa, oohiviruwaca, oohihapaliya, oohinanthola, ni oohimilili.
Nanso, akhaleke mayowaakhela aletto, ooncivela coorera, owiiwacawaca, nasariya, mayannema ni owiivaraca,
akhaleke mayovarecesa ikhweli, toko ciryaya mmiitthucihoni, wowiira akhalane ikuru muulalyaani wo miitthuciho comaana, ni wiira ooryace mayovaanyiha.
Kontha ahaawo enci oohileelyaa, oorekama nlimi ni mayowootha, venci venci ale ankhuluvela ikano ca ayuta.
Unlamuliya waamaaliha, maana ammakela upahula itthoko cinci, yiitthucihaka citthu cithiru nlattu wo milili.
Ciicammo, nnapiyu aya mmoca o'Kereta aheera coo: Akereta ukati wothene ari mayowootha, masene ooluwa, ananlula owoolwaa.
Ula usaahiti ula weekhweli. Phimaana, waakuphulace venci, wiira akhale oolipa munroromeloni,
ni ahivarecese ithele ca ayuta, hata ni malamulo a atthu oohapuwa ikhweli.
Citthu cothene ciri coorera mwa ale ari oorera, nanso, mwa ale oohirera ni oohikupali, khiiwo yoorera, maana hata moopuwelo n'ankhili aya ahotthunttuwana.
Ayo aneera anaancuwela Nluku, nanso, anaankhotta mwa coopanka caya. Phimaana wakhanlyaya atthu oopanka co miikho ni oohitthuna uhimeriya, maana khaanoorya upanka itthu yomaana mena vakani.
Nanso we, wuulumace citthu cimphwanelana mmiitthucihoni comaana.
Vano alopwana oolupale ayo, akhale oopisa nrima, oophwanela uhisiminya, owiirattavelela, ookhalana nroromelo nikumi, o nifento ni oovilela.
Ciicammo, athiyana oolupale ayo, weetthucihe wiira akhale eekhweli, ahikhale owaapa, ahiipanke ipottha yo'vinyu, nanso akhale owiitthuciha comaana.
Toko commo, yeetthucihe asithiyana ootheliya naanano waafenta asiwannyaya ni asaanaya,
ukhala owiirattavelela, eekhweli, anatthoko omaana, oorera nrima ni oweewelela asiwannyaya, wiira nuulumo na Nluku nihinyoholaciye.
Ciicammo, waalakeke amwaavano, wiira akhale owiirattavelela.
Vano we, ukhaleke nthoonyero wo miteko coorera. Mmiitthucihoni mwaa, uthoonyereke ikhweli ni ihisima,
moolumelo oorera ni oohicovaciya, wiira mwiinani oolihiye muru, wahinkhalanawe itthu yoonootheryaca.
Ipottha nnyo, cimwiiwelele nkunya aya, ciphavelaka mananna oontteeliha nrima, cihikhale cowaakhulaca pufya,
cihimwinnyere, nanso ciithoonyere wiira khweli ciri cookhuluvelyaa, wiira miitthuciho cothene ca Nluku moopoli ihu cikhale coocivela.
Kontha nnema na Nluku niheethoonyihera ukhala nowoopola atthu othene,
niniitthucihaka, wiira, ninakhottilene ukhala oohaamini ni ucivelaciya wo citthu co mwiilaponi, nikhale ukati urihu ula, wo mananna o'sariya ni eemaani,
niwehereryaka nkhuluvelo wootteeliha nrima, ni uwa wo nttittimiho na Nluku ihu muulupale ni moopoli Yesu Kristu.
Yooyo eevaherenre mwa nlattu wawihu, wiira anitaphule mwa coonanara cihu ni wiirerihela unethi awe, wiira uvarecese miteko coorera.
Paahi, uhimyace nnya citthu nnya; waalakaka ni waakuphulacaka n'ulamuli wothene. Hikhale nohala wuvyaavyeha.
Vano woopusere asunna ayo wiira anlamuliya wiivaherera wa ahooleli na alamuli o mwiilaponi; akhale owiiwelela, alikaneliyeke mavarelo miteko coorera cothene,
ahinterempulace ntthu; ahikhale atthu oonyakulihana, nanso akhale atthu owiiwanana, athoonyeraka usaahiti woorera wiiwanana waya nwo, mwa atthu othene.

Maana ni hi, khalayi, naari oohaankhili, oohiiwelela, owiihawula; naari ipottha co citthu coociva co vathi va, ni ucivelaciya, nikhalaka woohiloka n'urama, naanyoonyihaka akhwihu ni nikhalelanaka nttima ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Nanso wawilyaya imaani ni nifento na Nluku moopoli ehu mwa atthu othene,
uyo honoopola, woohikhala nlattu wo miteko co'sariya civanrehu, nanso toko ciryaya ikiriri cawe, anirapihaka, uneehaninya uyaryaa wonayeeli n'uthatuwa onaanano muNnepani Nttakattifu.
Nluku honimorosela venci Nnepa awe Nttakattifu, mwa Yesu Kristu moopoli ihu,
wiira, ninavaheriyene isariya yo nnema nawe, nikhale mayowaakhela awe, niwehereryaka ukumi woohimala.

Vano nuulumo neekhweli phi nna, ni kimphavela wiira, wo cennya citthu nnya, uhimyeehe, wiira ale ammwaamini Nluku avarecese n'urattavelela miteko comaana. Nnya citthu nnya ciri coorera ni co'fayita mwa atthu.
Usempe manyakunyaku o citthu cithiru, uwacawaca macina a anhakhalayi, waanihana ni uthavarela Nlamulo, maana khacinanteko ni ciri cithiru.
Wiisempihe mwa ntthu o waakawaniha akhwawe, unankuphunlene ikwaha yoopacera ni yonayeeli,
maana unaacuwela wiira ula ntthu ula hopahuwa ni neetta ntampini, ni heehukhumu mwanene.
Vano kooveleeliheraka Artema atthuna Tikiku, wowaakuvyaca wene uwe nikumanace uNikopoli. Kontha philakenlyaka uviriha iyiita yothene wonwo.
Unkavihere n'unvarecesa Senasi, ntaphuleli o malamulo, ni Apolu, wiira ihaathwee itthu phi itthu.
Vano, asikhwihu ayo, ciicammo yiitthuce wiithoonyihera mmitekoni coorera wo waawacawaca oothwennya, wiira ahikhale oohifayita.
Paahi, othene ari ni mi, anawusalameeha; isalamu wa ale othene annifenta munroromeloni. Nnema nikhale ni nyu othene. Ameni.
Mi Paulu, nantthukiya a Yesu Kristu ni munnaka Timotiyu, wa Filimoni oofentiya, nkhwihu muntekoni,
ni mwanrokorihu Afiya, ni Arkipu, nkhwihu onkhottoni, ni ikereca iri wapuwani waa:
Nnema ni isalama wa nyu, cinkhuma wa Nluku Athumwanihu ni wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Kinaansukuru Nluku aka, kiwuupuwelelakani ukati wothene muswalini mwaka,
kiiwaka co nifento naa, ni nroromelo nirinaa mwa Apwiya Yesu ni wa attakattifu othene.
Kinvekela wiira waatana wo nroromela naa ukhale wowiiwannyaa, muucuwelacani wa coorera cothene cirinehu, mwa Kristu.
Kahotteeliya venci ni upisihiya nrima wo nifento naa, kontha nrima wa attakattifu uhotteeliya nlattu wawaa.
Phimaana, hata kikhalanaka mwa Kristu ukhuluvela ni ihathuwa yowiira kuurume upanka itthu inowaaca,
nanso, nlattu wo nifento, kinlamuliya wuulepela nna va; mi Paulu, owuuluvala ni nantthukiya a Yesu Kristu,
kinawulepela nlattu wa mwanaka Onesimu onnyanryaka kinari nkalaposo.
Uyo, khalayi khaari ofayita ni we. Nanso vano, haana ifayita mwa we ni ciicammo ni mi.
Kinawuhokolosera we ni umwaakhelele toko nrima aka mi.
Wahokicivela wiira akhale ni mi, akikavihere wanipuroni waa, mi kinari nantthukiya nlattu wo nhupi woorera;
nanso, akitthunne upanka itthu phi itthu uhinaya ukittunihera we, wiira uloka waa uhikela wakhala wookhanyererihiya, nanso ukhaleke wotthuna waa.
Kaahiki uyo haawayanihinya ni we ukati vakani, wiira wahoolo akhale ni we ukati wothene,
woohikhala toko ipottha, nanso, woovikana ipottha, toko munna oofentiya. Wo mi, uyo ri munnaka oofentiya, ni utepa n'upwaha we, toko o mwirutthuni ni toko a Apwiya.
Vano, we wakikupaliki wiira khweli mi kinkhunanaa o munroromeloni, umwaakhelele toko caahalaa ukaakhelela mi.
Wakhala wiira ihaawo yuutankanyenryawe atthuna ihaawo itthu inonlokihaa, uhele nkonthani mwaka.
Mi, Paulu, kinantikha ni matata aka: Mi kinaahala uliva; wahinhimyaka wiira ni we kinawulokiha ukumi wawaa.
Khweli, munna, mi waanakicivela kinaakhenle wa we ifayita nlattu wookhala wihu mwa Apwiya. Utteelihe nrima aka mwa Kristu!
Kimwantikhela kuukhuluvelaka wiira we unaahala ukiiwelela, ni kicuwelak'ono tho wiira unaahala upanka woopwaha culepenlyaka.
Nanso uhiya iyo, ukitthenkemanihere nipuro noomaka, maana, nlattu wo mavekelo aa, kinawehererya utaphuleliya we.
Epafra, nantthukiya nkhunanaka mwa Yesu Kristu, nawuveleelihera isalamu.
Marku ciicammo, ni Aristarku, Temasi ni Luka, mayokikavihera.
Nnema na Apwiya Yesu Kristu nikhale ni nnepa enyu othene.
Khalayi, Nluku ahoolumana mayapaapehu imaara cinci wo mananna menci atthumiriki minapiyu,
nanso ala mahuku oomalihera ala, Nluku nonuulumana antthumiriki Mwanawe. Yooyo hompanka mayowaakhela o citthu cothene, ni mwa yooyo hopattusa ittuninya.

Yooyo mwan'oyo phiri waarya wo nttittimiho ni ilatarato yoothoonyera makhalelo a Nluku. Uyo phinlipiha citthu cothene ni woorya wo nuulumo nawe. Naarapihilene atthu itampi caya, honkoma moono wo nlopwana wa Nluku o wirimu ni o'kuru cothene.
Phimaana hokhala muulupale wo waapwaha ancelo, n'uvahiya ncina no waapwaha yaayo.
Vano Nluku khaawo ncelo mwiirenlyawe wiira: We uri mwanaka, mi ilelo kihooyara. Ni eeraka tho: Mi kinhala ukhala athumwana ni we unhala ukhala mwanaka.
Nanso Nluku unruma wawe mwanawe ontthaara mwiilaponi, eenre: Ancelo othene anlapele.
Nluku, aacaka ancelo, aheera: Nluku nawaatatusa iphyoo ancelo awe, ni arumeyi awe nawaatatusa malimi o mooro.
Nanso mwa Mwanawe, eenre: Nyu Nluku, ihice enyu iri yoohimala; ni ikopo yo'lamuli wo'mwene enyu uri wo'sariya.
Vano uhofenta isariya ni uhorusanana coonanara; phimaana Nluku howiitthela makhura ootteeliha nrima wo waapwaha asikhwaa.
Ciicammo cowantikhiya cineera: Wupaceroni, Apwiya nhopattusa itthaya, ni irimu iri nteko wo mmatatani mwinyu.
Cothene cinaahala umalamala, nanso nyu nnaakhala woohimala; khweli othene ayo anaahala ukhucuwa toko ikuwo.
Nyu nnokowaapinttaca toko ikuwo, ayo anaahala upittinkuliya; nanso nyu phi nyu ni mahuku inyu khaammala.
Nluku khamwiirenle hata ncelo mmoca: Wunkome moono aka wo nlopwana, mpaka wanhalaka weesa eenani aa toko ntapita noonyakelela.
Vano ancelo phapani? Ancelo ari minepa cinruminya wiira caarumeele anhala woopwa.
Vano hi ninlamuliya uttharihelela ratta ikhweli yiiwilehu waacera wiira nihirimele.
Khuuwo waakaaka nuulumo nihimilyaya ancelo, wiira niri neekhweli; ale ahittharihelenle ni ahiiwelenle, ahottarusiya toko caaphwanenlyaya.
Ninhala wootopwa cani nahanyurihaka yoopwelo yuulupale toko ila? Yeeyo yoopwelo iyo ipacenre ulalennya na Apwiya, wahoolo phinittonkelaka atthu yiiwile.
Ciicammo Nluku hovahera usaahiti aya, ni ikanyero, malakalaka, cootikineeha cinci, n'ukawa ivahiya co Nnepa Nttakattifu wootthuna wawe.
Maana Nluku khaavahile ancelo weettiha ilapo inhala uwa, yeeyo inlalyehu.
Nanso nihaawo nipuro nantikhiye nipankenlyawe ntthu usaahiti eeraka: Vano pinatamu ri pani owiira mmuupuwelele? Ni mwana a pinatamu owiira munwacawace?
Khweli, nhompanka mwankani waavikana ancelo. Nanso nhonwariha nlemeliho ni nttittimiho.
Nheesa citthu cothene vathi inyaa cawe. Vano Nluku wanvahilyawe citthu cothene, khiiwo ihilyawe woohinvaha. Nanlelo khaninoona citthu cothene cinari vathi inyaa cawe.

Nanso nimmoona yoole pankiye mwankani waavikana ancelo, ri Yesu. Nlattu wo mahuviho o nookhwa, uyo howarihiya ikhwerempa yo nttittimiho ni nlemeliho, wiira, wo nnema na Nluku, anlawihe nookhwa nlattu wa atthu othene.
Khweli, waalamuliya wiira Nluku mwanene, pattusile citthu cothene, nlattu wo mahuviho a Yesu, ampanke yoopwelo ni aarweehe atthu enci unttittimihoni.
Maana, ule nottakattifiha na ale anttakattifihiya, othene ankhuma mwa mmoca paahi. Phimaana, Yesu khummuulihaca muru weerela, asunnaka.
Yesu heera: Kinaahala waalaleera asunnaka ncina ninyu, ni kinaahala uwiipelani icipo co nttittimiho iriyari ya atthu.
Ciicammo heera: Kinaahala unroromela. Nanlelo heera: Mi kiri va na asaana akivahilyawe Nluku.
Maana asaana ayo ahaana irutthu ni iphome, ni yooyo ciicammo haana irutthu ni iphome, waacera wiira, nlattu wo nookhwa awe, ankwanyulace ule rina ikuru co nookhwa, acuwannyaka ukhala Sotwani,
ni waataphula atthu yaapankiye ipottha ukati wothene nlattu woomoova nookhwa.
Weekhweli uyo khanaakavihera ancelo, nanso nokavihera ucuulu wa Aparahamu.
Phimaana, waalamuliya wiira uyo alikaneke na asunnawe mwa citthu cothene, waacera wiira akhale nkhulupale o mayasataka, o'kiriri ni eekhweli muntekoni wa Nluku, ni akhale mayoliva itampi ca atthu.
Ukhala wiira uyo hohuva nlattu woottehattehiya, nawoorya waakavihera ale anttehattehiya.
Phimaana, asunnaka attakattifu, nnopanka mphantte wa atthu owiihaninya wirimu, moopuwelo enyu ayo akhale mwa Yesu, ri mmitthenka ni nkhulupale o mayasataka nonlapelehu.
Uyo ri ookhuluvelyaa n'ule mweesile, toko ceenryawe Musa aari ookhuluvelyaa mwa cothene mpaani mwa Nluku.
Kontha Yesu phinomphwanela nttittimiho nothene wompwaha Musa, toko cinkhalawe mayoteka inupa, haana nttittimiho woopwaha inupa itekilyawe.
Maana, inupa yothene intekiya ni ntthu, nanso Nluku phiri mayoteka o citthu cothene.
Musa aari nrumeyi ookhuluvelyaa nhina mo'nupa ya Nluku, avaheraka usaahiti wo citthu caahala uhiminya wahoolo;
nanso Kristu, ri mwana ookhuluvelyaa nhina mo'nupa ya Nluku. Yeeyo inupa iyo niri phi hi, wakhala wiira khweli ninaavarecesa nkhuluvelo n'uwehererya uneettottopelehu mpaka wiimaleloni.
Phimaana, toko cineeraya Nnepa Nttakattifu: Nyu ilelo mweewaka ncu nawe,
nhiturumalihe mirima cinyu toko mayapaapenyu waanhanyurihilyaya Nluku ntakhwani ukati waanlawihilyaya,
wonwo ukittehattehilyaya mayapaapenyu akilawihaka, unookhalaru wiira yahoona miteko civanryaka ukati wo myakha arupayini (40).
Phimaana kihorusiya ni nenna nloko nna ni kiheera coo: Ukati wothene mirima caya ciri coohapuwa ni khaacuwelenle iphiro caka.
Vano kiholupela muuviruwani mwaka, kiiraka: Khaanhala ukela mena vakani umumula nipuro nitthenkacilyaka.
Vano asunnaka, ratta! Hikhale nohala ukhalana nrima woonanara ni woohikupali, unommwalaniha ni Nluku nkumi.
Uhiya commo, mahuku othene nlipiheraneke ntthu ni nkhwawe, ula ukati uneehaninya ilelo ula, wiira hikhale wa nyu nohala utarumiha nrima nlattu woothepiya ni itampi.
Kontha nihopanka mphantte mwa Kristu wakhalaka wiira khweli ninaavarecesa nkhuluvelo urinehu mpaka ummaleloni.
Phimaana yiiriyaka: Vano nyu ilelo mweewaka ncu nawe, nhiturumalihe mirima cinyu toko mayohanyuriha.
Vano tapani yeewile ncu na Nluku ahanyurihaka? Khaanakhala phi yaayo yaakhumile wIciipitu ni Musa?
Ni tapani yaarusanannyawe Nluku ukati wo myakha arupayini (40)? Khaanakhala ale yaakosile, mpaka irutthu caya ukhwa ntakhwani?
Tapani aalupelenle wiira khaanhala ukela muumumulani mwawe? Khaanakhala ale yahaatthunne wiiwelela?
Paahi, phoonnehu wiira nlattu woohiiwelela, khayoonrye ukela muumumulani.
Vano, ukhala wiira nihokhuluvelihiya ukela wumumulani wa Nluku, hikhale hata ntthu mmoca wa nyu nohala wuupuwela wiira hovonyiha.
Maana hi niholaleeriya nhupi woorera, na ayo ciicammo, nanso nhupi wiiwilyaya khawaarina ifayita, kontha khawaatakaneenle ni nroromelo wa ale yeewile.

Phimaana hi nikupanli va, ninkokela wumumulani, toko Nluku cihimilyawe eeraka: Kiholupela muuviruwani mwaka, kiiraka: Khaanhala ukela mena vakani umumula nipuro nitthenkacilyaka. Nluku oolumaca commo namalihilene khalayi wuumpa ittuninya.
Vano nihaawo nipuro noolumacilyawe nlahanya wo nihuku no ntivela, eeraka: Nluku ahomumula nihuku no ntivela miteko caavarawe.
Ni ikwaha ikina tho, aheera: Khaanhala ukela mena vakani umumula nipuro nitthenkacilyaka.
Vano anaahala akina wiira akele wumumulani nwo, ni ale alaleeriye wupaceroni nhupi woorera, khaakenle nlattu woohiiwelela.
Phimaana Nluku heesa tho nihuku nikina, eehanaka ilelo, ahomuulumana Taviti, unavinrene toko cantikhiyaya wupaceroni: Nyu ilelo mweewaka ncu nawe, nhiturumalihe mirima cinyu.
Maana unari wiira Yosuwe ahaavahaca umumula, Nluku kaahala wuuluma aacaka nihuku nikina.
Paahi, unaahala nanlelo umumula wo'nethi wa Nluku.
Maana ule kenle wumumulani wa Nluku, naamumula mmitekoni mwawe, toko Nluku ceenryawe woomumula mmitekoni mwawe.
Vano nrwee niikurumice wiira nikele wumumulani nwo waacera hikhale tho nohala uhaleela toko caahaleenlyaya ale yaahanyurihile.

Maana nuulumo na Nluku niri nikumi, no'kuru ni noononinya woopwaha ikatana yo wiitha miphantte coomiili; nenno ninaaneela mpaka ukawaniha iroho ni nnepa, nluttanihiyaya mpaka nnikhuvani, ninaacuwela moopuwelo ni imphavelaya nrima.
Khiiwo ikhiyumpe iri yo wiipithyaa wamiithoni wa Nluku, kontha citthu cothene ciri wamiithoni wa ule nohalehu umwaakhula.
Vano ukhala wiira nihaana nkhulupale o mayasataka, Yesu, Mwanawe Nluku, kenle wirimu, nivarecese nroromelo nikupanlihu.
Maana hi khanirina nkhulupale o mayasataka hinoorya unoonela ikiriri nlattu wookenkennya wihu; nirina nkhulupale o mayasataka ttehattehiye toko hi, nanso woohikosa.
Phimaana, niphiye ni nkhuluvelo wahiceni wo nnema, wiira naakhele ikiriri waacera nikaviheriye waphiyaka ukati.
Kontha, nkhulupale o mayasataka nothanliya iriyari ya atthu, nokhuma wa atthu wiira anrumeele Nluku, waacera wiira avahe ni aveleelihe isataka nlattu wo'tampi.
Uyo nawoorya woonela ikiriri atthu oohicuwela itthu ni ampanka coonanara, maana n'uyo unaamphwanyaka ukenkennyaa.
Phimaana uyo nolamuliya uveleeliha isataka awe ni isataka ya atthu nlattu wo'tampi.
Khaawo neehelela nna nttittimiho nna, ari hikhanle ule eehaninye ni Nluku, toko Aroni.
Ciicammo, Kristu kheevahile nttittimiho wiira akhale nkhulupale o mayasataka, nanso Nluku phimwiirenle: We uri mwanaka, mi ilelo kihooyara.
Nipuro nikhwawe ihantikhiya wiira: We uri mayasataka oohimala, o mananna a Melekesatiki.
Yesu mahuku yaaryawe nttuniyani ahoswali venci ni miithori ni akhuwelaka anvekelaka ule aahala umoopola wukhwani. Mavekelo awe yaheewiya nlattu wo wiiwelela wawe.
Yesu, aanookhalaru mwana, aheetthuca wiiwelela mmahuvihoni.
Vano ukwanihera wawe, hothatuwa moopoli oohimala wa ale othene ammwiiwelela.
Nluku honthanla ukhala nkhulupale o mayasataka, o mananna a Melekesatiki.
Mwa yoola mwaha ula nihaana cowuhimeryani cinci coorikarika utaphulela, maana nyu nheepanka oopica wiitthuca.
Unokhalaru ula ukati ula wiira mwaaphavela ukhala aalimu, nnomphavela ntthu oohala wusomihani tho ikettelo coopacera co nuulumo na Nluku. Nnophavelaca mahaaca woohikhala iyolya yoolipa.
Maana ule neehephela mahaaca, nanlelo ri mwana ni khanaya ucuwela nuulumo no'sariya.
Nanso iyolya yoolipa, iri ya atthu oolupale, yaayo alemalenle ukati wothene, uhiyaniha yoorera ni yoonanara.

Vano nrwee nihiye miitthuciho coopacera ceemwaamini, nipwaherere ni miitthuciho ceemwaamini o wunnuwa munnepani. Nihiyeke wuupuserana miitthuciho coopacera, toko urukunusa nrima wo miteko cinnirwaana wuukhwani ni nroromelo na Nluku,
miitthuciho co'pattiso n'uthateliya wo matata, ni wunwelela wa atthu ookhwa n'uhukhumwinya woohimala.
Commo phinhalehu upanka, Nluku atthunaka.
Kontha ale amwaleeliye ni alawihile coorera co wirimu, ni apankile mphantte wo citthu coorera co Nnepa Nttakattifu,
alawihile nuulumo noorera na Nluku ni ikuru cinhala uwa,
yawuluwaka, khawanooryaa urukunusa tho nrima; maana yaayo, ahonkhomela tho mwana a Nluku ni ahontarawihaca waatthuni.
Maana, imaara cinci itthaya inrupeliya ipula cimelaka coolya, iri yo'fayita wa ale anlima wiira yaakhele iparakha ca Nluku.
Nanso itthaya inrupeliya ipula cimelaka miiwa ni itulu, khimphaveliya ni inaalaphiya. Wiimaleloni waya itthaya iyo uri upahiya.
Asunnaka oofentiya, hata nuulumacaka commo ninaakupaleela wiira nyu nhaana iparakha comaana cinkhuma uwoopwani.
Kontha Nluku kahimwe oohi isariya owiira aliyale miteko cinvarenyu ni nifento nithoonyenrenyu mwa ncina nawe, maana nhaakavihera attakattifu ni nanlelo nneera mwaakaviheraka.
Nimphavela wiira khula ntthu wa nyu, athoonyere wiivaherera wawe mpaka wiimaleloni, waacera nkhalane ikhweli yo nwehereryo woolikana,
wiira nhikhale owoolwaa, nanso nkhale o waatakiha ale anaakhela cikhuluvelihiyaya, nlattu wo nroromelo n'uvilela.
Nluku ahonkhuluveliha Aparahamu, ni nlattu woohikhala nkina muulupale owiira anlupele, aheelupela mwanene,
eeraka: Khweli mi kinaahala wureriha ni wuncerera ucuulu aa.
Vano awehereryak'ono n'upisa nrima, ahaakhela caakhuluvelihiyawe.
Atthu anonlupela ule ri muulupale owaapwaha ayo, ni cinlupelaya cinkhala cookhuluvelyaa mwa ayo, mpaka wahinkhalaya unyakulihana.
Vano Nluku aphavelaka uthoonyihera makhalelo awe oohirukunusaciya w'etthu imphavelawe waavaha mayowaakhela nkhuluveliho, uyo aholipihera n'ulupela,
wiira ni citthu piili cihimpittinkuliya, wo cennyo Nluku khanoorya wootha. Nikhale oopisa nrima, hi nintthawelenle yooyo wiira niphwanye nwehereryo ukhuluvelihiyehu.
Hi nihaana nenno nroromelo nno wanrimani wihu toko nankora nolipiha ikalawa. Nkhuluvelo ehu uyo uhokela mpaka uttuli waya ikuwo inkawaniha inupa ya Nluku;
