nipuro nikenlyawe Yesu, akhalaka mayasataka oohimala, o mananna a Melekesatiki.
Yooyo Melekesatiki uyo, aari mwene o'Salemu ni mayasataka a Nluku Ooculu. Aparahamu ukati waaturuwawe ukhottoni waatthemilyawe mamwene, Melekesatiki ahorwaa umoonanana yooyo ni ahonreriha.
Vano Aparahamu ahonvaha Melekesatiki mphantte wonakhumi wo citthu cothene. Ncina na Melekesatiki, maanaya wiira mwene o'sariya, mwene o'Salemu, ari mwene o mpuha.
Khaarina athumwane hata anumwane, mena nloko; khacuweliye upacera wo mahuku awe hata umala wo mahuku awe. Melekesatiki aari toko mwana a Nluku, ni ri nkhulupale o mayasataka oohimala.
Vano nkoonani, mananna Melekesatiki caaryawe muulupale, mpaka athumwanihu Aparahamu waanvahilyaya mphantte wonakhumi wo mihakhu caakihenryaya.

Nlamulo na Musa nihohimya wiira mayasataka ari ucuulu wa Levi, unawaaphwanela waakhela mphantte wonakhumi wo citthu cinkhuma wa atthu. Ayo anawaakhelaca wa asunnaya, hata anookhalaru ucuulu wa Aparahamu.
Nanso Melekesatiki ahaalikeleliye munlokoni na Levi, ahaakhela mphantte wonakhumi wa Aparahamu ni ahonreriha ule aakhuluvelihiye.
Vano woohaakanyaca, mwankani naarerihiya ni muulupale.
Mayasataka anaakhela mphantte wonakhumi ari ph'ale ankhwa, nanso Melekesatiki aakhenle mphantte wonakhumi, ph'ule ri nkumi.
Maanaya wiira Aparahamu waavahilyawe mphantte wonakhumi, Levi ukhala wiira n'uyo ucuulu unaakhela mphantte wonakhumi, ciicammo n'uyo hovaha.
Kontha yooyo ukati uyo Aparahamu waamoonanannyawe Melekesatiki, Levi aari hinaya uyaryaa.

Nlamulo naakhenlyaya unethi wo'Sirayeli naakhuma munlokoni na Levi. Vano unari wiira nteko woomayasataka wa Levi waari woomalela, khaahala ukhumelela tho mayasataka nkina, o mananna a Melekesatiki, woohikhala o mananna a Aroni.
Maana nteko wo mayasataka wapittinkusiyaka, ni nlamulo nno ciicammo ninaapittinkusiya.
Nnya citthu nnya cimmwaaca Yesu, ri o nloko nikina ni khaawo hata ntthu mmoca munlokoni mwawe aari mayasataka.
Uhocuweliya wiira Apwiy'ehu akhumile nloko na ayuta, ni mwa nenno nloko nno, Musa khoolumacile hata itthu imoca mwaha wo miteko co mayasataka.
Cothene cinawoonnya maana hokhumelela mayasataka nkina oolikana ni Melekesatiki,
yooyo hipankiye ni nlamulo no'rutthu, nanso pankiye ni ikuru co'kumi uhinkwanyuwa.
Cowantikhiya cineera: We uri mayasataka oohimala, o mananna a Melekesatiki.
Kontha ikettelo coopacera nnyo cihokhwelihiya nlattu wookhala cookenkennyaa ni coohi ifayita.
Maana Nlamulo na Musa khanoonrye ureriha itthu woomalela, vano phiwilyaya nkhuluvelo nkina womaana ni unnipiiha wa Nluku.
Iyo khikhumelenle woohilupela. Akina ahokhala mayasataka woohilupeliya,
nanso uyo, khanle mayasataka n'ulupela, Nluku wamwiirenlyawe: Apwiya aholupela ni khaanhala uhokolosa ilupenlyaya: We uri mayasataka oohimala.
Nlattu wo yeeyo, Yesu hokhala nleehano nuulupale noororomelya.
Vano khalayi yahaawo mayasataka enci yaarenttelana, nlattu wo nookhwa, khayaapwaherera uvara nteko aya;
nanso Yesu rina ukumi woohimala, yooyo phi mayasataka oohimala.
Phimaana, nawoorya woopola woomalela ale ammwaattamerya Nluku mwa yooyo, kontha uyo ukati wothene nawaavekelela.
Maana Yesu phiri nkhulupale o mayasataka aamphavelehu: Nttakattifu, oohikosa, oorera nrima, oohaalikanana anatampi, ni onnuwihiye wirimu.

Khari toko mayasataka akina, uyo khamphavela uveleeliha isataka khula nihuku, woopacera nlattu wo'tampi cawe, ni wahoolo itampi ca atthu. Maana uyo hovaha isataka yothene weekwaha imoca paahi, wiivaherenryawe mwanene.
Kontha Nlamulo niheesa atthu ookenkennyaa ukhala mayasataka, nanso ulupeliya uwile uhoolo waya Nlamulo, nihomwesa Mwana ukhala mayasataka oomalela ukati wothene.
Vano, itthu yuulupale inhimyehu iri yo wiira, nihaana nkhulupale o mayasataka, onkomile wirimu moono nlopwana wo'hice ya Nluku o'kuru cothene.
Uyo ri muulupale o'khipula yo'khweli, yo heema ntekilyaya Apwiya; oohitekiya ni ntthu.
Maana khula mayasataka vahaceriye uveleeliha isataka ni coovaha. Phimaana, yooyo mayasataka uyo nolamuliya ukhalana yoovaha.
Vano aari mwiilaponi, khaahala ukhala nkhulupale o mayasataka, ukhala wiira ahaawo ale anveleela coovaha, toko cantikhiyaya muNlamuloni.

Ayo anhoolela wakhipulani ari nthoonyero ni irunku yo citthu ciri wirimu, toko Musa caahimeriyawe ni Nluku ukati waaphavelawe unkhurutula heema a Nluku; maana yeeriye coo: We, upanke cothene toko cithoonyeriyaa umwaakoni.
Nanso nteko uvahiyawe Yesu, uri muulupale wo waapwaha ayo, kontha nleehano noonryawe upanka phiri nootepa urera, maana nno niri munkhuluvelihoni wo citthu cootepa urera.
Maana nleehano noopacera nno naari nootepa urera, khanaahala upankiya tho nonayeeli.
Nanso Nluku ahoona yaahaleela munethini, ni aheera coo: Aneera aphiyaka mahuku wanhalaka upanka nleehano nonaanano n'unethi wo'Sirayeli ni wo'Yuta; aneera ph'Apwiya.
Khunhala ukhala toko nleehano nipankilyaka ni mayapaapa aya, nihuku naakumihilyaka wIciipitu ni ntata naka, nanso nlattu woohittharihelela nleehano naka, mi akaawacawacile tho, aneera ph'Apwiya.

Nna phi nleehano ninhalaka upanka n'unethi wo'Sirayeli, anavinrene yaayo mahuku ayo, aneera ph'Apwiya. Kinaahala uhela malamulo aka mmuruni mwaya ni wantikha wanrimani waya. Mi kinhala ukhala Nluku aya, na ayo anhala ukhala unethi aka.
Khaawo nohala umwiitthuciha mwaattamanani awe, mena munnawe, eeraka: Waacuwele Apwiya. Maana othene ammokicuwela, ukhuma asaana mpaka oolupale.
Kontha kinaahala waalevelela coonanara caya, ni akinhala wuupuwelela tho itampi caya.
Paahi, weeriyaka nleehano nonaanano, maanaya wiira nokhalayi nno nihokhucuwa; nihanle ukhwelakhwela.
Vano, nleehano noopacera, nahaana ikettelo caya cittakattifu ni ikhipula yo mwiilaponi.
Toko commo, ahokhurutuliya heema, aakawanihinye miphantte miili. Mphantte wo'hoolo, weehaninya nipuro nittakattifu, weesiyaya isamaninya, meeca ni mikatthe coovahereriya Nluku.
Withela wo'kuwo yonayeeli, wahaawo mphantte weehaninya Nipuro Nittakattifu Cinene,

wonwo waaryaya ikhipula yo'wooru waapahiyawe lumpani, ni waaryaya ikasa yo nleehano yothene yoopankiya ni iwooru. Mommo nkasani mmo wahaawo mwaapu waaheliya manaa, ikopo ya Aroni yaaphuwenle ithutu ni mapawu o maluku o nleehano.
Waculu waya ikasa yahaawo ancelo o waarya, yaakhuneela waculu ikasa ele ni irunku aya. Nanso wo nnya citthu nnya khaninhala wuulumacera nna va woomalela.
Vano cinatthenkaciyene nnya citthu nnya, mayasataka yaankela nipuro nittakattifu no heema uvara miteko caya mahuku othene.

Nanso nipuro nonayeeli, aakela veekha nkhulupale o mayasataka, wo khula mwakha ikwaha imoca ni khaakela woohikusa iphome, wiira avaherere isataka yawawe ni isataka ya atthu othene, nlattu wo'tampi cihincuwelaya.
Commo, Nnepa Nttakattifu waanthoonyera wiira waari uhinaya uthoonyera iphiro yorwaa nipuro nittakattifu cinene nari nanlelo yooyo heema oopacera uyo.
Vano iyo iri nthoonyero w'ala mahuku ala; inthoonyera wiira coovaha ni coovahereriya, khacaahala waareriha nrima mayolompa ayo.
Caari ikettelo caawacawaca paahi coolya ni coowurya, ni ikano cikina coorapiha irutthu ni maasi. Cennyo ikettelo co mwirutthuni nnyo ciheleliye mpaka ukati wo nlamulo nonaanano.
Vano wawilyawe Kristu ri nkhulupale o mayasataka wo citthu coorera ciri nna va, uyo hokela nheemani muulupale ni oomalela, oohitekiya na atthu, maanaya wiira, oohikhala o yeela iphattu ila.
Woohikhala nlattu wo'phome yo'khontwaa ni yo'puri, nanso mwa iphome awe, hokela nipuro nittakattifu cinene weekwaha imoca paahi, ni honoopola woohimala.
Kontha, wakhalaka wiira iphome yo'puri atthuna yo'mope ni ittura yo mwakhontwaa, caattikittheliya ale ari o mahirihiri, na ayo caarerihaka mwirutthuni,

utepa n'upwaha iphome ya Kristu nlattu wo Nnepa woohimala, heevaherera woohi mahirihiri wa Nluku, ni naahala urapiha nrima ehu nlattu wo miteko cinnirwaana wuukhwani, waacera wiira ninrumeele Nluku nkumi!

Phimaana Kristu hoorya upanka nleehano nonaanano, waacera wiira ale aneehaninya yaakhele nkhuluveliho woohiyeriya wo citthu coohimala, maana uyo khwile toko mayowaakihera nlattu wo'tampi caapankiya ukati wo nleehano noopacera.
Maana nipuro niri nleehano, nincuwannya nakhwile ule pankile nleehano;
kontha nleehano ninkhalana nteko akhwaaka pankile ule. Nanso akhalaka nkumi pankile ule kaninkalana nteko.
Phimaana, nleehano noopacera naapankiye ni iphome yo'nama.

Musa nahimyacilene malamulo toko caalamuliyaya weettela atthu othene, ahokusa iphome yo mwakhontwaa ni yo'mope, ciicammo maasi, mapururu ookhwiila ni ahokusa mwiila n'utathela iliivuru ile n'unethi wothene,
eeraka: Ila iri iphome yo nleehano, ilamunlyawe Nluku wiira mwiiwelele.
Ahottikitthela iphome waheemani, ciicammo ni ikaruma cothene co nteko nttakattifu.
Phimaana, toko cinhimyaya Nlamulo, citthu cinci cinrerihiya ni iphome, ni woohivuva iphome khuuwo uleveleliya.
Nnya citthu nnya caari nlikaniho no citthu cokhweli ciri wirimu, caaphwanelannya urapihiya cennyo isataka nnyo, nanso citthu cuulupale co wirimu, cimphwanelannya ni isataka cuulupale cikhwaya.
Maana Kristu khakenle ikhipula yootekiya na atthu, iri nthoonyero wo nipuro no'khweli. Uyo howela wirimu wiira eethoonyihere wa Nluku ni anivekelele.
Kuhimwe wiira eevaherenre imaara cinci, toko nkhulupale o mayasataka nokela Nipuro Nittakattifu Cinene myakha cothene ni iphome ihiri yawawe.

Yiiriyaka waari commo, Kristu aalamuliya uhuva imaara cinci, ikhumelo yompiyeru ittuninya. Nanso vano, uyo ahowa ikwaha imoca weemaara cothene ummaleloni wo'kati, wiira amalihe itampi eepankaka isataka.
Toko commo, caalikeleliyawe ntthu ukhwa ikwaha imoca paahi, wahoolo puhukhumwinyaka,

ciicammo Kristu, hovahereriya toko isataka ikwaha imoca paahi, wiira atamihe itampi ca atthu enci; naahala uwa ikwaha yonayeeli, woohikhala wiira atamihe itampi, nanso wiira awiihe woopwa wa ale anommwehererya.
Nlamulo ninwiiha paahi irunku yo citthu co'fayita co'hoolo. Phimaana nenno khaninoorya waareriha ale ammwaattamerya Nluku anvahaka isataka khula mwakha.
Waari wiira atthu anonlapela Nluku ahorapihiya itampi caya, khayaahala woona wiira ahaana itampi, ni isataka cothene caammala.
Nanso cennya isataka nnya ciri co wuupusera itampi khula mwakha,
maana iphome yo'puri ni yo'khontwaa khinoorya utamiha itampi.
Phimaana, Kristu wawilyawe wattuniyani, aheera: Isataka ni coovaha khantthunne, nanso irutthu nhokitthenkacera.
Khacuucivenleni isataka coopahiya ni coovahiya nlattu wo'tampi.
Vano mi kaheera: Kihaawo mi va! Nliivuruni nhantikhiya nlattu wawaka mi. Kiwile wiira kipanke utthuna winyu, Nluku aka.
Woopacera eenre: Isataka, coovahereriya ni coopahiya nlattu wo'tampi khantthunne ni khacuucivenleni, cennyo caapankiya toko cinhimyaya Nlamulo.
Vano ahoncerera eeraka: Mi kiri va, kiwile wiira kipanke utthuna winyu. Commo Nluku ahomaliha isataka yoopacera ni aheesa wanipuroni waya isataka yonayeeli.
Ukhala wiira Yesu Kristu hottharihelela utthuna wa Nluku, hi nihottakattifihiya nlattu wo'sataka yo'rutthu awe, ivahereriye weekwaha imoca paahi.
Vano wo khula nihuku, mayasataka othene nawiithoonyera avaraka nteko wo'ttiini; anawaakulelihaca uvaha isataka cimocaru, cihinoorya umaliha itampi.
Nanso Yesu, navahilene isataka imoca yeeyo yo mahuku othene nlattu wo'tampi, honkoma moono nlopwana wa Nluku.
Ukhuma vaavale mpaka uhoolo, uyo naawehererya mpaka eenani awe weesiya vathi inyaa cawe.
Maana, wo'sataka imoca paahi, ahomalela ukati wothene atthu anttakattifihiya.
Nnepa Nttakattifu ciicammo unaanipankela usaahiti wo yaayo mananna ayo. Woopacera uyo uneera:
Nna phi nleehano ninhalaka upanka n'unethi wo'Sirayeli, anavinrene yaayo mahuku ayo, aneera ph'Apwiya. Kinaahala uhela malamulo aka wanrimani waya, ni wantikha mmuruni mwaya.
Ahoncerera tho eeraka: Mi akinhala wuupuwelela tho itampi caya ni coonanara caya.
Vano nipuro nileveleliye itampi, khuuwo tho uvahereriya isataka wa cennyo.
Phimaana asunnaka, nihaana nkhuluvelo wo wiira nikele nipuro nittakattifu cinene ni iphome ya Yesu,
wo'phiro ikumi ni yonaanano inihulenlyawe ni ikuwo inkawaniha inupa ya Nluku, maanaya wiira, wo'rutthu awe.
Vano nihaana nkhulupale o mayasataka mpaani mwa Nluku.
Commo, nimwaattamerye Nluku ni nrima weekhweli ni nroromelo noomalela, ninarinene mirima coorapihiya ni coorerihiya nlattu wo coonanara, ni irutthu cihu coorapihiya ni maasi oorera.
Nvarecese ratta nwehereryo unlalyehu, maana ule khuluvelihile ri eekhweli.
Niwaceraneke ntthu ni nkhwawe, wiira nivarecese nifento n'upanka coorera.
Nihihiye uthukumana toko ikereca, toko cilemalenlyaya akina; nilipiherane ntthu ni nkhwawe, utepa n'upwaha ula ukati unaattameryaya nihuku noomaliha.
Maana napwahereraka ukosa, ninapacenrene ucuwela ikhweli, vano khiiwo tho isataka yoolevelela itampi;
woovirikana commo, uhanle uwa paahi mooro ni ihukhumu yo woopiha immwa waamalamaliha eenani a Nluku.
Vano ntthu aakhotta Nlamulo na Musa, aaneeviya wohooneliya ikiriri, aneewiyene asaahiti eeli atthuna araru.
Vano inhala waakhumelela isiyani ale anontarawaca mwana a Nluku, avenwihaka iphome yaarapihile yo nleehano na Nluku? Ni inhala waakhumelela isiyani ale anruwana Nnepa wo nnema?
Kontha nihoncuwela ule eenre: Phi mi kinlivyaanihera; mi kinaahala uturusela. Ni heera tho: Apwiya anaahala uhukhumu unethi aya.
Itthu yootepa woopiha iri uwuluwela mmatatani mwa Nluku nkumi.
Vano muupuwele mahuku oopacera avinre, ukati waamwaleeliyenyu ni waavilenlenyu nkhottoni ni mmahuvihoni.
Imaara cikina mwaanruwaninya n'uhuvihiya; ukati nkina mwahopanka mphantte na ale yaahuvihiya.
Nyu mwahoonela ikiriri ale yaatthukiye ni mwahokupaleela n'utteeliya uhukhaceriya caarinenyu, ni nyu mwahovilela cothene nnyo, maana mwaancuwela wiira nhaana nhakhu mwinci ni woohimala.
Phimaana nhivolole, maana iyo phinwaana nlipihero wo'tthuvo yuulupale.
Ciicammo, nnolamuliya uvilela. Mwapankaka utthuna wa Nluku, nnawaakhela ikhuluvelihilyawe.
Maana: Wo'kati vakani, ule nowa, naahala uwa woohipica.
Nasariya aka nohala ukhala nkumi nlattu wo nroromelo. Nanso aturuwelaka uttuli, mi akinhala utteeliya n'uyo.
Vano hi, khanihimwe ale anturuwela uttuli ni akwanyulaciyaka, nanso hi niri ale ankupali ni yoopwaka.
Vano, nroromelo niri ikhweli yo citthu cinwehereryehu, n'ukupali wo citthu cihinoonnya.
Maana nlattu wo nroromelo, atthu o khalayi phaakhenlyaya usaahiti wo maana.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, ninaacuwela wiira ittuninya yuumpiye ni nuulumo na Nluku; mpaka ile inoonnya khayumpiye ni itthu inoonnya.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Apeli ahonvaha Nluku isataka yomaana wompwaha Kayini, mpaka ahokupaliya ukhala nasariya, Nluku waattottopenlyawe coovaha cawe. Hata nakhwilene, ninlelo nawuuluma.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Enoki hokusiya ni khanlawihile nookhwa; mpaka woohooninya tho, maana Nluku honkusa. Kontha ahinaya ukusiya, ahaana usaahiti woonciveliha Nluku.
Vano woohi nroromelo khawanooryaa unciveliha Nluku, maana ule nomwaattamerya Nluku, nolamuliya ukupali wiira uyo khweli haawo ni nantthuva ule nomwaavya.

Nlattu wo nroromelo, Nowee waahimeriyawe ni Nluku mananna caahalaya ukhumelela citthu caari cihinaya woonnya ni amoovaka Nluku, ahopanka ikalawa wiira oopole ntthoko nawe. Nlattu wo nroromelo, uyo hohukhumu ittuninya ni hokhala mayowaakhela isariya inkhuma munroromeloni.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Aparahamu weehaninyawe, aheewelela ni ahorwaa nipuro naahalawe waakhela coohalana; aanohicuwelaru nipuro naarwawe.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, aheettakaca ilapo yaakhuluvelihiyawe inari ilapo ya amalaponi; ahokhala mmaheemani, ciicammo Isaki ni Yakopi, othene ale yaari mayowaakhela yaakhuluvelihiye wamocaru.
Maana aawehererya isittatti yoopankiya caasa, mayothipelaca n'uteka nari mwanene Nluku.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, ciicammo Sara aahookhalaru mwali eekupa ni o wuuluvala, ahovahiya ikuru coonnyara mwana, maana ahonkupali wiira ri eekhweli ule aankhuluvelihile.
Phimaana, mwa ntthu mmoca owuuluvala ahaawehererya uyara, ahokhumelela atthu enci toko itthoottwa co wirimu ni oohaalikelyaa toko nhaava wo mpahari.
Paahi othene ala yaakhala ni nroromelo ni akhwile ahinaphwanya caakhuluvelihiyaya, nanso yahoona nttayi-nttayi, cahaacivela, ni yahokupali wiira khweli ari aletto ni mayoweettakaca o mwiilaponi.
Maana ale anoolumaca toko commo anthoonyera wiira amphavelaca ilapo yookhala.
Vano yiiriyaka wiira yahoopuwela ilapo ikhumilyaya, caano anaturuwile.
Nanso yaawehererya ilapo yoorera venci, maanaya wiira wirimu. Phimaana, Nluku khanoolihaciya muru wiihaninya Nluku aya, kontha haatthenkacera isittatti.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Aparahamu waalawihiyawe ni Nluku, ahonvaha Isaki ukhala isataka. Yoole aakhelenle cookhuluvelihiya, aahanle vakani umpanka isataka mwanawe ontthaara,
hata aanowiireliyaru ni Nluku: Mwa Isaki, phinhalaya ukhumelela ucuulu aa.
Maana Aparahamu ahokupali wiira Nluku nawonweleliha atthu ookhwa, ni iyo inthoonyera wiira Aparahamu homwaakhela Isaki toko ntthu aakhwile.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Isaki ahonreriha Yakopi ni Isawu, nlattu wo citthu caahalaya uphwanya uhoolo.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Yakopi waahanlyawe vakani ukhwa, ahaareriha asaana a Yusufu ni ahonlapela Nluku naphitenryene nttontto awe.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, ummaleloni wo mahuku a Yusufu, ahohimyaca mananna caahalaya ukhuma asaana a Sirayeli, ni ciicammo ahovaha nlamulo caahalaya wiirihiya makhuva awe.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Musa nayariyene naanano, ahovithavithiya myeeri miraru na asithumwane, maana yahomoona wiira mwan'ole aari oorera, ni ciicammo khayoovile nlamulo na mwene.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Musa ukati wonnuwilyawe, ahokhotta wiihaninya mwana a mwana mwanthiyana a Farawoo;
ahotthuna uhuvihiya wamoca n'unethi wa Nluku woohikhala utthumiri citthu co'tampi ciri co'kati vakani.
Uyo ahoona wiira phatari utarawaciya nlattu wa Kristu, woohikhala ukhalana mihakhu cothene co wIciipitu. Maana miitho awe yaanoona itthuvo awe yo'hoolo.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Musa ahokhuma wIciipitu, wohoova uviruwa wa mwene, nanso ahopwaherera ulipa, kontha aammoona ule hinoonnya.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, Musa ahompanka Paasikuwa ni ahottikitthela iphome mmikhorani, wiira ncelo mayowiiva haakwanye asaana ontthaara a annasirayeli.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, unethi waholapuwa Ipahari Yookhwiila toko watthayani yo wuuma, nanso annaciipitu waaphavelaya waatakiha, yahomiriya othene ni maasi.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, iluwani yo'Yeriko yahokomwaaca inarukureriyene mahuku saapa.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, puuta Rahapi kheeviye wamoca na atthu oohiiwelela, kontha haakhelela orattene mayohottela.
Vano kinhala uhimyani tho? Akirina ukati wo wiira kuulumace ihaali ya Kiteyau, Paraki, Sansau, Yefte, Taviti, Samuweli ni yo minapiyu.
Yaayo atthu ayo, nlattu wo nroromelo, yahotthema umwene n'ulamuli, yahopanka isariya, yahaakhela yaakhuluvelihiyaya, yahotthuka malaku a akharamu;
yahottipihaca mooro, yahokuluphuwa wiiviya ni ikatana, mukenkennyani yahophwanya ikuru, yahaana ikuru cowaana ikhotto, yahotthema itoropa cookhuma ilapo cikina.
Nlattu wo nroromelo, yahaawo athiyana yaakhenle amuci aya yaakhwile yunwelelaka. Akina yahotulumwinya, wahintthunaya waakihiya, wiira aphwanye wunwelela womaana.
Akina, yahotarawaciya ni waafyulaciya; akina yahotthukiya n'unyolo, n'utthukeliya nkalaposo.
Yahovonyakaciya ni maluku, yahottupulanihinya iriyariru, yaheeviya ni ikatana. Yaari o weetteetta, yaawara marapala o'khontwaa ni o'puri, yaari oothennya, oocukulihaciya ni oohuvihiya.
Yaayo atthu ayo, ittuninya khayaaphwanenle. Yeettakaca muthakoni, mmyaakoni, mmakhukuni ni mmiliwini cuulupale.
Vano othene ala aphwanyile usaahiti woorera nlattu wo nroromelo naya, nanso othene ayo, khaawo aakhenle ile yaakhuluvelihiye.
Maana Nluku ahonitthenkemanihera itthu yoorera, waacera wiira hi wamoca ni ayo nirerihiye woomalela.
Phimaana ni hi ciicammo, ukhala wiira nihorukureriya ni nihutte nuulupale na asaahiti, nootopwe ni nrintti woolemela wo'tampi cirinehu, nitthawatthawe n'uvilela, muntekoni urinehu ula,
ninwehaka Yesu paahi pacenre ni malihenre nroromelo nihu; yooyo, nlattu wotteeliya weesiye uhoolo wawe, hovilela nsalapa, khahelelenle utarawaciya ni honkoma wahiceni wa Nluku.
Mmuupuwelele ule vileenle uvaanyihiya na atthu ookosa, aaceraka wiira nyu nhitoomwe ni nhivolole munnepani.
Vano nkhottoni yo waanana itampi, nyu nanlelo khannaya uvilela mpaka umwarusa iphome enyu.
Nyu nholiyala nuulumo noolipihera ninoovahaweni toko asaanawe, niiraka: Mwanaka, uhikhotte upwapweliya unkhuma wa Apwiya, ni uhirusiye nlattu wo wuuttarusa,
maana Apwiya anaapwapwela ale anaafentaya, ni anawaattarusa ale anaakhelelaya toko asaanaya.
Nvilele mahuviho, mwaakhelelaka toko uttarusiya; Nluku noowacawacani toko asaanawe. Vano, haawo mwana himpwapweliya na athumwane?
Nanso nyu mwahipwapweliyeke toko cineerannyaya na asaana othene a Nluku, mweeco khannakhala asaana eekhweli.
Uhiya commo, nahaana mayathumwanihu o mwirutthuni yaanipwapwela ni hi naawaahisimu. Vano ninhala uhiivaherera cani wa athumwanihu o munnepani wiira nikhale akumi?
Kontha mayapaapehu yaannipwapwela wo'kati vakani, toko coonelaya urera, nanso Nluku nonipwapwela wiira nikhale ratta ni nipanke mphantte woottakattifu awe.
Khuuwo upwapweliya untteeliha nrima yooyo ukati uyo, nanso unkhala woocukuliha, wahoolo unaavaha nhokorokho wo'sariya ni nnema wa ale ampwapweliya ale.
Phimaana, nlipihe ni nwuse matata enyu amontile ni makutha enyu ookenkennyaa.
Mwaake iphiro co wookwa, waacera wiira oottumpela ahirimele, nanso avonihinye.
Nkhalane nnema n'uttakattifu na atthu othene. Woohikhalana uttakattifu, khaawo nohala umoona Nluku.
Mwiirattavelele wiira hikhale nohala uhiya nnema na Nluku; uhiphuwele ntithari wowaawa, unhala waatankanya atthu enci;
ni hikhale ooluva atthuna nkaafiri, toko Isawu, aatumihile iyuulupale yontthara nawe nlattu wo iyolya.
Toko cincuwelenyu wiira, wahoolo waaphavelacilyawe urerihiya, ahokhottiya ni khaarina tho mananna ooturusa yaalakenlyawe, hata waahookhalaru wiira, mareriho ayo aavya ni miithori.
Maana nyu khamphiile mwaako unkwanyinya, yooyo umpharela mooro, ni khamphiile mpiphini, ni mapuro ooripela, mena mapuro ari nkhaya.
Uruma waya nipalapatta ni wiiwannya wo macu, atthu ale yaholepela wiira ahuulumaninye tho.
Ukhala wiira ayo khayoorya uvilela citthu caahimya wiira: Hikhale nohala ukwanya mwaako, hata mwannama. Nohala ukwanya naavonyakaciya ni maluku.
Vano yaakhumelenle ile yaari yootepa woopiha, mpaka Musa aheera: Mi ukoopiha ni kinaattettemela!
Nanso nhophiya umwaakoni Siyoni, Yerusalemu o wirimu ni isittatti ya Nluku nkumi. Nhophiya wa ancelo oohaalikelyaa athukumanne atteeliyaka nrima,
ni ikereca ya asaana ontthaara, yaayo macina aya yantikhiye wirimu. Nyu nhophiya wa Nluku, ri hukhumu a atthu othene, ni minepa ca atthu o'sariya oomalela.
Nyu nhophiya wa Yesu, mwanene nleehano nonaanano, ni iphome ittikittheliye, inoolumaca ratta woopwaha iphome ya Apeli.
Kaasope! Nhinkhottele ule noolumaca. Wakhala wiira ale yaakhottile umwiiwelela ule aahimyacera anari vathi va khayootopweele, vano ninhala ukhala cani hi, naahimwiiweleleke ule ri o wirimu?
Yoole ttinkihile ittuniya ni ncu nawe, vano naakhuluveliha eeraka: Ninlelo kinaahala uttinkiha tho ikwaha imoca weekwaha cothene, kahi paahi itthaya, mpaka ni irimu iyo.
Paahi, ala moolumo ala aneera: Ikwaha ikina tho inhimya wiira immotamihiya inhala uttinkihiy'eyo, maanaya wiira ukumiha citthu coopattusiya, wiira cahale nnye cihinttinkihiya.
Phimaana ukhala wiira nineera naakhelelaka umwene woohittinka, nikhale oosukuru, ninlapele Nluku wo mananna oorera, ni ihisima ni nttittimiho,
maana Nluku ihu ri mooro umpaha.
Vano nifento nirinenyu ntthu ni nkhwawe, ninlamuliya upwaherera.
Nhiliyale waakhelela aletto, maana akina, apankaka commo, woohicuwela, yahaakhelela ancelo.
Moopuwelele anantthukiya, toko ntthukiye wamoca na ayo; ale anhuvihiya, toko phi nyu nnohuvihiya.
Vano uthela uttittimihiye na atthu othene, ni ananthelana khaanlamuliya utuphana, maana Nluku naahala waattarusa antuphana ni anooluva.
Makhalelo enyu ahikhale oofenta ncurukhu. Yuutteeliheni nrima irinenyu, maana Nluku heera: Akinoohiyani ni akinoonyanyalani.
Vano ni nkhuluvelo niireke: Apwiya phi mwaakihi aka, khiiwo inoovaka; tupani nohala ukipanka yoonanara?
Moopuwelele ahooleli inyu, yaayo yuulalyeenreni nuulumo na Nluku. Muupuweleke ratta makhalelo yaarinaya ni ntakihe nroromelo naarinaya.
Yesu Kristu nanlelo phi yooyo, ncana, ilelo mpaka mahuku othene.
Nhiihiyerere nttheminyaka ni miitthuciho cikina. Itthu yoorera iri yo wiira nrima ehu ulipihiye ni nnema na Nluku, kahi ni ikano co iyolya, kontha ale yeettela cennyo ikano nnyo khaaphurenle itthu.
Hi nihaana ikhipula, ahinlamuliyaya ulya ale anvara nteko nheemani.
Maana nkhulupale o mayasataka naakusa iphome yo'nama mpaka nipuro nittakattifu cinene toko isataka yoofutta itampi, nanso inama eyo yaampahiya uta waya iluwani.
Phimaana Yesu, hohuva uta waya isittatti wiira attakattifihe ni iphome awe unethi wothene.
Vano nirwee uceresere iluwani uryawe, nivilelaka utarawaciya toko uyo civilenlyawe.
Maana va khanirina isittatti yo mahuku othene, nanso naavye isittatti yo'hoolo.
Phimaana, mwa Yesu Kristu, ninvahe Nluku isataka yo nttottopelo uri nhokorokho wo malaku othene anhimya ncina nawe.
Nhiliyale upanka coorera n'umeelana irinenyu, kontha commo Nluku unaancivela.

Mweeweleleke ahooleli inyu ni ntthareke inoohimeryayani, ukhala wiira ayo phinwacawaca ukumi inyu, maana ayo phinhala uwaakhulelani nyu wa Nluku. Ciicammo mweeweleleke yaayo wiira avare nteko aya n'utteeliya nrima, kontha mwaaheeweleleke, khannohala uphura itthu.
Nnivekeleleke, kontha ninaakhuluvela wiira nihaana ankhili omaana, nimphavela weetta uratta wo mananna oottittimihyaa.
Kinawulepelani wiira nkivekelele, waacera wiira kituruseliye wa nyu.
Vano, Nluku o nnema, yoole munwelelihile Pwiy'ehu Yesu nlattu wo'phome yo nleehano noohimala, nhakheli muulupale o'khontwaa,
oovaheni ikuru yo weettela wiira mpanke utthuna wawe, ni apanke mwa hi ile inoncivela mwa Yesu Kristu, ri o nttittimiho mahuku othene. Ameni!
Asunnaka, kinawulepelani wiira, nvilele nuulumo no nhupi ula, kontha iwantikhenlyakani iyo iri vakani.
Vano ncuwele wiira munnihu Timotiyu hotthukuliya mwaatthukeliyawe, awaaka kinaahala untthukana nloko wiira kaawooneni.
Isalamu ahooleli na attakattifu othene. Atthu o wItaliya anawusalamihani.
Nnema nikhale ni nyu othene. Ameni!
Mi Yakopu, ipottha ya Nluku ni ya Apwiya Yesu Kristu, kinasalameeha mahimo khumi na meeli, amwarenle mwiilaponi mothene.
Asunnaka, nkhalane utteeliya cinene woophwanyakani ukati woottehattehiya,
ncuwelaka wiira nroromelo ninyu nno nalawihiyaka phinkhalanaya nlipihero.
Nlipihero nihaana nivaraka nteko woomalela wiira nyuva nkhale oomalela, weeyiintthu ni woohihaleela itthu.
Wakhala wiira haawo hirina ankhili, anlepele Nluku, naavaha atthu othene woohimatthepwa ni nawaakawa.
Nanso alepele n'uroromela woohaakanyaca, kontha ule nakanyaca ri toko mawimpi o mpahari, ankusiya ni wuutuwanyinya ni iphyoo.
Uyo huupuwele wiira nawaakhela itthu ya Apwiya,
maana ri ntthu oohilakela ni oohilipelela iphiro cothene cineettawe.
Munnihu oothwennya atteeliye nlattu wowunnuwihiya,
ni oopuha atteeliye nlattu wowiiyeviha, kontha naacuwela wiira mahuku awe ari vakani toko ithutu contakhwani.
Ncuwa noopaka ni nivihaka, yowaaliya inawuuma, ni ithutu aya inanyaala ni urera waya unaamala. Ciicammo, mayopuha naakhala oonyaala mphironi mwawe.
Horeriya ntthu noovilela waphiyaka ukati woottehattehiya, kontha, alawihiyaka, nowa uvahiya ikhwerempa yo'kumi, yeeyo Apwiya yaroromelihilyaya ale anaafenta.
Hikhale neera, attehattehiyaka eeraka: Nluku phinkitteha. Kontha Nluku khanttehattehiya ni itthu yoonanara, ni uyo khanonttehatteha ntthu.
Uhiya commo, khula ntthu nottehattehiya ni wunlela wawe citthu, vano wunlela wawe nwo wantepelaka unamooryaca.
Vano wunlela nwo wanttokotthelaka untothola itampi, ni itampi iyo inontothola nookhwa.
Asunnaka oofentiya, nhithepiye.
Khula ivahiya yoorera ni khula itthuvo yoomalela inkhuma wirimu, cikhuruwaka wa Athumwanaya o waarya, ahinrukunuwa toko mitthuuci cihirina nipuro noweemela.
Ni wotthuna wawe, ule honipattusa ni nuulumo neekhweli, wiira nikhale nlipu no'khiyumpe cawe.
Asunnaka oofentiya, nkiiwe. Nyu ncuweleke nnya citthu nnya, wiira ntthu phi ntthu nolamuliya ukhala owaakuva wiiwa, oohipuphela wuulumaca, ni oopica uviruwa.
Kontha uviruwa wa ntthu khunphwanyiha isariya ya Nluku.
Phimaana, nhiye iharamu cinyu ni coonanara cimpankenyu nnyo, mwaakhele ni imaani nuulumo niphattyeliyenyu, nno nihaana ikuru co woopola iroho cinyu.
Vano, nkhale oweettela nuulumo, nhimakele wiiwa paahi, mwithepyaka veekhenyu.
Kontha, ntthu eewaka nuulumo nno ni heettelaka, nolikana toko ntthu neewehera waloolani, oonaka ikhove awe yeephattuwelo.
Wahoolo neewehenrene naathama, ni wowaakuvyaca naaliyala weenryaya ikhove awe iyo.

Nanso ule nohelelela aviriyanaka nlamulo noomalela, nlamulo nowoopola, akhanyereraka weettela, wohiira wiiwa n'uhiya, nanso woorya uvarela nteko, ula ntthu ula nokhala oorerihiya mpaka ni nteko umpankawe uyo.
Ntthu eehelaka ukhala nattiini, ahiyaka ulokiha nlimi nawe, nanso phiithepyaka, ittiini awe iyo iri yo mahala.
Ittiini yomaana ni yeekhweli inoncivela Nluku Athumwanihu, phi ila: Waathotola akhwaacuni ni minankhwele ukati unhuvaya ni wiisunka umwanene woohinyala toko cineettiyaya nttuniyani.
Asunnaka, naakupaliki Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu anene uttitthima, nihaahiyaniheke atthu ayo.
Phimaana, awaaka ntthu mapuro anthukumanenyu, oonwara nnela o'wooru mmakokhoni mmo, nawaracile ikuwo comaana, wahoolo phikelaka tho ntthu nkina oohuva ni oothaaleliya.

Vano phaahawulanihaka wowaakhelela va, ni phimwiirelaka oowaraca ikuwo comaana uyo: Nyu va, mmweke mowunkomeke va nipuro noolemela nuuphwanenleni. Vano oohuva uyo phimwiirelaka: We, weemeleke nwo, atthuna uweke wawonkomeke waryaka va.
Mwapankaka ciicammo nheehawulaniha ayaayoru ni nheepanka mayahukhumu owuupuwela coonanara.
Nkiiwe, asunnaka oofentiya, Nluku haathanla atthu owooninya uhuva mwiilaponi wiira akhale athaciri muukupalini ni mayowaakhela umwene waalupelenlyawe ale anonfenta.
Nanso, nyu nnawaanyohola mayohuva. Khaanakhala athaciri phinootulumuni? Khaanakhala yaayo phinoorwanani upwaroni onoolumiya milattu?
Khaanakhala yaayo phinnyohola ncina nomaana ninromoleliyenyu?
Nyu mweettela malamulo o'mwene, mwaanapanka toko cinhimyaya cowantikhiya: Unfente nkhwaa toko cineefentaa umwanene. Unaapanka yoorera.
Nanso, mwaahiyanihaka atthu nnopanka itampi, ni nnaahala uhukhumwinya ni Nlamulo toko mayotthekaca.
Ule noorya weettela Nlamulo nothene, nanso phivonyanihaka nipuro nimoca, naalikeleliya ukosera othene.
Phimaana, ule eenre: Nheette uluva, ciicammo holamula eeraka: Nhiive. Vano, waheetteke uluva, nanso unawiiva, unkhala ntthu oovonyiha Nlamulo.
Toko cineerenyu ni cinoolumacenyu, mpankeke ciicammo ncuwelaka wiira nnohala uhukhumwinya ni nlamulo nowiithawala.
Kontha ule hirina ikiriri naahala uhukhumwinya woohi ikiriri. Ikiriri cinaatthema ihukhumu.
Asunnaka, nohala uphurani ntthu neera: Mi kihaana nroromelo, nanso woohivarela nteko? Unoona wiira nenno nroromelo nno ninaamoopola?
Akhala wiira mwamunninyu atthuna mwanrokorinyu hothaaleliya atthuna hovoliya itala yo khula nihuku,
ni mmoca wa nyu phimwiirelaka: Urweeke ni mpuha, wawareke ni walyeke womaana, woohinvaha imphavelawe; mpankileni yoorera?
Ciicammo, nroromeloru paahi, noohivareliya nteko, ninkhala nookhwa.
Vano haawo nohala wiira: We uhaana nroromelo, ni mi kihaana miteko. Ukithoonyere nroromelo naa noohimiteko ni mi kinawuthoonyera nroromelo naka ni miteko caka.
We unaakupali wiira ri Nluku mmoca paahi. Wahorera! Ciicammo asotwani anaakupali ni anaattettemela!
We, mphuku! Khuncuwela wiira nroromelo noohivareliya nteko khanirina ifayita?
Aparahamu athumwanihu okhalayi, khayaavahiye isariya nlattu wo miteko waanvaherenraya mwanaya Isaki nkhipulani?
Vano wooneke wiira nroromelo ni miteko cineetta wamoca, ni nroromelo nimmaliheriya ni miteko.
Coo phitthariheleliyaya yowantikhiya yiiraka: Aparahamu honkupali Nluku, phimaana ahovaheriya isariya, ni uyo heehaninya mpwanawe Nluku.
Mooneke wiira ntthu novahiya isariya nlattu wo miteko, woohikhala nroromeloru.
Wanlikana toko puuta Rahapi; waavahiyawe isariya nlattu woopanka yoorera, aavahaka nipuro atthu oohottela ni waathoonyera iphiro ikina.
Ciicammo irutthu yoohi iroho inkhala yookhwa, philikanaya nroromelo nohikhalana coopankiya ninkhala nookhwa.
Asunnaka, nhunlele ukhala othene mayosomiha, maana nhocuwela wiira hi, nineetthuciha, phi hi ninkela utepa uhukhumwiya.
Othene ninaakakathuwa wo mananna oovirikana. Ntthu aahikakathuweke nlattu wo wuulumaca, uyo ri nttuntthu, ciicammo nawoorya usunka irutthu awe yothene.
Nahelelaka iyuma malaku o'khavalu wiira ciniiwelele, ciicammo ninawoorya weettiha irutthu aya yothene.
Nthoonyero enyu ukhale wo'kalawa; cinookhalaru cuulupale ni cittinkihiyaka ni iphyoo cuulupale, cineettihiya ni ileemi yankani cinene, toko cintthunawe nocika.
Ni ciicammo phinlikanaya, nlimi waryaya itthu yankani iri mwirutthuni, ninawiittottopa nlattu woopanka citthu cuulupale. Nkoonani, itakhwa yuulupale impariheliyaya ni mooro mwankani.

Phi ciicammo, nlimi nihu niri mooro; nlimi niri ittuniya yo'tampi. Ninaheliyene iriyari yo'rutthu ihu ninaannanariha irutthu yothene, ninaparihela makhalelo ookumi, ni mpaka ni nno ninapariheliya umooroni.
Phimaana ikhapila cothene co'nama, coovava, cowiipurula ni co mpharyaa cinaasinttiya ni cinsinttiya na atthu,
nanso nlimi khaawo ntthu noorya usintta. Niri noonanara woohimala ni noocara nrette wo wiiva.
Ni nenno, ninawaattittimiha Apwiya Athumwanihu; ciicammo ninawaalapha atthu, apattusiye oolattana ni Nluku.
Malaku mamoca yaayo paahi, inaakhuma iparakha ni ikilapho. Asunnaka, khawanrera wiira citthu nnya cikhaleke coo.
Uhopaca woona waluusi akhumaka maasi oociva na ayo ootumpurya nipuro nimoca nenno?
Asunnaka, nrale unawoorya wiima maphepu atthuna mphepu wiima nrale? Hata vakani, khawanooryaa iluusi yo maasi ootumpurya ukhuma maasi oociva.
Tipani iriyari inyu ri a ankhili ni oocuwelaca? Aathoonyihere makhalelo omaana n'upisa nrima wa ankhili.
Waahikhaleke commo, munrimani mwinyu mmo nhaana urama wootepa ni wiihelela, vano nhiittottope ni nhoothe nveehaka ikhweli.
Ala ankhili ala, khaankhuma wirimu, nanso ari omwiilaponi moomu; khaanakhala o munnepani, nanso a sotwani.
Phimaana nipuro niri uramana ni wiihelela, ciri iporonka ni coonanara cinci.
Nanso ankhili ankhuma wirimu ari oorera, o'salama, onnema, eemaani ni oocara ikiriri, ookumiha mihokorokho comaana, oohihawulaniha ni oohiithepya.
Ni wo'salama phinwiihaya isalama ale anaala nhokorokho wo'sariya.
Cinkhumelela vayi ikhotto nnyo ni waanaca winyu ayaayoru nwo? Cinkhuma nkhwiluni cinaana mwirutthuni mwinyu mmo.

Nnakhalela nttima ca akhwinyu ni khannophwanya. Nnawiiva ni nnarama nanso khannoorya uphwanya. Makhalelo enyu ari oonyakulihana ni waana ikhotto. Nnaavekela nanso khannaakhela, kontha khannovekela ratta.
Nnophavela mwaphwanyaka nrihakaceleke nkhwiluni mwinyu mmo.
Nyu mayoluva, khannocuwela wiira upatthanana ittuniya unkhala mwiinani awe Nluku? Ule nophavela ukhala mpwana awe ittuniya, neepanka mwiinani a Nluku.
Khunakhala wo pure cihimilyaya cowantikhiya ciiraka: Nnepa univahilyawe wiira ukhale ni hi uhaana ihace.
Nanso uyo nanivaha nnema nuulupale. Phimaana cowantikhiya ciiraka: Nluku nawaarusanana owiittottopa nanso nawaavaha nnema owiiyeviha.
Phimaana, mmwiiwelele Nluku. Munkhottele Sotwani ni uyo phinhalawe wuutthawani.
Mphiyeke wa Nluku, ni uyo phinhalawe wuphiyerani! Anatampi, nnyaweke ni nrapiheke nrima, nyu anamirima miili!
Ncukuleke ni munleke. Mwakakhaniheke uthyaa ni wunla, utteeliya ni ucukula.
Mwiiyevihe wa miithoni wa Apwiya ni ayo phinhalaya uwunnuwihani.
Asunnaka, nhaapanane. Ule nomwaapa munnawe atthuna unhukhumu munnawe, noolumacera yoonanara ni nohukhumu Nlamulo. We wamakelaka uhukhumu Nlamulo, khuneettela, nanso wiihenle ukhala mayohukhumu.
Nlamuli ni Hukhumu ri mmoca paahi, yoole noorya woopola n'ukwanyula. Vano we, tipani oonhukhumu nkhwaa?
Vano nviriyane, nyu nneeresa: Ilelo atthuna meelo, ninaarwa iparasa yo'nese, ni ninkokhala mwakha mmoca nimweettaka nakoso n'uphwanya nhakhu.
Nyu khancuwenle itthu inhala wukhumelelani meelo. Ukumi inyu uyo unookhala isiyani? Nyu nri toko itthapwe inkhuma ni ukati vakani inaamwaryaca.
Uhiya wuulumaca commo, phatari wiira: Apwiya yatthunaka ni anivahaka ukumi, ninaapanka ila ni ile.
Nanso nna, nnaasamela citthu cinoopuwelenyu upanka. Wiisamiha toko coo inkhala itthu yoonanara.
Phimaana muupuwele ratta: Ule nocuwela wiira nolamuliya upanka yoorera, phihipankaka, naakosa.
Vano nviriyane, nyu athaciri! Ncukule ni munle mwa nlattu wo mahuviho anhala wuphwanyani.
Mihakhu cinyu nnyo, ikuwo cinyu ni coolya cinyu, cihontta ni ciholiya ikuttihi.
Iwooru inyu ni iparatha enyu cihonyela urenci. Vano urenci uyo phinhala ukhala saahiti owuttonkani ni wuulalihani toko waneerihaya mooro. Nyu nhothacirera mahuku oomalela.
Mooneke. Ncurukhu wa ananteko yoorula mmattani mwinyu ayo, nhaalivaka, unaakhuwela wuttonkakani nyenyu va. Wiikhupanya wa anakanyari uhophiya mpaka mmanyaruni mwa Apwiya a anakhotto.
Nyu nheetta mpuhaka ni nhovolela ikhwilu cothene cucivenleni vathi va. Nhoritimalihera mirima cinyu nnyo nihuku noohitiya.
Nnanhukhumu n'umwiiva nasariya, woohiwiirihani itthu.
Phimaana asunnaka, nkhale oovilela, mpaka wanhalaya uwa Apwiya. Kinawoona mayolima navilela awehereryaka iyolya yo mmattani, mpaka wammwaya ipula coopacera ni coomalihera.
Ciicammo nyu nkhale oovilela ni oolipa nrima, kontha uwa wa Apwiya uri wakhiviru.
Asunnaka, nhittokuttani ayaayoru wiira nhihukhumwinye. Hukhumu uyo ri wankhora!
Asunnaka, niwehere minapiyu coolumaca mwa ncina na Apwiya, ciinryaya woohuva n'uvilela.
Kinawoona nineerela ahoreriya ale yiisunkile ni uvilela. Nnawiiwaka uvilela wa Yopi ni nhoona yaceenryaya. Apwiya ari oocara uthunku ni ikiriri.

Asunnaka, hata mwiirihiye cani, nhilupele nromolaka wirimu, atthuna vathi va, ni hata itthu phi itthu iheliye nhilupelele. Yakhalaka khweli, mwiireke khweli, yakhalaka mena, mena, wiira nhihukhumwinye.
Wariyari winyu va haawo nohuva? Aswaliki. Haawo tteeliye? Eepeke icipo coolemeliha.
Wariyari winyu va haawo nowerennya? Arume urweeliya mahumu o'kereca, wiira yoonswalele ni anttikitthele makhura, mwa ncina na Apwiya.
Iswali yo waamini naavona nretta ni Apwiya anaanwusa, ni wakhala wiira nookosa, naleveleliya.
Phimaana, nlaphulule itampi cinyu nnyo waakhwinyu ni nswalelaneke wiira nvonihiye. Ulapa wa nasariya uhaana ikuru yoolipa.
Eliya aari ntthu, oolikana makhalelo ayo toko hi. Ule ahoswali venci wiira ihirupe ipula, ni khweli ilapo yothene khayaarupile ipula mpaka umala myakha miraru ni nuusu.
Ahaakulela tho uswali, vano irimu yahovaha ipula vathi n'umela mihokorokho.
Asunnaka, wariyari winyu va akhalaka ntthu hiile ikhweli, vano aturuselihiyaka ni nkhwawe,
ncuwele wiira ule nonturusiha natampi warukurerya cawe, nawoopola iroho awe wuukhwani ni cinakhuneelya itampi cinci.
Mi Peturu, mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu, kinwantikhelani nyu aletto mmwaryeenle uPontu, uKalata, uKapatosiya, wAsiya ni uPitiniya,
oothanliya toko caalikelenlyawe Nluku Paapa, oottakattifihileni ni Nnepa Nttakattifu, wiira mmwiiwelele Yesu Kristu ni iphome awe yuumwareeleni. Nnema ni isalama wa nyu cikhale cowuncererya.
Attottopeliye Nluku, Athumwanaya Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu. Wo'kiriri caya ahoniyara wonayeeli n'univaha ukumi wo nwehereryo, nlattu wo wunwelela Kristu wariyari wa atthu ookhwa,
wiira niphwanye yoohiyeriya yoohikhucuwa, yoohi manepa ni yoohuntta, isunkeriyenyu wirimu.
Nyu nnosunkiya ni ikuru ca Nluku, toko ciryaya makupalelo wiira mphwanye woopwa utthenkaciye ni uhanle vakani uthoonyiheriya ukati woomalela.
Phimaana ntteeliye, unookhalaru wiira, nnolamuliya ucukulihaciya wo'kati vakani nlattu woolawihaciya ni mananna menci.

Vano waneerannya commo waacera wacuwannye wiira, nroromelo nirinenyu nno niri nootepa ifayita woovikana iwooru inkhwelakhwela hata irerihiye ni mooro. Nenno nroromelo nno ninaahala uttittimihinya, uttottopeliya ni wunnuwihiya ukati unhalawe uwa Yesu Kristu.
Nyu nnohimoonaru, nnaanfenta ni nhonkupali nhinamoona. Vano commo nyu nnaatteeliya n'utthapa venci cinene mpaka wahinooryaya utaphulela,
maana nyu nneera mphwanyaka inaavyenyu n'ukupali winyu, uri woopwa wo iroho enyu.
Woono woopwa uno, minapiyu cihaavyavya ni ciholalyaa mwaha wo nnema niwiiheriyenyu.

Minapiyu nnyo cihaavyavya ukati ni mananna caahalaya ukhala ihaali yo woopwa. Nnepa wa Kristu waarinaya, waahimya yoola ukati wo'lelo ula, uhimyacaka caahalaya ukhala mahuviho a Kristu ni nttittimiho naahalawe waakhela.

Nluku ahoonihera minapiyu wiira nhupi waalalyaya khaaca ayo, nanso waawaacani nyu. Vano nyu nhaakhelela nhupi woorera, nlalyeeriyaka na ale yuhimenryeni ni Nnepa Nttakattifu uruminye wirimu. Mpaka ancelo anaaphavela ucuwela ratta yooyo nhupi uyo.
Phimaana mwiitthenkemanihe ni mwiicinanele, nwehereryaka ni nrima wothene nnema ninhalenyu uwiiheriya wanhalawe uthoonyiheriya Yesu Kristu.
Nkhale asaana o wiiwelela, nhikhanyerere upanka ilema ceettelenyu khalayi wahaacuwelenyu itthu.
Vano, ukhala wiira ule wiihanneni ri nttakattifu, ni nyu ciicammo nkhale attakattifu wo citthu cothene cinvarenyu,
kontha ihantikhiya wiira: Nkhale attakattifu kontha mi ki nttakattifu.
Vano toko cimmwiihanenyu Paapa ule hirina nthanlo na atthu, nanso nohukhumu awehaka nteko wo khula ntthu, ciicammo mweetteke ni ihisima ukati urinyu mwiilaponi mu.
Kontha nnaacuwela wiira khawaari nlattu wo citthu cimmala, toko iparatha, atthuna iwooru, phikhanlenyu owoopoliya mmakhaleloni mwinyu oohiloka, yuuhiyenryayani mayathumwaninyu okhalayi,
nanso moopoliye ni iphome yo'fayita ya Kristu toko yo mwakhontwaa oohipahuwa ni oohi mahirihiri.
Uyo cuweliye ihinompiya ittuninya, nanso thoonyiheriye wo yoola ukati woomalela ula, nlattu wo wufentani.
Nlattu wa Yesu Kristu phinkupanlinyu Nluku, yoole munwelelihile wariyari wa atthu ookhwa ni nvahile nttittimiho. Phimaana ukupali winyu nwo n'uwehererya winyu nwo ukhale mwa Nluku.
Vano warapihilenyu mirima cinyu nlattu woottharihelela ikhweli, mweettelaka nifento neekhweli ni noohithepyana, nkhalaneke nifento no wanrimani, nfentanaka venci ntthu ni nkhwawe,
kontha nri ooyariya wonaanano, woohikhala wo ntthu nokhwa, nanso hinkhwa mwa nlattu wo nuulumo na Nluku, nenno niri nikumi ni noohimala.
Kontha atthu othene ari toko malasi ni urera waya uri toko ithutu co maluwa. Malasi anawuuma ni ithutu caya nnyo cinaamora
nanso nuulumo na Apwiya ninaakhala ukati wothene. Paahi, nna phi nuulumo nilalyeeriyenyu.
Phimaana nhiye citthu cothene ciri coonanara; wootha, wiittottopa, urama n'uttokutta.
Toko asaana ooyariya naanano, mwaamwe nipele no maana no munnepani, ni wo nenno munnuwe wiira moopwe,
wakhala wiira nhotoko ulawiha nrerelo aya Apwiya.
Mwaattamerye Apwiya, yaayo ari nluku nikumi nikhottiye na atthu, nanso noothanliya ni no'fayita wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Ni nyu ciicammo nri maluku makumi, ootekeliya inupa yo munnepani, wiira nkhale mayasataka attakattifu, ni nvaherere isataka co munnepani cooncivela Nluku mwa Yesu Kristu.
Kontha ihantikhiya wiira: Kinaweesa uSiyoni nluku no wanloothoni, noothanliya ni no'fayita. Ule nokhuluvela khanhala wuulihaciya muru.
Phimaana, wa nyu nnokupali va, nna nluku nna niri no maana, nanso wa ale ahinkupali, ihantikhiya wiira: Nluku nikhottiye ni mayoteka, nenno pheesiye ukhala nowookolela nlootho,
ni nluku ninkakathula ni mwala unwulusa. Ayo ahokakathuwa nlattu woohikupali nuulumo na Nluku. Yeeyo phaalikeleliyaya.

Nanso nyu, nri ikhapila yoothanliya, mayasataka a Mwene, nloko nittakattifu, unethi wa Mwanene Nluku, wiira nlalye cootikineeha cawe ule awiihanneni nnari mpiphini oorweehakani nwaaryani wawe wootikineeha.
Vano nyu, khalayi khamwaari attaatthu, nanso nna va nri unethi wa Nluku; khalayi khamooneliya ikiriri, nanso nna va nhooneliya ikiriri.
Asunnaka oofentiya, kinoohimeryani wiira, toko cirinyu aletto mwiilaponi mu, nkhotte coowunlela co'rutthu, cinaana ni iroho.
Mpanke citthu coorera wamiithoni wa amalaponi. Mwapankaka commo, pooti uwootheryacani citthu coonanara, anaahala woona cimpankenyu coorera nnyo ni mpaka ammonttottopela Nluku nihuku noomalela.
Nlattu wa Apwiya, nkhale oweewelela alamuli othene o mwiilaponi: Mwene, ri nhooleli muulupale,
ni alamuli ooruminya ni yooyo, wiira aahukhumu ampanka coonanara ni aattottopele ampanka coorera.
Maana commo phiri utthuna wa Nluku, wiira, mwapankaka coorera, mwaamaalihe atthu oohicuwela itthu;
toko cirinyu owiithawala, nhitthumiri pufya wiithawala winyu nwo, nanso nkhale toko arumeyi a Nluku.
Vano mwaalemelihe atthu othene, mwaafente asunninyu, mmoove Nluku ni munlemelihe mwene.
Vano nyu ananteko, mwiivaherere ni nlemeliho nothene wa nkunya enyu, woohikhala paahi oorera nrima, nanso ciicammo n'ule oonanara nrima.
Maana commo phinreraya, wiira ntthu avilele masukuli awe, ahuvaka ni isariya awe nlattu wa ankhili arinawe ooncuwela Nluku.
Vano nnohala ulemelihiya cani mwaattiyaka nlattu wookosa ni nvilelaka? Nanso, mwapankaka coorera, nhuvihiyaka ni nvilelaka, commo Nluku naattittimihinya.
Phimaana, nlattu wo yeeyo phiihaneliyenyu, toko ciicammo Kristu cihuvilyawe nlattu wawinyu, oohiyerakani nthoonyero wiira ntthare malinca awe.
Uyo khaakosile, ni hata mahirihiri khaarina wamalakuni wawe.
Waatarawaciyawe, khaahokolosera utarawa; waahuvihiyawe, khaattisaca atthu ayo, nanso eevaherera wa ule nohukhumu uratta.
Uyo hokusa itampi cihu cothene mwirutthuni mwawe, ni hokhomela wansalapani, wiira cinikhwelele itampi cihu ni nikhale akumi wasariyani. Vano nhovonihinya nlattu wo makhwatta awe.
Kontha mwaari toko ikhontwaa coorimela, nanso vano nhoturuwela wa Nhakheli ni Nhooleli nosunka iroho cinyu.
Ciicammo nyu athiyana, mwaahisime awannyu, waacera wiira ayo yaahiiweleleke nuulumo na Nluku, yooryanihinye nlattu woopanka nyu citthu coorera, hata nhuulumile itthu,
wanoonaya meettelo enyu oorera ni ihisima cinyu.
Wiirerihaca winyu nwo, uhikhaleke wo mwirutthuni paahi; toko utthava ikharari, uwara co'wooru, uwara ikuwo coorika nttenko.
Uhiya commo, wiirerihaca winyu nwo ukhaleke wo munrimani ni mananna o munnepani, owiimaaliha ni oohiicoona. Ila phi itthu irina ifayita wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Maana ciicammo phakhalaya athiyana attakattifu o khalayi yaanwehererya Nluku, yaahisimaka awannyaya.
Sara eera ciicammo: Uyo aammwiiwelela Aparahamu, mpaka umwiirela nkunya aka. Nyu nnaahala ukhala asaanawe, mwapankaka coorera ni nhoovaka itthu.

Ciicammo nyu alopwana, nkhaleke ni makhalelo omaana na amwaarinyu, mwaawacawaceke ni ihisima, kontha ari ootteetthyaa venci. Maana oyeeli nnokowaakhela ivahiya yo ukumi, waacera Nluku aakhule mavekelo enyu.
Wuumaleloni, othene nkhale o nrima mmoca, mwiiwanane, nfentane ntthu ni nkhwawe, nkhale o'kiriri ni wiiyeviha.
Nhilivyaaniherane yoonanara ni yoonanara, atthuna maruwano ni maruwano. Uhiya commo, muulumelaneke uratta, maana nlattu wo yeeyo phihaneliyenyu, waacera wiira nrerihiye.
Maana: Ule nofenta ukumi awe ni nophavela ukhalana mahuku ootteeliya, anemecere nlimi nawe wuulumaca coonanara ni asempihe malaku awe wuulumaca cowootha.
Asempe coonanara, apanke coorera, aavye nnema ni attharelele.
Maana miitho a Apwiya ankhala ni ntthu o'sariya, ni manyaru aya ari tayari wiiwelela mavekelo awe, nanso ikhove ya Apwiya inawaaviruwela ale ampanka coonanara.
Vano tupani nohala wuhuvihani mwapankaka citthu coorera?
Nanso mwahuvihiyaka nlattu wo'sariya, nhoreriya. Nhoove ni nhisanke nlattu wo citthu cinookhumelelani nnyo;
munrimani mwinyu mmo munttittimihe Kristu ri Apwiy'enyu; nkhale owiitthenkemaniha wiira mmwaakhule ule nohala wukohani mwaha wo nwehereryo urinenyu.
Mmwaakhuleke woopisa nrima ni wo'hisima, na ankhili omaana, wiira nnye cinwuulumacerayani, akhale ni ihaaya ale antarawaca makhalelo enyu omaana ayo mwa Kristu.
Maana wakhalaka utthuna wa Nluku, phatari nhuve nlattu woopanka coorera, woohikhala nlattu woopanka coonanara.

Maana ciicammo Kristu hohuva nlattu wo'tampi cihu weekwaha imoca paahi, mayasariya phaakhwela atthu oohi isariya, wiira anipiihe wa Nluku. Uyo khwile toko pinatamu phikhalaka nkumi ni ikuru co Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Yooyo ahorwaa ulalyeera minepa caari nkalaposo,
cennyo caari coohiiwelela ikhumelo ukati wo khalayi, Nluku waawehereryawe n'uvilela, Nowee atekaka ikalawa. Yeeyo ikalawa eyo yooponle mmaasini atthu naane paahi,
ala maasi ala anthoonyera upattiso, yooyo unowoopolani. Upattiso kuhimwe ukumiha nihiro paahi, nanso uri wiivaherera wamiithoni wa Nluku ni nrima wothene, nlattu wo wunwelela wa Yesu Kristu.
Yooyo howela wirimu ni ri moono wo nlopwana wa Nluku, ancelo ni alamuli ni anakuru othene amwiiwelelaka.
Vano toko Yesu cihuvilyawe mwirutthuni, ciicammo ni nyu mwiitthenkemanihe mmoopuweloni mwinyu, maana ule huvile mwirutthuni homaliha itampi,
wiira, ukati unoohalelani vathi va, nheette toko cinaacivelaya atthu, nanso, toko cintthunawe Nluku.
Maana uhotosa ukati ule uvinre weettelenyu citthu cinaacivela ananttuniyani; mpankaka co mwirutthuni, uluvaluva, uhapaliya, nlula, ni waalapela anluku.
Ayo anaatikinihinya nlattu woohaatakaneelana mwa coopanka caya cowuuliha muru, ni mpaka anawuruwanani.
Ayo anaahala umwaakhula ule umphwanenle waahukhumu akumi ni akhwile.

Phimaana, nlattu wo yeela itthu ila, phiwilyaya nhupi woorera wiira alaleeriye ciicammo atthu ookhwa, hata anoohukhumwinyaru mwirutthuni toko cintthunaya atthu, akhale akumi munnepani toko cintthunawe Nluku.
Nanso ncuwele wiira ummaleloni wo citthu cothene uri wakhiviru. Phimaana nkhale a ankhili ni owiitthenkemaniha mmavekeloni mwinyu.
Mwa cothene nnyo, nfentane venci ntthu ni nkhwawe, maana nifento ninaafutta itampi cinci.
Ciicammo mwaakheleke aletto, woohittokutta.
Nrumeelaneke ntthu ni nkhwawe, toko caakhenlenyu ivahiya ya Nluku, ni ntthumiriki ratta yeeyo ivahiya iyo toko nrumeyi ookhuluvelyaa a Nluku.

Vano akhalaka ntthu noolumaca, oolumace moolumo a Nluku. Akhalaka mayorumeela, arumeele ni ikuru civahiyawe ni Nluku, wiira mo citthu cothene, Nluku attottopeliye mwa Yesu Kristu yoole ri o nttittimiho ni ikuru ukati wothene. Ameni!
Asunnaka oofentiya, nhitikhinace woophwanyakani uhuva, moonihaka toko iri itthu yootikiniha, maana nwo uri ulawihiya.
Nanso uhiya commo, ntteeliye nlattu woopanka mphantte wo mahuviho akhunnyawe Kristu. Commo nnaahala utteeliya wanhalawe uthoonyera nttittimiho nawe.
Wakhalaka wiira, mwa ncina na Kristu nnaaruwaninya, nhoreriya, maana uhokhuruwelani Nnepa Nttakattifu wa Nluku.
Nanso mwa nyu, hikhale nohuva toko namwiiva atthuna namwinnya, atthuna nannyatha, atthuna toko ntthu neekelakeliha myaha ca akina.
Wahuvaka toko nKristu, uhuulihaciye muru, nanso unttottopele Nluku mwa nenno ncina nno.

Maana ukati wo wancera uhukhumwinya uhophiya, ni ale ari unethi wa Nluku phinhala upacera uhukhumwinya. Vano wakhalaka wiira ihukhumu iyo inkonipacera hi, ale ahinttharihelela nhupi woorera wa Nluku ankomalela vayi?
Toko cantikhiyaya wiira: Warikaka woopwa nasariya, vano ananttuniyani na anatampi ayo anhala ukhala cani?
Phimaana, ale anhuva nlattu wootthuna Nluku, avaherere makhalelo aya wa Mpattusi ookhuluvelyaa, apankaka coorera.
Vano kinaalaka mahumu ari wariyari winyu, toko mi ciryaka humu ni saahiti o mahuviho a Kristu ni kimpanka mphantte wo nttittimiho ninhala wooniheriya.
Nhakhele nhuwo wa Nluku uri ni nyu, nhoolelaka woohikhanyererihiya, nanso nhakhele wo nrima raati, toko cintthunawe Nluku ni nhikhale oocivaciviya, nanso nvare n'utteeliya.
Nhiipanke toko alamuli o nhuwo ukhuluveliyenyu, nanso nkhale nthoonyero wo yooyo nhuwo uyo.
Vano, wanhalawe uwa ule ri Nhakheli Muulupale, phinhalenyu waakhela ikhwerempa yo nttittimiho noohimala.
Ciicammo nyu amwaavano, mwaahisimu mahumu. Nkhale othene owiiyeviha, maana ihantikhiya wiira: Nluku nawaarusanana owiittottopa nanso nawaavaha nnema owiiyeviha.
Mwiiyevihe mmatatani mwa Nluku okuru, wiira waphiyaka ukati awe, awunnuwiheni.
Munvaherere yooyo misankiho cinyu cothene, maana nawuwacawacani.
Nkhale owiimaaliha ni nronttaka, kontha Sotwani ri mwiinani enyu, toko kharamu neepa, neetta nceresere mwinyu, amwaavyaka oommara.
Nkhalane nroromelo noolipa ni munkhottele Sotwani, maana nyu nnaacuwela wiira nttuniyani mothene, asunninyu aneera yaakhunaka yaayo mahuviho ayo.
Vano Nluku o nnema nothene wiihanneni ni nttittimiho nawe noohimala mwa Yesu Kristu, nnahuvilene wo'kati vakani, uyo naahala wurerihani, wuuvahani ikuru, wulipihani ni wupankani nivatta.
Mwa yooyo, cikhale ikuru ukati wothene. Ameni!
Vano, kikaviheriyaka ni Sila, munnaka oororomelyaa, mi kihaantikha wocuumula, kuulipiherakani ni kivahaka usaahiti wiira nna phi nnema neekhweli na Nluku. Nkhale oolipa munnemani na Nluku.
Ale oothanliya ari uPapiloniya, anawusalamihani. Ciicammo mwanaka Marku nawusalamihani.
Nsalamihane ntthu ni nkhwawe ni nifento nittakattifu. Nnema nikhale ni nyu othene nri mwa Kristu.
Mi, Simoni Peturu, nrumeyi ni mmitthenka a Yesu Kristu, kinowantikhelani ila iwarakha ila nyu mwaakhelenle nroromelo no'fayita toko hi, nsariyani mwa Nluku ihu ni moopoli ihu Yesu Kristu.
Nnema ni isalama muncereriye nlattu wooncuwela Nluku ni Yesu Apwiy'ehu.
Vano Nluku ni ikuru cawe cittakattifu, honivaha cothene cimphavelehu mukumini ni mmakhaleloni oonciveliha, nlattu wooncuwela ule aniihanne munttittimihoni ni makhalelo awe.

Commo, ule honivaha cikhuluvelihilyawe cuulupale ni coorera, wiira nlattu wo cennyo nipanke mphantte o makhalelo oottakattifu awe, nitthawaka coonanara ni cowuntta co nttuniyani cimmwa nlattu woocivaciviya.
Phimaana, mwiikurumice wuncerera waamini winyu nvaraka coorera; uvara coorera n'ucuwelaca;
ucuwelaca ni wiivaraca mwanene enyu; wiivaraca mwanene enyu n'ukhanyerera, n'ukhanyerera winyu nwo, ukhale weemaani;
ni imaani inyu, ikhalane wiiwanana, ni wiiwanana winyu nwo, ukhalane nifento.
Kontha nnya citthu nnya cakhalaka ni nyu ni cuncereryanaka mwa nyu, khacinoohiyani nttekettuwacaka ni oohi ifayita muuncuwelani Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Maanaya wiira, ule hirina nnya citthu nnya, ri oohoona, noona paahi ile iri wakhiviru ni naaliyala urapihiya wo'tampi cawe cokhalayi.
Vano asunnaka, mwiikurumice ulipihera wiihaninya ni uthanliya winyu, kontha mwapankaka nnya citthu nnya, khannohala ukakathuwa.
Commo, phinhalenyu ukhala owaakhela ihathuwa yookela wumweneni woohimala wa Apwiy'ehu ni Moopoli, Yesu Kristu.
Phimaana, kinhala ukhala tayari ukati wothene wiira kiwuupusereni nnya citthu nnya, nnookhalaru oocuwela ni oolipa nkhwelini yaakhenlenyu.
Phatari mi kinaryene ninlelo nkumi, kikhalaka irutthu yo heema, uwuupuserani wiira nhiliyale,
kicuwelaka wiira khweli kihanle vakani ukhwa, toko Pwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu cikihimenryawe.
Nanso wo mphantte aka, kinaahala upankela ikuru vakani vakani, wiira ukati wothene mpaka wanhalaka ukhwa, nkhale owuupuwelela cothene.
Maana nihoocuwelihani ikuru ni uwa wa Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, woohikhala ni ithele coopanttureriya, nanso hi niri asaahiti eekhweli yeeyuulupale awe.
Uyo haakhela ihisima ni nttittimiho wo mphantte wa Nluku Athumwane, ukati weewilyawe ncu no nttittimiho nuulupale neera: Ula phi mwanaka oofentiya ni nokitteeliha nrima.
Vano nna ncu nookhuma wirimu nna, hi niheewa ukati waarihu ni yooyo umwaakoni woottakattifihiya.
Commo, ninaakhuluvela venci nhupi wo minapiyu, ni nnaapanka sana waneewelelenyu va, toko isamaninya impharela nipuro nooripela mpaka wansaaya, niworosa nimmwaleelaka munrimani mwinyu.
Vano ncuwele wiira khaawo notaphulela veekhawe cowantikhiya co minapiyu,
maana khaciwo cowantikhiya cinkhuma wotthuna wa ntthu, nanso atthu ahooluma wo mphantte wa Nluku, ahooleliyaka ni Nnepa Nttakattifu.

Vano, toko khalayi caakhumelenlyaya minapiyu cowootha iriyari ya atthu, ciicammo anaahala ukela ni mwiitiho iriyari inyu aalimu owootha. Yaayo aalimu owootha ayo anaahala wiitthuciha citthu cinvirikaniha ikhweli, acipulacaka ni moolumo ootankula, mpaka uphiya malipa owaakhotta Apwiya yaathumile, yiiwiiheraka ikhuutura yowiitankulaca nananoru asinene.
Vano atthu enci ammootthara coopanka caya coohiloka, ni nlattu wawaya yaayo, iphiro yo'khweli inaahala wuuluminya makufuru.
Ciicammo ni isooyo caya, anaahala uwooryacani ni moolumo owootha, nanso ihukhumu caya citthenkemanihinye nenne nokhalayi ni utankulaciya waya nwo khunhala upica.
Toko Nluku cihaanemecenryawe ancelo yaakosile, mpaka waavonyera umooroni, ni waatthukela mmakhukuni mooripela, aasunkaka mpaka nihuku nohukhumu.
Ule khaanemecenre ittuninya yokhalayi, ukati waanwiihilyawe naphuvu wariyari wa atthu oohiloka, nanso aansunkile paahi Nowee, nlalyeri o'sariya, ni atthu akina saapa.
Ciicammo ahohukhumu isittatti yo'Sotoma ni uKomora, apahaka ni mooro, apankaka nthoonyero unhala weeraneela atthu oohiloka.
Nanso ahomoopola Loti, nlopwana nasariya, eetta ni masukuli nlattu wo meettelo a atthu oohiloka.
Maana, akhalaka ni yaayo mahuku othene, nasariya ule aancukulaca wanrimani wawe nlattu wo woona ni wiiwa ithapiya caapankiya.
Phimaana, nihoona wiira Apwiya anaacuwela woopola muuttehattehiyani atthu ooloka ni waasunkera atthu oohiloka, mattaruso nihuku no'hukhumu,
venci venci ale antthara coociva co mwirutthuni nttuniyani ni yaatarawacaka alamuli othene. Atthu oohoova, owiihelela, khaanoova waaveeha alamuli o'culu,
hata ancelo, anookhalanaru ikuru cinene, khaankhumana nlove nowaaveeha, wamiithoni wa Apwiya.
Nanso ayo anveeha itthu ihincuwelaya, ari toko inama co ntakhwani ni coohi miruku, cipattuseriye uvarihiya ni wuntta. Ayo anaahala ukwanyulaciya toko cineerihiyaya inama.

Ciicammo anaahala ulivyaaniheriya coohi isariya cipankilyaya. Anooniha wiira, coonanara co mwirutthuni cimpankaya uthana ciri comaana, nanso ayo yakhalaka n'utthapa wariyari winyu, cimpankaya cinkhala co mahirihiri.
Vano miitho aya ankhala ooluva ni oohivona upanka itampi, yaathepyaka atthu oohimananna, ni mirima caya co'sooyo, asaana oolaphiya.
Ahohiya iphiro yomaana, ahohapuwa mpaka utthara iphiro ya Palamu, mwana a Peyori, aafentile itthuvo yoohi isariya,
nanso nlattu wa coohanyuriha cawe, ahokuphuliya ni mpakhira, oolumacile neehaninya puuru, oolumacile ni nlove no ntthu mpaka umaaliha uphuku wa namilohi.
Phimaana ala atthu ala ari toko iluusi yoohi maasi, ni toko itthapwe yooveverusiya ni iphyoo. Vano yaayo, ahosunkeriya mapuro ooripela.
Maana, yuulumacaka malove oohi ifayita ni owiihelela, anhacula ucivelaciya wo mwirutthuni, anawooryaca ale ahanle vakani waatthawa ampanka coohiloka,
yaaroromelihaka utaphuwa, nanso ayo ari ipottha co'lema coonanara, kontha ntthu nokhala ipottha nlattu woottheminya ni ile immooryaca.

Phimaana, anooryanihilene usempa citthu co nttuniyani nlattu wo waacuwela Apwiy'ehu ni Moopoli Yesu Kristu, anaaphwanyannya tho mwa cennyo anarukureriye ni wooryaciya ni cennyo, vano makhalelo aya ayo anaatepa, woovikana caaryaya woopacera.
Vano waanaarera yiiriyaka khayaatokile ucuwela iphiro yo'sariya, woohikhala anacuwenlene, uturuwela tho uttuli, ahiyaka nlamulo nittakattifu naavahiyaya.
Paahi, ihokhumelela ni yaayo, yoohiminya ineera: Mwalapwa hohokoleela ulya maraphyo awe, ni: Ikuluwe yoorapihiya, ihohokoleela wiiruwya mmattopeni.
Asunnaka oofentiya, ila iri iwarakha yonayeeli inowantikhelakani. Iwarakha coopiili nnya, kinaawusa ankhili inyu omaana, oowuupuserani
wiira nhiliyale moolumo yuuluminye khalayi ni minapiyu cittakattifu ni nlamulo na Apwiy'ehu ni Moopoli, nuusomihilyayani amitthenka.
Wahinaya itthu, ncuwele wiira, mahuku oomaliha, anaahala ukhumelela mayosilili, ooveeha ni oweettela cinaacivela.
Ayo anhala wiira coo: Keera wahokhuluvelihiya uwa wa Apwiya? Vano ahowa? Maana, nenne nenne yakhwaaceru asithumwanihu, citthu cothene ciri toko wupaceroni wo'ttuninya!
Nanso ayo aneeliyaliha imweni wiira, ukhuma khalayi irimu ni itthaya cuumpiye ni nuulumo na Nluku; itthaya ila yuumpiye ukhuma wamaasini ni iriyari maasi,
ciicammo, ukwanyulaciya wo'ttuninya waari wo naphuvu o maasi.
Vano, nlattu wo nenno nuulumo nno, irimu ni itthaya ciri ula ukati ula, cihosunkeriya mooro, ciwehereryaka nihuku no'hukhumu ni umalamalihiya wa atthu oohiloka.
Asunnaka oofentiya, nhiliyale ila itthu ila: Nihuku nimoca, Apwiya anaalikelela ukhala myakha ilufu, ni myakha ilufu anaalikelela ukhala nihuku nimoca.

Apwiya khaampicapica uttharihelela ikhuluvelihilyaya, toko cinoopuwelaya atthu akina; woovirikana commo, ayo ari owuuvilelani, ni khaantthuna wiira arimele hata mmoca, nanso othene akhale oorukunusa nrima.
Nanso nihuku na Apwiya ninhala uwa toko namwinnya. Irimu inkoorimya n'uruma venci, ni ciri uculu cinaahala uvya nlattu wooviha, ilapo ni citthu ciri mommo cinaahala ukhwelakhwela.
Toko cincuwannyaya wiira citthu cothene nnya cinaahala ukwanyulaciya, vano nnolamuliya ukhala attakattifu ni eemaani,
mmwehererye nihuku na Nluku ni mpanke mananna owiira nno niphiye wowaakuvya. Nenno nihuku nno, irimu cinaahala ukwanyuliya ni mooro, ni citthu cothene ciriwo cinaahala utothwa nlattu wooviha.
Nanso hi, toko cinikhuluvelihilyaya Apwiya, niwehereryeke irimu yonaanano ni ilapo yonaanano, wonwo uryaya isariya.
Phimaana, asunnaka oofentiya, nwehereryaka nnya citthu nnya, mwiikurumice, wiira mphwanyinye ni yooyo nnari ni nnema, woohi mahirihiri ni woohi ikoosi.
Nkhale owuupuwela wiira, uvilela wa Apwiy'ehu phimmwaana woopwa, toko Paulu munnihu oofentiya ciwantikhenlyaweni na ankhili avahiyawe ni Nluku.

Paulu oolumaca nnya citthu nnya, toko cinantikhesawe nwarakhani mwawe, cikina ciri cowaarikela wiiwa atthu. Phimaana, atthu oohicuwela itthu ni ookenkennyaa anaacipulaca iwarakha nnyo, toko cimpankaya cowantikhiya cikinaku, caakwanyulaka asinene.
Phimaana asunnaka oofentiya, ncuwelak'ono cennyo, mwiittattalihe, waacera nhooryaciye na ale ahirina ankhili omaana ni wiira nhiwuluwe mmakhaleloni mwinyu oolipa.
Nanso, munnuwe munnemani n'uncuwela Apwiy'ehu ni Moopoli ihu Yesu Kristu. Yooyo attittimihiye, ukhuma nna va mpaka mahuku othene. Ameni!
Nuulumo nno nikhanle ikhumelo wupaceroni wo'ttuniya, nenno niiwilehu, nenno noonnehu ni miitho ehu, nenno noonehilehu ni nivaravanrehu ni matata ehu, nenno phi nuulumo no'kumi.
Ukumi uheethoonyera, ni hi nihoona, ni mwa yooyo ninaavahera usaahiti, ni mwa yooyo phinoohimeryehuni ukumi woohimala, waari na Apaapa ni hi nihothoonyiheriya.
Yeeyo yoonnehu ni yiiwilehu phinoohimeryehuni nyuva, wiira ciicammo nkhale owaatana ni hi. Waatana wihu uri na Apaapa wamoca ni Mwanaya Yesu Kristu.
Nnya citthu nnya ninwantikhelani wiira utteeliya winyu nwo umalele.
Nhupi wiiwilehu mwa Kristu ni wuhimenryehuni ph'ula: Nluku phi waarya, ni mwa yooyo khiiwo ipiphi.
Phimaana neeraka niri owaatana ni yooyo, nanso neettaka mpiphini, ninawootha, ni khanimpanka ikhweli.
Nanso neettaka nwaaryani, toko uyo ciryawe nwaaryani, nihaana waatanaca ntthu ni nkhwawe, ni iphome ya Yesu, Mwanawe, inaanirapiha itampi cothene.
Neeraka khanirina itampi, ninawiithepya, ni ikhweli iyo khiri mwa hi.
Nalaphululaka itampi cihu, uyo ri oororomelyaa ni o'sariya wiira anilevelele itampi n'unirapiha coonanara cothene.
Neeraka khanirina itampi, nimmwiirela Nluku uyo, nawootha, ni nuulumo nawe khaniri mwa hi.
Asaanaka, kinowantikhelani nnya citthu nnya wiira nhikose. Nanso ntthu akosaka, nihaana mwaakihi Yesu Kristu, Nasariya, ri wamoca na Athumwane.
Yooyo phiri isataka yoonilevelela itampi cihu ni khaciri itampi cihu hi paahi, nanso ciicammo itampi co'ttuniya yothene.
Phimaana innicuweliha wiira ninaancuwela uyo, iri nlattu woottharihelela malamulo awe.
Ntthu neera: Mi kinaancuwela, nanso hittharihelelaka malamulo awe, ri nawootha, ni mwa uyo khiiwo ikhweli.
Nanso ntthu nottharihelela malamulo awe, wo'khweli nifento na Nluku niri noomalela. Commo phincuwelehu wiira hi niri ni yooyo,
kontha ntthu eeraka nokhala ni yooyo, nolamuliya weetta toko ule ceettilyawe.
Asunnaka oofentiya, akinowantikhelani nlamulo nonaanano, nari nihikhanle nlamulo nokhalayi, nenne naarinenyu ikhumelo wupaceroni. Nenno nlamulo nokhalayi nno niri nuulumo niiwilenyu.
Vano kinaawantikhelani nlamulo nonaanano nenno nikhanle neekhweli mwa ule ni nyu, kontha ipiphi ineera iviraka, ni waarya weekhweli unaamwaleela.
Ntthu neera ri nwaaryani nanso anrusihaka munnawe, ri mpiphini.
Ntthu nonfenta munnawe nokhala mo waarya, ni mwa uyo khiiwo itthu yookakathula.
Nanso ntthu anrusihaka munnawe, ri mpiphini, neetta mpiphini ni khancuwela unkelawe, kontha ipiphi ihonttiyelela miitho awe.
Nyu asaanaka, kinaawantikhelani kontha itampi cinyu ciholeveleliya mwa nlattu wo ncina nawe.
Nyu mayapaapa, kinaawantikhelani kontha nhoncuwela ule ri ikhumelo wupaceroni. Nyu amirawo, kinaawantikhelani kontha nhontthema Ntakhali.

Nyu asaanaka, kinaawantikhelani kontha nhaacuwela Apaapa. Nyu mayapaapa, kinaawantikhelani kontha nhoncuwela ule ri ikhumelo wupaceroni. Nyu amirawo, kinaawantikhelani kontha nri o'kuru ni nuulumo na Nluku nihoopharelelani ni nhontthema Ntakhali.
Nhifente ittuniya ni citthu ciri nttuniyani. Ntthu afentaka ittuniya, nifento na Apaapa khaniri ni yooyo.
Kontha cothene ciri nttuniyani, toko ucivaciviya wo'rutthu, ucivaciviya wo miitho n'usamela ukumi, nnya khacinkhuma wa Apaapa, nanso nttuniyani.
Ittuniya inaavira, ni ciicammo ucivaciviya waya nwo unaavira, nanso ule nopanka intthunawe Nluku naakhala ukati wothene.
Asaanaka, niri ukati woomaliha, toko ciiwilenyu wiira naawa mwiinani a Kristu, vano ahopacera ukhumelela eenani enci a Kristu, yeeyo phinnicuweliha wiira niri ukati woomaliha.
Ale akhumacile wariyari wihu, nanso khayaari awihu, kontha yaari awihu coono anapharelenle ukhala ni hi, nanso ahokhuma wiira wacuwannye wiira khaawo hata mmoca wa ale ri awihu.
Nyu nri oothapeliya n'ule ri Nttakattifu, ni nyu othene nnaacuwela.
Akiwantikhenleni nyu nlattu woohicuwela ikhweli, nanso nyu nhocuwela ikhweli, kontha khuuwo wootha wookhuma mwiikhwelini.
Tipani ri mayowootha? Phi ule nokhotta wiira Yesu phi Kristu. Ule naakhotta Apaapa ni Mwana, yooyo phi mwiinani a Kristu.
Ule nonkhotta Mwana, khari na Apaapa. Ule nonrumelela Mwana, ri na Apaapa.
Mpharelele ile yiiwilenyu ikhumelo wupaceroni. Nyu mwapharelelaka ile yiiwilenyu ikhumelo wupaceroni, ciicammo ni nyu nnaahala upharelela na Athumwane ni Mwana.
Nkhuluveliho univahilyawe ph'ula, ukumi woohimala.
Kinwantikhelani nnya citthu nnya nlattu wa ale amphavela wuuthepyani.

Vano, utthapeliya waakhenlenyu uri ni nyu. Khannaavya tho wiira ntthu oosomiheni, nanso ukhala wiira utthapeliya waakhenlenyu uri weekhweli khuhimwe wowootha unawiitthucihani citthu cothene, mpharelele toko ciwiitthucihilyayani.
Phimaana, asaanaka, nkhanyerere ukhala mwa yooyo wiira ukati unowawe, nihuulihiye muru nanso nikhalane nkhuluvelo.
Mwacuwelaka wiira ule ri nasariya, ciicammo ncuweleke wiira othene nopanka isariya, yariye ni yooyo.
Nkoonani nifento nuulupale ninivahilyaya Apaapa, mpaka hi wiihaninya asaana a Nluku, ni khweli niri asaana a Nluku. Phimaana, ittuniya khinnicuwela kontha khinoncuwela Nluku.
Asunnaka oofentiya, vano niri asaana a Nluku, ni khinaya wiithoonyihera inhalehu ukhala. Nihocuwela wiira ule eethoonyiheraka, hi ninhala unlattanana yooyo kontha ninhala umoona toko ule ciryawe.
Phimaana khula ntthu rina uno uwehererya uno eelokihe, toko ciryawe uyo ooloka.
Ule nopanka itampi nohanyuriha Nlamulo, kontha itampi, uri uhanyuriha Nlamulo.
Nhocuwela wiira uyo heethoonyihera wiira akumihe itampi cihu, ni mwa uyo khiiwo itampi.
Ule nokhanyerera ukhala mwa Kristu khampanka itampi. Ule nopanka itampi khamoonne ni khancuwenle.
Asaana aka, hikhale noothepyani, ntthu nopanka isariya ri nasariya, toko ule ciryawe nasariya.
Ntthu nopanka itampi nokhuma wa Sotwani, kontha Sotwani nopankesa itampi ikhumelo wupaceroni. Phimaana Mwana a Nluku eethoonyiheraka wiira akwanyulace miteko ca Sotwani.
Ntthu yariye ni Nluku khankhala apankaka itampi, kontha ipyo ya Nluku ihompharelela. Ula khanoorya upanka itampi, kontha yariye ni Nluku.
Commo phincuwannyaya asaana a Nluku ni asaana a Sotwani. Yoole himpanka isariya ni ule hinonfenta munnawe khankhuma wa Nluku.
Kontha nhupi wiiwilenyu ikhumelo wupaceroni ph'ula: nifentaneke ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Nihikhale toko Kayini aari a Ntakhali, homwiiva nhimawe. Vano mwiivenleni? Kontha miteko cawe caari coonanara, ni ca nhimawe caari co'sariya.
Asunnaka, ittuniya yooramakani, nhitikhinace.
Hi nihocuwela wiira nihovira wuukhwani nirwaka wukumini, kontha ninawaafenta asunnihu. Ntthu hinofenta hokhanyerera wuukhwani.
Yoole nonrama munnawe ri namwiiva. Nyu nhocuwela wiira namwiiva khankhalana ukumi woohimala.
Itthu innicuweliha nifento phi ila: Kristu hovaha ukumi awe mwa nlattu wo hi. Hi ninlamuliya uvaha ukumi ihu mwa nlattu wa asunnihu.
Vano ntthu rina mihakhu co yeela ittuniya ila, amoonaka munnawe ahuvaka, phihimoonelaka ikiriri, ninhala umpharelela cani nifento na Nluku?
Asaanaka, khaninlamuliya ufenta ni moolumo atthuna ni malaku paahi, nanso weekhweli ni miteko.
Commo phincuwelehu wiira niri eekhweli, maana wamiithoni wawe cinkopisa mirima cihu.
Kontha nrima ehu wanikasariki, khweli Nluku ri muulupale woopwaha nrima ehu ni naacuwela citthu cothene.
Oofentiya, vano nrima ehu uyo wahinikasariki, nihaana ukhuluvela wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Ninawaakhela ile inonvekelehu, kontha ninaattharihelela malamulo awe ni ninaapanka inoncivela wamiithoni wawe.
Vano nlamulo nawe phi nna wiira ninkupaliki mwa ncina na Mwana Yesu Kristu, ni nifentaneke ntthu ninkhwawe toko cinhimyaya nlamulo ninivahilyawe.
Ntthu nottharihelela malamulo, naakhanyerera ukhala mwa Nluku, ni Nluku nokhala mwa yooyo. Itthu innicuweliha wiira uyo ri mwa hi, phi Nnepa univahilyawe.
Anna oofentiya, nhikupali minepa cothene, nanso nweheehe minepa nnyo wakhala wiira cinkhuma wa Nluku, kontha minapiyu cinci cowootha cihomwareela nttuniyani.
Itthu innicuweliha Nnepa wa Nluku phi ila. Nnepa wothene unlaphulula wiira Yesu Kristu wile mwirutthuni, uyo unkhuma wa Nluku.
Ni nnepa wothene uhinonlaphulula Yesu, khunkhuma wa Nluku. Nanso uyo nnepa uyo uri wa mwiinani awe Kristu, yoole upacilenyu wiiwa wiira unaawa, ni khweli uhophiya, uri nttuniyani mu.
Asaanaka, nyu nri a Nluku ni nhotthema minapiyu cowootha, kontha muulupale ph'ule ri ni nyu, wompwaha ule ri nttuniyani.
Ale ari o nttuniyani anooluma mphantte wo'ttuniya, ni ittuniya iyo inaweewa.
Hi niri a Nluku. Ntthu ncuwenle Nluku naniiwa, ule hiri mphantte wa Nluku khanniiwa. Commo phincuwelelehu Nnepa weekhweli ni nnepa woothepya.
Anna oofentiya, nifentaneke ntthu ni nkhwawe, kontha nifento nno ninkhuma wa Nluku. Ntthu nofenta yariye ni Nluku ni naancuwela Nluku.
Ntthu hinofenta khancuwenle Nluku, kontha Nluku ri nifento.
Itthu inthoonyera nifento na Nluku wariyari wihu, phi ila: Nluku honruma Mwanawe mmoca nttuniyani, wiira nikhale akumi mwa yooyo.
Vano nifento nno phi nna: khunakhala wiira hi ninonfenta Nluku, nanso uyo honifenta hi ni honruma Mwanawe wiira akhale isataka yoonilevelela itampi cihu.
Anna oofentiya, ukhala wiira Nluku honifenta toko coo, ni hi ciicammo ninlamuliya ufentana ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Khaawo pacile umoona Nluku. Nafentanaka ntthu ni nkhwawe, Nluku naahala ukhala ni hiyano ni nifento nawe ninaamalela mwa hi.
Hi ninaacuwela wiira niri mwa yooyo n'uyo mwa hi, kontha uyo honivaha Nnepa awe.
Vano hi nihoona ni nihovahera usaahiti wiira, Apaapa ahonruma Mwanaya wiira akhale moopoli o'ttuniya.
Ntthu norumelela wiira Yesu ri Mwana a Nluku, Nluku naakhala mwa uyo, ni uyo naakhala mwa Nluku.
Hi nihocuwela ni ninaakupali nifento nirinawe Nluku ni hiyano. Nluku ri nifento. Ntthu nokhala nnifentoni, ri ni Nluku, ni Nluku ri ni yooyo.
Vano coo phimmalelaya nifento nihu wiira nihuku no'hukhumu nikhalane ukhuluvela, kontha toko ciryawe Nluku, ni hi niri ciicammo nttuniyani mu.
Nnifentoni khuuwo woova, maana nifento noomalela ninaatamiha woova, kontha woova uwaana icuku. Phimaana ntthu owoova khammalela nnifentoni.
Hi ninaanfenta kontha uyo phipacenre unifenta.
Ntthu eeraka kinaanfenta Nluku, nanso anrusihaka munnawe, nokhala mayowootha, kontha ule hinonfenta munnawe nomoonawe, khanoorya unfenta Nluku himmoonawe.
Phimaana mwa uyo nihaana nna nlamulo nna, nineera: Ule nonfenta Nluku ciicammo anfente munnawe.
Ntthu nokupali wiira Yesu phiri Kristu yariye ni Nluku, ni ntthu naafenta Athumwane annyanre, ciicammo naanfenta ule nnyanryaya.
Hi ninaacuwela wiira ninawaafenta asaana a Nluku nanfentaka Nluku n'uttharihelela malamulo awe.
Kontha nna phi nifento na Nluku, wiira nittharihelele malamulo awe. Ni malamulo awe khahimwena oolemela.
Kontha ntthu yariye ni Nluku naatthema ittuniya; utthema ittuniya phiri ukupali wihu.
Tupani notthema ittuniya? Nari hikhanle ule nokupali wiira Yesu ri Mwana a Nluku.
Yesu Kristu ph'ule wile ni maasi ni iphome. Kahi paahi ni maasi, nanso ciicammo maasi ni iphome. Nnepa Nttakattifu phinvaha usaahiti, kontha uyo Nnepa uyo uri ikhweli.
Kontha ahaawo araru anvaha usaahiti:
Nnepa, maasi ni iphome, ni ala araru ala anawiiwanana.
Nakupaliki usaahiti wa atthu, nicuwele wiira usaahiti wa Nluku phiri muulupale, kontha Nluku phinvaha usaahiti wa Mwanawe.
Ntthu nonkupali Mwana a Nluku haana mwa yooyo usaahiti. Ule hinonkupali Nluku naamwiirela Nluku namootha, kontha khankupali usaahiti unvahawe Nluku mwa Mwanawe.
Usaahiti uyo ph'ula, wiira Nluku honivaha ukumi woohimala, ni ula ukumi ula uri mwa Mwanawe.
Ntthu rina Mwana a Nluku haana ukumi; ule hirina Mwana a Nluku kharina ukumi.
Nnya citthu nnya kiwantikhenleni wiira ncuwele wiira nhaana ukumi woohimala ni wiira nkupali ncina na Mwana a Nluku.
Ula phi nkhuluvelo urinehu ni uyo, wiira navekelaka itthu n'utthuna wawe, uyo naaniiwa.
Ni nacuwelaka wiira uyo naaniiwa yothene inonvekelehu, ninaacuwela wiira nihaakhela ivekenlehu.

Ntthu amoonaka munnawe apankaka itampi ihinonrweeha wukhwani, avekele, ni Nluku naahala unvaha ukumi ule kosile. Akinaaca itampi yonrweeha wukhwani. Ihaawo itampi inrweeha wukhwani. Yeeyo akineera avekeleliye.
Yoonanara yothene iri itampi, ni ihaawo itampi ihinrweeha wukhwani.
Nihocuwela wiira ntthu yariye ni Nluku, khampanka itampi, nanso ule yariye ni Nluku naansunka, ni Ntakhali khanonkwanya.
Nihocuwela wiira niri a Nluku, ni ittuniya yothene ihothawaliya ni Ntakhali.
Ciicammo nihocuwela wiira Mwana a Nluku howa ni honivaha ankhili wiira nincuwele yooyo ri eekhweli. Ni hi niri mwa Yesu Kristu, yooyo ri Mwanawe eekhweli. Ula phi Nluku eekhweli ni ukumi woohimala.
Paahi, asaanaka, mwiinemecere mwa anluku oohikhweli.
Mi humu, kinawantikhela apwiyawe oothanliya wamoca na asaanaya, anaafentaka weekhweli, kahi mi paahi, nanso ciicammo othene acuwenle ikhweli,
mwa nlattu weekhweli inkhala mwa hi ni wa hi inaakhala woohimala.
Nnema, ikiriri ni isalama cinkhuma wa Nluku Apaapa ni wa Yesu Kristu, Mwanaya Apaapa, cikhale ni hi, weekhweli ni nifento.
Kihotteeliya venci nlattu wowaaphwanya asaanenyu akina yeettelaka ikhweli, toko caakhenlehu nlamulo wa Apaapa.
Vano, kinawulepelani apwiyawe, khunakhala wiira kinantikha nlamulo nonaanano, nanso naarinehu ukhuma wiipaceroni, wiira nifentaneke ntthu ni nkhwawe.
Nifento niri weettela malamulo awe. Nlamulo phi nna, toko ciiwilenyu ikhumelo wiipaceroni wiira mweettele nenno nifento nno.
Kontha mayothepya enci aheekhumeleliha nttuniyani, yaayo ahinlaphulula wiira Yesu Kristu wile ni irutthu. Yaayo phiri mayothepya ni eenani awe Kristu.
Mwiirattavelele wiira ihuurihyeni ifayita yo nteko uvanrehu, nanso mwaakhelele itthuvo yoomalela.
Ule noncerera miitthuciho ca Kristu ni aheettelaka, kharina Nluku; ntthu neettela miitthuciho, yooyo haana Apaapa ni Mwana.
Vano ntthu awaaka uwuulumanani woohiwaana nnya miitthuciho ca Kristu nnya, nhimwaakhelele uwannyu ni nhinsalameehe hata vakani.
Ule nonsalameeha nopanka mphantte mmitekoni mwawe coonanara.
Kihaana nanlelo citthu cinci coowantikhelani. Akitthunne wantikha ni nikhanta ni uwiini, kontha kinaawehererya uwa uwoonananani n'uvaanela, wiira utteeliya wihu ukhale woomalela.
Asaana a anuunu inyu oothanliya anawusalameehani.
Mi humu, kinawantikhelani nyu oofentiya Kaiyu, kinoofentakani weekhweli.
Munna oofentiya, kinawuvekelelani wiira cothene ciweetteleni sana ni nkhalane ukumi, toko ciicammo ciryaya iroho enyu.
Kontha akimala utteeliya venci ukati uwilyaya asunna, attottopelaka ikhweli inyu ni mananna cineettenyu nkhwelini.
Akirina utteeliya woopwaha, nari uhiri wiiwa wiira asaanaka aneetta nkhwelini.
Munna oofentiya, ile inaapankelenyu asunninyu ni ciicammo aletto ahinaacuwelenyu iri yookhuluvelyaa.
Yaayo ahottottopela nifento ninyu uhoolo wo'kereca. Commo, nnaapanka sana. Vano kinawuvekelani wiira mwaaveleele munkwahani mwaya toko cinoncivelaya Nluku.
Kontha ayo akhumacile mwa ncina na Yesu, ni khiiwo yaakhenlyaya wa amalaponi.
Phimaana, ninlamuliya waakavihera asunnihu toko ala, wiira nikhale akaviheri eekhweli.
Kihaantikhela ikereca nna nuulumo nna, nanso Tiyotrefe unoncivela ukhala oopacera, khantthuna unaakhelela.

Vano mi kawaaka nwo, kinaahimyaca miteko cinvarawe, ni moolumo oonanara annootheryacawe. Khantteeliya ni nnya citthu nnya, ciicammo yooyo khanaakhelela asunna, mpaka nawaahiiha ale yaaphavela waakhelela ni nawoomola nkereca.
Munna oofentiya, nhitakihe iri yoonanara, nanso iri yoorera. Ule nopanka yoorera nokhuma wa Nluku, nanso ule nopanka yoonanara khanamoona Nluku.
Atthu othene anaanttottopela Timetriyu, mpaka ikhweli inanttottopela. Ni hi ciicammo ninaanttottopela, ni nyu nnaacuwela wiira usaahiti ihu uri weekhweli.
Kahaana citthu cinci coowantikhelani, nanso akitthunne wantikha n'uwiini ni nikhanta,
kontha wowaakuvyaca wene kinaaweherera uwoonananani. Ninaahala uvaanela.
Nnema nikhale ni nyu. Asimpwaninyu anawusalameehani. Mwaasalameehe asimpwanihu, khula ntthu ni ncina nawe.
Mi Yuta, ipottha ya Yesu Kristu ni munnawe Yakopu, kinaantikhela iwarakha ila ale owiihaniya ni oofentiya ni Nluku Apaapa ni asunkiye ni Yesu Kristu.
Ikiriri, nnema ni nifento na Nluku cuncererye mwa nyu.

Asunnaka oofentiya, kihophavela uwantikhelani mwaha wo woopwa wihu. Vano kihoona wiira waanrera uwantikhelani, kuulipiherakani wiira mwaane ikhotto nlattu wo nroromelo nikhuluveliyaya weekwaha imoca attakattifu othene.

Kontha ahaawo atthu akina, yaayo yaahukhumwinye nankhalayi, aheetakanihera womwiitiho wariyari winyu. Ayo ari akaafiri, anrukunusa nnema na Nluku ihu waacera wiira apanke citthu coohiloka. Yaayo anaankhotta Yesu Kristu, mwanene mmoca ni Pwiy'ehu.
Hata nnoocuwelaru cothene nnyo, kimphavela uwuupuserani wiira Apwiya ahoopola unethi akumihaka wiciipitu, nanso wahoolo ahaarimesa ale yahaakupanli.
Moopuwele ancelo, ale ahinemecenre makhalelo aya eeyuulupale, ahiile mapuro aya. Nluku haatthuka n'unyolo ni haatthukela mooripela mpaka khalayi, awehereryaka uhukhumwinya nihuku nuulupale,
toko uSotoma ni uKomora, ni isittatti cowaattamana, ceevaherenryaya muuluvani n'uvirikaniha mathelanelo eephattu. Ayo ahopankiya nthoonyero woottarusiya ni mooro woohimala.
Ciicammo, ala anamilohi ala, antankanya irutthu caya, anaahanyuriha ulamuli wothene ni anawaatarawa ancelo owirimu.
Nanso, ncelo Mikeli waanyakulihanawe ni Sotwani nlattu wo nrutthu wa Musa, khaamuulumenle moolumo ooruwana, nanso eenre paahi: Nluku ookuphule!
Vano, ayo antarawa cothene cihincuwelaya, ni citthu cincuwelaya nnyo toko inama coohaankhili, cennyo citthu nnyo phinaatankanya.
Ayo ahotakhaliya! Maana atthanre iphiro ya Kayini, ni nlattu wowaaciva ncurukhu, ahowuluwela nkosini toko Palamu, ni ahorimesiya muuhanyurihani toko Koraa.

Ala atthu ala ari owoopiha mmasikuhuuluni mwinyu co waatana, anlya ni nyu woohi ihisima. Ari ahakheli aneewacawaca asinene. Ayo ari mahutte oohi maasi ooveverusiya ni iphyoo; miri coonyaala ni coohiima, cowuuma ni coopheliya.
Ari toko mawimpi oocaca ompahari, ankahula athoonyeraka miteko caya cowuuliha muru; itthoottwa coohimpatta, yaayo asunkeriye mapuro aya ooripela cinene mpaka ukati woohimala.
Ciicammo Enoki, ri onasaapa ikhumelo Atamu, aholalya aacaka yaala eeraka: Nkoonani, Apwiya anaawa na attakattifu aya ilufu cene,
wiira yawaahukhumu ni waatthukela oonanara nrima othene, nlattu wo miteko caya coonanara caapankaya ni moolumo oonanara yaamuulumaceraya Nluku.
Ala atthu ala ankhala yunlacaka, oohitteeliya ni iparakha caya, ni antthara cinaacivela coonanara; ari owiihelela, aneepanka toko o nifento, nanso aphavelaka uphwanya cimphavelaya.
Nanso, asunnaka oofentiya, muupuwelele moolumo ahimeriyenyu na amitthenka a Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu.
Moolumo yaayo anhimya wiira, ukati woomaliha, anaahala uwa atthu ootarawa, anhala utthara coonanara caya co'kaafiri.
Yaala phinkukumiha uhiiwanana, antthara iroho caya maana khaarina Nnepa Nttakattifu.
Nanso nyu, asunnaka oofentiya, mwiilipihere munroromeloni noorera, nvekelaka muNnepani Nttakattifu.
Nkhale nnifentoni na Nluku, nwehereryaka ikiriri ca Apwiy'ehu Yesu Kristu, anvaha ukumi woohimala.
Mooneleke ikiriri ayo anaakanyaca;
moopoleke akina, mwaapulaka wamooroni, ni akina, mooneleke ikiriri moovaka, ni nrusanane mpaka ni ikuwo caya co mahirihiri o citthu coonanara cimpankaya.
