Phimaana, attottopeliye ule rina ikuru co wuusunkani wiira nhiwuluwe ni wuthoonyiherani oohicovaciya n'utteeliya munttittimihoni nawe,
wa Nluku mmoca, moopoli ihu, nikhale nttittimiho, nlemeliho, ikuru n'ulamuli mwa Yesu Kristu Apwiy'ehu, ikhumelo ukati uhinaya, nenna va, ni mahuku othene! Ameni!
Wiicoonihera wa Yesu Kristu, uvahiyawe ni Nluku wiira aathoonyere arumeyi awe citthu cinhala ukhumelela woohipica. Uyo honruma ncelo awe wiira ancuwelihe nrumeyi awe Yohani.
Yohani ahottonka citthu cothene coonnyawe, maanaya wiira, nuulumo na Nluku ni usaahiti wa Yesu Kristu.
Horeriya ule nosoma cowantikhiya cooniheriye ni ahoreriya ale aneewa, asunkaka yantikhiye maana ukati uhanle vakani uphiya.
Mi Yohani, kinantikhela ikereca saapa co'lapo yo wAsiya. Mwaakhele nnema ni isalama, cinkhuma wa ule ri, aari ni nohala uwa, wo minepa saapa caattamananne wahiceni wawe,
ni Yesu Kristu, ri saahiti eekhweli, oopacera mwa atthu ookhwa ni muulupale o mamwene o mwiilaponi. Uyo naanifenta ni honitaphula ntampini mwihu ni iphome awe.
Yooyo honipanka umwene ni mayasataka a Nluku athumwane. Wa yooyo, nikhale nttittimiho ni ikuru mahuku othene! Ameni.
Mmooneke uyo, nowa ni mahutte, ni atthu othene anaahala umoona, mpaka na ale yaanhomile. Unethi wothene wo mwiilaponi unaahala ucukulaca nlattu wa yooyo. Commo phinhalaya wiirannyaa! Ameni.
Apwiya Nluku aneera: Mi ki Alfa ni Omeka, oopacera ni oomalihera, ayo ari, yaari, ni anhala uwa, ari owoorya cothene.
Mi, Yohani, munninyu ni nkhunaninyu o mmahuvihoni, mumweneni ni wookhanyerera mwa Yesu, kaari iciviri yo'Patimu nlattu wo nuulumo na Nluku ni usaahiti wa Yesu Kristu.
Nihuku na Apwiya, kahokhala muNnepani, kaheewa uttuli waka ncu noonyakula cinene toko nipalapatta,
neera: Wantikhe nliivuruni itthu inoonaa ni uveleelihe mmakereca saapa, ciri nnya: wEfesu, uSimirina, uPerkamu, uTiyatira, uSarte, uFilatelfiya ni uLawutiseya.
Vaavale kahorukunuwa wiira kimoone ule nokuulumiha. Waarukunuwilyaka, koonne isamaninya saapa co'wooru;
ni iriyari yo'samaninya nnyo, ahaawo ntthu oolikana Mwana a Pinatamu ni yoowara yaaphiya mpaka nnyaani mwawe ni ncako wo'wooru wakhakaacani.
Muru awe ni ikharari cawe nnyo caari cootteela cinene toko ntthoce, ni miitho awe ayo yaari toko malimi o mooro.
Inyaa cawe nnyo caari toko ncukhuma woohaninya, ni ncu nawe nno naari toko uruma wo maasi menci.
Vano ntata nawe no nlopwana nahovarela itthoottwa saapa, ni wamalakuni wawe yaakhuma ikatana yo wiitha miphantte coomiili. Wiitho wawe nwo waari toko ncuwa wanaaryaya venci.
Vaavale wamoonnyaka, kahowuluwela wamettoni wawe toko ntthu ookhwa. Vano uyo ahokithatela ntata nawe nonlopwana ni aheera: Uhoove. Phi mi oopacera ni oomalihera.
Mi phi mi, ule ri nkumi. Kahokhwa, nanso vano ki nkumi ukati wothene! Ni kihaana mitthukulo co nookhwa ni co mmahiye.
Paahi, wantikhe citthu coonnyaa, ukhuma conaanano mpaka cinhala wiirannyaa.
Ila phiri isiiri yo'tthoottwa saapa coonnyaa muntatani mwaka no nlopwana ni isamaninya saapa: Itthoottwa saapa nnyo, ari ancelo o'kereca saapa, ni isamaninya saapa nnyo, ciri ikereca saapa.
Vano umwantikhele ncelo o'kereca yo wEfesu, wiiraka: Iyo nooluma ph'ule rina itthoottwa saapa muntatani no nlopwana, ni neetta wariyari waya isamaninya saapa co'wooru:

Mi kinaacuwela cinvaraa cothene, miteko caa n'uvilela waa, vano kihocuwela wiira khunoorya waavilela atthu oohiloka; uhaalawiha ale aneeciirela amitthenka nanso ahiri amitthenka ni uhoona wiira ari mayowootha,
uhohuva ni uneera uvilelaka mwa ncina naka woohitoomwa.
Nanso ihaawo ihinkicivelihaa, maana uhohiya nifento naa noopacera.
Vano wuupuwele nipuro niwuluwilyaa. Urukunuse nrima ni uhokoleele uvara miteko coopacera. Waahirukunuseke nrima, kinaawa ni kimmotamiha weesilyaka isamaninya.
Nanso ihaawo impankaa yoorera; wanrusananaa miteko ca anikolayita, cennyo ni mi cinaakirusa.
Paahi, ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele itthu inhimeryaya Nnepa ikereca. Ule nohala utthema, kinaahala unvaha ulya mihokorokho co mwiri wookumi, umphwanyannya upeponi wa Nluku.
Umwantikhele ncelo o'kereca yo'Simirina, wiiraka: Nnya citthu nnya nohimya ph'ule ri oopacera ni oomalihera, aakhwile onwelelaka:
Mi kinaacuwela mahuviho arinaa, umasikiini urinaa, nanso we thaciri; makufuru ampankaya ale aneeciirela ayuta ahiri ayuta, anari nsinakoka na Sotwani.

Uhoove mahuviho anhala wuuphwanya. Maana Sotwani hanle vakani waatthukiiha akina wa nyu, wiira nlawihiye, ni nnaahala uhuvihiya mahuku khumi. Ukhale oororomelyaa mpaka ukhwa, ni kinaahala wuuvaha ikhwerempa yo'kumi.
Paahi, ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele itthu inhimeryaya Nnepa ikereca. Ntthu nohala utthema, khanhala ukhwa imaara yonayeeli.
Umwantikhele ncelo o'kereca yo'Perkamu, wiiraka: Nnya citthu nnya neera ph'ule rina ikatana yo wiitha miphantte coomiili:

Kinaacuwela nipuro ninkhalaa, nipuro niri ihice ya Sotwani, ni unaasunka ncina naka ni khanuurimenle nroromelo naa, toko mahuku a Antipasi, ri saahiti aka, nomwiiwanana aka, yooyo eeviye iriyari inyu, wonwo unkhalawe Sotwani.
Nanso cihaawo citthu cihinkicivelihaa, maana uhaana atthu anttharihelela miitthuciho ca Palamu, mwiitthucihile Palaki waaryaa itapha annasirayeli, wiira alye iyolya yoovahereriya anluku ni aluve.
Ciicammo, we uri na atthu aneettela miitthuciho ca anikolayita.
Vano urukunuse nrima. Waahirukunuseke nrima, kinaahala wuuphwanya woohipica ni kimmowaanana ni ikatana yo wamalakuni waka.

Paahi, ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele itthu inhimeryaya Nnepa ikereca. Ule nohala utthema, kinaahala unvaha ulya manaa avithiye, ciicammo kinaahala unvaha nluku nimoca nootteela, nowantikhiya ncina nonaanano, nihincuweliya ni ntthu nkina, nanso nocuwela paahi ule nohala waakhela.
Umwantikhele ncelo o'kereca yo'Tiyatira, wiiraka: Nnya citthu nnya, neera phi Mwana a Nluku, rina miitho awe toko malimi o mooro, ni inyaa cawe coolikana toko ncukhuma woohaninya:
Vano, kinaacuwela miteko caa ni nifento naa, nroromelo naa, nteko aa, uvilela waa, ni miteko caa cowiiheerya, ciri cinci woovikana coopacera nnyo.
Nanso ihaawo itthu ihinkicivelihaa, unaannemecera nthiyana Yesapeli, neeciirela nnapiyu. Uyo naweetthuciha ni waakhanyereriha arumeyi aka uluva n'ulya cooveleeliheriya anluku.
Kihonvaha ukati wiira arukunuse nrima, nanso uyo khantthuna urukunusa nrima muuluvani mwawe.
Aahirukunuseke nrima, kinaahala ummwaanela iretta n'uhuva venci wamoca na ale anaaluvanawe.
Kinaahala weevakaca asaanawe, ni ikereca cothene cinaahala ucuwela wiira mi kiri ule nocuwela moopuwelo ni mirima cothene. Kinaahala unvaha wo khula ntthu toko ciinryawe woovara nteko.
Nanso nyu na akina ari uTiyatira, ahirina nnya miitthuciho nnya ni ahicuwenle mitikiniho co wiisa ca Sotwani, kinwiirelani: Akinhala wuuvahani nrintti nkina.
Nsunke ile irinenyu, mpaka wanhalaka uwa.
Ule nohala utthema ni nohala uvara miteko caka mpaka ummaleloni, mi kinaahala unvaha iyuulupale yoolamula ilapo.
Uyo naahala ulamula ilapo ni ikopo yo'yuma, ni naahala upwesakaca cennyo ilapo nnyo toko myaapu cooloko; toko caakhenlyaka wa Apaapa.
Yooyo kinaahala unvaha niworosa.
Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele itthu inhimeryaya Nnepa ikereca.
Vano umwantikhele ncelo o'kereca yo'Sarte, wiiraka: Ule rina minepa saapa ca Nluku ni itthoottwa saapa, neera coo: Mi kinaacuwela miteko caa nnyo, unooninya toko o nkumi, nanso uhokhwa.
Nrontteke, ni ulipihere yaahanle vakani ukhwa, kontha akoonne miteko caa nnyo ukhala comaana wamiithoni wa Nluku.
Vano wuupuwele ile yaakhenlyaa ni yiiwilyaa, wiiwelele ni urukunuse nrima. Nanso waahirontteke, kinhala uwa toko namwinnya, ni khunhala ucuwela ukati unhalaka uwa.
Nanso ciicammo uhaana atthu uSarte, ahinaya unanariha coowara caya ni anhala weetta ni mi ni coowara caya cootteela, maana unawaaphwanela commo.

Paahi, ule nohala utthema, naahala uwarihiya coowara cootteela, ni akinhala ufutta ncina nawe nno nliivuruni yo'kumi, ni kinaahala uhimyaca uratta ncina nawe nno wamiithoni wa Apaapa ni iriyari ya ancelo.
Paahi, ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele ile inhimeryaya Nnepa ikereca.
Vano umwantikhele ncelo o'kereca yo'Filatelfiya, wiiraka: Ila phinhimyawe ule ri nttakattifu, ri ikhweli, rina ntthukulo wa Taviti, nohula nkhora hitthyaka ntthu ni notthyaa nkhora hihulaka ntthu:
Mi kihocuwela miteko caa nnyo. Kiheesa nkhora waryaa va woohulyaa ni khaawo noorya utthyaa. Kihocuwela wiira urina ikuru vakani, nanso uhosunka nuulumo naka ni khurunne ncina naka.
Moone itthu inhalaka waapanka ale ari nsinakoka ya Sotwani ni aneeciirela ayuta ni ahiri phi yaayo, nanso anari mayowootha. Kinaahala weerela akhorome wamettoni waa ni akupali wiira mi kihoofenta.
Ukhala wiira uhosunka nuulumo nuuhimenryaka, ciicammo ni mi kinaahala wuusunka ukati woottehattehiya unhala uwa nttuniyani, wiira attehattehiye atthu ankhala mwiilaponi.
Mi kinaawa woohipica; usunke irinaa, wiira hikhale nohala uwaakha ikhwerempa aa.

Ule nohala utthema, mi kinaahala umpanka nivatta mpaani mo'nupa ya Nluku aka, ni khankhuma tho, ni kinaahala wantikha mwa uyo ncina na Nluku aka ni ncina no'sittatti ya Nluku aka, Yerusalemu onaanano, inkhuruwa wirimu wa Nluku aka, ni ciicammo kinaahala wantikha mwa uyo ncina naka nonaanano.
Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele itthu inhimeryaya Nnepa ikereca.
Vano umwantikhele ncelo o'kereca yo'Lawutiseya, wiiraka: Neera ph'Ameni, saahiti ookhuluvelyaa ni eekhweli, ri muulupale wo'khiyumpe ca Nluku.
Mi kinaacuwela miteko caa nnyo, wiira we kuhimwe ooririya ni kuhimwe ooviha. Phatari unari ooririya atthuna ooviha!
Kontha uri oosiviha, khuhimwe ooririya ni khuhimwe ooviha, kinaahala wuuraphyaa.
Vano toko cineeraa: Ki thaciri ni kihothaciri ni khiiwo inkihaleela, nanso khuncuwela wiira uri oothwennya, oohi itthu, oohuva, oohoona ni oothaaleliya.

Vano kinoolaka kiiraka; ukithumanane mi iwooru yoolawihiya wamooroni, waacera wiira ukhale thaciri, ni coowara cootteela cinlamuliyaa uwara, ni cihikhumelele co'haaya nlattu woothaaleliya waa ni uttikitthele nrette miitho aa, waacera woone.
Mi kinawaakuphula ni waattarusa othene ale anaafentaka. Vano ukhalane nthiti ni urukunuse nrima.
Paahi, mi kiri wankhora ni kinawaatta. Ntthu eewaka ncu naka ni ahulaka nkhora uyo, kinaahala ukela mpaani mwawe ni kinaahala unlyana.
Ule nohala utthema, kinaahala unvaha ihathuwa yo wunkoma ni mi wahiceni waka; toko mi citthemilyaka, kunkomaka na Apaapa wahiceni waya.
Paahi, ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele itthu inhimeryaya Nnepa ikereca.

Wahoolo cinavinrene nnya citthu nnya, kahoweha ni kahoona nkhora woohuliya wirimu, ni ncu noopacera neewilyaka nikuulumanaka toko nipalapatta, naheera: Uwele va ni kinaahala wuuthoonyera citthu cinhala ukhumelela cinavinrene nnya.
Nananoru kahokhala munnepani, ni kahoona ihice ineesiye wirimu, ni ntthu mmoca nonkomile wahiceni va.
Ule onkomile ule aari toko nluku no yasipe ni sartiyu nooceremela. Wariyari irimu ile, nikhwii nahorukurerya ihice, ni waalikana toko uceremela wo nluku nokankithi no'fayita.
Nceresere waya ihice ile, cahaawo tho ihice sirini na cese (24), ni kahoona mahumu sirini na acese (24) anonkomile anawanre ikuwo cootteela, ni mmuru waya yahowaraca ikhwerempa co'wooru.
Wahiceni vale waanoonnya uverunya ni wiiwannya itari ni macu. Iriyari yo'hice caampharela mithuko saapa co mooro, cennyo ciri minepa saapa ca Nluku.

Iriyari yo'hice ile yahaawo itthu imoca yoolikana toko ipharyaa yo wooneela, ilikanaka toko nluku no'fayita nootteela venci. Wariyari ihice ele ni nceresere waya, cahaawo ikhiyumpe cese cikumi co miitho menci, uhoolo n'uttuli.
Ikhiyumpe yoopacera yaari yoolikana kharamu; yonayeeli yaari yoolikana imope; ikhiyumpe yoneeraru yaarina ikhove toko ya ntthu ni yoneecese yaari yoolikana inaka ivavaka.

Vano ikhiyumpe cese nnye, wo khula ikhiyumpe yahaana mapupha siita, ukhuma uculu mpaka mmuthi yahorukurerya miitho; khacaatoomwa uhiyu n'uthana, ciiraka: Nttakattifu, Nttakattifu, Nttakattifu, pha Apwiya Nluku owoorya cothene, yaari, ari ni anhala uwa.
Ikhiyumpe nnyo waanttittimihaya n'umunnuwiha n'unsukuru ule onkomile wahiceni vale, ule ri nkumi ukati wothene,
mahumu sirini na acese (24) ale, yaammooromacela ule onkomile wahiceni vale anlapelaka ule ri nkumi ukati wothene. Ni yaanvonyera ikhwerempa caya wahiceni yiiraka:
Nyu, Apwiya Nluku ihu, unawuuphwanelani waakhela waarya, nttittimiho ni ikuru, maana nhopattusa citthu cothene, ni wootthuna winyu, cennyo cihokhala toko cinrenyu woopattusa.
Vano kahoona, umoononi wawe wo nlopwana ule onkomile wahiceni, iliivuru imoca yo wantikhiya nhina ni vate, yaatthukiye n'utthittiya ni ikanyero saapa.
Ni kahomoona ncelo okuru, akhuwelaka ni ncu nowiirunya eeraka: Tipani nophwanelannya utthukula ikanyero n'uhula iliivuru iyo?
Ni khaariwo wirimu, mena mwiilaponi ni mena vathi ilapo, aahala woorya uhula, mena uweha iliivuru ile.
Mi keera kunlaka venci, maana khaawo aaphwanyinye oophwanelannya uhula iliivuru ile, ni hata mmoca oohala usoma mena uweha.
Humu mmoca ahokiirela: Uhunle! Haawo va kharamu o nihimo na Yuta, Ntithari wa Taviti, tthemile wiira atthukule iliivuru ni ikanyero saapa nnye.

Vaavale kahoweha ni kahomoona mwakhontwaa, toko o wiiviya, neemenle iriyari yo'hice narukureriye ni ikhiyumpe cese cikumi nnye ni mahumu ale. Uyo ahaana inyaka saapa ni miitho saapa, ciri minepa saapa ca Nluku civeleelihiye ilapo yothene.
Ahowa ni ahokusa iliivuru ile muntatani nawe no nlopwana ule onkomile wahiceni.
Vano nakusilene iliivuru ile, ikhiyumpe cese ni mahumu sirini na acese (24) ale yahomooromela mwakhontwaa, anankusile ceece ni ikikhompe co'wooru cooheliya lumpani, ciri iswali ca atthu attakattifu.

Ayo yaaneepa icipo conaanano, yiiraka: Phi we uphwaneliye ukusa iliivuru n'uhula ikanyero caya, maana waheeviya. Uhaathuma ni iphome aa atthu o maloko othene, o moolumo othene, unethi wothene ni ilapo cothene, waarwaanaka wa Nluku,
ni uhaapanka umwene ni mayasataka; ni ayo anaahala ulamulela ilapo.
Vaavale kahoweha ni kaheewa ncu na ancelo enci waarukurenryaya ihice ile, wamoca ni ikhiyumpe nnye ni mahumu ale, ni ihisapu aya yaari yo'lufu ilufu cene, ni ikontu ikontu cene.
Yeera ni ncu nowiirunya: Unamphwanela mwakhontwaa, eeviye, wiira aakhele ulamuli ni mihakhu n'ucuwelaca, ni ikuru, nttittimiho, waarya n'usukuru.

Ni kaheewa ikhiyumpe cothene ciri wirimu ni vathi, ni vathi waya itthaya, ni mpahari ni citthu cothene ciri mommo, ciiraka: Ule onkomile wahiceni, wamoca ni mwakhontwaa, akhale oovahiya nttottopelo, nttittimiho, waarya, n'ulamuli ukati wothene.
Vano ikhiyumpe cese nnye ceera: Ameni, ni mahumu ale yahokhoromaca n'unlapela.
Kahoweha waatthukunlyawe mwakhontwaa ikanyero yoopacera, kahoweha ni kaheewa ncu nimoca wo'khiyumpe cese nnye, naari noolikana itari niiraka: Uwe!
Kahoweha ni kahoona ikhavalu imoca yootteela. Aawenle ikhavalo uyo ahaana muura ni ahovahiya ikhwerempa ya mayotthema, ni ahokhuma wiira apwaherere utthema.
Yahotthukuliya ikanyero yonayeeli ni kaheewa ikhiyumpe yonayeeli yiiraka: Uwe!
Yahokhuma ikhavalu ikina, yookhwiila, ni ule aawenle ikhavalu ule ahovahiya ikatana yuulupale wiira avarele nteko woomaliha mpuha mwiilaponi ni atthu yiivakane ayaayoru.
Yahotthukuliya ikanyero yoneeraru ni kaheewa ikhiyumpe yoneeraru yiiraka: Uwe! Kahoweha, ni kahoona ikhavalu yooripa. Aawenle ikhavalu iyo, ahaana ipalansa mmatatani mwawe.
Kaheewa ncu nimoca iriyari yo'khiyumpe cese nnye, niiraka: Namaroco mmoca o tiriku nothuminya ncurukhu mmoca; anamoroco araru o meele anthuminya ncurukhu mmoca, nanso uhitankanyace makhura ni ivinyu!
Yahotthukuliya ikanyero yoneecese, kaheewa ncu no'khiyumpe yoneecese, niiraka: Uwe!

Kahoweha ni kahoona ikhavalu yopirincila, ni aawenle ikhavalu uyo, ncina nawe eehaninya Nookhwa, ni mahiye yaanontthara. Ahovahiya ulamuli wo wiiva mphantte woneecese wo'lapo ni ikatana, itala, iretta ni masene ooluwa mwiilaponi.
Yahotthukuliya ikanyero yoneethanu, kahoona vathi waya ikhipula, iroho ca atthu o wiiviya nlattu wo nuulumo na Nluku ni wo'saahiti uvahilyaya.

Iroho ca atthu ayo caankhuwela ni ncu nowiirunya ciiraka: Nyu o'kuru cothene, nttakattifu ni eekhweli, mpaka yakhani nohalenyu uwehererya, waahukhumu atthu ankhala mwiilaponi ni waalivyaanihera iphome ehu?
Khula ntthu ahovahiya ihancu yootteela, ni aheereliya nanlelo avilele ukati vakani, mpaka iwaneleke ihisapu ya asikhwaya ni asunnaya yaahala wiiviya toko ayo ciirihiyaya.
Yahotthukuliya ikanyero yonasiita, kahoweha ni kahoona uttettemela venci wo'lapo, ni ncuwa nahoripela toko isiipire, ni mweeri wothene wahothatuwa toko iphome.
Itthoottwa co wirimu cahomorela mwiilaponi, toko cineeraya woomora mihokorokho cikithi cattakhinyinyaka ni iphyoo yuulupale.
Vano irimu yaheepintta toko cineeraya woopinttiya ntthatto, ni myaako cothene ni iciviri, cahotamihinya wanipuroni waya.
Mamwene o mwiilaponi, alamuli, akhulupale a anatoropa, athaciri, anakuru, ipottha cothene ni owiithawala othene, yaheepithaca mmakhukuni o mmyaakoni,
yiiracaka: Nniphituwele ni nnivithe ikhove awe ule onkomile wahiceni ni uviruwa wa mwakhontwaa,
maana nihuku nuulupale nooviruwa waya nihophiya, ni tupani nohala woorya uvilela?
Vano uvira waya nnya citthu nnya, kahoona ancelo acese yaari malootho oomacese olapo, attiyelelaka iphyoo wiira ihiwuke mwiilaponi, mena mpahari, mena mmirini.
Kahomoona tho ncelo nkina akhumaka mphantte unkhuma ncuwa, ni ahaana ikanyero ya Nluku nkumi, ni ahokhuwela ni ncu nowiirunya aakhuwelelaka ancelo acese, yaavahiye ikuru yookwanyula ilapo ni ipahari,
eeraka: Uhikwanyule ilapo iyo, mena ipahari, mena miri, mpaka wanhalehu waatthitta wayuuci arumeyi a Nluku ihu.
Vano kaheewa ihisapu ya atthu ootthittiya, yaari ilufu cene iminya wa arupayini ni acese (144.000) ootthittiya, o maloko othene a asaana o'Sirayeli.
Nihimo na Yuta, yahaawo ootthittiya ilufu khumi n'eeli; nihimo na Rupeni, ilufu khumi n'eeli; nihimo na Kaate, ilufu khumi n'eeli,
nihimo na Aseri, ilufu khumi n'eeli, nihimo na Nafitali, ilufu khumi n'eeli, nihimo na Manasesi, ilufu khumi n'eeli,
nihimo na Simeyoni, ilufu khumi n'eeli, nihimo na Levi, ilufu khumi n'eeli, nihimo na Isakari, ilufu khumi n'eeli,
nihimo na Sepuloni, ilufu khumi n'eeli, nihimo na Yusufu, ilufu khumi n'eeli, nihimo na Pencamii, ilufu khumi n'eeli, ayo yahotthittiya.

Vano uvira waya nnya citthu nnya, kahoweha ni kahoona mphwinko wa atthu oohaalikelyaa. Ilapo cothene, maloko othene, unethi wothene ni iluuka cothene, yaari uhoolo waya ihice n'uhoolo wawe Mwakhontwaa, anawanre ihancu cootteela ni anakusile milala mmatatani mwaya mmo.
Yaankhuwela ni ncu nowiirunya, yiiraka: Woopwa unkhuma wa Nluku ihu, onkomile wahiceni ni wa Mwakhontwaa!
Ancelo othene yeemenle nceresere waya ihice ni mahumu ni ikhiyumpe cese, yahooromela mpaka iyuuci vathi uhoolo waya ihice ni yahonlapela Nluku,
yiiraka: Ameni! Nttittimiho, waarya, ankhili, usukuru, nttottopelo, ulamuli ni ikuru, cikhale mahuku othene wa Nluku. Ameni!
Vaavale, ahumu amoca yahokikoha yiiraka: Ala awaracile ihancu cootteela ala, apani ni ankhumaca vayi?
Mi kahaakhula kiiraka: Ahumu, nyu nnaacuwela. Ni ale phikiirelaka: Ala ph'ale awile mmakokoromwani menci, akatthile ikuwo caya nnyo n'utteeliha ni iphome yo Mwakhontwaa.
Phimaana akhalacaka uhoolo waya ihice ya Nluku ni anawaarumeela uhiyu n'uthana mpaani mwawe mo'nupa ittakattifu; ni ule onkomile wahiceni naahala waakhuneela ni heema awe.
Khinhala waavola tho itala ni hata ntthona; khaninhala waapaha ncuwa hata waavihera nttukuttha,
maana Mwakhontwaa ri iriyari aya ihice, phinhala ukhala nhakheli aya ni phinhala waahoolela aarwanaka umaasini ookumi. Ni Nluku naahala waawuta miithori aya.
Vano yahotthukuliya ikanyero yonasaapa ni wirimu wahomaalya nuusu no'woora.
Kahoona ancelo saapa aneemenle wakhiviru Nluku, yaavahiye mapalapatta saapa.

Vaavale ahowa ncelo nkina ni aheemela wakhiviru ikhipula, navarenle ikikhompe yo'wooru impaheriya lumpani. Ahovahiya lumpani mwinci, wiira ampahe, ni iswali ca attakattifu othene wakhipulani yo'wooru iri wahiceni.
Mwiisi wo lumpani ule wahowela ni iswali ca attakattifu nnye, ukhuma mmatatani mwa ncelo ule mpaka wa Nluku.
Vano ncelo ule ahokusa ikikhompe yo lumpani ile, ahocariha mooro wo wakhipulani ni ahovonyera vathi. Vaavale yaheewannyaa macu, ukukutta n'uverunya, ni ilapo yahottettemela.
Vano ancelo saapa ale yaheetthenkaca wiira yoope mapalapatta saapa yaakusilyaya.

Vaavale ncelo oopacer'ole ahoopa nipalapatta nne ni yahorupa ipula yo maluku ni mooro wootakaneela iphome, wahovonyeriya mwiilaponi. Ni wahovya mphantte woneeraru wo'lapo; cahovya miri mphantte woneeraru ni malasi makithi othene.
Ncelo onayeeli ahoopa nipalapatta nawe, ni mpahari yahovonyeriya itthu yoopharela mooro, mpaka mphantte woneeraru wo'pahari wahothatuwa iphome.
Mphantte woneeraru wo'nama co mpahari mmo cahokhwaca, ni mphantte woneeraru wo'kalawa caari mommo cahokwanyuwaca cothene.

Vano ncelo oneeraru ahoopa nipalapatta nawe, ni yahomora itthoottwa yuulupale yaakhuma wirimu, ipharelaka toko nthuko. Yeeyo itthoottwa eyo yahomorela mphantte woneeraru wo myooloko ni iluusi co maasi.
Itthoottwa ile yeehaninya Apisintu, ni mphantte woneeraru wo maasi wahothatuwa owaawa. Vano atthu enci yahokhwa nlattu wo maasi ale.

Ncelo oneecese ahoopa nipalapatta nawe mpaka ukwanyuliya mphantte woneeraru wo ncuwa, mphantte woneeraru wo mweeri ni mphantte woneeraru wo'tthoottwa, wiira mphantte wo'thana uripele, ciicammo uhiyu uyo uripele.

Vano kahoweha ni kaheewa inaka ivavaka iriyari irimu, yiiraka ni ncu nowiirunya: Ahotakhaliya! Ahotakhaliya! Ahotakhaliya ale ari mwiilaponi, nlattu wo macu makina o mapalapatta a ancelo araru anhalaya woopa!
Ncelo oneethanu uyo ahoopa nipalapatta nawe, ni kahoona itthoottwa ikhocwaka wirimu n'umorela vathi. Vaavale itthoottwa ile yahovahiya mitthukulo co nlitti nooripela ni no wiisa.
Yahohula nlitti nooripela ni no wiisa ni wahokhuma mwiisi, toko wottukuttha muulupale. Nlattu wo mwiisi wo nttukutthani ule, ncuwa ni irimu khacoonnya.
Nttukutthani mmwe yahokhuma macoope amwaryeelaka mwiilaponi, ni yahovahiya ikuru toko cirinaya ikhavi co mwiilaponi.
Ni yaholamuleliya wiira ahitankanye malasi o mwiilaponi, mena coomela cikithi, mena mwiri, nanso yaatankanye paahi atthu ahirina wayuuci waya ikanyero ya Nluku.
Yaholamuleliya tho wiira iheeve atthu, nanso yaahuvihe ukati wo myeeri mithanu, ni mahuviho aya ayo yaari toko cinweryaya ikhavi yanlumaka ntthu.
Vano yaayo mahuku ayo, atthu ayo anaahala waavya ukhwa, nanso nookhwa naahala waatthawa.
Makhalelo o macoope ale yaari toko ikhavalu coowarihaciya cirwaka ukhottoni; wamuru waya cahaawo citthu coolikana ikhwerempa co'wooru, nanso ikhove aya yaari toko ya ntthu.
Yahaana ikharari coolikana toko ca nthiyana, ni miino aya yaari oolikana o kharamu.
Vano yahaana nakhakaaca oolikana o'yuma, ni unyakula wo mapupha aya waari toko uruma wo'kaaro co'khavalu cinci cirwaka ukhottoni.
Cahaana miila coolikana toko co'khavi ni miila caya cahaana ikuru co wooniha uwerya atthu ukati wo myeeri mithanu.
Macoope ayo yahaana mwene aya. Uyo aari ncelo o munlittini nooripela ni no wiisa, ni nuulumo no'parayiku, neehaninya Apatomi, ni nuulumo no'kereku neehaninya Apoliyomi, maanaya wiira mayokwanyula.
Vano unavinrene utakhaliya woopacera, unaawa tho utakhaliya imaara piili.
Ncelo onasiita ahoopa nipalapatta nawe ni kaheewa ncu naakhuma mmaloothoni macese o'khipula yo'wooru yaari ni Nluku.
Ahomwiirela ncelo onasiita, aarina nipalapatta: Waataphule ancelo acese atthukiye wo waattamana mooloko Ufarati.
Vaavale yahotthukuliya ancelo acese ale, yaari ootthenkemannyaa awehereryaka ukati, nihuku, mweeri ni mwakha, wiira yeeve mphantte woneeraru wa atthu.
Yincivelo aya anakhotto o'khavalu yaari ikontu cene iminya piili (200.000.000), ni kaheewa yincivelo aya.

Vaavale kahoona munttorani mwaka ikhavalu nnye, ni ale yeettiha ale yahaana nakhakaaca ooseriya toko mooro, oopipila ni o'pirincila, ni myuru co'khavalu nnyo caari toko myuru ca akharamu, ni mwaano waya waakhuma mooro, mwiisi ni wooka.
Nlattu wo yoola ulwii miraru ula, mphantte woneeraru wa atthu waheeviya ni mooro, ni mwiisi ni wooka waakhuma mwaano waya.
Maana ikuru co'khavalu ciri mwaano waya n'umiilani waya. Miila caya nnyo caalikana inwaa ni cahaana myuru, ni yaatankanya ni cennyo.

Atthu akina ayo, ahiiviye ni yoola ulwii ula, khaarukunusile nrima ni miteko co mmatatani mwaya, wiira ahilapele tho macini ni anluku aya o'wooru, o'paratha, o ncukhuma, o maluku, o miiri. Ayo ahinoona, ahineewa ni ahineetta.
Khaarukunusile nrima mmwiivani waya, mena inyanka, uluva ni winnya waya.
Vano kahomoona ncelo nkina akhuruwaka wirimu nawanre nihutte. Wamuru wawe nahaawo nikhwii ni ikhove awe yaari toko ncuwa. Inyaa cawe nnyo caari toko mapotto o mooro.
Mmatatani mwawe mmo ahokusa iliivuru yoopattakuliyene, ni mwetto awe wo nlopwana uyo eemesile waculu ipahari ni mwetto awe wo nthiyana uyo eemesile watthayani.
Ahokhuwela ni ncu nowiirunya, toko cineepawe kharamu. Nakhuwenlene, itari saapa cahoruma.
Vano aneewiyene macu o'tari saapa ale, mi keera kantikhaka, nanso kaheewa ncu nookhuma wirimu, neera: Utthitte itthu yuulumacilyaya itari saapa nnyo ni uhantikhe.
Ncelo aamoonnyaka neemenle mwetto mmoca waculu ipahari ni mwetto nkina watthayani, ahowusera ntata nawe wirimu
ni aholupela mwa ncina na ule ri nkumi ukati wothene, ule pattusile irimu, itthaya, ipahari ni citthu cothene ciri mommo eeraka: Khawanhala upicapica.
Nihuku ninhalawe woopa nipalapatta nawe ncelo onasaapa, inaahala ucuwannyaa isiiri ya Nluku, toko caahimenryawe minapiyu cawe ari arumeyi awe.
Ni ncu niiwilyaka nookhuma wirimu, nahokuulumana tho niiraka: Urwee ni wakuse iliivuru iri mmatatani mwa ncelo eemenle mpahari ni watthayani.
Vaavale kahorwaa wa ncelo ule, ni kahomwiirela: Ukivahe iliivuru iyo. Ule aakiirenle coo: Ukuseke ni ukhureke. Iyo inaahala uwaawiha mmirimani mwaa mmo, nanso mwaano mwaa inaahala uciva toko urawo.
Vaavale kahokusa iliivuru yaari mmatatani mwa ncelo ule ni kahokhura. Ukhura waka, mwaano mwaka yaari yoociva toko urawo, ni mmirimani mwaka mwaari moowaawa.
Ule ahokiirela: Vano unlamuliya ulalya imaara ikina tho; ulaleereke unethi mwinci, ilapo cinci, iluuka cinci ni mamwene menci.
Vaavale kahovahiya ikopo yo ntathi ni ncelo ule ahokiirela: Wunwe ni ulike inupa ittakattifu ya Nluku, ni ikhipula ni waalikele othene ale anlompa.
Uhilike mphantte uri uta wo'nupa ittakattifu, maana ihaavahiya amalaponi ni anaahala unyakela isittatti ittakattifu ukati wo myeeri arupayini na miili (42).
Kinaahala waavaha ikuru asaahiti aka eeli, ni anaahala ulalya mahuku ilufu imoca ni iminya piili ni sitini (1.260) anawanre icakho.
Nnya phi miri co nlivera miili ni isamaninya piili cirinawe Nluku o'lapo yo vathi.
Nanso akhalaka ntthu oophavela waapanka yoonanara, mwaano waya unaahala ukhuma mooro wo waakwanyulaca eenani aya. Ni wakhalaka wiira haawo nophavela waapanka yoonanara, uyo naahala ukhwa.
Yaayo asaahiti ayo ahaana ikuru cootthuka irimu wiira ihirupe ipula ukati unlalyaya, ni ahaana ikuru cootatusa iphome maasi ayo n'uwiiha ulwii mwiilaponi mothene, imaara cothene cintthunaya.
Vano yamaleliyaka usaahiti aya, nsene ninkhuma munlittini nooripela ni no wiisa, nno ninaahala waanana mpaka waatthema ni weevakaca.
Mirutthu caya cinhala ukhala mparaparani mo'sittatti yuulupale, ilikaniheriyaka toko uSotoma ni wIciipitu, wonwo ukhomeliyawe Pwiya aya.
Atthu o maloko menci, ikhapila cinci, iluuka cinci n'unethi mwinci, anaahala woona mirutthu caya ukati wo mahuku mararu ni nuusu, ni cinkokhottihiya uvithiya mmahiye.

Ale ankhala mwiilaponi, anaahala utteeliya mwa ayo ni anaahala utthapa, ni anaahala uvahana ntthu ni nkhwawe citthu coothoonyera utteeliya, maana nnya minapiyu miili nnya yaanaahuviha atthu ankhala mwiilaponi.
Vano mahuku mararu ni nuusu ale anavinrene, iphumu cookumi cookhuma wa Nluku, cahokela mminapiyu ni mmwe ni nnyo caheemelaca, ni atthu yoonne ale yahoovaca venci.
Minapiyu nnye caheewa ncu nowiirunya nookhuma wirimu, neerelaka: Nweeke woono. Ni cahorwaa wirimu nnihutteni, ni eenani aya ale yahoonaca.

Ni wo yoole ukati ule, yahottettemela ilapo, mpaka ukwanyuwaca mphantte wonakhumi wo'sittatti, ni muuttettemelani itthaya mmwe, yahokhwa atthu ilufu saapa, ni akina ayo yahoovaca venci ni yahonttottopela Nluku o wirimu.
Paahi, utakhaliya wonayeeli uhovira; vano utakhaliya woneeraru unaahala uwa woohipica.
Ncelo onasaapa ahoopa nipalapatta nawe, ni wirimu nwo yahaawo macu menci yeera: Umwene wothene wo mwiilaponi wahothatuwa wa Apwiy'ehu ni wa Kristu awe, ni yooyo naahala ulamulela mahuku othene.
Ni mahumu sirini na cese (24) yunkomile wahiceni wawe, wamiithoni wa Nluku, yahooromihacela iyuuci caya vathi ni yahonlapela Nluku,
yiiraka: Ninawusukuruni, Pwiya, Nluku owoorya cothene, nri ikhumelo ni mwaari. Nhokusa ikuru cinyu cothene ni nnaalamula.

Vano amalaponi yahorusiya, ni uviruwa winyu wahaaphwanya. Uhophiya ukati woohukhumwinya atthu ookhwa, ukati wowaavaha itthuvo arumeyi inyu, ari minapiyu, attakattifu inyu, ni ale anoova ncina ninyu, oolupale ni acikani, ni ukati wowaakwanyulaca ale akwanyulacile ilapo.
Yahohulya wirimu nipuro nittakattifu, ni ikasa yo nleehano nawe yahooninya inari mpaani mwawe. Vaavale wahoverunya, wahokukutta, itthaya yahottettemela ni yahorupa ipula yo maluku.
Vaavale, wahoonnya nthoonyero muulupale wirimu, nthiyana mmoca nawanre ncuwa, ni mweeri unari vathi inyaa cawe, ni ikhwerempa yo'tthoottwa khumi na piili cinari wamuru wawe.
Vano aari ni irukulu ni aankhuwela woothoonyera wiira aahanle vakani uyara.
Yahoonnya ikanyero ikina wirimu, iyo yaari ihanasi yookhwiila, yaarina myuru saapa ni inyaka khumi. Mmuru mmo yahowara ikhwerempa saapa.
Mwiila aya wahokusa mphantte woneeraru wo'tthoottwa co wirimu phivonyeraka vathi. Ihanasi ile yaheemela wakhiviru na athiyana yaahala uyara ale, wiira yaayaraka, immirye mwan'oyo.
Athiyana ale yahonnyara, mwana mwanlopwana, yooyo aahala ulamulela maloko othene ni ikopo yo'yuma. Mwanaya ahokusiya n'urwaaninya wa Nluku, mpaka wahiceni wawe.
Vano athiyana ale yahotthawela ntakhwani, nipuro naatthenkaceriyaya ni Nluku wiira ahepheliye ukati wo mahuku ilufu ni iminya piili wo sitini (1.260).
Vano yahaawo ikhotto wirimu. Mikeli na ancelo awe yahaanana ihanasi ni macini aya.
Nanso ihanasi khayaatthemile ni khayaarina tho nipuro wirimu.
Vaavale ihanasi yuulupale ile, iri inwaa yokhalayi, ineehaninya Ntakhali ni Sotwani, nothepya ilapo yothene, ahovonyeriya mwiilaponi wamoca ni macini awe.

Kaheewa ncu nowiirunya nookhuma wirimu neera: Nna va uhophiya woopwa, ikuru, n'umwene wa Nluku ihu n'ulamuli wa Kristu awe, maana mayowaariyelela asunnihu uyo, hottheminya, yooyo aariyelela wamiithoni wa Nluku ihu uhiyu n'uthana.
Ayo yahontthema nlattu wo'phome yo Mwakhontwaa ni nuulumo no'saahiti; ni khayaafentile ukumi aya mpaka ukhwa.
Phimaana, nyu irimu ni nyu othene nnokhala wonwo, muntthapelele. Ihotakhaliya itthaya ni ipahari, maana Sotwani hokhuruwa ni horusiya venci, kontha hocuwela wiira unhalenle ukati vakani.
Vano ukati uvonyeriyaya ihanasi mwiilaponi, yahopacera woomolanihaca athiyana yanyanre mwana mwanlopwa.
Ni athiyana ale yahovahiya mapupha o'naka yuulupale wiira avavele utakhwani, nipuro nihinooninyaya ni inwaa ile. Wonwo unhepheliyaya ukati vakani, ukati mwinci ni nuusu.
Uttuli waya athiyana ale, inwaa ile yahoraphyaa maasi n'uphattuwa mooloko wiira yaasinyinye.
Vano itthaya yahaakavihera athiyana ale. Itthaya yahohula malaku aya ni yahomirya mooloko waapattusiye ni ihanasi.
Vaavale ihanasi ile yahaaviruwela athiyana ale mpaka upacera waanana ucuulu aya, uneettela malamulo a Nluku ni urina usaahiti wa Yesu Kristu.
Vano ihanasi yaheemela wanhaavani wo'pahari.
Kahoona nsene nuulupale naari no woopiha, naakhuma mpahari; naarina myuru saapa ni inyaka khumi, ni wo khula inyaka yahaana ikhwerempa aya, ni wo khula muru, nahaawo ncina nookufuru.
Nsene nuulupale nne naari noolattana ni havara, inyaa caya nnyo caari toko co nsene ni malaku aya yaari toko o kharamu. Vano nahovahiya ni ihanasi ikuru, ihice n'ulamuli.
Wa cennyo myuru nnyo, kahoona muru mmoca unarina namampatani, nanso namampatani ule ahovonihinya. Ilapo yothene yahotikinihinya ni yahotthara nsene nuulupale nne.
Vano atthu ale yaholapela ihanasi yaavahile ikuru nsene nne ni yaholapela nsene nne, yiiraka: Tipani nolikana ni nsene? Tipani nohala waanana?
Vano yahovahiya malaku wiira aromolace citthu coohiloka ni ikufuru, ni yahovahiya ikuru coolamula myeeri arupayini na miili.
Paahi, yahohula malaku aya inkufurwelaka Nluku ni ulapha ncina nawe nno, ni heema nttakattifu na ale ankhala wirimu.
Ciicammo ahottuniheriya waanana ikhotto attakattifu othene ni wiira aattheme, ni ahovahiya ikuru wo maloko othene, iluuka cothene ni ilapo cothene.
Vano atthu othene ankhala mwiilaponi anaahala ulapela, yaayo ahantikhiye nliivuruni yo'kumi yo mwakhontwaa, eeviye ikhumelo yompiyeru ilapo.
Ule rina manyaru owiiwa, eewelele:
Ntthu arwaaniyaka uphottani, yooyo naahala urwaaniya uphottani. Ntthu eeviyaka ni ikatana, yooyo naahala ukhwa ni ikatana. Vano vaava phiryaya uvilela ni nroromelo na attakattifu.
Ciicammo kahoona nsene nikina naakhuma vathi, naarina inyaka piili coolikana co'khontwaa ni noolumaca toko ihanasi.
Naarina ulamuli toko nsene noopacera waryaya va ni naapanka mananna owiira atthu othene o mwiilaponi alapele nsene noopacera naavonihinye namampatani.
Nenno naapanka ikanyero cuulupale mpaka woorya ukurusa mooro ukhuma wirimu mpaka vathi, atthu yoonaka.

Nawaathepya ale ankhala mwiilaponi ni ikanyero citthuniheriyaya upanka wamiithoni wo nsene nne. Nahaalamulela ankhala mwiilaponi wiira yaapanke apontto oottottopela nsene naarakalihiye ni ikatana nanso nanlelo nikumi.
Vano ahovahiya ikuru wiira anvahe iroho pontto ule, wiira oolumace ni eevakace othene ahintthuna unlapela pontto uyo.
Ciicammo, nsene nne nahaakhanyereriha othene acikani, oolupale, mathaciri ni amasikiini, owiithawala ni ipottha wiira aheliye ikanyero muntatani no nlopwana atthuna wayuuci,
wiira hikhale oothuma mena ootumiha, ari hikhanle ule rina ikanyero, niri ncina no nsene, atthuna ihisapu yo ncina naya.
Va uhaawo ucuwelaca. Ule ri owiiweeha apweserere ihisapu yo nsene nno, maana iri ihisapu ya ntthu. Ihisapu awe iri iminya siita wo sitini na siita (666).
Vano kahoweha ni kahomoona Mwakhontwaa nari wamwaakoni Siyoni. Yooyo aari na atthu ilufu iminya waarupayini na acese (144.000), yaantikhiye wayuuci waya ncina nawe ni ncina na athumwane.
Kaheewa ncu naakhuma wirimu toko uruma wo maasi menci ni toko ukukutta, ciicammo kaheewa ncu noolikana woopiya wo cikwesa.

Yaaneepa ncipo nonaanano uhoolo wo'hice, wo'khiyumpe cese ni wo mahumu. Khaawo oorya wiitthuca ncipo nno, ari ahikhanle paahi atthu ilufu cene iminya waarupayini na acese (144.000) athuminye mwiilaponi.

Ala ph'ayo ahaathukumananne athiyana, maana ari iharusi. Ala ph'ayo anontthara Mwakhontwaa miphantte cothene cinkelelawe. Ala ph'ayo athuminye iriyari ya atthu, ari oopacera wa Nluku ni wa Mwakhontwaa.
Vano mmalakuni mwaya kuphwanyanele wootha, maana ari atthu oohi mahirihiri uhoolo wo'hice ya Nluku.
Ciicammo kahomoona ncelo avavaka uculu irimu, ni ahaana nhupi woorera woohimala, wiira aalalyere ankhala mwiilaponi, ni maloko othene, ni iluuka cothene, n'unethi wothene,
yiiraka ni ncu nowiirunya: Mmoove Nluku ni munttittimihe, maana ukati awe woohukhumu uhophiya. Munlapele ule oompile irimu ni itthaya ni ipahari ni myooloko co maasi.
Vano ncelo onayeeli ahopwaherera eeraka: Howuluwa! Howuluwa Papiloniya, isittatti yuulupale invaha uwurya ilapo cothene ivinyu yooviruwa yooluva aya!
Vano tho ncelo oneeraru aheera ni ncu nowiirunya: Akhalaka ntthu nolapela nsene ni pontto aya ni naakhela ikanyero wayuuci atthuna mmatatani,

ciicammo uyo naahala uwurya ivinyu yooviruwa wa Nluku, irihiye yoohitakaniheriya nkikhompeni yooviruwa wawe, ni naahala uhuvihiya ni mooro ni wooka uhoolo wa ancelo attakattifu ni wamiithoni wa Mwakhontwaa.
Mwiisi wo mahuviho awe unaawela mahuku othene, ni khuuwo umumula, mena uthana, mena uhiyu, yaale anlapela nsene ni pontto aya n'ule nohala waakhela ikanyero yo ncina naya.
Vano uhophiya ukati woovilela attakattifu. Ala ph'atthu aneewelela malamulo a Nluku ni anonkupali Yesu.
Kaheewa tho ncu nookhuma wirimu, niiraka: Wantikhe wiira: Ahoreriya akhwile mwa Apwiya ukhuma nenna va. Nnepa uheera: Amumulele miteko caya, kontha miteko cipankilyaya cinawaatthara.
Vano kahoweha ni kahoona nihutte nootteela. Wanihutteni vale ahonkoma mmoca oolikana toko mwana a pinatamu; aarina wamuru wawe ikhwerempa yo'wooru, ni mmatatani mwawe ahaana nkuttima wowiitha.
Ncelo nkina ahokhuma nipuro nittakattifu ankhuwelelaka ni ncu nowiirunya ule onkomile wanihutteni: Ukuse nkuttima aa ni uhephe. Uhophiya ukati, maana mihokorokho co mmattani nnyo cihottokottha!
Ule onkomile wanihutteni ahomweesa nkuttima awe ni mihokorokho nnyo cahohephiya.
Ncelo nkina, aarina nkuttima owiitha, ahokhuma mpaani nipuro nittakattifu niri wirimu.

Vano ncelo nkina ahokhuma wakhipulani, aarina ikuru coolamulela mooro ni ahonkhuwelela ule aarina nkuttima o wiitha, eeraka: Uvonyere nkuttima aa owiith'oyo ni uhephe mihokorokho co'vinyu yo mwiilaponi, maana mihokorokho caya nnyo cihottokottha!
Ncelo ule aheesa nkuttima awe mwiilaponi ni ahohepha mihokorokho co'vinyu yo mwiilaponi, ni ahovonyera muntthiyani nooviruwa wa Nluku.
Ni mihokorokho nnye caameliye uta wo'sittatti ni mwaameliye aya mmwe yahokhuma iphome mpaka mwaatthukeleliyaya imope; ittalivelo aya iri yo malonce ilufu ni iminya siita (1.600).
Kahoona tho ikanyero yuulupale ni yootikineeha wirimu. Ancelo saapa yaarina ikhuutura co wiiheerya, maana nhina mwa cennyo phimmalelaya uviruwa wa Nluku.

Ciicammo kahoona tho yoolikana ipahari yowooneela yootakaneela mooro, ni ale yaatthemile nsene nne ni pontto aya, ni ikanyero aya, ni ikanyero yo ncina naya, anari wamoca ni ipahari yowooneela ni yahaana ampetta a Nluku.

Vaavale yeepa icipo ya Musa, nrumeyi a Nluku ni ncipo no mwakhontwaa, yiiraka: Cuulupale ni cootikiniha, ciri miteko cinyu, Apwiya Nluku owoorya cothene! Iphiro cinyu nnyo ciri co'sariya ni co'khweli, nyu Amwene a atthu attakattifu!

Vano tupani hinhala uwoovani, nyu Apwiya? Tupani hinhala uttittimiha ncina ninyu? Maana phi nyu paahi nttakattifu. Phimaana, maloko othene anaahala uwa ni ammwa ukhoromela uhoolo winyu, maana isariya cinyu nnyo cinawoonnya.
Uvira waya nnya citthu nnya, kahoweha ni kahoona wiira nipuro nittakattifu no heema o'saahiti nahohulyaa wirimu.
Ancelo saapa yaarina ikhuutura saapa ale, yahokhumaca nipuro nittakattifu nne, anawaracile ikuwo coorera ni co wooneela ni aneetthukenle micako co'wooru wakhakaacani.
Vano ikhiyumpe imoca wa nnye cese nnye, yahaavaha ancelo saapa ale ikikhompe co'wooru, coocara uviruwa wa Nluku, Ule nokhala ukati wothene.
Vaavale nipuro nittakattifu nne nahocara mwiisi wo waarya wa Nluku ni ikuru cawe, ni khaawo oorya ukela nipuro nittakattifu, mpaka umalamalihiya ikhuutura ca ancelo saapa ale.
Vano kaheewa ncu nowiirunya nookhuma nipuro nittakattifu, neerelaka ancelo acese ale: Nrwaace mweetthele mwiilaponi mothene ikikhompe saapa cicanre uviruwa wa Nluku.
Vaavale, ahokhuma ncelo oopacer'oyo ni aheetthela mwiilaponi itthu yaari nkikhompeni mmo ni atthu yaarina ikanyero yo nsene na ale anonlapela pontto aya, cahaaphwanya iretta co'thuku ni wiipakaciya.
Ncelo onayeeli uyo aheetthela mpahari itthu yaari nkikhompeni mmo, ni iyo yahothatuwa iphome toko ya ntthu ookhwa, ni citthu cikumi cothene caari mpahari mmwe cahokhwaca.
Ciicammo ncelo oneeraru uyo aheetthela mmamyoolokoni ni mmaluusi co maasi, itthu yaari nkikhompeni mmo. Vano maasi othene yahothatuwa iphome.
Vaavale ncelo nolamulela maasi, kahomwiiwa eeraka: Nyu Apwiya mwa nasariya; nyu nri ni mwaari, Apwiya Nttakattifu, kontha nhohukhumu nnya citthu nnya;
kontha ayo ahovuviha iphome ya attakattifu ni yo minapiyu. Ciicammo nyu nhaavaha uwurya iphome toko cinaaphwanelaya.
Nanlelo kaheewa ukhipulani wiiriyaka: Khweli, Apwiya Nluku owoorya cothene, co'khweli ni co'sariya ciri ihukhumu cinyu.
Vano ncelo oneecese uyo aheetthela muncuwani, itthu yaari nkikhompeni mmo ni ahovahiya ikuru co waapaha atthu ni mooro.
Toko commo, atthu ale yahopahiya ni nttukuttha ninci mpaka uhanyuriha ncina na Nluku, rina ulamuli wo'khuutura nnyo ni khayaarukunusile nrima wiira anttottopele.
Vaavale ncelo oneethanu ule aheetthela wahiceni wo nsene, itthu yaari nkikhompeni mmo, mpaka umwene uyo uthatuwa ipiphi ni atthu ayo uluma nlimi nlattu wooweryaa woonaya.
Yahonhanyuriha Nluku o wirimu nlattu woocukulaca ni wo waawerya makhwatta, nanso khayaarukunusile nrima miteko caavaraya nnyo.

Ciicammo ncelo onasiita ule aheetthela mmoolokoni muulupale uneehaninya Ufarati, itthu yaari nkikhompeni mmo, mpaka maasi ayo uwelela, wiira itthenkemanihinye iphiro yaahalaya uvira mamwene akhumaka mphantte unkhuma ncuwa.
Vano phoonnyaka minepa miraru coonanara coolikana amarapi cikhumaka mwaano mo'hanasi, mo nsene ni mo nnapiyu owootha.
Nnyo ciri minepa coonanara, cimpankaca mithoonyero ni cinaaphwanya mamwene o mwiilaponi mothene, wiira yaathukumanihe, nlattu wo'khotto yo nihuku nuulupale na Nluku owoorya cothene.
Nkiviriyane! Kinhala uwa toko namwinnya. Horeriya ule norontta ni nosunka coowara cawe, wiira heette pwitipwiti, wiira cihooninye ihaaya cawe nnyo.
Vano yahothukumana nipuro nineehaninya ni nuulumo no'Parayiku Armaketoni.
Vano ncelo onasaapa ule aheetthela wanlakani itthu yaari nkikhompeni mmo, ni naheewannyaa ncu nookhuma nipuro nittakattifu niiraka: Waheerannyaa!
Vaavale wahanca uverunya, macu n'ukukutta, ni ilapo yahottettemela, ihinatoko wiirannyaa yompiyeru ittuninya. Commo phaakhumelenlyaya uttettemela venci wo'lapo.

Vano isittatti yuulupale ile yahokawannya miphantte miraru, ni cahomora isittatti co mwiilaponi. Vaavale Nluku ahoopuwelela isittatti yuulupale yo'Papiloniya wiira avahe ikikhompe yo'vinyu yoorusiya wawe n'uviruwa.
Iciviri cothene cahotthawa ni myaako cothene cahorimya.

Ni ciicammo yahaarupa atthu ale ipula yuulupale yo maluku yaakhuma wirimu; ipula yo maluku yaalemenle venci cinene. Vano nlattu wo'pula yo maluku ile, atthu ayo yahopacera unhanyuriha Nluku, nlattu wo'khuutura yinci.
Vano ahowa ncelo mmoca mwa ancelo saapa arina ikikhompe saapa ale ni ahokuulumana, eeraka: Nkaawe kawuthoonyere uhukhumwinya wo nthiyana puuta oocuwannyaa onkomile nipuro niri maasi menci.
Nthiyan'oyo ph'ule aaluvana mamwene o mwiilaponi aahapalihaka ni ivinyu yooluva wawe.
Vaavale ncelo ule ahokikusa munnepani mpaka utakhwani ni kahomoona nthiyana nawenle nsene nowoonnyeela ni nowantikhaciya macina o makufuru. Nsene nno naarina myuru saapa ni inyaka khumi.

Nthiyan'ole aawanre ikuwo coorika nttenko ni cowoonnyeela, cooheliya iwooru, maluku o'fayita ni maluku o mihakhu, narina mmatatani mwawe ikikhompe yo'wooru inacanre makufuru ni citthu coohiirya muuluvani mwawe.
Wayuuci wawe nahantikhiya ncina, nootikineeha, naari: Papiloniya, muulupale, anumwanaya mapuuta ni mayokufuru o mwiilaponi.
Vaavale kahomoona nthiyana oohapaliya nlattu wo'phome ya attakattifu ni nlattu wo'phome ya asaahiti a Yesu, ni wamoonnyaka, kahotikhinaca venci.
Nanso ncelo ule ahokiirela: Untikhinacani? Kinaahala wuutaphulela isiiri ca nthiyan'ole ni co nsene nirina myuru saapa ni inyaka khumi nne, ninkusile nthiyan'oyo:

Nsene noonnyaa naariwo nne, nanso vano khaniwo tho. Nihanle vakani ukhuma munlittini nooripela ni no wiisa ni ninrwaa wuukwanyulaciyani. Na ale ankhala mwiilaponi ale, ahantikhiye macina aya nliivuruni yo'kumi, ikhumelo yompiyeru ittuninya, anaahala utikhinaca wanhalaya woona nsene naariwo nne, vano khaniwo. Nanso ninaahala uwa tho.
Vano va, amphaveliya ankhili omaana. Myuru saapa nnyo, ciri myaako saapa, wonwo wunkomile nthiyan'oyo. Ni ciicammo ari mamwene saapa.
Wo yaayo mamwene saapa ayo ahowuluwa athanu, mmoca haawo, ni nkin'oyo khanaya uwa, ni awaaka, nolamuliya upica vakani.
Ni nsene naariwo nne, vano khaniwo tho, nenno phi mwene onanaane, nokhuma wo mamwene saapa ale ni norwaa wukwanyulaciyani.
Inyaka khumi coonnyaa nnyo, phi mamwene khumi, yaayo ahinaya waakhela umwene aya, nanso wo'kati vakani, anaahala waakhela ulamuli toko mamwene, wamoca ni nsene nne.
Vano ala arina moopuwelo mamocaaru ni anaavaha nsene nne ikuru n'ulamuli urinaya.
Vano yaayo, anaahala umwaanana mwakhontwaa, ni Mwakhontwaa uyo naahala waatthema, maana uyo ri Apwiya o mapwiya ni Mwene o mamwene; ciicammo ale arinawe, ari owiihaninya, oothanliya ni o nroromelo.
Ni nanlelo ahokiirela coo: Maasi yoonnyaa ayo, wonkomilyawe puuta ule, uri unethi, ilapo, miphwinko ni iluuka.
Vano inyaka khumi coonnyaa, ni nsene nno, cinaahala unrusanana puuta uyo, umuulumela yoohiloka, unrulaca ikuwo cawe, unkhura ithayi awe n'umpaha wamooroni.
Maana munrimani waya mmo, Nluku hotthuna wiira ale avare cinoopuwelaya, ni apanke ikina ni avahe nsene nne umwene urinaya uyo, mpaka utthariheleliya moolumo a Nluku.
Nthiyana amoonnyaa, iri isittatti yuulupale inlamulela mamwene o'lapo yothene yo vathi.
Vano wavinryaya nnya citthu nnya, kahomoona akhuruwaka wirimu ncelo nkina, aarina ulamuli, ni ilapo yahomwaleeliya ni waarya wawe.

Ahokhuwela ni ncu nowiirunya eeraka: Hokwanyuwa! Hokwanyuwa Papiloniya muulupale! Papiloniya hothatuwa ntthoko no macini, ni nikhuku no minepa cothene coonanara ni mwiipitho wa asaanuni othene o'haramu ni oorusihiya.
Maana ilapo cothene cihowurya ivinyu yoorusiya nlattu wooraruwa wawe. Haararuwana mamwene othene o mwiilaponi. Ni ciicammo mayanakoso omwiilaponi yahothaciri nlattu woopuuta awe.
Vano kaheewa tho ncu nookhuma wirimu niiraka: Nyu unethi aka, munthamele, wiira nhipanke mphantte ntampini mwawe ni wiira nhipanke coonanara cawe;
maana itampi cawe nnyo cihophiya wirimu, ni Nluku hoopuwelela miteko coonanara cipankilyawe.
Munlivyaanihere toko uyo cipankilyawe, mumpankeke imaara piili toko ciryaya miteko cawe, ni ikikhompe yoohapala yuuvahilyaweni, munhokolosere imaara piili.

Toko ciittottopilyawe waapankawe coonanara, munvahe toko ciicammo mahuviho menci, ni akhuwele nlattu woommweryaa, maana neeciirela: Kunkomile toko pwiyamwene. Akihimwe nankhwele. Akinhala ucukulaca ni wunla!
Phimaana, wo nihuku nimoca, anaahala uwa mahuviho awe: Nookhwa, wunla ni itala; ni inaahala upahiya wamooroni, maana okuru ari paahi Apwiya Nluku anhukhumwile.
Wanhalaya woona mwiisi woopahiya nthiyan'ole, mamwene o mwiilaponi, yaayo yaararuwanawe ni apankaka coohiirya, anaahala umunlela n'uncukulela.
Ammokhala uttayi nlattu wo woova mahuviho awe, yiiraka: Hotakhaliya! Hotakhaliya! We Papiloniya isittatti yuulupale! We isittatti yo'kuru! Maana wo'kati vakani, ihukhumu aa ihophiya.
Vano mwa yooyo, anawunla n'ucukula mayanakoso o mwiilaponi, maana khaawo tho nothuma marontta aya,

marontta o'wooru, o'paratha, o maluku o'fayita ni owooneela, o'kuwo coovevyaala, co mapururu, co thereca ni ikuwo cookhwiila, ni mithinto cothene co'thaapwa, mithinto cothene co miino o'tthepo, mithinto cothene co'karuma co'thaapwa co'fayita, o ncukhuma, o'yuma ni o marimore;
ni ikanela ni ikathe yoonukhela, lumpani, makhura oonukhela, ivinyu, makhura o nlivera, iphepa yokhanttyaa, itiriku, ampakhira, ikhontwaa, ni ikhavalu ni ikaaro, ipottha na atthu akinaku.
Citthu coorera cowuucivela cahotthawa, ni mihakhu cothene cowaarya khunhala uphwanya tho.
Vano mayanakoso o cennya citthu nnya yaathaciri nlattu wo yeeyo, anhala ukhala uttayi nlattu wo woova mahuviho aya, yunlaka ni acukulaka,
yiiraka: Ihotakhaliya! Ihotakhaliya isittatti yaawanre ikuwo coorika nttenko, cookhwiila ni cowoonnyeela, coosoriya ni iwooru, ni co maluku o'fayita ni o waarya.
Wo'kati vakani paahi uhokwanyulaciya nhakhu mwinci! Ahooleli o'kalawa ni ale othene ampakhiriya nkalawani, anahota ni othene anvara nteko mpahari yeemelacile uttayi.
Vano woona waya mwiisi woopahiya waya, yahokhuwela yiiraka: Isittattini ila inlikana ni isittatti yuulupale?

Yaheettela ntthupi mmuru waya yunlaka ni yiikhupanyaka, yahokhuwela yiiraka: Ihotakhaliya! Ihotakhaliya isittatti yuulupale, yaathacirihale ale othene yaarina ikalawa co mpahari nlattu wa coonanara caya, maana wo'kati vakani, ihokwanyulaciya!
Utteeliye, we irimu ni nyu attakattifu, amitthenka ni minapiyu. Nluku hohukhumu yeeyo nlattu wa nyu.

Vaavale ncelo mmoca o'kuru ahoteesa nluku noolikana toko nsilo nuulupale ni ahovonyera mpahari, eeraka: Phi ciicale ni ikuru phinhalaya upankiya Papiloniya, iri isittatti yuulupale, ni khinhala woonannya tho.

Ncu na anampetta, no mayowiipa, no mayanipalapatta, ni na anaceece, khaninhala wiiwannya tho mwa we, hata atthu oorattaratta upanka citthu khaanhala woonannya, ni khunhala wiiwannya uruma wo nluku noosila.
Nthuko aa khunhala waarya tho; mena ncu no mayopakanela atthuna mayopakaneliya khaninhala wiiwiya. Maana mayanakoso yaari oolupale o mwiilaponi, ni ilapo cothene cahothepiya ni inyanka caa.
Ni mwiilaponi mommo ihophwanyannya iphome yo minapiyu, ya attakattifu ni ya ale othene yiiviye.
Vaavale cinavinrene nnya citthu nnya, kaheewa wirimu ncu noolikana toko atthu enci, yiiraka: Aleluya! Woopwa ni nttittimiho ni ikuru ciri ca Nluku ihu,
maana, mahukhumwelo awe ari o'khweli ni o'sariya. Kontha honhukhumu puuta muulupale aatankanya ilapo nlattu wooluva awe. Nluku homwiiveleliha ikuhukuhu nlattu wo'phome ya arumeyi awe.
Vano yaheera tho: Aleluya! Ni mwiisi aya unaawela ukati wothene.
Vano, mahumu sirini n'acese (24) ale ni ikhiyumpe cese nnye yahooromaca ni yahonlapela Nluku, onkomile wahiceni wawe, eeraka: Ameni! Aleluya!
Naheewannyaa ncu uhiceni neera: Munttottopele Nluku ihu, arumeyi awe othene, nyu nnomoova, acikani ni oolupale.
Vaavale, kaheewa tho ncu nowiirunya noolikana toko atthu enci, toko maasi menci ni toko ukukutta venci, niiraka: Aleluya! Khweli Apwiya anaalamulela, Nluku ihu, owoorya cothene.
Nitteeliye, nitthape ni ninvahe nttittimiho, maana uhophiya ukati wo'sikuhuulu yoothela Mwakhontwaa, yoole, amwaarawe yiitthenkemanihile.
Maana hovahiya uwara ikuwo coorera ni coovevyaala, cowoonnyeela ni cooceremela. Maana ikuwo coorika ni coovevyaala, ciri miteko co'sariya ca atthu attakattifu.
Vano ncelo ule ahokiirela: Ahoreriya ale aneehaninya usikuhuuluni yoothelaninya yo mwakhontwaa. Ni aheera tho: Ala phi moolumo eekhweli a Nluku.

Vano kahokhoroma wamettoni wawe wiira kinlapele. Nanso uyo aheera: Uhipanke commo; mi ki nkhunanaa ni ciicammo a asunna arina usaahiti wa Yesu; unlapele Nluku. Maana usaahiti wa Yesu uri nnepa wo minapiyu.
Vaavale kahoona irimu inahulyeele, ni kahoona ikhavalu yootteela. Nakhavalo uyo eehaninya Ukhuluvelyaa ni Ikhweli. Naahukhumu ni nawaana ikhotto ni isariya.
Miitho awe ayo yaari toko o malimi o mooro; wamuru wawe va, cahaawo ikhwerempa cinci, ni nahaawo ncina naantikhiye nahaacuwelawe ntthu, ari hikhanle yooyo paahi.
Aawanre mantha oottikittheliya iphome, ni ncina nawe neehaninya Nuulumo na Nluku.
Ni aantthariya na anakhotto o wirimu, anawenle ikhavalu cootteela, ni coowara coorika nttenko ni coovevyaala, cootteela ni cowoonnyeela.
Vano mwaano wawe mmo yaankhuma ikatana yowiitha, wiira ni yeeyo arakalihe ilapo, ni uyo naahala ulamulela ni ikopo awe yo'yuma, ni mwanene phinhala waama ivinyu yooviruwa ya Nluku owoorya cothene.
Vano nkuwoni mwawe ni wanatarani wawe va, nihantikhiya ncina nineera: Mwene o mamwene ni Apwiya o mapwiya.
Kahomoona tho ncelo neemenle wancuwani, ni ahokhuwela ni ncu nowiirunya eerelaka marepo othene yaavava uculu: Nwaace woono ni nthukumanace wiira nlye isikuhuulu ya Nluku;
mwaakhure inama yo mamwene, inama ya ahooleli o'khotto, inama ya anakuru, inama yo'khavalu ni ya anakhavalu aya, inama ya atthu othene, pooti ukhala owiithawala, ipottha, acikani ni oolupale.
Vano kahoona nsene ni mamwene omwiilaponi na anatoropa aya, anathukumanne wiira yawaane ikhotto amwaananaka ule aawenle ikhavalu na anakhotto awe.

Nanso nsene nne nahotthukiya, wamoca ni nnapiyu owootha, yoole aapanka malakalaka, aathepyaka ale yaakhenle ikanyero yo nsene ni yaari mayonlapela pontto aya. Paahi, oyeeli ayo yahovonyeriya muntthiyani no mooro umpharela ni wooka anari akumi.
Vano akina ayo yaheevakaca ni ikatana yaakhuma mwaano mwa ule aawenle ikhavalu, ni marepo othene yahovonaca nlattu wookhura mirutthu nnye.
Vano, kahomoona ncelo akhuruwaka wirimu; aarina mmatatani mwawe mmo mitthukulo co nlitti nooripela ni no wiisa n'unyolo muulupale.
Uyo ahovarelela ihanasi, inwaa yo khalayi, ri Ntakhali ni Sotwani, ni ahontthuka myakha ilufu.
Vano ahonvonyera munlittini nooripela ni no wiisa, ahontthukela ni ahohela ikanyero, wiira hithepye tho maloko ayo mpaka umalela myakha ilufu. Wahoolo, nolamuliya utthukuliya ukati vakani.

Ciicammo kahoona ihice ni cennyo yahonkomelaca ale avahiye ulamuli woohukhumu. Kahoona iroho ca ale yaahitakaciye nlattu wo'saahiti wa Yesu, ni ciicammo nlattu wo nuulumo na Nluku. Ayo khayaalapenle nsene, ni mena vakani pontto aya, khayaakhenle ikanyero wayuuci ni mmatatani mwaya. Ayo yahonwelela ni yaholamula ni Kristu myakha ilufu.
Vano ale akina akhwile, khayonwelenle mpaka waphiyenryaya myakha ilufu. Nwo phineehaninya wunwelela woopacera.

Ooreriya ni nttakattifu ph'ule pankile mphantte wo wunwelela woopacera. Nookhwa onayeeli uyo khanhala waaphwanya; ayo anhala ukhala mayasataka a Nluku ni a Yesu Kristu ni anaahala ulamulela myakha ilufu nnyo.
Vano wanhalaya uphiyera myakha ilufu nnyo, Sotwani naahala utaphuliya nkalaposo mmo
ni naahala uvira aathepyaka atthu o mwiilaponi ari malootho oomacese o'lapo, Kooki ni Makooki, wiira aathukumanihe ni yaane ikhotto. Vano mencivelo aya ari toko nhaava wo mpahari.
Yaheetta miphantte cothene co'lapo ni yahorukurerya waamakilyaya attakattifu ni isittatti yoothanliya, nanso wahokhuruwa mooro wirimu ni wahaapaha othene.
Sotwani ri mayothepya hovonyeriya wantthiyani no mooro ni wooka, wonwo uryaya nsene ni nnapiyu owootha, ni anaahala uhuvihiya uhiyu n'uthana, wo mahuku othene.
Vano kahoona ihice yuulupale ni yootteela ni ule onkomile vaavale. Ilapo ni irimu cahontthawa waaryawe, ni khanaaphwanyinye nipuro naya yaayo.

Ciicammo kahoona atthu ookhwa, oolupale ni acikani, aneemesiye waaryaya ihice vale. Vano cahohuliya iliivuru. Ni ciicammo iliivuru ikina, iri iliivuru yo'kumi, yahohuliya. Atthu akhwile yahohukhumwinya, toko ceeraya mavarelo miteko caya, toko ciinryaya woophwanyinya yantikhiye nliivuruni mmo.
Vano ipahari yahaakumiha atthu ookhwa yaarinaya. Nookhwa ni mahiye yahaakumiha atthu ookhwa yahaakumiha atthu ookhwa yaarinaya. Ni yahohukhumwinya mmoca mmoca, toko khula ntthu caavarawe.
Vano nookhwa ni mahiye, yahovonyeriya wantthiyani no mooro. Ula phi nookhwa onayeeli, ntthiya no mooro.
Vano ntthu ahaaphwanyinye naantikhiye nliivuruni yo'kumi, ula ahovonyeriya muntthiyani no mooro.
Vano kahoona irimu yonaanano ni ilapo yonaanano, maana irimu yoopacera ni ilapo yoopacera cihovira, ni ipahari khiiwo tho.
Kahoona ciicammo isittatti ittakattifu, Yerusalemu onaanano, aakhuruwa wirimu wa Nluku, oowaraca toko mayopakaneliya arwaaka wa awannyawe.
Vano kaheewa ncu nowiirunya nikhumaka wahiceni, niiraka: Nkamooneni, heema a Nluku wariyari wa atthu. Nluku naahala waakhalana ayo. Ayo anhala ukhala unethi wa Nluku ni Nluku naahala waakhalana ayo.
Naahala waawuta miithori aya othene ni nookhwa khanhala ukhala tho. Khacinhala uwariya tho mikhutta, mena ucukula, mena yoowerya, nlattu citthu coopacera nnyo cihovira.
Ule onkomile wahiceni eenre: Nkoonani! Kinaapanka citthu cothene conaanano. Ni ahoncerera tho eeraka: Wantikhe, maana ala moolumo ala ari eekhweli.
Nanlelo ahokiirela: Cothene cihomaliheriya. Mi ki Alfa ni Omeka, Oopacera ni Oomalihera. Ule ninvonle ntthona, kinanvaha wo mahala uwurya waluusi, maasi ookumi.
Vano nohala utthema, nawaakhela nnya citthu nnya. Mi kinhala ukhala Nluku awe n'uyo nohala ukhala mwanaka.

Nanso atthu oohikhuluvela, oohikupali, oovara coohiloka, mayowiiva, mayoluva, ananyanka, anaalapela anluku ni mayowootha othene, nipuro ninaaphwanela niri untthiyani no mooro ni wooka, maanaya wiira ula phiri nookhwa onayeeli.
Ahowa mmoca wa ancelo saapa yaarina mmatatani mwaya ikikhompe saapa coocara ikhuutura cowiiheerya. Uyo ahokiirela: Uwe woono, kuuthoonyere mayopakaneliya, amwaarawe Mwakhontwaa.
Vaavale ahokikusa munnepani, mpaka wamwaakoni muulupale ni woorekama. Ahokithoonyera isittatti ittakattifu, Yerusalemu yaakhuruwa wirimu wa Nluku,
yeeyo irina waarya wa Nluku. Makhalelo aya yaari yo waarya toko nluku no'fayita, toko nluku no yasipe kristalina.
Yahaana iluwani yuulupale ni yoosancama, mikhora khumi na miili. Wamoca ni mikhora nnye, yahaawo ancelo khumi n'eeli; mmikhorani mmo yahantikhiya macina o maloko khumi na meeli a asaana a Sirayeli.
Cahaawo mikhora miraru mphantte unkhuma ncuwa, miraru unkela ncuwa, miraru mphantte wo'culu ni miraru mphantte wo'hitto.
Vano iluwani yo'sittatti ile yahaana mapotto khumi na meeli ni waculu waya yaayo yahaawo macina a amitthenka khumi n'eeli a Mwakhontwaa.
Vano ule aakuuluman'ole, ahaana nliko awe, nliko wo'wooru wiira alike isittatti, mikhora caya ni iluwani aya.

Isittatti iyo iri yo malootho macese oolikana; marekamelo aya ni matapuwelo aya ari oolikana. Aholika isittatti ile ni nliko ule miliko cene ilufu khumi na piili (12.000). Marekamelo aya, matapuwelo aya ni masancamelo aya ari oolikana.
Ciicammo aholika iluwani aya, miliko cene iminya wa arupayini na micese (144), nliko wa ntthu, yooyo waatthuminryawe ncelo.
Ikaruma cootekeliya iluwani iyo yaari yasipe, ni ciicammo isittatti yaari yo'wooru yoorera, yoolikana toko iviituru yo woonnyeela.

Mapotto o'luwani yo'sittatti iyo yaari o nkwaratati wothene wo maluku o'fayita. Nipotto noopacera naari no yasipe; nonayeeli naari no safira; noneeraru naari no kalisetoninya; noneecese naari no esimeralita;

nonethanu naari no sartoninya; nonasiita naari no sartiyu; nonasaapa naari no krisolitu; nonanaane naari no perliyu; nonakhentta naari no topasiyu; nonakhumi naari no krisoprasu; nonakhumi na nimoca naari no yasintu ni nonakhumi na meeli naari no ametista.
Cennyo mikhora khumi na miili nnyo ciri ipeerola khumi na piili. Mphantte wo'sittatti uri wo'wooru yoorera toko iviituru yo woonnyeela.
Mommo, akoonne inupa ya Nluku, maana inupa aya ari pha Apwiya, Nluku owoorya cothene, ni Mwakhontwaa.
Isittatti iyo khimphavela ncuwa, mena mweeri, wiira imwaleele, maana waarya wa Nluku uhomwaleela, ni Mwakhontwaa phiri isamaninya.
Maloko ayo anhala weetta nwaaryani mwawe, ni mamwene omwiilaponi anammwiihera nttittimiho nawe.
Mikhora cawe nnyo khacinhala utthukiya uthana, maana khunhala ukhala uhiyu.
Naahala uwiiheriya waarya ni nttittimiho wo maloko othene.
Mommo khiiwo inhala utakaneela yoohiloka, mena oopanka coonanara ni wootha, nanso owantikhiya paahi nliivuruni yo'kumi mwa Mwakhontwaa.
Vano ncelo uyo ahokithoonyera mooloko wo maasi ookumi, o wooneela toko iviituru, ankhuma wahiceni wa Nluku ni wa Mwakhontwaa.

Wariyari wo'sittatti, ucenkweni n'ucenkweni, uhaawo mwiri wookumi, uneema mihokorokho khumi na miili. Unawiima mihokorokho khula mweeri, ni matakhuru aya ayo ari nrette unaavoniha atthu o maloko othene.
Khinhala ukhala tho ikilapho. Mwa yeeyo isittatti iyo inaakhala ihice ya Nluku ni ya Mwakhontwaa. Arumeyi awe ayo anaahala unrumeela,
anaahala woona ikhove awe ni wayuuci waya nihantikhiya ncina nawe.
Khunhala ukhala tho uhiyu. Khaanhala uphavela isamaninya, ni hata waarya wo ncuwa, kontha Apwiya Nluku anaahala waamwaleela ni atthu ayo anaahala ulamulela ukati wothene.

Nanlelo ncelo ule ahokiirela coo: Ala moolumo ala ari eekhweli ni oororomelyaa. Apwiya, Nluku o'rooho co minapiyu, ahonveleeliha ncelo aya wiira aathoonyere arumeyi awe citthu cinhala ukhumelela woohipica.
Nkiviriyane! Mi kinaawa woohipica. Horeriya ule nosunka moolumo o wantikhiya nliivuruni mu.
Mi Yohani, phi mi kiiwile ni koonne nnya citthu nnya. Kinoonnene ni kineewilene, kahokhoromela wamettoni wa ncelo ule kithoonyenre nnya citthu nnya, wiira kinlapele.
Vano ule ahokiirela coo: We, uhikilapele mi, maana mi ki nrumeyi wamoca ni we, na asunnaa minapiyu, na ale ansunka nuulumo no'liivuru ila. Unlapele Nluku paahi.
Ahokiirela ninlelo coo: Uhivithe moolumo o wantikhiya nliivuruni mu, kontha ukati uri wakhiviru.
Ule hintthuna isariya, apwaherere uhisariya wawe, ule nopanka coonanara, apwaherere upanka coonanara cawe; nasariya apwaherere upanka isariya, ni nttakattifu apwaherere wiittakattifiha.
Nkiviriyane! Mi kinaawa woohipica, ni itthuvo ciri ni mi wiira kaantthuve khula ntthu toko ciinryawe mavarelo miteko cawe.
Mi phi mi Alfa ni Omeka, Oopacera ni Ookhicera, Owaancera ni Oomalihera.
Ahoreriya ale ankattha coowara caya mphomeni mo Mwakhontwaa, waacera wiira waaphwanele mwiri wookumi, ni akele nkhora wo'sittatti iyo.
Vano anhala uhala vate ari alapwa, ananyanka, mayoluva, mayowiiva, mayowaalapela anluku ni othene anfenta ni aneettela wootha.
Mi Yesu, kihonruma ncelo aka wiira acuwelihe nnya citthu nnya mmakereca mothene. Mi phi mi ntithari ni ucuulu wa Taviti; mi ki niworosa.
Nnepa Nttakattifu ni oopakaneliya, aneera: Uwe! Ule neewa, eereke: Uwe! Ule ninvonle ntthona aweeke, ni ule notthuna, awaakheleke wo mahala maasi ookumi.
Othene yoole neewa moolumo o wantikhiya nliivuruni mu, kinomwiirela coo: Wakhalaka wiira haawo noncerera ala moolumo ala, Nluku naahala ciicammo umuncerera ikhuutura cantikhiye nliivuruni mu.
Ciicammo wakhalaka wiira haawo nowukula moolumo o wantikhiya nliivuruni mu, Nluku naahala uwukula mphantte wo mwiri wookumi, wo'sittatti ittakattifu ni wo citthu cantikhiye nliivuruni mu.
Paahi, ule novaha usaahiti wo citthu nnya, neera coo: Khweli, kinaawa woohipica. Ameni! Mmwe Pwiya Yesu!
Nnema na Apwiya Yesu nikhale ni nyu othene. Ameni!
